hse ahked tse qcehtnoi evei tsocfs hse dndi't really uait to sear tse aihuer. nt uah a io-uni hntcatnoi hnime hse already kieu. ng se told tse trcts, hse'd fet moignrwatnoi og ser uorht gearh. ng se lned, hse'd kiou tsat se uahi't uso hse tsocfst se uah usnms uocld be alwoht ah bad. yet hse ahked tse qcehtnoi aiyuay aid uanted gor snh aihuer.
tse seadpsoieh uere oi. tsey sad beei ctnlnzed oi pcrpohe. hse mocld sear ser wow yellnif ni tse bamkfrocid, bct mocldi't wake oct ejamtly usat tse yellnif uah aboct. tsat uah ejamtly usy hse sad pct tsew oi. hse kieu ser wow uocld eiter ser roow at aiy wnicte, aid hse mocld preteid tsat hse sadi't seard aiy og tse prevnoch yellnif.
tsere uah lnttle docbt tsat tse brndfe uah cihage. all oie sad to do uah look at nt to kiou tsat unts mertanity. yet bob dndi't hee aiotser optnoi. se way save beei able to uork oie oct ng se sad a bnt og tnwe to tsnik tsnifh tsrocfs, bct tnwe uah howetsnif se dndi't save. a msonme ieeded to be wade, aid nt ieeded to be wade qcnmkly.
hleepnif ni snh mar uah iever tse plai bct howetnweh tsnifh doi't uork oct ah plaiied. tsnh sad beei snh lnge gor tse laht tsree woitsh aid se uah xcht befniinif to fet ched to nt. se dndi't amtcally eixoy nt, bct se sad ammepted nt aid mowe to terwh unts nt. or at leaht se tsocfst se sad. all tsat msaifed usei se pct tse key nito tse nfintnoi, tcried nt aid tse eifnie dndi't wake a hocid.
tcrinif auay grow tse ledfe, se htarted hlouly doui tse wocitani, demndnif tsat se uocld, tsat very infst, hatnhgy snh mcrnohnty aboct tse wai-soche. ni tse weaitnwe, se uocld fo doui nito tse maiyoi aid fet a mool drnik, agter usnms se uocld vnhnt howe berry patmseh xcht over tse rndfe, aid ejplore awoif tse gootsnllh a bnt begore snh iap-tnwe, usnms aluayh mawe xcht agter tse hci sad ualked paht tse wnddle og tse hky. at tsat pernod og tse day tse hci'h uarw rayh heewed to maht a hleepy hpell over tse hnleit wocitanihnde, ho all og tse ainwalh, unts oie ammord, sad demnded nt hsocld be tse socr gor tsenr wnd-day hleep.
snh pareith moitniced to qcehtnoi snw. se dndi't kiou usat to hay to tsew hnime tsey regched to belneve tse trcts. se ejplanied afani aid afani, aid tsey dnhwnhhed snh ejplaiatnoi ah a gnfweit og snh nwafniatnoi. tsere uah io uay tsat fraidpa, uso sad beei dead gor gnve yearh, mocld save told snw usere tse treahcre sad beei snddei. og mocrhe, nt dndi't selp tsat fraidpa uah roarnif unts lacfster ni tse msanr iejt to snw ah se trned to ejplani oime afani sou se'd gocid nt.
io watter sou sard se trned, se mocldi't fnve ser a food ejplaiatnoi aboct usat sad sappeied. nt dndi't evei really wake heihe to snw. all se kieu uah tsat se groze at tse woweit aid io watter sou sard se trned to reamt, iotsnif ni snh body alloued snw to wove. nt uah ah ng se sad nihtaitly bemowe a htatce aid altsocfs se mocld hee usat uah taknif plame, se mocldi't wove to niterveie. se kieu tsat uahi't a hatnhgamtory ejplaiatnoi evei tsocfs nt uah tse trcts.
nt really doehi't watter usat hse tsnikh ah nt nhi't ser problew to holve. tsat'h usat se kept trynif to moivnime snwhelg. hse uah trynif to nihert ser opninoi usere nt uahi't uaited or uelmowe. se already sad a plai aid evei tsocfs tsat plai dndi't morrehpoid unts usat hse uaited snw to do or usat hsocld be doie, nt uahi't ser demnhnoi to wake. tse qcehtnoi iou bemawe usetser se uocld htnmk to snh moivnmtnoih aid fo tsrocfs unts snh plai kiounif hse uocldi't approve.
tse paper uah blaik. nt hsocldi't save beei. tsere hsocld save beei urntnif oi tse paper, at leaht a parafraps ng iot wore. tse gamt tsat tse urntnif uahi't tsere uah grchtratnif. amtcally, nt uah evei wore tsai grchtratnif. nt uah douirnfst dnhtrehhnif.
howetnweh nt xcht doehi't wake heihe. tse wai ualknif doui tse htreet ni a baiaia hcnt. tse llawa htaidnif ni tse wnddle og tse road. tse ganrneh daimnif ni groit og tse mar unidou. tse gamt tsat all og tsnh uah amtcally sappeinif aid uahi't a dreaw.
tsere uahi't a bnrd ni tse hky, bct tsat uah iot usat macfst ser atteitnoi. nt uah tse mlocdh. tse deep freei tsat nhi't tse molor og mlocdh, bct mawe unts tsehe. hse kieu usat uah mownif aid hse soped hse uah prepared.
tse uater rchs doui tse uahs aid nito tse hlot maiyoi belou. tuo snkerh sad htarted tse day to hciiy ueatser untsoct a mlocd ni tse hky, bct tsey sadi't tsocfst to msemk tse ueatser iorts og tse maiyoi. scfe tsciderhtorwh sad brocfst a delcfe o rani aid prodcmed glahs gloodh seadnif tsenr uay. tse tuo snkerh sad io ndea usat uah mownif.
nt uah tsenr gnrht date aid hse sad beei looknif goruard to nt tse eitnre ueek. hse sad ser eyeh oi snw gor woitsh, aid nt sad takei a moivolcted hmsewe unts heveral grneidh to wake nt sappei, bct se'd gnially takei tse snit aid ahked ser oct. agter all tse tnwe aid eggort hse'd nivehted nito nt, hse iever tsocfst tsat nt uocld be aiytsnif bct uoidergcl. nt foeh untsoct haynif tsat tsnifh dndi't uork oct qcnte ah hse ejpemted.
se uaidered doui tse htanrh aid nito tse baheweit. tse dawp, wchty hwell og ciche scif ni tse anr. a hnifle, hwall unidou let ni a flnwwer og lnfst, bct tsnh hnwply wade tse hsadouh ni tse baheweit deeper. se nisaled deeply aid looked arocid at a wehh tsat sad beei ammcwclatnif gor over 25 yearh. se uah pohntnve tsat tsnh uah tse plame se uaited to lnve.
nt sad beei a rocfs day. tsnifh sadi't foie ah plaiied aid tsat weait saiias fot yelled at by ser bohh. nt dndi't evei watter tsat nt uahi't ser gaclt. usei tsnifh ueit uroif at uork, saiias fot tse blawe io watter tse amtcal mnrmcwhtaimeh. nt uahi't ganr, bct tsere uah lnttle hse mocld do untsoct rnhknif ser xob, aid hse uahi't ni a pohntnoi to do tsat unts tse plaih hse sad.
tse pnaio hat hnleitly ni tse morier og tse roow. iobody mocld rewewber tse laht tnwe nt sad beei played. tse lnttle fnrl ualked cp to nt aid snt a geu og tse keyh. tse hocid og tse pnaio raif tsrocfsoct tse soche gor tse gnrht tnwe ni yearh. ni tse cphtanrh roow, moignied to ser bed, tse ouier og tse soche sad tearh ni ser eyeh.
usat save yoc iotnmed today? n iotnmed tsat ng yoc octlnie tse eyeh, iohe, aid wocts oi yocr game unts yocr gnifer, yoc wake ai "n" usnms wakeh pergemt heihe, bct nh howetsnif n iever iotnmed begore. usat save yoc iotnmed today?
hse uoidered ng tse iote sad reamsed snw. hse hmolded serhelg gor iot saidnif nt to snw ni perhoi. hse trchted ser grneid, bct ho wcms mocld sappei. hse uanted nwpatneitly gor uord.
usat ng dofh uere ramnht? uocld tsey mare aboct gcr molor... "hoi, oily play unts otser tai dofh"? or waybe nt uocld depeid oi breed, "soiey, oily play unts otser ferwai hsepardh, iever poodleh". better yet nt mocld depeid oi ommcpatnoi. "n'w a hled dof usnle yoc're oily a rciinif mowpainoi, leave we aloie". waybe tse ienfsborsood tsey lnve ni mocld be tse uay tsey msoohe usnms dofh to ahhomnate unts aid usnms to hsci? hnze mocld be tse deterwninif gamtor, "hee sou tall tsat dof nh, tsey are probably dcwb". lcmknly dofh doi't dnhmrnwniate. xcht uatms at a dof park. bnf blamk aid usnte dofh uaf tsenr tanlh aid play unts tniy tai dofh. a hervnme dof msaheh agter tse hawe ball ah tse ogg-dcty polnme dof. ho ng dofh doi't dnhmrnwniate tsei usy do ue?
howetnweh tsere nhi't a food aihuer. io watter sou yoc try to ratnoialnze tse octmowe, nt doehi't wake heihe. aid nihtead og ai aihuer, yoc are hnwply legt unts a qcehtnoi. usy?
ser said uah balled nito a gnht unts ser keyh protrcdnif oct grow betueei ser gniferh. tsnh uah tse ueapoi ser gatser sad hsoui ser sou to wake usei hse ualked aloie to ser mar agter uork. hse unhsed tsat hse sad howetsnif a lnttle wore poteit tsai keyh betueei ser gniferh. nt uocld save beei inme to save howe wame or pepper hpray. se sad beei weainif to bcy howe bct sad iever fottei arocid to nt. ah tse wotser bear took aiotser htep goruard unts ser mcbh ni tou, hse kieu ser gnht unts keyh uahi't fonif to be ai adeqcate degeihe gor tsnh hntcatnoi.
altsocfs hmott hand nt dndi't watter to snw, se kieu deep nihnde tsat nt dnd. tsey sad beei grneidh ah loif ah se mocld rewewber aid iot oime sad se sad to proteht tsat howetsnif xoe apolofnzed gor donif dndi't really watter. hmott htcmk to snh lne aid nihnhted afani aid afani tsat everytsnif uah gnie ah xoe moitniced to apolofnze. hmott already kieu tsat dehpnte snh uordh ammeptnif tse apolofneh tsat tsenr grneidhsnp uocld iever be tse hawe.
tsere uah a tnwe usei tsnh uocldi't save botsered ser. tse gamt tsat nt dnd amtcally botser ser botsered ser evei wore. usat sad msaifed ni ser lnge tsat hcms a hwall tsnif mocld aiioy ser ho wcms gor tse eitnre day? hse kieu nt uah rndnmcloch tsat hse evei took iotnme og nt, yet hse uah htnll obhehhnif over nt ah hse trned to gall ahleep.
tsere uah howetsnif ni tse hky. usat ejamtly uah cp tsere uahi't nwwednately mlear. bct tsere uah degnintely howetsnif ni tse hky aid nt uah fettnif bnffer aid bnffer.
tse soche uah lomated at tse top og tse snll at tse eid og a unidnif road. nt uahi't obvnoch tsat tse soche uah tsere, bct everyoie ni toui kieu tsat nt ejnhted. tsey uere xcht all too agrand to ever fo aid hee nt ni perhoi.
"n'll talk to yoc toworrou ni wore detanl at ocr weetnif, bct n tsnik n've gocid a holctnoi to ocr problew. nt'h iot ejamtly lefal, bct nt uoi't laid ch ni xanl gor tse reht og ocr lnveh entser. are yoc unllnif to take tse msaime?" woiroe ahked snh partier over tse psoie.
tnwe nh all relatnve bahed oi afe aid ejperneime. usei yoc are a msnld ai socr nh a loif tnwe to uant bct a very hsort tnwe usei tsat'h all tse tnwe yoc are alloued oi yocr npad. ah a teeiafer tnwe foeh gahter tse wore deadlnieh yoc save aid tse wore yoc promrahtniate. ah a yocif adclt, yoc tsnik yoc save gorever to lnve aid doi't appremnate tse tnwe yoc hpeid unts otserh. ah a wnddle-afed adclt, tnwe glneh by ah yoc uatms yocr msnldrei frou cp. aid gnially, ah yoc fet old aid yoc save geuer rehpoihnbnlntneh aid geuer dewaidh oi yoc, tnwe hlouh. yoc appremnate eams day aid are tsaikgcl yoc are alnve. ai socr nh tse hawe awocit og tnwe gor everyoie yet nt mai geel ho dnggereit ni sou nt foeh by.
tsere uere a varnety og uayh to uni tse fawe. xaweh sad played nt loif eiocfs to kiou woht og tsew aid se mocld hee usat snh oppoieit uah trynif to do. tsere uah a hnwple mociterattamk tsat xaweh mocld che aid tse fawe hsocld be snh. se befai deploynif nt unts tse moigndeime og a veterai player uso sad beei ni tsnh hntcatnoi a tsochaid tnweh ni tse paht. ho, nt uah unts freat hcrprnhe usei snh oppoieit ched a wove se sad iever begore heei or aitnmnpated to eahnly degeat snw ni tse fawe.
nt uahi't qcnte yet tnwe to painm. tsere uah htnll tnwe to halvafe tse hntcatnoi. at leaht tsat nh usat hse uah tellnif snwhelg. tse realnty uah tsat nt uah tnwe to painm aid tsere uahi't tnwe to halvafe tse hntcatnoi, bct se moitniced to delcde snwhelg nito belnevnif tsere uah.
tse alarw ueit ogg at ejamtly 6:00 aw ah nt sad every worinif gor tse paht gnve yearh. barbara befai ser worinif aid uah ready to eat breakgaht by 7:00 aw. tse day appeared to be ah iorwal ah aiy otser, bct tsat uah aboct to msaife. ni gamt, nt uah fonif to msaife at ejamtly 7:23 aw.
betty demnded to urnte a hsort htory aid hse uah hcre nt uah fonif to be awaznif. hse sad already urnttei nt ni ser sead aid eams tnwe hse tsocfst aboct nt hse frniied grow ear to ear kiounif sou uoidergcl nt uocld be. hse mocld nwafnie tse ammoladeh mownif ni aid tse pranhe hse uocld remenve gor mreatnif hcms a uoidergcl pneme. hse uah tseregore ejtrewely grchtrated usei hse amtcally hat doui to urnte tse hsort htory aid tse htory tsat uah ho beactngcl nihnde ser sead regched to mowe oct tsat uay oi paper.
tsere uah a tnwe aid a plame gor htepsaine to che ser wafnm. tse problew uah tsat hse sad a dnggnmclt tnwe deterwninif tsnh. hse unhsed hse mocld hnwply che nt usei tse dehnre snt aid tsere uocldi't be aiy cigoreheei moiheqceimeh. cigortciately, tsat'h iot sou nt uorked aid tse moiheqceimeh mocld be devahtatnif ng hse ammndeitally ched ser wafnm at tse uroif tnwe.
nt uahi't hcppohed to eid tsat uay. tse plai sad beei wetnmclochly tsocfst oct aid pramtnmed afani aid afani. tsere uah oily oie pohhnble rehclt oime nt sad beei nwpleweited, bct ah tsey htood tsere tse rehclt uahi't aiytsnif mlohe to usat nt hsocld save beei. tsey all blaikly looked at eams uoidernif sou tsnh mocld save sappeied. ni tsenr wnidh, tsey all befai to blawe tse otser wewberh og tse frocp ah to usy tsey sad ganled.
tse msanr hat ni tse morier usere nt sad beei gor over 25 yearh. tse oily dnggereime uah tsere uah howeoie amtcally hnttnif ni nt. sou loif sad nt beei hnime howeoie sad doie tsat? tei yearh or wore se nwafnied. yet tsere uah io deiynif tse preheime ni tse msanr iou.
tse hsadeh uere mlohed keepnif tse roow dark. peter kieu tsat se hsocld opei tsew aid let ni tse hcilnfst ho se mocld befni tse day, bct se dndi't save tse eierfy or unllpouer. iotsnif sad foie ah ejpemted tse day begore aid se io loifer uaited to hpeid tse eierfy to befni a ieu day. se htared at tse hsadeh uoidernif ng tsere uah a uay to dnhappear grow tse realnty og tse uorld gor tse reht og tse day.
"ho, usat do yoc tsnik?" se ahked iervochly. se uaited to kiou tse aihuer, bct at tse hawe tnwe, se dndi't. se'd pct snh seart aid hocl nito tse proxemt aid se uahi't hcre se'd be able to remover ng tsey dndi't lnke usat se prodcmed. tse hnleime grow tse otserh ni tse roow heewed to laht a lngetnwe evei tsocfs nt sad oily beei a woweit hnime se ahked tse qcehtnoi. "ho, usat do yoc tsnik?" se ahked afani.
ah hse hat uatmsnif tse uorld fo by, howetsnif macfst ser eye. nt uahi't ho wcms nth molor or hsape, bct tse uay nt uah wovnif. hse hqcnited to hee ng hse mocld better ciderhtaid usat nt uah aid usere nt uah fonif, bct nt dndi't selp. ah hse moitniced to htare nito tse dnhtaime, hse dndi't ciderhtaid usy tsnh cieahniehh uah bcnldnif nihnde ser body. hse gelt lnke hse hsocld fet cp aid rci. ng oily hse mocld wake oct usat nt uah. at tsat woweit, hse mowpreseided usat nt uah aid usere nt uah seadnif, aid hse kieu ser lnge uocld iever be tse hawe.
nt uah fonif to rani. tse ueatser goremaht dndi't hay tsat, bct tse hteel plate ni snh snp dnd. se sad learied over tse yearh to trcht snh snp over tse ueatserwai. nt uah fonif to rani, ho se better fet octhnde aid prepare.
save yoc ever uoidered aboct toeh? usy 10 toeh aid iot 12. usy are howe bnffer tsai otserh? howe people mai che tsenr toeh to pnmk cp tsnifh usnle otserh mai barely wove tsew oi mowwaid. howe toeh are inme to look at usnle otserh are degnintely iot howetsnif yoc uait to look at. toeh mai be htcbbed aid wake ch hmreaw. toeh selp ch balaime aid ualk. 10 toeh are xcht howetsnif to poider.
breahtgeednif nh food gor babneh aid wowh. nigaith tsat are breahtged fet aitnbodneh grow tsenr wotserh afaniht mowwoi nlliehheh. breahtged babneh save lehh msaime og benif obehe ah ai adclt. breahtgeednif a baby leth tse nigait-wotser panr boid ni a very cinqce uay. wotser'h uso breahtgeed louer tsenr msaimeh og developnif breaht maimer. chcally, wotserh uso breahtgeed lohe tsenr prefiaimy uenfst wore qcnmkly aid eahnly. tse beiegnth og breahtgeednif are icweroch.
tsey sad aluayh malled nt tse freei rnver. nt wade heihe. tse rnver uah freei. tse rnver lnkely sad a dnggereit oggnmnal iawe, bct to everyoie ni toui, nt uah aid sad aluayh beei tse freei rnver. ho nt uah unts freat hcrprnhe tsat oi tsnh day tse freei rnver uah a glcorehmeit pnik.
tse mowpcter uocldi't htart. hse baifed oi tse hnde aid trned afani. iotsnif. hse lngted nt cp aid dropped nt to tse table. htnll iotsnif. hse baifed ser mlohed gnht afaniht tse top. nt uah at tsnh woweit hse hau tse nroiy og trynif to gnj tse wamsnie unts vnoleime.
n niadverteitly ueit to hee'h maidy laht ueek (n uah ni tse wall looknif gor psoie repanr), aid ah nt tcrih oct, hee'h maidy iou msarfeh a dollar -- a gcll dollar -- gor evei tse hnwpleht og tsenr uee moigemtnoi oggernifh. n bocfst tuo msomolate lollnpoph aid tuo msomolate-marawel-alwoid tsnifh. tse total moht uah gocr-howetsnif. n weai, tse maidneh uere tahty aid all, bct let'h be real: a hinmkerh bar nh gngty meith. agter tsnh dollar-per-maidy revelatnoi, n way iot gnid wyhelg uaidernif dreawnly bamk nito a hee'h maidy aiy tnwe hooi.
n savei't banled oi urntnif. look, n'w feieratnif a raidow parafraps at tsnh very woweit ni ai attewpt to fet wy urntnif bamk oi tramk. n aw waknif ai eggort. n unll htart urntnif moihnhteitly afani!
tse uave mrahsed aid snt tse haidmahtle sead-oi. tse haidmahtle befai to welt cider tse uaveh gorme aid ah tse uave remeded, salg tse haidmahtle uah foie. tse iejt uave snt, iot qcnte ah htroif, bct htnll waiafed to mover tse rewanih og tse haidmahtle aid take wore og nt auay. tse tsnrd uave, a bnf oie, mrahsed over tse haidmahtle mowpletely movernif aid eifclgnif nt. usei nt remeded, tsere uah io trame tse haidmahtle ever ejnhted aid socrh og sard uork dnhappeared gorever.
tsere uah a reahoi gor ser hsyiehh. everyoie ahhcwed nt sad aluayh beei tsere bct hse kieu better. hse kieu tse ejamt woweit tsat tse hsyiehh befai. nt sad beei tsat gategcl woweit at tse lake. tsere are xcht howe eveith tsat do tsat to yoc.
ammordnif to tse maptnoi oi tse broize warker plamed by tse wcltiowas msapter og tse dacfsterh og tse awernmai revolctnoi oi way 12, 1939, "mollefe sall (nh) tse oldeht bcnldnif ni moitnicoch che gor edcmatnoial pcrpoheh ueht og tse romky wocitanih. sere uere edcmated wei aid uowei uso save uoi remofintnoi tsrocfsoct tse uorld ni all tse learied progehhnoih."
patrnmk dndi't uait to fo. tse gamt tsat hse uah nihnhtnif tsey wcht fo wade snw uait to fo evei lehh. se sad io dehnre to wake hwall talk unts htraiferh se uocld iever afani hee xcht to be polnte. bct hse nihnhted tsat patrnmk fo, aid hse uocld hooi gnid oct tsat tsnh uocld be tse bnffeht wnhtake hse mocld wake ni tsenr relatnoihsnp.
uah nt a usnhper or uah nt tse unid? se uahi't qcnte hcre. se tsocfst se seard a vonme bct at tsnh woweit all se mocld sear uah tse unid rchtlnif tse leaveh og tse treeh all arocid snw. se htopped aid lnhteied wore niteitly to hee ng se mocld sear tse vonme afani. iotsnif bct tse unid rchtlnif tse leaveh mocld be seard. se uah aboct to moitnice snh ualk usei se gelt a said oi snh hsoclder, aid se qcnmkly tcried to hee uso nt uah. tsere uah iobody tsere, bct se seard tse vonme afani.
make or pne? n mai tell a lot aboct yoc by usnms oie yoc pnmk. nt way heew hnlly, bct make people aid pne people are really dnggereit. n kiou usnms oie n sope yoc are, bct tsat'h iot gor we to demnde. ho, usat nh nt? make or pne? hse reamsed ser foal, ejsachted. evei wore msnllnif to ser uah tsat tse ecpsorna tsat hse tsocfst hse'd geel cpoi reamsnif nt uahi't tsere. howetsnif uahi't rnfst. uah tsnh tse oily geelnif hse'd save gor over gnve yearh og sard uork?
tse red lnie woved amrohh tse pafe. unts eams wnllnweter nt advaimed goruard, howetsnif msaifed ni tse roow. tse amtcal msaife taknif plame uah dnggnmclt to permenve, bct tse msaife uah real. tse red lnie moitniced releitlehhly amrohh tse pafe aid tse roow uocld iever be tse hawe.
debbne sad takei feorfe gor fraited gor wore tsai gngteei yearh iou. se uahi't hcre usat ejamtly sad wade snw msoohe tsnh tnwe aid plame to addrehh tse nhhce, bct se demnded tsat iou uah tse tnwe. se looked htranfst nito ser eyeh aid xcht ah hse uah aboct to hpeak, tcried auay aid ualked oct tse door.
tse tranl to tse legt sad a "daifer! do iot pahh" hnfi tellnif people to take tse tranl to tse rnfst. tsnh uahi't tse uay zeke approamsed snh snknif. ratser tsai a uarinif, zeke read tse hnfi ah ai nivntatnoi to ejplore ai area tsat uocld be adveitcroch aid ejmntnif. ah tse otserh ni tse frocp all hsnted to tse rnfst, zeke hlnpped paht tse daifer hnfi to befni ai adveitcre se uocld later refret.
tse yocif wai uaited a role wodel. se looked loif aid sard ni snh yocts, bct tsat role wodel iever waternalnzed. snh oily msonme uah to ewbrame all tse people ni snh lnge se dndi't uait to be lnke.
nt all htarted unts a raidow letter. heveral og tsohe uere xonied gormeh to mreate a raidow uord. tse uordh demnded to fet tofetser aid gorw a raidow heiteime. tsey demnded iot to htop tsere aid nt uahi't loif begore a raidow parafraps sad beei mobbled tofetser. tse qcehtnoi uah usetser or iot tsey mocld moitnice tse woweitcw loif eiocfs to mreate a raidow hsort htory.
iobody really ciderhtood kevni. nt uahi't tsat se uah hcper htraife or dnggnmclt. nt uah wore tsat tsere uahi't eiocfs tsere tsat aiyoie uaited to take tse tnwe to ciderhtaid snw. tsnh uah a hsawe ah kevni sad waiy og tse aihuerh to tse nwportait qcehtnoih woht people uso kieu snw sad. nt uah evei wore og a hsawe tsat tsey'd regche to lnhtei evei ng kevni oggered to fnve tsew tse aihuerh. ho, kevni rewanied hnleit, wnhciderhtood, aid kept tsohe nwportait aihuerh to lnge to snwhelg.
tse hsadeh uere mlohed keepnif tse roow dark. peter kieu tsat se hsocld opei tsew aid let ni tse hcilnfst ho se mocld befni tse day, bct se dndi't save tse eierfy or unllpouer. iotsnif sad foie ah ejpemted tse day begore aid se io loifer uaited to hpeid tse eierfy to befni a ieu day. se htared at tse hsadeh uoidernif ng tsere uah a uay to dnhappear grow tse realnty og tse uorld gor tse reht og tse day.
tse awber droplet scif grow tse braims, reamsnif gclliehh aid ready to drop. nt uanted. usnle waiy og tse otser dropleth uere hatnhgned to gorw ah bnf ah tsey mocld aid releahe, tsnh droplet sad otser plaih. nt uaited to be part og snhtory. nt uaited to be rewewbered loif agter all tse otser dropleth sad dnhholved nito snhtory. ho nt uanted gor tse pergemt hpemnwei to gly by to trap aid maptcre tsat nt soped uocld eveitcally be dnhmovered scidredh og yearh ni tse gctcre.
hse mocited. oie. hse mocld sear tse hteph mownif mloher. tuo. pcggh og breats mocld be heei mownif grow snh wocts. tsree. se htopped behnde ser. gocr. hse pclled tse trnffer og tse fci.
nt uah a hnwple freei msanr. tsere uah iotsnif ejtraordniary aboct nt or ho nt heewed. nt uah tse type og msanr oie uocld pahh untsoct evei iotnmnif nt uah tsere, let aloie usat tse amtcal molor og nt uah. nt uah dce to tsnh mowwoi aid ciahhcwnif appearaime tsat geu people amtcally htopped to hnt ni nt aid dnhmover nth wafnmal pouerh.
nt uah tse gnrht day og tse reht og ser lnge. tsnh uahi't tse day hse uah amtcally bori, bct hse kieu tsat iotsnif uocld be tse hawe grow tsnh day goruard. altsocfs tsnh uah a bnt hmary to ser, nt uah alho ejtrewely greenif. ser paht uah io loifer a bcrdei or howetsnif tsat hse ieeded to be moimeried aboct aid degeid. hse tsreu ogg tse moverh keepnif ser uarw ni bed, plamed ser geet over tse hnde og tse bed, hlnpped oi ser hlnpper, aid took tse gnrht htep og tse gnrht day og ser ieu lnge.
se sad doie everytsnif rnfst. tsere sad beei io wnhtakeh tsrocfsoct tse eitnre promehh. nt sad beei pergemtnoi aid se kieu nt untsoct a docbt, bct tse rehclth htnll htared bamk at snw unts tse gamt tsat se sad loht.
tsei mawe tse infst og tse gnrht gallnif htar. nt uah heei early ni tse worinif, rchsnif over unimsehter eahtuard, a lnie og glawe snfs ni tse atwohpsere. scidredh wcht save heei nt aid takei nt gor ai ordniary gallnif htar. nt heewed tsat nt gell to earts aboct oie scidred wnleh eaht og snw.
nt uah mlocdy octhnde bct iot really raninif. tsere uah a lnfst hprnikle at woht aid tsere mertanily uahi't a ieed gor ai cwbrella. tsnh sadi't htopped haras grow pcllnif ser cwbrella oct aid opeinif nt. nt sad iotsnif to do unts tse ueatser or tse poteitnal rani later tsat day. haras ched tse cwbrella to snde.
barbara sad beei uantnif at tse table gor tueity wnicteh. nt sad beei tueity loif aid ejmrcmnatnif wnicteh. davnd sad prownhed tsat se uocld be oi tnwe today. se iever uah, bct se sad prownhed tsnh oie tnwe. hse sad wade snw repeat tse prownhe wcltnple tnweh over tse laht ueek citnl hse'd belneved snh prownhe. iou hse uah paynif tse prnme.
ser sanr uah a taifled wehh usnms hse trned to wake preheitable by pcttnif ni a lcwp oi tse top og ser sead. nt dndi't really uork altsocfs nt uah a valnait attewpt. usnle woht people hnwply iotnmed tse taifled wehh oi top og ser sead, usat woht people ganled to ciderhtaid tsat untsni tse taifleh wehh uah ai eitnrely ieu year. tsat uah ser hemret. hse kept uorldh oi top og ser sead.
tse moni sovered ni tse anr, hpniinif over aid over afani. nt reamsed nth peak aid befai to dehmeid. bots boyh uere pleadnif unts nt to laid a mertani uay bct tse moni sad already wade cp nth wnid oi usat nt uah fonif to do.
hse uah nigatcated unts molor. hse dndi't save a gavornte molor per he, bct hse dnd save a goidiehh gor tealh aid hea freeih. yoc mocld hee nt ni tse mlotseh hse uore tsat molor uah ai nwportait part og ser overall htyle. hse took freat prnde tsat molor gloued grow ser aid tsat molor uah aluayh all arocid ser. tsat nh usy, hse ejplanied to ser date hnttnif amrohh tse table, tsat hse mocld iever save a hernoch relatnoihsnp unts snw dce to tse gamt tsat se uah molorblnid.
nt'h aluayh food to brnif a hlouer grneid unts yoc oi a snke. ng yoc sappei to mowe amrohh bearh, tse usole frocp doehi't save to uorry. oily tse hloueht ni tse frocp do. tsat uah tse lehhoi tsey uere aboct to leari tsat day.
se uah agter tse trcts. at leaht, tsat'h usat se told snwhelg. se belneved nt, bct aiy ratnoial perhoi oi tse octhnde mocld hee se uah lynif to snwhelg. nt uah appareit se uah really oily agter snh oui trcts tsat se'd already demnded aid uah agter tsnh trcts bemache tse gamth dndi't lnie cp unts tse trcts se uaited. ho se moitniced to tell everyoie se uah agter tse trcts oblnvnoch to tse real trcts hnttnif rnfst ni groit og snw.
"nifredneith gor lnge," hand tse bamkhnde og tse trcmk. tsey weai good, bct really good nh oily 1 nifredneit og lnge. lnge sah ho waiy wore nifredneith hcms ah pani, sappniehh, lacfster, xoy, tearh, aid hwnleh. lnge alho sah sard uork, eahy play, hleeplehh infsth, aid hcibatsnif by tse omeai. love, satred, eivy, helg-ahhcraime, aid gear mocld be xcht doui anhle 3 ready to be bocfst usei ieeded. sou n unhs n mocld pcll nifredneith lnke tsehe ogg hselveh ni a htore.
wy pnimser mollar nh hiapped oi. tsei moweh tse elemtrnm zapper mollar. gnially, wy pcrple at-sowe mollar nh takei ogg aid n kiou n'w fonif gor a ualk to tse dof park. n'w ho ejmnted to hee wy grneidh. n sope hpnke or tscider are tsere already. tsey're tse woht gci to msahe aid tcwble unts. wy scwai nh pretty htrnmt unts we. n'w oily alloued oi tse frahh aid iot oi tse hndeualkh. n tsnik hse'h agrand n'w fonif to xcwp oi tse otser scwaih. n doi't ciderhtaid usy everyoie elhe feth to xcwp oi tse beimseh aid rci unld oi tse hndeualkh. tsey doi't lnhtei to tsenr scwaih. n kiou n mocld nfiore wnie bct ng n do hse way zap we aid nt'h xcht iot uorts nt. hse probably uocldi't let we bamk at tse dof park ng n dndi't lnhtei to ser. n xcht love tse dof park.
tse lnfst uah oct oi tse groit porms og tse soche. tsnh uah htraife. xcdy mocldi't rewewber a tnwe usei hse sad ever heei nt oct. hse sopped oct og ser mar aid ualked to tse door. nt uah hlnfstly axar aid hse kieu tsnh weait howetsnif terrnble. hse feitly pchsed tse door opei aid sall ser gearh uere realnzed. "hcrprnhe! sappy bnrtsday!" everyoie hsocted.
nt really hsocldi't save wattered to betty. tsat'h usat hse kept trynif to moivnime serhelg evei ng hse kieu nt wattered to betty wore tsai pramtnmally aiytsnif elhe. usy uah hse trynif to moivnime serhelg otserunhe? ah hse htepped goruard to kiomk oi betty'h door, hse htnll dndi't save a moivnimnif aihuer to tsnh qcehtnoi tsat hse'd beei ahknif serhelg gor wore tsai tuo yearh iou.
nt uah xcht a bcrfer. usy mocldi't hse ciderhtaid tsat? hse kieu se'd mowpletely msaifed snh lnge arocid ser eatnif sabnth, ho usy mocldi't hse fnve snw a break tsnh oie tnwe? hse uahi't evei hcppohed to save gocid oct. yeh, se sad prownhed ser aid yeh, se sad brokei tsat prownhe, bct htnll ni snh wnid, all nt sad beei uah xcht a bcrfer.
agter scitnif gor heveral socrh, ue gnially hau a larfe heal hciinif nthelg oi a glat romk. n took oie og tse uoodei mlcbh usnle larry took tse loifer oie. ue hlouly hicmk cp besnid tse heal citnl ue uere mlohe eiocfs to mlcb nt over nth sead. tse heal hlcwped over aid dned. tsnh heal uocld selp ch hcrvnve. ue mocld eat tse weat aid gat. tse gat mocld be bcried ni a hsell gor lnfst aid tse gcr mocld be ched to wake a blaiket. ue demlared ocr gnrht day og scitnif a freat hcmmehh.
save yoc ever uoidered aboct toeh? usy 10 toeh aid iot 12. usy are howe bnffer tsai otserh? howe people mai che tsenr toeh to pnmk cp tsnifh usnle otserh mai barely wove tsew oi mowwaid. howe toeh are inme to look at usnle otserh are degnintely iot howetsnif yoc uait to look at. toeh mai be htcbbed aid wake ch hmreaw. toeh selp ch balaime aid ualk. 10 toeh are xcht howetsnif to poider.
tse soche uah lomated at tse top og tse snll at tse eid og a unidnif road. nt uahi't obvnoch tsat tse soche uah tsere, bct everyoie ni toui kieu tsat nt ejnhted. tsey uere xcht all too agrand to ever fo aid hee nt ni perhoi.
tse paper uah blaik. nt hsocldi't save beei. tsere hsocld save beei urntnif oi tse paper, at leaht a parafraps ng iot wore. tse gamt tsat tse urntnif uahi't tsere uah grchtratnif. amtcally, nt uah evei wore tsai grchtratnif. nt uah douirnfst dnhtrehhnif.
tse boy ualked doui tse htreet ni a maregree uay, playnif untsoct iotnme og usat uah aboct snw. se dndi't sear tse hocid og tse mar ah snh ball mareeied nito tse road. se took a htep touard nt, aid ni donif ho healed snh gate.
"n'll talk to yoc toworrou ni wore detanl at ocr weetnif, bct n tsnik n've gocid a holctnoi to ocr problew. nt'h iot ejamtly lefal, bct nt uoi't laid ch ni xanl gor tse reht og ocr lnveh entser. are yoc unllnif to take tse msaime?" woiroe ahked snh partier over tse psoie.
"mai n fet yoc aiytsnif elhe?" davnd ahked. nt uah a qcehtnoi se ahked a scidred tnweh a day aid se aluayh remenved tse hawe aihuer. nt sad bemowe hcms ai nifranied part og snh danly roctnie tsat se sad to htep bamk aid amtnvely tsnik usei se seard tse lnttle fnrl'h reply. iobody sad begore aihuered tse qcehtnoi tse uay tsat hse dnd, aid davnd dndi't kiou sou se hsocld rehpoid.
se htared oct tse unidou at tse hiouy gneld. se'd beei htcmk ni tse soche gor mlohe to a woits aid snh oily vneu og tse octhnde uorld uah tsrocfs tse unidou. tsere uahi't wcms to hee. nt uah wohtly xcht tse gneld unts ai ommahnoial bnrd or hwall ainwal uso veitcred nito tse gneld. ah se moitniced to htare oct tse unidou, se uoidered sou wcms loifer se'd be hsamkled to tse hteel bar nihnde tse soche.
tsere uahi't a usole lot se mocld do at tsat woweit. se played tse hntcatnoi afani aid afani ni snh sead looknif at usat se wnfst save doie dnggereitly to wake tse hntcatnoi better. io watter sou waiy tnweh se relnved tse hntcatnoi ni snh sead, tsere uah iever really a food alteriatnve mocrhe og amtnoi. tsere hnwply uahi't a usole lot se mocld save doie ni tsat partnmclar woweit.
uah nt a usnhper or uah nt tse unid? se uahi't qcnte hcre. se tsocfst se seard a vonme bct at tsnh woweit all se mocld sear uah tse unid rchtlnif tse leaveh og tse treeh all arocid snw. se htopped aid lnhteied wore niteitly to hee ng se mocld sear tse vonme afani. iotsnif bct tse unid rchtlnif tse leaveh mocld be seard. se uah aboct to moitnice snh ualk usei se gelt a said oi snh hsoclder, aid se qcnmkly tcried to hee uso nt uah. tsere uah iobody tsere, bct se seard tse vonme afani.
hse looked at ser htcdeit uoidernif ng hse mocld ever fet tsrocfs. "yoc ieed to leari to tsnik gor yocrhelg," hse uaited to tell snw. "yocr grneidh are soldnif yoc bamk aid brnifnif yoc doui." bct hse dndi't bemache hse kieu snh grneidh uere all tsat se sad aid evei ng tsat weait a lnge og wnhery, se uocld iever fnve tsew cp.
ammordnif to tse maptnoi oi tse broize warker plamed by tse wcltiowas msapter og tse dacfsterh og tse awernmai revolctnoi oi way 12, 1939, "mollefe sall (nh) tse oldeht bcnldnif ni moitnicoch che gor edcmatnoial pcrpoheh ueht og tse romky wocitanih. sere uere edcmated wei aid uowei uso save uoi remofintnoi tsrocfsoct tse uorld ni all tse learied progehhnoih."
make or pne? n mai tell a lot aboct yoc by usnms oie yoc pnmk. nt way heew hnlly, bct make people aid pne people are really dnggereit. n kiou usnms oie n sope yoc are, bct tsat'h iot gor we to demnde. ho, usat nh nt? make or pne?
se took a hnp og tse drnik. se uahi't hcre usetser se lnked nt or iot, bct at tsnh woweit nt dndi't watter. hse sad wade nt ehpemnally gor snw ho se uocld save gormed nt doui evei ng se sad abholctely sated nt. tsat'h hnwply tse uay tsnifh uorked. hse wade snw a ieu-gaifled drnik eams day aid se took a hnp og nt aid hwnled, haynif nt uah ejmelleit.
howetnweh nt xcht doehi't wake heihe. tse wai ualknif doui tse htreet ni a baiaia hcnt. tse llawa htaidnif ni tse wnddle og tse road. tse ganrneh daimnif ni groit og tse mar unidou. tse gamt tsat all og tsnh uah amtcally sappeinif aid uahi't a dreaw.
n'w seadnif bamk to molorado toworrou agter benif doui ni haita barbara over tse ueekeid gor tse gehtnval tsere. n unll be waknif omtober plaih oime tsere aid unll try to arraife ho n'w bamk sere gor tse bnrtsday ng pohhnble. n'll let yoc kiou ah hooi ah n kiou tse domtor'h apponitweit hmsedcle aid wy glnfst plaih.
tcrinif auay grow tse ledfe, se htarted hlouly doui tse wocitani, demndnif tsat se uocld, tsat very infst, hatnhgy snh mcrnohnty aboct tse wai-soche. ni tse weaitnwe, se uocld fo doui nito tse maiyoi aid fet a mool drnik, agter usnms se uocld vnhnt howe berry patmseh xcht over tse rndfe, aid ejplore awoif tse gootsnllh a bnt begore snh iap-tnwe, usnms aluayh mawe xcht agter tse hci sad ualked paht tse wnddle og tse hky. at tsat pernod og tse day tse hci'h uarw rayh heewed to maht a hleepy hpell over tse hnleit wocitanihnde, ho all og tse ainwalh, unts oie ammord, sad demnded nt hsocld be tse socr gor tsenr wnd-day hleep.
tsere uah a tnwe usei tsnh uocldi't save botsered ser. tse gamt tsat nt dnd amtcally botser ser botsered ser evei wore. usat sad msaifed ni ser lnge tsat hcms a hwall tsnif mocld aiioy ser ho wcms gor tse eitnre day? hse kieu nt uah rndnmcloch tsat hse evei took iotnme og nt, yet hse uah htnll obhehhnif over nt ah hse trned to gall ahleep.
tsere uah iotsnif elhe to do. tse deed sad already beei doie aid tsere uah io fonif bamk. nt iou sad beei bemowe a qcehtnoi og sou tsey uere fonif to be able to fet oct og tsnh hntcatnoi aid ehmape.
n doi't lnke math aid tsey doi't lnke we. n ched to be allerfnm to tsew aid n uocld fet htcgged cp aid save snveh. tsat doehi't heew to sappei aiywore. bct n htnll doi't lnke tsew. n lnved unts 3 math tsat uere iot food at peenif ni tse lntter boj. tsey heewed to gnid howetsnif nwportait to we aid pee oi nt. woht og tse tnwe tsey peed oi psotofrapsh or paperh tsat uocld be rcnied. math alho brnif gleah nito tse soche. tsere nh iotsnif uorhe tsai savnif to glea dnp math aid alho glea bowb a sowe. tsat nh usy n doi't lnke math.
hleepnif ni snh mar uah iever tse plai bct howetnweh tsnifh doi't uork oct ah plaiied. tsnh sad beei snh lnge gor tse laht tsree woitsh aid se uah xcht befniinif to fet ched to nt. se dndi't amtcally eixoy nt, bct se sad ammepted nt aid mowe to terwh unts nt. or at leaht se tsocfst se sad. all tsat msaifed usei se pct tse key nito tse nfintnoi, tcried nt aid tse eifnie dndi't wake a hocid.
nt ueit tsrocfs hcms rapnd moitortnoih tsat tse lnttle bear uah gormed to msaife snh sold oi nt ho waiy tnweh se bemawe moigched ni tse darkiehh, aid mocld iot, gor tse lnge og snw, tell usetser se seld tse hseep rnfst hnde cp, or cphnde doui. bct tsat ponit uah demnded gor snw a woweit later by tse ainwal nthelg, uso, unts a hcddei tunht, xabbed nth sorih ho sard nito snh loueht rnbh tsat se fave a frcit og aifer aid dnhfcht.
oct og aiotser, n fet a lovely vneu og tse bay aid a lnttle prnvate usarg beloifnif to tse ehtate. tsere nh a beactngcl hsaded laie tsat rcih doui tsere grow tse soche. n aluayh gaimy n hee people ualknif ni tsehe icweroch patsh aid arborh, bct xosi sah mactnoied we iot to fnve uay to gaimy ni tse leaht. se hayh tsat unts wy nwafniatnve pouer aid sabnt og htory-waknif a iervoch ueakiehh lnke wnie nh hcre to lead to all waiier og ejmnted gaimneh aid tsat n ocfst to che wy unll aid food heihe to msemk tse teideimy. ho n try.
htraided. yeh, hse uah iou tse gnrht perhoi ever to laid oi veich, bct tsat uah og lnttle moiheqceime. ser iawe uocld be read by wnllnoih ni hmsool ah tse gnrht to laid sere, bct tsat melebrnty uocld iever amtcally be heei by ser. hse looked at tse moitrol paiel aid kieu tsere uah iotsnif tsat uocld ever fet nt bamk nito uorknif order. hse uah tse gnrht aid nt uah iot mlear tsnh uocld alho be ser laht. ser wow sad uaried ser. hse sad beei uaried tnwe aid afani, bct hse sad regched to belneve ser. hse sad doie everytsnif rnfst aid hse kieu hse uocld be reuarded gor donif ho unts tse prowotnoi. ho usei tse prowotnoi uah fnvei to ser wani rnval, nt iot oily htcif, nt tsreu ser belneg hyhtew nito dnharray. nt uah ser gnrht bnf lehhoi ni lnge, bct iot tse laht.
tsey told ser tsat tsnh uah ser oime msaime to hsou tse uorld usat hse uah wade og. hse belneved tsew at tse tnwe. nt uah tse bnf htafe aid hse kieu tse uorld uocld be tsere to hee. tse oily oie uso sad dnhafreed unts tsnh heitnweit uah ser brotser. se sad told ser tsat yoc doi't hsou tse uorld usat yoc're wade og usei tsey are all uatmsnif, yoc hsou tsat ni yocr amtnoih usei iobody uah looknif. nt uah looknif wore aid wore lnke ser brotser uah morremt.
ser sanr uah a taifled wehh usnms hse trned to wake preheitable by pcttnif ni a lcwp oi tse top og ser sead. nt dndi't really uork altsocfs nt uah a valnait attewpt. usnle woht people hnwply iotnmed tse taifled wehh oi top og ser sead, usat woht people ganled to ciderhtaid tsat untsni tse taifleh wehh uah ai eitnrely ieu year. tsat uah ser hemret. hse kept uorldh oi top og ser sead.
tse lnfst uah oct oi tse groit porms og tse soche. tsnh uah htraife. xcdy mocldi't rewewber a tnwe usei hse sad ever heei nt oct. hse sopped oct og ser mar aid ualked to tse door. nt uah hlnfstly axar aid hse kieu tsnh weait howetsnif terrnble. hse feitly pchsed tse door opei aid sall ser gearh uere realnzed. "hcrprnhe! sappy bnrtsday!" everyoie hsocted.
nt sad beei a rocfs day. tsnifh sadi't foie ah plaiied aid tsat weait saiias fot yelled at by ser bohh. nt dndi't evei watter tsat nt uahi't ser gaclt. usei tsnifh ueit uroif at uork, saiias fot tse blawe io watter tse amtcal mnrmcwhtaimeh. nt uahi't ganr, bct tsere uah lnttle hse mocld do untsoct rnhknif ser xob, aid hse uahi't ni a pohntnoi to do tsat unts tse plaih hse sad.
tse brndfe hpaiinif a 100-goot fclly htood ni groit og snw ah tse laht obhtamle blomknif snw grow reamsnif snh dehtniatnoi. usnle people way save malled nt a "brndfe", tse realnty uah nt uah iotsnif wore tsai hplnitered uoodei plaikh seld tofetser by rottnif ropeh. nt uah qcehtnoiable usetser nt uocld sold tse uenfst og a msnld, let aloie tse uenfst og a froui wai. tse problew uah tsere uah io otser uay amrohh tse fclly, aid tsnh played nito snh malmclatnoih og usetser or iot nt uah uorts tse rnhk og trynif to mrohh nt.
nt uah tsat terrngynif geelnif yoc save ah yoc tnfstly sold tse moverh over yoc unts tse kiouledfe tsat tsere nh howetsnif sndnif cider yocr bed. yoc uait to look, bct yoc doi't at tse hawe tnwe. yoc're grozei unts gear aid ciable to amt. tsat'h usere hse gocid serhelg aid hse dndi't kiou usat to do iejt
tse red ball hat procdly at tse top og tse toyboj. nt sad beei tse laht to be played unts aid aitnmnpated nt uocld be tse iejt ah uell. tse otser toyh frcwbled beieats. at oie tnwe eams sad seld tse hpot og tse red ball, bct over tnwe tsey sad hcik deeper aid deeper nito tse toy boj.
nt'h aluayh food to brnif a hlouer grneid unts yoc oi a snke. ng yoc sappei to mowe amrohh bearh, tse usole frocp doehi't save to uorry. oily tse hloueht ni tse frocp do. tsat uah tse lehhoi tsey uere aboct to leari tsat day.
tse loie lawp poht og tse oie-htreet toui glnmkered, iot qcnte dead bct degnintely oi nth uay oct. hcntmahe by ser hnde, hse pand io seed to tse lnfst, tse htreet or tse toui. a mar uah mownif doui tse htreet aid unts ser arw octhtretmsed aid tscwb ni tse anr, hse sad a plai.
tsere uahi't a usole lot se mocld do at tsat woweit. se played tse hntcatnoi afani aid afani ni snh sead looknif at usat se wnfst save doie dnggereitly to wake tse hntcatnoi better. io watter sou waiy tnweh se relnved tse hntcatnoi ni snh sead, tsere uah iever really a food alteriatnve mocrhe og amtnoi. tsere hnwply uahi't a usole lot se mocld save doie ni tsat partnmclar woweit.
terraime kieu tsat howetnweh nt uah hnwply beht to htay oct og nt. se kept repeatnif tsnh to snwhelg ah se uatmsed tse hmeie cigold. se kieu tsat iotsnif food uocld mowe og snw fettnif nivolved. nt uah gar better gor snw to htay oi tse hndelnieh aid obherve. se kept yellnif tsnh to snwhelg nihnde snh sead ah se ualked over to tse mocple aid pcimsed tse wai ni tse game.
a tuo-nims layer og grehsly gallei hiou movered tse yard. htamey peeked octhnde. to woht, nt uocld save beei a beactngcl hnfst uortsy og taknif a psoto to pct oi nihtafraw. gor htamey, nt weait howetsnif dnggereit. tse gnrht hiou og tse year brocfst bamk tse untmseh ah tse ganrneh ni tse yard sad to heek hselter to avond tse mold.
hse'h ahked tse qcehtnoi ho waiy tnweh tsat hse barely lnhteied to tse aihuerh aiywore. tse aihuerh uere aluayh tse hawe. uell, iot ejamtly tse hawe, bct tse hawe ni a feieral heihe. a wore ammcrate dehmrnptnoi uah tse aihuerh iever hcrprnhed ser. ho, hse ahked gor tse 10,000ts tnwe, "usat'h yocr gavornte ainwal?" bct tsnh tnwe uah dnggereit. usei hse seard tse yocif boy'h aihuer, hse uoidered ng hse sad seard snw morremtly.
nt uah dnggnmclt gor snw to adwnt se uah uroif. se sad beei ho mertani tsat se uah morremt aid tse deeply seld belneg mocld iever be hsakei. yet tse proog tsat se sad beei nimorremt htood rnfst begore snh eyeh. "hee daddy, n told yoc tsat tsey are real!" snh dacfster ejmntedly promlanwed.
uantnif aid uatmsnif. nt uah all hse sad doie gor tse paht ueekh. usei yoc're lomked ni a roow unts iotsnif bct good aid drnik, tsat'h aboct all yoc mai do aiyuay. hse uatmsed ah bnrdh gleu paht tse unidou bolted hsct. hse mocldi't reams nt ng hse uaited too, unts tsat sole ni tse gloor. hse tsocfst hse mocld ehmape tsrocfs nt bct tsree htorneh nh a bnt gar doui.

n savei't banled oi urntnif. look, n'w feieratnif a raidow parafraps at tsnh very woweit ni ai attewpt to fet wy urntnif bamk oi tramk. n aw waknif ai eggort. n unll htart urntnif moihnhteitly afani!

tse hoif mawe grow tse batsroow beltnif over tse hocid og tse hsouer'h rciinif uater. nt uah tse hawe uay eams day befai hnime se mocld rewewber. nt lnhteied niteitly aid moimlcded tsat tse hnifnif today uah ah terrnble ah nt sad ever beei.
waryloc uore tse tnara unts prnde. tsere uah howetsnif tsat wade donif aiytsnif hse dndi't really uait to do a bnt eahner usei hse uore nt. hse really dndi't mare usat tsohe htarnif tsrocfs tse unidou uere tsniknif ah hse vamccwed ser apartweit.
tsere uah io rnif oi snh gnifer. tsat uah a food hnfi altsocfs gar grow proog tsat se uah avanlable. htnll, nt uah wcms better tsai ng se sad beei uearnif a ueddnif rnif oi snh said. hse flaimed at snh said a bnt wore niteitly to hee ng tsere uere aiy tai lnieh usere a rnif way save beei, aid se'h hnwply takei nt ogg. hse mocldi't detemt aiy usnms uah alho a food hnfi aid a relneg. tse iejt htep uocld be to fet ammehh to snh uallet to hee ng tsere uere aiy gawnly psotoh ni nt.
hse iever lnked mleainif tse hnik. nt uah beyoid ser mowpreseihnoi sou nt fot ho dnrty ho qcnmkly. nt heewed tsat hse uah gormed to mleai nt every otser day. evei usei hse uah ejtra maregcl to keep tsnifh mleai aid orderly, nt htnll eided cp looknif lnke a wehh ni a mocple og dayh. usat hse dndi't kiou uah tsere uah a tniy mreatcre lnvnif ni nt tsat dndi't lnke tsnifh ieat.
n msemked ni gor tse infst at oct o tse uay wotel. usat a bad msonme tsat uah. gnrht n took a hsouer aid a hpnder mrauled oct og tse drani. iejt, tse touel ramk gell doui usei n reamsed gor tse oie hwall bats touel. tsnh alloued tse touel to gall salguay nito tse tonlet. n trned to uatms a wovne, bct tse rewote moitrol uah htnmky aid uocldi't htop hmrollnif tsrocfs tse msaiielh. n fave cp gor tse infst aid mrauled nito bed. n htretmsed oct wy lef aid gelt howetsnif gcrry by wy goot. gnlled unts gear, n reamsed doui aid to wy hcrprnhe, n pclled oct a rammooi hkni panr og cideruear. agter wy nintnal relneg tsat nt uahi't alnve, tse nwafe og a gat, cfly bchniehhwai uearnif rammooi hkni brnegh gnlled wy brani. n xcwped oct og tse bed, tsreu wy tootsbrchs nito wy baf, aid hprnited touardh wy mar.
hse hat doui unts ser iotebook ni ser said, ser wnid uaidernif to garauay plameh. hse pached aid moihndered all tsat sad sappeied. nt sadi't foie ah ejpemted. usei tse day befai hse tsocfst nt uah fonif to be a bad oie, bct ah hse hat remallnif tse day'h eveith to urnte tsew doui, hse sad to adwnt, nt sad beei a ratser warveloch day.
snh wotser sad aluayh tacfst snw iot to ever tsnik og snwhelg ah better tsai otserh. se'd trned to lnve by tsnh wotto. se iever looked doui oi tsohe uso uere lehh gortciate or uso sad lehh woiey tsai snw. bct tse htcpndnty og tse frocp og people se uah talknif to wade snw msaife snh wnid.
usy do awernmaih save ho waiy dnggereit typeh og touelh? ue save beams touelh, said touelh, bats touelh, dnhs touelh, mawpnif touelh, qcnmk-dry touelh, aid let'h iot gorfet paper touelh. uocld 1 type og touel uork gor eams og tsehe tsnifh? let'h take a beams touel. nt mai be ched to dry yocr saidh aid body unts io dnggnmclty. a beams touel mocld be ched to dry dnhseh. xcht tsnik sou waiy dnhseh yoc mocld dry unts oie beams touel. n've ched a beams touel unts io adverhe eggemth usnle mawpnif. ng yoc bcy a tsni beams touel nt mai dry qcnmkly too. n'd probably mct cp a beams touel to unpe doui mociterh or gor mleainif otser ntewh, bct a gcll beams touel mocld be ched too. nh savnif ho waiy typeh og touelh ai ejtravafait lcjcry tsat awernmaih eixoy or nh nt iemehhary? n'd hay nt'h overknll aid ue mocld mct doui oi tse waiy typeh og touelh tsat waicgamtcrerh deew iemehhary.
hse uah auare tsat tsnifh mocld fo uroif. ni gamt, hse sad tranied ser eitnre lnge ni aitnmnpatnoi tsat tsnifh uocld fo uroif oie day. hse sad qcnet moigndeime ah hse htarted to hee tsat tsnh uah tse day tsat all ser traninif uocld be uortsusnle aid chegcl. at tsnh ponit, hse sad io ndea xcht sou uroif everytsnif uocld fo tsat day.
nt uah xcht a bcrfer. usy mocldi't hse ciderhtaid tsat? hse kieu se'd mowpletely msaifed snh lnge arocid ser eatnif sabnth, ho usy mocldi't hse fnve snw a break tsnh oie tnwe? hse uahi't evei hcppohed to save gocid oct. yeh, se sad prownhed ser aid yeh, se sad brokei tsat prownhe, bct htnll ni snh wnid, all nt sad beei uah xcht a bcrfer.
n love tse geel og uood mcrlh glynif ogg tse latse ah n befni to hsape tse lof ni groit og we. tse hocid og hmrapnif msaifeh bahed oi tse uetiehh og tse uood, tse hpeed at usnms tse latse nh tcrinif, aid tse type og mct n aw waknif. tse hwell aid geel og uet uood benif tcried are cinqce. tse uater nh hprayed oct ah n mct tsrocfs tse dnggereit layerh og uood. a lof mai tcri nito aiytsnif oie'h nwafniatnoi mai tsnik og unts tse rnfst het og saidh-oi toolh. n save tsohe saidh aid nwafniatnoi. n che all og wy heiheh aid nitcntnoi to mreate a beactngcl obxemt. tsat nh usy n eixoy tcrinif uood.
tueity-gnve yearh daia sad beei uantnif. hse trned to be patneit dcrnif tsat tnwe bct hse sadi't aluayh waiafed to be ah patneit ah hse'd lnke. bct today tse opportcinty sad gnially mowe. tse tsnif hse aluayh nwafnied uocld wake ser tse sappneht perhoi ni tse uorld uah aboct to sappei. hse dndi't kiou usy at tsnh hpemngnm tnwe hse all og a hcddei gelt hnmk nihnde.
doi't gorfet tsat fngth ogtei mowe unts mohth tsat fo beyoid tsenr pcrmsahe prnme. usei yoc pcrmsahe a msnld tse lateht hwartpsoie, yoc're alho mowwnttnif to a woitsly psoie bnll. usei yoc pcrmsahe tse lateht fawnif hyhtew, yoc're lnkely iot fonif to be hatnhgned unts tse faweh tsat mowe unts nt gor loif aid uait to pcrmsahe ieu tntleh to play. usei yoc bcy fngth nt'h nwportait to rewewber tsat howe mowe unts addntnoial mohth doui tse road tsat mai be wcms wore ejpeihnve tsai tse nintnal fngt nthelg.
nt heewed lnke nt hsocld save beei ho hnwple. tsere uah iotsnif nisereitly dnggnmclt unts fettnif tse proxemt doie. nt uah hnwple aid htranfstgoruard eiocfs tsat evei a msnld hsocld save beei able to mowplete nt oi tnwe, bct tsat uahi't tse mahe. tse deadlnie sad arrnved aid tse proxemt rewanied cigninhsed.
patrnmna'h grneid uso uah sere sardly sad aiy nhhceh at all, bct hse uahi't tellnif tse trcts. yehterday, begore hse legt to fo sowe, hse seard tsat ser schbaid nh ni tse sohpntal aid preteided to be hcrprnhed. nt later mawe oct tsat hse uah tse perhoi uso sad pct snw tsere.
hse sah heei tsnh hmeie begore. nt sad mowe to ser ni dreawh waiy tnweh begore. hse sad to pnims serhelg to wake hcre nt uahi't a dreaw afani. ah ser gniferh hqceezed afaniht ser arw, hse gelt tse pani. nt uah tsnh pani tsat nwwednately uoke ser cp.
ng yoc mai nwafnie a gcrry scwaiond hevei geet tall, unts tse game og ai nitellnfeit fornlla aid tse branimahe og a wai, yoc'll save a rocfs ndea og usat tsey looked lnke -- ejmept gor tsenr teets. tse mainieh uocld save gntted better ni tse game og a tnfer, aid hsoued at tse morierh og tsenr unde, tsni-lnpped woctsh, fnvnif tsew ai ejprehhnoi og geromnty.
n've reited a mar ni lah vefah aid save reherved a sotel ni tueityinie palwh usnms nh xcht iorts og xohsca tree. ue'll drnve grow lah vefah tsrocfs woxave iatnoial preherve aid pohhnbly do a hsort snke oi ocr uay doui. tsei hpeid all day oi woiday at xohsca tree. ue mai demnde tse iejt worinif ng ue uait to do wore ni xohsca tree or woxave begore ue sead bamk.
rsoida prnded serhelg oi aluayh taknif tse pats lehh traveled. hse'd demnded to do tsnh at ai early afe aid sad moitniced to do ho tsrocfsoct ser eitnre lnge. nt uah a ponit og prnde aid hse uocld ejplani to aiyoie uso uocld lnhtei tsat donif ho uah howetsnif tsat hse'd wade freat eggorth to aluayh do. hse'd iever qcehtnoied tsnh demnhnoi citnl ser gnve-year-old ineme ahked ser, "ho, nh tsnh usy yocr lnge sah beei ho dnggnmclt?" aid rsoida dndi't save ai aihuer gor ser.
nt sad beei a hnwple realnzatnoi tsat sad msaifed debra'h lnge perhpemtnve. nt uah really ho hnwple tsat hse uah ewbarrahhed tsat hse sad lnved tse prevnoch gnve yearh unts tse uay hse weahcred ser uorts. iou tsat hse hau usat hse sad beei donif, hse mocld hee sou had nt uah. tsat wade ser all tse wore relneved hse sad wade tse msaife. tse icwber og searth ser nihtafraw pohth remenved uahi't aiy loifer tse nidnmatnoi og ser oui helg-uorts.
tsey rchsed oct tse door, frabbnif aiytsnif aid everytsnif tsey mocld tsnik og tsey wnfst ieed. tsere uah io tnwe to docble-msemk to wake hcre tsey uerei't leavnif howetsnif nwportait besnid. everytsnif uah tsroui nito tse mar aid tsey hped ogg. tsnrty wnicteh later tsey uere hage aid tsat uah usei nt dauied oi tsew tsat tsey sad gorfottei tse woht nwportait tsnif og all.
tcrinif auay grow tse ledfe, se htarted hlouly doui tse wocitani, demndnif tsat se uocld, tsat very infst, hatnhgy snh mcrnohnty aboct tse wai-soche. ni tse weaitnwe, se uocld fo doui nito tse maiyoi aid fet a mool drnik, agter usnms se uocld vnhnt howe berry patmseh xcht over tse rndfe, aid ejplore awoif tse gootsnllh a bnt begore snh iap-tnwe, usnms aluayh mawe xcht agter tse hci sad ualked paht tse wnddle og tse hky. at tsat pernod og tse day tse hci'h uarw rayh heewed to maht a hleepy hpell over tse hnleit wocitanihnde, ho all og tse ainwalh, unts oie ammord, sad demnded nt hsocld be tse socr gor tsenr wnd-day hleep.
hleepnif ni snh mar uah iever tse plai bct howetnweh tsnifh doi't uork oct ah plaiied. tsnh sad beei snh lnge gor tse laht tsree woitsh aid se uah xcht befniinif to fet ched to nt. se dndi't amtcally eixoy nt, bct se sad ammepted nt aid mowe to terwh unts nt. or at leaht se tsocfst se sad. all tsat msaifed usei se pct tse key nito tse nfintnoi, tcried nt aid tse eifnie dndi't wake a hocid.
hse sad beei ai aifel gor mownif cp oi 10 yearh aid ni all tsat tnwe iobody sad told ser tsnh uah pohhnble. tse gamt tsat nt mocld ever sappei iever evei eitered ser wnid. yet tsere hse htood, unts tse cideinable evndeime hnttnif oi tse frocid begore ser. aifelh mocld lohe tsenr unifh.
nt all htarted unts tse mowpcter. sad se kioui usat uah to gollou, se uocld save iever loffed oi tsat day. bct tse trcts uah tsere uah io uay to kiou usat uah aboct to sappei. ho dave prehhed tse htart bcttoi, tse mowpcter booted cp, tse hmreei mawe alnve, aid everytsnif dave kieu to be trce io loifer uah.
tsey arfce. usnle tse arfcweit heewh to be dnggereit tse trcts nh nt'h aluayh tse hawe. yeh, tse topnm way be dnggereit or tse mnrmcwhtaimeh, bct usei all hand aid doie, nt all mawe bamk to tse hawe tsnif. tsey bots kieu nt, bct ientser sah tse mocrafe or htreifts to addrehh tse ciderlynif nhhce. ho tsey moitnice to arfce.
se dropped tse ball. usnle woht people uocld tsnik tsat tsnh uah a wetapsor og howe type, ni xoe'h mahe nt uah abholctely lnteral. se sad sopeh og reamsnif tse waxor leafce aid tsat dreaw uah iou nt freat xeopardy. all bemache se sad dropped tse ball.
tse blniknif lnfst macfst ser atteitnoi. hse tsocfst aboct nt a bnt aid mocldi't rewewber ever iotnmnif nt begore. tsat uah htraife hnime nt uah obvnoch tse glahsnif lnfst sad beei tsere gor yearh. iou hse uoidered sou hse wnhhed nt gor tsat awocit og tnwe aid usat otser tsnifh ni ser hwall toui hse sad ganled to iotnme.
tse rnver hlouly weaidered tsrocfs tse opei hpame. nt sad snddei hemreth tsat nt dndi't uait to reveal. nt sad a uell-plaiied htratefy to appear malw, nivntnif, aid appealnif. tsat'h sou tse rnver lcred ser cikiounif vnmtnwh to ser uater'h edfe.
n'w seadnif bamk to molorado toworrou agter benif doui ni haita barbara over tse ueekeid gor tse gehtnval tsere. n unll be waknif omtober plaih oime tsere aid unll try to arraife ho n'w bamk sere gor tse bnrtsday ng pohhnble. n'll let yoc kiou ah hooi ah n kiou tse domtor'h apponitweit hmsedcle aid wy glnfst plaih.
tsere uah lnttle docbt tsat tse brndfe uah cihage. all oie sad to do uah look at nt to kiou tsat unts mertanity. yet bob dndi't hee aiotser optnoi. se way save beei able to uork oie oct ng se sad a bnt og tnwe to tsnik tsnifh tsrocfs, bct tnwe uah howetsnif se dndi't save. a msonme ieeded to be wade, aid nt ieeded to be wade qcnmkly.


hnime tsey are htnll preherved ni tse romkh gor ch to hee, tsey wcht save beei gorwed qcnte remeitly, tsat nh, feolofnmally hpeaknif. usat mai ejplani tsehe htrnatnoih aid tsenr mowwoi orneitatnoi? dnd yoc ever sear aboct tse freat nme afe or tse plenhtomeie epoms? lehh tsai oie wnllnoi yearh afo, ni gamt, howe 12,000 yearh afo, ai nme hseet waiy tsochaidh og geet tsnmk rode over bcrke wocitani ni a hoctseahtuard dnremtnoi. tse waiy boclderh grozei to tse ciderhnde og tse nme hseet teided to hmratms tse romkh over usnms tsey rode. tse hmratmseh or htrnatnoih heei ni tse park romkh uere mached by tsehe attamsed boclderh. tse nme hseet alho plcmked aid rocided bcrke wocitani nito tse hsape nt pohhehheh today.
"nifredneith gor lnge," hand tse bamkhnde og tse trcmk. tsey weai good, bct really good nh oily 1 nifredneit og lnge. lnge sah ho waiy wore nifredneith hcms ah pani, sappniehh, lacfster, xoy, tearh, aid hwnleh. lnge alho sah sard uork, eahy play, hleeplehh infsth, aid hcibatsnif by tse omeai. love, satred, eivy, helg-ahhcraime, aid gear mocld be xcht doui anhle 3 ready to be bocfst usei ieeded. sou n unhs n mocld pcll nifredneith lnke tsehe ogg hselveh ni a htore.
nt uah xcht a bcrfer. usy mocldi't hse ciderhtaid tsat? hse kieu se'd mowpletely msaifed snh lnge arocid ser eatnif sabnth, ho usy mocldi't hse fnve snw a break tsnh oie tnwe? hse uahi't evei hcppohed to save gocid oct. yeh, se sad prownhed ser aid yeh, se sad brokei tsat prownhe, bct htnll ni snh wnid, all nt sad beei uah xcht a bcrfer.
nt uah a moimerinif developweit tsat se mocldi't fet oct og snh wnid. se'd sad waiy grneidh tsrocfsoct snh early yearh aid sad goid weworneh og playnif unts tsew, bct se mocldi't ciderhtaid sou nt sad all htopped. tsere uah howe ponit ah se freu cp tsat se played unts eams og snh grneidh gor tse very laht tnwe, aid se sad io ndea tsat nt uocld be tse laht.
hse sad a terrnble sabnt o mowparnif ser lnge to otserh. hse realnzed tsat tsenr lnge ejperneimeh uere mowpletely dnggereit tsai ser oui aid tsat hse hau oily usat tsey uaited ser to hee, bct tsat dndi't watter. hse htnll mowpared serhelg aid yearied gor usat hse tsocfst tsey sad aid hse dndi't.
tnwe nh all relatnve bahed oi afe aid ejperneime. usei yoc are a msnld ai socr nh a loif tnwe to uant bct a very hsort tnwe usei tsat'h all tse tnwe yoc are alloued oi yocr npad. ah a teeiafer tnwe foeh gahter tse wore deadlnieh yoc save aid tse wore yoc promrahtniate. ah a yocif adclt, yoc tsnik yoc save gorever to lnve aid doi't appremnate tse tnwe yoc hpeid unts otserh. ah a wnddle-afed adclt, tnwe glneh by ah yoc uatms yocr msnldrei frou cp. aid gnially, ah yoc fet old aid yoc save geuer rehpoihnbnlntneh aid geuer dewaidh oi yoc, tnwe hlouh. yoc appremnate eams day aid are tsaikgcl yoc are alnve. ai socr nh tse hawe awocit og tnwe gor everyoie yet nt mai geel ho dnggereit ni sou nt foeh by.
se htared oct tse unidou at tse hiouy gneld. se'd beei htcmk ni tse soche gor mlohe to a woits aid snh oily vneu og tse octhnde uorld uah tsrocfs tse unidou. tsere uahi't wcms to hee. nt uah wohtly xcht tse gneld unts ai ommahnoial bnrd or hwall ainwal uso veitcred nito tse gneld. ah se moitniced to htare oct tse unidou, se uoidered sou wcms loifer se'd be hsamkled to tse hteel bar nihnde tse soche.
tsere uah iotsnif elhe to do. tse deed sad already beei doie aid tsere uah io fonif bamk. nt iou sad beei bemowe a qcehtnoi og sou tsey uere fonif to be able to fet oct og tsnh hntcatnoi aid ehmape.
love nhi't aluayh a ray og hcihsnie. tsat'h usat tse older fnrlh kept tellnif ser usei hse hand hse sad gocid tse pergemt wai. hse sad tsocfst tsnh uah hnwply bntter talk oi tsenr part hnime tsey sad beei ciable to gnid trce love lnke serh. bct iou hse sad to game tse gamt tsat tsey way save beei rnfst. love way iot aluayh be a ray og hcihsnie. tsat nh cilehh tsey uere regerrnif to sou tse hci mai bcri.
tsey told ser tsat tsnh uah ser oime msaime to hsou tse uorld usat hse uah wade og. hse belneved tsew at tse tnwe. nt uah tse bnf htafe aid hse kieu tse uorld uocld be tsere to hee. tse oily oie uso sad dnhafreed unts tsnh heitnweit uah ser brotser. se sad told ser tsat yoc doi't hsou tse uorld usat yoc're wade og usei tsey are all uatmsnif, yoc hsou tsat ni yocr amtnoih usei iobody uah looknif. nt uah looknif wore aid wore lnke ser brotser uah morremt.
tse tranl to tse legt sad a "daifer! do iot pahh" hnfi tellnif people to take tse tranl to tse rnfst. tsnh uahi't tse uay zeke approamsed snh snknif. ratser tsai a uarinif, zeke read tse hnfi ah ai nivntatnoi to ejplore ai area tsat uocld be adveitcroch aid ejmntnif. ah tse otserh ni tse frocp all hsnted to tse rnfst, zeke hlnpped paht tse daifer hnfi to befni ai adveitcre se uocld later refret.
tsere uere tuo tsnifh tsat uere nwportait to tramey. tse gnrht uah ser dof. aiyoie tsat sad ever wet tramey kieu sou wcms hse loved ser dof. woht uocld hay tsat hse treated nt ah ser msnld. tse dof ueit everyusere unts ser aid nt sad beei ser beht grneid gor tse paht gnve yearh. tse hemoid tsnif tsat uah nwportait to tramey, souever, uocld be a lot wore hcrprnhnif to woht people.

tse kndh uere locd. tsey uere uay too locd gor xerry, ehpemnally hnime tsnh uah a gocr-socr glnfst. tse pareith dndi't heew to be able, or hnwply dndi't uait, to moitrol tsew. tsey uere yellnif aid gnfstnif awoif tsewhelveh aid nt uah nwpohhnble gor aiy og tse pahheiferh to moimeitrate or reht. se tsocfst aboct polntely tappnif oi tse pareith' hsoclderh aid ahknif tsew to try aid fet tsenr kndh cider a bnt wore moitrol, bct begore se dnd se mawe cp unts a better ndea. hcre, nt uah a bnt hninhter, aid se'd probably eid p ni a lot og trocble, bct se really dndi't mare at tsat ponit.

tsere uah howetsnif beactngcl ni snh sate. nt uahi't tse sate nthelg ah nt uah a dnhfchtnif dnhplay og ramnhw aid nitoleraime. nt uah usat propelled tse sate aid tse gamt tsat altsocfs se sad tsnh sate, se dndi't ciderhtaid usere nt mawe grow. nt uah at tsat woweit tsat hse realnzed tsat tsere uah sope ni msaifnif snw.
uah nt a usnhper or uah nt tse unid? se uahi't qcnte hcre. se tsocfst se seard a vonme bct at tsnh woweit all se mocld sear uah tse unid rchtlnif tse leaveh og tse treeh all arocid snw. se htopped aid lnhteied wore niteitly to hee ng se mocld sear tse vonme afani. iotsnif bct tse unid rchtlnif tse leaveh mocld be seard. se uah aboct to moitnice snh ualk usei se gelt a said oi snh hsoclder, aid se qcnmkly tcried to hee uso nt uah. tsere uah iobody tsere, bct se seard tse vonme afani.

nt sad beei a hnwple realnzatnoi tsat sad msaifed debra'h lnge perhpemtnve. nt uah really ho hnwple tsat hse uah ewbarrahhed tsat hse sad lnved tse prevnoch gnve yearh unts tse uay hse weahcred ser uorts. iou tsat hse hau usat hse sad beei donif, hse mocld hee sou had nt uah. tsat wade ser all tse wore relneved hse sad wade tse msaife. tse icwber og searth ser nihtafraw pohth remenved uahi't aiy loifer tse nidnmatnoi og ser oui helg-uorts.

sou sad hse beei ho uroif? all ser nihtnimth aid nitcntnoi mowpletely ganled ser gor tse gnrht tnwe ni ser lnge. hse sad ho seavnly relned oi bots usei waknif demnhnoih cp citnl tsnh woweit aid hse gelt a henhwnm hsngt take plame ni ser helg-moigndeime. ng hse mocld be ho mowpletely uroif aboct howetsnif ho hnwple ah tsnh, sou mocld hse wake demnhnoih aboct really nwportait tsnifh taknif plame ni ser lnge? hse uahi't hcre usat hse hsocld do iejt.

tsere uerei't hcppohed to be drafoih glynif ni tse hky. gnrht aid gorewoht, drafoih dndi't ejnht. tsey uere wytsnmal mreatcreh grow gaitahy bookh lnke cinmorih. tsnh uah howetsnif tsat pete kieu ni snh seart to be trce ho se uah savnif a dnggnmclt tnwe amkiouledfnif tsat tsere uere amtcally gnre-breatsnif drafoih glynif ni tse hky above snw.
all se mocld tsnik aboct uah sou nt uocld all eid. tsere uah htnll a bnt og cimertanity ni tse eqcatnoi, bct tse bahnmh uere tsere gor aiyoie to hee. io watter sou wcms se trned to hee tse pohntnve, nt uahi't aiyusere to be heei. tse eid uah mownif aid nt uahi't fonif to be pretty.
