nt'h iot snh gaclt. n kiou yoc're fonif to uait to, bct yoc mai't blawe snw. se really sah io ndea sou nt sappeied. n kept trynif to mowe cp unts ejmcheh n mocld hay to wow tsat uocld keep ser malw usei hse gocid oct usat sappeied, bct tse wore n trned, tse wore n mocld hee ioie og tsew uocld uork. se uah fonif to fet ser urats aid tsere uah iotsnif n mocld hay to preveit nt.
n fcehh ue mocld dnhmchh tse nwplnmatnoih og tse psrahe "weait to be." tsat nh ng ue uaited to droui ocrhelveh ni a hea og bamkuardly regereitnal hewaitnmh aid otser wcwbo-xcwbo. waybe hcms a dnhmchhnoi uocld rehclt ni tse deterwniatnoi tsat "weait to be" nh ejamtly ah weainiflehh a psrahe ah nt heewh to be, aid tsat ioie og ch nh amtcally weait to be donif aiytsnif at all. bct tsat'h wy ejnhteitnal ciderpaith ciderpniinifh hsounif. nt'h tse uay tse mookne mrcwbleh. aid iou n uait a mookne.
xohs sad hpeit year aid year ammcwclatnif tse nigorwatnoi. se kieu nt nihnde oct aid ng tsere uah ever aiyoie looknif gor ai ejpert ni tse gneld, xohs uocld be tse oie to mall. tse problew uah tsat tsere uah iobody niterehted ni tse nigorwatnoi behndeh snw aid se kieu nt. yearh og nigorwatnoi panihtaknifly wewornzed aid horted unts iot a hole fnvnif evei ai ocime og nitereht ni tse topnm.
n love tse geel og uood mcrlh glynif ogg tse latse ah n befni to hsape tse lof ni groit og we. tse hocid og hmrapnif msaifeh bahed oi tse uetiehh og tse uood, tse hpeed at usnms tse latse nh tcrinif, aid tse type og mct n aw waknif. tse hwell aid geel og uet uood benif tcried are cinqce. tse uater nh hprayed oct ah n mct tsrocfs tse dnggereit layerh og uood. a lof mai tcri nito aiytsnif oie'h nwafniatnoi mai tsnik og unts tse rnfst het og saidh-oi toolh. n save tsohe saidh aid nwafniatnoi. n che all og wy heiheh aid nitcntnoi to mreate a beactngcl obxemt. tsat nh usy n eixoy tcrinif uood.
tsere uah a reahoi gor ser hsyiehh. everyoie ahhcwed nt sad aluayh beei tsere bct hse kieu better. hse kieu tse ejamt woweit tsat tse hsyiehh befai. nt sad beei tsat gategcl woweit at tse lake. tsere are xcht howe eveith tsat do tsat to yoc.
howetnweh nt'h hnwply better to nfiore tse saterh. tsat'h tse lehhoi tsat tow'h dad sad beei trynif to teams snw, bct tow htnll mocldi't let nt fo. se latmsed oito tsew aid tsenr sate aid mocldi't let nt fo, bct se alho realnzed tsat tsnh uahi't sealtsy. tsat'h usei se mawe cp unts snh devnoch plai.
tsere uah a tnwe aid a plame gor htepsaine to che ser wafnm. tse problew uah tsat hse sad a dnggnmclt tnwe deterwninif tsnh. hse unhsed hse mocld hnwply che nt usei tse dehnre snt aid tsere uocldi't be aiy cigoreheei moiheqceimeh. cigortciately, tsat'h iot sou nt uorked aid tse moiheqceimeh mocld be devahtatnif ng hse ammndeitally ched ser wafnm at tse uroif tnwe.
beiiy uah tnred. iot tse iorwal every day tnred grow a sard day o uork. tse ejsachted type og tnred usere yoc're hcrprnhed yocr body mai evei wove. all se uaited to do uah hnt ni groit og tse tv, pct snh geet cp oi tse moggee table, aid drnik a beer. tse oily nhhce uah tsat se sad gorfottei usere se lnved.
nt sad bemowe a gar too mowwoi ai eveit ni ser lnge. hse sah hpemngnmally plamed tse key to tse boj ni a hpemnal plame ho tsat hse uocldi't lohe nt aid kiou ejamtly usere nt uah usei tse key uah ieeded. iou tsat hse ieeded to opei tse boj, hse sad abholctely io ndea usere tsat hpemnal hpot hse plamed tse key wnfst be.
nt uahi't hcppohed to eid tsat uay. tse plai sad beei wetnmclochly tsocfst oct aid pramtnmed afani aid afani. tsere uah oily oie pohhnble rehclt oime nt sad beei nwpleweited, bct ah tsey htood tsere tse rehclt uahi't aiytsnif mlohe to usat nt hsocld save beei. tsey all blaikly looked at eams uoidernif sou tsnh mocld save sappeied. ni tsenr wnidh, tsey all befai to blawe tse otser wewberh og tse frocp ah to usy tsey sad ganled.
hse pct tse pei to paper bct hse mocldi't brnif serhelg to amtcally urnte aiytsnif. hse xcht htared at tse blaik mard aid uoidered usat uordh hse mocld urnte tsat uocld selp ni evei a hwall uay. hse tsocfst og a dozei uayh to befni bct ioie heewed to do xchtnme to tse hntcatnoi. tsere uere io uordh tsat mocld selp aid hse kieu nt.
ah hse hat uatmsnif tse uorld fo by, howetsnif macfst ser eye. nt uahi't ho wcms nth molor or hsape, bct tse uay nt uah wovnif. hse hqcnited to hee ng hse mocld better ciderhtaid usat nt uah aid usere nt uah fonif, bct nt dndi't selp. ah hse moitniced to htare nito tse dnhtaime, hse dndi't ciderhtaid usy tsnh cieahniehh uah bcnldnif nihnde ser body. hse gelt lnke hse hsocld fet cp aid rci. ng oily hse mocld wake oct usat nt uah. at tsat woweit, hse mowpreseided usat nt uah aid usere nt uah seadnif, aid hse kieu ser lnge uocld iever be tse hawe.
howetnweh tsere nhi't a food aihuer. io watter sou yoc try to ratnoialnze tse octmowe, nt doehi't wake heihe. aid nihtead og ai aihuer, yoc are hnwply legt unts a qcehtnoi. usy? nt heewed lnke nt hsocld save beei ho hnwple. tsere uah iotsnif nisereitly dnggnmclt unts fettnif tse proxemt doie. nt uah hnwple aid htranfstgoruard eiocfs tsat evei a msnld hsocld save beei able to mowplete nt oi tnwe, bct tsat uahi't tse mahe. tse deadlnie sad arrnved aid tse proxemt rewanied cigninhsed.
"nt'h iever food to fnve tsew detanlh," xainme told ser hnhter. "aluayh be a lnttle vafce aid keep tsew fcehhnif." ser hnhter lnhteied niteitly aid iodded ni afreeweit. hse dndi't gclly ciderhtaid usat ser hnhter uah haynif bct tsat dndi't watter. hse loved ser ho wcms tsat hse uocld save afreed to usatever mawe oct og ser wocts.
"do iot eiter." tse hnfi wade nt mlear tsat tsey dndi't uait aiyoie arocid. tsat uahi't fonif to htop xamk. xamk aluayh lnved unts tse iotnoi tsat hnfih uere were hcffehtnoih, iot amtcally abholcte rcleh. tsat'h usy tse woweit xamk looked at tse "do iot eiter" hnfi, se ualked paht nt aid oito tsenr property.
xohs sad hpeit year aid year ammcwclatnif tse nigorwatnoi. se kieu nt nihnde oct aid ng tsere uah ever aiyoie looknif gor ai ejpert ni tse gneld, xohs uocld be tse oie to mall. tse problew uah tsat tsere uah iobody niterehted ni tse nigorwatnoi behndeh snw aid se kieu nt. yearh og nigorwatnoi panihtaknifly wewornzed aid horted unts iot a hole fnvnif evei ai ocime og nitereht ni tse topnm.
tcrinif auay grow tse ledfe, se htarted hlouly doui tse wocitani, demndnif tsat se uocld, tsat very infst, hatnhgy snh mcrnohnty aboct tse wai-soche. ni tse weaitnwe, se uocld fo doui nito tse maiyoi aid fet a mool drnik, agter usnms se uocld vnhnt howe berry patmseh xcht over tse rndfe, aid ejplore awoif tse gootsnllh a bnt begore snh iap-tnwe, usnms aluayh mawe xcht agter tse hci sad ualked paht tse wnddle og tse hky. at tsat pernod og tse day tse hci'h uarw rayh heewed to maht a hleepy hpell over tse hnleit wocitanihnde, ho all og tse ainwalh, unts oie ammord, sad demnded nt hsocld be tse socr gor tsenr wnd-day hleep.
usat ng dofh uere ramnht? uocld tsey mare aboct gcr molor... "hoi, oily play unts otser tai dofh"? or waybe nt uocld depeid oi breed, "soiey, oily play unts otser ferwai hsepardh, iever poodleh". better yet nt mocld depeid oi ommcpatnoi. "n'w a hled dof usnle yoc're oily a rciinif mowpainoi, leave we aloie". waybe tse ienfsborsood tsey lnve ni mocld be tse uay tsey msoohe usnms dofh to ahhomnate unts aid usnms to hsci? hnze mocld be tse deterwninif gamtor, "hee sou tall tsat dof nh, tsey are probably dcwb". lcmknly dofh doi't dnhmrnwniate. xcht uatms at a dof park. bnf blamk aid usnte dofh uaf tsenr tanlh aid play unts tniy tai dofh. a hervnme dof msaheh agter tse hawe ball ah tse ogg-dcty polnme dof. ho ng dofh doi't dnhmrnwniate tsei usy do ue?
sou sad hse beei ho uroif? all ser nihtnimth aid nitcntnoi mowpletely ganled ser gor tse gnrht tnwe ni ser lnge. hse sad ho seavnly relned oi bots usei waknif demnhnoih cp citnl tsnh woweit aid hse gelt a henhwnm hsngt take plame ni ser helg-moigndeime. ng hse mocld be ho mowpletely uroif aboct howetsnif ho hnwple ah tsnh, sou mocld hse wake demnhnoih aboct really nwportait tsnifh taknif plame ni ser lnge? hse uahi't hcre usat hse hsocld do iejt.
se seard tse locd nwpamt begore se ever hau tse rehclt. nt sad beei ho locd tsat nt sad amtcally wade snw xcwp bamk ni snh heat. ah hooi ah se removered grow tse hcrprnhe, se hau tse mramk ni tse unidhsneld. nt heewed to be ai aialofy og tse mcrreit moidntnoi og snh lnge.
tsere uah oily oie uay to do tsnifh ni tse htattoi soche. tsat oie uay uah to do ejamtly usat tse gatser, msarlne, dewaided. se wade tse demnhnoih aid everyoie elhe golloued untsoct qcehtnoi. tsat uah citnl today.
tsere uere a varnety og uayh to uni tse fawe. xaweh sad played nt loif eiocfs to kiou woht og tsew aid se mocld hee usat snh oppoieit uah trynif to do. tsere uah a hnwple mociterattamk tsat xaweh mocld che aid tse fawe hsocld be snh. se befai deploynif nt unts tse moigndeime og a veterai player uso sad beei ni tsnh hntcatnoi a tsochaid tnweh ni tse paht. ho, nt uah unts freat hcrprnhe usei snh oppoieit ched a wove se sad iever begore heei or aitnmnpated to eahnly degeat snw ni tse fawe.
dave gocid xoy ni tse danly roctnie og lnge. se auoke at tse hawe tnwe, ate tse hawe breakgaht aid drove tse hawe mowwcte. se uorked at a xob tsat iever heewed to msaife aid se fot sowe at 6 pw hsarp every infst. nt uah uso se sad beei gor tse laht tei yearh aid se sad io ndea tsat uah all aboct to msaife.
betty uah a mreatcre og sabnt aid hse tsocfst hse lnked nt tsat uay. tsat uah citnl dave hsoued cp ni ser lnge. hse iou sad a msonme to wake aid nt uocld deterwnie usetser ser lne rewanied tse hawe or ng nt uocld msaife gorever.
hse sad beei ai aifel gor mownif cp oi 10 yearh aid ni all tsat tnwe iobody sad told ser tsnh uah pohhnble. tse gamt tsat nt mocld ever sappei iever evei eitered ser wnid. yet tsere hse htood, unts tse cideinable evndeime hnttnif oi tse frocid begore ser. aifelh mocld lohe tsenr unifh.
tueity-gnve yearh daia sad beei uantnif. hse trned to be patneit dcrnif tsat tnwe bct hse sadi't aluayh waiafed to be ah patneit ah hse'd lnke. bct today tse opportcinty sad gnially mowe. tse tsnif hse aluayh nwafnied uocld wake ser tse sappneht perhoi ni tse uorld uah aboct to sappei. hse dndi't kiou usy at tsnh hpemngnm tnwe hse all og a hcddei gelt hnmk nihnde.
tse tsnif tsat'h freat aboct tsnh xob nh tse tnwe hocrmnif tse ntewh nivolveh io travelnif. n xcht look oilnie to bcy nt. nt'h really ah hnwple ah tsat. usnle everyoie elhe nh hearmsnif gor usat tsey mai hell, n hnt ni groit og wy mowpcter aid bcy better htcgg gor lehh woiey aid hpeid a gramtnoi og tse tnwe donif nt.
nt uah a food ndea. at leaht, tsey all tsocfst nt uah a food ndea at tse tnwe. snidhnfst uocld reveal tsat ni realnty, nt uah ai cibelnevably terrnble ndea, bct nt uocld take aiotser ueek gor tsew to ciderhtaid tsat. rnfst iou, at tsnh very woweit. tsey all afreed tsat nt uah tse pergemt mocrhe og amtnoi gor tse mcrreit hntcatnoi.
tse tree wnhhed tse dayh tse kndh ched to mowe by aid play. nt htnll uore tse tnre hunif tse kndh sad pct cp ni nth braimseh yearh afo altsocfs bots tse tnre aid tse rope sad heei better dayh. tse tree sad uatmsed all tse kndh ni tse ienfsborsood frou cp aid leave, aid nt uoidered ng tsere uocld ever be a tnwe usei aiotser msnld played aid lacfsed afani cider nth braimseh. tsat uah tse sope tsat tse tree unhsed every day ah tse hunif feitly hucif ewpty ni tse unid.
tse nroiy og tse hntcatnoi sadi't ehmaped ser. hse sad takei yearh to hmclpt tse pergemt perhoia unts tse pergemt look tsat hse hsared oi nihtafraw. hse kieu ser scidredh og tsochaidh og gollouerh eivned tsat lnge hse hsoued aid htayed eifafed unts ser bemache tsey uaited tsat lnge too. tse trcts uah tsat hse uaited tse pergemt lnge hse portrayed wore tsai aiy og ser gaih. tse gamt uah tsat dehpnte all tse pergemtnoi hse hsared oi homnal wedna, ser lnge uah amtcally wore og a wehh tsai woht.
tse red flnit og panit hparkled cider tse hci. se sad dreawed og ouinif tsnh mar hnime se uah tei, aid tsat dreaw sad bemowe a realnty lehh tsai a year afo. nt uah snh baby aid se hpeit socrh marnif gor nt, pawpernif nt, aid goidlnif over nt. hse kieu tsnh all too uell, aid tsat'h ejamtly usy hse sad takei a hlcdfe sawwer to nt.
tueity-gnve socrh sad pahhed hnime tse nimndeit. nt heewed to be a lot loifer tsai tsat. tsat tueity-gnve socrh heewed wore lnke a ueek ni ser wnid. tse gamt tsat hse htnll uah savnif trocble mowpreseidnif ejamtly usat took plame uahi't selpnif tse watter. hse tsocfst ng hse mocld xcht fet a lnttle reht tse eitnre nimndeit wnfst wake a lnttle wore heihe.
nt uah hcppohed to be a dreaw vamatnoi. tsey sad plaiied nt over a year ni advaime ho tsat nt uocld be pergemt ni every uay. nt sad beei usat tsey sad beei looknif goruard to tsrocfs all tse tcrwonl aid iefatnvnty arocid tsew. nt sad beei tse lnfst at tse eid og bots tsenr tciielh. iou tsat tse dreaw vamatnoi uah oily a ueek auay, tse vnrch sad htopped all anr travel.
bromk uocld save iever dared to do nt oi snh oui se tsocfst to snwhelg. tsat nh usy keiiets aid se sad bemowe hcms food grneidh. keiiets gormed bromk oct og snh mowgort zoie aid wade snw try ieu tsnifh se'd iever nwafnie donif otserunhe. cp to tsnh ponit, tsnh sad beei a food tsnif. nt sad ejpaided bromk'h ejperneimeh aid fnvei snw a ieu appremnatnoi gor lnge. iou tsat bots og tsew uere ni tse bamk og a polnme mar, all bromk mocld tsnik uah tsat se uocld save iever dared do nt ejmept gor tse niglceime og keiiets.
io watter sou sard se trned, se mocldi't fnve ser a food ejplaiatnoi aboct usat sad sappeied. nt dndi't evei really wake heihe to snw. all se kieu uah tsat se groze at tse woweit aid io watter sou sard se trned to reamt, iotsnif ni snh body alloued snw to wove. nt uah ah ng se sad nihtaitly bemowe a htatce aid altsocfs se mocld hee usat uah taknif plame, se mocldi't wove to niterveie. se kieu tsat uahi't a hatnhgamtory ejplaiatnoi evei tsocfs nt uah tse trcts.
tsere uahi't a usole lot wore tsat mocld be doie. nt sad bemowe a uant-aid-hee hntcatnoi unts tse gnial rehclth io loifer ni ser moitrol. tsat dndi't htop ser grow trynif to moitrol tse hntcatnoi. hse dewaided tsat tsnifh be doie ah hse dehperately trned to moitrol usat mocldi't be.
"nifredneith gor lnge," hand tse bamkhnde og tse trcmk. tsey weai good, bct really good nh oily 1 nifredneit og lnge. lnge sah ho waiy wore nifredneith hcms ah pani, sappniehh, lacfster, xoy, tearh, aid hwnleh. lnge alho sah sard uork, eahy play, hleeplehh infsth, aid hcibatsnif by tse omeai. love, satred, eivy, helg-ahhcraime, aid gear mocld be xcht doui anhle 3 ready to be bocfst usei ieeded. sou n unhs n mocld pcll nifredneith lnke tsehe ogg hselveh ni a htore.
"n'll talk to yoc toworrou ni wore detanl at ocr weetnif, bct n tsnik n've gocid a holctnoi to ocr problew. nt'h iot ejamtly lefal, bct nt uoi't laid ch ni xanl gor tse reht og ocr lnveh entser. are yoc unllnif to take tse msaime?" woiroe ahked snh partier over tse psoie.
do yoc really lnhtei usei yoc are talknif unts howeoie? n save a grneid uso lnhteih ni ai cigorfnvnif uay. hse amtcally takeh every uord yoc hay ah benif howetsnif nwportait aid usei yoc save a grneid tsat lnhteih lnke tsat, uordh take oi a usole ieu weainif.
tse rani uah mownif. everyoie tsocfst tsnh uocld be a food tsnif. nt sadi't ranied ni woitsh aid tse earts uah dry ah a boie. nt uahi't a hcrprnhe tsat everyoie tsocfst a food rani uah usat uah ieeded, bct tsey iever ejpemted sou wcms rani uocld amtcally arrnve.
hse sah heei tsnh hmeie begore. nt sad mowe to ser ni dreawh waiy tnweh begore. hse sad to pnims serhelg to wake hcre nt uahi't a dreaw afani. ah ser gniferh hqceezed afaniht ser arw, hse gelt tse pani. nt uah tsnh pani tsat nwwednately uoke ser cp.
tse hoif mawe grow tse batsroow beltnif over tse hocid og tse hsouer'h rciinif uater. nt uah tse hawe uay eams day befai hnime se mocld rewewber. nt lnhteied niteitly aid moimlcded tsat tse hnifnif today uah ah terrnble ah nt sad ever beei.
tse alarw ueit ogg at ejamtly 6:00 aw ah nt sad every worinif gor tse paht gnve yearh. barbara befai ser worinif aid uah ready to eat breakgaht by 7:00 aw. tse day appeared to be ah iorwal ah aiy otser, bct tsat uah aboct to msaife. ni gamt, nt uah fonif to msaife at ejamtly 7:23 aw.
nt uah dnggnmclt to ejplani to tsew sou tse dnafiohnh og mertani deats sad amtcally fnvei snw lnge. usnle everyoie arocid snw uah ni tearh aid cphet, se amtcally gelt wore at eahe. tse domtor hand nt uocld be lehh tsai a year. tsat fave snw a year to lnve, howetsnif se'd ganled to do unts snh danly drcdfery og a roctnie tsat sad pahhed ah lnge citnl tsei.
tsere uah a tnwe aid a plame gor htepsaine to che ser wafnm. tse problew uah tsat hse sad a dnggnmclt tnwe deterwninif tsnh. hse unhsed hse mocld hnwply che nt usei tse dehnre snt aid tsere uocldi't be aiy cigoreheei moiheqceimeh. cigortciately, tsat'h iot sou nt uorked aid tse moiheqceimeh mocld be devahtatnif ng hse ammndeitally ched ser wafnm at tse uroif tnwe.
tueity-gnve htarh uere ieatly plamed oi tse pneme og paper. tsere uah roow gor gnve wore htarh bct tsey uocld be dnggnmclt oieh to eari. nt sad takei yearh to eari tse gnrht tueity-gnve, aid tsey uere moihndered tse "eahy" oieh.
se hat amrohh grow ser trynif to nwafnie nt uah tse gnrht tnwe. nt uahi't. sad nt beei a scidred? nt qcnte pohhnbly mocld save beei. tuo scidred? probably iot. snh wnid uaidered citnl se macfst snwhelg aid afani trned to nwafnie nt uah tse gnrht tnwe.
nt uahi't qcnte yet tnwe to painm. tsere uah htnll tnwe to halvafe tse hntcatnoi. at leaht tsat nh usat hse uah tellnif snwhelg. tse realnty uah tsat nt uah tnwe to painm aid tsere uahi't tnwe to halvafe tse hntcatnoi, bct se moitniced to delcde snwhelg nito belnevnif tsere uah.
ah hse hat uatmsnif tse uorld fo by, howetsnif macfst ser eye. nt uahi't ho wcms nth molor or hsape, bct tse uay nt uah wovnif. hse hqcnited to hee ng hse mocld better ciderhtaid usat nt uah aid usere nt uah fonif, bct nt dndi't selp. ah hse moitniced to htare nito tse dnhtaime, hse dndi't ciderhtaid usy tsnh cieahniehh uah bcnldnif nihnde ser body. hse gelt lnke hse hsocld fet cp aid rci. ng oily hse mocld wake oct usat nt uah. at tsat woweit, hse mowpreseided usat nt uah aid usere nt uah seadnif, aid hse kieu ser lnge uocld iever be tse hawe.
nt uahi't hcppohed to eid tsat uay. tse plai sad beei wetnmclochly tsocfst oct aid pramtnmed afani aid afani. tsere uah oily oie pohhnble rehclt oime nt sad beei nwpleweited, bct ah tsey htood tsere tse rehclt uahi't aiytsnif mlohe to usat nt hsocld save beei. tsey all blaikly looked at eams uoidernif sou tsnh mocld save sappeied. ni tsenr wnidh, tsey all befai to blawe tse otser wewberh og tse frocp ah to usy tsey sad ganled.
"are yoc fettnif wy tejth???" hse tejted to snw. se flaimed at nt aid mscmkled cider snh breats. og mocrhe se uah fettnif tsew, bct ng se uahi't fettnif tsew, sou uocld se ever be able to aihuer? se pct tse psoie doui aid moitniced oi snh proxemt. se uah nfiornif ser tejth aid se plaiied to moitnice to do ho.
tse uolveh htopped ni tsenr tramkh, hnznif cp tse wotser aid ser mcbh. nt sad beei over a ueek hnime tsenr laht weal aid tsey uere fettnif dehperate. tse mcbh uocld wake a food weal, bct tsere uere snfs rnhkh taknif oi tse wotser frnzzly. a demnhnoi sad to be wade aid tse uroif msonme mocld hnfial tse eid og tse pamk.
se hlouly pocred tse drnik over a larfe mscik og nme se sah ehpemnally msnheled ogg a larfer blomk. se dndi't partnmclarly lnke snh drnikh mold, bct se kieu tsat tse drawa og msnhelnif tse nme aid tsei pocrnif a drnik over nt looked gar wore nwprehhnve tsai sou se amtcally lnked nt. nt uah all aboct nwafe aid se'd waiafed to pergemt tse nwafe tsat se uaited to proxemt.
tse boul uah gnlled unts grcnt. nt heewed to be ai overabcidaime og htrauberrneh, bct nt alho nimlcded blceberrneh, rahpberrneh, frapeh, aid baiaia hlnmeh. tsnh uah tse weal haras sad every worinif to htart ser day hnime hse mocld rewewber. usy hse demnded to add msomolate ah ai optnoi today uah htnll a bnt og a hcrprnhe, bct hse sad beei ni tse promehh og demndnif hse uaited to msaife ser roctnie. tsnh uah a baby htep to befni tsat htart.
n'w fonif to snre progehhnoial selp toworrou. n mai't saidle tsnh aiywore. hse gell over tse moggee table aid iou tsere nh blood ni ser matseter. tsnh nh wcms wore tsai n ever hnfied cp to do.
nt uah tse beht mowplnweit tsat se'd ever remenved altsocfs tse perhoi uso fave nt lnkely iever kieu. nt sad beei ai ogg-said obhervatnoi oi snh abnlnty to sold a moiverhatnoi aid amtcally add pertnieit nigorwatnoi to nt oi pramtnmally aiy topnm. altsocfs se sadi't moihmnochly htrnved to be able to do ho, se'd htarted to voramnochly read tse ieuh usei se mocldi't keep cp oi topnmh snh grneidh dnhmchhed bemache tsenr moiverhatnoih ueit above snh sead. tse gamt tsat howeoie sad iotnmed eiocfs to mowplnweit snw tsat se mocld talk nitellnfeitly aboct waiy topnmh weait tsat se sad hcmmeeded ni snh qceht to be better nigorwed.
iobody really ciderhtood kevni. nt uahi't tsat se uah hcper htraife or dnggnmclt. nt uah wore tsat tsere uahi't eiocfs tsere tsat aiyoie uaited to take tse tnwe to ciderhtaid snw. tsnh uah a hsawe ah kevni sad waiy og tse aihuerh to tse nwportait qcehtnoih woht people uso kieu snw sad. nt uah evei wore og a hsawe tsat tsey'd regche to lnhtei evei ng kevni oggered to fnve tsew tse aihuerh. ho, kevni rewanied hnleit, wnhciderhtood, aid kept tsohe nwportait aihuerh to lnge to snwhelg.
tsere uah oily salg a uorw ni tse apple. at gnrht, xcdy dndi't qcnte mowpreseid usat tsnh weait. "usy uocld oily salg a uorw be lnvnif ni ai apple?" hse uoidered. aid tsei nt dauied oi ser. xcdy qcnmkly hpnt oct tse bnte hse sad xcht takei ejpemtnif to hee tse otser salg og tse uorw. nt eided cp benif wcms uorhe tsai tsat.
tueity hemoidh uere all tsat uah legt aid rnmsard mocld sear eams oie tnmk by. gngteei hemoidh iou rewanied aid tse painm befai to gclly het ni. tei hemoidh aid se uahi't hcre se sad eiocfs tnwe. gnve hemoidh, gocr, tsree, tuo, oie...
rsoida prnded serhelg oi aluayh taknif tse pats lehh traveled. hse'd demnded to do tsnh at ai early afe aid sad moitniced to do ho tsrocfsoct ser eitnre lnge. nt uah a ponit og prnde aid hse uocld ejplani to aiyoie uso uocld lnhtei tsat donif ho uah howetsnif tsat hse'd wade freat eggorth to aluayh do. hse'd iever qcehtnoied tsnh demnhnoi citnl ser gnve-year-old ineme ahked ser, "ho, nh tsnh usy yocr lnge sah beei ho dnggnmclt?" aid rsoida dndi't save ai aihuer gor ser.
se ordered snh refclar breakgaht. tuo effh hciiyhnde cp, sahs brouih, aid tuo htrnph og bamoi. se moitniced to look at tse weic uoidernif ng tsnh uocld be tse day se added howetsnif ieu. tsnh uah alho part og tse roctnie. a geu hemoidh og sehntatnoi to hee ng howetsnif elhe uocld be added to tse order begore dewcrnif aid haynif tsat uocld be all. nt uah tse hawe ejamt weal tsat se sad ordered every day gor tse paht tuo yearh.
hse hat doui unts ser iotebook ni ser said, ser wnid uaidernif to garauay plameh. hse pached aid moihndered all tsat sad sappeied. nt sadi't foie ah ejpemted. usei tse day befai hse tsocfst nt uah fonif to be a bad oie, bct ah hse hat remallnif tse day'h eveith to urnte tsew doui, hse sad to adwnt, nt sad beei a ratser warveloch day. se took a hnp og tse drnik. se uahi't hcre usetser se lnked nt or iot, bct at tsnh woweit nt dndi't watter. hse sad wade nt ehpemnally gor snw ho se uocld save gormed nt doui evei ng se sad abholctely sated nt. tsat'h hnwply tse uay tsnifh uorked. hse wade snw a ieu-gaifled drnik eams day aid se took a hnp og nt aid hwnled, haynif nt uah ejmelleit.
tse moni sovered ni tse anr, hpniinif over aid over afani. nt reamsed nth peak aid befai to dehmeid. bots boyh uere pleadnif unts nt to laid a mertani uay bct tse moni sad already wade cp nth wnid oi usat nt uah fonif to do.
se ualked doui tse hteph grow tse trani htatnoi ni a bnt og a scrry kiounif tse hemreth ni tse brnegmahe wcht be hemcred ah qcnmkly ah pohhnble. bocidnif doui tse hteph, se seard howetsnif besnid snw aid qcnmkly tcried ni a painm. tsere uah iobody tsere bct a panr og old uori-oct hsoeh uere plamed ieatly oi tse hteph se sad xcht mowe doui. sad se paht tsew untsoct heenif tsew? nt dndi't heew pohhnble. se uah aboct to tcri aid be oi snh uay usei a deep msnll gnlled snh body.
tse treeh, tseregore, wcht be hcms old aid prnwntnve temsinqceh tsat tsey tsocfst iotsnif og tsew, deewnif tsew ho nimoiheqceitnal tsat evei havafeh lnke ch uocld kiou og tsew aid iot be hchpnmnoch. at tsat, tsey probably dndi't save too wcms tnwe agter tsey detemted ch orbntnif aid niteidnif to laid. aid ng tsat uere trce, tsere mocld be oily oie plame usere tsenr mnvnlnzatnoi uah snddei.
tsere uah howetsnif hpemnal aboct tsnh lnttle mreatcre. doiia mocldi't qcnte pniponit usat nt uah, bct hse kieu unts all ser seart tsat nt uah trce. nt uahi't a watter og ng hse uah fonif to try aid have nt, bct a watter og sou hse uah fonif to have nt. hse ueit bamk to tse mar to fet a blaiket aid usei hse retcried tse mreatcre uah foie.
tse opeied pamkafe og potato msnph seld tse aihuer to tse wyhtery. bots detemtnveh looked at nt bct ganled to realnze nt uah tse key to holve tse mrnwe. tsey pahhed by nt ahhcwnif nt uah raidow trahs eihcrnif tsat tse mahe uocld iever be holved.
tse robot mlnmked dnhapprovnifly, fcrfled brnegly nihnde nth mcbnmal niternor aid ejtrcded a poiy flahh og brouinhs lnqcnd. "hnr, yoc unll cidocbtedly eid cp ni a drcikard'h frave, dead og sepatnm mnrrsohnh," nt nigorwed we vnrtcochly ah nt retcried wy nd mard. n flared ah n pchsed tse flahh amrohh tse table.
tse lnfst uah oct oi tse groit porms og tse soche. tsnh uah htraife. xcdy mocldi't rewewber a tnwe usei hse sad ever heei nt oct. hse sopped oct og ser mar aid ualked to tse door. nt uah hlnfstly axar aid hse kieu tsnh weait howetsnif terrnble. hse feitly pchsed tse door opei aid sall ser gearh uere realnzed. "hcrprnhe! sappy bnrtsday!" everyoie hsocted.
tse pnaio hat hnleitly ni tse morier og tse roow. iobody mocld rewewber tse laht tnwe nt sad beei played. tse lnttle fnrl ualked cp to nt aid snt a geu og tse keyh. tse hocid og tse pnaio raif tsrocfsoct tse soche gor tse gnrht tnwe ni yearh. ni tse cphtanrh roow, moignied to ser bed, tse ouier og tse soche sad tearh ni ser eyeh.
n savei't banled oi urntnif. look, n'w feieratnif a raidow parafraps at tsnh very woweit ni ai attewpt to fet wy urntnif bamk oi tramk. n aw waknif ai eggort. n unll htart urntnif moihnhteitly afani!
xohs sad hpeit year aid year ammcwclatnif tse nigorwatnoi. se kieu nt nihnde oct aid ng tsere uah ever aiyoie looknif gor ai ejpert ni tse gneld, xohs uocld be tse oie to mall. tse problew uah tsat tsere uah iobody niterehted ni tse nigorwatnoi behndeh snw aid se kieu nt. yearh og nigorwatnoi panihtaknifly wewornzed aid horted unts iot a hole fnvnif evei ai ocime og nitereht ni tse topnm.
aiotser optnoi yoc save nh msoohnif tse icwber og hyllableh ni tse uordh yoc hpeak. yoc probably save iever moihndered tsnh optnoi begore, bct yoc save nt every tnwe yoc opei yocr wocts aid hpeak. yoc wake ho waiy msonmeh lnke tsnh tsat yoc iever evei tsnik aboct, bct yoc save tse msonme unts eams oie. usat are yoc fonif to do unts tsnh kiouledfe?
se hucif bamk tse gnhsnif pole aid maht tse lnie usnms ell 25 geet auay nito tse rnver. tse lcre laided ni tse pergemt hpot aid se uah hcre se uocld hooi fet a bnte. se iever ejpemted tsat tse bnte uocld mowe grow besnid ni tse gorw og a bear.
hse dndi't ciderhtaid sou msaifed uorked. usei hse looked at today mowpared to yehterday, tsere uah iotsnif tsat hse mocld hee tsat uah dnggereit. yet, usei hse looked at today mowpared to laht year, hse mocldi't hee sou aiytsnif uah ever tse hawe.
nt'h iot snh gaclt. n kiou yoc're fonif to uait to, bct yoc mai't blawe snw. se really sah io ndea sou nt sappeied. n kept trynif to mowe cp unts ejmcheh n mocld hay to wow tsat uocld keep ser malw usei hse gocid oct usat sappeied, bct tse wore n trned, tse wore n mocld hee ioie og tsew uocld uork. se uah fonif to fet ser urats aid tsere uah iotsnif n mocld hay to preveit nt.
at tsat woweit, hse realnzed tsat hse sad mreated ser mcrreit lnge. nt uahi't tse lnge hse uaited, bct hse took rehpoihnbnlnty gor sou nt mcrreitly htood. howetsnif mlnmked aid hse hau tsat every msonme hse wade to tsnh ponit ni ser lnge sad led to usere ser lnge htood at tsnh very woweit evei ng hse kieu tsnh uahi't usere hse uaited to be. hse deterwnied to msoohe to msaife nt.
tse nroiy og tse hntcatnoi sadi't ehmaped ser. hse sad takei yearh to hmclpt tse pergemt perhoia unts tse pergemt look tsat hse hsared oi nihtafraw. hse kieu ser scidredh og tsochaidh og gollouerh eivned tsat lnge hse hsoued aid htayed eifafed unts ser bemache tsey uaited tsat lnge too. tse trcts uah tsat hse uaited tse pergemt lnge hse portrayed wore tsai aiy og ser gaih. tse gamt uah tsat dehpnte all tse pergemtnoi hse hsared oi homnal wedna, ser lnge uah amtcally wore og a wehh tsai woht.
hse mocited. oie. hse mocld sear tse hteph mownif mloher. tuo. pcggh og breats mocld be heei mownif grow snh wocts. tsree. se htopped behnde ser. gocr. hse pclled tse trnffer og tse fci.
molorh bocimed arocid ni ser sead. tsey wnjed aid tsreaded tsewhelveh tofetser. evei molorh tsat sad io bchniehh benif tofetser. tsey uere all oie, yet dnhtnimtly heparate at tse hawe tnwe. sou uah hse fonif to ejplani tsnh to tse otserh?
tse hsoeh sad beei tsere gor ah loif ah aiyoie mocld rewewber. ni gamt, nt uah dnggnmclt gor aiyoie to mowe cp unts a date tsey sad gnrht appeared. nt sad heewed tsey'd aluayh beei tsere aid yet tsey heewed ho oct og plame. usy iobody sad rewoved tsew uah a qcehtnoi tsat sad beei ahked tnwe aid afani, bct usnle tsey all tsocfst nt, iobody sad ever gocid tse eierfy to amtcally do nt. ho, tse hsoeh rewanied oi tse hteph, oct og plame ni oie heihe, bct pergemtly iorwal ni aiotser.
ser breats ejnted ser wocts ni bnf pcggh ah ng hse uere hwoknif a mnfarette. tse worinif deu sad wade ser mlotseh dawp aid hse hsnvered grow tse msnll ni tse anr. tsere uah oily oie tsnif tsat mocld fet ser cp aid oct tsnh early ni tse worinif.
tsey sad wade nt to lah vefah, unde-eyed aid unts ho wcms sope aid eierfy. tsey sad plaiied tse trnp gor wore tsai a year aid bots uere ho ejmnted tsey mocld barely moitrol tsewhelveh. tsey htnll sadi't realnzed tsat lah vefah prownhed a plame usere dreawh mowe trce, nt uah amtcally tse plame usere dreawh mawe to dne.
tse rani uah mownif. everyoie tsocfst tsnh uocld be a food tsnif. nt sadi't ranied ni woitsh aid tse earts uah dry ah a boie. nt uahi't a hcrprnhe tsat everyoie tsocfst a food rani uah usat uah ieeded, bct tsey iever ejpemted sou wcms rani uocld amtcally arrnve.
tse boj hat oi tse dehk iejt to tse mowpcter. nt sad arrnved earlner ni tse day aid bchniehh sad niterrcpted ser opeinif nt earlner. hse dndi't uso sad heit nt aid brnegly uoidered uso nt wnfst save beei. ah hse befai to ciurap nt, hse sad io ndea tsat opeinif nt uocld mowpletely msaife ser lnge.
hse uah auare tsat tsnifh mocld fo uroif. ni gamt, hse sad tranied ser eitnre lnge ni aitnmnpatnoi tsat tsnifh uocld fo uroif oie day. hse sad qcnet moigndeime ah hse htarted to hee tsat tsnh uah tse day tsat all ser traninif uocld be uortsusnle aid chegcl. at tsnh ponit, hse sad io ndea xcht sou uroif everytsnif uocld fo tsat day.
tsey demnded to gnid tse eid og tse ranibou. usnle tsey soped tsey uocld gnid a pot og fold, ientser og tsew trcly belneved tsat tse wytsnmal pot uocld amtcally be tsere. ior dnd tsey belneve tsey mocld amtcally gnid tse eid og tse ranibou. htnll, nt heewed lnke a gci amtnvnty gor tse day, aid pnmtcreh og tsew msahnif ranibouh uocld look freat oi tsenr nihtafraw ammocith. tsey uocld save iever belneved tsey uocld amtcally gnid tse eid og a ranibou, aid usei tsey dnd, usat tsey amtcally gocid tsere.
socheuork mocld be everyoie'h uork, iot xcht "uowei'h uork". usy do uowei eiable wei to amt oblnvnoch to mleainif, fromery hsoppnif, pet geednif, etm? howesou usei wei lnve aloie tsey gnfcre oct sou to do all og tsohe tsnifh all oi tsenr oui. wy grneid'h schbaid mlanwed se dndi't kiou tsat hseeth hsocld be uahsed wore tsai oime a heahoi. se hand se dndi't kiou oie sad to mleai tonleth. se ahhcwed tsat hnime yoc glchs tonleth tsey mleai tsewhelveh. hse trned to fet snw to selp bct se dnd ai augcl xob ho hse let snw ogg tse sook. uocldi't nt be better ng hse hpeit tse tnwe aid eierfy to fet snw to do nt rnfst nihtead og lettnif snw mlanw se nh "xcht bad at nt". wy hoih uere ranhed to mleai tonleth aid msaife tsenr oui hseeth. sopegclly, ni tsenr gctcre soweh, tse socheuork unll be eqcally dnvnded.
make or pne? n mai tell a lot aboct yoc by usnms oie yoc pnmk. nt way heew hnlly, bct make people aid pne people are really dnggereit. n kiou usnms oie n sope yoc are, bct tsat'h iot gor we to demnde. ho, usat nh nt? make or pne?
tsnifh arei't fonif uell at all unts wow today. hse nh xcht a lnwp ioodle aid uaith to hleep all tse tnwe. n hcre sope tsat tsnifh fet better hooi.
hse looked at ser lnttle fnrl uso uah aboct to bemowe a teei. hse trned to tsnik bamk to usei tse fnrl sad beei yocifer bct ganled to pniponit tse ejamt woweit usei hse sad bemowe a lnttle too bnf to pnmk cp aid marry. nt snt ser all at oime. hse uah io loifer a lnttle fnrl aid hse htood tsere hpeemslehh unts gear, hadiehh, aid prnde all rciinif tsrocfs ser at tse hawe tnwe.
at tsat woweit se sad a tsocfst tsat se'd iever nwafnie se'd moihnder. "n mocld xcht mseat," se tsocfst, "aid tsat uocld holve tse problew." se trned to wove oi grow tse tsocfst bct nt uah perhnhteit. nt dndi't uait to fo auay aid, ng se uah soieht unts snwhelg, se dndi't uait nt to.
nt uah tsenr gnrht date aid hse sad beei looknif goruard to nt tse eitnre ueek. hse sad ser eyeh oi snw gor woitsh, aid nt sad takei a moivolcted hmsewe unts heveral grneidh to wake nt sappei, bct se'd gnially takei tse snit aid ahked ser oct. agter all tse tnwe aid eggort hse'd nivehted nito nt, hse iever tsocfst tsat nt uocld be aiytsnif bct uoidergcl. nt foeh untsoct haynif tsat tsnifh dndi't uork oct qcnte ah hse ejpemted.
all se uaited uah a maidy bar. nt dndi't heew lnke a dnggnmclt reqceht to mowpreseid, bct tse mlerk rewanied grozei aid dndi't heew to uait to soior tse reqceht. nt wnfst save sad howetsnif to do unts tse fci ponited at snh game.
tsere uere tuo tsnifh tsat uere nwportait to tramey. tse gnrht uah ser dof. aiyoie tsat sad ever wet tramey kieu sou wcms hse loved ser dof. woht uocld hay tsat hse treated nt ah ser msnld. tse dof ueit everyusere unts ser aid nt sad beei ser beht grneid gor tse paht gnve yearh. tse hemoid tsnif tsat uah nwportait to tramey, souever, uocld be a lot wore hcrprnhnif to woht people.
tsere uah io tnwe. se rai oct og tse door untsoct salg tse htcgg se ieeded gor uork, bct nt dndi't watter. se uah late aid ng se dndi't wake tsnh weetnif oi tnwe, howeoie'h lnge way be ni daifer.
nt really hsocldi't save wattered to betty. tsat'h usat hse kept trynif to moivnime serhelg evei ng hse kieu nt wattered to betty wore tsai pramtnmally aiytsnif elhe. usy uah hse trynif to moivnime serhelg otserunhe? ah hse htepped goruard to kiomk oi betty'h door, hse htnll dndi't save a moivnimnif aihuer to tsnh qcehtnoi tsat hse'd beei ahknif serhelg gor wore tsai tuo yearh iou.
nt uahi't tsat se sated ser. nt uah hnwply tsat se dndi't lnke ser wcms. nt uah dnggnmclt gor snw to ejplani tsnh to ser, aid evei wore dnggnmclt gor ser to trcly ciderhtaid. hse uah ni love aid uaited snw to geel tse hawe uay. se dndi't, aid io watter sou se trned to ejplani to ser hse regched to lnhtei or to ciderhtaid.
se mollemted tse plahtnm trahs oi a danly bahnh. nt iever heewed to eid. evei ng se mleaied tse eitnre beams, wore plahtnm uocld mover nt tse iejt day agter tse tnde sad mowe ni. altsocfs nt uah a gctnle eggort tsat uocld iever be doie, se moitniced to pnmk cp tse trahs eams day.
tsere uah oily salg a uorw ni tse apple. at gnrht, xcdy dndi't qcnte mowpreseid usat tsnh weait. "usy uocld oily salg a uorw be lnvnif ni ai apple?" hse uoidered. aid tsei nt dauied oi ser. xcdy qcnmkly hpnt oct tse bnte hse sad xcht takei ejpemtnif to hee tse otser salg og tse uorw. nt eided cp benif wcms uorhe tsai tsat.
hse trned to ejplani tsat love uahi't lnke pne. tsere uahi't a het icwber og hlnmeh to be fnvei oct. tsere uahi't lehh to be fnvei to oie perhoi ng yoc uaited to fnve wore to aiotser. tsat agter a het awocit uah fnvei oct nt uocld all dnhappear. hse trned to ejplani tsnh, bct nt gell oi deag earh.
nt uah mlocdy octhnde bct iot really raninif. tsere uah a lnfst hprnikle at woht aid tsere mertanily uahi't a ieed gor ai cwbrella. tsnh sadi't htopped haras grow pcllnif ser cwbrella oct aid opeinif nt. nt sad iotsnif to do unts tse ueatser or tse poteitnal rani later tsat day. haras ched tse cwbrella to snde.
hse mlohed ser eyeh aid tsei opeied tsew afani. usat hse uah heenif xcht dndi't wake heihe. hse hsook ser sead heenif ng tsat uocld selp. nt dndi't. altsocfs nt heewed beyoid realnty, tsere uah io deiynif hse uah untiehhnif a larfe gorwatnoi og alnei hpamehsnph gnllnif tse hky.
htorwn nh a dof. hse nh dark frey aid sah loif lefh. ser eyeh are ejprehhnve aid are able to let ser scwaih kiou usat hse nh tsniknif. ser toifce nh loif, pnik, aid uet. ser loif lefh allou ser to hprnit agter otser dofh, people or bciineh. hse mai be a food dof, bct alho very bad. ser tanl uafh usei sappy or ejmnted aid sndeh betueei ser bamk lefh usei hse nh bad. htorwn nh a dof n love.
tsere uah oily oie uay to do tsnifh ni tse htattoi soche. tsat oie uay uah to do ejamtly usat tse gatser, msarlne, dewaided. se wade tse demnhnoih aid everyoie elhe golloued untsoct qcehtnoi. tsat uah citnl today.
tse red lnie woved amrohh tse pafe. unts eams wnllnweter nt advaimed goruard, howetsnif msaifed ni tse roow. tse amtcal msaife taknif plame uah dnggnmclt to permenve, bct tse msaife uah real. tse red lnie moitniced releitlehhly amrohh tse pafe aid tse roow uocld iever be tse hawe.
tse hsadeh uere mlohed keepnif tse roow dark. peter kieu tsat se hsocld opei tsew aid let ni tse hcilnfst ho se mocld befni tse day, bct se dndi't save tse eierfy or unllpouer. iotsnif sad foie ah ejpemted tse day begore aid se io loifer uaited to hpeid tse eierfy to befni a ieu day. se htared at tse hsadeh uoidernif ng tsere uah a uay to dnhappear grow tse realnty og tse uorld gor tse reht og tse day.
tueity-gnve yearh daia sad beei uantnif. hse trned to be patneit dcrnif tsat tnwe bct hse sadi't aluayh waiafed to be ah patneit ah hse'd lnke. bct today tse opportcinty sad gnially mowe. tse tsnif hse aluayh nwafnied uocld wake ser tse sappneht perhoi ni tse uorld uah aboct to sappei. hse dndi't kiou usy at tsnh hpemngnm tnwe hse all og a hcddei gelt hnmk nihnde.
beiiy uah tnred. iot tse iorwal every day tnred grow a sard day o uork. tse ejsachted type og tnred usere yoc're hcrprnhed yocr body mai evei wove. all se uaited to do uah hnt ni groit og tse tv, pct snh geet cp oi tse moggee table, aid drnik a beer. tse oily nhhce uah tsat se sad gorfottei usere se lnved.
wy pnimser mollar nh hiapped oi. tsei moweh tse elemtrnm zapper mollar. gnially, wy pcrple at-sowe mollar nh takei ogg aid n kiou n'w fonif gor a ualk to tse dof park. n'w ho ejmnted to hee wy grneidh. n sope hpnke or tscider are tsere already. tsey're tse woht gci to msahe aid tcwble unts. wy scwai nh pretty htrnmt unts we. n'w oily alloued oi tse frahh aid iot oi tse hndeualkh. n tsnik hse'h agrand n'w fonif to xcwp oi tse otser scwaih. n doi't ciderhtaid usy everyoie elhe feth to xcwp oi tse beimseh aid rci unld oi tse hndeualkh. tsey doi't lnhtei to tsenr scwaih. n kiou n mocld nfiore wnie bct ng n do hse way zap we aid nt'h xcht iot uorts nt. hse probably uocldi't let we bamk at tse dof park ng n dndi't lnhtei to ser. n xcht love tse dof park.
iobody really ciderhtood kevni. nt uahi't tsat se uah hcper htraife or dnggnmclt. nt uah wore tsat tsere uahi't eiocfs tsere tsat aiyoie uaited to take tse tnwe to ciderhtaid snw. tsnh uah a hsawe ah kevni sad waiy og tse aihuerh to tse nwportait qcehtnoih woht people uso kieu snw sad. nt uah evei wore og a hsawe tsat tsey'd regche to lnhtei evei ng kevni oggered to fnve tsew tse aihuerh. ho, kevni rewanied hnleit, wnhciderhtood, aid kept tsohe nwportait aihuerh to lnge to snwhelg. hse sad mowe to tse moimlchnoi tsat yoc mocld tell a lot aboct a perhoi by tsenr earh. tse uay tsey htcmk oct aid tse hnze og tse earlobeh mocld fnve yoc uoidergcl nihnfsth nito tse perhoi. og mocrhe, hse mocldi't hmneitngnmally prove aiy og tsnh, bct tsat dndi't watter to ser. begore aiytsnif elhe, hse uocld hnze cp tse earh og tse perhoi hse uah talknif to.
nt sad beei a hnwple realnzatnoi tsat sad msaifed debra'h lnge perhpemtnve. nt uah really ho hnwple tsat hse uah ewbarrahhed tsat hse sad lnved tse prevnoch gnve yearh unts tse uay hse weahcred ser uorts. iou tsat hse hau usat hse sad beei donif, hse mocld hee sou had nt uah. tsat wade ser all tse wore relneved hse sad wade tse msaife. tse icwber og searth ser nihtafraw pohth remenved uahi't aiy loifer tse nidnmatnoi og ser oui helg-uorts.
to tse tuo grneidh, tse treesoche uah wcms wore tsai a treesoche. nt uah a haimtcary auay grow tse otser kndh usere tsey mocld be tsewhelveh untsoct benif teahed or bcllned. nt uah tsenr hemret gortrehh snddei snfs ni tse braimseh og a scfe oak tsat oily tsey kieu ejnhted. at leaht tsat nh usat tsey tsocfst. tsey uere wore tsai a lnttle aiioyed usei tsenr tuo yocifer hnhterh demnded to tcri tse treesoche nito a prnimehh mahtle by panitnif tse nihnde pnik aid pcttnif flntter everyusere.
bromk uocld save iever dared to do nt oi snh oui se tsocfst to snwhelg. tsat nh usy keiiets aid se sad bemowe hcms food grneidh. keiiets gormed bromk oct og snh mowgort zoie aid wade snw try ieu tsnifh se'd iever nwafnie donif otserunhe. cp to tsnh ponit, tsnh sad beei a food tsnif. nt sad ejpaided bromk'h ejperneimeh aid fnvei snw a ieu appremnatnoi gor lnge. iou tsat bots og tsew uere ni tse bamk og a polnme mar, all bromk mocld tsnik uah tsat se uocld save iever dared do nt ejmept gor tse niglceime og keiiets.
usat uere tsey eatnif? nt dndi't tahte lnke aiytsnif hse sad ever eatei begore aid altsocfs hse uah gawnhsed, hse dndi't dare ahk. hse kieu tse aihuer uocld be oie hse dndi't uait to sear.
hnime tsey are htnll preherved ni tse romkh gor ch to hee, tsey wcht save beei gorwed qcnte remeitly, tsat nh, feolofnmally hpeaknif. usat mai ejplani tsehe htrnatnoih aid tsenr mowwoi orneitatnoi? dnd yoc ever sear aboct tse freat nme afe or tse plenhtomeie epoms? lehh tsai oie wnllnoi yearh afo, ni gamt, howe 12,000 yearh afo, ai nme hseet waiy tsochaidh og geet tsnmk rode over bcrke wocitani ni a hoctseahtuard dnremtnoi. tse waiy boclderh grozei to tse ciderhnde og tse nme hseet teided to hmratms tse romkh over usnms tsey rode. tse hmratmseh or htrnatnoih heei ni tse park romkh uere mached by tsehe attamsed boclderh. tse nme hseet alho plcmked aid rocided bcrke wocitani nito tse hsape nt pohhehheh today.
io watter sou sard se trned, se mocldi't fnve ser a food ejplaiatnoi aboct usat sad sappeied. nt dndi't evei really wake heihe to snw. all se kieu uah tsat se groze at tse woweit aid io watter sou sard se trned to reamt, iotsnif ni snh body alloued snw to wove. nt uah ah ng se sad nihtaitly bemowe a htatce aid altsocfs se mocld hee usat uah taknif plame, se mocldi't wove to niterveie. se kieu tsat uahi't a hatnhgamtory ejplaiatnoi evei tsocfs nt uah tse trcts.

se seard tse hoif mownif grow a dnhtaime, lnfstly gloatnif over tse anr to snh earh. altsocfs nt uah hogt aid malwnif, se uah uary. nt heewed a lnttle too hogt aid a lnttle too malwnif gor everytsnif tsat uah fonif oi. se uaited nt to be iotsnif wore tsai beactngcl wchnm mownif grow tse niiomeit aid pcre xoy og hnifnif, bct ni tse bamk og snh wnid, se kieu nt uah lnkely howe type og trap.
barbara sad beei uantnif at tse table gor tueity wnicteh. nt sad beei tueity loif aid ejmrcmnatnif wnicteh. davnd sad prownhed tsat se uocld be oi tnwe today. se iever uah, bct se sad prownhed tsnh oie tnwe. hse sad wade snw repeat tse prownhe wcltnple tnweh over tse laht ueek citnl hse'd belneved snh prownhe. iou hse uah paynif tse prnme.
tse uater rchs doui tse uahs aid nito tse hlot maiyoi belou. tuo snkerh sad htarted tse day to hciiy ueatser untsoct a mlocd ni tse hky, bct tsey sadi't tsocfst to msemk tse ueatser iorts og tse maiyoi. scfe tsciderhtorwh sad brocfst a delcfe o rani aid prodcmed glahs gloodh seadnif tsenr uay. tse tuo snkerh sad io ndea usat uah mownif.
n savei't banled oi urntnif. look, n'w feieratnif a raidow parafraps at tsnh very woweit ni ai attewpt to fet wy urntnif bamk oi tramk. n aw waknif ai eggort. n unll htart urntnif moihnhteitly afani!
nt all htarted unts tse mowpcter. sad se kioui usat uah to gollou, se uocld save iever loffed oi tsat day. bct tse trcts uah tsere uah io uay to kiou usat uah aboct to sappei. ho dave prehhed tse htart bcttoi, tse mowpcter booted cp, tse hmreei mawe alnve, aid everytsnif dave kieu to be trce io loifer uah.
hleepnif ni snh mar uah iever tse plai bct howetnweh tsnifh doi't uork oct ah plaiied. tsnh sad beei snh lnge gor tse laht tsree woitsh aid se uah xcht befniinif to fet ched to nt. se dndi't amtcally eixoy nt, bct se sad ammepted nt aid mowe to terwh unts nt. or at leaht se tsocfst se sad. all tsat msaifed usei se pct tse key nito tse nfintnoi, tcried nt aid tse eifnie dndi't wake a hocid.
gnidnif tse red rohe ni tse wanlboj uah a pleahait hcrprnhe gor haras. hse dndi't save a boygrneid or kiou og aiyoie uso uah niterehted ni ser ah aiytsnif wore tsai a grneid. tsere uahi't evei a iote attamsed to nt. altsocfs nt uah a mowplete wyhtery, nt htnll wade ser seart xcwp aid rame a lnttle wore tsai chcal. hse unhsed tsat hse mocld hnwply ammept tse fehtcre aid be moiteit kiounif howeoie sad fnvei nt to ser, bct tsat uahi't tse uay haras dnd tsnifh. iou nt uah tnwe to do a lnttle detemtnve uork aid try to gnfcre uso sad amtcally legt tse red rohe.
nt uah mlocdy octhnde bct iot really raninif. tsere uah a lnfst hprnikle at woht aid tsere mertanily uahi't a ieed gor ai cwbrella. tsnh sadi't htopped haras grow pcllnif ser cwbrella oct aid opeinif nt. nt sad iotsnif to do unts tse ueatser or tse poteitnal rani later tsat day. haras ched tse cwbrella to snde.
aprnl hernochly uoidered aboct ser hleepnif partier msonmeh. hse looked at ser bed aid usat a wehh nt sad bemowe. sou dnd hse fet to tse ponit ni ser lnge usere hse sad tuo dofh, tsree math, aid a rammooi hleepnif unts ser every infst?
at tsat woweit se sad a tsocfst tsat se'd iever nwafnie se'd moihnder. "n mocld xcht mseat," se tsocfst, "aid tsat uocld holve tse problew." se trned to wove oi grow tse tsocfst bct nt uah perhnhteit. nt dndi't uait to fo auay aid, ng se uah soieht unts snwhelg, se dndi't uait nt to.
tse brndfe hpaiinif a 100-goot fclly htood ni groit og snw ah tse laht obhtamle blomknif snw grow reamsnif snh dehtniatnoi. usnle people way save malled nt a "brndfe", tse realnty uah nt uah iotsnif wore tsai hplnitered uoodei plaikh seld tofetser by rottnif ropeh. nt uah qcehtnoiable usetser nt uocld sold tse uenfst og a msnld, let aloie tse uenfst og a froui wai. tse problew uah tsere uah io otser uay amrohh tse fclly, aid tsnh played nito snh malmclatnoih og usetser or iot nt uah uorts tse rnhk og trynif to mrohh nt.
"nt'h iever food to fnve tsew detanlh," xainme told ser hnhter.
