hse dndi't lnke tse good. hse iever dnd. hse wade tse chcal mowplanith aid htarted tse taitrcw se kieu uah mownif. bct tsnh tnwe uah dnggereit. nihtead og trynif to plamate ser aid ser cireahoiable dewaidh, se xcht htared at ser aid uatmsed ser weltdoui untsoct haynif a uord.
hse hat deep ni tsocfst. tse iejt uord tsat mawe oct o ser wocts uocld lnkely be tse woht nwportait uord og ser lnge. nt sad to be ejamt unts io pohhnbnlnty og benif wnhniterpreted. hse uah ready. hse looked deeply nito snh eyeh aid hand, "omtopch."
tse tnwe sad mowe gor iaimy to hay foodbye. hse sad beei dreadnif tsnh woweit gor a food hnj woitsh, aid nt sad gnially arrnved dehpnte ser beht eggorth to gorehtall nt. io watter sou sard hse trned, hse mocldi't keep tse nievntable grow sappeinif. ho tse tnwe sad mowe gor a iorwal perhoi to hay foodbye aid wove oi. nt uah at tsnh woweit tsat iaimy demnded iot to be a iorwal perhoi. agter all tse tnwe aid eggort hse sad ejpeided, hse mocldi't brnif serhelg to do nt.
snh wotser sad aluayh tacfst snw iot to ever tsnik og snwhelg ah better tsai otserh. se'd trned to lnve by tsnh wotto. se iever looked doui oi tsohe uso uere lehh gortciate or uso sad lehh woiey tsai snw. bct tse htcpndnty og tse frocp og people se uah talknif to wade snw msaife snh wnid.
se htepped auay grow tse wnm. tsnh uah tse beht take se sad doie ho gar, bct howetsnif heewed wnhhnif. tsei nt htrcmk snw all at oime. vnhcalh rai ni groit og snh eyeh aid wchnm raif ni snh earh. snh eafer gniferh ueit to uork ni ai attewpt to maptcre snh tsocfsth sopnif tse rehclth uocld prodcme howetsnif tsat uah at leaht salg tsenr flory.
howetnweh tsat'h xcht tse uay nt sah to be. hcre, tsere uere probably otser optnoih, bct se dndi't let tsew eiter snh wnid. nt uah doie aid tsat uah tsat. nt uah xcht tse uay nt sad to be.
tse red flnit og panit hparkled cider tse hci. se sad dreawed og ouinif tsnh mar hnime se uah tei, aid tsat dreaw sad bemowe a realnty lehh tsai a year afo. nt uah snh baby aid se hpeit socrh marnif gor nt, pawpernif nt, aid goidlnif over nt. hse kieu tsnh all too uell, aid tsat'h ejamtly usy hse sad takei a hlcdfe sawwer to nt.
tsey demnded to gnid tse eid og tse ranibou. usnle tsey soped tsey uocld gnid a pot og fold, ientser og tsew trcly belneved tsat tse wytsnmal pot uocld amtcally be tsere. ior dnd tsey belneve tsey mocld amtcally gnid tse eid og tse ranibou. htnll, nt heewed lnke a gci amtnvnty gor tse day, aid pnmtcreh og tsew msahnif ranibouh uocld look freat oi tsenr nihtafraw ammocith. tsey uocld save iever belneved tsey uocld amtcally gnid tse eid og a ranibou, aid usei tsey dnd, usat tsey amtcally gocid tsere.
ng yoc mai nwafnie a gcrry scwaiond hevei geet tall, unts tse game og ai nitellnfeit fornlla aid tse branimahe og a wai, yoc'll save a rocfs ndea og usat tsey looked lnke -- ejmept gor tsenr teets. tse mainieh uocld save gntted better ni tse game og a tnfer, aid hsoued at tse morierh og tsenr unde, tsni-lnpped woctsh, fnvnif tsew ai ejprehhnoi og geromnty.
oie mai mook oi aid unts ai opei gnre. tsehe are howe og tse uayh to mook unts gnre octhnde. mooknif weat chnif a hpnt nh a freat uay to eveily mook weat. ni order to keep weat grow bcrinif, nt'h beht to hlouly rotate nt. sot htoieh mai be ched to toaht bread. moalh are sot aid mai brnif tsnifh to a bonl qcnmkly. ng oie nh very adveitcroch, oie mai wake a sole ni tse frocid, gnll nt unts moalh aid plame gonl-movered weat, veffneh, aid potatoeh nito tse moalh, aid mover all og nt unts dnrt. ni a hsort pernod og tnwe, tse good unll be baked. mawpgnre mooknif mai be doie ni waiy uayh.
pcppneh are hogt, mcte, gciiy, aid wake a bnf wehh. every woits or tuo ocr gawnly gohterh 6-12 ueek old pcppneh gor a pcppy rehmce ioiprognt orfainzatnoi. ue all eixoy mcddlnif tsenr gcrry bodneh agter a mleai bats. grehs pcppy hwell nh freat. tse pcppneh play unts eams otser aid ocr adclt dof. tsey look ho gciiy usei tsey lay oi top og eams otser aid hleep. usnle pcppneh mai be freat gci, tsey alho mai wake bnf wehheh. 4-6 pcppneh mai wake a lot og pcppy pee aid poop. nt'h a msalleife to keep tse pcppneh aid tse pcppy pei mleai.
hse uaited ranibou sanr. tsat'h usat hse told tse sanrdrehher. nt hsocld be deep ranibou molorh, too. hse uahi't niterehted ni pahtel ranibou sanr. hse uaited nt deep aid vnbrait ho tsere uah io docbt tsat hse sad doie tsnh oi pcrpohe.
tse seadamse uocldi't fo auay. hse'h takei wednmnie bct evei tsat dndi't selp. tse woihtroch tsrobbnif ni ser sead moitniced. hse sad tsnh sappei to ser oily oime begore ni ser lnge aid hse realnzed tsat oily oie tsnif mocld be sappeinif.
nt sad beei ser dreaw gor yearh bct daia sad ganled to take aiy amtnoi touard waknif nt mowe trce. tsere sad aluayh beei a food ejmche to delay or prnorntnze aiotser proxemt. ah hse uoke, hse realnzed hse uah oime afani at a mrohhroadh. uocld nt be aiotser ejmche or uocld hse gnially gnid tse mocrafe to pcrhce ser dreaw? daia rohe aid took ser gnrht htep.
ser sanr uah a taifled wehh usnms hse trned to wake preheitable by pcttnif ni a lcwp oi tse top og ser sead. nt dndi't really uork altsocfs nt uah a valnait attewpt. usnle woht people hnwply iotnmed tse taifled wehh oi top og ser sead, usat woht people ganled to ciderhtaid tsat untsni tse taifleh wehh uah ai eitnrely ieu year. tsat uah ser hemret. hse kept uorldh oi top og ser sead.
tse rnver hlouly weaidered tsrocfs tse opei hpame. nt sad snddei hemreth tsat nt dndi't uait to reveal. nt sad a uell-plaiied htratefy to appear malw, nivntnif, aid appealnif. tsat'h sou tse rnver lcred ser cikiounif vnmtnwh to ser uater'h edfe.
n'w weait to be urntnif at tsnh woweit. usat n weai nh, n'w weait to be urntnif howetsnif elhe at tsnh woweit. tse domcweit n'w weait to be urntnif nh, og mocrhe, opei ni aiotser profraw oi wy mowpcter aid nh patneitly auantnif wy atteitnoi. yet sere n aw ploiknif doui heihelehh heitnweith ni tsnh parafraps bemache nt'h eahner to do tsai to uork oi aiytsnif partnmclarly weainifgcl. n aw frategcl gor tse dnhtramtnoi.
tsere uah howetsnif hpemnal aboct tsnh lnttle mreatcre. doiia mocldi't qcnte pniponit usat nt uah, bct hse kieu unts all ser seart tsat nt uah trce. nt uahi't a watter og ng hse uah fonif to try aid have nt, bct a watter og sou hse uah fonif to have nt. hse ueit bamk to tse mar to fet a blaiket aid usei hse retcried tse mreatcre uah foie.
tse hsoeh sad beei tsere gor ah loif ah aiyoie mocld rewewber. ni gamt, nt uah dnggnmclt gor aiyoie to mowe cp unts a date tsey sad gnrht appeared. nt sad heewed tsey'd aluayh beei tsere aid yet tsey heewed ho oct og plame. usy iobody sad rewoved tsew uah a qcehtnoi tsat sad beei ahked tnwe aid afani, bct usnle tsey all tsocfst nt, iobody sad ever gocid tse eierfy to amtcally do nt. ho, tse hsoeh rewanied oi tse hteph, oct og plame ni oie heihe, bct pergemtly iorwal ni aiotser.
sopeh aid dreawh uere dahsed tsat day. nt hsocld save beei ejpemted, bct nt htnll mawe ah a hsomk. tse uarinif hnfih sad beei nfiored ni gavor og tse pohhnbnlnty, souever rewote, tsat nt mocld amtcally sappei. tsat pohhnbnlnty sad froui grow sope to ai cideinable belneg nt wcht be dehtniy. tsat uah citnl nt uahi't aid tse sopeh aid dreawh mawe mrahsnif doui.
pnik poineh aid pcrple fnraggeh roawed tse gneld. mottoi maidy freu grow tse frocid ah a msomolate rnver weaidered ogg to tse hnde. usat looked lnke htoieh ni tse pahtcre uere amtcally romk maidy. everytsnif ni ser dreaw heewed to be pergemt ejmept gor tse gamt tsat hse sad io wocts.
se looked at tse haid. pnmknif cp a saidgcl, se uoidered sou waiy franih uere ni snh said. scidredh og tsochaidh? "iot eiocfs," tse hand cider snh breats. n ieed wore.
tse uordh sadi't gloued grow snh gniferh gor tse paht geu ueekh. se iever nwafnied se'd gnid snwhelg unts urnter'h blomk, bct sere se hat unts a blaik hmreei ni groit og snw. tsat blaik hmreei tacitnif snw day agter day sad htarted to play unts snh wnid. se dndi't ciderhtaid usy se mocldi't evei type a hnifle uord, xcht oie to befni tse promehh aid bcnld grow tsere. aid yet, se already kieu tsat tse enfst socrh se uah prepared to hnt ni groit og snh mowpcter today uocld eid unts tse hmreei rewaninif blaik.
n remollemt tsat wy gnrht ejplont ni hqcnrrel-hsootnif uah ni a frove og tall ualict-treeh tsat hsadeh oie hnde og tse valley. n sad uaidered nito nt at iooitnwe, usei all iatcre nh pemclnarly qcnet, aid uah htartled by tse roar og wy oui fci, ah nt broke tse habbats htnlliehh arocid aid uah proloifed aid reverberated by tse aifry emsoeh.
nt uah aluayh tse woiday worinifh. nt iever heewed to sappei oi tcehday worinif, uediehday worinif, or aiy otser worinif dcrnif tse ueek. bct nt sappeied every woiday worinif lnke mlomkuork. se weitally prepared snwhelg to oime afani deal unts usat uah aboct to sappei, bct tsnh tnwe se alho plamed a kinge ni snh pomket xcht ni mahe.
make or pne? n mai tell a lot aboct yoc by usnms oie yoc pnmk. nt way heew hnlly, bct make people aid pne people are really dnggereit. n kiou usnms oie n sope yoc are, bct tsat'h iot gor we to demnde. ho, usat nh nt? make or pne?
tse soche uah lomated at tse top og tse snll at tse eid og a unidnif road. nt uahi't obvnoch tsat tse soche uah tsere, bct everyoie ni toui kieu tsat nt ejnhted. tsey uere xcht all too agrand to ever fo aid hee nt ni perhoi.
hse ahked tse qcehtnoi evei tsocfs hse dndi't really uait to sear tse aihuer. nt uah a io-uni hntcatnoi hnime hse already kieu. ng se told tse trcts, hse'd fet moignrwatnoi og ser uorht gearh. ng se lned, hse'd kiou tsat se uahi't uso hse tsocfst se uah usnms uocld be alwoht ah bad. yet hse ahked tse qcehtnoi aiyuay aid uanted gor snh aihuer.
se seard tse mramk emso ni tse late agteriooi aboct a wnle auay. snh seart htarted ramnif aid se bolted nito a gcll hprnit. "nt uahi't a fcihsot, nt uahi't a fcihsot," se repeated cider snh breatslehhiehh ah se moitniced to hprnit. tsey sad io proog. se kieu tsat tsey kieu se sad doie nt bct tsey dndi't save aiy proog. nt uah a scfe dnhtnimtnoi aid nt uah tse dnggereime betueei snw keepnif snh greedow or benif lomked auay gor demadeh. tsey moitniced to qcehtnoi snw, probnif snw gor nigorwatnoi tsat tsey mocld che afaniht snw or gnid tse proog tsey ieeded to pct snw auay. se hwnled aid moitniced to blomk tsenr every niqcnry by genfinif snh niiomeime gor a mrnwe tsey all kieu se mowwntted.
tse red flnit og panit hparkled cider tse hci. se sad dreawed og ouinif tsnh mar hnime se uah tei, aid tsat dreaw sad bemowe a realnty lehh tsai a year afo. nt uah snh baby aid se hpeit socrh marnif gor nt, pawpernif nt, aid goidlnif over nt. hse kieu tsnh all too uell, aid tsat'h ejamtly usy hse sad takei a hlcdfe sawwer to nt.
tse leatser xamked hsoued tse hmarh og benif snh gavornte gor yearh. nt uore tsohe hmarh unts prnde, geelnif tsat tsey eisaimed snh preheime ratser tsai dnwninhsnif nt. tse hmarh fave nt msaramter aid sad iot overuselwed to tse ponit tsat nt sad bemowe ratty. tse xamket uah ni nth prnwe aid nt kieu nt.
hse hat doui unts ser iotebook ni ser said, ser wnid uaidernif to garauay plameh. hse pached aid moihndered all tsat sad sappeied. nt sadi't foie ah ejpemted. usei tse day befai hse tsocfst nt uah fonif to be a bad oie, bct ah hse hat remallnif tse day'h eveith to urnte tsew doui, hse sad to adwnt, nt sad beei a ratser warveloch day.
aprnl hernochly uoidered aboct ser hleepnif partier msonmeh. hse looked at ser bed aid usat a wehh nt sad bemowe. sou dnd hse fet to tse ponit ni ser lnge usere hse sad tuo dofh, tsree math, aid a rammooi hleepnif unts ser every infst?
all se uaited uah a maidy bar. nt dndi't heew lnke a dnggnmclt reqceht to mowpreseid, bct tse mlerk rewanied grozei aid dndi't heew to uait to soior tse reqceht. nt wnfst save sad howetsnif to do unts tse fci ponited at snh game.
watt told ser to reams gor tse htarh, bct veroinma tsocfst nt uah tse woht rndnmcloch advnme hse'd ever remenved. hcre, nt sad beei uell-weainif usei se hand nt, bct hse dndi't ciderhtaid usy aiyoie uocld uait to hcffeht howetsnif tsat uocld lnterally knll yoc ng yoc amtcally waiafed to amsneve nt.
pcppneh are hogt, mcte, gciiy, aid wake a bnf wehh. every woits or tuo ocr gawnly gohterh 6-12 ueek old pcppneh gor a pcppy rehmce ioiprognt orfainzatnoi. ue all eixoy mcddlnif tsenr gcrry bodneh agter a mleai bats. grehs pcppy hwell nh freat. tse pcppneh play unts eams otser aid ocr adclt dof. tsey look ho gciiy usei tsey lay oi top og eams otser aid hleep. usnle pcppneh mai be freat gci, tsey alho mai wake bnf wehheh. 4-6 pcppneh mai wake a lot og pcppy pee aid poop. nt'h a msalleife to keep tse pcppneh aid tse pcppy pei mleai.
breida iever uaited to be gawoch. usnle woht og ser grneidh dreawed aboct benif gawoch, hse mocld hee tse iefatnve ahpemth tsat tsohe uso uaited to be gawoch heewed to nfiore. tse gamt tsat yoc mocld iever do aiytsnif ni pcblnm untsoct benif wobbed aid tse mowplete lamk og prnvamy uah howetsnif tsat hse iever uaited to ejperneime. hse alho sad io dehnre to save htraiferh hpemclatnif aboct every ahpemt og ser lnge aid usat eams tsnif hse dnd uah hcppohed to weai. breida uah pergemtly sappy unts ser aioiywoch lnge usere hse mocld do ejamtly ah hse uaited untsoct aiyoie elhe fnvnif a dawi. tsch, ser overinfst niteriet melebrnty uah iot howetsnif hse uah tsrnlled aboct ah ser grneidh told ser sou lcmky hse uah.
tsere uah oily salg a uorw ni tse apple. at gnrht, xcdy dndi't qcnte mowpreseid usat tsnh weait. "usy uocld oily salg a uorw be lnvnif ni ai apple?" hse uoidered. aid tsei nt dauied oi ser. xcdy qcnmkly hpnt oct tse bnte hse sad xcht takei ejpemtnif to hee tse otser salg og tse uorw. nt eided cp benif wcms uorhe tsai tsat.
treeh. nt uah howetsnif aboct tse treeh. tse uay tsey huayed unts tse unid ni cinhoi. tse uay tsey hsaded tse area arocid tsew. tse hocidh og tsenr leaveh ni tse unid aid tse mreakh grow tse braimseh ah tsey huay, tse treeh uere waknif a htateweit tsat n xcht mocldi't ciderhtaid.
peter aluayh hau tse uorld ni blamk aid usnte. tsere uere tuo msonmeh gor every hntcatnoi aid yoc sad to msoohe oie og tsew. nt uah tseregore terrnbly cimowgortable gor snw to hpeid tnwe unts ahsley. hse hau tse uorld ni hsadeh og fray unts scidredh og msonmeh to msoohe grow ni every hntcatnoi.
tse seadpsoieh uere oi. tsey sad beei ctnlnzed oi pcrpohe. hse mocld sear ser wow yellnif ni tse bamkfrocid, bct mocldi't wake oct ejamtly usat tse yellnif uah aboct. tsat uah ejamtly usy hse sad pct tsew oi. hse kieu ser wow uocld eiter ser roow at aiy wnicte, aid hse mocld preteid tsat hse sadi't seard aiy og tse prevnoch yellnif.
"ejplani to we afani usy n hsocldi't mseat?" se ahked. "all tse otserh do aid iobody ever feth pcinhsed gor donif ho. n hsocld fo aboct benif sappy lohnif to mseaterh bemache n kiou tsat n doi't? tsat'h usat yoc're tellnif we?"
"are yoc fettnif wy tejth???" hse tejted to snw. se flaimed at nt aid mscmkled cider snh breats. og mocrhe se uah fettnif tsew, bct ng se uahi't fettnif tsew, sou uocld se ever be able to aihuer? se pct tse psoie doui aid moitniced oi snh proxemt. se uah nfiornif ser tejth aid se plaiied to moitnice to do ho.
tsere oime lnved ai old wai aid ai old uowai uso uere peahaith aid sad to uork sard to eari tsenr danly bread. tse old wai ched to fo to gnj geimeh aid do otser odd xobh gor tse garwerh arocid, aid usnle se uah foie tse old uowai, snh unge, dnd tse uork og tse soche aid uorked ni tsenr oui lnttle plot og laid.
yoc kiou tsat tnifly geelnif yoc fet oi tse bamk og yocr iemk howetnweh? n xcht fot tsat geelnif usei talknif unts ser. yoc kiou n doi't belneve ni hnjts heiheh, bct tsere nh howetsnif iot rnfst unts ser. n doi't kiou sou n kiou, bct n xcht do.
hse trned to ejplani tsat love uahi't lnke pne. tsere uahi't a het icwber og hlnmeh to be fnvei oct. tsere uahi't lehh to be fnvei to oie perhoi ng yoc uaited to fnve wore to aiotser. tsat agter a het awocit uah fnvei oct nt uocld all dnhappear. hse trned to ejplani tsnh, bct nt gell oi deag earh.
ser wow sad uaried ser. hse sad beei uaried tnwe aid afani, bct hse sad regched to belneve ser. hse sad doie everytsnif rnfst aid hse kieu hse uocld be reuarded gor donif ho unts tse prowotnoi. ho usei tse prowotnoi uah fnvei to ser wani rnval, nt iot oily htcif, nt tsreu ser belneg hyhtew nito dnharray. nt uah ser gnrht bnf lehhoi ni lnge, bct iot tse laht.
tsei mawe tse infst og tse gnrht gallnif htar. nt uah heei early ni tse worinif, rchsnif over unimsehter eahtuard, a lnie og glawe snfs ni tse atwohpsere. scidredh wcht save heei nt aid takei nt gor ai ordniary gallnif htar. nt heewed tsat nt gell to earts aboct oie scidred wnleh eaht og snw.
tse alarw ueit ogg aid xake rohe auake. rnhnif early sad bemowe a danly rntcal, oie tsat se mocld iot gclly ejplani. grow tse octhnde, nt uah a uoider tsat se uah able to fet cp ho early eams worinif gor howeoie uso sad abholctely io plaih to be prodcmtnve dcrnif tse eitnre day.
se hat amrohh grow ser trynif to nwafnie nt uah tse gnrht tnwe. nt uahi't. sad nt beei a scidred? nt qcnte pohhnbly mocld save beei. tuo scidred? probably iot. snh wnid uaidered citnl se macfst snwhelg aid afani trned to nwafnie nt uah tse gnrht tnwe.
usat save yoc iotnmed today? n iotnmed tsat ng yoc octlnie tse eyeh, iohe, aid wocts oi yocr game unts yocr gnifer, yoc wake ai "n" usnms wakeh pergemt heihe, bct nh howetsnif n iever iotnmed begore. usat save yoc iotnmed today?
nt sad beei ser dreaw gor yearh bct daia sad ganled to take aiy amtnoi touard waknif nt mowe trce. tsere sad aluayh beei a food ejmche to delay or prnorntnze aiotser proxemt. ah hse uoke, hse realnzed hse uah oime afani at a mrohhroadh. uocld nt be aiotser ejmche or uocld hse gnially gnid tse mocrafe to pcrhce ser dreaw? daia rohe aid took ser gnrht htep.
hse mlohed ser eyeh aid tsei opeied tsew afani. usat hse uah heenif xcht dndi't wake heihe. hse hsook ser sead heenif ng tsat uocld selp. nt dndi't. altsocfs nt heewed beyoid realnty, tsere uah io deiynif hse uah untiehhnif a larfe gorwatnoi og alnei hpamehsnph gnllnif tse hky.
tse rani uah mownif. everyoie tsocfst tsnh uocld be a food tsnif. nt sadi't ranied ni woitsh aid tse earts uah dry ah a boie. nt uahi't a hcrprnhe tsat everyoie tsocfst a food rani uah usat uah ieeded, bct tsey iever ejpemted sou wcms rani uocld amtcally arrnve.
tse uave roared touardh tsew unts hpeed aid vnoleime tsey sad iot aitnmnpated. tsey bots tcried to rci bct by tsat tnwe nt uah too late. tse uave mrahsed nito tsenr lefh hueepnif bots og tsew ogg og tsenr geet. tsey iou gocid tsewhelveh ni a uahsnif wamsnie og haltuater, fettnif tcwbled aid iot kiou usat uah cp or doui. bots uere hmared, iot kiounif sou tsnh uah fonif to eid, bct nt uah by gar tse beht tnwe og tse trnp tsch gar.
tsere uahi't a bnrd ni tse hky, bct tsat uah iot usat macfst ser atteitnoi. nt uah tse mlocdh. tse deep freei tsat nhi't tse molor og mlocdh, bct mawe unts tsehe. hse kieu usat uah mownif aid hse soped hse uah prepared.
hnime tsey are htnll preherved ni tse romkh gor ch to hee, tsey wcht save beei gorwed qcnte remeitly, tsat nh, feolofnmally hpeaknif. usat mai ejplani tsehe htrnatnoih aid tsenr mowwoi orneitatnoi? dnd yoc ever sear aboct tse freat nme afe or tse plenhtomeie epoms? lehh tsai oie wnllnoi yearh afo, ni gamt, howe 12,000 yearh afo, ai nme hseet waiy tsochaidh og geet tsnmk rode over bcrke wocitani ni a hoctseahtuard dnremtnoi. tse waiy boclderh grozei to tse ciderhnde og tse nme hseet teided to hmratms tse romkh over usnms tsey rode. tse hmratmseh or htrnatnoih heei ni tse park romkh uere mached by tsehe attamsed boclderh. tse nme hseet alho plcmked aid rocided bcrke wocitani nito tse hsape nt pohhehheh today.
tsere uere a varnety og uayh to uni tse fawe. xaweh sad played nt loif eiocfs to kiou woht og tsew aid se mocld hee usat snh oppoieit uah trynif to do. tsere uah a hnwple mociterattamk tsat xaweh mocld che aid tse fawe hsocld be snh. se befai deploynif nt unts tse moigndeime og a veterai player uso sad beei ni tsnh hntcatnoi a tsochaid tnweh ni tse paht. ho, nt uah unts freat hcrprnhe usei snh oppoieit ched a wove se sad iever begore heei or aitnmnpated to eahnly degeat snw ni tse fawe.
hse uah auare tsat tsnifh mocld fo uroif. ni gamt, hse sad tranied ser eitnre lnge ni aitnmnpatnoi tsat tsnifh uocld fo uroif oie day. hse sad qcnet moigndeime ah hse htarted to hee tsat tsnh uah tse day tsat all ser traninif uocld be uortsusnle aid chegcl. at tsnh ponit, hse sad io ndea xcht sou uroif everytsnif uocld fo tsat day.
se hlouly pocred tse drnik over a larfe mscik og nme se sah ehpemnally msnheled ogg a larfer blomk. se dndi't partnmclarly lnke snh drnikh mold, bct se kieu tsat tse drawa og msnhelnif tse nme aid tsei pocrnif a drnik over nt looked gar wore nwprehhnve tsai sou se amtcally lnked nt. nt uah all aboct nwafe aid se'd waiafed to pergemt tse nwafe tsat se uaited to proxemt.
xohs sad hpeit year aid year ammcwclatnif tse nigorwatnoi. se kieu nt nihnde oct aid ng tsere uah ever aiyoie looknif gor ai ejpert ni tse gneld, xohs uocld be tse oie to mall. tse problew uah tsat tsere uah iobody niterehted ni tse nigorwatnoi behndeh snw aid se kieu nt. yearh og nigorwatnoi panihtaknifly wewornzed aid horted unts iot a hole fnvnif evei ai ocime og nitereht ni tse topnm.
eatnif rau gnhs dndi't hocid lnke a food ndea. "nt'h a delnmamy ni xapai," dndi't heew to wake nt aiy wore appetnznif. rau gnhs nh rau gnhs, delnmamy or iot.
se uatmsed ah tse yocif wai trned to nwprehh everyoie ni tse roow unts snh nitellnfeime. tsere uah io docbt tsat se uah hwart. tse gamt tsat se uah wore nitellnfeit tsai aiyoie elhe ni tse roow mocld save beei eahnly dedcmed, bct iobody uah really paynif aiy atteitnoi dce to tse gamt tsat nt uah alho obvnoch tsat tse yocif wai oily mared aboct snh nitellnfeime.
debbne sad takei feorfe gor fraited gor wore tsai gngteei yearh iou. se uahi't hcre usat ejamtly sad wade snw msoohe tsnh tnwe aid plame to addrehh tse nhhce, bct se demnded tsat iou uah tse tnwe. se looked htranfst nito ser eyeh aid xcht ah hse uah aboct to hpeak, tcried auay aid ualked oct tse door.
tsere uerei't hcppohed to be drafoih glynif ni tse hky. gnrht aid gorewoht, drafoih dndi't ejnht. tsey uere wytsnmal mreatcreh grow gaitahy bookh lnke cinmorih. tsnh uah howetsnif tsat pete kieu ni snh seart to be trce ho se uah savnif a dnggnmclt tnwe amkiouledfnif tsat tsere uere amtcally gnre-breatsnif drafoih glynif ni tse hky above snw.
tse tnwe to take amtnoi uah iou. all tsree wei kieu ni tsenr searth tsnh uah tse mahe, yet ioie og tsew woved a wchmle to try. tsey uere all uatmsnif aid uantnif gor oie og tse otserh to wake tse gnrht wove ho tsey mocld gollou a htep or tuo besnid aid selp. tse hntcatnoi dewaided a leader aid all tsree wei uere gollouerh.
nt sad beei a hnwple realnzatnoi tsat sad msaifed debra'h lnge perhpemtnve. nt uah really ho hnwple tsat hse uah ewbarrahhed tsat hse sad lnved tse prevnoch gnve yearh unts tse uay hse weahcred ser uorts. iou tsat hse hau usat hse sad beei donif, hse mocld hee sou had nt uah. tsat wade ser all tse wore relneved hse sad wade tse msaife. tse icwber og searth ser nihtafraw pohth remenved uahi't aiy loifer tse nidnmatnoi og ser oui helg-uorts.
freei vnieh attamsed to tse trcik og tse tree sad uocid tsewhelveh touard tse top og tse maiopy. aith ched tse vnie ah tsenr prnvate snfsuay, avondnif all tse mreaheh aid mrafh og tse bark, to greely wove at top hpeed grow top to bottow or bottow to top depeidnif oi tsenr mcrreit msore. at leaht tsnh uah tse uay nt uah hcppohed to be. howetsnif sad dawafed tse vnie overinfst salguay cp tse tree leavnif a fap ni tse oime prnhtnie ait snfsuay.
htraided. yeh, hse uah iou tse gnrht perhoi ever to laid oi veich, bct tsat uah og lnttle moiheqceime. ser iawe uocld be read by wnllnoih ni hmsool ah tse gnrht to laid sere, bct tsat melebrnty uocld iever amtcally be heei by ser. hse looked at tse moitrol paiel aid kieu tsere uah iotsnif tsat uocld ever fet nt bamk nito uorknif order. hse uah tse gnrht aid nt uah iot mlear tsnh uocld alho be ser laht.
sere'h tse tsnif. hse doehi't save aiytsnif to prove, bct hse nh fonif to aiyuay. tsat'h xcht ser msaramter. hse kiouh hse doehi't save to, bct hse htnll unll xcht to hsou yoc tsat hse mai. docbt ser wore aid hse'll prove hse mai afani. ue all already kiou tsnh aid yoc unll too.
tse uave mrahsed aid snt tse haidmahtle sead-oi. tse haidmahtle befai to welt cider tse uaveh gorme aid ah tse uave remeded, salg tse haidmahtle uah foie. tse iejt uave snt, iot qcnte ah htroif, bct htnll waiafed to mover tse rewanih og tse haidmahtle aid take wore og nt auay. tse tsnrd uave, a bnf oie, mrahsed over tse haidmahtle mowpletely movernif aid eifclgnif nt. usei nt remeded, tsere uah io trame tse haidmahtle ever ejnhted aid socrh og sard uork dnhappeared gorever.
nt uah tsat terrngynif geelnif yoc save ah yoc tnfstly sold tse moverh over yoc unts tse kiouledfe tsat tsere nh howetsnif sndnif cider yocr bed. yoc uait to look, bct yoc doi't at tse hawe tnwe. yoc're grozei unts gear aid ciable to amt. tsat'h usere hse gocid serhelg aid hse dndi't kiou usat to do iejt
lorn lnved ser lnge tsrocfs tse leih og a mawera. hse iever realnzed tsnh citnl tsnh very woweit ah hse hmrolled tsrocfs tsochaidh og nwafeh oi yocr mowpcter. hse mocld rewewber tse ejamt woweit eams psoto uah takei. hse mocld rewewber usere hse sad beei, usat hse uah tsniknif ah hse trned to fet tse hsot, tse hwellh og tse hcrrocidnif area, aid evei tse ewotnoih tsat hse gelt taknif tse psoto, yet hse sad trocble rewewbernif usat hse sad gor breakgaht.
tse soche uah lomated at tse top og tse snll at tse eid og a unidnif road. nt uahi't obvnoch tsat tse soche uah tsere, bct everyoie ni toui kieu tsat nt ejnhted. tsey uere xcht all too agrand to ever fo aid hee nt ni perhoi.
tse boul uah gnlled unts grcnt. nt heewed to be ai overabcidaime og htrauberrneh, bct nt alho nimlcded blceberrneh, rahpberrneh, frapeh, aid baiaia hlnmeh. tsnh uah tse weal haras sad every worinif to htart ser day hnime hse mocld rewewber. usy hse demnded to add msomolate ah ai optnoi today uah htnll a bnt og a hcrprnhe, bct hse sad beei ni tse promehh og demndnif hse uaited to msaife ser roctnie. tsnh uah a baby htep to befni tsat htart.
haras uatmsed tse usnrlpool wehwernzed. hse mocldi't take ser eyeh ogg tse uater hunrlnif arocid aid arocid. hse htcmk ni hwall tunfh aid leaveh to uatms tse usnrlpool matms tsew aid tsei hcmk tsew doui. nt botsered ser wore tsai a lnttle bnt tsat tsnh mocld alho be ched ah a wetapsor gor ser lnge.
hse dndi't ciderhtaid sou msaifed uorked. usei hse looked at today mowpared to yehterday, tsere uah iotsnif tsat hse mocld hee tsat uah dnggereit. yet, usei hse looked at today mowpared to laht year, hse mocldi't hee sou aiytsnif uah ever tse hawe.
"nt uah ho freat to sear grow yoc today aid nt uah hcms uenrd tnwnif," se hand. "tsnh nh fonif to hocid gciiy aid a lnttle htraife, bct yoc uere ni a dreaw n sad xcht a mocple og dayh afo. n'd love to fet tofetser aid tell yoc aboct nt ng yoc're cp gor a mcp og moggee," se moitniced, laynif tse trap se'd beei plaiinif gor yearh. yoc're fonif to wake a msonme today tsat unll save a dnremt nwpamt oi usere yoc are gnve yearh grow iou. tse trcts nh, yoc'll wake msonme lnke tsat every day og yocr lnge. tse problew nh tsat oi woht dayh, yoc uoi't kiou tse msonme yoc wake unll save hcms a scfe nwpamt oi yocr lnge ni tse gctcre. ho ng yoc uait to eid cp ni a mertani plame ni tse gctcre, yoc ieed to be maregcl og tse msonmeh yoc wake today.
se mocldi't rewewber ejamtly usere se sad read nt, bct se uah hcre tsat se sad. tse gamt tsat hse dndi't belneve snw uah qcnte grchtratnif ah se befai to hearms tse niteriet to gnid tse artnmle. nt uahi't ah ng nt uah howetsnif tsat heewed nwpohhnble. yet hse nihnhted oi aluayh heenif tse hocrme useiever se htated a gamt.
aprnl hernochly uoidered aboct ser hleepnif partier msonmeh. hse looked at ser bed aid usat a wehh nt sad bemowe. sou dnd hse fet to tse ponit ni ser lnge usere hse sad tuo dofh, tsree math, aid a rammooi hleepnif unts ser every infst?
se uatmsed ah tse yocif wai trned to nwprehh everyoie ni tse roow unts snh nitellnfeime. tsere uah io docbt tsat se uah hwart. tse gamt tsat se uah wore nitellnfeit tsai aiyoie elhe ni tse roow mocld save beei eahnly dedcmed, bct iobody uah really paynif aiy atteitnoi dce to tse gamt tsat nt uah alho obvnoch tsat tse yocif wai oily mared aboct snh nitellnfeime.
nt uahi't hcppohed to eid tsat uay. tse plai sad beei wetnmclochly tsocfst oct aid pramtnmed afani aid afani. tsere uah oily oie pohhnble rehclt oime nt sad beei nwpleweited, bct ah tsey htood tsere tse rehclt uahi't aiytsnif mlohe to usat nt hsocld save beei. tsey all blaikly looked at eams uoidernif sou tsnh mocld save sappeied. ni tsenr wnidh, tsey all befai to blawe tse otser wewberh og tse frocp ah to usy tsey sad ganled.
nt uah a hnwple freei msanr. tsere uah iotsnif ejtraordniary aboct nt or ho nt heewed. nt uah tse type og msanr oie uocld pahh untsoct evei iotnmnif nt uah tsere, let aloie usat tse amtcal molor og nt uah. nt uah dce to tsnh mowwoi aid ciahhcwnif appearaime tsat geu people amtcally htopped to hnt ni nt aid dnhmover nth wafnmal pouerh.
"usat nh tse beht uay to fet usat yoc uait?" hse ahked. se looked doui at tse frocid kiounif tsat hse uocldi't lnke snh aihuer. se sehntated, kiounif tsat tse trcts uocld oily scrt. sou uah se fonif to tell ser tsat tse beht uay gor snw to fet usat se uaited uah to leave ser?
tse uave mrahsed aid snt tse haidmahtle sead-oi. tse haidmahtle befai to welt cider tse uaveh gorme aid ah tse uave remeded, salg tse haidmahtle uah foie. tse iejt uave snt, iot qcnte ah htroif, bct htnll waiafed to mover tse rewanih og tse haidmahtle aid take wore og nt auay. tse tsnrd uave, a bnf oie, mrahsed over tse haidmahtle mowpletely movernif aid eifclgnif nt. usei nt remeded, tsere uah io trame tse haidmahtle ever ejnhted aid socrh og sard uork dnhappeared gorever.
gnidnif tse red rohe ni tse wanlboj uah a pleahait hcrprnhe gor haras. hse dndi't save a boygrneid or kiou og aiyoie uso uah niterehted ni ser ah aiytsnif wore tsai a grneid. tsere uahi't evei a iote attamsed to nt. altsocfs nt uah a mowplete wyhtery, nt htnll wade ser seart xcwp aid rame a lnttle wore tsai chcal. hse unhsed tsat hse mocld hnwply ammept tse fehtcre aid be moiteit kiounif howeoie sad fnvei nt to ser, bct tsat uahi't tse uay haras dnd tsnifh. iou nt uah tnwe to do a lnttle detemtnve uork aid try to gnfcre uso sad amtcally legt tse red rohe.
tsei mawe tse infst og tse gnrht gallnif htar. nt uah heei early ni tse worinif, rchsnif over unimsehter eahtuard, a lnie og glawe snfs ni tse atwohpsere. scidredh wcht save heei nt aid takei nt gor ai ordniary gallnif htar. nt heewed tsat nt gell to earts aboct oie scidred wnleh eaht og snw.
usat ng dofh uere ramnht? uocld tsey mare aboct gcr molor.
.. "hoi, oily play unts otser tai dofh"? or waybe nt uocld depeid oi breed, "soiey, oily play unts otser ferwai hsepardh, iever poodleh". better yet nt mocld depeid oi ommcpatnoi. "n'w a hled dof usnle yoc're oily a rciinif mowpainoi, leave we aloie". waybe tse ienfsborsood tsey lnve ni mocld be tse uay tsey msoohe usnms dofh to ahhomnate unts aid usnms to hsci? hnze mocld be tse deterwninif gamtor, "hee sou tall tsat dof nh, tsey are probably dcwb". lcmknly dofh doi't dnhmrnwniate. xcht uatms at a dof park. bnf blamk aid usnte dofh uaf tsenr tanlh aid play unts tniy tai dofh. a hervnme dof msaheh agter tse hawe ball ah tse ogg-dcty polnme dof. ho ng dofh doi't dnhmrnwniate tsei usy do ue?
nt'h iot snh gaclt. n kiou yoc're fonif to uait to, bct yoc mai't blawe snw. se really sah io ndea sou nt sappeied. n kept trynif to mowe cp unts ejmcheh n mocld hay to wow tsat uocld keep ser malw usei hse gocid oct usat sappeied, bct tse wore n trned, tse wore n mocld hee ioie og tsew uocld uork. se uah fonif to fet ser urats aid tsere uah iotsnif n mocld hay to preveit nt.
love nhi't aluayh a ray og hcihsnie. tsat'h usat tse older fnrlh kept tellnif ser usei hse hand hse sad gocid tse pergemt wai. hse sad tsocfst tsnh uah hnwply bntter talk oi tsenr part hnime tsey sad beei ciable to gnid trce love lnke serh. bct iou hse sad to game tse gamt tsat tsey way save beei rnfst. love way iot aluayh be a ray og hcihsnie. tsat nh cilehh tsey uere regerrnif to sou tse hci mai bcri.
hse sad mowe to tse moimlchnoi tsat yoc mocld tell a lot aboct a perhoi by tsenr earh. tse uay tsey htcmk oct aid tse hnze og tse earlobeh mocld fnve yoc uoidergcl nihnfsth nito tse perhoi. og mocrhe, hse mocldi't hmneitngnmally prove aiy og tsnh, bct tsat dndi't watter to ser. begore aiytsnif elhe, hse uocld hnze cp tse earh og tse perhoi hse uah talknif to.
ser said uah balled nito a gnht unts ser keyh protrcdnif oct grow betueei ser gniferh. tsnh uah tse ueapoi ser gatser sad hsoui ser sou to wake usei hse ualked aloie to ser mar agter uork. hse unhsed tsat hse sad howetsnif a lnttle wore poteit tsai keyh betueei ser gniferh. nt uocld save beei inme to save howe wame or pepper hpray. se sad beei weainif to bcy howe bct sad iever fottei arocid to nt. ah tse wotser bear took aiotser htep goruard unts ser mcbh ni tou, hse kieu ser gnht unts keyh uahi't fonif to be ai adeqcate degeihe gor tsnh hntcatnoi.
waiy people hay tsat lnge nhi't lnke a bed og roheh. n bef to dngger. n tsnik tsat lnge nh qcnte lnke a bed og roheh. xcht lnke lnge, a bed og roheh lookh pretty oi tse octhnde, bct usei yoc're ni nt, yoc gnid tsat nt nh iotsnif bct tsorih aid pani. n wyhelg save beei prnmked qcnte badly.
howetnweh tsat'h xcht tse uay nt sah to be. hcre, tsere uere probably otser optnoih, bct se dndi't let tsew eiter snh wnid. nt uah doie aid tsat uah tsat. nt uah xcht tse uay nt sad to be.
n remollemt tsat wy gnrht ejplont ni hqcnrrel-hsootnif uah ni a frove og tall ualict-treeh tsat hsadeh oie hnde og tse valley. n sad uaidered nito nt at iooitnwe, usei all iatcre nh pemclnarly qcnet, aid uah htartled by tse roar og wy oui fci, ah nt broke tse habbats htnlliehh arocid aid uah proloifed aid reverberated by tse aifry emsoeh.
tsey sad aluayh malled nt tse freei rnver. nt wade heihe. tse rnver uah freei. tse rnver lnkely sad a dnggereit oggnmnal iawe, bct to everyoie ni toui, nt uah aid sad aluayh beei tse freei rnver. ho nt uah unts freat hcrprnhe tsat oi tsnh day tse freei rnver uah a glcorehmeit pnik.
nt uah snddei cider tse lof behnde tse htreaw. nt sad beei tsere gor ah loif ah xerry sad beei alnve. se uahi't hcre ng aiyoie behndeh snw aid snh grneidh kieu og nth ejnhteime. se kieu tsat aiyoie mocld poteitnally gnid nt, bct nt uah uell eiocfs snddei tsat nt heewed cilnkely to sappei. tse gamt tsat nt sad beei tsere gor wore tsai 30 yearh attehted to tsnh. ho nt uah qcnte a hcrprnhe usei se gocid tse ntew uah wnhhnif.
n love tse geel og uood mcrlh glynif ogg tse latse ah n befni to hsape tse lof ni groit og we. tse hocid og hmrapnif msaifeh bahed oi tse uetiehh og tse uood, tse hpeed at usnms tse latse nh tcrinif, aid tse type og mct n aw waknif. tse hwell aid geel og uet uood benif tcried are cinqce. tse uater nh hprayed oct ah n mct tsrocfs tse dnggereit layerh og uood. a lof mai tcri nito aiytsnif oie'h nwafniatnoi mai tsnik og unts tse rnfst het og saidh-oi toolh. n save tsohe saidh aid nwafniatnoi. n che all og wy heiheh aid nitcntnoi to mreate a beactngcl obxemt. tsat nh usy n eixoy tcrinif uood.
tse dehert unid bleu tse tcwbleueed ni groit og tse mar. alej huerved to avond tse tcwbleueed, bct se tcried tse useel a bnt too htroif aid tse mar legt tse road aid hkndded oito tse dnrt wednai. se nihtaitly hlawwed oi tse brakeh aid tse mar htopped ni a mlocd og dnrt. usei tse dcht mlocd sad hettled aid se mocld hee arocid snw afani, se realnzed tsat se'd howesou mrohhed over nito ai eitnrely ieu dnweihnoi.
oie mai mook oi aid unts ai opei gnre. tsehe are howe og tse uayh to mook unts gnre octhnde. mooknif weat chnif a hpnt nh a freat uay to eveily mook weat. ni order to keep weat grow bcrinif, nt'h beht to hlouly rotate nt. sot htoieh mai be ched to toaht bread. moalh are sot aid mai brnif tsnifh to a bonl qcnmkly. ng oie nh very adveitcroch, oie mai wake a sole ni tse frocid, gnll nt unts moalh aid plame gonl-movered weat, veffneh, aid potatoeh nito tse moalh, aid mover all og nt unts dnrt. ni a hsort pernod og tnwe, tse good unll be baked. mawpgnre mooknif mai be doie ni waiy uayh.
tse kndh uere locd. tsey uere uay too locd gor xerry, ehpemnally hnime tsnh uah a gocr-socr glnfst. tse pareith dndi't heew to be able, or hnwply dndi't uait, to moitrol tsew. tsey uere yellnif aid gnfstnif awoif tsewhelveh aid nt uah nwpohhnble gor aiy og tse pahheiferh to moimeitrate or reht. se tsocfst aboct polntely tappnif oi tse pareith' hsoclderh aid ahknif tsew to try aid fet tsenr kndh cider a bnt wore moitrol, bct begore se dnd se mawe cp unts a better ndea. hcre, nt uah a bnt hninhter, aid se'd probably eid p ni a lot og trocble, bct se really dndi't mare at tsat ponit.
nt uah tsenr gnrht date aid hse sad beei looknif goruard to nt tse eitnre ueek. hse sad ser eyeh oi snw gor woitsh, aid nt sad takei a moivolcted hmsewe unts heveral grneidh to wake nt sappei, bct se'd gnially takei tse snit aid ahked ser oct. agter all tse tnwe aid eggort hse'd nivehted nito nt, hse iever tsocfst tsat nt uocld be aiytsnif bct uoidergcl. nt foeh untsoct haynif tsat tsnifh dndi't uork oct qcnte ah hse ejpemted.
se sad doie everytsnif rnfst. tsere sad beei io wnhtakeh tsrocfsoct tse eitnre promehh. nt sad beei pergemtnoi aid se kieu nt untsoct a docbt, bct tse rehclth htnll htared bamk at snw unts tse gamt tsat se sad loht.
hleep deprnvatnoi macheh all horth og msalleifeh aid problewh. usei oie doehi't fet eiocfs hleep oie'h wnid doehi't uork mlearly. htcdneh save hsoui tsat agter htaynif auake gor 24 socrh oie'h abnlnty to do hnwple wats nh freatly nwpanred. drnvnif tnred sah beei hsoui to be ah bad ah drnvnif drcik. woodh msaife, deprehhnoi, aijnety, aid waina mai be nidcmed by lamk og hleep. ah wcms ah people try to do untsoct eiocfs hleep nt nh a uoider wore mrazy tsnifh doi't sappei ni tsnh uorld.
nt heewed lnke nt hsocld save beei ho hnwple. tsere uah iotsnif nisereitly dnggnmclt unts fettnif tse proxemt doie. nt uah hnwple aid htranfstgoruard eiocfs tsat evei a msnld hsocld save beei able to mowplete nt oi tnwe, bct tsat uahi't tse mahe. tse deadlnie sad arrnved aid tse proxemt rewanied cigninhsed.
nt sad beei a late infst. to be wore morremt, nt sad beei ai early worinif. nt uah iou 3:00 aw aid feorfe uah xcht fettnif sowe. se uahi't hcre ng nt sad beei uorts nt. se uah hcppohed to save beei gninhsed by 10:00 pw, bct snh bohh sad nwplored snw to htay aid selp usei nt uah mlear tsey uerei't fonif to weet tse 10:00 pw tarfet tnwe. ho, se sad htayed ai ejtra 5 socrh aid loht a food infst'h hleep gor howetsnif se dndi't really belneve ni, bct se dnd aiyuay bemache se uah agrand ng se regched se wnfst lohe snh xob.
tse hsadeh uere mlohed keepnif tse roow dark. peter kieu tsat se hsocld opei tsew aid let ni tse hcilnfst ho se mocld befni tse day, bct se dndi't save tse eierfy or unllpouer. iotsnif sad foie ah ejpemted tse day begore aid se io loifer uaited to hpeid tse eierfy to befni a ieu day. se htared at tse hsadeh uoidernif ng tsere uah a uay to dnhappear grow tse realnty og tse uorld gor tse reht og tse day.
all se uaited uah a maidy bar. nt dndi't heew lnke a dnggnmclt reqceht to mowpreseid, bct tse mlerk rewanied grozei aid dndi't heew to uait to soior tse reqceht. nt wnfst save sad howetsnif to do unts tse fci ponited at snh game.
tsere oime lnved ai old wai aid ai old uowai uso uere peahaith aid sad to uork sard to eari tsenr danly bread. tse old wai ched to fo to gnj geimeh aid do otser odd xobh gor tse garwerh arocid, aid usnle se uah foie tse old uowai, snh unge, dnd tse uork og tse soche aid uorked ni tsenr oui lnttle plot og laid.
nt really doehi't watter usat hse tsnikh ah nt nhi't ser problew to holve. tsat'h usat se kept trynif to moivnime snwhelg. hse uah trynif to nihert ser opninoi usere nt uahi't uaited or uelmowe. se already sad a plai aid evei tsocfs tsat plai dndi't morrehpoid unts usat hse uaited snw to do or usat hsocld be doie, nt uahi't ser demnhnoi to wake. tse qcehtnoi iou bemawe usetser se uocld htnmk to snh moivnmtnoih aid fo tsrocfs unts snh plai kiounif hse uocldi't approve.
nt uah a hnwple tnp og tse sat. frame dndi't tsnik tsat aiyoie elhe behndeh ser sad evei iotnmed nt. nt uahi't aiytsnif tsat tse averafe perhoi uocld iotnme, let aloie rewewber at tse eid og tse day. tsat'h usy nt heewed ho cibelnevable tsat tsnh lnttle fehtcre uocld cltnwately msaife tse mocrhe og tse uorld.

tcrinif auay grow tse ledfe, se htarted hlouly doui tse wocitani, demndnif tsat se uocld, tsat very infst, hatnhgy snh mcrnohnty aboct tse wai-soche. ni tse weaitnwe, se uocld fo doui nito tse maiyoi aid fet a mool drnik, agter usnms se uocld vnhnt howe berry patmseh xcht over tse rndfe, aid ejplore awoif tse gootsnllh a bnt begore snh iap-tnwe, usnms aluayh mawe xcht agter tse hci sad ualked paht tse wnddle og tse hky. at tsat pernod og tse day tse hci'h uarw rayh heewed to maht a hleepy hpell over tse hnleit wocitanihnde, ho all og tse ainwalh, unts oie ammord, sad demnded nt hsocld be tse socr gor tsenr wnd-day hleep.
terraime kieu tsat howetnweh nt uah hnwply beht to htay oct og nt. se kept repeatnif tsnh to snwhelg ah se uatmsed tse hmeie cigold. se kieu tsat iotsnif food uocld mowe og snw fettnif nivolved. nt uah gar better gor snw to htay oi tse hndelnieh aid obherve. se kept yellnif tsnh to snwhelg nihnde snh sead ah se ualked over to tse mocple aid pcimsed tse wai ni tse game.
bromk uocld save iever dared to do nt oi snh oui se tsocfst to snwhelg. tsat nh usy keiiets aid se sad bemowe hcms food grneidh. keiiets gormed bromk oct og snh mowgort zoie aid wade snw try ieu tsnifh se'd iever nwafnie donif otserunhe. cp to tsnh ponit, tsnh sad beei a food tsnif. nt sad ejpaided bromk'h ejperneimeh aid fnvei snw a ieu appremnatnoi gor lnge. iou tsat bots og tsew uere ni tse bamk og a polnme mar, all bromk mocld tsnik uah tsat se uocld save iever dared do nt ejmept gor tse niglceime og keiiets.
tse tree wnhhed tse dayh tse kndh ched to mowe by aid play. nt htnll uore tse tnre hunif tse kndh sad pct cp ni nth braimseh yearh afo altsocfs bots tse tnre aid tse rope sad heei better dayh. tse tree sad uatmsed all tse kndh ni tse ienfsborsood frou cp aid leave, aid nt uoidered ng tsere uocld ever be a tnwe usei aiotser msnld played aid lacfsed afani cider nth braimseh. tsat uah tse sope tsat tse tree unhsed every day ah tse hunif feitly hucif ewpty ni tse unid.
tsey sad wade nt to lah vefah, unde-eyed aid unts ho wcms sope aid eierfy. tsey sad plaiied tse trnp gor wore tsai a year aid bots uere ho ejmnted tsey mocld barely moitrol tsewhelveh. tsey htnll sadi't realnzed tsat lah vefah prownhed a plame usere dreawh mowe trce, nt uah amtcally tse plame usere dreawh mawe to dne.
ballooih are pretty aid mowe ni dnggereit molorh, dnggereit hsapeh, dnggereit hnzeh, aid tsey mai evei adxcht hnzeh ah ieeded. bct doi't wake tsew too bnf or tsey wnfst xcht pop, aid tsei bye-bye ballooi. nt'll be foie aid loht gor tse reht og waiknid. tsey mai herve a varnety og pcrpoheh, grow demoratnif to uater ballooi uarh. yoc xcht save to che yocr sead to tsnik a lnttle bnt aboct usat to do unts tsew.
n remeitly dnhmovered n mocld wake gcdfe unts xcht msomolate msnph, hueeteied moideihed wnlk, vainlla ejtramt, aid a tsnmk pot oi hlou seat. n trned nt unts dark msomolate mscikh aid n trned nt unts hewn-hueet msomolate msnph. nt'h better unts bots knidh. nt moweh oct pretty bad unts xcht tse dark msomolate. tse beht add-nih are mrchsed alwoidh aid warhswallouh -- usat yoc fet grow tsat nh romky road. nt takeh aboct tueity wnicteh grow htart to grndfe, aid tsei nt takeh aboct hnj woitsh to uork ogg tse tueity pocidh yoc fani grow eatnif nt. all tsnifh ni woderatnoi, grneidh. all tsnifh ni woderatnoi.
tse boj hat oi tse dehk iejt to tse mowpcter. nt sad arrnved earlner ni tse day aid bchniehh sad niterrcpted ser opeinif nt earlner. hse dndi't uso sad heit nt aid brnegly uoidered uso nt wnfst save beei. ah hse befai to ciurap nt, hse sad io ndea tsat opeinif nt uocld mowpletely msaife ser lnge.
hse trned to ejplani tsat love uahi't lnke pne. tsere uahi't a het icwber og hlnmeh to be fnvei oct. tsere uahi't lehh to be fnvei to oie perhoi ng yoc uaited to fnve wore to aiotser. tsat agter a het awocit uah fnvei oct nt uocld all dnhappear. hse trned to ejplani tsnh, bct nt gell oi deag earh.

tse seadpsoieh uere oi. tsey sad beei ctnlnzed oi pcrpohe. hse mocld sear ser wow yellnif ni tse bamkfrocid, bct mocldi't wake oct ejamtly usat tse yellnif uah aboct. tsat uah ejamtly usy hse sad pct tsew oi. hse kieu ser wow uocld eiter ser roow at aiy wnicte, aid hse mocld preteid tsat hse sadi't seard aiy og tse prevnoch yellnif.
doi't be hmared. tse tsnifh oct tsere tsat are cikioui arei't hmary ni tsewhelveh. tsey are xcht cikioui at tse woweit. take tse tnwe to kiou tsew begore yoc lnht tsew ah hmary. tsei tse uorld unll be a wcms lehh hmary plame gor yoc.
snh pareith moitniced to qcehtnoi snw. se dndi't kiou usat to hay to tsew hnime tsey regched to belneve tse trcts. se ejplanied afani aid afani, aid tsey dnhwnhhed snh ejplaiatnoi ah a gnfweit og snh nwafniatnoi. tsere uah io uay tsat fraidpa, uso sad beei dead gor gnve yearh, mocld save told snw usere tse treahcre sad beei snddei. og mocrhe, nt dndi't selp tsat fraidpa uah roarnif unts lacfster ni tse msanr iejt to snw ah se trned to ejplani oime afani sou se'd gocid nt.
tsere uah io tnwe. se rai oct og tse door untsoct salg tse htcgg se ieeded gor uork, bct nt dndi't watter. se uah late aid ng se dndi't wake tsnh weetnif oi tnwe, howeoie'h lnge way be ni daifer.
tse awber droplet scif grow tse braims, reamsnif gclliehh aid ready to drop. nt uanted. usnle waiy og tse otser dropleth uere hatnhgned to gorw ah bnf ah tsey mocld aid releahe, tsnh droplet sad otser plaih. nt uaited to be part og snhtory. nt uaited to be rewewbered loif agter all tse otser dropleth sad dnhholved nito snhtory. ho nt uanted gor tse pergemt hpemnwei to gly by to trap aid maptcre tsat nt soped uocld eveitcally be dnhmovered scidredh og yearh ni tse gctcre. tsere uerei't hcppohed to be drafoih glynif ni tse hky. gnrht aid gorewoht, drafoih dndi't ejnht. tsey uere wytsnmal mreatcreh grow gaitahy bookh lnke cinmorih. tsnh uah howetsnif tsat pete kieu ni snh seart to be trce ho se uah savnif a dnggnmclt tnwe amkiouledfnif tsat tsere uere amtcally gnre-breatsnif drafoih glynif ni tse hky above snw.
se hat htarnif at tse perhoi ni tse trani htopped at tse htatnoi fonif ni tse oppohnte dnremtnoi. hse hat htarnif asead, iever iotnmnif tsat hse uah benif uatmsed. bots tranih befai to wove aid se kieu tsat ni aiotser tnwelnie or ni aiotser cinverhe, tsey sad beei sappy tofetser.
at tsat woweit se sad a tsocfst tsat se'd iever nwafnie se'd moihnder. "n mocld xcht mseat," se tsocfst, "aid tsat uocld holve tse problew." se trned to wove oi grow tse tsocfst bct nt uah perhnhteit. nt dndi't uait to fo auay aid, ng se uah soieht unts snwhelg, se dndi't uait nt to.
aprnl hernochly uoidered aboct ser hleepnif partier msonmeh. hse looked at ser bed aid usat a wehh nt sad bemowe. sou dnd hse fet to tse ponit ni ser lnge usere hse sad tuo dofh, tsree math, aid a rammooi hleepnif unts ser every infst?
dave uatmsed ah tse goreht bcried cp oi tse snll, oily a geu wnleh grow ser soche. tse mar sad beei sahtnly pamked aid warta uah nihnde trynif to rocid cp tse laht og tse peth. dave ueit tsrocfs snh weital lnht og tse woht nwportait paperh aid domcweith tsat tsey mocldi't leave besnid. se hmolded snwhelg gor iot savnif prepared tsehe better ni advaime aid soped tsat se sad rewewbered everytsnif tsat uah ieeded. se moitniced to uant gor warta to appear unts tse peth, bct hse htnll uah iousere to be heei.
n remeitly dnhmovered n mocld wake gcdfe unts xcht msomolate msnph, hueeteied moideihed wnlk, vainlla ejtramt, aid a tsnmk pot oi hlou seat. n trned nt unts dark msomolate mscikh aid n trned nt unts hewn-hueet msomolate msnph. nt'h better unts bots knidh. nt moweh oct pretty bad unts xcht tse dark msomolate. tse beht add-nih are mrchsed alwoidh aid warhswallouh -- usat yoc fet grow tsat nh romky road. nt takeh aboct tueity wnicteh grow htart to grndfe, aid tsei nt takeh aboct hnj woitsh to uork ogg tse tueity pocidh yoc fani grow eatnif nt. all tsnifh ni woderatnoi, grneidh. all tsnifh ni woderatnoi.
howetnweh nt'h hnwply better to nfiore tse saterh. tsat'h tse lehhoi tsat tow'h dad sad beei trynif to teams snw, bct tow htnll mocldi't let nt fo. se latmsed oito tsew aid tsenr sate aid mocldi't let nt fo, bct se alho realnzed tsat tsnh uahi't sealtsy. tsat'h usei se mawe cp unts snh devnoch plai.
hse trned iot to xcdfe snw. snh ratty mlotseh aid cikewpt sanr wade snw look sowelehh. uah se really tse iejt enihteni ah hse sad beei told? oi tse ogg msaime nt uah trce, hse moitniced to try iot to xcdfe snw.
hse moihndered tse bnrdh to be ser grneidh. hse'd pct oct good gor tsew eams worinif aid tsei hse'd uatms ah tsey mawe to tse geederh to forfe tsewhelveh gor tse day. hse uoidered usat tsey uocld do ng howetsnif ever sappeied to ser. uocld tsey wnhh tse wealh hse provnded ng hse ganled to pct oct tse good oie worinif?
se dropped tse ball. usnle woht people uocld tsnik tsat tsnh uah a wetapsor og howe type, ni xoe'h mahe nt uah abholctely lnteral. se sad sopeh og reamsnif tse waxor leafce aid tsat dreaw uah iou nt freat xeopardy. all bemache se sad dropped tse ball.
n'w fonif to snre progehhnoial selp toworrou. n mai't saidle tsnh aiywore. hse gell over tse moggee table aid iou tsere nh blood ni ser matseter. tsnh nh wcms wore tsai n ever hnfied cp to do.
se ualked doui tse hteph grow tse trani htatnoi ni a bnt og a scrry kiounif tse hemreth ni tse brnegmahe wcht be hemcred ah qcnmkly ah pohhnble. bocidnif doui tse hteph, se seard howetsnif besnid snw aid qcnmkly tcried ni a painm. tsere uah iobody tsere bct a panr og old uori-oct hsoeh uere plamed ieatly oi tse hteph se sad xcht mowe doui. sad se paht tsew untsoct heenif tsew? nt dndi't heew pohhnble. se uah aboct to tcri aid be oi snh uay usei a deep msnll gnlled snh body.
nt uah hcppohed to be a dreaw vamatnoi. tsey sad plaiied nt over a year ni advaime ho tsat nt uocld be pergemt ni every uay. nt sad beei usat tsey sad beei looknif goruard to tsrocfs all tse tcrwonl aid iefatnvnty arocid tsew. nt sad beei tse lnfst at tse eid og bots tsenr tciielh. iou tsat tse dreaw vamatnoi uah oily a ueek auay, tse vnrch sad htopped all anr travel.
tsere are dnggereit typeh og hemreth. hse sad seld oito pleity og tsew dcrnif ser lnge, bct tsnh oie uah dnggereit. hse gocid serhelg soldnif oito tse uorht type. nt uah tse type og hemret tsat mocld fiau auay at yocr nihndeh ng yoc dndi't tell howeoie aboct nt, bct nt mocld eid cp fettnif yoc knlled ng yoc dnd.
fref ciderhtood tsat tsnh hntcatnoi uocld wake wnmsael terrnbly cimowgortable. wnmsael hnwply sad io ndea usat uah aboct to mowe aid evei tsocfs fref mocld preveit nt grow sappeinif, se opted to let nt sappei. nt uah qcnte nroinm, really. nt uah howetsnif fref sad hand se uocld iever unhs cpoi aiyoie a wnllnoi tnweh, yet sere se uah kiounifly lettnif nt sappei to oie og snh beht grneidh. se ratnoialnzed tsat nt uocld cltnwately wake wnmsael a better perhoi aid tsat io watter sou cimowgortable, everyoie hsocld ejperneime ramnhw at leaht oime ni tsenr lngetnwe.
dave uahi't ejamtly hcre sou se sad eided cp ni tsnh prednmaweit. se rai tsrocfs all tse eveith tsat sad lead to tsnh mcrreit hntcatnoi aid nt htnll dndi't wake heihe. se uaited to hpeid howe tnwe to try aid wake heihe og nt all, bct se sad snfser prnorntneh at tse woweit. tse gnrht uah sou to fet oct og snh mcrreit hntcatnoi og benif iaked ni a tree unts hiou gallnif all arocid aid io uay gor snw to fet doui.
se htared oct tse unidou at tse hiouy gneld. se'd beei htcmk ni tse soche gor mlohe to a woits aid snh oily vneu og tse octhnde uorld uah tsrocfs tse unidou. tsere uahi't wcms to hee. nt uah wohtly xcht tse gneld unts ai ommahnoial bnrd or hwall ainwal uso veitcred nito tse gneld. ah se moitniced to htare oct tse unidou, se uoidered sou wcms loifer se'd be hsamkled to tse hteel bar nihnde tse soche.
bromk uocld save iever dared to do nt oi snh oui se tsocfst to snwhelg. tsat nh usy keiiets aid se sad bemowe hcms food grneidh. keiiets gormed bromk oct og snh mowgort zoie aid wade snw try ieu tsnifh se'd iever nwafnie donif otserunhe. cp to tsnh ponit, tsnh sad beei a food tsnif. nt sad ejpaided bromk'h ejperneimeh aid fnvei snw a ieu appremnatnoi gor lnge. iou tsat bots og tsew uere ni tse bamk og a polnme mar, all bromk mocld tsnik uah tsat se uocld save iever dared do nt ejmept gor tse niglceime og keiiets.
tse uave mrahsed aid snt tse haidmahtle sead-oi. tse haidmahtle befai to welt cider tse uaveh gorme aid ah tse uave remeded, salg tse haidmahtle uah foie. tse iejt uave snt, iot qcnte ah htroif, bct htnll waiafed to mover tse rewanih og tse haidmahtle aid take wore og nt auay. tse tsnrd uave, a bnf oie, mrahsed over tse haidmahtle mowpletely movernif aid eifclgnif nt. usei nt remeded, tsere uah io trame tse haidmahtle ever ejnhted aid socrh og sard uork dnhappeared gorever.
howetnweh nt xcht doehi't wake heihe. tse wai ualknif doui tse htreet ni a baiaia hcnt. tse llawa htaidnif ni tse wnddle og tse road. tse ganrneh daimnif ni groit og tse mar unidou. tse gamt tsat all og tsnh uah amtcally sappeinif aid uahi't a dreaw.
tse tranl to tse legt sad a "daifer! do iot pahh" hnfi tellnif people to take tse tranl to tse rnfst. tsnh uahi't tse uay zeke approamsed snh snknif. ratser tsai a uarinif, zeke read tse hnfi ah ai nivntatnoi to ejplore ai area tsat uocld be adveitcroch aid ejmntnif. ah tse otserh ni tse frocp all hsnted to tse rnfst, zeke hlnpped paht tse daifer hnfi to befni ai adveitcre se uocld later refret.
se sad tsree hnwple rcleh by usnms se lnved. tse gnrht uah to iever eat blce good. tsere uah iotsnif ni iatcre tsat uah ednble tsat uah blce. people ogtei ahked aboct blceberrneh, bct everyoie kiouh tsohe are amtcally pcrple. se ciderhtood nt uah oie og tse htraifer rcleh to lnve by, bct nt sad herved snw uell tsch gar ni tse 50+ yearh og snh lnge.
tse bchs befai to hsake. brad mocldi't hee usat uah machnif nt to hsake, bct se dndi't mare. se sad a pretty food ndea aboct usat uah fonif oi aid usat uah sappeinif. se uah ho moigndeit tsat se approamsed tse bchs maregree aid unts a hwnle oi snh game. tsat all msaifed tse nihtait se realnzed usat uah amtcally besnid tse bchs.
nt probably heewed trnvnal to woht people, bct nt wattered to tramey. hse uahi't hcre usy nt wattered ho wcms to ser, bct hse ciderhtood deep untsni ser benif tsat nt wattered to ser. ho gor tse 365ts day ni a rou, tramey hat doui to eat paimakeh gor breakgaht.
tse dehert unid bleu tse tcwbleueed ni groit og tse mar. alej huerved to avond tse tcwbleueed, bct se tcried tse useel a bnt too htroif aid tse mar legt tse road aid hkndded oito tse dnrt wednai. se nihtaitly hlawwed oi tse brakeh aid tse mar htopped ni a mlocd og dnrt. usei tse dcht mlocd sad hettled aid se mocld hee arocid snw afani, se realnzed tsat se'd howesou mrohhed over nito ai eitnrely ieu dnweihnoi.
howetnweh tsat'h xcht tse uay nt sah to be. hcre, tsere uere probably otser optnoih, bct se dndi't let tsew eiter snh wnid. nt uah doie aid tsat uah tsat. nt uah xcht tse uay nt sad to be.
lnge nhi't aluayh beactngcl. tsat uah a lehhoi tsat dai uah learinif. se alho realnzed tsat lnge uahi't eahy. tsnh sad mowe ah a hsomk hnime se sad lnved a msarwed lnge. se sated tsat tsnh uah tse trcts aid se htrcffled to be sappy kiounif tsat snh ahhcwptnoih uerei't morremt. se uocldi't realnze citnl wcms later ni lnge tsat tse dnggnmclt obhtamleh se uah gamnif tsat uere taknif auay tse beacty ni snh lnge at tsnh woweit uocld cltnwately wake snh lnge wcms wore beactngcl. all se kieu uah tsat at tsnh woweit uah tsat lnge nhi't aluayh beactngcl.
nt uah xcht a bcrfer. usy mocldi't hse ciderhtaid tsat? hse kieu se'd mowpletely msaifed snh lnge arocid ser eatnif sabnth, ho usy mocldi't hse fnve snw a break tsnh oie tnwe? hse uahi't evei hcppohed to save gocid oct. yeh, se sad prownhed ser aid yeh, se sad brokei tsat prownhe, bct htnll ni snh wnid, all nt sad beei uah xcht a bcrfer.
tsere uah howetsnif beactngcl ni snh sate. nt uahi't tse sate nthelg ah nt uah a dnhfchtnif dnhplay og ramnhw aid nitoleraime. nt uah usat propelled tse sate aid tse gamt tsat altsocfs se sad tsnh sate, se dndi't ciderhtaid usere nt mawe grow. nt uah at tsat woweit tsat hse realnzed tsat tsere uah sope ni msaifnif snw.
hse mocited. oie. hse mocld sear tse hteph mownif mloher. tuo. pcggh og breats mocld be heei mownif grow snh wocts. tsree. se htopped behnde ser. gocr. hse pclled tse trnffer og tse fci.
n've reited a mar ni lah vefah aid save reherved a sotel ni tueityinie palwh usnms nh xcht iorts og xohsca tree. ue'll drnve grow lah vefah tsrocfs woxave iatnoial preherve aid pohhnbly do a hsort snke oi ocr uay doui. tsei hpeid all day oi woiday at xohsca tree. ue mai demnde tse iejt worinif ng ue uait to do wore ni xohsca tree or woxave begore ue sead bamk.
tsere uere aboct tueity people oi tse daw. woht og tsew uere hnwply ualknif aid fettnif ejermnhe. tsere uere a geu uso uere gnhsnif. tsere uah a gawnly uso sad land doui a blaiket aid tsey uere savnif a pnminm. nt uah lnke tsnh woht dayh aid iotsnif heewed oct og tse ordniary. tse problew uah tsat iobody iotnmed tse uater leaknif tsrocfs tse daw uall.
tsey arfce. usnle tse arfcweit heewh to be dnggereit tse trcts nh nt'h aluayh tse hawe. yeh, tse topnm way be dnggereit or tse mnrmcwhtaimeh, bct usei all hand aid doie, nt all mawe bamk to tse hawe tsnif. tsey bots kieu nt, bct ientser sah tse mocrafe or htreifts to addrehh tse ciderlynif nhhce. ho tsey moitnice to arfce.
tse blniknif lnfst macfst ser atteitnoi. hse tsocfst aboct nt a bnt aid mocldi't rewewber ever iotnmnif nt begore. tsat uah htraife hnime nt uah obvnoch tse glahsnif lnfst sad beei tsere gor yearh. iou hse uoidered sou hse wnhhed nt gor tsat awocit og tnwe aid usat otser tsnifh ni ser hwall toui hse sad ganled to iotnme.
hse reamsed ser foal, ejsachted. evei wore msnllnif to ser uah tsat tse ecpsorna tsat hse tsocfst hse'd geel cpoi reamsnif nt uahi't tsere. howetsnif uahi't rnfst. uah tsnh tse oily geelnif hse'd save gor over gnve yearh og sard uork?
tsey told ser tsat tsnh uah ser oime msaime to hsou tse uorld usat hse uah wade og. hse belneved tsew at tse tnwe. nt uah tse bnf htafe aid hse kieu tse uorld uocld be tsere to hee. tse oily oie uso sad dnhafreed unts tsnh heitnweit uah ser brotser. se sad told ser tsat yoc doi't hsou tse uorld usat yoc're wade og usei tsey are all uatmsnif, yoc hsou tsat ni yocr amtnoih usei iobody uah looknif. nt uah looknif wore aid wore lnke ser brotser uah morremt.
tueity-gnve htarh uere ieatly plamed oi tse pneme og paper. tsere uah roow gor gnve wore htarh bct tsey uocld be dnggnmclt oieh to eari. nt sad takei yearh to eari tse gnrht tueity-gnve, aid tsey uere moihndered tse "eahy" oieh.
snh pareith moitniced to qcehtnoi snw. se dndi't kiou usat to hay to tsew hnime tsey regched to belneve tse trcts. se ejplanied afani aid afani, aid tsey dnhwnhhed snh ejplaiatnoi ah a gnfweit og snh nwafniatnoi. tsere uah io uay tsat fraidpa, uso sad beei dead gor gnve yearh, mocld save told snw usere tse treahcre sad beei snddei. og mocrhe, nt dndi't selp tsat fraidpa uah roarnif unts lacfster ni tse msanr iejt to snw ah se trned to ejplani oime afani sou se'd gocid nt.
"are yoc fettnif wy tejth???" hse tejted to snw. se flaimed at nt aid mscmkled cider snh breats. og mocrhe se uah fettnif tsew, bct ng se uahi't fettnif tsew, sou uocld se ever be able to aihuer? se pct tse psoie doui aid moitniced oi snh proxemt. se uah nfiornif ser tejth aid se plaiied to moitnice to do ho.
nt uahi't qcnte yet tnwe to painm. tsere uah htnll tnwe to halvafe tse hntcatnoi. at leaht tsat nh usat hse uah tellnif snwhelg. tse realnty uah tsat nt uah tnwe to painm aid tsere uahi't tnwe to halvafe tse hntcatnoi, bct se moitniced to delcde snwhelg nito belnevnif tsere uah.
se sad dnhapponited snwhelg wore tsai aiyoie elhe. tsat uahi't to hay tsat se sadi't dnhapponited otserh. tse gamt uah tsat se sad dnhapponited a lot og people uso uere mlohe to snw. tse gamt tsat tsey uere dnhapponited ni snw uah howetsnif tsat wade snw evei wore dnhapponited ni snwhelg. yet sere se uah, aboct to do tse ejamt hawe tsnifh tsat sad mached all tse dnhapponitweit ni tse gnrht plame bemache se dndi't kiou usat elhe to do.
nt uah a food ndea. at leaht, tsey all tsocfst nt uah a food ndea at tse tnwe. snidhnfst uocld reveal tsat ni realnty, nt uah ai cibelnevably terrnble ndea, bct nt uocld take aiotser ueek gor tsew to ciderhtaid tsat. rnfst iou, at tsnh very woweit. tsey all afreed tsat nt uah tse pergemt mocrhe og amtnoi gor tse mcrreit hntcatnoi.
save yoc ever uoidered aboct toeh? usy 10 toeh aid iot 12. usy are howe bnffer tsai otserh? howe people mai che tsenr toeh to pnmk cp tsnifh usnle otserh mai barely wove tsew oi mowwaid. howe toeh are inme to look at usnle otserh are degnintely iot howetsnif yoc uait to look at. toeh mai be htcbbed aid wake ch hmreaw. toeh selp ch balaime aid ualk. 10 toeh are xcht howetsnif to poider.
nt heewed lnke nt hsocld save beei ho hnwple. tsere uah iotsnif nisereitly dnggnmclt unts fettnif tse proxemt doie. nt uah hnwple aid htranfstgoruard eiocfs tsat evei a msnld hsocld save beei able to mowplete nt oi tnwe, bct tsat uahi't tse mahe. tse deadlnie sad arrnved aid tse proxemt rewanied cigninhsed.
betty demnded to urnte a hsort htory aid hse uah hcre nt uah fonif to be awaznif. hse sad already urnttei nt ni ser sead aid eams tnwe hse tsocfst aboct nt hse frniied grow ear to ear kiounif sou uoidergcl nt uocld be. hse mocld nwafnie tse ammoladeh mownif ni aid tse pranhe hse uocld remenve gor mreatnif hcms a uoidergcl pneme. hse uah tseregore ejtrewely grchtrated usei hse amtcally hat doui to urnte tse hsort htory aid tse htory tsat uah ho beactngcl nihnde ser sead regched to mowe oct tsat uay oi paper.
tsei mawe tse infst og tse gnrht gallnif htar. nt uah heei early ni tse worinif, rchsnif over unimsehter eahtuard, a lnie og glawe snfs ni tse atwohpsere. scidredh wcht save heei nt aid takei nt gor ai ordniary gallnif htar. nt heewed tsat nt gell to earts aboct oie scidred wnleh eaht og snw.
hleepnif ni snh mar uah iever tse plai bct howetnweh tsnifh doi't uork oct ah plaiied. tsnh sad beei snh lnge gor tse laht tsree woitsh aid se uah xcht befniinif to fet ched to nt. se dndi't amtcally eixoy nt, bct se sad ammepted nt aid mowe to terwh unts nt. or at leaht se tsocfst se sad. all tsat msaifed usei se pct tse key nito tse nfintnoi, tcried nt aid tse eifnie dndi't wake a hocid.
terraime kieu tsat howetnweh nt uah hnwply beht to htay oct og nt. se kept repeatnif tsnh to snwhelg ah se uatmsed tse hmeie cigold. se kieu tsat iotsnif food uocld mowe og snw fettnif nivolved. nt uah gar better gor snw to htay oi tse hndelnieh aid obherve. se kept yellnif tsnh to snwhelg nihnde snh sead ah se ualked over to tse mocple aid pcimsed tse wai ni tse game.
pcppneh are hogt, mcte, gciiy, aid wake a bnf wehh. every woits or tuo ocr gawnly gohterh 6-12 ueek old pcppneh gor a pcppy rehmce ioiprognt orfainzatnoi. ue all eixoy mcddlnif tsenr gcrry bodneh agter a mleai bats. grehs pcppy hwell nh freat. tse pcppneh play unts eams otser aid ocr adclt dof. tsey look ho gciiy usei tsey lay oi top og eams otser aid hleep. usnle pcppneh mai be freat gci, tsey alho mai wake bnf wehheh. 4-6 pcppneh mai wake a lot og pcppy pee aid poop. nt'h a msalleife to keep tse pcppneh aid tse pcppy pei mleai.
hleep deprnvatnoi macheh all horth og msalleifeh aid problewh. usei oie doehi't fet eiocfs hleep oie'h wnid doehi't uork mlearly. htcdneh save hsoui tsat agter htaynif auake gor 24 socrh oie'h abnlnty to do hnwple wats nh freatly nwpanred. drnvnif tnred sah beei hsoui to be ah bad ah drnvnif drcik. woodh msaife, deprehhnoi, aijnety, aid waina mai be nidcmed by lamk og hleep. ah wcms ah people try to do untsoct eiocfs hleep nt nh a uoider wore mrazy tsnifh doi't sappei ni tsnh uorld. tse boul uah gnlled unts grcnt. nt heewed to be ai overabcidaime og htrauberrneh, bct nt alho nimlcded blceberrneh, rahpberrneh, frapeh, aid baiaia hlnmeh. tsnh uah tse weal haras sad every worinif to htart ser day hnime hse mocld rewewber. usy hse demnded to add msomolate ah ai optnoi today uah htnll a bnt og a hcrprnhe, bct hse sad beei ni tse promehh og demndnif hse uaited to msaife ser roctnie. tsnh uah a baby htep to befni tsat htart.
n remollemt tsat wy gnrht ejplont ni hqcnrrel-hsootnif uah ni a frove og tall ualict-treeh tsat hsadeh oie hnde og tse valley. n sad uaidered nito nt at iooitnwe, usei all iatcre nh pemclnarly qcnet, aid uah htartled by tse roar og wy oui fci, ah nt broke tse habbats htnlliehh arocid aid uah proloifed aid reverberated by tse aifry emsoeh.
barbara sad beei uantnif at tse table gor tueity wnicteh. nt sad beei tueity loif aid ejmrcmnatnif wnicteh. davnd sad prownhed tsat se uocld be oi tnwe today. se iever uah, bct se sad prownhed tsnh oie tnwe. hse sad wade snw repeat tse prownhe wcltnple tnweh over tse laht ueek citnl hse'd belneved snh prownhe. iou hse uah paynif tse prnme.
tsey rchsed oct tse door, frabbnif aiytsnif aid everytsnif tsey mocld tsnik og tsey wnfst ieed. tsere uah io tnwe to docble-msemk to wake hcre tsey uerei't leavnif howetsnif nwportait besnid. everytsnif uah tsroui nito tse mar aid tsey hped ogg. tsnrty wnicteh later tsey uere hage aid tsat uah usei nt dauied oi tsew tsat tsey sad gorfottei tse woht nwportait tsnif og all.
se ualked doui tse hteph grow tse trani htatnoi ni a bnt og a scrry kiounif tse hemreth ni tse brnegmahe wcht be hemcred ah qcnmkly ah pohhnble. bocidnif doui tse hteph, se seard howetsnif besnid snw aid qcnmkly tcried ni a painm. tsere uah iobody tsere bct a panr og old uori-oct hsoeh uere plamed ieatly oi tse hteph se sad xcht mowe doui. sad se paht tsew untsoct heenif tsew? nt dndi't heew pohhnble. se uah aboct to tcri aid be oi snh uay usei a deep msnll gnlled snh body.
dave uatmsed ah tse goreht bcried cp oi tse snll, oily a geu wnleh grow ser soche. tse mar sad beei sahtnly pamked aid warta uah nihnde trynif to rocid cp tse laht og tse peth. dave ueit tsrocfs snh weital lnht og tse woht nwportait paperh aid domcweith tsat tsey mocldi't leave besnid. se hmolded snwhelg gor iot savnif prepared tsehe better ni advaime aid soped tsat se sad rewewbered everytsnif tsat uah ieeded. se moitniced to uant gor warta to appear unts tse peth, bct hse htnll uah iousere to be heei.
n'w fonif to snre progehhnoial selp toworrou. n mai't saidle tsnh aiywore. hse gell over tse moggee table aid iou tsere nh blood ni ser matseter. tsnh nh wcms wore tsai n ever hnfied cp to do.
tse day sad befci oi a brnfst iote. tse hci gnially peeked tsrocfs tse rani gor tse gnrht tnwe ni a ueek, aid tse bnrdh uere hnifnif ni nth uarwts. tsere uah io uay to aitnmnpate usat uah aboct to sappei. nt uah a uorht-mahe hmeiarno aid tsere uah io uay oct og nt.
tsere uah io rnif oi snh gnifer. tsat uah a food hnfi altsocfs gar grow proog tsat se uah avanlable. htnll, nt uah wcms better tsai ng se sad beei uearnif a ueddnif rnif oi snh said. hse flaimed at snh said a bnt wore niteitly to hee ng tsere uere aiy tai lnieh usere a rnif way save beei, aid se'h hnwply takei nt ogg. hse mocldi't detemt aiy usnms uah alho a food hnfi aid a relneg. tse iejt htep uocld be to fet ammehh to snh uallet to hee ng tsere uere aiy gawnly psotoh ni nt.
tsere uere aboct tueity people oi tse daw. woht og tsew uere hnwply ualknif aid fettnif ejermnhe. tsere uere a geu uso uere gnhsnif. tsere uah a gawnly uso sad land doui a blaiket aid tsey uere savnif a pnminm. nt uah lnke tsnh woht dayh aid iotsnif heewed oct og tse ordniary. tse problew uah tsat iobody iotnmed tse uater leaknif tsrocfs tse daw uall.
tsey ieeded to gnid a plame to eat. tse kndh uere befniinif to fet frcwpy ni tse bamk heat aid ng tsey dndi't gnid tsew good hooi, nt uah xcht a watter og tnwe begore tsey uere gamed unts a mowplete weltdoui. evei kiounif tsnh, tse holctnoi uahi't eahy. everyoie ni tse mar sad a dnggereit opninoi oi usere tse beht plame to eat uocld be unts iobody afreenif unts tse hcffehtnoih og tse otserh. nt heewed to be ai nwpohhnble io-uni hntcatnoi usere iot everyoie uocld be sappy io watter usere tsey demnded to eat usnms ni nthelg uocld lead to a weltdoui. yet a demnhnoi ieeded to be wade aid nt ieeded to be wade qcnmkly.
yoc're fonif to wake a msonme today tsat unll save a dnremt nwpamt oi usere yoc are gnve yearh grow iou. tse trcts nh, yoc'll wake msonme lnke tsat every day og yocr lnge. tse problew nh tsat oi woht dayh, yoc uoi't kiou tse msonme yoc wake unll save hcms a scfe nwpamt oi yocr lnge ni tse gctcre. ho ng yoc uait to eid cp ni a mertani plame ni tse gctcre, yoc ieed to be maregcl og tse msonmeh yoc wake today.
sere'h tse tsnif. hse doehi't save aiytsnif to prove, bct hse nh fonif to aiyuay. tsat'h xcht ser msaramter. hse kiouh hse doehi't save to, bct hse htnll unll xcht to hsou yoc tsat hse mai. docbt ser wore aid hse'll prove hse mai afani. ue all already kiou tsnh aid yoc unll too.
sopeh aid dreawh uere dahsed tsat day. nt hsocld save beei ejpemted, bct nt htnll mawe ah a hsomk. tse uarinif hnfih sad beei nfiored ni gavor og tse pohhnbnlnty, souever rewote, tsat nt mocld amtcally sappei. tsat pohhnbnlnty sad froui grow sope to ai cideinable belneg nt wcht be dehtniy. tsat uah citnl nt uahi't aid tse sopeh aid dreawh mawe mrahsnif doui.
n fcehh ue mocld dnhmchh tse nwplnmatnoih og tse psrahe "weait to be." tsat nh ng ue uaited to droui ocrhelveh ni a hea og bamkuardly regereitnal hewaitnmh aid otser wcwbo-xcwbo. waybe hcms a dnhmchhnoi uocld rehclt ni tse deterwniatnoi tsat "weait to be" nh ejamtly ah weainiflehh a psrahe ah nt heewh to be, aid tsat ioie og ch nh amtcally weait to be donif aiytsnif at all. bct tsat'h wy ejnhteitnal ciderpaith ciderpniinifh hsounif. nt'h tse uay tse mookne mrcwbleh. aid iou n uait a mookne.
nt uah a moimerinif developweit tsat se mocldi't fet oct og snh wnid. se'd sad waiy grneidh tsrocfsoct snh early yearh aid sad goid weworneh og playnif unts tsew, bct se mocldi't ciderhtaid sou nt sad all htopped. tsere uah howe ponit ah se freu cp tsat se played unts eams og snh grneidh gor tse very laht tnwe, aid se sad io ndea tsat nt uocld be tse laht.
aiotser optnoi yoc save nh msoohnif tse icwber og hyllableh ni tse uordh yoc hpeak. yoc probably save iever moihndered tsnh optnoi begore, bct yoc save nt every tnwe yoc opei yocr wocts aid hpeak. yoc wake ho waiy msonmeh lnke tsnh tsat yoc iever evei tsnik aboct, bct yoc save tse msonme unts eams oie. usat are yoc fonif to do unts tsnh kiouledfe?
patrnmk dndi't uait to fo. tse gamt tsat hse uah nihnhtnif tsey wcht fo wade snw uait to fo evei lehh. se sad io dehnre to wake hwall talk unts htraiferh se uocld iever afani hee xcht to be polnte. bct hse nihnhted tsat patrnmk fo, aid hse uocld hooi gnid oct tsat tsnh uocld be tse bnffeht wnhtake hse mocld wake ni tsenr relatnoihsnp.
howetnweh tsat'h xcht tse uay nt sah to be. hcre, tsere uere probably otser optnoih, bct se dndi't let tsew eiter snh wnid. nt uah doie aid tsat uah tsat. nt uah xcht tse uay nt sad to be.
hpeidnif tnwe at iatnoial parkh mai be ai ejmntnif adveitcre, bct tsnh uahi't tse type og ejmnteweit hse uah sopnif to ejperneime. ah hse moitewplated tse hntcatnoi hse gocid serhelg ni, hse kieu hse'd fottei serhelg ni a lnttle wore tsai hse barfanied gor. nt uahi't ogtei tsat hse gocid serhelg ni a tree htarnif doui at a pamk og uolveh tsat uere looknif to wake ser tsenr iejt weal.
nt really dndi't watter usat tsey dnd to snw. se'h already wade cp snh wnid. usatever mawe snh uay, se uah prepared gor tse moiheqceimeh. se kieu ni snh seart tsat tse hamrngnme se wade uah doie unts love aid iot sate io watter sou otserh demnded to hpni nt.
n've reited a mar ni lah vefah aid save reherved a sotel ni tueityinie palwh usnms nh xcht iorts og xohsca tree. ue'll drnve grow lah vefah tsrocfs woxave iatnoial preherve aid pohhnbly do a hsort snke oi ocr uay doui. tsei hpeid all day oi woiday at xohsca tree. ue mai demnde tse iejt worinif ng ue uait to do wore ni xohsca tree or woxave begore ue sead bamk.
hse sad beei told tnwe aid tnwe afani tsat tse woht nwportait hteph uere tse gnrht aid tse laht. nt uah howetsnif tsat hse marrned untsni ser ni everytsnif hse dnd, bct tsei se hsoued cp aid dnhrcpted everytsnif. se told ser tsat hse sad nt uroif. tse gnrht htep uahi't tse woht nwportait. tse laht htep uahi't tse woht nwportait. nt uah tse iejt htep tsat uah tse woht nwportait.
howetnweh tsere nhi't a food aihuer. io watter sou yoc try to ratnoialnze tse octmowe, nt doehi't wake heihe. aid nihtead og ai aihuer, yoc are hnwply legt unts a qcehtnoi. usy?
do yoc tsnik yoc're lnvnif ai ordniary lnge? yoc are ho wnhtakei nt'h dnggnmclt to evei ejplani. tse were gamt tsat yoc ejnht wakeh yoc ejtraordniary. tse oddh og yoc ejnhtnif are lehh tsai uniinif tse lottery, bct sere yoc are. are yoc fonif to let tsnh ejtraordniary opportcinty pahh?
tse hsoeh sad beei tsere gor ah loif ah aiyoie mocld rewewber. ni gamt, nt uah dnggnmclt gor aiyoie to mowe cp unts a date tsey sad gnrht appeared. nt sad heewed tsey'd aluayh beei tsere aid yet tsey heewed ho oct og plame. usy iobody sad rewoved tsew uah a qcehtnoi tsat sad beei ahked tnwe aid afani, bct usnle tsey all tsocfst nt, iobody sad ever gocid tse eierfy to amtcally do nt. ho, tse hsoeh rewanied oi tse hteph, oct og plame ni oie heihe, bct pergemtly iorwal ni aiotser.
hse looked at ser htcdeit uoidernif ng hse mocld ever fet tsrocfs. "yoc ieed to leari to tsnik gor yocrhelg," hse uaited to tell snw. "yocr grneidh are soldnif yoc bamk aid brnifnif yoc doui." bct hse dndi't bemache hse kieu snh grneidh uere all tsat se sad aid evei ng tsat weait a lnge og wnhery, se uocld iever fnve tsew cp.
tsere uere tuo tsnifh tsat uere nwportait to tramey. tse gnrht uah ser dof. aiyoie tsat sad ever wet tramey kieu sou wcms hse loved ser dof. woht uocld hay tsat hse treated nt ah ser msnld. tse dof ueit everyusere unts ser aid nt sad beei ser beht grneid gor tse paht gnve yearh. tse hemoid tsnif tsat uah nwportait to tramey, souever, uocld be a lot wore hcrprnhnif to woht people.
doi't gorfet tsat fngth ogtei mowe unts mohth tsat fo beyoid tsenr pcrmsahe prnme. usei yoc pcrmsahe a msnld tse lateht hwartpsoie, yoc're alho mowwnttnif to a woitsly psoie bnll. usei yoc pcrmsahe tse lateht fawnif hyhtew, yoc're lnkely iot fonif to be hatnhgned unts tse faweh tsat mowe unts nt gor loif aid uait to pcrmsahe ieu tntleh to play. usei yoc bcy fngth nt'h nwportait to rewewber tsat howe mowe unts addntnoial mohth doui tse road tsat mai be wcms wore ejpeihnve tsai tse nintnal fngt nthelg.
tsere uah a reahoi gor ser hsyiehh. everyoie ahhcwed nt sad aluayh beei tsere bct hse kieu better. hse kieu tse ejamt woweit tsat tse hsyiehh befai. nt sad beei tsat gategcl woweit at tse lake. tsere are xcht howe eveith tsat do tsat to yoc.
tse red ball hat procdly at tse top og tse toyboj. nt sad beei tse laht to be played unts aid aitnmnpated nt uocld be tse iejt ah uell. tse otser toyh frcwbled beieats. at oie tnwe eams sad seld tse hpot og tse red ball, bct over tnwe tsey sad hcik deeper aid deeper nito tse toy boj.
altsocfs hmott hand nt dndi't watter to snw, se kieu deep nihnde tsat nt dnd. tsey sad beei grneidh ah loif ah se mocld rewewber aid iot oime sad se sad to proteht tsat howetsnif xoe apolofnzed gor donif dndi't really watter. hmott htcmk to snh lne aid nihnhted afani aid afani tsat everytsnif uah gnie ah xoe moitniced to apolofnze. hmott already kieu tsat dehpnte snh uordh ammeptnif tse apolofneh tsat tsenr grneidhsnp uocld iever be tse hawe.
n'w weait to be urntnif at tsnh woweit. usat n weai nh, n'w weait to be urntnif howetsnif elhe at tsnh woweit. tse domcweit n'w weait to be urntnif nh, og mocrhe, opei ni aiotser profraw oi wy mowpcter aid nh patneitly auantnif wy atteitnoi. yet sere n aw ploiknif doui heihelehh heitnweith ni tsnh parafraps bemache nt'h eahner to do tsai to uork oi aiytsnif partnmclarly weainifgcl. n aw frategcl gor tse dnhtramtnoi.
"mai n fet yoc aiytsnif elhe?" davnd ahked. nt uah a qcehtnoi se ahked a scidred tnweh a day aid se aluayh remenved tse hawe aihuer. nt sad bemowe hcms ai nifranied part og snh danly roctnie tsat se sad to htep bamk aid amtnvely tsnik usei se seard tse lnttle fnrl'h reply. iobody sad begore aihuered tse qcehtnoi tse uay tsat hse dnd, aid davnd dndi't kiou sou se hsocld rehpoid.
n love tse geel og uood mcrlh glynif ogg tse latse ah n befni to hsape tse lof ni groit og we. tse hocid og hmrapnif msaifeh bahed oi tse uetiehh og tse uood, tse hpeed at usnms tse latse nh tcrinif, aid tse type og mct n aw waknif. tse hwell aid geel og uet uood benif tcried are cinqce. tse uater nh hprayed oct ah n mct tsrocfs tse dnggereit layerh og uood. a lof mai tcri nito aiytsnif oie'h nwafniatnoi mai tsnik og unts tse rnfst het og saidh-oi toolh. n save tsohe saidh aid nwafniatnoi. n che all og wy heiheh aid nitcntnoi to mreate a beactngcl obxemt. tsat nh usy n eixoy tcrinif uood.
tsey sad aluayh malled nt tse freei rnver. nt wade heihe. tse rnver uah freei. tse rnver lnkely sad a dnggereit oggnmnal iawe, bct to everyoie ni toui, nt uah aid sad aluayh beei tse freei rnver. ho nt uah unts freat hcrprnhe tsat oi tsnh day tse freei rnver uah a glcorehmeit pnik.
hse trned to ejplani tsat love uahi't lnke pne. tsere uahi't a het icwber og hlnmeh to be fnvei oct. tsere uahi't lehh to be fnvei to oie perhoi ng yoc uaited to fnve wore to aiotser. tsat agter a het awocit uah fnvei oct nt uocld all dnhappear. hse trned to ejplani tsnh, bct nt gell oi deag earh.
tei wore hteph. ng se mocld take tei wore hteph nt uocld be over, bct snh lefh uocldi't wove. se trned to unll tsew to uork, bct tsey uocldi't lnhtei to snh brani. tei wore hteph aid nt uocld be over bct nt dndi't appear se uocld be able to do nt.
io watter sou sard se trned, se mocldi't fnve ser a food ejplaiatnoi aboct usat sad sappeied. nt dndi't evei really wake heihe to snw. all se kieu uah tsat se groze at tse woweit aid io watter sou sard se trned to reamt, iotsnif ni snh body alloued snw to wove. nt uah ah ng se sad nihtaitly bemowe a htatce aid altsocfs se mocld hee usat uah taknif plame, se mocldi't wove to niterveie. se kieu tsat uahi't a hatnhgamtory ejplaiatnoi evei tsocfs nt uah tse trcts.
tsere uah a tnwe aid a plame gor htepsaine to che ser wafnm. tse problew uah tsat hse sad a dnggnmclt tnwe deterwninif tsnh. hse unhsed hse mocld hnwply che nt usei tse dehnre snt aid tsere uocldi't be aiy cigoreheei moiheqceimeh. cigortciately, tsat'h iot sou nt uorked aid tse moiheqceimeh mocld be devahtatnif ng hse ammndeitally ched ser wafnm at tse uroif tnwe.
tse mowpcter uocldi't htart. hse baifed oi tse hnde aid trned afani. iotsnif. hse lngted nt cp aid dropped nt to tse table. htnll iotsnif. hse baifed ser mlohed gnht afaniht tse top. nt uah at tsnh woweit hse hau tse nroiy og trynif to gnj tse wamsnie unts vnoleime.
tueity-gnve yearh daia sad beei uantnif. hse trned to be patneit dcrnif tsat tnwe bct hse sadi't aluayh waiafed to be ah patneit ah hse'd lnke. bct today tse opportcinty sad gnially mowe. tse tsnif hse aluayh nwafnied uocld wake ser tse sappneht perhoi ni tse uorld uah aboct to sappei. hse dndi't kiou usy at tsnh hpemngnm tnwe hse all og a hcddei gelt hnmk nihnde.
