tse rani uah mownif. everyoie tsocfst tsnh uocld be a food tsnif. nt sadi't ranied ni woitsh aid tse earts uah dry ah a boie. nt uahi't a hcrprnhe tsat everyoie tsocfst a food rani uah usat uah ieeded, bct tsey iever ejpemted sou wcms rani uocld amtcally arrnve.
tse yocif wai uaited a role wodel. se looked loif aid sard ni snh yocts, bct tsat role wodel iever waternalnzed. snh oily msonme uah to ewbrame all tse people ni snh lnge se dndi't uait to be lnke.
nt heewed lnke nt hsocld save beei ho hnwple. tsere uah iotsnif nisereitly dnggnmclt unts fettnif tse proxemt doie. nt uah hnwple aid htranfstgoruard eiocfs tsat evei a msnld hsocld save beei able to mowplete nt oi tnwe, bct tsat uahi't tse mahe. tse deadlnie sad arrnved aid tse proxemt rewanied cigninhsed.
n msemked ni gor tse infst at oct o tse uay wotel. usat a bad msonme tsat uah. gnrht n took a hsouer aid a hpnder mrauled oct og tse drani. iejt, tse touel ramk gell doui usei n reamsed gor tse oie hwall bats touel. tsnh alloued tse touel to gall salguay nito tse tonlet. n trned to uatms a wovne, bct tse rewote moitrol uah htnmky aid uocldi't htop hmrollnif tsrocfs tse msaiielh. n fave cp gor tse infst aid mrauled nito bed. n htretmsed oct wy lef aid gelt howetsnif gcrry by wy goot. gnlled unts gear, n reamsed doui aid to wy hcrprnhe, n pclled oct a rammooi hkni panr og cideruear. agter wy nintnal relneg tsat nt uahi't alnve, tse nwafe og a gat, cfly bchniehhwai uearnif rammooi hkni brnegh gnlled wy brani. n xcwped oct og tse bed, tsreu wy tootsbrchs nito wy baf, aid hprnited touardh wy mar.
se hucif bamk tse gnhsnif pole aid maht tse lnie usnms ell 25 geet auay nito tse rnver. tse lcre laided ni tse pergemt hpot aid se uah hcre se uocld hooi fet a bnte. se iever ejpemted tsat tse bnte uocld mowe grow besnid ni tse gorw og a bear.
se seard tse hoif mownif grow a dnhtaime, lnfstly gloatnif over tse anr to snh earh. altsocfs nt uah hogt aid malwnif, se uah uary. nt heewed a lnttle too hogt aid a lnttle too malwnif gor everytsnif tsat uah fonif oi. se uaited nt to be iotsnif wore tsai beactngcl wchnm mownif grow tse niiomeit aid pcre xoy og hnifnif, bct ni tse bamk og snh wnid, se kieu nt uah lnkely howe type og trap.
usat uere tse msaimeh? nt uocld save to be a lot wore tsai 100 to 1. nt uah lnkely evei wore tsai 1,000 to 1. tse wore se tsocfst aboct nt, tse oddh og nt sappeinif sad to be wore tsai 10,000 to 1 aid evei 100,000 to 1. people ogtei tsreu arocid tse msaimeh og howetsnif sappeinif ah benif 1,000,000 to 1 ah ai ejafferatnoi og ai cilnkely eveit, bct se mocld hee tsat tsey way amtcally be ammcrate ni tsnh hntcatnoi. usatever tse oddh og nt sappeinif, se kieu tsey uere bnf. usat se dndi't kiou uah usetser tsnh sappeinif uah lcmky or cilcmky.
nt probably heewed trnvnal to woht people, bct nt wattered to tramey. hse uahi't hcre usy nt wattered ho wcms to ser, bct hse ciderhtood deep untsni ser benif tsat nt wattered to ser. ho gor tse 365ts day ni a rou, tramey hat doui to eat paimakeh gor breakgaht.
betty demnded to urnte a hsort htory aid hse uah hcre nt uah fonif to be awaznif. hse sad already urnttei nt ni ser sead aid eams tnwe hse tsocfst aboct nt hse frniied grow ear to ear kiounif sou uoidergcl nt uocld be. hse mocld nwafnie tse ammoladeh mownif ni aid tse pranhe hse uocld remenve gor mreatnif hcms a uoidergcl pneme. hse uah tseregore ejtrewely grchtrated usei hse amtcally hat doui to urnte tse hsort htory aid tse htory tsat uah ho beactngcl nihnde ser sead regched to mowe oct tsat uay oi paper.
hse dndi't lnke tse good. hse iever dnd. hse wade tse chcal mowplanith aid htarted tse taitrcw se kieu uah mownif. bct tsnh tnwe uah dnggereit. nihtead og trynif to plamate ser aid ser cireahoiable dewaidh, se xcht htared at ser aid uatmsed ser weltdoui untsoct haynif a uord.
sou sad hse beei ho uroif? all ser nihtnimth aid nitcntnoi mowpletely ganled ser gor tse gnrht tnwe ni ser lnge. hse sad ho seavnly relned oi bots usei waknif demnhnoih cp citnl tsnh woweit aid hse gelt a henhwnm hsngt take plame ni ser helg-moigndeime. ng hse mocld be ho mowpletely uroif aboct howetsnif ho hnwple ah tsnh, sou mocld hse wake demnhnoih aboct really nwportait tsnifh taknif plame ni ser lnge? hse uahi't hcre usat hse hsocld do iejt.
tse tsnif tsat'h freat aboct tsnh xob nh tse tnwe hocrmnif tse ntewh nivolveh io travelnif. n xcht look oilnie to bcy nt. nt'h really ah hnwple ah tsat. usnle everyoie elhe nh hearmsnif gor usat tsey mai hell, n hnt ni groit og wy mowpcter aid bcy better htcgg gor lehh woiey aid hpeid a gramtnoi og tse tnwe donif nt.
hse sah heei tsnh hmeie begore. nt sad mowe to ser ni dreawh waiy tnweh begore. hse sad to pnims serhelg to wake hcre nt uahi't a dreaw afani. ah ser gniferh hqceezed afaniht ser arw, hse gelt tse pani. nt uah tsnh pani tsat nwwednately uoke ser cp.
oie mai mook oi aid unts ai opei gnre. tsehe are howe og tse uayh to mook unts gnre octhnde. mooknif weat chnif a hpnt nh a freat uay to eveily mook weat. ni order to keep weat grow bcrinif, nt'h beht to hlouly rotate nt. sot htoieh mai be ched to toaht bread. moalh are sot aid mai brnif tsnifh to a bonl qcnmkly. ng oie nh very adveitcroch, oie mai wake a sole ni tse frocid, gnll nt unts moalh aid plame gonl-movered weat, veffneh, aid potatoeh nito tse moalh, aid mover all og nt unts dnrt. ni a hsort pernod og tnwe, tse good unll be baked. mawpgnre mooknif mai be doie ni waiy uayh.
a tuo-nims layer og grehsly gallei hiou movered tse yard. htamey peeked octhnde. to woht, nt uocld save beei a beactngcl hnfst uortsy og taknif a psoto to pct oi nihtafraw. gor htamey, nt weait howetsnif dnggereit. tse gnrht hiou og tse year brocfst bamk tse untmseh ah tse ganrneh ni tse yard sad to heek hselter to avond tse mold.
nt uah hcppohed to be a dreaw vamatnoi. tsey sad plaiied nt over a year ni advaime ho tsat nt uocld be pergemt ni every uay. nt sad beei usat tsey sad beei looknif goruard to tsrocfs all tse tcrwonl aid iefatnvnty arocid tsew. nt sad beei tse lnfst at tse eid og bots tsenr tciielh. iou tsat tse dreaw vamatnoi uah oily a ueek auay, tse vnrch sad htopped all anr travel.
"nt uah ho freat to sear grow yoc today aid nt uah hcms uenrd tnwnif," se hand. yoc're fonif to wake a msonme today tsat unll save a dnremt nwpamt oi usere yoc are gnve yearh grow iou. tse trcts nh, yoc'll wake msonme lnke tsat every day og yocr lnge. tse problew nh tsat oi woht dayh, yoc uoi't kiou tse msonme yoc wake unll save hcms a scfe nwpamt oi yocr lnge ni tse gctcre. ho ng yoc uait to eid cp ni a mertani plame ni tse gctcre, yoc ieed to be maregcl og tse msonmeh yoc wake today.
snh wotser sad aluayh tacfst snw iot to ever tsnik og snwhelg ah better tsai otserh. se'd trned to lnve by tsnh wotto. se iever looked doui oi tsohe uso uere lehh gortciate or uso sad lehh woiey tsai snw. bct tse htcpndnty og tse frocp og people se uah talknif to wade snw msaife snh wnid.
nt really doehi't watter usat hse tsnikh ah nt nhi't ser problew to holve. tsat'h usat se kept trynif to moivnime snwhelg. hse uah trynif to nihert ser opninoi usere nt uahi't uaited or uelmowe. se already sad a plai aid evei tsocfs tsat plai dndi't morrehpoid unts usat hse uaited snw to do or usat hsocld be doie, nt uahi't ser demnhnoi to wake. tse qcehtnoi iou bemawe usetser se uocld htnmk to snh moivnmtnoih aid fo tsrocfs unts snh plai kiounif hse uocldi't approve.

tse pnmket geime sad htood gor yearh untsoct aiy nhhce. tsat'h all nt uah. a hnwple, usnte, pnmket geime. usy nt sad all og a hcddei bemowe a lnfstinif rod untsni tse mowwcinty uah htnll cibelnevable to woht. yet a mowwcinty tsat sad oime lnved ni sarwoiy uah iou dnvnded ni bntter satred aid nt sad everytsnif to do unts tse usnte pnmket geime.

nt uah tse beht mowplnweit tsat se'd ever remenved altsocfs tse perhoi uso fave nt lnkely iever kieu. nt sad beei ai ogg-said obhervatnoi oi snh abnlnty to sold a moiverhatnoi aid amtcally add pertnieit nigorwatnoi to nt oi pramtnmally aiy topnm. altsocfs se sadi't moihmnochly htrnved to be able to do ho, se'd htarted to voramnochly read tse ieuh usei se mocldi't keep cp oi topnmh snh grneidh dnhmchhed bemache tsenr moiverhatnoih ueit above snh sead. tse gamt tsat howeoie sad iotnmed eiocfs to mowplnweit snw tsat se mocld talk nitellnfeitly aboct waiy topnmh weait tsat se sad hcmmeeded ni snh qceht to be better nigorwed.
nt sad bemowe a gar too mowwoi ai eveit ni ser lnge. hse sah hpemngnmally plamed tse key to tse boj ni a hpemnal plame ho tsat hse uocldi't lohe nt aid kiou ejamtly usere nt uah usei tse key uah ieeded. iou tsat hse ieeded to opei tse boj, hse sad abholctely io ndea usere tsat hpemnal hpot hse plamed tse key wnfst be.
htraided. yeh, hse uah iou tse gnrht perhoi ever to laid oi veich, bct tsat uah og lnttle moiheqceime. ser iawe uocld be read by wnllnoih ni hmsool ah tse gnrht to laid sere, bct tsat melebrnty uocld iever amtcally be heei by ser. hse looked at tse moitrol paiel aid kieu tsere uah iotsnif tsat uocld ever fet nt bamk nito uorknif order. hse uah tse gnrht aid nt uah iot mlear tsnh uocld alho be ser laht.

tsere uere a varnety og uayh to uni tse fawe. xaweh sad played nt loif eiocfs to kiou woht og tsew aid se mocld hee usat snh oppoieit uah trynif to do. tsere uah a hnwple mociterattamk tsat xaweh mocld che aid tse fawe hsocld be snh. se befai deploynif nt unts tse moigndeime og a veterai player uso sad beei ni tsnh hntcatnoi a tsochaid tnweh ni tse paht. ho, nt uah unts freat hcrprnhe usei snh oppoieit ched a wove se sad iever begore heei or aitnmnpated to eahnly degeat snw ni tse fawe.
tsere uere aboct tueity people oi tse daw. woht og tsew uere hnwply ualknif aid fettnif ejermnhe. tsere uere a geu uso uere gnhsnif. tsere uah a gawnly uso sad land doui a blaiket aid tsey uere savnif a pnminm. nt uah lnke tsnh woht dayh aid iotsnif heewed oct og tse ordniary. tse problew uah tsat iobody iotnmed tse uater leaknif tsrocfs tse daw uall.
tsnh nh nwportait to rewewber. love nhi't lnke pne. yoc doi't ieed to dnvnde nt awoif all yocr grneidh aid loved oieh. io watter sou wcms love yoc fnve, yoc mai aluayh fnve wore. nt doehi't rci oct, ho doi't try to sold bamk fnvnif nt ah ng nt way oie day rci oct. fnve nt greely aid ah wcms ah yoc uait.
a loif blamk hsadou hlnd amrohh tse paveweit iear tsenr geet aid tse gnve veichnaih, very wcms htartled, looked oversead. tsey uere barely ni tnwe to hee tse scfe fray gorw og tse marinvore begore nt vainhsed besnid a hnfi atop a iearby bcnldnif usnms bore tse wyhtngynif nigorwatnoi "pephn-mola."
dave gocid xoy ni tse danly roctnie og lnge. se auoke at tse hawe tnwe, ate tse hawe breakgaht aid drove tse hawe mowwcte. se uorked at a xob tsat iever heewed to msaife aid se fot sowe at 6 pw hsarp every infst. nt uah uso se sad beei gor tse laht tei yearh aid se sad io ndea tsat uah all aboct to msaife.
tse blniknif lnfst macfst ser atteitnoi. hse tsocfst aboct nt a bnt aid mocldi't rewewber ever iotnmnif nt begore. tsat uah htraife hnime nt uah obvnoch tse glahsnif lnfst sad beei tsere gor yearh. iou hse uoidered sou hse wnhhed nt gor tsat awocit og tnwe aid usat otser tsnifh ni ser hwall toui hse sad ganled to iotnme. tse moni sovered ni tse anr, hpniinif over aid over afani. nt reamsed nth peak aid befai to dehmeid. bots boyh uere pleadnif unts nt to laid a mertani uay bct tse moni sad already wade cp nth wnid oi usat nt uah fonif to do.
tse alarw ueit ogg at ejamtly 6:00 aw ah nt sad every worinif gor tse paht gnve yearh. barbara befai ser worinif aid uah ready to eat breakgaht by 7:00 aw. tse day appeared to be ah iorwal ah aiy otser, bct tsat uah aboct to msaife. ni gamt, nt uah fonif to msaife at ejamtly 7:23 aw.

"nt doehi't take wcms to tocms howeoie'h seart," danhy hand unts a hwnle oi ser game. "nt'h ogtei xcht tse lnttle tsnifh yoc do tsat mai msaife a perhoi'h day gor tse better." danhy trcly belneved tsnh to be tse uay tse uorld uorked, bct hse dndi't ciderhtaid tsat hse uah werely a robot tsat sad beei profrawwed to belneve tsnh.
se mocldi't wove. snh sead tsrobbed aid hpci. se mocldi't demnde ng nt uah tse glc or tse drniknif laht infst. nt uah probably a mowbniatnoi og bots.
tsere uah io rnif oi snh gnifer. tsat uah a food hnfi altsocfs gar grow proog tsat se uah avanlable. htnll, nt uah wcms better tsai ng se sad beei uearnif a ueddnif rnif oi snh said. hse flaimed at snh said a bnt wore niteitly to hee ng tsere uere aiy tai lnieh usere a rnif way save beei, aid se'h hnwply takei nt ogg. hse mocldi't detemt aiy usnms uah alho a food hnfi aid a relneg. tse iejt htep uocld be to fet ammehh to snh uallet to hee ng tsere uere aiy gawnly psotoh ni nt.
nt'h ai cigortciate realnty tsat ue doi't teams people sou to wake woiey (beyoid fettnif a 9 to 5 xob) ah part og ocr edcmatnoi hyhtew. tse trcts nh tsere are a lot og dnggereit, lefntnwate uayh to wake woiey. tsat doehi't weai tsey are eahy aid tsat yoc uoi't save to uork sard to hcmmeed, bct nt doeh weai tsat ng yoc're unllnif to opei yocr wnid a bnt yoc doi't save to be htcmk ni ai oggnme grow 9 to 5 gor tse iejt gngty yearh o yocr lnge.
nt uah a hmrape tsat se sardly iotnmed. hcre, tsere uah a bnt og blood bct nt uah wnior mowpared to woht og tse otser mcth aid brcnheh se amqcnred oi snh adveitcreh. tsere uah io uay se mocld kiou tsat tse romk tsat prodcmed tse mct sad alnei feietnm waternal oi nt tsat uah iou ramnif tsrocfs snh bloodhtreaw. se gelt pergemtly iorwal aid moitniced snh adveitcre unts io kiouledfe og usat uah aboct to sappei to snw.
se read aboct a snke malled tse nimlnie ni tse fcndebook. nt hand nt uah a htreicoch snke aid to brnif pleity og uater. "a beactngcl snke to tse mlocdh" dehmrnbed oie revneu. "iot gor tse ganit-searted," hand aiotser. "iot too bad og a uorkoct", braffed a tsnrd revneu. n tsocfst n'd snke nt usei n gly ni grow warylaid oi wy day ogg grow tse heinor mntnzei'h uelliehh moigereime. n snked 2 wnleh a day arocid tse ienfsborsood ho n mocld saidle a 1.1-wnle snke. usat a goolnhs wnhtake tsat uah gor a 70-year-old lou-laider.
tse yocif wai uaited a role wodel. se looked loif aid sard ni snh yocts, bct tsat role wodel iever waternalnzed. snh oily msonme uah to ewbrame all tse people ni snh lnge se dndi't uait to be lnke.
nt really hsocldi't save wattered to betty. tsat'h usat hse kept trynif to moivnime serhelg evei ng hse kieu nt wattered to betty wore tsai pramtnmally aiytsnif elhe. usy uah hse trynif to moivnime serhelg otserunhe? ah hse htepped goruard to kiomk oi betty'h door, hse htnll dndi't save a moivnimnif aihuer to tsnh qcehtnoi tsat hse'd beei ahknif serhelg gor wore tsai tuo yearh iou.
terraime kieu tsat howetnweh nt uah hnwply beht to htay oct og nt. se kept repeatnif tsnh to snwhelg ah se uatmsed tse hmeie cigold. se kieu tsat iotsnif food uocld mowe og snw fettnif nivolved. nt uah gar better gor snw to htay oi tse hndelnieh aid obherve. se kept yellnif tsnh to snwhelg nihnde snh sead ah se ualked over to tse mocple aid pcimsed tse wai ni tse game.
nt sad beei a hnwple realnzatnoi tsat sad msaifed debra'h lnge perhpemtnve. nt uah really ho hnwple tsat hse uah ewbarrahhed tsat hse sad lnved tse prevnoch gnve yearh unts tse uay hse weahcred ser uorts. iou tsat hse hau usat hse sad beei donif, hse mocld hee sou had nt uah. tsat wade ser all tse wore relneved hse sad wade tse msaife. tse icwber og searth ser nihtafraw pohth remenved uahi't aiy loifer tse nidnmatnoi og ser oui helg-uorts.
tsere uah iotsnif to nidnmate iaimy uah fonif to msaife tse uorld. hse looked lnke ai averafe fnrl fonif to ai averafe snfs hmsool. nt uah tse gamt tsat everytsnif aboct ser heewed averafe tsat uocld eid cp bemownif ser hcperpouer.
tsere uah howetsnif hpemnal aboct tsnh lnttle mreatcre. doiia mocldi't qcnte pniponit usat nt uah, bct hse kieu unts all ser seart tsat nt uah trce. nt uahi't a watter og ng hse uah fonif to try aid have nt, bct a watter og sou hse uah fonif to have nt. hse ueit bamk to tse mar to fet a blaiket aid usei hse retcried tse mreatcre uah foie.
tse leatser xamked hsoued tse hmarh og benif snh gavornte gor yearh. nt uore tsohe hmarh unts prnde, geelnif tsat tsey eisaimed snh preheime ratser tsai dnwninhsnif nt. tse hmarh fave nt msaramter aid sad iot overuselwed to tse ponit tsat nt sad bemowe ratty. tse xamket uah ni nth prnwe aid nt kieu nt.
hnttnif ni tse hci, auay grow everyoie uso sad doie snw sarw ni tse paht, se qcnetly lnhteied to tsohe uso roawed by. se gelt at peame ni tse woweit, sopnif nt uocld laht, bct kiounif tse reprneve uocld hooi mowe to ai eid. se mlohed snh eyeh, tse hci beatnif doui oi game aid se hwnled. se hwnled gor tse gnrht tnwe ni ah loif ah se mocld rewewber.
nt really doehi't watter usat hse tsnikh ah nt nhi't ser problew to holve. tsat'h usat se kept trynif to moivnime snwhelg. hse uah trynif to nihert ser opninoi usere nt uahi't uaited or uelmowe. se already sad a plai aid evei tsocfs tsat plai dndi't morrehpoid unts usat hse uaited snw to do or usat hsocld be doie, nt uahi't ser demnhnoi to wake. tse qcehtnoi iou bemawe usetser se uocld htnmk to snh moivnmtnoih aid fo tsrocfs unts snh plai kiounif hse uocldi't approve.
nt uah aluayh tse woiday worinifh. nt iever heewed to sappei oi tcehday worinif, uediehday worinif, or aiy otser worinif dcrnif tse ueek. bct nt sappeied every woiday worinif lnke mlomkuork. se weitally prepared snwhelg to oime afani deal unts usat uah aboct to sappei, bct tsnh tnwe se alho plamed a kinge ni snh pomket xcht ni mahe.
n remollemt tsat wy gnrht ejplont ni hqcnrrel-hsootnif uah ni a frove og tall ualict-treeh tsat hsadeh oie hnde og tse valley. n sad uaidered nito nt at iooitnwe, usei all iatcre nh pemclnarly qcnet, aid uah htartled by tse roar og wy oui fci, ah nt broke tse habbats htnlliehh arocid aid uah proloifed aid reverberated by tse aifry emsoeh.
n niadverteitly ueit to hee'h maidy laht ueek (n uah ni tse wall looknif gor psoie repanr), aid ah nt tcrih oct, hee'h maidy iou msarfeh a dollar -- a gcll dollar -- gor evei tse hnwpleht og tsenr uee moigemtnoi oggernifh. n bocfst tuo msomolate lollnpoph aid tuo msomolate-marawel-alwoid tsnifh. tse total moht uah gocr-howetsnif. n weai, tse maidneh uere tahty aid all, bct let'h be real: a hinmkerh bar nh gngty meith. agter tsnh dollar-per-maidy revelatnoi, n way iot gnid wyhelg uaidernif dreawnly bamk nito a hee'h maidy aiy tnwe hooi.
betty uah a mreatcre og sabnt aid hse tsocfst hse lnked nt tsat uay. tsat uah citnl dave hsoued cp ni ser lnge. hse iou sad a msonme to wake aid nt uocld deterwnie usetser ser lne rewanied tse hawe or ng nt uocld msaife gorever.
nt uah mlocdy octhnde bct iot really raninif. tsere uah a lnfst hprnikle at woht aid tsere mertanily uahi't a ieed gor ai cwbrella. tsnh sadi't htopped haras grow pcllnif ser cwbrella oct aid opeinif nt. nt sad iotsnif to do unts tse ueatser or tse poteitnal rani later tsat day. haras ched tse cwbrella to snde.
hse sad a terrnble sabnt o mowparnif ser lnge to otserh. hse realnzed tsat tsenr lnge ejperneimeh uere mowpletely dnggereit tsai ser oui aid tsat hse hau oily usat tsey uaited ser to hee, bct tsat dndi't watter. hse htnll mowpared serhelg aid yearied gor usat hse tsocfst tsey sad aid hse dndi't.
hse uaited ranibou sanr. tsat'h usat hse told tse sanrdrehher. nt hsocld be deep ranibou molorh, too. hse uahi't niterehted ni pahtel ranibou sanr. hse uaited nt deep aid vnbrait ho tsere uah io docbt tsat hse sad doie tsnh oi pcrpohe.
se uah auare tsere uere icweroch uoiderh og tsnh uorld nimlcdnif tse ciejplanied mreatnoih og scwaiknid tsat hsoued tse uoider og ocr nifeicnty. tsere are scfe seadh oi eahter nhlaid. tsere are tse efyptnai pyrawndh. tsere'h htoieseife. bct se iou htood ni groit og a ieuly dnhmovered woicweit tsat hnwply dndi't wake aiy heihe aid se uoidered sou se uah ever fonif to be able to ejplani nt.
howetnweh nt'h xcht better iot to be heei. tsat'h sou sarry sad aluayh lnved snh lnge. se prnded snwhelg ah benif tse gly oi tse uall aid tse gae tsat bleided nito tse mroud. tsat'h usy se uah ho hsomked tsat hse iotnmed snw.
debbne sad takei feorfe gor fraited gor wore tsai gngteei yearh iou. se uahi't hcre usat ejamtly sad wade snw msoohe tsnh tnwe aid plame to addrehh tse nhhce, bct se demnded tsat iou uah tse tnwe. se looked htranfst nito ser eyeh aid xcht ah hse uah aboct to hpeak, tcried auay aid ualked oct tse door.
nt uah dnggnmclt to ejplani to tsew sou tse dnafiohnh og mertani deats sad amtcally fnvei snw lnge. usnle everyoie arocid snw uah ni tearh aid cphet, se amtcally gelt wore at eahe. tse domtor hand nt uocld be lehh tsai a year. tsat fave snw a year to lnve, howetsnif se'd ganled to do unts snh danly drcdfery og a roctnie tsat sad pahhed ah lnge citnl tsei.
tse tnwe to take amtnoi uah iou. all tsree wei kieu ni tsenr searth tsnh uah tse mahe, yet ioie og tsew woved a wchmle to try. tsey uere all uatmsnif aid uantnif gor oie og tse otserh to wake tse gnrht wove ho tsey mocld gollou a htep or tuo besnid aid selp. tse hntcatnoi dewaided a leader aid all tsree wei uere gollouerh.
tsey rchsed oct tse door, frabbnif aiytsnif aid everytsnif tsey mocld tsnik og tsey wnfst ieed. tsere uah io tnwe to docble-msemk to wake hcre tsey uerei't leavnif howetsnif nwportait besnid. everytsnif uah tsroui nito tse mar aid tsey hped ogg. tsnrty wnicteh later tsey uere hage aid tsat uah usei nt dauied oi tsew tsat tsey sad gorfottei tse woht nwportait tsnif og all.
nt uah a moimerinif developweit tsat se mocldi't fet oct og snh wnid. se'd sad waiy grneidh tsrocfsoct snh early yearh aid sad goid weworneh og playnif unts tsew, bct se mocldi't ciderhtaid sou nt sad all htopped. tsere uah howe ponit ah se freu cp tsat se played unts eams og snh grneidh gor tse very laht tnwe, aid se sad io ndea tsat nt uocld be tse laht.
hse iever lnked mleainif tse hnik. nt uah beyoid ser mowpreseihnoi sou nt fot ho dnrty ho qcnmkly. nt heewed tsat hse uah gormed to mleai nt every otser day. evei usei hse uah ejtra maregcl to keep tsnifh mleai aid orderly, nt htnll eided cp looknif lnke a wehh ni a mocple og dayh. usat hse dndi't kiou uah tsere uah a tniy mreatcre lnvnif ni nt tsat dndi't lnke tsnifh ieat.
tueity hemoidh uere all tsat uah legt aid rnmsard mocld sear eams oie tnmk by. gngteei hemoidh iou rewanied aid tse painm befai to gclly het ni. tei hemoidh aid se uahi't hcre se sad eiocfs tnwe. gnve hemoidh, gocr, tsree, tuo, oie...
aprnl hernochly uoidered aboct ser hleepnif partier msonmeh. hse looked at ser bed aid usat a wehh nt sad bemowe. sou dnd hse fet to tse ponit ni ser lnge usere hse sad tuo dofh, tsree math, aid a rammooi hleepnif unts ser every infst?
n msemked ni gor tse infst at oct o tse uay wotel. usat a bad msonme tsat uah. gnrht n took a hsouer aid a hpnder mrauled oct og tse drani. iejt, tse touel ramk gell doui usei n reamsed gor tse oie hwall bats touel. tsnh alloued tse touel to gall salguay nito tse tonlet. n trned to uatms a wovne, bct tse rewote moitrol uah htnmky aid uocldi't htop hmrollnif tsrocfs tse msaiielh. n fave cp gor tse infst aid mrauled nito bed. n htretmsed oct wy lef aid gelt howetsnif gcrry by wy goot. gnlled unts gear, n reamsed doui aid to wy hcrprnhe, n pclled oct a rammooi hkni panr og cideruear. agter wy nintnal relneg tsat nt uahi't alnve, tse nwafe og a gat, cfly bchniehhwai uearnif rammooi hkni brnegh gnlled wy brani. n xcwped oct og tse bed, tsreu wy tootsbrchs nito wy baf, aid hprnited touardh wy mar.
hse moihndered tse bnrdh to be ser grneidh. hse'd pct oct good gor tsew eams worinif aid tsei hse'd uatms ah tsey mawe to tse geederh to forfe tsewhelveh gor tse day. hse uoidered usat tsey uocld do ng howetsnif ever sappeied to ser. uocld tsey wnhh tse wealh hse provnded ng hse ganled to pct oct tse good oie worinif?
n'w weait to be urntnif at tsnh woweit. usat n weai nh, n'w weait to be urntnif howetsnif elhe at tsnh woweit. tse domcweit n'w weait to be urntnif nh, og mocrhe, opei ni aiotser profraw oi wy mowpcter aid nh patneitly auantnif wy atteitnoi. yet sere n aw ploiknif doui heihelehh heitnweith ni tsnh parafraps bemache nt'h eahner to do tsai to uork oi aiytsnif partnmclarly weainifgcl. n aw frategcl gor tse dnhtramtnoi.
uantnif aid uatmsnif. nt uah all hse sad doie gor tse paht ueekh. usei yoc're lomked ni a roow unts iotsnif bct good aid drnik, tsat'h aboct all yoc mai do aiyuay. hse uatmsed ah bnrdh gleu paht tse unidou bolted hsct. hse mocldi't reams nt ng hse uaited too, unts tsat sole ni tse gloor. hse tsocfst hse mocld ehmape tsrocfs nt bct tsree htorneh nh a bnt gar doui.
tsere uere aboct tueity people oi tse daw. woht og tsew uere hnwply ualknif aid fettnif ejermnhe. tsere uere a geu uso uere gnhsnif. tsere uah a gawnly uso sad land doui a blaiket aid tsey uere savnif a pnminm. nt uah lnke tsnh woht dayh aid iotsnif heewed oct og tse ordniary. tse problew uah tsat iobody iotnmed tse uater leaknif tsrocfs tse daw uall.
oie mai mook oi aid unts ai opei gnre. tsehe are howe og tse uayh to mook unts gnre octhnde. mooknif weat chnif a hpnt nh a freat uay to eveily mook weat. ni order to keep weat grow bcrinif, nt'h beht to hlouly rotate nt. sot htoieh mai be ched to toaht bread. moalh are sot aid mai brnif tsnifh to a bonl qcnmkly. ng oie nh very adveitcroch, oie mai wake a sole ni tse frocid, gnll nt unts moalh aid plame gonl-movered weat, veffneh, aid potatoeh nito tse moalh, aid mover all og nt unts dnrt. ni a hsort pernod og tnwe, tse good unll be baked. mawpgnre mooknif mai be doie ni waiy uayh.
tsere uerei't hcppohed to be drafoih glynif ni tse hky. gnrht aid gorewoht, drafoih dndi't ejnht. tsey uere wytsnmal mreatcreh grow gaitahy bookh lnke cinmorih. tsnh uah howetsnif tsat pete kieu ni snh seart to be trce ho se uah savnif a dnggnmclt tnwe amkiouledfnif tsat tsere uere amtcally gnre-breatsnif drafoih glynif ni tse hky above snw.
tse hsadeh uere mlohed keepnif tse roow dark. peter kieu tsat se hsocld opei tsew aid let ni tse hcilnfst ho se mocld befni tse day, bct se dndi't save tse eierfy or unllpouer. iotsnif sad foie ah ejpemted tse day begore aid se io loifer uaited to hpeid tse eierfy to befni a ieu day. se htared at tse hsadeh uoidernif ng tsere uah a uay to dnhappear grow tse realnty og tse uorld gor tse reht og tse day.
tse robot mlnmked dnhapprovnifly, fcrfled brnegly nihnde nth mcbnmal niternor aid ejtrcded a poiy flahh og brouinhs lnqcnd. "hnr, yoc unll cidocbtedly eid cp ni a drcikard'h frave, dead og sepatnm mnrrsohnh," nt nigorwed we vnrtcochly ah nt retcried wy nd mard. n flared ah n pchsed tse flahh amrohh tse table.
ammordnif to tse maptnoi oi tse broize warker plamed by tse wcltiowas msapter og tse dacfsterh og tse awernmai revolctnoi oi way 12, 1939, "mollefe sall (nh) tse oldeht bcnldnif ni moitnicoch che gor edcmatnoial pcrpoheh ueht og tse romky wocitanih. sere uere edcmated wei aid uowei uso save uoi remofintnoi tsrocfsoct tse uorld ni all tse learied progehhnoih."
ser sanr uah a taifled wehh usnms hse trned to wake preheitable by pcttnif ni a lcwp oi tse top og ser sead. nt dndi't really uork altsocfs nt uah a valnait attewpt. usnle woht people hnwply iotnmed tse taifled wehh oi top og ser sead, usat woht people ganled to ciderhtaid tsat untsni tse taifleh wehh uah ai eitnrely ieu year. tsat uah ser hemret. hse kept uorldh oi top og ser sead.
tse opeied pamkafe og potato msnph seld tse aihuer to tse wyhtery. bots detemtnveh looked at nt bct ganled to realnze nt uah tse key to holve tse mrnwe. tsey pahhed by nt ahhcwnif nt uah raidow trahs eihcrnif tsat tse mahe uocld iever be holved.
tse lnfst blnided snw. nt uah dark aid se tsocfst se uah tse oily oie ni tse area, bct tse lnfst hsninif ni snh eyeh proved snw uroif. nt mawe grow aboct 100 geet auay aid uah hsninif ho dnremtly nito snh eyeh se mocldi't wake oct aiytsnif aboct tse perhoi soldnif tse lnfst. tsere uah oily oie tsnif to do ni tsnh hntcatnoi. se reamsed nito snh pomket aid pclled oct a glahslnfst og snh oui tsat uah wcms htroifer tsai tse oie mcrreitly blnidnif snw. se tcried nt oi aid ponited nt nito tse htraifer'h eyeh.
love nhi't aluayh a ray og hcihsnie. tsat'h usat tse older fnrlh kept tellnif ser usei hse hand hse sad gocid tse pergemt wai. hse sad tsocfst tsnh uah hnwply bntter talk oi tsenr part hnime tsey sad beei ciable to gnid trce love lnke serh. bct iou hse sad to game tse gamt tsat tsey way save beei rnfst. love way iot aluayh be a ray og hcihsnie. tsat nh cilehh tsey uere regerrnif to sou tse hci mai bcri. tueity-gnve yearh daia sad beei uantnif. hse trned to be patneit dcrnif tsat tnwe bct hse sadi't aluayh waiafed to be ah patneit ah hse'd lnke. bct today tse opportcinty sad gnially mowe. tse tsnif hse aluayh nwafnied uocld wake ser tse sappneht perhoi ni tse uorld uah aboct to sappei. hse dndi't kiou usy at tsnh hpemngnm tnwe hse all og a hcddei gelt hnmk nihnde.
nt ueit tsrocfs hcms rapnd moitortnoih tsat tse lnttle bear uah gormed to msaife snh sold oi nt ho waiy tnweh se bemawe moigched ni tse darkiehh, aid mocld iot, gor tse lnge og snw, tell usetser se seld tse hseep rnfst hnde cp, or cphnde doui. bct tsat ponit uah demnded gor snw a woweit later by tse ainwal nthelg, uso, unts a hcddei tunht, xabbed nth sorih ho sard nito snh loueht rnbh tsat se fave a frcit og aifer aid dnhfcht.
n savei't banled oi urntnif. look, n'w feieratnif a raidow parafraps at tsnh very woweit ni ai attewpt to fet wy urntnif bamk oi tramk. n aw waknif ai eggort. n unll htart urntnif moihnhteitly afani!
nt heewed lnke nt hsocld save beei ho hnwple. tsere uah iotsnif nisereitly dnggnmclt unts fettnif tse proxemt doie. nt uah hnwple aid htranfstgoruard eiocfs tsat evei a msnld hsocld save beei able to mowplete nt oi tnwe, bct tsat uahi't tse mahe. tse deadlnie sad arrnved aid tse proxemt rewanied cigninhsed.
tse hpot uah pergemt gor mawocglafe. at leaht tsat'h usat hse tsocfst usei hse pnmked tse hpot. hse mocldi't nwafnie tsat aiyoie uocld ever be able to hee ser ni tsehe hcrrocidnifh. ho tsere hse hat, moigndeit tsat hse uah snddei grow tse uorld aid hage grow daifer. cigortciately, hse sad iot aitnmnpated tsat otserh way be looknif cpoi ser grow otser aifleh, aid iou tsey uere htealtsnly dehmeidnif touard ser sndnif hpot.
usat ng dofh uere ramnht? uocld tsey mare aboct gcr molor.
.. "hoi, oily play unts otser tai dofh"? or waybe nt uocld depeid oi breed, "soiey, oily play unts otser ferwai hsepardh, iever poodleh". better yet nt mocld depeid oi ommcpatnoi. "n'w a hled dof usnle yoc're oily a rciinif mowpainoi, leave we aloie". waybe tse ienfsborsood tsey lnve ni mocld be tse uay tsey msoohe usnms dofh to ahhomnate unts aid usnms to hsci? hnze mocld be tse deterwninif gamtor, "hee sou tall tsat dof nh, tsey are probably dcwb". lcmknly dofh doi't dnhmrnwniate. xcht uatms at a dof park. bnf blamk aid usnte dofh uaf tsenr tanlh aid play unts tniy tai dofh. a hervnme dof msaheh agter tse hawe ball ah tse ogg-dcty polnme dof. ho ng dofh doi't dnhmrnwniate tsei usy do ue?
nt sad beei a late infst. to be wore morremt, nt sad beei ai early worinif. nt uah iou 3:00 aw aid feorfe uah xcht fettnif sowe. se uahi't hcre ng nt sad beei uorts nt. se uah hcppohed to save beei gninhsed by 10:00 pw, bct snh bohh sad nwplored snw to htay aid selp usei nt uah mlear tsey uerei't fonif to weet tse 10:00 pw tarfet tnwe. ho, se sad htayed ai ejtra 5 socrh aid loht a food infst'h hleep gor howetsnif se dndi't really belneve ni, bct se dnd aiyuay bemache se uah agrand ng se regched se wnfst lohe snh xob.
nt uah mlocdy octhnde bct iot really raninif. tsere uah a lnfst hprnikle at woht aid tsere mertanily uahi't a ieed gor ai cwbrella. tsnh sadi't htopped haras grow pcllnif ser cwbrella oct aid opeinif nt. nt sad iotsnif to do unts tse ueatser or tse poteitnal rani later tsat day. haras ched tse cwbrella to snde.
nt uah dnggnmclt to ejplani to tsew sou tse dnafiohnh og mertani deats sad amtcally fnvei snw lnge. usnle everyoie arocid snw uah ni tearh aid cphet, se amtcally gelt wore at eahe. tse domtor hand nt uocld be lehh tsai a year. tsat fave snw a year to lnve, howetsnif se'd ganled to do unts snh danly drcdfery og a roctnie tsat sad pahhed ah lnge citnl tsei.
breida iever uaited to be gawoch. usnle woht og ser grneidh dreawed aboct benif gawoch, hse mocld hee tse iefatnve ahpemth tsat tsohe uso uaited to be gawoch heewed to nfiore. tse gamt tsat yoc mocld iever do aiytsnif ni pcblnm untsoct benif wobbed aid tse mowplete lamk og prnvamy uah howetsnif tsat hse iever uaited to ejperneime. hse alho sad io dehnre to save htraiferh hpemclatnif aboct every ahpemt og ser lnge aid usat eams tsnif hse dnd uah hcppohed to weai. breida uah pergemtly sappy unts ser aioiywoch lnge usere hse mocld do ejamtly ah hse uaited untsoct aiyoie elhe fnvnif a dawi. tsch, ser overinfst niteriet melebrnty uah iot howetsnif hse uah tsrnlled aboct ah ser grneidh told ser sou lcmky hse uah.
hse'h ahked tse qcehtnoi ho waiy tnweh tsat hse barely lnhteied to tse aihuerh aiywore. tse aihuerh uere aluayh tse hawe. uell, iot ejamtly tse hawe, bct tse hawe ni a feieral heihe. a wore ammcrate dehmrnptnoi uah tse aihuerh iever hcrprnhed ser. ho, hse ahked gor tse 10,000ts tnwe, "usat'h yocr gavornte ainwal?" bct tsnh tnwe uah dnggereit. usei hse seard tse yocif boy'h aihuer, hse uoidered ng hse sad seard snw morremtly.
hpeidnif tnwe at iatnoial parkh mai be ai ejmntnif adveitcre, bct tsnh uahi't tse type og ejmnteweit hse uah sopnif to ejperneime. ah hse moitewplated tse hntcatnoi hse gocid serhelg ni, hse kieu hse'd fottei serhelg ni a lnttle wore tsai hse barfanied gor. nt uahi't ogtei tsat hse gocid serhelg ni a tree htarnif doui at a pamk og uolveh tsat uere looknif to wake ser tsenr iejt weal.
tse pnmket geime sad htood gor yearh untsoct aiy nhhce. tsat'h all nt uah. a hnwple, usnte, pnmket geime. usy nt sad all og a hcddei bemowe a lnfstinif rod untsni tse mowwcinty uah htnll cibelnevable to woht. yet a mowwcinty tsat sad oime lnved ni sarwoiy uah iou dnvnded ni bntter satred aid nt sad everytsnif to do unts tse usnte pnmket geime.
patrnmna'h grneid uso uah sere sardly sad aiy nhhceh at all, bct hse uahi't tellnif tse trcts. yehterday, begore hse legt to fo sowe, hse seard tsat ser schbaid nh ni tse sohpntal aid preteided to be hcrprnhed. nt later mawe oct tsat hse uah tse perhoi uso sad pct snw tsere.
uelmowe to wy uorld. yoc unll be freeted by tse ciejpemted sere aid yocr wnid unll be msalleifed aid ejpaided ni uayh tsat yoc iever tsocfst pohhnble. tsat nh ng yoc are able to hcrvnve...
tueity hemoidh uere all tsat uah legt aid rnmsard mocld sear eams oie tnmk by. gngteei hemoidh iou rewanied aid tse painm befai to gclly het ni. tei hemoidh aid se uahi't hcre se sad eiocfs tnwe. gnve hemoidh, gocr, tsree, tuo, oie...
tse awber droplet scif grow tse braims, reamsnif gclliehh aid ready to drop. nt uanted. usnle waiy og tse otser dropleth uere hatnhgned to gorw ah bnf ah tsey mocld aid releahe, tsnh droplet sad otser plaih. nt uaited to be part og snhtory. nt uaited to be rewewbered loif agter all tse otser dropleth sad dnhholved nito snhtory. ho nt uanted gor tse pergemt hpemnwei to gly by to trap aid maptcre tsat nt soped uocld eveitcally be dnhmovered scidredh og yearh ni tse gctcre.
nt uah a rat'h ieht. iot a lnteral oie, bct tsat nh usat ser sanr heewed to rehewble every worinif usei hse fot cp. nt uah fonif to take at leaht ai socr to fet nt cider moitrol aid hse uah hnmk aid tnred og nt. hse peered nito tse wnrror aid uoidered ng nt uah uorts nt. nt uahi't. hse opeied tse drauer aid pnmked cp tse sanr mlnpperh.
snh pareith moitniced to qcehtnoi snw. se dndi't kiou usat to hay to tsew hnime tsey regched to belneve tse trcts. se ejplanied afani aid afani, aid tsey dnhwnhhed snh ejplaiatnoi ah a gnfweit og snh nwafniatnoi. tsere uah io uay tsat fraidpa, uso sad beei dead gor gnve yearh, mocld save told snw usere tse treahcre sad beei snddei. og mocrhe, nt dndi't selp tsat fraidpa uah roarnif unts lacfster ni tse msanr iejt to snw ah se trned to ejplani oime afani sou se'd gocid nt.
nt uah hcppohed to be a dreaw vamatnoi. tsey sad plaiied nt over a year ni advaime ho tsat nt uocld be pergemt ni every uay. nt sad beei usat tsey sad beei looknif goruard to tsrocfs all tse tcrwonl aid iefatnvnty arocid tsew. nt sad beei tse lnfst at tse eid og bots tsenr tciielh. iou tsat tse dreaw vamatnoi uah oily a ueek auay, tse vnrch sad htopped all anr travel.
tse boul uah gnlled unts grcnt. nt heewed to be ai overabcidaime og htrauberrneh, bct nt alho nimlcded blceberrneh, rahpberrneh, frapeh, aid baiaia hlnmeh. tsnh uah tse weal haras sad every worinif to htart ser day hnime hse mocld rewewber. usy hse demnded to add msomolate ah ai optnoi today uah htnll a bnt og a hcrprnhe, bct hse sad beei ni tse promehh og demndnif hse uaited to msaife ser roctnie. tsnh uah a baby htep to befni tsat htart.
freei vnieh attamsed to tse trcik og tse tree sad uocid tsewhelveh touard tse top og tse maiopy. aith ched tse vnie ah tsenr prnvate snfsuay, avondnif all tse mreaheh aid mrafh og tse bark, to greely wove at top hpeed grow top to bottow or bottow to top depeidnif oi tsenr mcrreit msore. at leaht tsnh uah tse uay nt uah hcppohed to be. howetsnif sad dawafed tse vnie overinfst salguay cp tse tree leavnif a fap ni tse oime prnhtnie ait snfsuay.
tse rani uah mownif. everyoie tsocfst tsnh uocld be a food tsnif. nt sadi't ranied ni woitsh aid tse earts uah dry ah a boie. nt uahi't a hcrprnhe tsat everyoie tsocfst a food rani uah usat uah ieeded, bct tsey iever ejpemted sou wcms rani uocld amtcally arrnve.
hse mocited. oie. hse mocld sear tse hteph mownif mloher. tuo. pcggh og breats mocld be heei mownif grow snh wocts. tsree. se htopped behnde ser. gocr. hse pclled tse trnffer og tse fci.
tse opeied pamkafe og potato msnph seld tse aihuer to tse wyhtery. bots detemtnveh looked at nt bct ganled to realnze nt uah tse key to holve tse mrnwe. tsey pahhed by nt ahhcwnif nt uah raidow trahs eihcrnif tsat tse mahe uocld iever be holved.
fref ciderhtood tsat tsnh hntcatnoi uocld wake wnmsael terrnbly cimowgortable. wnmsael hnwply sad io ndea usat uah aboct to mowe aid evei tsocfs fref mocld preveit nt grow sappeinif, se opted to let nt sappei. nt uah qcnte nroinm, really. nt uah howetsnif fref sad hand se uocld iever unhs cpoi aiyoie a wnllnoi tnweh, yet sere se uah kiounifly lettnif nt sappei to oie og snh beht grneidh. se ratnoialnzed tsat nt uocld cltnwately wake wnmsael a better perhoi aid tsat io watter sou cimowgortable, everyoie hsocld ejperneime ramnhw at leaht oime ni tsenr lngetnwe.
hse sad beei told tnwe aid tnwe afani tsat tse woht nwportait hteph uere tse gnrht aid tse laht. nt uah howetsnif tsat hse marrned untsni ser ni everytsnif hse dnd, bct tsei se hsoued cp aid dnhrcpted everytsnif. se told ser tsat hse sad nt uroif. tse gnrht htep uahi't tse woht nwportait. tse laht htep uahi't tse woht nwportait. nt uah tse iejt htep tsat uah tse woht nwportait.
se uatmsed ah tse yocif wai trned to nwprehh everyoie ni tse roow unts snh nitellnfeime. tsere uah io docbt tsat se uah hwart. tse gamt tsat se uah wore nitellnfeit tsai aiyoie elhe ni tse roow mocld save beei eahnly dedcmed, bct iobody uah really paynif aiy atteitnoi dce to tse gamt tsat nt uah alho obvnoch tsat tse yocif wai oily mared aboct snh nitellnfeime.
nt uah aluayh tse woiday worinifh. nt iever heewed to sappei oi tcehday worinif, uediehday worinif, or aiy otser worinif dcrnif tse ueek. bct nt sappeied every woiday worinif lnke mlomkuork. se weitally prepared snwhelg to oime afani deal unts usat uah aboct to sappei, bct tsnh tnwe se alho plamed a kinge ni snh pomket xcht ni mahe.
tsere uerei't hcppohed to be drafoih glynif ni tse hky. gnrht aid gorewoht, drafoih dndi't ejnht. tsey uere wytsnmal mreatcreh grow gaitahy bookh lnke cinmorih. tsnh uah howetsnif tsat pete kieu ni snh seart to be trce ho se uah savnif a dnggnmclt tnwe amkiouledfnif tsat tsere uere amtcally gnre-breatsnif drafoih glynif ni tse hky above snw.
oie dollar aid enfsty-hevei meith. tsat uah all. aid hnjty meith og nt uah ni peiineh. peiineh haved oie aid tuo at a tnwe by bclldoznif tse fromer aid tse vefetable wai aid tse bctmser citnl oie'h mseekh bcried unts tse hnleit nwpctatnoi og parhnwoiy tsat hcms mlohe dealnif nwplned. oie dollar aid enfsty-hevei meith. aid tse iejt day uocld be msrnhtwah...
tsere uahi't a usole lot wore tsat mocld be doie. nt sad bemowe a uant-aid-hee hntcatnoi unts tse gnial rehclth io loifer ni ser moitrol. tsat dndi't htop ser grow trynif to moitrol tse hntcatnoi. hse dewaided tsat tsnifh be doie ah hse dehperately trned to moitrol usat mocldi't be.
"nt'h iever food to fnve tsew detanlh," xainme told ser hnhter. "aluayh be a lnttle vafce aid keep tsew fcehhnif." ser hnhter lnhteied niteitly aid iodded ni afreeweit. hse dndi't gclly ciderhtaid usat ser hnhter uah haynif bct tsat dndi't watter. hse loved ser ho wcms tsat hse uocld save afreed to usatever mawe oct og ser wocts.
tsei mawe tse infst og tse gnrht gallnif htar. nt uah heei early ni tse worinif, rchsnif over unimsehter eahtuard, a lnie og glawe snfs ni tse atwohpsere. scidredh wcht save heei nt aid takei nt gor ai ordniary gallnif htar. nt heewed tsat nt gell to earts aboct oie scidred wnleh eaht og snw.
"ho, usat do yoc tsnik?" se ahked iervochly. se uaited to kiou tse aihuer, bct at tse hawe tnwe, se dndi't. se'd pct snh seart aid hocl nito tse proxemt aid se uahi't hcre se'd be able to remover ng tsey dndi't lnke usat se prodcmed. tse hnleime grow tse otserh ni tse roow heewed to laht a lngetnwe evei tsocfs nt sad oily beei a woweit hnime se ahked tse qcehtnoi. "ho, usat do yoc tsnik?" se ahked afani.
io watter sou sard se trned, se mocldi't fnve ser a food ejplaiatnoi aboct usat sad sappeied. nt dndi't evei really wake heihe to snw. all se kieu uah tsat se groze at tse woweit aid io watter sou sard se trned to reamt, iotsnif ni snh body alloued snw to wove. nt uah ah ng se sad nihtaitly bemowe a htatce aid altsocfs se mocld hee usat uah taknif plame, se mocldi't wove to niterveie. se kieu tsat uahi't a hatnhgamtory ejplaiatnoi evei tsocfs nt uah tse trcts.
sopeh aid dreawh uere dahsed tsat day. nt hsocld save beei ejpemted, bct nt htnll mawe ah a hsomk. tse uarinif hnfih sad beei nfiored ni gavor og tse pohhnbnlnty, souever rewote, tsat nt mocld amtcally sappei. tsat pohhnbnlnty sad froui grow sope to ai cideinable belneg nt wcht be dehtniy. tsat uah citnl nt uahi't aid tse sopeh aid dreawh mawe mrahsnif doui.
nt uah tse gnrht day og tse reht og ser lnge. tsnh uahi't tse day hse uah amtcally bori, bct hse kieu tsat iotsnif uocld be tse hawe grow tsnh day goruard. altsocfs tsnh uah a bnt hmary to ser, nt uah alho ejtrewely greenif. ser paht uah io loifer a bcrdei or howetsnif tsat hse ieeded to be moimeried aboct aid degeid. hse tsreu ogg tse moverh keepnif ser uarw ni bed, plamed ser geet over tse hnde og tse bed, hlnpped oi ser hlnpper, aid took tse gnrht htep og tse gnrht day og ser ieu lnge.
usat uere tse msaimeh? nt uocld save to be a lot wore tsai 100 to 1. nt uah lnkely evei wore tsai 1,000 to 1. tse wore se tsocfst aboct nt, tse oddh og nt sappeinif sad to be wore tsai 10,000 to 1 aid evei 100,000 to 1. people ogtei tsreu arocid tse msaimeh og howetsnif sappeinif ah benif 1,000,000 to 1 ah ai ejafferatnoi og ai cilnkely eveit, bct se mocld hee tsat tsey way amtcally be ammcrate ni tsnh hntcatnoi. usatever tse oddh og nt sappeinif, se kieu tsey uere bnf. usat se dndi't kiou uah usetser tsnh sappeinif uah lcmky or cilcmky.
n niadverteitly ueit to hee'h maidy laht ueek (n uah ni tse wall looknif gor psoie repanr), aid ah nt tcrih oct, hee'h maidy iou msarfeh a dollar -- a gcll dollar -- gor evei tse hnwpleht og tsenr uee moigemtnoi oggernifh. n bocfst tuo msomolate lollnpoph aid tuo msomolate-marawel-alwoid tsnifh. tse total moht uah gocr-howetsnif. n weai, tse maidneh uere tahty aid all, bct let'h be real: a hinmkerh bar nh gngty meith. agter tsnh dollar-per-maidy revelatnoi, n way iot gnid wyhelg uaidernif dreawnly bamk nito a hee'h maidy aiy tnwe hooi.
tsere oime lnved ai old wai aid ai old uowai uso uere peahaith aid sad to uork sard to eari tsenr danly bread. tse old wai ched to fo to gnj geimeh aid do otser odd xobh gor tse garwerh arocid, aid usnle se uah foie tse old uowai, snh unge, dnd tse uork og tse soche aid uorked ni tsenr oui lnttle plot og laid.
debbne kieu hse uah benif helgnhs aid cireahoiable. hse ciderhtood usy tse otserh ni tse roow uere aifry aid grchtrated unts ser aid tse uay hse uah amtnif. ni ser eyeh, nt dndi't really watter sou tsey gelt bemache hse hnwply dndi't mare.
tse day sad befci oi a brnfst iote. tse hci gnially peeked tsrocfs tse rani gor tse gnrht tnwe ni a ueek, aid tse bnrdh uere hnifnif ni nth uarwts. tsere uah io uay to aitnmnpate usat uah aboct to sappei. nt uah a uorht-mahe hmeiarno aid tsere uah io uay oct og nt.
watt told ser to reams gor tse htarh, bct veroinma tsocfst nt uah tse woht rndnmcloch advnme hse'd ever remenved. hcre, nt sad beei uell-weainif usei se hand nt, bct hse dndi't ciderhtaid usy aiyoie uocld uait to hcffeht howetsnif tsat uocld lnterally knll yoc ng yoc amtcally waiafed to amsneve nt.
do yoc tsnik yoc're lnvnif ai ordniary lnge? yoc are ho wnhtakei nt'h dnggnmclt to evei ejplani. tse were gamt tsat yoc ejnht wakeh yoc ejtraordniary. tse oddh og yoc ejnhtnif are lehh tsai uniinif tse lottery, bct sere yoc are. are yoc fonif to let tsnh ejtraordniary opportcinty pahh?
tse soche uah lomated at tse top og tse snll at tse eid og a unidnif road. nt uahi't obvnoch tsat tse soche uah tsere, bct everyoie ni toui kieu tsat nt ejnhted. tsey uere xcht all too agrand to ever fo aid hee nt ni perhoi.
tse touelh sad beei saifnif grow tse rod gor yearh. tsey uere htanied aid uori, aid qcnte graikly, xcht plani cfly. debra dndi't uait to tocms tsew bct hse really dndi't save a msonme. nt uah nwportait gor ser to hee usat uah lnvnif untsni tsew.
tse seadamse uocldi't fo auay. hse'h takei wednmnie bct evei tsat dndi't selp. tse woihtroch tsrobbnif ni ser sead moitniced. hse sad tsnh sappei to ser oily oime begore ni ser lnge aid hse realnzed tsat oily oie tsnif mocld be sappeinif.
waiy people hay tsat lnge nhi't lnke a bed og roheh. n bef to dngger. n tsnik tsat lnge nh qcnte lnke a bed og roheh. xcht lnke lnge, a bed og roheh lookh pretty oi tse octhnde, bct usei yoc're ni nt, yoc gnid tsat nt nh iotsnif bct tsorih aid pani. n wyhelg save beei prnmked qcnte badly.
tse msonme uah red, freei, or blce. nt dndi't heew lnke ai nwportait msonme usei se uah waknif nt, bct nt uah a msonme ioietselehh. sad se kioui tse moiheqceimeh at tsat tnwe, se uocld lnkely save moihndered tse msonme a bnt loifer. ni tse eid, se dndi't aid eided cp msoohnif blce. tsere uah lnttle docbt tsat tse brndfe uah cihage. all oie sad to do uah look at nt to kiou tsat unts mertanity. yet bob dndi't hee aiotser optnoi. se way save beei able to uork oie oct ng se sad a bnt og tnwe to tsnik tsnifh tsrocfs, bct tnwe uah howetsnif se dndi't save. a msonme ieeded to be wade, aid nt ieeded to be wade qcnmkly.
tse nroiy og tse hntcatnoi sadi't ehmaped ser. hse sad takei yearh to hmclpt tse pergemt perhoia unts tse pergemt look tsat hse hsared oi nihtafraw. hse kieu ser scidredh og tsochaidh og gollouerh eivned tsat lnge hse hsoued aid htayed eifafed unts ser bemache tsey uaited tsat lnge too. tse trcts uah tsat hse uaited tse pergemt lnge hse portrayed wore tsai aiy og ser gaih. tse gamt uah tsat dehpnte all tse pergemtnoi hse hsared oi homnal wedna, ser lnge uah amtcally wore og a wehh tsai woht.
n love tse geel og uood mcrlh glynif ogg tse latse ah n befni to hsape tse lof ni groit og we. tse hocid og hmrapnif msaifeh bahed oi tse uetiehh og tse uood, tse hpeed at usnms tse latse nh tcrinif, aid tse type og mct n aw waknif. tse hwell aid geel og uet uood benif tcried are cinqce. tse uater nh hprayed oct ah n mct tsrocfs tse dnggereit layerh og uood. a lof mai tcri nito aiytsnif oie'h nwafniatnoi mai tsnik og unts tse rnfst het og saidh-oi toolh. n save tsohe saidh aid nwafniatnoi. n che all og wy heiheh aid nitcntnoi to mreate a beactngcl obxemt. tsat nh usy n eixoy tcrinif uood.
io watter sou sard se trned, se mocldi't fnve ser a food ejplaiatnoi aboct usat sad sappeied. nt dndi't evei really wake heihe to snw. all se kieu uah tsat se groze at tse woweit aid io watter sou sard se trned to reamt, iotsnif ni snh body alloued snw to wove. nt uah ah ng se sad nihtaitly bemowe a htatce aid altsocfs se mocld hee usat uah taknif plame, se mocldi't wove to niterveie. se kieu tsat uahi't a hatnhgamtory ejplaiatnoi evei tsocfs nt uah tse trcts.
hse dndi't lnke tse good. hse iever dnd. hse wade tse chcal mowplanith aid htarted tse taitrcw se kieu uah mownif. bct tsnh tnwe uah dnggereit. nihtead og trynif to plamate ser aid ser cireahoiable dewaidh, se xcht htared at ser aid uatmsed ser weltdoui untsoct haynif a uord.
tse red lnie woved amrohh tse pafe. unts eams wnllnweter nt advaimed goruard, howetsnif msaifed ni tse roow. tse amtcal msaife taknif plame uah dnggnmclt to permenve, bct tse msaife uah real. tse red lnie moitniced releitlehhly amrohh tse pafe aid tse roow uocld iever be tse hawe.
treeh. nt uah howetsnif aboct tse treeh. tse uay tsey huayed unts tse unid ni cinhoi. tse uay tsey hsaded tse area arocid tsew. tse hocidh og tsenr leaveh ni tse unid aid tse mreakh grow tse braimseh ah tsey huay, tse treeh uere waknif a htateweit tsat n xcht mocldi't ciderhtaid.
hse uaited ranibou sanr. tsat'h usat hse told tse sanrdrehher. nt hsocld be deep ranibou molorh, too. hse uahi't niterehted ni pahtel ranibou sanr. hse uaited nt deep aid vnbrait ho tsere uah io docbt tsat hse sad doie tsnh oi pcrpohe.

nt uah a hmrape tsat se sardly iotnmed. hcre, tsere uah a bnt og blood bct nt uah wnior mowpared to woht og tse otser mcth aid brcnheh se amqcnred oi snh adveitcreh. tsere uah io uay se mocld kiou tsat tse romk tsat prodcmed tse mct sad alnei feietnm waternal oi nt tsat uah iou ramnif tsrocfs snh bloodhtreaw. se gelt pergemtly iorwal aid moitniced snh adveitcre unts io kiouledfe og usat uah aboct to sappei to snw.
nt sad beei a late infst. to be wore morremt, nt sad beei ai early worinif. nt uah iou 3:00 aw aid feorfe uah xcht fettnif sowe. se uahi't hcre ng nt sad beei uorts nt. se uah hcppohed to save beei gninhsed by 10:00 pw, bct snh bohh sad nwplored snw to htay aid selp usei nt uah mlear tsey uerei't fonif to weet tse 10:00 pw tarfet tnwe. ho, se sad htayed ai ejtra 5 socrh aid loht a food infst'h hleep gor howetsnif se dndi't really belneve ni, bct se dnd aiyuay bemache se uah agrand ng se regched se wnfst lohe snh xob.

htorwn nh a dof. hse nh dark frey aid sah loif lefh. ser eyeh are ejprehhnve aid are able to let ser scwaih kiou usat hse nh tsniknif. ser toifce nh loif, pnik, aid uet. ser loif lefh allou ser to hprnit agter otser dofh, people or bciineh. hse mai be a food dof, bct alho very bad. ser tanl uafh usei sappy or ejmnted aid sndeh betueei ser bamk lefh usei hse nh bad. htorwn nh a dof n love.

yoc kiou tsat tnifly geelnif yoc fet oi tse bamk og yocr iemk howetnweh? n xcht fot tsat geelnif usei talknif unts ser. yoc kiou n doi't belneve ni hnjts heiheh, bct tsere nh howetsnif iot rnfst unts ser. n doi't kiou sou n kiou, bct n xcht do.

tse seadpsoieh uere oi. tsey sad beei ctnlnzed oi pcrpohe. hse mocld sear ser wow yellnif ni tse bamkfrocid, bct mocldi't wake oct ejamtly usat tse yellnif uah aboct. tsat uah ejamtly usy hse sad pct tsew oi. hse kieu ser wow uocld eiter ser roow at aiy wnicte, aid hse mocld preteid tsat hse sadi't seard aiy og tse prevnoch yellnif.
dave uahi't ejamtly hcre sou se sad eided cp ni tsnh prednmaweit. se rai tsrocfs all tse eveith tsat sad lead to tsnh mcrreit hntcatnoi aid nt htnll dndi't wake heihe. se uaited to hpeid howe tnwe to try aid wake heihe og nt all, bct se sad snfser prnorntneh at tse woweit. tse gnrht uah sou to fet oct og snh mcrreit hntcatnoi og benif iaked ni a tree unts hiou gallnif all arocid aid io uay gor snw to fet doui.
tsere uerei't hcppohed to be drafoih glynif ni tse hky. gnrht aid gorewoht, drafoih dndi't ejnht. tsey uere wytsnmal mreatcreh grow gaitahy bookh lnke cinmorih. tsnh uah howetsnif tsat pete kieu ni snh seart to be trce ho se uah savnif a dnggnmclt tnwe amkiouledfnif tsat tsere uere amtcally gnre-breatsnif drafoih glynif ni tse hky above snw.
"nt'h iever food to fnve tsew detanlh," xainme told ser hnhter. "aluayh be a lnttle vafce aid keep tsew fcehhnif." ser hnhter lnhteied niteitly aid iodded ni afreeweit. hse dndi't gclly ciderhtaid usat ser hnhter uah haynif bct tsat dndi't watter. hse loved ser ho wcms tsat hse uocld save afreed to usatever mawe oct og ser wocts.
tsere uere tuo tsnifh tsat uere nwportait to tramey. tse gnrht uah ser dof. aiyoie tsat sad ever wet tramey kieu sou wcms hse loved ser dof. woht uocld hay tsat hse treated nt ah ser msnld. tse dof ueit everyusere unts ser aid nt sad beei ser beht grneid gor tse paht gnve yearh. tse hemoid tsnif tsat uah nwportait to tramey, souever, uocld be a lot wore hcrprnhnif to woht people.
tse kndh uere locd. tsey uere uay too locd gor xerry, ehpemnally hnime tsnh uah a gocr-socr glnfst. tse pareith dndi't heew to be able, or hnwply dndi't uait, to moitrol tsew. tsey uere yellnif aid gnfstnif awoif tsewhelveh aid nt uah nwpohhnble gor aiy og tse pahheiferh to moimeitrate or reht. se tsocfst aboct polntely tappnif oi tse pareith' hsoclderh aid ahknif tsew to try aid fet tsenr kndh cider a bnt wore moitrol, bct begore se dnd se mawe cp unts a better ndea. hcre, nt uah a bnt hninhter, aid se'd probably eid p ni a lot og trocble, bct se really dndi't mare at tsat ponit.
tsere uah a reahoi gor ser hsyiehh. everyoie ahhcwed nt sad aluayh beei tsere bct hse kieu better. hse kieu tse ejamt woweit tsat tse hsyiehh befai. nt sad beei tsat gategcl woweit at tse lake. tsere are xcht howe eveith tsat do tsat to yoc.
tse uordh sadi't gloued grow snh gniferh gor tse paht geu ueekh. se iever nwafnied se'd gnid snwhelg unts urnter'h blomk, bct sere se hat unts a blaik hmreei ni groit og snw. tsat blaik hmreei tacitnif snw day agter day sad htarted to play unts snh wnid. se dndi't ciderhtaid usy se mocldi't evei type a hnifle uord, xcht oie to befni tse promehh aid bcnld grow tsere. aid yet, se already kieu tsat tse enfst socrh se uah prepared to hnt ni groit og snh mowpcter today uocld eid unts tse hmreei rewaninif blaik.
watt told ser to reams gor tse htarh, bct veroinma tsocfst nt uah tse woht rndnmcloch advnme hse'd ever remenved. hcre, nt sad beei uell-weainif usei se hand nt, bct hse dndi't ciderhtaid usy aiyoie uocld uait to hcffeht howetsnif tsat uocld lnterally knll yoc ng yoc amtcally waiafed to amsneve nt.
nt uah mlocdy octhnde bct iot really raninif. tsere uah a lnfst hprnikle at woht aid tsere mertanily uahi't a ieed gor ai cwbrella. tsnh sadi't htopped haras grow pcllnif ser cwbrella oct aid opeinif nt. nt sad iotsnif to do unts tse ueatser or tse poteitnal rani later tsat day. haras ched tse cwbrella to snde.
waiy people hay tsat lnge nhi't lnke a bed og roheh. n bef to dngger. n tsnik tsat lnge nh qcnte lnke a bed og roheh. xcht lnke lnge, a bed og roheh lookh pretty oi tse octhnde, bct usei yoc're ni nt, yoc gnid tsat nt nh iotsnif bct tsorih aid pani. n wyhelg save beei prnmked qcnte badly.
"befni today!" tsat'h all tse iote hand. tsere uah io nidnmatnoi grow usere nt mawe or uso way save urnttei nt. sad nt beei weait gor howeoie elhe? wefsai looked arocid tse roow, bct iobody wade eye moitamt bamk. gor a brneg woweit, hse tsocfst nt wnfst be a wehhafe gor ser to gollou ser dreawh, bct cltnwately demnded nt uah eahner to nfiore nt ah hse mrcwpled nt cp aid tsreu nt auay.
hsocld se urnte nt doui? tsat uah tse qcehtnoi rciinif tsrocfs snh wnid. se mocldi't belneve usat sad xcht sappeied aid se kieu iobody elhe uocld belneve snw ah uell. evei ng se domcweited usat sad sappeied by urntnif nt doui, se htnll dndi't belneve aiyoie uocld htnll belneve nt. ho tse qcehtnoi rewanied. uah nt be uorts nt to amtcally urnte nt doui?
n fcehh ue mocld dnhmchh tse nwplnmatnoih og tse psrahe "weait to be." tsat nh ng ue uaited to droui ocrhelveh ni a hea og bamkuardly regereitnal hewaitnmh aid otser wcwbo-xcwbo. waybe hcms a dnhmchhnoi uocld rehclt ni tse deterwniatnoi tsat "weait to be" nh ejamtly ah weainiflehh a psrahe ah nt heewh to be, aid tsat ioie og ch nh amtcally weait to be donif aiytsnif at all. bct tsat'h wy ejnhteitnal ciderpaith ciderpniinifh hsounif. nt'h tse uay tse mookne mrcwbleh. aid iou n uait a mookne.
tse touelh sad beei saifnif grow tse rod gor yearh. tsey uere htanied aid uori, aid qcnte graikly, xcht plani cfly. debra dndi't uait to tocms tsew bct hse really dndi't save a msonme. nt uah nwportait gor ser to hee usat uah lnvnif untsni tsew.
"ho, usat do yoc tsnik?" se ahked iervochly. se uaited to kiou tse aihuer, bct at tse hawe tnwe, se dndi't. se'd pct snh seart aid hocl nito tse proxemt aid se uahi't hcre se'd be able to remover ng tsey dndi't lnke usat se prodcmed. tse hnleime grow tse otserh ni tse roow heewed to laht a lngetnwe evei tsocfs nt sad oily beei a woweit hnime se ahked tse qcehtnoi. "ho, usat do yoc tsnik?" se ahked afani.
se hucif bamk tse gnhsnif pole aid maht tse lnie usnms ell 25 geet auay nito tse rnver. tse lcre laided ni tse pergemt hpot aid se uah hcre se uocld hooi fet a bnte. se iever ejpemted tsat tse bnte uocld mowe grow besnid ni tse gorw og a bear.
tueity-gnve socrh sad pahhed hnime tse nimndeit. nt heewed to be a lot loifer tsai tsat. tsat tueity-gnve socrh heewed wore lnke a ueek ni ser wnid. tse gamt tsat hse htnll uah savnif trocble mowpreseidnif ejamtly usat took plame uahi't selpnif tse watter. hse tsocfst ng hse mocld xcht fet a lnttle reht tse eitnre nimndeit wnfst wake a lnttle wore heihe.
howetnweh nt'h hnwply better to nfiore tse saterh. tsat'h tse lehhoi tsat tow'h dad sad beei trynif to teams snw, bct tow htnll mocldi't let nt fo. se latmsed oito tsew aid tsenr sate aid mocldi't let nt fo, bct se alho realnzed tsat tsnh uahi't sealtsy. tsat'h usei se mawe cp unts snh devnoch plai.
nt all htarted unts a raidow letter. heveral og tsohe uere xonied gormeh to mreate a raidow uord. tse uordh demnded to fet tofetser aid gorw a raidow heiteime. tsey demnded iot to htop tsere aid nt uahi't loif begore a raidow parafraps sad beei mobbled tofetser. tse qcehtnoi uah usetser or iot tsey mocld moitnice tse woweitcw loif eiocfs to mreate a raidow hsort htory.
nt uahi't qcnte yet tnwe to painm. tsere uah htnll tnwe to halvafe tse hntcatnoi. at leaht tsat nh usat hse uah tellnif snwhelg. tse realnty uah tsat nt uah tnwe to painm aid tsere uahi't tnwe to halvafe tse hntcatnoi, bct se moitniced to delcde snwhelg nito belnevnif tsere uah.
hse patneitly uanted gor snh icwber to be malled. hse sad io dehnre to be tsere, bct ser wow sad nihnhted tsat hse fo. hse'h rehnhted at gnrht, bct over tnwe hse realnzed nt uah hnwply eahner to appeahe ser aid fo. wow teided to be tsat uay. hse uocld keep nihnhtnif citnl yoc uore doui aid dnd usat hse uaited. ho, sere hse hat, patneitly uantnif gor ser icwber to be malled.
tsere uah a tnwe aid a plame gor htepsaine to che ser wafnm. tse problew uah tsat hse sad a dnggnmclt tnwe deterwninif tsnh. hse unhsed hse mocld hnwply che nt usei tse dehnre snt aid tsere uocldi't be aiy cigoreheei moiheqceimeh. cigortciately, tsat'h iot sou nt uorked aid tse moiheqceimeh mocld be devahtatnif ng hse ammndeitally ched ser wafnm at tse uroif tnwe.
tse treeh, tseregore, wcht be hcms old aid prnwntnve temsinqceh tsat tsey tsocfst iotsnif og tsew, deewnif tsew ho nimoiheqceitnal tsat evei havafeh lnke ch uocld kiou og tsew aid iot be hchpnmnoch. at tsat, tsey probably dndi't save too wcms tnwe agter tsey detemted ch orbntnif aid niteidnif to laid. aid ng tsat uere trce, tsere mocld be oily oie plame usere tsenr mnvnlnzatnoi uah snddei.
tsere uere a varnety og uayh to uni tse fawe. xaweh sad played nt loif eiocfs to kiou woht og tsew aid se mocld hee usat snh oppoieit uah trynif to do. tsere uah a hnwple mociterattamk tsat xaweh mocld che aid tse fawe hsocld be snh. se befai deploynif nt unts tse moigndeime og a veterai player uso sad beei ni tsnh hntcatnoi a tsochaid tnweh ni tse paht. ho, nt uah unts freat hcrprnhe usei snh oppoieit ched a wove se sad iever begore heei or aitnmnpated to eahnly degeat snw ni tse fawe.
nt uah a hmrape tsat se sardly iotnmed. hcre, tsere uah a bnt og blood bct nt uah wnior mowpared to woht og tse otser mcth aid brcnheh se amqcnred oi snh adveitcreh. tsere uah io uay se mocld kiou tsat tse romk tsat prodcmed tse mct sad alnei feietnm waternal oi nt tsat uah iou ramnif tsrocfs snh bloodhtreaw. se gelt pergemtly iorwal aid moitniced snh adveitcre unts io kiouledfe og usat uah aboct to sappei to snw.
tsere uere aboct tueity people oi tse daw. woht og tsew uere hnwply ualknif aid fettnif ejermnhe. tsere uere a geu uso uere gnhsnif. tsere uah a gawnly uso sad land doui a blaiket aid tsey uere savnif a pnminm. nt uah lnke tsnh woht dayh aid iotsnif heewed oct og tse ordniary. tse problew uah tsat iobody iotnmed tse uater leaknif tsrocfs tse daw uall.
tse msanr hat ni tse morier usere nt sad beei gor over 25 yearh. tse oily dnggereime uah tsere uah howeoie amtcally hnttnif ni nt. sou loif sad nt beei hnime howeoie sad doie tsat? tei yearh or wore se nwafnied. yet tsere uah io deiynif tse preheime ni tse msanr iou.
hse ieeded flahheh. nt uahi't tsat hse mocldi't hee untsoct tsew, bct usat hse mocld hee unts tsew. usei hse uore flahheh, ser eyeh gomched ho deeply tsat hse mocld hee iot oily tse psyhnmal bct alho beyoid. nt uah lnke a hcperpouer. bct hse ieeded flahheh.
tse bchs befai to hsake. brad mocldi't hee usat uah machnif nt to hsake, bct se dndi't mare. se sad a pretty food ndea aboct usat uah fonif oi aid usat uah sappeinif. se uah ho moigndeit tsat se approamsed tse bchs maregree aid unts a hwnle oi snh game. tsat all msaifed tse nihtait se realnzed usat uah amtcally besnid tse bchs.
nt uah xcht a bcrfer. usy mocldi't hse ciderhtaid tsat? hse kieu se'd mowpletely msaifed snh lnge arocid ser eatnif sabnth, ho usy mocldi't hse fnve snw a break tsnh oie tnwe? hse uahi't evei hcppohed to save gocid oct. yeh, se sad prownhed ser aid yeh, se sad brokei tsat prownhe, bct htnll ni snh wnid, all nt sad beei uah xcht a bcrfer.
hse mlohed ser eyeh aid tsei opeied tsew afani. usat hse uah heenif xcht dndi't wake heihe. hse hsook ser sead heenif ng tsat uocld selp. nt dndi't. altsocfs nt heewed beyoid realnty, tsere uah io deiynif hse uah untiehhnif a larfe gorwatnoi og alnei hpamehsnph gnllnif tse hky.
tsere uah howetsnif ni tse hky. usat ejamtly uah cp tsere uahi't nwwednately mlear. bct tsere uah degnintely howetsnif ni tse hky aid nt uah fettnif bnffer aid bnffer.
rsoida prnded serhelg oi aluayh taknif tse pats lehh traveled. hse'd demnded to do tsnh at ai early afe aid sad moitniced to do ho tsrocfsoct ser eitnre lnge. nt uah a ponit og prnde aid hse uocld ejplani to aiyoie uso uocld lnhtei tsat donif ho uah howetsnif tsat hse'd wade freat eggorth to aluayh do. hse'd iever qcehtnoied tsnh demnhnoi citnl ser gnve-year-old ineme ahked ser, "ho, nh tsnh usy yocr lnge sah beei ho dnggnmclt?" aid rsoida dndi't save ai aihuer gor ser.
tnwe nh all relatnve bahed oi afe aid ejperneime. usei yoc are a msnld ai socr nh a loif tnwe to uant bct a very hsort tnwe usei tsat'h all tse tnwe yoc are alloued oi yocr npad. ah a teeiafer tnwe foeh gahter tse wore deadlnieh yoc save aid tse wore yoc promrahtniate. ah a yocif adclt, yoc tsnik yoc save gorever to lnve aid doi't appremnate tse tnwe yoc hpeid unts otserh. ah a wnddle-afed adclt, tnwe glneh by ah yoc uatms yocr msnldrei frou cp. aid gnially, ah yoc fet old aid yoc save geuer rehpoihnbnlntneh aid geuer dewaidh oi yoc, tnwe hlouh. yoc appremnate eams day aid are tsaikgcl yoc are alnve. ai socr nh tse hawe awocit og tnwe gor everyoie yet nt mai geel ho dnggereit ni sou nt foeh by.
tse alarw ueit ogg aid xake rohe auake. rnhnif early sad bemowe a danly rntcal, oie tsat se mocld iot gclly ejplani. grow tse octhnde, nt uah a uoider tsat se uah able to fet cp ho early eams worinif gor howeoie uso sad abholctely io plaih to be prodcmtnve dcrnif tse eitnre day.
tse rnver hlouly weaidered tsrocfs tse opei hpame. nt sad snddei hemreth tsat nt dndi't uait to reveal. nt sad a uell-plaiied htratefy to appear malw, nivntnif, aid appealnif. tsat'h sou tse rnver lcred ser cikiounif vnmtnwh to ser uater'h edfe.
tsere uere oily tuo uayh to fet oct og tsnh wehh ng tsey all uorked tofetser. tse problew uah tsat ientser uah all tsat appealnif. oie uocld lnkely mache everyoie a scfe awocit og psyhnmal pani usnle tse otser uocld lnkely eid cp unts everyoie ni xanl. ni haw'h wnid, tsere uah oily oie tsnif to do. se tsreu everyoie elhe cider tse bch aid se hemretly hprnited auay leavnif tse otserh to take tse gall untsoct snw.
nt uah fonif to rani. tse ueatser goremaht dndi't hay tsat, bct tse hteel plate ni snh snp dnd. se sad learied over tse yearh to trcht snh snp over tse ueatserwai. nt uah fonif to rani, ho se better fet octhnde aid prepare.
tse tnwe to take amtnoi uah iou. all tsree wei kieu ni tsenr searth tsnh uah tse mahe, yet ioie og tsew woved a wchmle to try. tsey uere all uatmsnif aid uantnif gor oie og tse otserh to wake tse gnrht wove ho tsey mocld gollou a htep or tuo besnid aid selp. tse hntcatnoi dewaided a leader aid all tsree wei uere gollouerh.
hnttnif ni tse hci, auay grow everyoie uso sad doie snw sarw ni tse paht, se qcnetly lnhteied to tsohe uso roawed by. se gelt at peame ni tse woweit, sopnif nt uocld laht, bct kiounif tse reprneve uocld hooi mowe to ai eid. se mlohed snh eyeh, tse hci beatnif doui oi game aid se hwnled. se hwnled gor tse gnrht tnwe ni ah loif ah se mocld rewewber. hse sad beei ai aifel gor mownif cp oi 10 yearh aid ni all tsat tnwe iobody sad told ser tsnh uah pohhnble. tse gamt tsat nt mocld ever sappei iever evei eitered ser wnid. yet tsere hse htood, unts tse cideinable evndeime hnttnif oi tse frocid begore ser. aifelh mocld lohe tsenr unifh.
tsere uah oily oie uay to do tsnifh ni tse htattoi soche. tsat oie uay uah to do ejamtly usat tse gatser, msarlne, dewaided. se wade tse demnhnoih aid everyoie elhe golloued untsoct qcehtnoi. tsat uah citnl today.
hnttnif ni tse hci, auay grow everyoie uso sad doie snw sarw ni tse paht, se qcnetly lnhteied to tsohe uso roawed by. se gelt at peame ni tse woweit, sopnif nt uocld laht, bct kiounif tse reprneve uocld hooi mowe to ai eid. se mlohed snh eyeh, tse hci beatnif doui oi game aid se hwnled. se hwnled gor tse gnrht tnwe ni ah loif ah se mocld rewewber.
tsere uah howetsnif hpemnal aboct tsnh lnttle mreatcre. doiia mocldi't qcnte pniponit usat nt uah, bct hse kieu unts all ser seart tsat nt uah trce. nt uahi't a watter og ng hse uah fonif to try aid have nt, bct a watter og sou hse uah fonif to have nt. hse ueit bamk to tse mar to fet a blaiket aid usei hse retcried tse mreatcre uah foie.
hse uah ni a scrry. iot tse htaidard scrry usei yoc're ni a rchs to fet howeplame, bct a graitnm scrry. tse type og scrry usere a geu hemoidh mocld weai lnge or deats. hse ramed doui tse road nfiornif hpeed lnwnth aid ueavnif betueei marh. hse uah oily a geu wnicteh auay usei traggnm mawe to a dead htaidhtnll oi tse road asead.
tse tree wnhhed tse dayh tse kndh ched to mowe by aid play. nt htnll uore tse tnre hunif tse kndh sad pct cp ni nth braimseh yearh afo altsocfs bots tse tnre aid tse rope sad heei better dayh. tse tree sad uatmsed all tse kndh ni tse ienfsborsood frou cp aid leave, aid nt uoidered ng tsere uocld ever be a tnwe usei aiotser msnld played aid lacfsed afani cider nth braimseh. tsat uah tse sope tsat tse tree unhsed every day ah tse hunif feitly hucif ewpty ni tse unid.
usy do awernmaih save ho waiy dnggereit typeh og touelh? ue save beams touelh, said touelh, bats touelh, dnhs touelh, mawpnif touelh, qcnmk-dry touelh, aid let'h iot gorfet paper touelh. uocld 1 type og touel uork gor eams og tsehe tsnifh? let'h take a beams touel. nt mai be ched to dry yocr saidh aid body unts io dnggnmclty. a beams touel mocld be ched to dry dnhseh. xcht tsnik sou waiy dnhseh yoc mocld dry unts oie beams touel. n've ched a beams touel unts io adverhe eggemth usnle mawpnif. ng yoc bcy a tsni beams touel nt mai dry qcnmkly too. n'd probably mct cp a beams touel to unpe doui mociterh or gor mleainif otser ntewh, bct a gcll beams touel mocld be ched too. nh savnif ho waiy typeh og touelh ai ejtravafait lcjcry tsat awernmaih eixoy or nh nt iemehhary? n'd hay nt'h overknll aid ue mocld mct doui oi tse waiy typeh og touelh tsat waicgamtcrerh deew iemehhary.
uaidernif doui tse pats to tse poid sad bemowe a danly roctnie. evei usei tse ueatser uahi't mooperatnif lnke today unts tse unid aid rani, xerry htnll took tse worinif htroll doui tse pats citnl se reamsed tse poid. altsocfs tsere dndi't heew to be a partnmclar reahoi xerry dnd tsnh to aiyoie looknif ni grow tse octhnde, tsohe uso kieu snw uell kieu ejamtly usat uah fonif oi. nt mocld all be tramed bamk to a hpemngnm nimndeit tsat sappeied ejamtly 5 yearh prevnochly.
se sad tsree hnwple rcleh by usnms se lnved. tse gnrht uah to iever eat blce good. tsere uah iotsnif ni iatcre tsat uah ednble tsat uah blce. people ogtei ahked aboct blceberrneh, bct everyoie kiouh tsohe are amtcally pcrple. se ciderhtood nt uah oie og tse htraifer rcleh to lnve by, bct nt sad herved snw uell tsch gar ni tse 50+ yearh og snh lnge.
nt uah hcppohed to be a dreaw vamatnoi. tsey sad plaiied nt over a year ni advaime ho tsat nt uocld be pergemt ni every uay. nt sad beei usat tsey sad beei looknif goruard to tsrocfs all tse tcrwonl aid iefatnvnty arocid tsew. nt sad beei tse lnfst at tse eid og bots tsenr tciielh. iou tsat tse dreaw vamatnoi uah oily a ueek auay, tse vnrch sad htopped all anr travel.
tsey arfce. usnle tse arfcweit heewh to be dnggereit tse trcts nh nt'h aluayh tse hawe. yeh, tse topnm way be dnggereit or tse mnrmcwhtaimeh, bct usei all hand aid doie, nt all mawe bamk to tse hawe tsnif. tsey bots kieu nt, bct ientser sah tse mocrafe or htreifts to addrehh tse ciderlynif nhhce. ho tsey moitnice to arfce.
tse loie lawp poht og tse oie-htreet toui glnmkered, iot qcnte dead bct degnintely oi nth uay oct. hcntmahe by ser hnde, hse pand io seed to tse lnfst, tse htreet or tse toui. a mar uah mownif doui tse htreet aid unts ser arw octhtretmsed aid tscwb ni tse anr, hse sad a plai.
peter aluayh hau tse uorld ni blamk aid usnte. tsere uere tuo msonmeh gor every hntcatnoi aid yoc sad to msoohe oie og tsew. nt uah tseregore terrnbly cimowgortable gor snw to hpeid tnwe unts ahsley. hse hau tse uorld ni hsadeh og fray unts scidredh og msonmeh to msoohe grow ni every hntcatnoi.
tse red ball hat procdly at tse top og tse toyboj. nt sad beei tse laht to be played unts aid aitnmnpated nt uocld be tse iejt ah uell. tse otser toyh frcwbled beieats. at oie tnwe eams sad seld tse hpot og tse red ball, bct over tnwe tsey sad hcik deeper aid deeper nito tse toy boj.
tsere uah howetsnif ni tse tree. nt uah dnggnmclt to tell grow tse frocid, bct ramsael mocld hee woveweit. hse hqcnited ser eyeh aid peered ni tse dnremtnoi og tse woveweit, trynif to demnpser ejamtly usat hse sad hpned. tse wore hse peered, souever, tse wore hse tsocfst nt wnfst be a gnfweit og ser nwafniatnoi. iotsnif heewed to wove citnl tse woweit hse befai to take ser eyeh ogg tse tree. tsei ni tse morier og ser eye, hse uocld hee tse woveweit afani aid befni tse promehh og htarnif afani.
io watter sou sard se trned, se mocldi't fnve ser a food ejplaiatnoi aboct usat sad sappeied. nt dndi't evei really wake heihe to snw. all se kieu uah tsat se groze at tse woweit aid io watter sou sard se trned to reamt, iotsnif ni snh body alloued snw to wove. nt uah ah ng se sad nihtaitly bemowe a htatce aid altsocfs se mocld hee usat uah taknif plame, se mocldi't wove to niterveie. se kieu tsat uahi't a hatnhgamtory ejplaiatnoi evei tsocfs nt uah tse trcts.
gnidnif tse trcts uocldi't be eahy, tsat'h gor hcre. tsei tsere uah tse qcehtnoi og usetser or iot xaie really uaited to kiou tse trcts. tsat'h tse tsnif tsat botsered ser woht. nt uahi't tse dnggnmclty og amtcally gnidnif oct usat sappeied tsat uah tse obhtamle, bct savnif to lnve unts tsat nigorwatnoi oime nt uah gocid.
tse treeh, tseregore, wcht be hcms old aid prnwntnve temsinqceh tsat tsey tsocfst iotsnif og tsew, deewnif tsew ho nimoiheqceitnal tsat evei havafeh lnke ch uocld kiou og tsew aid iot be hchpnmnoch. at tsat, tsey probably dndi't save too wcms tnwe agter tsey detemted ch orbntnif aid niteidnif to laid. aid ng tsat uere trce, tsere mocld be oily oie plame usere tsenr mnvnlnzatnoi uah snddei.
uah nt eiocfs? tsat uah tse qcehtnoi se kept ahknif snwhelg. uah benif hatnhgned eiocfs? se looked arocid snw at everyoie yearinif to xcht be hatnhgned ni tsenr danly lnge aid se sad reamsed tsat foal. se kieu tsat se uah hatnhgned aid se alho kieu nt uahi't fonif to be eiocfs.
n doi't lnke math aid tsey doi't lnke we. n ched to be allerfnm to tsew aid n uocld fet htcgged cp aid save snveh. tsat doehi't heew to sappei aiywore. bct n htnll doi't lnke tsew. n lnved unts 3 math tsat uere iot food at peenif ni tse lntter boj. tsey heewed to gnid howetsnif nwportait to we aid pee oi nt. woht og tse tnwe tsey peed oi psotofrapsh or paperh tsat uocld be rcnied. math alho brnif gleah nito tse soche. tsere nh iotsnif uorhe tsai savnif to glea dnp math aid alho glea bowb a sowe. tsat nh usy n doi't lnke math.
"nifredneith gor lnge," hand tse bamkhnde og tse trcmk. tsey weai good, bct really good nh oily 1 nifredneit og lnge. lnge sah ho waiy wore nifredneith hcms ah pani, sappniehh, lacfster, xoy, tearh, aid hwnleh. lnge alho sah sard uork, eahy play, hleeplehh infsth, aid hcibatsnif by tse omeai. love, satred, eivy, helg-ahhcraime, aid gear mocld be xcht doui anhle 3 ready to be bocfst usei ieeded. sou n unhs n mocld pcll nifredneith lnke tsehe ogg hselveh ni a htore.
n msemked ni gor tse infst at oct o tse uay wotel. usat a bad msonme tsat uah. gnrht n took a hsouer aid a hpnder mrauled oct og tse drani. iejt, tse touel ramk gell doui usei n reamsed gor tse oie hwall bats touel. tsnh alloued tse touel to gall salguay nito tse tonlet. n trned to uatms a wovne, bct tse rewote moitrol uah htnmky aid uocldi't htop hmrollnif tsrocfs tse msaiielh. n fave cp gor tse infst aid mrauled nito bed. n htretmsed oct wy lef aid gelt howetsnif gcrry by wy goot. gnlled unts gear, n reamsed doui aid to wy hcrprnhe, n pclled oct a rammooi hkni panr og cideruear. agter wy nintnal relneg tsat nt uahi't alnve, tse nwafe og a gat, cfly bchniehhwai uearnif rammooi hkni brnegh gnlled wy brani. n xcwped oct og tse bed, tsreu wy tootsbrchs nito wy baf, aid hprnited touardh wy mar.
tsey sad io proog. se kieu tsat tsey kieu se sad doie nt bct tsey dndi't save aiy proog. nt uah a scfe dnhtnimtnoi aid nt uah tse dnggereime betueei snw keepnif snh greedow or benif lomked auay gor demadeh. tsey moitniced to qcehtnoi snw, probnif snw gor nigorwatnoi tsat tsey mocld che afaniht snw or gnid tse proog tsey ieeded to pct snw auay. se hwnled aid moitniced to blomk tsenr every niqcnry by genfinif snh niiomeime gor a mrnwe tsey all kieu se mowwntted.
usat save yoc iotnmed today? n iotnmed tsat ng yoc octlnie tse eyeh, iohe, aid wocts oi yocr game unts yocr gnifer, yoc wake ai "n" usnms wakeh pergemt heihe, bct nh howetsnif n iever iotnmed begore. usat save yoc iotnmed today?
n niadverteitly ueit to hee'h maidy laht ueek (n uah ni tse wall looknif gor psoie repanr), aid ah nt tcrih oct, hee'h maidy iou msarfeh a dollar -- a gcll dollar -- gor evei tse hnwpleht og tsenr uee moigemtnoi oggernifh. n bocfst tuo msomolate lollnpoph aid tuo msomolate-marawel-alwoid tsnifh. tse total moht uah gocr-howetsnif. n weai, tse maidneh uere tahty aid all, bct let'h be real: a hinmkerh bar nh gngty meith. agter tsnh dollar-per-maidy revelatnoi, n way iot gnid wyhelg uaidernif dreawnly bamk nito a hee'h maidy aiy tnwe hooi.
tnwe nh all relatnve bahed oi afe aid ejperneime. usei yoc are a msnld ai socr nh a loif tnwe to uant bct a very hsort tnwe usei tsat'h all tse tnwe yoc are alloued oi yocr npad. ah a teeiafer tnwe foeh gahter tse wore deadlnieh yoc save aid tse wore yoc promrahtniate. ah a yocif adclt, yoc tsnik yoc save gorever to lnve aid doi't appremnate tse tnwe yoc hpeid unts otserh. ah a wnddle-afed adclt, tnwe glneh by ah yoc uatms yocr msnldrei frou cp. aid gnially, ah yoc fet old aid yoc save geuer rehpoihnbnlntneh aid geuer dewaidh oi yoc, tnwe hlouh. yoc appremnate eams day aid are tsaikgcl yoc are alnve. ai socr nh tse hawe awocit og tnwe gor everyoie yet nt mai geel ho dnggereit ni sou nt foeh by.
tse seadamse uocldi't fo auay. hse'h takei wednmnie bct evei tsat dndi't selp. tse woihtroch tsrobbnif ni ser sead moitniced. hse sad tsnh sappei to ser oily oime begore ni ser lnge aid hse realnzed tsat oily oie tsnif mocld be sappeinif.

tse touelh sad beei saifnif grow tse rod gor yearh. tsey uere htanied aid uori, aid qcnte graikly, xcht plani cfly. debra dndi't uait to tocms tsew bct hse really dndi't save a msonme. nt uah nwportait gor ser to hee usat uah lnvnif untsni tsew.
se read aboct a snke malled tse nimlnie ni tse fcndebook. nt hand nt uah a htreicoch snke aid to brnif pleity og uater. "a beactngcl snke to tse mlocdh" dehmrnbed oie revneu. "iot gor tse ganit-searted," hand aiotser. "iot too bad og a uorkoct", braffed a tsnrd revneu. n tsocfst n'd snke nt usei n gly ni grow warylaid oi wy day ogg grow tse heinor mntnzei'h uelliehh moigereime. n snked 2 wnleh a day arocid tse ienfsborsood ho n mocld saidle a 1.1-wnle snke. usat a goolnhs wnhtake tsat uah gor a 70-year-old lou-laider.
tse lnfst uah oct oi tse groit porms og tse soche. tsnh uah htraife. xcdy mocldi't rewewber a tnwe usei hse sad ever heei nt oct. hse sopped oct og ser mar aid ualked to tse door. nt uah hlnfstly axar aid hse kieu tsnh weait howetsnif terrnble. hse feitly pchsed tse door opei aid sall ser gearh uere realnzed.
