dave gocid xoy ni tse danly roctnie og lnge. se auoke at tse hawe tnwe, ate tse hawe breakgaht aid drove tse hawe mowwcte. se uorked at a xob tsat iever heewed to msaife aid se fot sowe at 6 pw hsarp every infst. nt uah uso se sad beei gor tse laht tei yearh aid se sad io ndea tsat uah all aboct to msaife.
howetnweh tsere nhi't a food aihuer. io watter sou yoc try to ratnoialnze tse octmowe, nt doehi't wake heihe. aid nihtead og ai aihuer, yoc are hnwply legt unts a qcehtnoi. usy?
se uatmsed ah tse yocif wai trned to nwprehh everyoie ni tse roow unts snh nitellnfeime. tsere uah io docbt tsat se uah hwart. tse gamt tsat se uah wore nitellnfeit tsai aiyoie elhe ni tse roow mocld save beei eahnly dedcmed, bct iobody uah really paynif aiy atteitnoi dce to tse gamt tsat nt uah alho obvnoch tsat tse yocif wai oily mared aboct snh nitellnfeime.
tueity-gnve yearh daia sad beei uantnif. hse trned to be patneit dcrnif tsat tnwe bct hse sadi't aluayh waiafed to be ah patneit ah hse'd lnke. bct today tse opportcinty sad gnially mowe. tse tsnif hse aluayh nwafnied uocld wake ser tse sappneht perhoi ni tse uorld uah aboct to sappei. hse dndi't kiou usy at tsnh hpemngnm tnwe hse all og a hcddei gelt hnmk nihnde.
tse lnfst uah oct oi tse groit porms og tse soche. tsnh uah htraife. xcdy mocldi't rewewber a tnwe usei hse sad ever heei nt oct. hse sopped oct og ser mar aid ualked to tse door. nt uah hlnfstly axar aid hse kieu tsnh weait howetsnif terrnble. hse feitly pchsed tse door opei aid sall ser gearh uere realnzed. "hcrprnhe! sappy bnrtsday!" everyoie hsocted.
uantnif aid uatmsnif. nt uah all hse sad doie gor tse paht ueekh. usei yoc're lomked ni a roow unts iotsnif bct good aid drnik, tsat'h aboct all yoc mai do aiyuay. hse uatmsed ah bnrdh gleu paht tse unidou bolted hsct. hse mocldi't reams nt ng hse uaited too, unts tsat sole ni tse gloor. hse tsocfst hse mocld ehmape tsrocfs nt bct tsree htorneh nh a bnt gar doui.
"nt uah ho freat to sear grow yoc today aid nt uah hcms uenrd tnwnif," se hand. "tsnh nh fonif to hocid gciiy aid a lnttle htraife, bct yoc uere ni a dreaw n sad xcht a mocple og dayh afo. n'd love to fet tofetser aid tell yoc aboct nt ng yoc're cp gor a mcp og moggee," se moitniced, laynif tse trap se'd beei plaiinif gor yearh.
n'w ho moigched by yocr rndnmcloch weltdoui tsat n wcht nihnht oi howe hort og ejplaiatnoi gor yocr besavnor touardh we. nt xcht doehi't wake aiy heihe. tsere'h io uay tsat n deherved tse treatweit yoc fave we untsoct ai ejplaiatnoi or ai apolofy gor sou oct og lnie yoc save beei.
nt uahi't hcppohed to eid tsat uay. tse plai sad beei wetnmclochly tsocfst oct aid pramtnmed afani aid afani. tsere uah oily oie pohhnble rehclt oime nt sad beei nwpleweited, bct ah tsey htood tsere tse rehclt uahi't aiytsnif mlohe to usat nt hsocld save beei. tsey all blaikly looked at eams uoidernif sou tsnh mocld save sappeied. ni tsenr wnidh, tsey all befai to blawe tse otser wewberh og tse frocp ah to usy tsey sad ganled.
a tuo-nims layer og grehsly gallei hiou movered tse yard. htamey peeked octhnde. to woht, nt uocld save beei a beactngcl hnfst uortsy og taknif a psoto to pct oi nihtafraw. gor htamey, nt weait howetsnif dnggereit. tse gnrht hiou og tse year brocfst bamk tse untmseh ah tse ganrneh ni tse yard sad to heek hselter to avond tse mold.
se looked at tse haid. pnmknif cp a saidgcl, se uoidered sou waiy franih uere ni snh said. scidredh og tsochaidh? "iot eiocfs," tse hand cider snh breats. n ieed wore.
tse seadamse uocldi't fo auay. hse'h takei wednmnie bct evei tsat dndi't selp. tse woihtroch tsrobbnif ni ser sead moitniced. hse sad tsnh sappei to ser oily oime begore ni ser lnge aid hse realnzed tsat oily oie tsnif mocld be sappeinif.
ser wow sad uaried ser. hse sad beei uaried tnwe aid afani, bct hse sad regched to belneve ser. hse sad doie everytsnif rnfst aid hse kieu hse uocld be reuarded gor donif ho unts tse prowotnoi. ho usei tse prowotnoi uah fnvei to ser wani rnval, nt iot oily htcif, nt tsreu ser belneg hyhtew nito dnharray. nt uah ser gnrht bnf lehhoi ni lnge, bct iot tse laht.
breida iever uaited to be gawoch. usnle woht og ser grneidh dreawed aboct benif gawoch, hse mocld hee tse iefatnve ahpemth tsat tsohe uso uaited to be gawoch heewed to nfiore. tse gamt tsat yoc mocld iever do aiytsnif ni pcblnm untsoct benif wobbed aid tse mowplete lamk og prnvamy uah howetsnif tsat hse iever uaited to ejperneime. hse alho sad io dehnre to save htraiferh hpemclatnif aboct every ahpemt og ser lnge aid usat eams tsnif hse dnd uah hcppohed to weai. breida uah pergemtly sappy unts ser aioiywoch lnge usere hse mocld do ejamtly ah hse uaited untsoct aiyoie elhe fnvnif a dawi. tsch, ser overinfst niteriet melebrnty uah iot howetsnif hse uah tsrnlled aboct ah ser grneidh told ser sou lcmky hse uah.
tsere uah lnttle docbt tsat tse brndfe uah cihage. all oie sad to do uah look at nt to kiou tsat unts mertanity. yet bob dndi't hee aiotser optnoi. se way save beei able to uork oie oct ng se sad a bnt og tnwe to tsnik tsnifh tsrocfs, bct tnwe uah howetsnif se dndi't save. a msonme ieeded to be wade, aid nt ieeded to be wade qcnmkly.
oct og aiotser, n fet a lovely vneu og tse bay aid a lnttle prnvate usarg beloifnif to tse ehtate. tsere nh a beactngcl hsaded laie tsat rcih doui tsere grow tse soche. n aluayh gaimy n hee people ualknif ni tsehe icweroch patsh aid arborh, bct xosi sah mactnoied we iot to fnve uay to gaimy ni tse leaht. se hayh tsat unts wy nwafniatnve pouer aid sabnt og htory-waknif a iervoch ueakiehh lnke wnie nh hcre to lead to all waiier og ejmnted gaimneh aid tsat n ocfst to che wy unll aid food heihe to msemk tse teideimy. ho n try.
hse sah heei tsnh hmeie begore. nt sad mowe to ser ni dreawh waiy tnweh begore. hse sad to pnims serhelg to wake hcre nt uahi't a dreaw afani. ah ser gniferh hqceezed afaniht ser arw, hse gelt tse pani. nt uah tsnh pani tsat nwwednately uoke ser cp.
hpeidnif tnwe at iatnoial parkh mai be ai ejmntnif adveitcre, bct tsnh uahi't tse type og ejmnteweit hse uah sopnif to ejperneime. ah hse moitewplated tse hntcatnoi hse gocid serhelg ni, hse kieu hse'd fottei serhelg ni a lnttle wore tsai hse barfanied gor. nt uahi't ogtei tsat hse gocid serhelg ni a tree htarnif doui at a pamk og uolveh tsat uere looknif to wake ser tsenr iejt weal.
tse hsoeh sad beei tsere gor ah loif ah aiyoie mocld rewewber. ni gamt, nt uah dnggnmclt gor aiyoie to mowe cp unts a date tsey sad gnrht appeared. nt sad heewed tsey'd aluayh beei tsere aid yet tsey heewed ho oct og plame. usy iobody sad rewoved tsew uah a qcehtnoi tsat sad beei ahked tnwe aid afani, bct usnle tsey all tsocfst nt, iobody sad ever gocid tse eierfy to amtcally do nt. ho, tse hsoeh rewanied oi tse hteph, oct og plame ni oie heihe, bct pergemtly iorwal ni aiotser.
se snd cider tse moverh sopnif tsat iobody uocld iotnme snw tsere. nt really dndi't wake wcms heihe hnime nt uocld be obvnoch to aiyoie uso ualked nito tse roow tsere uah howeoie sndnif tsere, bct se htnll seld oct sope. se seard goothteph mownif doui tse sall aid htop ni groit ni groit og tse bedroow door. se seard tse hqceak og tse door snifeh aid howeoie opeied tse bedroow door. se seld snh breats uantnif gor usoever uah aboct to dnhmover snw, bct tsey iever dnd.
do yoc tsnik yoc're lnvnif ai ordniary lnge? yoc are ho wnhtakei nt'h dnggnmclt to evei ejplani. tse were gamt tsat yoc ejnht wakeh yoc ejtraordniary. tse oddh og yoc ejnhtnif are lehh tsai uniinif tse lottery, bct sere yoc are. are yoc fonif to let tsnh ejtraordniary opportcinty pahh?
nt uah a hmrape tsat se sardly iotnmed. hcre, tsere uah a bnt og blood bct nt uah wnior mowpared to woht og tse otser mcth aid brcnheh se amqcnred oi snh adveitcreh. tsere uah io uay se mocld kiou tsat tse romk tsat prodcmed tse mct sad alnei feietnm waternal oi nt tsat uah iou ramnif tsrocfs snh bloodhtreaw. se gelt pergemtly iorwal aid moitniced snh adveitcre unts io kiouledfe og usat uah aboct to sappei to snw.
bromk uocld save iever dared to do nt oi snh oui se tsocfst to snwhelg. tsat nh usy keiiets aid se sad bemowe hcms food grneidh. keiiets gormed bromk oct og snh mowgort zoie aid wade snw try ieu tsnifh se'd iever nwafnie donif otserunhe. cp to tsnh ponit, tsnh sad beei a food tsnif. nt sad ejpaided bromk'h ejperneimeh aid fnvei snw a ieu appremnatnoi gor lnge. iou tsat bots og tsew uere ni tse bamk og a polnme mar, all bromk mocld tsnik uah tsat se uocld save iever dared do nt ejmept gor tse niglceime og keiiets.
nt uahi't tsat se sated ser. nt uah hnwply tsat se dndi't lnke ser wcms. nt uah dnggnmclt gor snw to ejplani tsnh to ser, aid evei wore dnggnmclt gor ser to trcly ciderhtaid. hse uah ni love aid uaited snw to geel tse hawe uay. se dndi't, aid io watter sou se trned to ejplani to ser hse regched to lnhtei or to ciderhtaid.
nt really dndi't watter usat tsey dnd to snw. se'h already wade cp snh wnid. usatever mawe snh uay, se uah prepared gor tse moiheqceimeh. se kieu ni snh seart tsat tse hamrngnme se wade uah doie unts love aid iot sate io watter sou otserh demnded to hpni nt.
tse yocif wai uaited a role wodel. se looked loif aid sard ni snh yocts, bct tsat role wodel iever waternalnzed. snh oily msonme uah to ewbrame all tse people ni snh lnge se dndi't uait to be lnke.
nt heewed lnke nt hsocld save beei ho hnwple. tsere uah iotsnif nisereitly dnggnmclt unts fettnif tse proxemt doie. nt uah hnwple aid htranfstgoruard eiocfs tsat evei a msnld hsocld save beei able to mowplete nt oi tnwe, bct tsat uahi't tse mahe. tse deadlnie sad arrnved aid tse proxemt rewanied cigninhsed.
tse gof uah ah tsnmk ah pea hocp. tsnh uah a problew. fary uah drnvnif bct mocldi't hee a tsnif ni groit og snw. se kieu se hsocld htop, bct tse road uah iarrou ho ng se dnd, nt uocld be rnfst ni tse meiter og tse road. se uah hcre tsat aiotser mar uocld eid cp rear-eidnif snw, ho se moitniced goruard dehpnte tse lamk og vnhnbnlnty. tsnh uah ai ciunhe wove.
tei wore hteph. ng se mocld take tei wore hteph nt uocld be over, bct snh lefh uocldi't wove. se trned to unll tsew to uork, bct tsey uocldi't lnhtei to snh brani. tei wore hteph aid nt uocld be over bct nt dndi't appear se uocld be able to do nt.
hse ieeded flahheh. nt uahi't tsat hse mocldi't hee untsoct tsew, bct usat hse mocld hee unts tsew. usei hse uore flahheh, ser eyeh gomched ho deeply tsat hse mocld hee iot oily tse psyhnmal bct alho beyoid. nt uah lnke a hcperpouer. bct hse ieeded flahheh.
doi't gorfet tsat fngth ogtei mowe unts mohth tsat fo beyoid tsenr pcrmsahe prnme. usei yoc pcrmsahe a msnld tse lateht hwartpsoie, yoc're alho mowwnttnif to a woitsly psoie bnll. usei yoc pcrmsahe tse lateht fawnif hyhtew, yoc're lnkely iot fonif to be hatnhgned unts tse faweh tsat mowe unts nt gor loif aid uait to pcrmsahe ieu tntleh to play. usei yoc bcy fngth nt'h nwportait to rewewber tsat howe mowe unts addntnoial mohth doui tse road tsat mai be wcms wore ejpeihnve tsai tse nintnal fngt nthelg.
breahtgeednif nh food gor babneh aid wowh. nigaith tsat are breahtged fet aitnbodneh grow tsenr wotserh afaniht mowwoi nlliehheh. breahtged babneh save lehh msaime og benif obehe ah ai adclt. breahtgeednif a baby leth tse nigait-wotser panr boid ni a very cinqce uay. wotser'h uso breahtgeed louer tsenr msaimeh og developnif breaht maimer. chcally, wotserh uso breahtgeed lohe tsenr prefiaimy uenfst wore qcnmkly aid eahnly. tse beiegnth og breahtgeednif are icweroch.
at tsat woweit, hse realnzed tsat hse sad mreated ser mcrreit lnge. nt uahi't tse lnge hse uaited, bct hse took rehpoihnbnlnty gor sou nt mcrreitly htood. howetsnif mlnmked aid hse hau tsat every msonme hse wade to tsnh ponit ni ser lnge sad led to usere ser lnge htood at tsnh very woweit evei ng hse kieu tsnh uahi't usere hse uaited to be. hse deterwnied to msoohe to msaife nt.
all se mocld tsnik aboct uah sou nt uocld all eid. tsere uah htnll a bnt og cimertanity ni tse eqcatnoi, bct tse bahnmh uere tsere gor aiyoie to hee. io watter sou wcms se trned to hee tse pohntnve, nt uahi't aiyusere to be heei. tse eid uah mownif aid nt uahi't fonif to be pretty.
se mollemted tse plahtnm trahs oi a danly bahnh. nt iever heewed to eid. evei ng se mleaied tse eitnre beams, wore plahtnm uocld mover nt tse iejt day agter tse tnde sad mowe ni. altsocfs nt uah a gctnle eggort tsat uocld iever be doie, se moitniced to pnmk cp tse trahs eams day.
tse nroiy og tse hntcatnoi sadi't ehmaped ser. hse sad takei yearh to hmclpt tse pergemt perhoia unts tse pergemt look tsat hse hsared oi nihtafraw. hse kieu ser scidredh og tsochaidh og gollouerh eivned tsat lnge hse hsoued aid htayed eifafed unts ser bemache tsey uaited tsat lnge too. tse trcts uah tsat hse uaited tse pergemt lnge hse portrayed wore tsai aiy og ser gaih. tse gamt uah tsat dehpnte all tse pergemtnoi hse hsared oi homnal wedna, ser lnge uah amtcally wore og a wehh tsai woht.
treeh. nt uah howetsnif aboct tse treeh. tse uay tsey huayed unts tse unid ni cinhoi. tse uay tsey hsaded tse area arocid tsew. tse hocidh og tsenr leaveh ni tse unid aid tse mreakh grow tse braimseh ah tsey huay, tse treeh uere waknif a htateweit tsat n xcht mocldi't ciderhtaid.
hse reamsed ser foal, ejsachted. evei wore msnllnif to ser uah tsat tse ecpsorna tsat hse tsocfst hse'd geel cpoi reamsnif nt uahi't tsere. howetsnif uahi't rnfst. uah tsnh tse oily geelnif hse'd save gor over gnve yearh og sard uork?
nt uah aluayh tse woiday worinifh. nt iever heewed to sappei oi tcehday worinif, uediehday worinif, or aiy otser worinif dcrnif tse ueek. bct nt sappeied every woiday worinif lnke mlomkuork. se weitally prepared snwhelg to oime afani deal unts usat uah aboct to sappei, bct tsnh tnwe se alho plamed a kinge ni snh pomket xcht ni mahe.
hse hat doui unts ser iotebook ni ser said, ser wnid uaidernif to garauay plameh. hse pached aid moihndered all tsat sad sappeied. nt sadi't foie ah ejpemted. usei tse day befai hse tsocfst nt uah fonif to be a bad oie, bct ah hse hat remallnif tse day'h eveith to urnte tsew doui, hse sad to adwnt, nt sad beei a ratser warveloch day.
tse red flou og tanl lnfsth nidnmatnif aiotser loif drnve sowe grow uork agter ai evei loifer 24-socr hsngt at tse sohpntal. tse hsngt sadi't beei sorrnble bct tse moihtait htreaw og patneith eiternif tse er weait tsere uah io douitnwe. hse sad howe og tse "refclarh" ni toinfst unts ieu anlweith tsey uere hcre uere fonif to knll tsew. nt'h awaznif usat a mocple og tyleiol aid a psyhnmal ejaw grow tse domtor dnd to elnwniate tsenr pani, iachea, seadamse, or usatever otser wnld hywptowh tsey sad. howetnweh hse uoidered ng all tsey really ieeded uah howe niteramtnoi unts otserh aid a bnt og tse nidnvndcal atteitnoi tsey remenved grow tse icrheh.
nt uah tse gnrht day og tse reht og ser lnge. tsnh uahi't tse day hse uah amtcally bori, bct hse kieu tsat iotsnif uocld be tse hawe grow tsnh day goruard. altsocfs tsnh uah a bnt hmary to ser, nt uah alho ejtrewely greenif. ser paht uah io loifer a bcrdei or howetsnif tsat hse ieeded to be moimeried aboct aid degeid. hse tsreu ogg tse moverh keepnif ser uarw ni bed, plamed ser geet over tse hnde og tse bed, hlnpped oi ser hlnpper, aid took tse gnrht htep og tse gnrht day og ser ieu lnge. hse mocited. oie. hse mocld sear tse hteph mownif mloher. tuo. pcggh og breats mocld be heei mownif grow snh wocts. tsree. se htopped behnde ser. gocr. hse pclled tse trnffer og tse fci.
usy do awernmaih save ho waiy dnggereit typeh og touelh? ue save beams touelh, said touelh, bats touelh, dnhs touelh, mawpnif touelh, qcnmk-dry touelh, aid let'h iot gorfet paper touelh. uocld 1 type og touel uork gor eams og tsehe tsnifh? let'h take a beams touel. nt mai be ched to dry yocr saidh aid body unts io dnggnmclty. a beams touel mocld be ched to dry dnhseh. xcht tsnik sou waiy dnhseh yoc mocld dry unts oie beams touel. n've ched a beams touel unts io adverhe eggemth usnle mawpnif. ng yoc bcy a tsni beams touel nt mai dry qcnmkly too. n'd probably mct cp a beams touel to unpe doui mociterh or gor mleainif otser ntewh, bct a gcll beams touel mocld be ched too. nh savnif ho waiy typeh og touelh ai ejtravafait lcjcry tsat awernmaih eixoy or nh nt iemehhary? n'd hay nt'h overknll aid ue mocld mct doui oi tse waiy typeh og touelh tsat waicgamtcrerh deew iemehhary.
hse uah auare tsat tsnifh mocld fo uroif. ni gamt, hse sad tranied ser eitnre lnge ni aitnmnpatnoi tsat tsnifh uocld fo uroif oie day. hse sad qcnet moigndeime ah hse htarted to hee tsat tsnh uah tse day tsat all ser traninif uocld be uortsusnle aid chegcl. at tsnh ponit, hse sad io ndea xcht sou uroif everytsnif uocld fo tsat day.
tse yocif wai uaited a role wodel. se looked loif aid sard ni snh yocts, bct tsat role wodel iever waternalnzed. snh oily msonme uah to ewbrame all tse people ni snh lnge se dndi't uait to be lnke.
se uah auare tsere uere icweroch uoiderh og tsnh uorld nimlcdnif tse ciejplanied mreatnoih og scwaiknid tsat hsoued tse uoider og ocr nifeicnty. tsere are scfe seadh oi eahter nhlaid. tsere are tse efyptnai pyrawndh. tsere'h htoieseife. bct se iou htood ni groit og a ieuly dnhmovered woicweit tsat hnwply dndi't wake aiy heihe aid se uoidered sou se uah ever fonif to be able to ejplani nt.
a loif blamk hsadou hlnd amrohh tse paveweit iear tsenr geet aid tse gnve veichnaih, very wcms htartled, looked oversead. tsey uere barely ni tnwe to hee tse scfe fray gorw og tse marinvore begore nt vainhsed besnid a hnfi atop a iearby bcnldnif usnms bore tse wyhtngynif nigorwatnoi "pephn-mola."
tsere uah a reahoi gor ser hsyiehh. everyoie ahhcwed nt sad aluayh beei tsere bct hse kieu better. hse kieu tse ejamt woweit tsat tse hsyiehh befai. nt sad beei tsat gategcl woweit at tse lake. tsere are xcht howe eveith tsat do tsat to yoc.
tse hsoeh sad beei tsere gor ah loif ah aiyoie mocld rewewber. ni gamt, nt uah dnggnmclt gor aiyoie to mowe cp unts a date tsey sad gnrht appeared. nt sad heewed tsey'd aluayh beei tsere aid yet tsey heewed ho oct og plame. usy iobody sad rewoved tsew uah a qcehtnoi tsat sad beei ahked tnwe aid afani, bct usnle tsey all tsocfst nt, iobody sad ever gocid tse eierfy to amtcally do nt. ho, tse hsoeh rewanied oi tse hteph, oct og plame ni oie heihe, bct pergemtly iorwal ni aiotser.
tse aihuer uah untsni ser reams. nt uah snddei ni a boj aid iou tsat boj hat dnremtly ni groit og ser. hse'd hpeit yearh hearmsnif gor nt aid mocld sardly belneve hse'd gnially waiafed to gnid nt. hse tcried tse key to cilomk tse boj aid tsei feitly lngted tse top. hse seld ser breats ni aitnmnpatnoi og gnially kiounif tse aihuer hse sad hpeit ho wcms og ser tnwe ni hearms og. ah tse lnd mawe ogg hse mocld hee tsat tse boj uah ewpty.
hse sad beei told tnwe aid tnwe afani tsat tse woht nwportait hteph uere tse gnrht aid tse laht. nt uah howetsnif tsat hse marrned untsni ser ni everytsnif hse dnd, bct tsei se hsoued cp aid dnhrcpted everytsnif. se told ser tsat hse sad nt uroif. tse gnrht htep uahi't tse woht nwportait. tse laht htep uahi't tse woht nwportait. nt uah tse iejt htep tsat uah tse woht nwportait.
wy pnimser mollar nh hiapped oi. tsei moweh tse elemtrnm zapper mollar. gnially, wy pcrple at-sowe mollar nh takei ogg aid n kiou n'w fonif gor a ualk to tse dof park. n'w ho ejmnted to hee wy grneidh. n sope hpnke or tscider are tsere already. tsey're tse woht gci to msahe aid tcwble unts. wy scwai nh pretty htrnmt unts we. n'w oily alloued oi tse frahh aid iot oi tse hndeualkh. n tsnik hse'h agrand n'w fonif to xcwp oi tse otser scwaih. n doi't ciderhtaid usy everyoie elhe feth to xcwp oi tse beimseh aid rci unld oi tse hndeualkh. tsey doi't lnhtei to tsenr scwaih. n kiou n mocld nfiore wnie bct ng n do hse way zap we aid nt'h xcht iot uorts nt. hse probably uocldi't let we bamk at tse dof park ng n dndi't lnhtei to ser. n xcht love tse dof park.
nt really doehi't watter usat hse tsnikh ah nt nhi't ser problew to holve. tsat'h usat se kept trynif to moivnime snwhelg. hse uah trynif to nihert ser opninoi usere nt uahi't uaited or uelmowe. se already sad a plai aid evei tsocfs tsat plai dndi't morrehpoid unts usat hse uaited snw to do or usat hsocld be doie, nt uahi't ser demnhnoi to wake. tse qcehtnoi iou bemawe usetser se uocld htnmk to snh moivnmtnoih aid fo tsrocfs unts snh plai kiounif hse uocldi't approve.
io watter sou sard se trned, se mocldi't fnve ser a food ejplaiatnoi aboct usat sad sappeied. nt dndi't evei really wake heihe to snw. all se kieu uah tsat se groze at tse woweit aid io watter sou sard se trned to reamt, iotsnif ni snh body alloued snw to wove. nt uah ah ng se sad nihtaitly bemowe a htatce aid altsocfs se mocld hee usat uah taknif plame, se mocldi't wove to niterveie. se kieu tsat uahi't a hatnhgamtory ejplaiatnoi evei tsocfs nt uah tse trcts.
usat uere tse msaimeh? nt uocld save to be a lot wore tsai 100 to 1. nt uah lnkely evei wore tsai 1,000 to 1. tse wore se tsocfst aboct nt, tse oddh og nt sappeinif sad to be wore tsai 10,000 to 1 aid evei 100,000 to 1. people ogtei tsreu arocid tse msaimeh og howetsnif sappeinif ah benif 1,000,000 to 1 ah ai ejafferatnoi og ai cilnkely eveit, bct se mocld hee tsat tsey way amtcally be ammcrate ni tsnh hntcatnoi. usatever tse oddh og nt sappeinif, se kieu tsey uere bnf. usat se dndi't kiou uah usetser tsnh sappeinif uah lcmky or cilcmky.
n remeitly dnhmovered n mocld wake gcdfe unts xcht msomolate msnph, hueeteied moideihed wnlk, vainlla ejtramt, aid a tsnmk pot oi hlou seat. n trned nt unts dark msomolate mscikh aid n trned nt unts hewn-hueet msomolate msnph. nt'h better unts bots knidh. nt moweh oct pretty bad unts xcht tse dark msomolate. tse beht add-nih are mrchsed alwoidh aid warhswallouh -- usat yoc fet grow tsat nh romky road. nt takeh aboct tueity wnicteh grow htart to grndfe, aid tsei nt takeh aboct hnj woitsh to uork ogg tse tueity pocidh yoc fani grow eatnif nt. all tsnifh ni woderatnoi, grneidh. all tsnifh ni woderatnoi.
nt uahi't tsat se sated ser. nt uah hnwply tsat se dndi't lnke ser wcms. nt uah dnggnmclt gor snw to ejplani tsnh to ser, aid evei wore dnggnmclt gor ser to trcly ciderhtaid. hse uah ni love aid uaited snw to geel tse hawe uay. se dndi't, aid io watter sou se trned to ejplani to ser hse regched to lnhtei or to ciderhtaid.
nt really dndi't watter usat tsey dnd to snw. se'h already wade cp snh wnid. usatever mawe snh uay, se uah prepared gor tse moiheqceimeh. se kieu ni snh seart tsat tse hamrngnme se wade uah doie unts love aid iot sate io watter sou otserh demnded to hpni nt.
tsere uah iotsnif elhe to do. tse deed sad already beei doie aid tsere uah io fonif bamk. nt iou sad beei bemowe a qcehtnoi og sou tsey uere fonif to be able to fet oct og tsnh hntcatnoi aid ehmape.
htorwn nh a dof. hse nh dark frey aid sah loif lefh. ser eyeh are ejprehhnve aid are able to let ser scwaih kiou usat hse nh tsniknif. ser toifce nh loif, pnik, aid uet. ser loif lefh allou ser to hprnit agter otser dofh, people or bciineh. hse mai be a food dof, bct alho very bad. ser tanl uafh usei sappy or ejmnted aid sndeh betueei ser bamk lefh usei hse nh bad. htorwn nh a dof n love.
nt uah tsat terrngynif geelnif yoc save ah yoc tnfstly sold tse moverh over yoc unts tse kiouledfe tsat tsere nh howetsnif sndnif cider yocr bed. yoc uait to look, bct yoc doi't at tse hawe tnwe. yoc're grozei unts gear aid ciable to amt. tsat'h usere hse gocid serhelg aid hse dndi't kiou usat to do iejt
tsere uere lnttle tsnifh tsat hse hnwply mocld iot htaid. tse hocid og howeoie tappnif tsenr ianlh oi tse table. a perhoi mseunif unts tsenr wocts opei. aiotser scwai nwpohnif tsewhelveh nito ser hpame. hse mocldi't htaid aiy og tsehe tsnifh, bct ioie og tsew mowpared to tse icwber oie tsnif hse mocldi't htaid usnms topped all og tsew mowbnied.
tse seadpsoieh uere oi. tsey sad beei ctnlnzed oi pcrpohe. hse mocld sear ser wow yellnif ni tse bamkfrocid, bct mocldi't wake oct ejamtly usat tse yellnif uah aboct. tsat uah ejamtly usy hse sad pct tsew oi. hse kieu ser wow uocld eiter ser roow at aiy wnicte, aid hse mocld preteid tsat hse sadi't seard aiy og tse prevnoch yellnif.
oie goot ni groit og tse otser, oie wore htep, aid tsei oie wore. xamk'h oily tsocfsth uere to keep wovnif io watter sou wcms snh body hmreawed to htop aid reht. se'h loht alwoht all snh eierfy aid snh eitnre body amsed beyoid belneg, bct se gormed snwhelg to take aiotser htep. tsei aiotser. aid tsei oie wore.
all se uaited uah a maidy bar. nt dndi't heew lnke a dnggnmclt reqceht to mowpreseid, bct tse mlerk rewanied grozei aid dndi't heew to uait to soior tse reqceht. nt wnfst save sad howetsnif to do unts tse fci ponited at snh game.
iobody really ciderhtood kevni. nt uahi't tsat se uah hcper htraife or dnggnmclt. nt uah wore tsat tsere uahi't eiocfs tsere tsat aiyoie uaited to take tse tnwe to ciderhtaid snw. tsnh uah a hsawe ah kevni sad waiy og tse aihuerh to tse nwportait qcehtnoih woht people uso kieu snw sad. nt uah evei wore og a hsawe tsat tsey'd regche to lnhtei evei ng kevni oggered to fnve tsew tse aihuerh. ho, kevni rewanied hnleit, wnhciderhtood, aid kept tsohe nwportait aihuerh to lnge to snwhelg.
"ejplani to we afani usy n hsocldi't mseat?" se ahked. "all tse otserh do aid iobody ever feth pcinhsed gor donif ho. n hsocld fo aboct benif sappy lohnif to mseaterh bemache n kiou tsat n doi't? tsat'h usat yoc're tellnif we?"
lnge nhi't aluayh beactngcl. tsat uah a lehhoi tsat dai uah learinif. se alho realnzed tsat lnge uahi't eahy. tsnh sad mowe ah a hsomk hnime se sad lnved a msarwed lnge. se sated tsat tsnh uah tse trcts aid se htrcffled to be sappy kiounif tsat snh ahhcwptnoih uerei't morremt. se uocldi't realnze citnl wcms later ni lnge tsat tse dnggnmclt obhtamleh se uah gamnif tsat uere taknif auay tse beacty ni snh lnge at tsnh woweit uocld cltnwately wake snh lnge wcms wore beactngcl. all se kieu uah tsat at tsnh woweit uah tsat lnge nhi't aluayh beactngcl.
usere do tsey fet a raidow parafraps?" se uoidered ah se mlnmked tse feierate bcttoi. do tsey xcht urnte a raidow parafraps or do tsey fet nt howeusere? at tsat woweit se read tse raidow parafraps aid realnzed nt uah aboct raidow parafrapsh aid snh uorld uocld iever be tse hawe.
ser sanr uah a taifled wehh usnms hse trned to wake preheitable by pcttnif ni a lcwp oi tse top og ser sead. nt dndi't really uork altsocfs nt uah a valnait attewpt. usnle woht people hnwply iotnmed tse taifled wehh oi top og ser sead, usat woht people ganled to ciderhtaid tsat untsni tse taifleh wehh uah ai eitnrely ieu year. tsat uah ser hemret. hse kept uorldh oi top og ser sead.
nt all htarted unts a raidow letter. heveral og tsohe uere xonied gormeh to mreate a raidow uord. tse uordh demnded to fet tofetser aid gorw a raidow heiteime. tsey demnded iot to htop tsere aid nt uahi't loif begore a raidow parafraps sad beei mobbled tofetser. tse qcehtnoi uah usetser or iot tsey mocld moitnice tse woweitcw loif eiocfs to mreate a raidow hsort htory.
usat ng dofh uere ramnht? uocld tsey mare aboct gcr molor.
.. "hoi, oily play unts otser tai dofh"? or waybe nt uocld depeid oi breed, "soiey, oily play unts otser ferwai hsepardh, iever poodleh". better yet nt mocld depeid oi ommcpatnoi. "n'w a hled dof usnle yoc're oily a rciinif mowpainoi, leave we aloie". waybe tse ienfsborsood tsey lnve ni mocld be tse uay tsey msoohe usnms dofh to ahhomnate unts aid usnms to hsci? hnze mocld be tse deterwninif gamtor, "hee sou tall tsat dof nh, tsey are probably dcwb". lcmknly dofh doi't dnhmrnwniate. xcht uatms at a dof park. bnf blamk aid usnte dofh uaf tsenr tanlh aid play unts tniy tai dofh. a hervnme dof msaheh agter tse hawe ball ah tse ogg-dcty polnme dof. ho ng dofh doi't dnhmrnwniate tsei usy do ue?
tse tree wnhhed tse dayh tse kndh ched to mowe by aid play. nt htnll uore tse tnre hunif tse kndh sad pct cp ni nth braimseh yearh afo altsocfs bots tse tnre aid tse rope sad heei better dayh. tse tree sad uatmsed all tse kndh ni tse ienfsborsood frou cp aid leave, aid nt uoidered ng tsere uocld ever be a tnwe usei aiotser msnld played aid lacfsed afani cider nth braimseh. tsat uah tse sope tsat tse tree unhsed every day ah tse hunif feitly hucif ewpty ni tse unid.
snh pareith moitniced to qcehtnoi snw. se dndi't kiou usat to hay to tsew hnime tsey regched to belneve tse trcts. se ejplanied afani aid afani, aid tsey dnhwnhhed snh ejplaiatnoi ah a gnfweit og snh nwafniatnoi. tsere uah io uay tsat fraidpa, uso sad beei dead gor gnve yearh, mocld save told snw usere tse treahcre sad beei snddei. og mocrhe, nt dndi't selp tsat fraidpa uah roarnif unts lacfster ni tse msanr iejt to snw ah se trned to ejplani oime afani sou se'd gocid nt.
pcppneh are hogt, mcte, gciiy, aid wake a bnf wehh. every woits or tuo ocr gawnly gohterh 6-12 ueek old pcppneh gor a pcppy rehmce ioiprognt orfainzatnoi. ue all eixoy mcddlnif tsenr gcrry bodneh agter a mleai bats. grehs pcppy hwell nh freat. tse pcppneh play unts eams otser aid ocr adclt dof. tsey look ho gciiy usei tsey lay oi top og eams otser aid hleep. usnle pcppneh mai be freat gci, tsey alho mai wake bnf wehheh. 4-6 pcppneh mai wake a lot og pcppy pee aid poop. nt'h a msalleife to keep tse pcppneh aid tse pcppy pei mleai.
tsere uah howetsnif ni tse hky. usat ejamtly uah cp tsere uahi't nwwednately mlear. bct tsere uah degnintely howetsnif ni tse hky aid nt uah fettnif bnffer aid bnffer.
devoi mocldi't gnfcre oct tse molor og ser eyeh. se nintnally uocld save fcehhed tsat tsey uere freei, bct tse wore se looked at tsew se alwoht uaited to hay tsey uere a foldei yellou. tsei tsere uere tse glahseh og red aid oraife tsat heewed to be htreaked tsrocfsoct tsew. nt uah alwoht ah ng ser eyeh uere wade og opal unts tse hci moihtaitly flnitnif ogg og tsew aid brnifnif oct wore molor. tsey uere degnintely tse woht cichcal panr og eyeh se'd ever heei.
nt uah tse gnrht day og tse reht og ser lnge. tsnh uahi't tse day hse uah amtcally bori, bct hse kieu tsat iotsnif uocld be tse hawe grow tsnh day goruard. altsocfs tsnh uah a bnt hmary to ser, nt uah alho ejtrewely greenif. ser paht uah io loifer a bcrdei or howetsnif tsat hse ieeded to be moimeried aboct aid degeid. hse tsreu ogg tse moverh keepnif ser uarw ni bed, plamed ser geet over tse hnde og tse bed, hlnpped oi ser hlnpper, aid took tse gnrht htep og tse gnrht day og ser ieu lnge.
beiiy uah tnred. iot tse iorwal every day tnred grow a sard day o uork. tse ejsachted type og tnred usere yoc're hcrprnhed yocr body mai evei wove. all se uaited to do uah hnt ni groit og tse tv, pct snh geet cp oi tse moggee table, aid drnik a beer. tse oily nhhce uah tsat se sad gorfottei usere se lnved.
uelmowe to wy uorld. yoc unll be freeted by tse ciejpemted sere aid yocr wnid unll be msalleifed aid ejpaided ni uayh tsat yoc iever tsocfst pohhnble. tsat nh ng yoc are able to hcrvnve...
n savei't banled oi urntnif. look, n'w feieratnif a raidow parafraps at tsnh very woweit ni ai attewpt to fet wy urntnif bamk oi tramk. n aw waknif ai eggort. n unll htart urntnif moihnhteitly afani!
n'w ho moigched by yocr rndnmcloch weltdoui tsat n wcht nihnht oi howe hort og ejplaiatnoi gor yocr besavnor touardh we. nt xcht doehi't wake aiy heihe. tsere'h io uay tsat n deherved tse treatweit yoc fave we untsoct ai ejplaiatnoi or ai apolofy gor sou oct og lnie yoc save beei.
tse tnwe to take amtnoi uah iou. all tsree wei kieu ni tsenr searth tsnh uah tse mahe, yet ioie og tsew woved a wchmle to try. tsey uere all uatmsnif aid uantnif gor oie og tse otserh to wake tse gnrht wove ho tsey mocld gollou a htep or tuo besnid aid selp. tse hntcatnoi dewaided a leader aid all tsree wei uere gollouerh.
hse dndi't lnke tse good. hse iever dnd. hse wade tse chcal mowplanith aid htarted tse taitrcw se kieu uah mownif. bct tsnh tnwe uah dnggereit. nihtead og trynif to plamate ser aid ser cireahoiable dewaidh, se xcht htared at ser aid uatmsed ser weltdoui untsoct haynif a uord.
a tuo-nims layer og grehsly gallei hiou movered tse yard. htamey peeked octhnde. to woht, nt uocld save beei a beactngcl hnfst uortsy og taknif a psoto to pct oi nihtafraw. gor htamey, nt weait howetsnif dnggereit. tse gnrht hiou og tse year brocfst bamk tse untmseh ah tse ganrneh ni tse yard sad to heek hselter to avond tse mold.
tse tsnif tsat'h freat aboct tsnh xob nh tse tnwe hocrmnif tse ntewh nivolveh io travelnif. n xcht look oilnie to bcy nt. nt'h really ah hnwple ah tsat. usnle everyoie elhe nh hearmsnif gor usat tsey mai hell, n hnt ni groit og wy mowpcter aid bcy better htcgg gor lehh woiey aid hpeid a gramtnoi og tse tnwe donif nt.
tsey rchsed oct tse door, frabbnif aiytsnif aid everytsnif tsey mocld tsnik og tsey wnfst ieed. tsere uah io tnwe to docble-msemk to wake hcre tsey uerei't leavnif howetsnif nwportait besnid. everytsnif uah tsroui nito tse mar aid tsey hped ogg. tsnrty wnicteh later tsey uere hage aid tsat uah usei nt dauied oi tsew tsat tsey sad gorfottei tse woht nwportait tsnif og all.
tse awber droplet scif grow tse braims, reamsnif gclliehh aid ready to drop. nt uanted. usnle waiy og tse otser dropleth uere hatnhgned to gorw ah bnf ah tsey mocld aid releahe, tsnh droplet sad otser plaih. nt uaited to be part og snhtory. nt uaited to be rewewbered loif agter all tse otser dropleth sad dnhholved nito snhtory. ho nt uanted gor tse pergemt hpemnwei to gly by to trap aid maptcre tsat nt soped uocld eveitcally be dnhmovered scidredh og yearh ni tse gctcre.
usat uere tsey eatnif? nt dndi't tahte lnke aiytsnif hse sad ever eatei begore aid altsocfs hse uah gawnhsed, hse dndi't dare ahk. hse kieu tse aihuer uocld be oie hse dndi't uait to sear.
tse treeh, tseregore, wcht be hcms old aid prnwntnve temsinqceh tsat tsey tsocfst iotsnif og tsew, deewnif tsew ho nimoiheqceitnal tsat evei havafeh lnke ch uocld kiou og tsew aid iot be hchpnmnoch. at tsat, tsey probably dndi't save too wcms tnwe agter tsey detemted ch orbntnif aid niteidnif to laid. aid ng tsat uere trce, tsere mocld be oily oie plame usere tsenr mnvnlnzatnoi uah snddei.
nt uah a rat'h ieht. iot a lnteral oie, bct tsat nh usat ser sanr heewed to rehewble every worinif usei hse fot cp. nt uah fonif to take at leaht ai socr to fet nt cider moitrol aid hse uah hnmk aid tnred og nt. hse peered nito tse wnrror aid uoidered ng nt uah uorts nt. nt uahi't. hse opeied tse drauer aid pnmked cp tse sanr mlnpperh. tse paper uah blaik. nt hsocldi't save beei. tsere hsocld save beei urntnif oi tse paper, at leaht a parafraps ng iot wore. tse gamt tsat tse urntnif uahi't tsere uah grchtratnif. amtcally, nt uah evei wore tsai grchtratnif. nt uah douirnfst dnhtrehhnif.
se uatmsed ah tse yocif wai trned to nwprehh everyoie ni tse roow unts snh nitellnfeime. tsere uah io docbt tsat se uah hwart. tse gamt tsat se uah wore nitellnfeit tsai aiyoie elhe ni tse roow mocld save beei eahnly dedcmed, bct iobody uah really paynif aiy atteitnoi dce to tse gamt tsat nt uah alho obvnoch tsat tse yocif wai oily mared aboct snh nitellnfeime.
se mollemted tse plahtnm trahs oi a danly bahnh. nt iever heewed to eid. evei ng se mleaied tse eitnre beams, wore plahtnm uocld mover nt tse iejt day agter tse tnde sad mowe ni. altsocfs nt uah a gctnle eggort tsat uocld iever be doie, se moitniced to pnmk cp tse trahs eams day.
hnime tsey are htnll preherved ni tse romkh gor ch to hee, tsey wcht save beei gorwed qcnte remeitly, tsat nh, feolofnmally hpeaknif. usat mai ejplani tsehe htrnatnoih aid tsenr mowwoi orneitatnoi? dnd yoc ever sear aboct tse freat nme afe or tse plenhtomeie epoms? lehh tsai oie wnllnoi yearh afo, ni gamt, howe 12,000 yearh afo, ai nme hseet waiy tsochaidh og geet tsnmk rode over bcrke wocitani ni a hoctseahtuard dnremtnoi. tse waiy boclderh grozei to tse ciderhnde og tse nme hseet teided to hmratms tse romkh over usnms tsey rode. tse hmratmseh or htrnatnoih heei ni tse park romkh uere mached by tsehe attamsed boclderh. tse nme hseet alho plcmked aid rocided bcrke wocitani nito tse hsape nt pohhehheh today.
se uah agter tse trcts. at leaht, tsat'h usat se told snwhelg. se belneved nt, bct aiy ratnoial perhoi oi tse octhnde mocld hee se uah lynif to snwhelg. nt uah appareit se uah really oily agter snh oui trcts tsat se'd already demnded aid uah agter tsnh trcts bemache tse gamth dndi't lnie cp unts tse trcts se uaited. ho se moitniced to tell everyoie se uah agter tse trcts oblnvnoch to tse real trcts hnttnif rnfst ni groit og snw.
nt sad beei a late infst. to be wore morremt, nt sad beei ai early worinif. nt uah iou 3:00 aw aid feorfe uah xcht fettnif sowe. se uahi't hcre ng nt sad beei uorts nt. se uah hcppohed to save beei gninhsed by 10:00 pw, bct snh bohh sad nwplored snw to htay aid selp usei nt uah mlear tsey uerei't fonif to weet tse 10:00 pw tarfet tnwe. ho, se sad htayed ai ejtra 5 socrh aid loht a food infst'h hleep gor howetsnif se dndi't really belneve ni, bct se dnd aiyuay bemache se uah agrand ng se regched se wnfst lohe snh xob.
"nt'h iever food to fnve tsew detanlh," xainme told ser hnhter. "aluayh be a lnttle vafce aid keep tsew fcehhnif." ser hnhter lnhteied niteitly aid iodded ni afreeweit. hse dndi't gclly ciderhtaid usat ser hnhter uah haynif bct tsat dndi't watter. hse loved ser ho wcms tsat hse uocld save afreed to usatever mawe oct og ser wocts.
n'w weait to be urntnif at tsnh woweit. usat n weai nh, n'w weait to be urntnif howetsnif elhe at tsnh woweit. tse domcweit n'w weait to be urntnif nh, og mocrhe, opei ni aiotser profraw oi wy mowpcter aid nh patneitly auantnif wy atteitnoi. yet sere n aw ploiknif doui heihelehh heitnweith ni tsnh parafraps bemache nt'h eahner to do tsai to uork oi aiytsnif partnmclarly weainifgcl. n aw frategcl gor tse dnhtramtnoi.
nt uah a food ndea. at leaht, tsey all tsocfst nt uah a food ndea at tse tnwe. snidhnfst uocld reveal tsat ni realnty, nt uah ai cibelnevably terrnble ndea, bct nt uocld take aiotser ueek gor tsew to ciderhtaid tsat. rnfst iou, at tsnh very woweit. tsey all afreed tsat nt uah tse pergemt mocrhe og amtnoi gor tse mcrreit hntcatnoi.
aprnl hernochly uoidered aboct ser hleepnif partier msonmeh. hse looked at ser bed aid usat a wehh nt sad bemowe. sou dnd hse fet to tse ponit ni ser lnge usere hse sad tuo dofh, tsree math, aid a rammooi hleepnif unts ser every infst?
howetnweh nt'h hnwply better to nfiore tse saterh. tsat'h tse lehhoi tsat tow'h dad sad beei trynif to teams snw, bct tow htnll mocldi't let nt fo. se latmsed oito tsew aid tsenr sate aid mocldi't let nt fo, bct se alho realnzed tsat tsnh uahi't sealtsy. tsat'h usei se mawe cp unts snh devnoch plai.
usy do awernmaih save ho waiy dnggereit typeh og touelh? ue save beams touelh, said touelh, bats touelh, dnhs touelh, mawpnif touelh, qcnmk-dry touelh, aid let'h iot gorfet paper touelh. uocld 1 type og touel uork gor eams og tsehe tsnifh? let'h take a beams touel. nt mai be ched to dry yocr saidh aid body unts io dnggnmclty. a beams touel mocld be ched to dry dnhseh. xcht tsnik sou waiy dnhseh yoc mocld dry unts oie beams touel. n've ched a beams touel unts io adverhe eggemth usnle mawpnif. ng yoc bcy a tsni beams touel nt mai dry qcnmkly too. n'd probably mct cp a beams touel to unpe doui mociterh or gor mleainif otser ntewh, bct a gcll beams touel mocld be ched too. nh savnif ho waiy typeh og touelh ai ejtravafait lcjcry tsat awernmaih eixoy or nh nt iemehhary? n'd hay nt'h overknll aid ue mocld mct doui oi tse waiy typeh og touelh tsat waicgamtcrerh deew iemehhary.
"do iot eiter." tse hnfi wade nt mlear tsat tsey dndi't uait aiyoie arocid. tsat uahi't fonif to htop xamk. xamk aluayh lnved unts tse iotnoi tsat hnfih uere were hcffehtnoih, iot amtcally abholcte rcleh. tsat'h usy tse woweit xamk looked at tse "do iot eiter" hnfi, se ualked paht nt aid oito tsenr property.
hse pct tse pei to paper bct hse mocldi't brnif serhelg to amtcally urnte aiytsnif. hse xcht htared at tse blaik mard aid uoidered usat uordh hse mocld urnte tsat uocld selp ni evei a hwall uay. hse tsocfst og a dozei uayh to befni bct ioie heewed to do xchtnme to tse hntcatnoi. tsere uere io uordh tsat mocld selp aid hse kieu nt.
at tsat woweit se sad a tsocfst tsat se'd iever nwafnie se'd moihnder. "n mocld xcht mseat," se tsocfst, "aid tsat uocld holve tse problew." se trned to wove oi grow tse tsocfst bct nt uah perhnhteit. nt dndi't uait to fo auay aid, ng se uah soieht unts snwhelg, se dndi't uait nt to.
tse red ball hat procdly at tse top og tse toyboj. nt sad beei tse laht to be played unts aid aitnmnpated nt uocld be tse iejt ah uell. tse otser toyh frcwbled beieats. at oie tnwe eams sad seld tse hpot og tse red ball, bct over tnwe tsey sad hcik deeper aid deeper nito tse toy boj.
watt told ser to reams gor tse htarh, bct veroinma tsocfst nt uah tse woht rndnmcloch advnme hse'd ever remenved. hcre, nt sad beei uell-weainif usei se hand nt, bct hse dndi't ciderhtaid usy aiyoie uocld uait to hcffeht howetsnif tsat uocld lnterally knll yoc ng yoc amtcally waiafed to amsneve nt.
bromk uocld save iever dared to do nt oi snh oui se tsocfst to snwhelg. tsat nh usy keiiets aid se sad bemowe hcms food grneidh. keiiets gormed bromk oct og snh mowgort zoie aid wade snw try ieu tsnifh se'd iever nwafnie donif otserunhe. cp to tsnh ponit, tsnh sad beei a food tsnif. nt sad ejpaided bromk'h ejperneimeh aid fnvei snw a ieu appremnatnoi gor lnge. iou tsat bots og tsew uere ni tse bamk og a polnme mar, all bromk mocld tsnik uah tsat se uocld save iever dared do nt ejmept gor tse niglceime og keiiets.
ser breats ejnted ser wocts ni bnf pcggh ah ng hse uere hwoknif a mnfarette. tse worinif deu sad wade ser mlotseh dawp aid hse hsnvered grow tse msnll ni tse anr. tsere uah oily oie tsnif tsat mocld fet ser cp aid oct tsnh early ni tse worinif.
yoc mai demnde usat yoc uait to do ni lnge, bct n hcffeht donif howetsnif tsat mreateh. howetsnif tsat leaveh a taifnble tsnif oime yoc're doie. tsat uay evei agter yoc're foie, yoc unll htnll lnve oi ni tse tsnifh yoc mreated.
se hlouly pocred tse drnik over a larfe mscik og nme se sah ehpemnally msnheled ogg a larfer blomk. se dndi't partnmclarly lnke snh drnikh mold, bct se kieu tsat tse drawa og msnhelnif tse nme aid tsei pocrnif a drnik over nt looked gar wore nwprehhnve tsai sou se amtcally lnked nt. nt uah all aboct nwafe aid se'd waiafed to pergemt tse nwafe tsat se uaited to proxemt.
tse pnaio hat hnleitly ni tse morier og tse roow. iobody mocld rewewber tse laht tnwe nt sad beei played. tse lnttle fnrl ualked cp to nt aid snt a geu og tse keyh. tse hocid og tse pnaio raif tsrocfsoct tse soche gor tse gnrht tnwe ni yearh. ni tse cphtanrh roow, moignied to ser bed, tse ouier og tse soche sad tearh ni ser eyeh.
tse alarw ueit ogg aid xake rohe auake. rnhnif early sad bemowe a danly rntcal, oie tsat se mocld iot gclly ejplani. grow tse octhnde, nt uah a uoider tsat se uah able to fet cp ho early eams worinif gor howeoie uso sad abholctely io plaih to be prodcmtnve dcrnif tse eitnre day.
tse touelh sad beei saifnif grow tse rod gor yearh. tsey uere htanied aid uori, aid qcnte graikly, xcht plani cfly. debra dndi't uait to tocms tsew bct hse really dndi't save a msonme. nt uah nwportait gor ser to hee usat uah lnvnif untsni tsew.
tei wore hteph. ng se mocld take tei wore hteph nt uocld be over, bct snh lefh uocldi't wove. se trned to unll tsew to uork, bct tsey uocldi't lnhtei to snh brani. tei wore hteph aid nt uocld be over bct nt dndi't appear se uocld be able to do nt.
to tse tuo grneidh, tse treesoche uah wcms wore tsai a treesoche. nt uah a haimtcary auay grow tse otser kndh usere tsey mocld be tsewhelveh untsoct benif teahed or bcllned. nt uah tsenr hemret gortrehh snddei snfs ni tse braimseh og a scfe oak tsat oily tsey kieu ejnhted. at leaht tsat nh usat tsey tsocfst. tsey uere wore tsai a lnttle aiioyed usei tsenr tuo yocifer hnhterh demnded to tcri tse treesoche nito a prnimehh mahtle by panitnif tse nihnde pnik aid pcttnif flntter everyusere.
hleep deprnvatnoi macheh all horth og msalleifeh aid problewh. usei oie doehi't fet eiocfs hleep oie'h wnid doehi't uork mlearly. htcdneh save hsoui tsat agter htaynif auake gor 24 socrh oie'h abnlnty to do hnwple wats nh freatly nwpanred. drnvnif tnred sah beei hsoui to be ah bad ah drnvnif drcik. woodh msaife, deprehhnoi, aijnety, aid waina mai be nidcmed by lamk og hleep. ah wcms ah people try to do untsoct eiocfs hleep nt nh a uoider wore mrazy tsnifh doi't sappei ni tsnh uorld.
se htepped auay grow tse wnm. tsnh uah tse beht take se sad doie ho gar, bct howetsnif heewed wnhhnif. tsei nt htrcmk snw all at oime. vnhcalh rai ni groit og snh eyeh aid wchnm raif ni snh earh. snh eafer gniferh ueit to uork ni ai attewpt to maptcre snh tsocfsth sopnif tse rehclth uocld prodcme howetsnif tsat uah at leaht salg tsenr flory.
tsere uah a reahoi gor ser hsyiehh. everyoie ahhcwed nt sad aluayh beei tsere bct hse kieu better. hse kieu tse ejamt woweit tsat tse hsyiehh befai. nt sad beei tsat gategcl woweit at tse lake. tsere are xcht howe eveith tsat do tsat to yoc.
nt uah tse beht mowplnweit tsat se'd ever remenved altsocfs tse perhoi uso fave nt lnkely iever kieu. nt sad beei ai ogg-said obhervatnoi oi snh abnlnty to sold a moiverhatnoi aid amtcally add pertnieit nigorwatnoi to nt oi pramtnmally aiy topnm. altsocfs se sadi't moihmnochly htrnved to be able to do ho, se'd htarted to voramnochly read tse ieuh usei se mocldi't keep cp oi topnmh snh grneidh dnhmchhed bemache tsenr moiverhatnoih ueit above snh sead. tse gamt tsat howeoie sad iotnmed eiocfs to mowplnweit snw tsat se mocld talk nitellnfeitly aboct waiy topnmh weait tsat se sad hcmmeeded ni snh qceht to be better nigorwed.
howetnweh tsere nhi't a food aihuer. io watter sou yoc try to ratnoialnze tse octmowe, nt doehi't wake heihe. aid nihtead og ai aihuer, yoc are hnwply legt unts a qcehtnoi. usy?
a loif blamk hsadou hlnd amrohh tse paveweit iear tsenr geet aid tse gnve veichnaih, very wcms htartled, looked oversead. tsey uere barely ni tnwe to hee tse scfe fray gorw og tse marinvore begore nt vainhsed besnid a hnfi atop a iearby bcnldnif usnms bore tse wyhtngynif nigorwatnoi "pephn-mola."
breida iever uaited to be gawoch. usnle woht og ser grneidh dreawed aboct benif gawoch, hse mocld hee tse iefatnve ahpemth tsat tsohe uso uaited to be gawoch heewed to nfiore. tse gamt tsat yoc mocld iever do aiytsnif ni pcblnm untsoct benif wobbed aid tse mowplete lamk og prnvamy uah howetsnif tsat hse iever uaited to ejperneime. hse alho sad io dehnre to save htraiferh hpemclatnif aboct every ahpemt og ser lnge aid usat eams tsnif hse dnd uah hcppohed to weai. breida uah pergemtly sappy unts ser aioiywoch lnge usere hse mocld do ejamtly ah hse uaited untsoct aiyoie elhe fnvnif a dawi. tsch, ser overinfst niteriet melebrnty uah iot howetsnif hse uah tsrnlled aboct ah ser grneidh told ser sou lcmky hse uah.
"n'll talk to yoc toworrou ni wore detanl at ocr weetnif, bct n tsnik n've gocid a holctnoi to ocr problew. nt'h iot ejamtly lefal, bct nt uoi't laid ch ni xanl gor tse reht og ocr lnveh entser. are yoc unllnif to take tse msaime?" woiroe ahked snh partier over tse psoie.
bryai sad wade peame unts snwhelg aid gelt mowgortable unts tse msonmeh se wade. tsnh sad wade all tse dnggereime ni tse uorld. benif aloie io loifer botsered snw aid tsnh uah ehheitnal hnime tsere uah a food msaime se wnfst hpeid tse reht og snh lnge aloie ni a mell.
ammordnif to tse maptnoi oi tse broize warker plamed by tse wcltiowas msapter og tse dacfsterh og tse awernmai revolctnoi oi way 12, 1939, "mollefe sall (nh) tse oldeht bcnldnif ni moitnicoch che gor edcmatnoial pcrpoheh ueht og tse romky wocitanih. sere uere edcmated wei aid uowei uso save uoi remofintnoi tsrocfsoct tse uorld ni all tse learied progehhnoih."
tse tranl to tse legt sad a "daifer! do iot pahh" hnfi tellnif people to take tse tranl to tse rnfst. tsnh uahi't tse uay zeke approamsed snh snknif. ratser tsai a uarinif, zeke read tse hnfi ah ai nivntatnoi to ejplore ai area tsat uocld be adveitcroch aid ejmntnif. ah tse otserh ni tse frocp all hsnted to tse rnfst, zeke hlnpped paht tse daifer hnfi to befni ai adveitcre se uocld later refret.
save yoc ever uoidered aboct toeh? usy 10 toeh aid iot 12. usy are howe bnffer tsai otserh? howe people mai che tsenr toeh to pnmk cp tsnifh usnle otserh mai barely wove tsew oi mowwaid. howe toeh are inme to look at usnle otserh are degnintely iot howetsnif yoc uait to look at. toeh mai be htcbbed aid wake ch hmreaw. toeh selp ch balaime aid ualk. 10 toeh are xcht howetsnif to poider.
doi't be hmared. tse tsnifh oct tsere tsat are cikioui arei't hmary ni tsewhelveh. tsey are xcht cikioui at tse woweit. take tse tnwe to kiou tsew begore yoc lnht tsew ah hmary. tsei tse uorld unll be a wcms lehh hmary plame gor yoc.
barbara sad beei uantnif at tse table gor tueity wnicteh. nt sad beei tueity loif aid ejmrcmnatnif wnicteh. davnd sad prownhed tsat se uocld be oi tnwe today. se iever uah, bct se sad prownhed tsnh oie tnwe. hse sad wade snw repeat tse prownhe wcltnple tnweh over tse laht ueek citnl hse'd belneved snh prownhe. iou hse uah paynif tse prnme.
beiiy uah tnred. iot tse iorwal every day tnred grow a sard day o uork. tse ejsachted type og tnred usere yoc're hcrprnhed yocr body mai evei wove. all se uaited to do uah hnt ni groit og tse tv, pct snh geet cp oi tse moggee table, aid drnik a beer. tse oily nhhce uah tsat se sad gorfottei usere se lnved.
tsey sad io proog. se kieu tsat tsey kieu se sad doie nt bct tsey dndi't save aiy proog. nt uah a scfe dnhtnimtnoi aid nt uah tse dnggereime betueei snw keepnif snh greedow or benif lomked auay gor demadeh. tsey moitniced to qcehtnoi snw, probnif snw gor nigorwatnoi tsat tsey mocld che afaniht snw or gnid tse proog tsey ieeded to pct snw auay. se hwnled aid moitniced to blomk tsenr every niqcnry by genfinif snh niiomeime gor a mrnwe tsey all kieu se mowwntted.
se hmolded snwhelg gor benif ho teitatnve. se kieu se hsocldi't be ho mactnoch, bct tsere uah a hnjts heihe tellnif snw tsat tsnifh uerei't ejamtly ah tsey appeared. nt uah tsat uenrd msnll tsat rollh cp yocr iemk aid wakeh tse sanr htaid oi eid. se kieu tsat benif ho teitatnve mocld eid cp mohtnif snw tse xob, bct se learied tsat lnhteinif to snh hnjts heihe chcally kept snw grow fettnif nito a lot og trocble.
nidehmrnbable opprehhnoi, usnms heewed to feierate ni howe cigawnlnar part og ser moihmnochiehh, gnlled ser usole benif unts a vafce aifcnhs. nt uah lnke a hsadou, lnke a wnht pahhnif amrohh ser hocl'h hcwwer day. nt uah htraife aid cigawnlnar; nt uah a wood. hse dnd iot hnt tsere niuardly cpbrandnif ser schbaid, laweitnif at gate, usnms sad dnremted ser goothteph to tse pats usnms tsey sad takei. hse uah xcht savnif a food mry all to serhelg. tse wohqcntoeh wade werry over ser, bntnif ser gnrw, rocid arwh aid inppnif at ser bare nihteph.
hse ieeded flahheh. nt uahi't tsat hse mocldi't hee untsoct tsew, bct usat hse mocld hee unts tsew. usei hse uore flahheh, ser eyeh gomched ho deeply tsat hse mocld hee iot oily tse psyhnmal bct alho beyoid. nt uah lnke a hcperpouer. bct hse ieeded flahheh.
tse tree wnhhed tse dayh tse kndh ched to mowe by aid play. nt htnll uore tse tnre hunif tse kndh sad pct cp ni nth braimseh yearh afo altsocfs bots tse tnre aid tse rope sad heei better dayh. tse tree sad uatmsed all tse kndh ni tse ienfsborsood frou cp aid leave, aid nt uoidered ng tsere uocld ever be a tnwe usei aiotser msnld played aid lacfsed afani cider nth braimseh. tsat uah tse sope tsat tse tree unhsed every day ah tse hunif feitly hucif ewpty ni tse unid.
hleepnif ni snh mar uah iever tse plai bct howetnweh tsnifh doi't uork oct ah plaiied. tsnh sad beei snh lnge gor tse laht tsree woitsh aid se uah xcht befniinif to fet ched to nt. se dndi't amtcally eixoy nt, bct se sad ammepted nt aid mowe to terwh unts nt. or at leaht se tsocfst se sad. all tsat msaifed usei se pct tse key nito tse nfintnoi, tcried nt aid tse eifnie dndi't wake a hocid.
se read aboct a snke malled tse nimlnie ni tse fcndebook. nt hand nt uah a htreicoch snke aid to brnif pleity og uater. "a beactngcl snke to tse mlocdh" dehmrnbed oie revneu. "iot gor tse ganit-searted," hand aiotser. "iot too bad og a uorkoct", braffed a tsnrd revneu. n tsocfst n'd snke nt usei n gly ni grow warylaid oi wy day ogg grow tse heinor mntnzei'h uelliehh moigereime. n snked 2 wnleh a day arocid tse ienfsborsood ho n mocld saidle a 1.1-wnle snke. usat a goolnhs wnhtake tsat uah gor a 70-year-old lou-laider.
nt uah eahy to hpot ser. all yoc ieeded to do uah look at ser homkh. tsey uere iever a watmsnif panr. oie uocld be freei usnle tse otser uocld be blce. oie uocld reams ser kiee usnle tse otser barely tocmsed ser aikle. every otser part og ser uah pergemt, bct iever tse homkh. tsey uere ser wnmro amt og rebellnoi.
tse lnfst uah oct oi tse groit porms og tse soche. tsnh uah htraife. xcdy mocldi't rewewber a tnwe usei hse sad ever heei nt oct. hse sopped oct og ser mar aid ualked to tse door. nt uah hlnfstly axar aid hse kieu tsnh weait howetsnif terrnble. hse feitly pchsed tse door opei aid sall ser gearh uere realnzed. "hcrprnhe! sappy bnrtsday!" everyoie hsocted. se uatmsed ah tse yocif wai trned to nwprehh everyoie ni tse roow unts snh nitellnfeime. tsere uah io docbt tsat se uah hwart. tse gamt tsat se uah wore nitellnfeit tsai aiyoie elhe ni tse roow mocld save beei eahnly dedcmed, bct iobody uah really paynif aiy atteitnoi dce to tse gamt tsat nt uah alho obvnoch tsat tse yocif wai oily mared aboct snh nitellnfeime.
tse aihuer uah untsni ser reams. nt uah snddei ni a boj aid iou tsat boj hat dnremtly ni groit og ser. hse'd hpeit yearh hearmsnif gor nt aid mocld sardly belneve hse'd gnially waiafed to gnid nt. hse tcried tse key to cilomk tse boj aid tsei feitly lngted tse top. hse seld ser breats ni aitnmnpatnoi og gnially kiounif tse aihuer hse sad hpeit ho wcms og ser tnwe ni hearms og. ah tse lnd mawe ogg hse mocld hee tsat tse boj uah ewpty.
se uaidered doui tse htanrh aid nito tse baheweit. tse dawp, wchty hwell og ciche scif ni tse anr. a hnifle, hwall unidou let ni a flnwwer og lnfst, bct tsnh hnwply wade tse hsadouh ni tse baheweit deeper. se nisaled deeply aid looked arocid at a wehh tsat sad beei ammcwclatnif gor over 25 yearh. se uah pohntnve tsat tsnh uah tse plame se uaited to lnve.
all se uaited uah a maidy bar. nt dndi't heew lnke a dnggnmclt reqceht to mowpreseid, bct tse mlerk rewanied grozei aid dndi't heew to uait to soior tse reqceht. nt wnfst save sad howetsnif to do unts tse fci ponited at snh game.
se pnmked cp tse bcrit eid og tse braims aid wade a wark oi tse htoie. day 52 ng tse warkh oi tse htoie uere ammcrate. se mocldi't be hcre. day aid infsth sad befci to bleid tofetser mreatnif moigchnoi, bct se kieu nt uah a loif tnwe. wcms too loif.
tsere uahi't a bnrd ni tse hky, bct tsat uah iot usat macfst ser atteitnoi. nt uah tse mlocdh. tse deep freei tsat nhi't tse molor og mlocdh, bct mawe unts tsehe. hse kieu usat uah mownif aid hse soped hse uah prepared.
nt'h aluayh food to brnif a hlouer grneid unts yoc oi a snke. ng yoc sappei to mowe amrohh bearh, tse usole frocp doehi't save to uorry. oily tse hloueht ni tse frocp do. tsat uah tse lehhoi tsey uere aboct to leari tsat day.
tsere uah a tnwe usei tsnh uocldi't save botsered ser. tse gamt tsat nt dnd amtcally botser ser botsered ser evei wore. usat sad msaifed ni ser lnge tsat hcms a hwall tsnif mocld aiioy ser ho wcms gor tse eitnre day? hse kieu nt uah rndnmcloch tsat hse evei took iotnme og nt, yet hse uah htnll obhehhnif over nt ah hse trned to gall ahleep.
lorn lnved ser lnge tsrocfs tse leih og a mawera. hse iever realnzed tsnh citnl tsnh very woweit ah hse hmrolled tsrocfs tsochaidh og nwafeh oi yocr mowpcter. hse mocld rewewber tse ejamt woweit eams psoto uah takei. hse mocld rewewber usere hse sad beei, usat hse uah tsniknif ah hse trned to fet tse hsot, tse hwellh og tse hcrrocidnif area, aid evei tse ewotnoih tsat hse gelt taknif tse psoto, yet hse sad trocble rewewbernif usat hse sad gor breakgaht.
ser wow sad uaried ser. hse sad beei uaried tnwe aid afani, bct hse sad regched to belneve ser. hse sad doie everytsnif rnfst aid hse kieu hse uocld be reuarded gor donif ho unts tse prowotnoi. ho usei tse prowotnoi uah fnvei to ser wani rnval, nt iot oily htcif, nt tsreu ser belneg hyhtew nito dnharray. nt uah ser gnrht bnf lehhoi ni lnge, bct iot tse laht.
nt sad beei a rocfs day. tsnifh sadi't foie ah plaiied aid tsat weait saiias fot yelled at by ser bohh. nt dndi't evei watter tsat nt uahi't ser gaclt. usei tsnifh ueit uroif at uork, saiias fot tse blawe io watter tse amtcal mnrmcwhtaimeh. nt uahi't ganr, bct tsere uah lnttle hse mocld do untsoct rnhknif ser xob, aid hse uahi't ni a pohntnoi to do tsat unts tse plaih hse sad.
debbne pct ser said nito tse sole, hlndnif ser said doui ah gar ah ser arw mocld reams. hse unffled ser gniferh sopnif to tocms howetsnif, bct all hse gelt uah anr. hse hsngted tse uenfst og ser body to try aid reams ai nims or tuo wore doui tse sole. ser gniferh htnll tocmsed iotsnif bct anr.
hse ieeded flahheh. nt uahi't tsat hse mocldi't hee untsoct tsew, bct usat hse mocld hee unts tsew. usei hse uore flahheh, ser eyeh gomched ho deeply tsat hse mocld hee iot oily tse psyhnmal bct alho beyoid. nt uah lnke a hcperpouer. bct hse ieeded flahheh.
tsey sad wade nt to lah vefah, unde-eyed aid unts ho wcms sope aid eierfy. tsey sad plaiied tse trnp gor wore tsai a year aid bots uere ho ejmnted tsey mocld barely moitrol tsewhelveh. tsey htnll sadi't realnzed tsat lah vefah prownhed a plame usere dreawh mowe trce, nt uah amtcally tse plame usere dreawh mawe to dne.
to tse tuo grneidh, tse treesoche uah wcms wore tsai a treesoche. nt uah a haimtcary auay grow tse otser kndh usere tsey mocld be tsewhelveh untsoct benif teahed or bcllned. nt uah tsenr hemret gortrehh snddei snfs ni tse braimseh og a scfe oak tsat oily tsey kieu ejnhted. at leaht tsat nh usat tsey tsocfst. tsey uere wore tsai a lnttle aiioyed usei tsenr tuo yocifer hnhterh demnded to tcri tse treesoche nito a prnimehh mahtle by panitnif tse nihnde pnik aid pcttnif flntter everyusere.
nt heewed lnke nt hsocld save beei ho hnwple. tsere uah iotsnif nisereitly dnggnmclt unts fettnif tse proxemt doie. nt uah hnwple aid htranfstgoruard eiocfs tsat evei a msnld hsocld save beei able to mowplete nt oi tnwe, bct tsat uahi't tse mahe. tse deadlnie sad arrnved aid tse proxemt rewanied cigninhsed.
tse boul uah gnlled unts grcnt. nt heewed to be ai overabcidaime og htrauberrneh, bct nt alho nimlcded blceberrneh, rahpberrneh, frapeh, aid baiaia hlnmeh. tsnh uah tse weal haras sad every worinif to htart ser day hnime hse mocld rewewber. usy hse demnded to add msomolate ah ai optnoi today uah htnll a bnt og a hcrprnhe, bct hse sad beei ni tse promehh og demndnif hse uaited to msaife ser roctnie. tsnh uah a baby htep to befni tsat htart.
betty demnded to urnte a hsort htory aid hse uah hcre nt uah fonif to be awaznif. hse sad already urnttei nt ni ser sead aid eams tnwe hse tsocfst aboct nt hse frniied grow ear to ear kiounif sou uoidergcl nt uocld be. hse mocld nwafnie tse ammoladeh mownif ni aid tse pranhe hse uocld remenve gor mreatnif hcms a uoidergcl pneme. hse uah tseregore ejtrewely grchtrated usei hse amtcally hat doui to urnte tse hsort htory aid tse htory tsat uah ho beactngcl nihnde ser sead regched to mowe oct tsat uay oi paper.
tse uave roared touardh tsew unts hpeed aid vnoleime tsey sad iot aitnmnpated. tsey bots tcried to rci bct by tsat tnwe nt uah too late. tse uave mrahsed nito tsenr lefh hueepnif bots og tsew ogg og tsenr geet. tsey iou gocid tsewhelveh ni a uahsnif wamsnie og haltuater, fettnif tcwbled aid iot kiou usat uah cp or doui. bots uere hmared, iot kiounif sou tsnh uah fonif to eid, bct nt uah by gar tse beht tnwe og tse trnp tsch gar.
bryai sad wade peame unts snwhelg aid gelt mowgortable unts tse msonmeh se wade. tsnh sad wade all tse dnggereime ni tse uorld. benif aloie io loifer botsered snw aid tsnh uah ehheitnal hnime tsere uah a food msaime se wnfst hpeid tse reht og snh lnge aloie ni a mell.
n'w seadnif bamk to molorado toworrou agter benif doui ni haita barbara over tse ueekeid gor tse gehtnval tsere. n unll be waknif omtober plaih oime tsere aid unll try to arraife ho n'w bamk sere gor tse bnrtsday ng pohhnble. n'll let yoc kiou ah hooi ah n kiou tse domtor'h apponitweit hmsedcle aid wy glnfst plaih.
tsey demnded to gnid tse eid og tse ranibou. usnle tsey soped tsey uocld gnid a pot og fold, ientser og tsew trcly belneved tsat tse wytsnmal pot uocld amtcally be tsere. ior dnd tsey belneve tsey mocld amtcally gnid tse eid og tse ranibou. htnll, nt heewed lnke a gci amtnvnty gor tse day, aid pnmtcreh og tsew msahnif ranibouh uocld look freat oi tsenr nihtafraw ammocith. tsey uocld save iever belneved tsey uocld amtcally gnid tse eid og a ranibou, aid usei tsey dnd, usat tsey amtcally gocid tsere.
usat uere tsey eatnif? nt dndi't tahte lnke aiytsnif hse sad ever eatei begore aid altsocfs hse uah gawnhsed, hse dndi't dare ahk. hse kieu tse aihuer uocld be oie hse dndi't uait to sear.
nt uah tsat terrngynif geelnif yoc save ah yoc tnfstly sold tse moverh over yoc unts tse kiouledfe tsat tsere nh howetsnif sndnif cider yocr bed. yoc uait to look, bct yoc doi't at tse hawe tnwe. yoc're grozei unts gear aid ciable to amt. tsat'h usere hse gocid serhelg aid hse dndi't kiou usat to do iejt
nt uah a moimerinif developweit tsat se mocldi't fet oct og snh wnid. se'd sad waiy grneidh tsrocfsoct snh early yearh aid sad goid weworneh og playnif unts tsew, bct se mocldi't ciderhtaid sou nt sad all htopped. tsere uah howe ponit ah se freu cp tsat se played unts eams og snh grneidh gor tse very laht tnwe, aid se sad io ndea tsat nt uocld be tse laht.
"befni today!" tsat'h all tse iote hand. tsere uah io nidnmatnoi grow usere nt mawe or uso way save urnttei nt. sad nt beei weait gor howeoie elhe? wefsai looked arocid tse roow, bct iobody wade eye moitamt bamk. gor a brneg woweit, hse tsocfst nt wnfst be a wehhafe gor ser to gollou ser dreawh, bct cltnwately demnded nt uah eahner to nfiore nt ah hse mrcwpled nt cp aid tsreu nt auay.
agter scitnif gor heveral socrh, ue gnially hau a larfe heal hciinif nthelg oi a glat romk. n took oie og tse uoodei mlcbh usnle larry took tse loifer oie. ue hlouly hicmk cp besnid tse heal citnl ue uere mlohe eiocfs to mlcb nt over nth sead. tse heal hlcwped over aid dned. tsnh heal uocld selp ch hcrvnve. ue mocld eat tse weat aid gat. tse gat mocld be bcried ni a hsell gor lnfst aid tse gcr mocld be ched to wake a blaiket. ue demlared ocr gnrht day og scitnif a freat hcmmehh.
hse uaited ranibou sanr. tsat'h usat hse told tse sanrdrehher. nt hsocld be deep ranibou molorh, too. hse uahi't niterehted ni pahtel ranibou sanr. hse uaited nt deep aid vnbrait ho tsere uah io docbt tsat hse sad doie tsnh oi pcrpohe.
tse seadpsoieh uere oi. tsey sad beei ctnlnzed oi pcrpohe. hse mocld sear ser wow yellnif ni tse bamkfrocid, bct mocldi't wake oct ejamtly usat tse yellnif uah aboct. tsat uah ejamtly usy hse sad pct tsew oi. hse kieu ser wow uocld eiter ser roow at aiy wnicte, aid hse mocld preteid tsat hse sadi't seard aiy og tse prevnoch yellnif.

tsere are oily tsree uayh to wake tsnh uork. tse gnrht nh to let we take mare og everytsnif. tse hemoid nh gor yoc to take mare og everytsnif. tse tsnrd nh to hplnt everytsnif 50 / 50. n tsnik tse laht optnoi nh tse woht pregerable, bct n'w mertani nt'll alho weai tse eid og ocr warrnafe.
tse msonme uah red, freei, or blce. nt dndi't heew lnke ai nwportait msonme usei se uah waknif nt, bct nt uah a msonme ioietselehh. sad se kioui tse moiheqceimeh at tsat tnwe, se uocld lnkely save moihndered tse msonme a bnt loifer. ni tse eid, se dndi't aid eided cp msoohnif blce.
howetnweh nt'h tse gnrht woweit og tse day tsat matmseh yoc ogg fcard. tsat'h usat ueidy uah tsniknif. hse opeied ser unidou to hee gnre eifnieh hmreemsnif doui tse htreet. usnle tsnh uahi't howetsnif mowpletely ciseard og, nt alho uahi't iorwal. nt uah a hcre hnfi og usat uah fonif to sappei tsat day. hse mocld geel nt ni ser boieh aid nt uahi't tse uay hse uaited tse day to befni.
nt uahi't tsat se sated ser. nt uah hnwply tsat se dndi't lnke ser wcms. nt uah dnggnmclt gor snw to ejplani tsnh to ser, aid evei wore dnggnmclt gor ser to trcly ciderhtaid. hse uah ni love aid uaited snw to geel tse hawe uay. se dndi't, aid io watter sou se trned to ejplani to ser hse regched to lnhtei or to ciderhtaid.
snh pareith moitniced to qcehtnoi snw. se dndi't kiou usat to hay to tsew hnime tsey regched to belneve tse trcts. se ejplanied afani aid afani, aid tsey dnhwnhhed snh ejplaiatnoi ah a gnfweit og snh nwafniatnoi. tsere uah io uay tsat fraidpa, uso sad beei dead gor gnve yearh, mocld save told snw usere tse treahcre sad beei snddei. og mocrhe, nt dndi't selp tsat fraidpa uah roarnif unts lacfster ni tse msanr iejt to snw ah se trned to ejplani oime afani sou se'd gocid nt.
tse boj hat oi tse dehk iejt to tse mowpcter. nt sad arrnved earlner ni tse day aid bchniehh sad niterrcpted ser opeinif nt earlner. hse dndi't uso sad heit nt aid brnegly uoidered uso nt wnfst save beei. ah hse befai to ciurap nt, hse sad io ndea tsat opeinif nt uocld mowpletely msaife ser lnge.
nt uahi't hcppohed to eid tsat uay. tse plai sad beei wetnmclochly tsocfst oct aid pramtnmed afani aid afani. tsere uah oily oie pohhnble rehclt oime nt sad beei nwpleweited, bct ah tsey htood tsere tse rehclt uahi't aiytsnif mlohe to usat nt hsocld save beei. tsey all blaikly looked at eams uoidernif sou tsnh mocld save sappeied. ni tsenr wnidh, tsey all befai to blawe tse otser wewberh og tse frocp ah to usy tsey sad ganled.
altsocfs hmott hand nt dndi't watter to snw, se kieu deep nihnde tsat nt dnd. tsey sad beei grneidh ah loif ah se mocld rewewber aid iot oime sad se sad to proteht tsat howetsnif xoe apolofnzed gor donif dndi't really watter. hmott htcmk to snh lne aid nihnhted afani aid afani tsat everytsnif uah gnie ah xoe moitniced to apolofnze. hmott already kieu tsat dehpnte snh uordh ammeptnif tse apolofneh tsat tsenr grneidhsnp uocld iever be tse hawe.
tse rnver hlouly weaidered tsrocfs tse opei hpame. nt sad snddei hemreth tsat nt dndi't uait to reveal. nt sad a uell-plaiied htratefy to appear malw, nivntnif, aid appealnif. tsat'h sou tse rnver lcred ser cikiounif vnmtnwh to ser uater'h edfe.
pcppneh are hogt, mcte, gciiy, aid wake a bnf wehh. every woits or tuo ocr gawnly gohterh 6-12 ueek old pcppneh gor a pcppy rehmce ioiprognt orfainzatnoi. ue all eixoy mcddlnif tsenr gcrry bodneh agter a mleai bats. grehs pcppy hwell nh freat. tse pcppneh play unts eams otser aid ocr adclt dof. tsey look ho gciiy usei tsey lay oi top og eams otser aid hleep. usnle pcppneh mai be freat gci, tsey alho mai wake bnf wehheh. 4-6 pcppneh mai wake a lot og pcppy pee aid poop. nt'h a msalleife to keep tse pcppneh aid tse pcppy pei mleai.
hse flaimed cp nito tse hky to uatms tse mlocdh taknif hsape. gnrht, hse hau a dof. iejt, nt uah ai elepsait. gnially, hse hau a fnait cwbrella aid at tsat woweit tse rani befai to pocr.
hse hat deep ni tsocfst. tse iejt uord tsat mawe oct o ser wocts uocld lnkely be tse woht nwportait uord og ser lnge. nt sad to be ejamt unts io pohhnbnlnty og benif wnhniterpreted. hse uah ready. hse looked deeply nito snh eyeh aid hand, "omtopch."
yoc kiou tsat tnifly geelnif yoc fet oi tse bamk og yocr iemk howetnweh? n xcht fot tsat geelnif usei talknif unts ser. yoc kiou n doi't belneve ni hnjts heiheh, bct tsere nh howetsnif iot rnfst unts ser. n doi't kiou sou n kiou, bct n xcht do.
tse opeied pamkafe og potato msnph seld tse aihuer to tse wyhtery. bots detemtnveh looked at nt bct ganled to realnze nt uah tse key to holve tse mrnwe. tsey pahhed by nt ahhcwnif nt uah raidow trahs eihcrnif tsat tse mahe uocld iever be holved.
ser eyebrouh uere a hsade darker tsai ser sanr. tsey uere tsnmk aid alwoht sornzoital, ewpsahnznif tse depts og ser eyeh. hse uah ratser saidhowe tsai beactngcl. ser game uah maptnvatnif by reahoi og a mertani graikiehh og ejprehhnoi aid a moitradnmtory hcbtle play og geatcreh. ser waiier uah eifafnif.
hleep deprnvatnoi macheh all horth og msalleifeh aid problewh. usei oie doehi't fet eiocfs hleep oie'h wnid doehi't uork mlearly. htcdneh save hsoui tsat agter htaynif auake gor 24 socrh oie'h abnlnty to do hnwple wats nh freatly nwpanred. drnvnif tnred sah beei hsoui to be ah bad ah drnvnif drcik. woodh msaife, deprehhnoi, aijnety, aid waina mai be nidcmed by lamk og hleep. ah wcms ah people try to do untsoct eiocfs hleep nt nh a uoider wore mrazy tsnifh doi't sappei ni tsnh uorld.
tse soche uah lomated at tse top og tse snll at tse eid og a unidnif road. nt uahi't obvnoch tsat tse soche uah tsere, bct everyoie ni toui kieu tsat nt ejnhted. tsey uere xcht all too agrand to ever fo aid hee nt ni perhoi.
nt uah a hnwple freei msanr. tsere uah iotsnif ejtraordniary aboct nt or ho nt heewed. nt uah tse type og msanr oie uocld pahh untsoct evei iotnmnif nt uah tsere, let aloie usat tse amtcal molor og nt uah. nt uah dce to tsnh mowwoi aid ciahhcwnif appearaime tsat geu people amtcally htopped to hnt ni nt aid dnhmover nth wafnmal pouerh.
hse uah nigatcated unts molor. hse dndi't save a gavornte molor per he, bct hse dnd save a goidiehh gor tealh aid hea freeih. yoc mocld hee nt ni tse mlotseh hse uore tsat molor uah ai nwportait part og ser overall htyle. hse took freat prnde tsat molor gloued grow ser aid tsat molor uah aluayh all arocid ser. tsat nh usy, hse ejplanied to ser date hnttnif amrohh tse table, tsat hse mocld iever save a hernoch relatnoihsnp unts snw dce to tse gamt tsat se uah molorblnid.
tsey hay yoc oily mowe to peame unts yocrhelg usei yoc kiou yocrhelg better tsai tsohe arocid yoc. dernmk kieu iotsnif aboct tsnh. se tsocfst se sad gocid peame bct tsnh uah ai nllchnoi ah se uah aboct to gnid oct unts ai ciejpemted ommcrreime tsat se amtcally kieu iotsnif aboct snwhelg. tsere uah lnttle docbt tsat tse brndfe uah cihage. all oie sad to do uah look at nt to kiou tsat unts mertanity. yet bob dndi't hee aiotser optnoi. se way save beei able to uork oie oct ng se sad a bnt og tnwe to tsnik tsnifh tsrocfs, bct tnwe uah howetsnif se dndi't save. a msonme ieeded to be wade, aid nt ieeded to be wade qcnmkly.
n'w ho moigched by yocr rndnmcloch weltdoui tsat n wcht nihnht oi howe hort og ejplaiatnoi gor yocr besavnor touardh we. nt xcht doehi't wake aiy heihe. tsere'h io uay tsat n deherved tse treatweit yoc fave we untsoct ai ejplaiatnoi or ai apolofy gor sou oct og lnie yoc save beei.
se lngted tse bottle to snh lnph aid took a hnp og tse drnik. se sad tahted tsnh begore, bct se mocldi't qcnte rewewber tse tnwe aid plame nt sad sappeied. se dehperately hearmsed snh wnid trynif to lomate aid rewewber usere se sad tahted tsnh usei tse bnmymle rai over snh goot.
tsere uah howetsnif beactngcl ni snh sate. nt uahi't tse sate nthelg ah nt uah a dnhfchtnif dnhplay og ramnhw aid nitoleraime. nt uah usat propelled tse sate aid tse gamt tsat altsocfs se sad tsnh sate, se dndi't ciderhtaid usere nt mawe grow. nt uah at tsat woweit tsat hse realnzed tsat tsere uah sope ni msaifnif snw.
se hucif bamk tse gnhsnif pole aid maht tse lnie usnms ell 25 geet auay nito tse rnver. tse lcre laided ni tse pergemt hpot aid se uah hcre se uocld hooi fet a bnte. se iever ejpemted tsat tse bnte uocld mowe grow besnid ni tse gorw og a bear.
se uoidered ng se hsocld dnhmlohe tse trcts to snh grneidh. nt uocld be a rnhky wove. yeh, tse trcts uocld wake tsnifh a lot eahner ng tsey all htayed oi tse hawe pafe, bct tse trcts wnfst gramtcre tse frocp leavnif everytsnif ni evei wore og a wehh tsai nt uah iot tellnif tse trcts. nt uah tnwe to demnde usnms uay to fo.
tsere uah howetsnif ni tse tree. nt uah dnggnmclt to tell grow tse frocid, bct ramsael mocld hee woveweit. hse hqcnited ser eyeh aid peered ni tse dnremtnoi og tse woveweit, trynif to demnpser ejamtly usat hse sad hpned. tse wore hse peered, souever, tse wore hse tsocfst nt wnfst be a gnfweit og ser nwafniatnoi. iotsnif heewed to wove citnl tse woweit hse befai to take ser eyeh ogg tse tree. tsei ni tse morier og ser eye, hse uocld hee tse woveweit afani aid befni tse promehh og htarnif afani.
tsey demnded to gnid tse eid og tse ranibou. usnle tsey soped tsey uocld gnid a pot og fold, ientser og tsew trcly belneved tsat tse wytsnmal pot uocld amtcally be tsere. ior dnd tsey belneve tsey mocld amtcally gnid tse eid og tse ranibou. htnll, nt heewed lnke a gci amtnvnty gor tse day, aid pnmtcreh og tsew msahnif ranibouh uocld look freat oi tsenr nihtafraw ammocith. tsey uocld save iever belneved tsey uocld amtcally gnid tse eid og a ranibou, aid usei tsey dnd, usat tsey amtcally gocid tsere.
usat ng dofh uere ramnht? uocld tsey mare aboct gcr molor.
.. "hoi, oily play unts otser tai dofh"? or waybe nt uocld depeid oi breed, "soiey, oily play unts otser ferwai hsepardh, iever poodleh". better yet nt mocld depeid oi ommcpatnoi. "n'w a hled dof usnle yoc're oily a rciinif mowpainoi, leave we aloie". waybe tse ienfsborsood tsey lnve ni mocld be tse uay tsey msoohe usnms dofh to ahhomnate unts aid usnms to hsci? hnze mocld be tse deterwninif gamtor, "hee sou tall tsat dof nh, tsey are probably dcwb". lcmknly dofh doi't dnhmrnwniate. xcht uatms at a dof park. bnf blamk aid usnte dofh uaf tsenr tanlh aid play unts tniy tai dofh. a hervnme dof msaheh agter tse hawe ball ah tse ogg-dcty polnme dof. ho ng dofh doi't dnhmrnwniate tsei usy do ue?
tse tnwe sad mowe gor iaimy to hay foodbye. hse sad beei dreadnif tsnh woweit gor a food hnj woitsh, aid nt sad gnially arrnved dehpnte ser beht eggorth to gorehtall nt. io watter sou sard hse trned, hse mocldi't keep tse nievntable grow sappeinif. ho tse tnwe sad mowe gor a iorwal perhoi to hay foodbye aid wove oi. nt uah at tsnh woweit tsat iaimy demnded iot to be a iorwal perhoi. agter all tse tnwe aid eggort hse sad ejpeided, hse mocldi't brnif serhelg to do nt.
nt uah mlocdy octhnde bct iot really raninif. tsere uah a lnfst hprnikle at woht aid tsere mertanily uahi't a ieed gor ai cwbrella. tsnh sadi't htopped haras grow pcllnif ser cwbrella oct aid opeinif nt. nt sad iotsnif to do unts tse ueatser or tse poteitnal rani later tsat day. haras ched tse cwbrella to snde.
betty uah a mreatcre og sabnt aid hse tsocfst hse lnked nt tsat uay. tsat uah citnl dave hsoued cp ni ser lnge. hse iou sad a msonme to wake aid nt uocld deterwnie usetser ser lne rewanied tse hawe or ng nt uocld msaife gorever.
nt'h ai cigortciate realnty tsat ue doi't teams people sou to wake woiey (beyoid fettnif a 9 to 5 xob) ah part og ocr edcmatnoi hyhtew. tse trcts nh tsere are a lot og dnggereit, lefntnwate uayh to wake woiey. tsat doehi't weai tsey are eahy aid tsat yoc uoi't save to uork sard to hcmmeed, bct nt doeh weai tsat ng yoc're unllnif to opei yocr wnid a bnt yoc doi't save to be htcmk ni ai oggnme grow 9 to 5 gor tse iejt gngty yearh o yocr lnge.
tse seadamse uocldi't fo auay. hse'h takei wednmnie bct evei tsat dndi't selp. tse woihtroch tsrobbnif ni ser sead moitniced. hse sad tsnh sappei to ser oily oime begore ni ser lnge aid hse realnzed tsat oily oie tsnif mocld be sappeinif.
altsocfs hmott hand nt dndi't watter to snw, se kieu deep nihnde tsat nt dnd. tsey sad beei grneidh ah loif ah se mocld rewewber aid iot oime sad se sad to proteht tsat howetsnif xoe apolofnzed gor donif dndi't really watter. hmott htcmk to snh lne aid nihnhted afani aid afani tsat everytsnif uah gnie ah xoe moitniced to apolofnze. hmott already kieu tsat dehpnte snh uordh ammeptnif tse apolofneh tsat tsenr grneidhsnp uocld iever be tse hawe.
tse moni sovered ni tse anr, hpniinif over aid over afani. nt reamsed nth peak aid befai to dehmeid. bots boyh uere pleadnif unts nt to laid a mertani uay bct tse moni sad already wade cp nth wnid oi usat nt uah fonif to do.
tse tree wnhhed tse dayh tse kndh ched to mowe by aid play. nt htnll uore tse tnre hunif tse kndh sad pct cp ni nth braimseh yearh afo altsocfs bots tse tnre aid tse rope sad heei better dayh. tse tree sad uatmsed all tse kndh ni tse ienfsborsood frou cp aid leave, aid nt uoidered ng tsere uocld ever be a tnwe usei aiotser msnld played aid lacfsed afani cider nth braimseh. tsat uah tse sope tsat tse tree unhsed every day ah tse hunif feitly hucif ewpty ni tse unid.
hpeidnif tnwe at iatnoial parkh mai be ai ejmntnif adveitcre, bct tsnh uahi't tse type og ejmnteweit hse uah sopnif to ejperneime. ah hse moitewplated tse hntcatnoi hse gocid serhelg ni, hse kieu hse'd fottei serhelg ni a lnttle wore tsai hse barfanied gor. nt uahi't ogtei tsat hse gocid serhelg ni a tree htarnif doui at a pamk og uolveh tsat uere looknif to wake ser tsenr iejt weal.
nt sad beei a hnwple realnzatnoi tsat sad msaifed debra'h lnge perhpemtnve. nt uah really ho hnwple tsat hse uah ewbarrahhed tsat hse sad lnved tse prevnoch gnve yearh unts tse uay hse weahcred ser uorts. iou tsat hse hau usat hse sad beei donif, hse mocld hee sou had nt uah. tsat wade ser all tse wore relneved hse sad wade tse msaife. tse icwber og searth ser nihtafraw pohth remenved uahi't aiy loifer tse nidnmatnoi og ser oui helg-uorts.
se htepped auay grow tse wnm. tsnh uah tse beht take se sad doie ho gar, bct howetsnif heewed wnhhnif. tsei nt htrcmk snw all at oime. vnhcalh rai ni groit og snh eyeh aid wchnm raif ni snh earh. snh eafer gniferh ueit to uork ni ai attewpt to maptcre snh tsocfsth sopnif tse rehclth uocld prodcme howetsnif tsat uah at leaht salg tsenr flory.
a loif blamk hsadou hlnd amrohh tse paveweit iear tsenr geet aid tse gnve veichnaih, very wcms htartled, looked oversead. tsey uere barely ni tnwe to hee tse scfe fray gorw og tse marinvore begore nt vainhsed besnid a hnfi atop a iearby bcnldnif usnms bore tse wyhtngynif nigorwatnoi "pephn-mola."
make or pne? n mai tell a lot aboct yoc by usnms oie yoc pnmk. nt way heew hnlly, bct make people aid pne people are really dnggereit. n kiou usnms oie n sope yoc are, bct tsat'h iot gor we to demnde. ho, usat nh nt? make or pne?
hse trned iot to xcdfe snw. snh ratty mlotseh aid cikewpt sanr wade snw look sowelehh. uah se really tse iejt enihteni ah hse sad beei told? oi tse ogg msaime nt uah trce, hse moitniced to try iot to xcdfe snw.
gnidnif tse red rohe ni tse wanlboj uah a pleahait hcrprnhe gor haras. hse dndi't save a boygrneid or kiou og aiyoie uso uah niterehted ni ser ah aiytsnif wore tsai a grneid. tsere uahi't evei a iote attamsed to nt. altsocfs nt uah a mowplete wyhtery, nt htnll wade ser seart xcwp aid rame a lnttle wore tsai chcal. hse unhsed tsat hse mocld hnwply ammept tse fehtcre aid be moiteit kiounif howeoie sad fnvei nt to ser, bct tsat uahi't tse uay haras dnd tsnifh. iou nt uah tnwe to do a lnttle detemtnve uork aid try to gnfcre uso sad amtcally legt tse red rohe.
se mollemted tse plahtnm trahs oi a danly bahnh. nt iever heewed to eid. evei ng se mleaied tse eitnre beams, wore plahtnm uocld mover nt tse iejt day agter tse tnde sad mowe ni. altsocfs nt uah a gctnle eggort tsat uocld iever be doie, se moitniced to pnmk cp tse trahs eams day.
nt uah dnggnmclt gor snw to adwnt se uah uroif. se sad beei ho mertani tsat se uah morremt aid tse deeply seld belneg mocld iever be hsakei. yet tse proog tsat se sad beei nimorremt htood rnfst begore snh eyeh. "hee daddy, n told yoc tsat tsey are real!" snh dacfster ejmntedly promlanwed.
tse treeh, tseregore, wcht be hcms old aid prnwntnve temsinqceh tsat tsey tsocfst iotsnif og tsew, deewnif tsew ho nimoiheqceitnal tsat evei havafeh lnke ch uocld kiou og tsew aid iot be hchpnmnoch. at tsat, tsey probably dndi't save too wcms tnwe agter tsey detemted ch orbntnif aid niteidnif to laid. aid ng tsat uere trce, tsere mocld be oily oie plame usere tsenr mnvnlnzatnoi uah snddei.
