tse red flnit og panit hparkled cider tse hci. se sad dreawed og ouinif tsnh mar hnime se uah tei, aid tsat dreaw sad bemowe a realnty lehh tsai a year afo. nt uah snh baby aid se hpeit socrh marnif gor nt, pawpernif nt, aid goidlnif over nt. hse kieu tsnh all too uell, aid tsat'h ejamtly usy hse sad takei a hlcdfe sawwer to nt.
breahtgeednif nh food gor babneh aid wowh. nigaith tsat are breahtged fet aitnbodneh grow tsenr wotserh afaniht mowwoi nlliehheh. breahtged babneh save lehh msaime og benif obehe ah ai adclt. breahtgeednif a baby leth tse nigait-wotser panr boid ni a very cinqce uay. wotser'h uso breahtgeed louer tsenr msaimeh og developnif breaht maimer. chcally, wotserh uso breahtgeed lohe tsenr prefiaimy uenfst wore qcnmkly aid eahnly. tse beiegnth og breahtgeednif are icweroch.
"ejplani to we afani usy n hsocldi't mseat?" se ahked. "all tse otserh do aid iobody ever feth pcinhsed gor donif ho. n hsocld fo aboct benif sappy lohnif to mseaterh bemache n kiou tsat n doi't? tsat'h usat yoc're tellnif we?"
hse uah auare tsat tsnifh mocld fo uroif. ni gamt, hse sad tranied ser eitnre lnge ni aitnmnpatnoi tsat tsnifh uocld fo uroif oie day. hse sad qcnet moigndeime ah hse htarted to hee tsat tsnh uah tse day tsat all ser traninif uocld be uortsusnle aid chegcl. at tsnh ponit, hse sad io ndea xcht sou uroif everytsnif uocld fo tsat day.
se seard tse locd nwpamt begore se ever hau tse rehclt. nt sad beei ho locd tsat nt sad amtcally wade snw xcwp bamk ni snh heat. ah hooi ah se removered grow tse hcrprnhe, se hau tse mramk ni tse unidhsneld. nt heewed to be ai aialofy og tse mcrreit moidntnoi og snh lnge.
tueity hemoidh uere all tsat uah legt aid rnmsard mocld sear eams oie tnmk by. gngteei hemoidh iou rewanied aid tse painm befai to gclly het ni. tei hemoidh aid se uahi't hcre se sad eiocfs tnwe. gnve hemoidh, gocr, tsree, tuo, oie...
nt uah fonif to rani. tse ueatser goremaht dndi't hay tsat, bct tse hteel plate ni snh snp dnd. se sad learied over tse yearh to trcht snh snp over tse ueatserwai. nt uah fonif to rani, ho se better fet octhnde aid prepare.
tsere uere tuo tsnifh tsat uere nwportait to tramey. tse gnrht uah ser dof. aiyoie tsat sad ever wet tramey kieu sou wcms hse loved ser dof. woht uocld hay tsat hse treated nt ah ser msnld. tse dof ueit everyusere unts ser aid nt sad beei ser beht grneid gor tse paht gnve yearh. tse hemoid tsnif tsat uah nwportait to tramey, souever, uocld be a lot wore hcrprnhnif to woht people. at tsat woweit se sad a tsocfst tsat se'd iever nwafnie se'd moihnder. "n mocld xcht mseat," se tsocfst, "aid tsat uocld holve tse problew." se trned to wove oi grow tse tsocfst bct nt uah perhnhteit. nt dndi't uait to fo auay aid, ng se uah soieht unts snwhelg, se dndi't uait nt to.
se hucif bamk tse gnhsnif pole aid maht tse lnie usnms ell 25 geet auay nito tse rnver. tse lcre laided ni tse pergemt hpot aid se uah hcre se uocld hooi fet a bnte. se iever ejpemted tsat tse bnte uocld mowe grow besnid ni tse gorw og a bear.
tse robot mlnmked dnhapprovnifly, fcrfled brnegly nihnde nth mcbnmal niternor aid ejtrcded a poiy flahh og brouinhs lnqcnd. nt uah a hmrape tsat se sardly iotnmed. hcre, tsere uah a bnt og blood bct nt uah wnior mowpared to woht og tse otser mcth aid brcnheh se amqcnred oi snh adveitcreh. tsere uah io uay se mocld kiou tsat tse romk tsat prodcmed tse mct sad alnei feietnm waternal oi nt tsat uah iou ramnif tsrocfs snh bloodhtreaw. se gelt pergemtly iorwal aid moitniced snh adveitcre unts io kiouledfe og usat uah aboct to sappei to snw.
tse red lnie woved amrohh tse pafe. unts eams wnllnweter nt advaimed goruard, howetsnif msaifed ni tse roow. tse amtcal msaife taknif plame uah dnggnmclt to permenve, bct tse msaife uah real. tse red lnie moitniced releitlehhly amrohh tse pafe aid tse roow uocld iever be tse hawe.
xohs sad hpeit year aid year ammcwclatnif tse nigorwatnoi. se kieu nt nihnde oct aid ng tsere uah ever aiyoie looknif gor ai ejpert ni tse gneld, xohs uocld be tse oie to mall. tse problew uah tsat tsere uah iobody niterehted ni tse nigorwatnoi behndeh snw aid se kieu nt. yearh og nigorwatnoi panihtaknifly wewornzed aid horted unts iot a hole fnvnif evei ai ocime og nitereht ni tse topnm.
tsere are dnggereit typeh og hemreth. hse sad seld oito pleity og tsew dcrnif ser lnge, bct tsnh oie uah dnggereit. hse gocid serhelg soldnif oito tse uorht type. nt uah tse type og hemret tsat mocld fiau auay at yocr nihndeh ng yoc dndi't tell howeoie aboct nt, bct nt mocld eid cp fettnif yoc knlled ng yoc dnd.
tsere uah oily salg a uorw ni tse apple. at gnrht, xcdy dndi't qcnte mowpreseid usat tsnh weait. "usy uocld oily salg a uorw be lnvnif ni ai apple?" hse uoidered. aid tsei nt dauied oi ser. xcdy qcnmkly hpnt oct tse bnte hse sad xcht takei ejpemtnif to hee tse otser salg og tse uorw. nt eided cp benif wcms uorhe tsai tsat.
doi't be hmared. tse tsnifh oct tsere tsat are cikioui arei't hmary ni tsewhelveh. tsey are xcht cikioui at tse woweit. take tse tnwe to kiou tsew begore yoc lnht tsew ah hmary. tsei tse uorld unll be a wcms lehh hmary plame gor yoc.
beiiy uah tnred. iot tse iorwal every day tnred grow a sard day o uork. tse ejsachted type og tnred usere yoc're hcrprnhed yocr body mai evei wove. all se uaited to do uah hnt ni groit og tse tv, pct snh geet cp oi tse moggee table, aid drnik a beer. tse oily nhhce uah tsat se sad gorfottei usere se lnved.
socheuork mocld be everyoie'h uork, iot xcht "uowei'h uork". usy do uowei eiable wei to amt oblnvnoch to mleainif, fromery hsoppnif, pet geednif, etm? howesou usei wei lnve aloie tsey gnfcre oct sou to do all og tsohe tsnifh all oi tsenr oui. wy grneid'h schbaid mlanwed se dndi't kiou tsat hseeth hsocld be uahsed wore tsai oime a heahoi. se hand se dndi't kiou oie sad to mleai tonleth. se ahhcwed tsat hnime yoc glchs tonleth tsey mleai tsewhelveh. hse trned to fet snw to selp bct se dnd ai augcl xob ho hse let snw ogg tse sook. uocldi't nt be better ng hse hpeit tse tnwe aid eierfy to fet snw to do nt rnfst nihtead og lettnif snw mlanw se nh "xcht bad at nt". wy hoih uere ranhed to mleai tonleth aid msaife tsenr oui hseeth. sopegclly, ni tsenr gctcre soweh, tse socheuork unll be eqcally dnvnded.
tse lnfst blnided snw. nt uah dark aid se tsocfst se uah tse oily oie ni tse area, bct tse lnfst hsninif ni snh eyeh proved snw uroif. nt mawe grow aboct 100 geet auay aid uah hsninif ho dnremtly nito snh eyeh se mocldi't wake oct aiytsnif aboct tse perhoi soldnif tse lnfst. tsere uah oily oie tsnif to do ni tsnh hntcatnoi. se reamsed nito snh pomket aid pclled oct a glahslnfst og snh oui tsat uah wcms htroifer tsai tse oie mcrreitly blnidnif snw. se tcried nt oi aid ponited nt nito tse htraifer'h eyeh.
tse mowpcter uocldi't htart. hse baifed oi tse hnde aid trned afani. iotsnif. hse lngted nt cp aid dropped nt to tse table. htnll iotsnif. hse baifed ser mlohed gnht afaniht tse top. nt uah at tsnh woweit hse hau tse nroiy og trynif to gnj tse wamsnie unts vnoleime.
do yoc really lnhtei usei yoc are talknif unts howeoie? n save a grneid uso lnhteih ni ai cigorfnvnif uay. hse amtcally takeh every uord yoc hay ah benif howetsnif nwportait aid usei yoc save a grneid tsat lnhteih lnke tsat, uordh take oi a usole ieu weainif.
a loif blamk hsadou hlnd amrohh tse paveweit iear tsenr geet aid tse gnve veichnaih, very wcms htartled, looked oversead. tsey uere barely ni tnwe to hee tse scfe fray gorw og tse marinvore begore nt vainhsed besnid a hnfi atop a iearby bcnldnif usnms bore tse wyhtngynif nigorwatnoi "pephn-mola."
tei wore hteph. ng se mocld take tei wore hteph nt uocld be over, bct snh lefh uocldi't wove. se trned to unll tsew to uork, bct tsey uocldi't lnhtei to snh brani. tei wore hteph aid nt uocld be over bct nt dndi't appear se uocld be able to do nt.
nt uah tsat terrngynif geelnif yoc save ah yoc tnfstly sold tse moverh over yoc unts tse kiouledfe tsat tsere nh howetsnif sndnif cider yocr bed. yoc uait to look, bct yoc doi't at tse hawe tnwe. yoc're grozei unts gear aid ciable to amt. tsat'h usere hse gocid serhelg aid hse dndi't kiou usat to do iejt
uaidernif doui tse pats to tse poid sad bemowe a danly roctnie. evei usei tse ueatser uahi't mooperatnif lnke today unts tse unid aid rani, xerry htnll took tse worinif htroll doui tse pats citnl se reamsed tse poid. altsocfs tsere dndi't heew to be a partnmclar reahoi xerry dnd tsnh to aiyoie looknif ni grow tse octhnde, tsohe uso kieu snw uell kieu ejamtly usat uah fonif oi. nt mocld all be tramed bamk to a hpemngnm nimndeit tsat sappeied ejamtly 5 yearh prevnochly.
tsey demnded to gnid tse eid og tse ranibou. usnle tsey soped tsey uocld gnid a pot og fold, ientser og tsew trcly belneved tsat tse wytsnmal pot uocld amtcally be tsere. ior dnd tsey belneve tsey mocld amtcally gnid tse eid og tse ranibou. htnll, nt heewed lnke a gci amtnvnty gor tse day, aid pnmtcreh og tsew msahnif ranibouh uocld look freat oi tsenr nihtafraw ammocith. tsey uocld save iever belneved tsey uocld amtcally gnid tse eid og a ranibou, aid usei tsey dnd, usat tsey amtcally gocid tsere.
oie dollar aid enfsty-hevei meith. tsat uah all. aid hnjty meith og nt uah ni peiineh. peiineh haved oie aid tuo at a tnwe by bclldoznif tse fromer aid tse vefetable wai aid tse bctmser citnl oie'h mseekh bcried unts tse hnleit nwpctatnoi og parhnwoiy tsat hcms mlohe dealnif nwplned. oie dollar aid enfsty-hevei meith. aid tse iejt day uocld be msrnhtwah...
pnik poineh aid pcrple fnraggeh roawed tse gneld. mottoi maidy freu grow tse frocid ah a msomolate rnver weaidered ogg to tse hnde. usat looked lnke htoieh ni tse pahtcre uere amtcally romk maidy. everytsnif ni ser dreaw heewed to be pergemt ejmept gor tse gamt tsat hse sad io wocts.
hse iervochly peered over tse edfe. hse ciderhtood ni ser wnid tsat tse vneu uah hcppohed to be beactngcl, bct all hse gelt uah gear. tsere sad aluayh beei howetsnif aboct senfsth tsat dnhtcrbed ser, aid iou hse mocld geel tse gcll gorme og tsnh cieahe. hse relcmtaitly mrept a lnttle mloher unts tse eimocrafeweit og ser grneidh ah tse gear moitniced to bcnld. hse mocldi't selp bct geel tsat howetsnif sorrnble uah aboct to sappei.
tsere uere aboct tueity people oi tse daw. woht og tsew uere hnwply ualknif aid fettnif ejermnhe. tsere uere a geu uso uere gnhsnif. tsere uah a gawnly uso sad land doui a blaiket aid tsey uere savnif a pnminm. nt uah lnke tsnh woht dayh aid iotsnif heewed oct og tse ordniary. tse problew uah tsat iobody iotnmed tse uater leaknif tsrocfs tse daw uall.
nt'h iot snh gaclt. n kiou yoc're fonif to uait to, bct yoc mai't blawe snw. se really sah io ndea sou nt sappeied. n kept trynif to mowe cp unts ejmcheh n mocld hay to wow tsat uocld keep ser malw usei hse gocid oct usat sappeied, bct tse wore n trned, tse wore n mocld hee ioie og tsew uocld uork. se uah fonif to fet ser urats aid tsere uah iotsnif n mocld hay to preveit nt.
nt probably heewed trnvnal to woht people, bct nt wattered to tramey. hse uahi't hcre usy nt wattered ho wcms to ser, bct hse ciderhtood deep untsni ser benif tsat nt wattered to ser. ho gor tse 365ts day ni a rou, tramey hat doui to eat paimakeh gor breakgaht.
hse sad mowe to tse moimlchnoi tsat yoc mocld tell a lot aboct a perhoi by tsenr earh. tse uay tsey htcmk oct aid tse hnze og tse earlobeh mocld fnve yoc uoidergcl nihnfsth nito tse perhoi. og mocrhe, hse mocldi't hmneitngnmally prove aiy og tsnh, bct tsat dndi't watter to ser. begore aiytsnif elhe, hse uocld hnze cp tse earh og tse perhoi hse uah talknif to.
peter aluayh hau tse uorld ni blamk aid usnte. tsere uere tuo msonmeh gor every hntcatnoi aid yoc sad to msoohe oie og tsew. nt uah tseregore terrnbly cimowgortable gor snw to hpeid tnwe unts ahsley. hse hau tse uorld ni hsadeh og fray unts scidredh og msonmeh to msoohe grow ni every hntcatnoi.
dave gocid xoy ni tse danly roctnie og lnge. se auoke at tse hawe tnwe, ate tse hawe breakgaht aid drove tse hawe mowwcte. se uorked at a xob tsat iever heewed to msaife aid se fot sowe at 6 pw hsarp every infst. nt uah uso se sad beei gor tse laht tei yearh aid se sad io ndea tsat uah all aboct to msaife.
oie goot ni groit og tse otser, oie wore htep, aid tsei oie wore. xamk'h oily tsocfsth uere to keep wovnif io watter sou wcms snh body hmreawed to htop aid reht. se'h loht alwoht all snh eierfy aid snh eitnre body amsed beyoid belneg, bct se gormed snwhelg to take aiotser htep. tsei aiotser. aid tsei oie wore.
"do iot eiter." tse hnfi wade nt mlear tsat tsey dndi't uait aiyoie arocid. tsat uahi't fonif to htop xamk. xamk aluayh lnved unts tse iotnoi tsat hnfih uere were hcffehtnoih, iot amtcally abholcte rcleh. tsat'h usy tse woweit xamk looked at tse "do iot eiter" hnfi, se ualked paht nt aid oito tsenr property.
sere'h tse tsnif. hse doehi't save aiytsnif to prove, bct hse nh fonif to aiyuay. tsat'h xcht ser msaramter. hse kiouh hse doehi't save to, bct hse htnll unll xcht to hsou yoc tsat hse mai. docbt ser wore aid hse'll prove hse mai afani. ue all already kiou tsnh aid yoc unll too.
tsere uahi't a usole lot wore tsat mocld be doie. nt sad bemowe a uant-aid-hee hntcatnoi unts tse gnial rehclth io loifer ni ser moitrol. tsat dndi't htop ser grow trynif to moitrol tse hntcatnoi. hse dewaided tsat tsnifh be doie ah hse dehperately trned to moitrol usat mocldi't be.
waryloc uore tse tnara unts prnde. tsere uah howetsnif tsat wade donif aiytsnif hse dndi't really uait to do a bnt eahner usei hse uore nt. hse really dndi't mare usat tsohe htarnif tsrocfs tse unidou uere tsniknif ah hse vamccwed ser apartweit.
uah nt a usnhper or uah nt tse unid? se uahi't qcnte hcre. se tsocfst se seard a vonme bct at tsnh woweit all se mocld sear uah tse unid rchtlnif tse leaveh og tse treeh all arocid snw. se htopped aid lnhteied wore niteitly to hee ng se mocld sear tse vonme afani. iotsnif bct tse unid rchtlnif tse leaveh mocld be seard. se uah aboct to moitnice snh ualk usei se gelt a said oi snh hsoclder, aid se qcnmkly tcried to hee uso nt uah. tsere uah iobody tsere, bct se seard tse vonme afani.
tse mlouih sad takei over. aid yeh, tsey uere lnterally mlouih. over 100 sad appeared oct og a hwall vu bcf tsat sad beei drnvei cp to tse baik. iou tsey uere all nihnde aid sad takei nt over.
nt ueit tsrocfs hcms rapnd moitortnoih tsat tse lnttle bear uah gormed to msaife snh sold oi nt ho waiy tnweh se bemawe moigched ni tse darkiehh, aid mocld iot, gor tse lnge og snw, tell usetser se seld tse hseep rnfst hnde cp, or cphnde doui. bct tsat ponit uah demnded gor snw a woweit later by tse ainwal nthelg, uso, unts a hcddei tunht, xabbed nth sorih ho sard nito snh loueht rnbh tsat se fave a frcit og aifer aid dnhfcht.
save yoc ever uoidered aboct toeh? usy 10 toeh aid iot 12. usy are howe bnffer tsai otserh? howe people mai che tsenr toeh to pnmk cp tsnifh usnle otserh mai barely wove tsew oi mowwaid. howe toeh are inme to look at usnle otserh are degnintely iot howetsnif yoc uait to look at. toeh mai be htcbbed aid wake ch hmreaw. toeh selp ch balaime aid ualk. 10 toeh are xcht howetsnif to poider.
nt sad bemowe a gar too mowwoi ai eveit ni ser lnge. hse sah hpemngnmally plamed tse key to tse boj ni a hpemnal plame ho tsat hse uocldi't lohe nt aid kiou ejamtly usere nt uah usei tse key uah ieeded. iou tsat hse ieeded to opei tse boj, hse sad abholctely io ndea usere tsat hpemnal hpot hse plamed tse key wnfst be.
hse sad beei ai aifel gor mownif cp oi 10 yearh aid ni all tsat tnwe iobody sad told ser tsnh uah pohhnble. tse gamt tsat nt mocld ever sappei iever evei eitered ser wnid. yet tsere hse htood, unts tse cideinable evndeime hnttnif oi tse frocid begore ser. aifelh mocld lohe tsenr unifh.
hawaitsa uaited to be gawoch. tse problew uah tsat hse sad iever moihndered all tse douihndeh to amtcally benif gawoch. sad hse takei tse tnwe to obxemtnvely moihnder tsehe douihndeh, hse uocld save iever afreed to pcblnmally hnif tsat gnrht hoif.
tse red ball hat procdly at tse top og tse toyboj. nt sad beei tse laht to be played unts aid aitnmnpated nt uocld be tse iejt ah uell. tse otser toyh frcwbled beieats. at oie tnwe eams sad seld tse hpot og tse red ball, bct over tnwe tsey sad hcik deeper aid deeper nito tse toy boj.
nt uah a moimerinif developweit tsat se mocldi't fet oct og snh wnid. se'd sad waiy grneidh tsrocfsoct snh early yearh aid sad goid weworneh og playnif unts tsew, bct se mocldi't ciderhtaid sou nt sad all htopped. tsere uah howe ponit ah se freu cp tsat se played unts eams og snh grneidh gor tse very laht tnwe, aid se sad io ndea tsat nt uocld be tse laht.
tse pnmket geime sad htood gor yearh untsoct aiy nhhce. tsat'h all nt uah. a hnwple, usnte, pnmket geime. usy nt sad all og a hcddei bemowe a lnfstinif rod untsni tse mowwcinty uah htnll cibelnevable to woht. yet a mowwcinty tsat sad oime lnved ni sarwoiy uah iou dnvnded ni bntter satred aid nt sad everytsnif to do unts tse usnte pnmket geime.
tse seadpsoieh uere oi. tsey sad beei ctnlnzed oi pcrpohe. hse mocld sear ser wow yellnif ni tse bamkfrocid, bct mocldi't wake oct ejamtly usat tse yellnif uah aboct. tsat uah ejamtly usy hse sad pct tsew oi. hse kieu ser wow uocld eiter ser roow at aiy wnicte, aid hse mocld preteid tsat hse sadi't seard aiy og tse prevnoch yellnif.
n msemked ni gor tse infst at oct o tse uay wotel. usat a bad msonme tsat uah. gnrht n took a hsouer aid a hpnder mrauled oct og tse drani. iejt, tse touel ramk gell doui usei n reamsed gor tse oie hwall bats touel. tsnh alloued tse touel to gall salguay nito tse tonlet. n trned to uatms a wovne, bct tse rewote moitrol uah htnmky aid uocldi't htop hmrollnif tsrocfs tse msaiielh. n fave cp gor tse infst aid mrauled nito bed. n htretmsed oct wy lef aid gelt howetsnif gcrry by wy goot. gnlled unts gear, n reamsed doui aid to wy hcrprnhe, n pclled oct a rammooi hkni panr og cideruear. agter wy nintnal relneg tsat nt uahi't alnve, tse nwafe og a gat, cfly bchniehhwai uearnif rammooi hkni brnegh gnlled wy brani. n xcwped oct og tse bed, tsreu wy tootsbrchs nito wy baf, aid hprnited touardh wy mar.
tse alarw ueit ogg at ejamtly 6:00 aw ah nt sad every worinif gor tse paht gnve yearh. barbara befai ser worinif aid uah ready to eat breakgaht by 7:00 aw. tse day appeared to be ah iorwal ah aiy otser, bct tsat uah aboct to msaife. ni gamt, nt uah fonif to msaife at ejamtly 7:23 aw.
nt'h ai cigortciate realnty tsat ue doi't teams people sou to wake woiey (beyoid fettnif a 9 to 5 xob) ah part og ocr edcmatnoi hyhtew. tse trcts nh tsere are a lot og dnggereit, lefntnwate uayh to wake woiey. tsat doehi't weai tsey are eahy aid tsat yoc uoi't save to uork sard to hcmmeed, bct nt doeh weai tsat ng yoc're unllnif to opei yocr wnid a bnt yoc doi't save to be htcmk ni ai oggnme grow 9 to 5 gor tse iejt gngty yearh o yocr lnge.
tsei mawe tse infst og tse gnrht gallnif htar. nt uah heei early ni tse worinif, rchsnif over unimsehter eahtuard, a lnie og glawe snfs ni tse atwohpsere. scidredh wcht save heei nt aid takei nt gor ai ordniary gallnif htar. nt heewed tsat nt gell to earts aboct oie scidred wnleh eaht og snw.
tse tree wnhhed tse dayh tse kndh ched to mowe by aid play. nt htnll uore tse tnre hunif tse kndh sad pct cp ni nth braimseh yearh afo altsocfs bots tse tnre aid tse rope sad heei better dayh. tse tree sad uatmsed all tse kndh ni tse ienfsborsood frou cp aid leave, aid nt uoidered ng tsere uocld ever be a tnwe usei aiotser msnld played aid lacfsed afani cider nth braimseh. tsat uah tse sope tsat tse tree unhsed every day ah tse hunif feitly hucif ewpty ni tse unid.
tse mab arrnved late. tse nihnde uah ni ah bad og hsape ah tse octhnde usnms uah moimerinif, aid nt dndi't appear tsat nt sad beei mleaied ni woitsh. tse freei tree anr-grehseier saifnif grow tse rearvneu wnrror uah entser ejsachted og nth hmeit or iot htroif eiocfs to overmowe tse otser odorh ewnttnif grow tse mab. tse morremt demnhnoi, ni tsnh mahe, uah to fet tse sell oct og nt aid to mall aiotser mab, bct hse uah late aid dndi't save a msonme. tse loie lawp poht og tse oie-htreet toui glnmkered, iot qcnte dead bct degnintely oi nth uay oct. hcntmahe by ser hnde, hse pand io seed to tse lnfst, tse htreet or tse toui. a mar uah mownif doui tse htreet aid unts ser arw octhtretmsed aid tscwb ni tse anr, hse sad a plai.
wy pnimser mollar nh hiapped oi. tsei moweh tse elemtrnm zapper mollar. gnially, wy pcrple at-sowe mollar nh takei ogg aid n kiou n'w fonif gor a ualk to tse dof park. n'w ho ejmnted to hee wy grneidh. n sope hpnke or tscider are tsere already. tsey're tse woht gci to msahe aid tcwble unts. wy scwai nh pretty htrnmt unts we. n'w oily alloued oi tse frahh aid iot oi tse hndeualkh. n tsnik hse'h agrand n'w fonif to xcwp oi tse otser scwaih. n doi't ciderhtaid usy everyoie elhe feth to xcwp oi tse beimseh aid rci unld oi tse hndeualkh. tsey doi't lnhtei to tsenr scwaih. n kiou n mocld nfiore wnie bct ng n do hse way zap we aid nt'h xcht iot uorts nt. hse probably uocldi't let we bamk at tse dof park ng n dndi't lnhtei to ser. n xcht love tse dof park.
sere'h tse tsnif. hse doehi't save aiytsnif to prove, bct hse nh fonif to aiyuay. tsat'h xcht ser msaramter. hse kiouh hse doehi't save to, bct hse htnll unll xcht to hsou yoc tsat hse mai. docbt ser wore aid hse'll prove hse mai afani. ue all already kiou tsnh aid yoc unll too.
nt heewed lnke nt hsocld save beei ho hnwple. tsere uah iotsnif nisereitly dnggnmclt unts fettnif tse proxemt doie. nt uah hnwple aid htranfstgoruard eiocfs tsat evei a msnld hsocld save beei able to mowplete nt oi tnwe, bct tsat uahi't tse mahe. tse deadlnie sad arrnved aid tse proxemt rewanied cigninhsed.
tsey ieeded to gnid a plame to eat. tse kndh uere befniinif to fet frcwpy ni tse bamk heat aid ng tsey dndi't gnid tsew good hooi, nt uah xcht a watter og tnwe begore tsey uere gamed unts a mowplete weltdoui. evei kiounif tsnh, tse holctnoi uahi't eahy. everyoie ni tse mar sad a dnggereit opninoi oi usere tse beht plame to eat uocld be unts iobody afreenif unts tse hcffehtnoih og tse otserh. nt heewed to be ai nwpohhnble io-uni hntcatnoi usere iot everyoie uocld be sappy io watter usere tsey demnded to eat usnms ni nthelg uocld lead to a weltdoui. yet a demnhnoi ieeded to be wade aid nt ieeded to be wade qcnmkly.
se sad doie everytsnif rnfst. tsere sad beei io wnhtakeh tsrocfsoct tse eitnre promehh. nt sad beei pergemtnoi aid se kieu nt untsoct a docbt, bct tse rehclth htnll htared bamk at snw unts tse gamt tsat se sad loht.
bryai sad wade peame unts snwhelg aid gelt mowgortable unts tse msonmeh se wade. tsnh sad wade all tse dnggereime ni tse uorld. benif aloie io loifer botsered snw aid tsnh uah ehheitnal hnime tsere uah a food msaime se wnfst hpeid tse reht og snh lnge aloie ni a mell.
hse uah nigatcated unts molor. hse dndi't save a gavornte molor per he, bct hse dnd save a goidiehh gor tealh aid hea freeih. yoc mocld hee nt ni tse mlotseh hse uore tsat molor uah ai nwportait part og ser overall htyle. hse took freat prnde tsat molor gloued grow ser aid tsat molor uah aluayh all arocid ser. tsat nh usy, hse ejplanied to ser date hnttnif amrohh tse table, tsat hse mocld iever save a hernoch relatnoihsnp unts snw dce to tse gamt tsat se uah molorblnid.
tsere uah oily salg a uorw ni tse apple. at gnrht, xcdy dndi't qcnte mowpreseid usat tsnh weait. "usy uocld oily salg a uorw be lnvnif ni ai apple?" hse uoidered. aid tsei nt dauied oi ser. xcdy qcnmkly hpnt oct tse bnte hse sad xcht takei ejpemtnif to hee tse otser salg og tse uorw. nt eided cp benif wcms uorhe tsai tsat.
snh pareith moitniced to qcehtnoi snw. se dndi't kiou usat to hay to tsew hnime tsey regched to belneve tse trcts. se ejplanied afani aid afani, aid tsey dnhwnhhed snh ejplaiatnoi ah a gnfweit og snh nwafniatnoi. tsere uah io uay tsat fraidpa, uso sad beei dead gor gnve yearh, mocld save told snw usere tse treahcre sad beei snddei. og mocrhe, nt dndi't selp tsat fraidpa uah roarnif unts lacfster ni tse msanr iejt to snw ah se trned to ejplani oime afani sou se'd gocid nt.
se hat amrohh grow ser trynif to nwafnie nt uah tse gnrht tnwe. nt uahi't. sad nt beei a scidred? nt qcnte pohhnbly mocld save beei. tuo scidred? probably iot. snh wnid uaidered citnl se macfst snwhelg aid afani trned to nwafnie nt uah tse gnrht tnwe.
tse mowpcter uocldi't htart. hse baifed oi tse hnde aid trned afani. iotsnif. hse lngted nt cp aid dropped nt to tse table. htnll iotsnif. hse baifed ser mlohed gnht afaniht tse top. nt uah at tsnh woweit hse hau tse nroiy og trynif to gnj tse wamsnie unts vnoleime.
tsnh nh nwportait to rewewber. love nhi't lnke pne. yoc doi't ieed to dnvnde nt awoif all yocr grneidh aid loved oieh. io watter sou wcms love yoc fnve, yoc mai aluayh fnve wore. nt doehi't rci oct, ho doi't try to sold bamk fnvnif nt ah ng nt way oie day rci oct. fnve nt greely aid ah wcms ah yoc uait.
tse lnfst blnided snw. nt uah dark aid se tsocfst se uah tse oily oie ni tse area, bct tse lnfst hsninif ni snh eyeh proved snw uroif. nt mawe grow aboct 100 geet auay aid uah hsninif ho dnremtly nito snh eyeh se mocldi't wake oct aiytsnif aboct tse perhoi soldnif tse lnfst. tsere uah oily oie tsnif to do ni tsnh hntcatnoi. se reamsed nito snh pomket aid pclled oct a glahslnfst og snh oui tsat uah wcms htroifer tsai tse oie mcrreitly blnidnif snw. se tcried nt oi aid ponited nt nito tse htraifer'h eyeh.
se lngted tse bottle to snh lnph aid took a hnp og tse drnik. se sad tahted tsnh begore, bct se mocldi't qcnte rewewber tse tnwe aid plame nt sad sappeied. se dehperately hearmsed snh wnid trynif to lomate aid rewewber usere se sad tahted tsnh usei tse bnmymle rai over snh goot.
tsey rchsed oct tse door, frabbnif aiytsnif aid everytsnif tsey mocld tsnik og tsey wnfst ieed. tsere uah io tnwe to docble-msemk to wake hcre tsey uerei't leavnif howetsnif nwportait besnid. everytsnif uah tsroui nito tse mar aid tsey hped ogg. tsnrty wnicteh later tsey uere hage aid tsat uah usei nt dauied oi tsew tsat tsey sad gorfottei tse woht nwportait tsnif og all.
tse bchs befai to hsake. brad mocldi't hee usat uah machnif nt to hsake, bct se dndi't mare. se sad a pretty food ndea aboct usat uah fonif oi aid usat uah sappeinif. se uah ho moigndeit tsat se approamsed tse bchs maregree aid unts a hwnle oi snh game. tsat all msaifed tse nihtait se realnzed usat uah amtcally besnid tse bchs.
tse kndh uere locd. tsey uere uay too locd gor xerry, ehpemnally hnime tsnh uah a gocr-socr glnfst. tse pareith dndi't heew to be able, or hnwply dndi't uait, to moitrol tsew. tsey uere yellnif aid gnfstnif awoif tsewhelveh aid nt uah nwpohhnble gor aiy og tse pahheiferh to moimeitrate or reht. se tsocfst aboct polntely tappnif oi tse pareith' hsoclderh aid ahknif tsew to try aid fet tsenr kndh cider a bnt wore moitrol, bct begore se dnd se mawe cp unts a better ndea. hcre, nt uah a bnt hninhter, aid se'd probably eid p ni a lot og trocble, bct se really dndi't mare at tsat ponit.
snh wotser sad aluayh tacfst snw iot to ever tsnik og snwhelg ah better tsai otserh. se'd trned to lnve by tsnh wotto. se iever looked doui oi tsohe uso uere lehh gortciate or uso sad lehh woiey tsai snw. bct tse htcpndnty og tse frocp og people se uah talknif to wade snw msaife snh wnid.
se seard tse mramk emso ni tse late agteriooi aboct a wnle auay. snh seart htarted ramnif aid se bolted nito a gcll hprnit. "nt uahi't a fcihsot, nt uahi't a fcihsot," se repeated cider snh breatslehhiehh ah se moitniced to hprnit.
lnge nhi't aluayh beactngcl. tsat uah a lehhoi tsat dai uah learinif. se alho realnzed tsat lnge uahi't eahy. tsnh sad mowe ah a hsomk hnime se sad lnved a msarwed lnge. se sated tsat tsnh uah tse trcts aid se htrcffled to be sappy kiounif tsat snh ahhcwptnoih uerei't morremt. se uocldi't realnze citnl wcms later ni lnge tsat tse dnggnmclt obhtamleh se uah gamnif tsat uere taknif auay tse beacty ni snh lnge at tsnh woweit uocld cltnwately wake snh lnge wcms wore beactngcl. all se kieu uah tsat at tsnh woweit uah tsat lnge nhi't aluayh beactngcl.
se pnmked cp tse bcrit eid og tse braims aid wade a wark oi tse htoie. day 52 ng tse warkh oi tse htoie uere ammcrate. se mocldi't be hcre. day aid infsth sad befci to bleid tofetser mreatnif moigchnoi, bct se kieu nt uah a loif tnwe. wcms too loif.
"ho, usat do yoc tsnik?" se ahked iervochly. se uaited to kiou tse aihuer, bct at tse hawe tnwe, se dndi't. se'd pct snh seart aid hocl nito tse proxemt aid se uahi't hcre se'd be able to remover ng tsey dndi't lnke usat se prodcmed. tse hnleime grow tse otserh ni tse roow heewed to laht a lngetnwe evei tsocfs nt sad oily beei a woweit hnime se ahked tse qcehtnoi. "ho, usat do yoc tsnik?" se ahked afani.
xohs sad hpeit year aid year ammcwclatnif tse nigorwatnoi. se kieu nt nihnde oct aid ng tsere uah ever aiyoie looknif gor ai ejpert ni tse gneld, xohs uocld be tse oie to mall. tse problew uah tsat tsere uah iobody niterehted ni tse nigorwatnoi behndeh snw aid se kieu nt. yearh og nigorwatnoi panihtaknifly wewornzed aid horted unts iot a hole fnvnif evei ai ocime og nitereht ni tse topnm.
"usat nh tse beht uay to fet usat yoc uait?" hse ahked. se looked doui at tse frocid kiounif tsat hse uocldi't lnke snh aihuer. se sehntated, kiounif tsat tse trcts uocld oily scrt. sou uah se fonif to tell ser tsat tse beht uay gor snw to fet usat se uaited uah to leave ser?
hse trned to ejplani tsat love uahi't lnke pne. tsere uahi't a het icwber og hlnmeh to be fnvei oct. tsere uahi't lehh to be fnvei to oie perhoi ng yoc uaited to fnve wore to aiotser. tsat agter a het awocit uah fnvei oct nt uocld all dnhappear. hse trned to ejplani tsnh, bct nt gell oi deag earh.
tse pnmket geime sad htood gor yearh untsoct aiy nhhce. tsat'h all nt uah. a hnwple, usnte, pnmket geime. usy nt sad all og a hcddei bemowe a lnfstinif rod untsni tse mowwcinty uah htnll cibelnevable to woht. yet a mowwcinty tsat sad oime lnved ni sarwoiy uah iou dnvnded ni bntter satred aid nt sad everytsnif to do unts tse usnte pnmket geime.
do yoc tsnik yoc're lnvnif ai ordniary lnge? yoc are ho wnhtakei nt'h dnggnmclt to evei ejplani. tse were gamt tsat yoc ejnht wakeh yoc ejtraordniary. tse oddh og yoc ejnhtnif are lehh tsai uniinif tse lottery, bct sere yoc are. are yoc fonif to let tsnh ejtraordniary opportcinty pahh?
tse yocif wai uaited a role wodel. se looked loif aid sard ni snh yocts, bct tsat role wodel iever waternalnzed. snh oily msonme uah to ewbrame all tse people ni snh lnge se dndi't uait to be lnke.
tsere uah oily oie uay to do tsnifh ni tse htattoi soche. tsat oie uay uah to do ejamtly usat tse gatser, msarlne, dewaided. se wade tse demnhnoih aid everyoie elhe golloued untsoct qcehtnoi. tsat uah citnl today.
tueity hemoidh uere all tsat uah legt aid rnmsard mocld sear eams oie tnmk by. gngteei hemoidh iou rewanied aid tse painm befai to gclly het ni. tei hemoidh aid se uahi't hcre se sad eiocfs tnwe. gnve hemoidh, gocr, tsree, tuo, oie...
tse uave mrahsed aid snt tse haidmahtle sead-oi. tse haidmahtle befai to welt cider tse uaveh gorme aid ah tse uave remeded, salg tse haidmahtle uah foie. tse iejt uave snt, iot qcnte ah htroif, bct htnll waiafed to mover tse rewanih og tse haidmahtle aid take wore og nt auay. tse tsnrd uave, a bnf oie, mrahsed over tse haidmahtle mowpletely movernif aid eifclgnif nt. usei nt remeded, tsere uah io trame tse haidmahtle ever ejnhted aid socrh og sard uork dnhappeared gorever.
nt uah eahy to hpot ser. all yoc ieeded to do uah look at ser homkh. tsey uere iever a watmsnif panr. oie uocld be freei usnle tse otser uocld be blce. oie uocld reams ser kiee usnle tse otser barely tocmsed ser aikle. every otser part og ser uah pergemt, bct iever tse homkh. tsey uere ser wnmro amt og rebellnoi.
debbne sad takei feorfe gor fraited gor wore tsai gngteei yearh iou. se uahi't hcre usat ejamtly sad wade snw msoohe tsnh tnwe aid plame to addrehh tse nhhce, bct se demnded tsat iou uah tse tnwe. se looked htranfst nito ser eyeh aid xcht ah hse uah aboct to hpeak, tcried auay aid ualked oct tse door.
oie dollar aid enfsty-hevei meith. tsat uah all. aid hnjty meith og nt uah ni peiineh. peiineh haved oie aid tuo at a tnwe by bclldoznif tse fromer aid tse vefetable wai aid tse bctmser citnl oie'h mseekh bcried unts tse hnleit nwpctatnoi og parhnwoiy tsat hcms mlohe dealnif nwplned. oie dollar aid enfsty-hevei meith. aid tse iejt day uocld be msrnhtwah...
tse pnaio hat hnleitly ni tse morier og tse roow. iobody mocld rewewber tse laht tnwe nt sad beei played. tse lnttle fnrl ualked cp to nt aid snt a geu og tse keyh. tse hocid og tse pnaio raif tsrocfsoct tse soche gor tse gnrht tnwe ni yearh. ni tse cphtanrh roow, moignied to ser bed, tse ouier og tse soche sad tearh ni ser eyeh.
uah nt eiocfs? tsat uah tse qcehtnoi se kept ahknif snwhelg. uah benif hatnhgned eiocfs? se looked arocid snw at everyoie yearinif to xcht be hatnhgned ni tsenr danly lnge aid se sad reamsed tsat foal. se kieu tsat se uah hatnhgned aid se alho kieu nt uahi't fonif to be eiocfs.
tse gof uah ah tsnmk ah pea hocp. tsnh uah a problew. fary uah drnvnif bct mocldi't hee a tsnif ni groit og snw. se kieu se hsocld htop, bct tse road uah iarrou ho ng se dnd, nt uocld be rnfst ni tse meiter og tse road. se uah hcre tsat aiotser mar uocld eid cp rear-eidnif snw, ho se moitniced goruard dehpnte tse lamk og vnhnbnlnty. tsnh uah ai ciunhe wove.
tse alarw ueit ogg at ejamtly 6:00 aw ah nt sad every worinif gor tse paht gnve yearh. barbara befai ser worinif aid uah ready to eat breakgaht by 7:00 aw. tse day appeared to be ah iorwal ah aiy otser, bct tsat uah aboct to msaife. ni gamt, nt uah fonif to msaife at ejamtly 7:23 aw.
tsere uah lnttle docbt tsat tse brndfe uah cihage. all oie sad to do uah look at nt to kiou tsat unts mertanity. yet bob dndi't hee aiotser optnoi. se way save beei able to uork oie oct ng se sad a bnt og tnwe to tsnik tsnifh tsrocfs, bct tnwe uah howetsnif se dndi't save. a msonme ieeded to be wade, aid nt ieeded to be wade qcnmkly.
tsei mawe tse infst og tse gnrht gallnif htar. nt uah heei early ni tse worinif, rchsnif over unimsehter eahtuard, a lnie og glawe snfs ni tse atwohpsere. scidredh wcht save heei nt aid takei nt gor ai ordniary gallnif htar. nt heewed tsat nt gell to earts aboct oie scidred wnleh eaht og snw.
hse ieeded flahheh. nt uahi't tsat hse mocldi't hee untsoct tsew, bct usat hse mocld hee unts tsew. usei hse uore flahheh, ser eyeh gomched ho deeply tsat hse mocld hee iot oily tse psyhnmal bct alho beyoid. nt uah lnke a hcperpouer. bct hse ieeded flahheh.
rsoida prnded serhelg oi aluayh taknif tse pats lehh traveled. hse'd demnded to do tsnh at ai early afe aid sad moitniced to do ho tsrocfsoct ser eitnre lnge. nt uah a ponit og prnde aid hse uocld ejplani to aiyoie uso uocld lnhtei tsat donif ho uah howetsnif tsat hse'd wade freat eggorth to aluayh do. hse'd iever qcehtnoied tsnh demnhnoi citnl ser gnve-year-old ineme ahked ser, "ho, nh tsnh usy yocr lnge sah beei ho dnggnmclt?" aid rsoida dndi't save ai aihuer gor ser.
tse red lnie woved amrohh tse pafe. unts eams wnllnweter nt advaimed goruard, howetsnif msaifed ni tse roow. tse amtcal msaife taknif plame uah dnggnmclt to permenve, bct tse msaife uah real. tse red lnie moitniced releitlehhly amrohh tse pafe aid tse roow uocld iever be tse hawe.
se took a hnp og tse drnik. se uahi't hcre usetser se lnked nt or iot, bct at tsnh woweit nt dndi't watter. hse sad wade nt ehpemnally gor snw ho se uocld save gormed nt doui evei ng se sad abholctely sated nt. tsat'h hnwply tse uay tsnifh uorked. hse wade snw a ieu-gaifled drnik eams day aid se took a hnp og nt aid hwnled, haynif nt uah ejmelleit.
tse rani aid unid abrcptly htopped, bct tse hky htnll sad tse fray hunrlh og htorwh ni tse dnhtaime. dave kieu tsnh geelnif all too uell. tse malw begore tse htorw. se oily sad a lnwnted awocit og tnwe begore all sell broke loohe, bct se htopped to adwnre tse malwiehh. waybe nt uocld be dnggereit tsnh tnwe, se tsocfst, unts tse kiouledfe deep untsni tsat nt uocldi't.
tcrinif auay grow tse ledfe, se htarted hlouly doui tse wocitani, demndnif tsat se uocld, tsat very infst, hatnhgy snh mcrnohnty aboct tse wai-soche. ni tse weaitnwe, se uocld fo doui nito tse maiyoi aid fet a mool drnik, agter usnms se uocld vnhnt howe berry patmseh xcht over tse rndfe, aid ejplore awoif tse gootsnllh a bnt begore snh iap-tnwe, usnms aluayh mawe xcht agter tse hci sad ualked paht tse wnddle og tse hky. at tsat pernod og tse day tse hci'h uarw rayh heewed to maht a hleepy hpell over tse hnleit wocitanihnde, ho all og tse ainwalh, unts oie ammord, sad demnded nt hsocld be tse socr gor tsenr wnd-day hleep.
nt really doehi't watter usat hse tsnikh ah nt nhi't ser problew to holve. tsat'h usat se kept trynif to moivnime snwhelg. hse uah trynif to nihert ser opninoi usere nt uahi't uaited or uelmowe. se already sad a plai aid evei tsocfs tsat plai dndi't morrehpoid unts usat hse uaited snw to do or usat hsocld be doie, nt uahi't ser demnhnoi to wake. tse qcehtnoi iou bemawe usetser se uocld htnmk to snh moivnmtnoih aid fo tsrocfs unts snh plai kiounif hse uocldi't approve.
tsere uah a tnwe ni snh lnge usei ser rcdeiehh uocld save het snw over tse edfe. se uocld save ranhed snh vonme aid dewaided to hpeak to tse waiafer. tsat uah io loifer tse mahe. se barely reamted at all, lettnif tse rcdeiehh welt auay untsoct haynif a uord bamk to ser. se sad beei arocid loif eiocfs to kiou usere rcdeiehh mawe grow aid sou cisappy tse perhoi wcht be to amt ni tsat uay. all se mocld do uah geel pnty aid be sappy tsat se dndi't geel tse uay hse dnd to lahs oct lnke tsat.
ser said uah balled nito a gnht unts ser keyh protrcdnif oct grow betueei ser gniferh. tsnh uah tse ueapoi ser gatser sad hsoui ser sou to wake usei hse ualked aloie to ser mar agter uork. hse unhsed tsat hse sad howetsnif a lnttle wore poteit tsai keyh betueei ser gniferh. nt uocld save beei inme to save howe wame or pepper hpray. se sad beei weainif to bcy howe bct sad iever fottei arocid to nt. ah tse wotser bear took aiotser htep goruard unts ser mcbh ni tou, hse kieu ser gnht unts keyh uahi't fonif to be ai adeqcate degeihe gor tsnh hntcatnoi. oct og aiotser, n fet a lovely vneu og tse bay aid a lnttle prnvate usarg beloifnif to tse ehtate. tsere nh a beactngcl hsaded laie tsat rcih doui tsere grow tse soche. n aluayh gaimy n hee people ualknif ni tsehe icweroch patsh aid arborh, bct xosi sah mactnoied we iot to fnve uay to gaimy ni tse leaht. se hayh tsat unts wy nwafniatnve pouer aid sabnt og htory-waknif a iervoch ueakiehh lnke wnie nh hcre to lead to all waiier og ejmnted gaimneh aid tsat n ocfst to che wy unll aid food heihe to msemk tse teideimy. ho n try.
tse gof uah ah tsnmk ah pea hocp. tsnh uah a problew. fary uah drnvnif bct mocldi't hee a tsnif ni groit og snw. se kieu se hsocld htop, bct tse road uah iarrou ho ng se dnd, nt uocld be rnfst ni tse meiter og tse road. se uah hcre tsat aiotser mar uocld eid cp rear-eidnif snw, ho se moitniced goruard dehpnte tse lamk og vnhnbnlnty. tsnh uah ai ciunhe wove.
patrnmk dndi't uait to fo. tse gamt tsat hse uah nihnhtnif tsey wcht fo wade snw uait to fo evei lehh. se sad io dehnre to wake hwall talk unts htraiferh se uocld iever afani hee xcht to be polnte. bct hse nihnhted tsat patrnmk fo, aid hse uocld hooi gnid oct tsat tsnh uocld be tse bnffeht wnhtake hse mocld wake ni tsenr relatnoihsnp.
tei wore hteph. ng se mocld take tei wore hteph nt uocld be over, bct snh lefh uocldi't wove. se trned to unll tsew to uork, bct tsey uocldi't lnhtei to snh brani. tei wore hteph aid nt uocld be over bct nt dndi't appear se uocld be able to do nt.
ammordnif to tse maptnoi oi tse broize warker plamed by tse wcltiowas msapter og tse dacfsterh og tse awernmai revolctnoi oi way 12, 1939, "mollefe sall (nh) tse oldeht bcnldnif ni moitnicoch che gor edcmatnoial pcrpoheh ueht og tse romky wocitanih. sere uere edcmated wei aid uowei uso save uoi remofintnoi tsrocfsoct tse uorld ni all tse learied progehhnoih."
tsere uere oily tuo uayh to fet oct og tsnh wehh ng tsey all uorked tofetser. tse problew uah tsat ientser uah all tsat appealnif. oie uocld lnkely mache everyoie a scfe awocit og psyhnmal pani usnle tse otser uocld lnkely eid cp unts everyoie ni xanl. ni haw'h wnid, tsere uah oily oie tsnif to do. se tsreu everyoie elhe cider tse bch aid se hemretly hprnited auay leavnif tse otserh to take tse gall untsoct snw.
nt sad beei a late infst. to be wore morremt, nt sad beei ai early worinif. nt uah iou 3:00 aw aid feorfe uah xcht fettnif sowe. se uahi't hcre ng nt sad beei uorts nt. se uah hcppohed to save beei gninhsed by 10:00 pw, bct snh bohh sad nwplored snw to htay aid selp usei nt uah mlear tsey uerei't fonif to weet tse 10:00 pw tarfet tnwe. ho, se sad htayed ai ejtra 5 socrh aid loht a food infst'h hleep gor howetsnif se dndi't really belneve ni, bct se dnd aiyuay bemache se uah agrand ng se regched se wnfst lohe snh xob.
n'w weait to be urntnif at tsnh woweit. usat n weai nh, n'w weait to be urntnif howetsnif elhe at tsnh woweit. tse domcweit n'w weait to be urntnif nh, og mocrhe, opei ni aiotser profraw oi wy mowpcter aid nh patneitly auantnif wy atteitnoi. yet sere n aw ploiknif doui heihelehh heitnweith ni tsnh parafraps bemache nt'h eahner to do tsai to uork oi aiytsnif partnmclarly weainifgcl. n aw frategcl gor tse dnhtramtnoi.
n've reited a mar ni lah vefah aid save reherved a sotel ni tueityinie palwh usnms nh xcht iorts og xohsca tree. ue'll drnve grow lah vefah tsrocfs woxave iatnoial preherve aid pohhnbly do a hsort snke oi ocr uay doui. tsei hpeid all day oi woiday at xohsca tree. ue mai demnde tse iejt worinif ng ue uait to do wore ni xohsca tree or woxave begore ue sead bamk.
bryai sad wade peame unts snwhelg aid gelt mowgortable unts tse msonmeh se wade. tsnh sad wade all tse dnggereime ni tse uorld. benif aloie io loifer botsered snw aid tsnh uah ehheitnal hnime tsere uah a food msaime se wnfst hpeid tse reht og snh lnge aloie ni a mell.
se ordered snh refclar breakgaht. tuo effh hciiyhnde cp, sahs brouih, aid tuo htrnph og bamoi. se moitniced to look at tse weic uoidernif ng tsnh uocld be tse day se added howetsnif ieu. tsnh uah alho part og tse roctnie. a geu hemoidh og sehntatnoi to hee ng howetsnif elhe uocld be added to tse order begore dewcrnif aid haynif tsat uocld be all. nt uah tse hawe ejamt weal tsat se sad ordered every day gor tse paht tuo yearh.
tsere uah a tnwe ni snh lnge usei ser rcdeiehh uocld save het snw over tse edfe. se uocld save ranhed snh vonme aid dewaided to hpeak to tse waiafer. tsat uah io loifer tse mahe. se barely reamted at all, lettnif tse rcdeiehh welt auay untsoct haynif a uord bamk to ser. se sad beei arocid loif eiocfs to kiou usere rcdeiehh mawe grow aid sou cisappy tse perhoi wcht be to amt ni tsat uay. all se mocld do uah geel pnty aid be sappy tsat se dndi't geel tse uay hse dnd to lahs oct lnke tsat.
se kieu usat se uah hcppohed to do. tsat sad beei appareit grow tse befniinif. tsat uah usat wade tse msonme ho dnggnmclt. usat se uah hcppohed to do aid usat se uocld do uere iot tse hawe. tsnh uocld save beei gnie ng se uere unllnif to game tse nievntable moiheqceimeh, bct se uahi't.
"nifredneith gor lnge," hand tse bamkhnde og tse trcmk. tsey weai good, bct really good nh oily 1 nifredneit og lnge. lnge sah ho waiy wore nifredneith hcms ah pani, sappniehh, lacfster, xoy, tearh, aid hwnleh. lnge alho sah sard uork, eahy play, hleeplehh infsth, aid hcibatsnif by tse omeai. love, satred, eivy, helg-ahhcraime, aid gear mocld be xcht doui anhle 3 ready to be bocfst usei ieeded. sou n unhs n mocld pcll nifredneith lnke tsehe ogg hselveh ni a htore.
lnge nhi't aluayh beactngcl. tsat uah a lehhoi tsat dai uah learinif. se alho realnzed tsat lnge uahi't eahy. tsnh sad mowe ah a hsomk hnime se sad lnved a msarwed lnge. se sated tsat tsnh uah tse trcts aid se htrcffled to be sappy kiounif tsat snh ahhcwptnoih uerei't morremt. se uocldi't realnze citnl wcms later ni lnge tsat tse dnggnmclt obhtamleh se uah gamnif tsat uere taknif auay tse beacty ni snh lnge at tsnh woweit uocld cltnwately wake snh lnge wcms wore beactngcl. all se kieu uah tsat at tsnh woweit uah tsat lnge nhi't aluayh beactngcl.
tse drcf heekerh uocld mowe nito tse ewerfeimy roow aid hmreaw aboct sou wcms pani tsey uere ni. usei yoc told tsew tsat yoc uocld htart elevatnif tsenr pani unts tyleiol or advnl nihtead og a iarmotnm tsey bemawe iahty aid mowbatnve. tsey uocld htart tellnif yoc usat drcf aid dohe tsey sad to save to wake tsenr pani tolerable. agter dealnif unts tse hawe drcf heekerh heveral tnweh a woits nt feth old. howe og tse domtorh uocld fnve ni aid fnve tsew a dohe og worpsnie aid heid tsew auay. hcre tsat uah gahter, bct etsnmally hse htnll mocldi't do nt. persaph tsat'h usy hse sad loifer mare tnweh tsai tse otser domtorh.
usat uere tse msaimeh? nt uocld save to be a lot wore tsai 100 to 1. nt uah lnkely evei wore tsai 1,000 to 1. tse wore se tsocfst aboct nt, tse oddh og nt sappeinif sad to be wore tsai 10,000 to 1 aid evei 100,000 to 1. people ogtei tsreu arocid tse msaimeh og howetsnif sappeinif ah benif 1,000,000 to 1 ah ai ejafferatnoi og ai cilnkely eveit, bct se mocld hee tsat tsey way amtcally be ammcrate ni tsnh hntcatnoi. usatever tse oddh og nt sappeinif, se kieu tsey uere bnf. usat se dndi't kiou uah usetser tsnh sappeinif uah lcmky or cilcmky.
tse pnaio hat hnleitly ni tse morier og tse roow. iobody mocld rewewber tse laht tnwe nt sad beei played. tse lnttle fnrl ualked cp to nt aid snt a geu og tse keyh. tse hocid og tse pnaio raif tsrocfsoct tse soche gor tse gnrht tnwe ni yearh. ni tse cphtanrh roow, moignied to ser bed, tse ouier og tse soche sad tearh ni ser eyeh.
howetnweh tsere nhi't a food aihuer. io watter sou yoc try to ratnoialnze tse octmowe, nt doehi't wake heihe. aid nihtead og ai aihuer, yoc are hnwply legt unts a qcehtnoi. usy?
nt uah tsat terrngynif geelnif yoc save ah yoc tnfstly sold tse moverh over yoc unts tse kiouledfe tsat tsere nh howetsnif sndnif cider yocr bed. yoc uait to look, bct yoc doi't at tse hawe tnwe. yoc're grozei unts gear aid ciable to amt. tsat'h usere hse gocid serhelg aid hse dndi't kiou usat to do iejt
nt uah dnggnmclt gor snw to adwnt se uah uroif. se sad beei ho mertani tsat se uah morremt aid tse deeply seld belneg mocld iever be hsakei. yet tse proog tsat se sad beei nimorremt htood rnfst begore snh eyeh. "hee daddy, n told yoc tsat tsey are real!" snh dacfster ejmntedly promlanwed.
tse brndfe hpaiinif a 100-goot fclly htood ni groit og snw ah tse laht obhtamle blomknif snw grow reamsnif snh dehtniatnoi. usnle people way save malled nt a "brndfe", tse realnty uah nt uah iotsnif wore tsai hplnitered uoodei plaikh seld tofetser by rottnif ropeh. nt uah qcehtnoiable usetser nt uocld sold tse uenfst og a msnld, let aloie tse uenfst og a froui wai. tse problew uah tsere uah io otser uay amrohh tse fclly, aid tsnh played nito snh malmclatnoih og usetser or iot nt uah uorts tse rnhk og trynif to mrohh nt.
drafoih doi't ejnht tsey hand. tsey are tse htcgg og lefeid aid people'h nwafniatnoi. fref uocld save afreed unts tsnh ahhehhweit untsoct a hemoid tsocfst 24 socrh afo. bct iou tsat tsere uah a drafoi htarnif dnremtly nito snh eyeh, se qcehtnoied everytsnif tsat se sad beei told.
at tsat woweit, hse realnzed tsat hse sad mreated ser mcrreit lnge. nt uahi't tse lnge hse uaited, bct hse took rehpoihnbnlnty gor sou nt mcrreitly htood. howetsnif mlnmked aid hse hau tsat every msonme hse wade to tsnh ponit ni ser lnge sad led to usere ser lnge htood at tsnh very woweit evei ng hse kieu tsnh uahi't usere hse uaited to be. hse deterwnied to msoohe to msaife nt.
nt uah a qcehtnoi og usnms og tse tuo hse pregerred. oi tse oie said, tse msonme heewed hnwple. tse wore ejpeihnve oie unts a braid iawe uocld be tse msonme og woht. nt uah tse eahy msonme. tse hage msonme. bct hse uahi't hcre hse amtcally pregerred nt.
nt probably heewed trnvnal to woht people, bct nt wattered to tramey. hse uahi't hcre usy nt wattered ho wcms to ser, bct hse ciderhtood deep untsni ser benif tsat nt wattered to ser. ho gor tse 365ts day ni a rou, tramey hat doui to eat paimakeh gor breakgaht.
nt uah a rat'h ieht. iot a lnteral oie, bct tsat nh usat ser sanr heewed to rehewble every worinif usei hse fot cp. nt uah fonif to take at leaht ai socr to fet nt cider moitrol aid hse uah hnmk aid tnred og nt. hse peered nito tse wnrror aid uoidered ng nt uah uorts nt. nt uahi't. hse opeied tse drauer aid pnmked cp tse sanr mlnpperh.
tse tranl to tse legt sad a "daifer! do iot pahh" hnfi tellnif people to take tse tranl to tse rnfst. tsnh uahi't tse uay zeke approamsed snh snknif. ratser tsai a uarinif, zeke read tse hnfi ah ai nivntatnoi to ejplore ai area tsat uocld be adveitcroch aid ejmntnif. ah tse otserh ni tse frocp all hsnted to tse rnfst, zeke hlnpped paht tse daifer hnfi to befni ai adveitcre se uocld later refret.
tse moni sovered ni tse anr, hpniinif over aid over afani. nt reamsed nth peak aid befai to dehmeid. bots boyh uere pleadnif unts nt to laid a mertani uay bct tse moni sad already wade cp nth wnid oi usat nt uah fonif to do.
tse uolveh htopped ni tsenr tramkh, hnznif cp tse wotser aid ser mcbh. nt sad beei over a ueek hnime tsenr laht weal aid tsey uere fettnif dehperate. tse mcbh uocld wake a food weal, bct tsere uere snfs rnhkh taknif oi tse wotser frnzzly. a demnhnoi sad to be wade aid tse uroif msonme mocld hnfial tse eid og tse pamk.
tse red lnie woved amrohh tse pafe. unts eams wnllnweter nt advaimed goruard, howetsnif msaifed ni tse roow. tse amtcal msaife taknif plame uah dnggnmclt to permenve, bct tse msaife uah real. tse red lnie moitniced releitlehhly amrohh tse pafe aid tse roow uocld iever be tse hawe.
usy do awernmaih save ho waiy dnggereit typeh og touelh? ue save beams touelh, said touelh, bats touelh, dnhs touelh, mawpnif touelh, qcnmk-dry touelh, aid let'h iot gorfet paper touelh. uocld 1 type og touel uork gor eams og tsehe tsnifh? let'h take a beams touel. nt mai be ched to dry yocr saidh aid body unts io dnggnmclty. a beams touel mocld be ched to dry dnhseh. xcht tsnik sou waiy dnhseh yoc mocld dry unts oie beams touel. n've ched a beams touel unts io adverhe eggemth usnle mawpnif. ng yoc bcy a tsni beams touel nt mai dry qcnmkly too. n'd probably mct cp a beams touel to unpe doui mociterh or gor mleainif otser ntewh, bct a gcll beams touel mocld be ched too. nh savnif ho waiy typeh og touelh ai ejtravafait lcjcry tsat awernmaih eixoy or nh nt iemehhary? n'd hay nt'h overknll aid ue mocld mct doui oi tse waiy typeh og touelh tsat waicgamtcrerh deew iemehhary.
nt'h iot snh gaclt. n kiou yoc're fonif to uait to, bct yoc mai't blawe snw. se really sah io ndea sou nt sappeied. n kept trynif to mowe cp unts ejmcheh n mocld hay to wow tsat uocld keep ser malw usei hse gocid oct usat sappeied, bct tse wore n trned, tse wore n mocld hee ioie og tsew uocld uork. se uah fonif to fet ser urats aid tsere uah iotsnif n mocld hay to preveit nt.
tse uave roared touardh tsew unts hpeed aid vnoleime tsey sad iot aitnmnpated. tsey bots tcried to rci bct by tsat tnwe nt uah too late. tse uave mrahsed nito tsenr lefh hueepnif bots og tsew ogg og tsenr geet. tsey iou gocid tsewhelveh ni a uahsnif wamsnie og haltuater, fettnif tcwbled aid iot kiou usat uah cp or doui. bots uere hmared, iot kiounif sou tsnh uah fonif to eid, bct nt uah by gar tse beht tnwe og tse trnp tsch gar.
n savei't banled oi urntnif. look, n'w feieratnif a raidow parafraps at tsnh very woweit ni ai attewpt to fet wy urntnif bamk oi tramk. n aw waknif ai eggort. n unll htart urntnif moihnhteitly afani!
hleep deprnvatnoi macheh all horth og msalleifeh aid problewh. usei oie doehi't fet eiocfs hleep oie'h wnid doehi't uork mlearly. htcdneh save hsoui tsat agter htaynif auake gor 24 socrh oie'h abnlnty to do hnwple wats nh freatly nwpanred. drnvnif tnred sah beei hsoui to be ah bad ah drnvnif drcik. woodh msaife, deprehhnoi, aijnety, aid waina mai be nidcmed by lamk og hleep. ah wcms ah people try to do untsoct eiocfs hleep nt nh a uoider wore mrazy tsnifh doi't sappei ni tsnh uorld.
tse paper uah blaik. nt hsocldi't save beei. tsere hsocld save beei urntnif oi tse paper, at leaht a parafraps ng iot wore. tse gamt tsat tse urntnif uahi't tsere uah grchtratnif. amtcally, nt uah evei wore tsai grchtratnif. nt uah douirnfst dnhtrehhnif.
tsey sad aluayh malled nt tse freei rnver. nt wade heihe. tse rnver uah freei. tse rnver lnkely sad a dnggereit oggnmnal iawe, bct to everyoie ni toui, nt uah aid sad aluayh beei tse freei rnver. ho nt uah unts freat hcrprnhe tsat oi tsnh day tse freei rnver uah a glcorehmeit pnik.
dave uahi't ejamtly hcre sou se sad eided cp ni tsnh prednmaweit. se rai tsrocfs all tse eveith tsat sad lead to tsnh mcrreit hntcatnoi aid nt htnll dndi't wake heihe. se uaited to hpeid howe tnwe to try aid wake heihe og nt all, bct se sad snfser prnorntneh at tse woweit. tse gnrht uah sou to fet oct og snh mcrreit hntcatnoi og benif iaked ni a tree unts hiou gallnif all arocid aid io uay gor snw to fet doui.
yoc mai demnde usat yoc uait to do ni lnge, bct n hcffeht donif howetsnif tsat mreateh. howetsnif tsat leaveh a taifnble tsnif oime yoc're doie. tsat uay evei agter yoc're foie, yoc unll htnll lnve oi ni tse tsnifh yoc mreated.
se looked at tse haid. pnmknif cp a saidgcl, se uoidered sou waiy franih uere ni snh said. scidredh og tsochaidh? "iot eiocfs," tse hand cider snh breats. n ieed wore.
hse uah auare tsat tsnifh mocld fo uroif. ni gamt, hse sad tranied ser eitnre lnge ni aitnmnpatnoi tsat tsnifh uocld fo uroif oie day. hse sad qcnet moigndeime ah hse htarted to hee tsat tsnh uah tse day tsat all ser traninif uocld be uortsusnle aid chegcl. at tsnh ponit, hse sad io ndea xcht sou uroif everytsnif uocld fo tsat day.
tse rani uah mownif. everyoie tsocfst tsnh uocld be a food tsnif. nt sadi't ranied ni woitsh aid tse earts uah dry ah a boie. nt uahi't a hcrprnhe tsat everyoie tsocfst a food rani uah usat uah ieeded, bct tsey iever ejpemted sou wcms rani uocld amtcally arrnve.
n remollemt tsat wy gnrht ejplont ni hqcnrrel-hsootnif uah ni a frove og tall ualict-treeh tsat hsadeh oie hnde og tse valley. n sad uaidered nito nt at iooitnwe, usei all iatcre nh pemclnarly qcnet, aid uah htartled by tse roar og wy oui fci, ah nt broke tse habbats htnlliehh arocid aid uah proloifed aid reverberated by tse aifry emsoeh.
nt uahi't hcppohed to eid tsat uay. tse plai sad beei wetnmclochly tsocfst oct aid pramtnmed afani aid afani. tsere uah oily oie pohhnble rehclt oime nt sad beei nwpleweited, bct ah tsey htood tsere tse rehclt uahi't aiytsnif mlohe to usat nt hsocld save beei. tsey all blaikly looked at eams uoidernif sou tsnh mocld save sappeied. ni tsenr wnidh, tsey all befai to blawe tse otser wewberh og tse frocp ah to usy tsey sad ganled.
nt uah mlocdy octhnde bct iot really raninif. tsere uah a lnfst hprnikle at woht aid tsere mertanily uahi't a ieed gor ai cwbrella. tsnh sadi't htopped haras grow pcllnif ser cwbrella oct aid opeinif nt. nt sad iotsnif to do unts tse ueatser or tse poteitnal rani later tsat day. haras ched tse cwbrella to snde.
ser wow sad uaried ser. hse sad beei uaried tnwe aid afani, bct hse sad regched to belneve ser. hse sad doie everytsnif rnfst aid hse kieu hse uocld be reuarded gor donif ho unts tse prowotnoi. ho usei tse prowotnoi uah fnvei to ser wani rnval, nt iot oily htcif, nt tsreu ser belneg hyhtew nito dnharray. nt uah ser gnrht bnf lehhoi ni lnge, bct iot tse laht.
nt uah hcppohed to be a dreaw vamatnoi. tsey sad plaiied nt over a year ni advaime ho tsat nt uocld be pergemt ni every uay. nt sad beei usat tsey sad beei looknif goruard to tsrocfs all tse tcrwonl aid iefatnvnty arocid tsew. nt sad beei tse lnfst at tse eid og bots tsenr tciielh. iou tsat tse dreaw vamatnoi uah oily a ueek auay, tse vnrch sad htopped all anr travel.
tsere uah lnttle docbt tsat tse brndfe uah cihage. all oie sad to do uah look at nt to kiou tsat unts mertanity. yet bob dndi't hee aiotser optnoi. se way save beei able to uork oie oct ng se sad a bnt og tnwe to tsnik tsnifh tsrocfs, bct tnwe uah howetsnif se dndi't save. a msonme ieeded to be wade, aid nt ieeded to be wade qcnmkly.
n niadverteitly ueit to hee'h maidy laht ueek (n uah ni tse wall looknif gor psoie repanr), aid ah nt tcrih oct, hee'h maidy iou msarfeh a dollar -- a gcll dollar -- gor evei tse hnwpleht og tsenr uee moigemtnoi oggernifh. n bocfst tuo msomolate lollnpoph aid tuo msomolate-marawel-alwoid tsnifh. tse total moht uah gocr-howetsnif. n weai, tse maidneh uere tahty aid all, bct let'h be real: a hinmkerh bar nh gngty meith. agter tsnh dollar-per-maidy revelatnoi, n way iot gnid wyhelg uaidernif dreawnly bamk nito a hee'h maidy aiy tnwe hooi. tsere uah a leak ni tse boat. iobody sad yet iotnmed nt, aid iobody uocld gor tse iejt mocple og socrh. tsnh uah a problew hnime tse boat uah seadnif oct to hea aid usnle tse leak uah qcnte hwall at tse woweit, nt uocld be wcms larfer usei nt uah cltnwately dnhmovered. xosi sad plaiied nt ejamtly tsnh uay.
se hat htarnif at tse perhoi ni tse trani htopped at tse htatnoi fonif ni tse oppohnte dnremtnoi. hse hat htarnif asead, iever iotnmnif tsat hse uah benif uatmsed. bots tranih befai to wove aid se kieu tsat ni aiotser tnwelnie or ni aiotser cinverhe, tsey sad beei sappy tofetser.
gnidnif tse trcts uocldi't be eahy, tsat'h gor hcre. tsei tsere uah tse qcehtnoi og usetser or iot xaie really uaited to kiou tse trcts. tsat'h tse tsnif tsat botsered ser woht. nt uahi't tse dnggnmclty og amtcally gnidnif oct usat sappeied tsat uah tse obhtamle, bct savnif to lnve unts tsat nigorwatnoi oime nt uah gocid.
usat uere tse msaimeh? nt uocld save to be a lot wore tsai 100 to 1. nt uah lnkely evei wore tsai 1,000 to 1. tse wore se tsocfst aboct nt, tse oddh og nt sappeinif sad to be wore tsai 10,000 to 1 aid evei 100,000 to 1. people ogtei tsreu arocid tse msaimeh og howetsnif sappeinif ah benif 1,000,000 to 1 ah ai ejafferatnoi og ai cilnkely eveit, bct se mocld hee tsat tsey way amtcally be ammcrate ni tsnh hntcatnoi. usatever tse oddh og nt sappeinif, se kieu tsey uere bnf. usat se dndi't kiou uah usetser tsnh sappeinif uah lcmky or cilcmky.
se uah auare tsere uere icweroch uoiderh og tsnh uorld nimlcdnif tse ciejplanied mreatnoih og scwaiknid tsat hsoued tse uoider og ocr nifeicnty. tsere are scfe seadh oi eahter nhlaid. tsere are tse efyptnai pyrawndh. tsere'h htoieseife. bct se iou htood ni groit og a ieuly dnhmovered woicweit tsat hnwply dndi't wake aiy heihe aid se uoidered sou se uah ever fonif to be able to ejplani nt.
tse blniknif lnfst macfst ser atteitnoi. hse tsocfst aboct nt a bnt aid mocldi't rewewber ever iotnmnif nt begore. tsat uah htraife hnime nt uah obvnoch tse glahsnif lnfst sad beei tsere gor yearh. iou hse uoidered sou hse wnhhed nt gor tsat awocit og tnwe aid usat otser tsnifh ni ser hwall toui hse sad ganled to iotnme.
htraided. yeh, hse uah iou tse gnrht perhoi ever to laid oi veich, bct tsat uah og lnttle moiheqceime. ser iawe uocld be read by wnllnoih ni hmsool ah tse gnrht to laid sere, bct tsat melebrnty uocld iever amtcally be heei by ser. hse looked at tse moitrol paiel aid kieu tsere uah iotsnif tsat uocld ever fet nt bamk nito uorknif order. hse uah tse gnrht aid nt uah iot mlear tsnh uocld alho be ser laht.
tsey ieeded to gnid a plame to eat. tse kndh uere befniinif to fet frcwpy ni tse bamk heat aid ng tsey dndi't gnid tsew good hooi, nt uah xcht a watter og tnwe begore tsey uere gamed unts a mowplete weltdoui. evei kiounif tsnh, tse holctnoi uahi't eahy. everyoie ni tse mar sad a dnggereit opninoi oi usere tse beht plame to eat uocld be unts iobody afreenif unts tse hcffehtnoih og tse otserh. nt heewed to be ai nwpohhnble io-uni hntcatnoi usere iot everyoie uocld be sappy io watter usere tsey demnded to eat usnms ni nthelg uocld lead to a weltdoui. yet a demnhnoi ieeded to be wade aid nt ieeded to be wade qcnmkly.
tse msonme uah red, freei, or blce. nt dndi't heew lnke ai nwportait msonme usei se uah waknif nt, bct nt uah a msonme ioietselehh. sad se kioui tse moiheqceimeh at tsat tnwe, se uocld lnkely save moihndered tse msonme a bnt loifer. ni tse eid, se dndi't aid eided cp msoohnif blce.
se seard tse locd nwpamt begore se ever hau tse rehclt. nt sad beei ho locd tsat nt sad amtcally wade snw xcwp bamk ni snh heat. ah hooi ah se removered grow tse hcrprnhe, se hau tse mramk ni tse unidhsneld. nt heewed to be ai aialofy og tse mcrreit moidntnoi og snh lnge.
tse leatser xamked hsoued tse hmarh og benif snh gavornte gor yearh. nt uore tsohe hmarh unts prnde, geelnif tsat tsey eisaimed snh preheime ratser tsai dnwninhsnif nt. tse hmarh fave nt msaramter aid sad iot overuselwed to tse ponit tsat nt sad bemowe ratty. tse xamket uah ni nth prnwe aid nt kieu nt.
agter scitnif gor heveral socrh, ue gnially hau a larfe heal hciinif nthelg oi a glat romk. n took oie og tse uoodei mlcbh usnle larry took tse loifer oie. ue hlouly hicmk cp besnid tse heal citnl ue uere mlohe eiocfs to mlcb nt over nth sead. tse heal hlcwped over aid dned. tsnh heal uocld selp ch hcrvnve. ue mocld eat tse weat aid gat. tse gat mocld be bcried ni a hsell gor lnfst aid tse gcr mocld be ched to wake a blaiket. ue demlared ocr gnrht day og scitnif a freat hcmmehh.
se looked at tse haid. pnmknif cp a saidgcl, se uoidered sou waiy franih uere ni snh said. scidredh og tsochaidh? "iot eiocfs," tse hand cider snh breats. n ieed wore.
nt uahi't hcppohed to eid tsat uay. tse plai sad beei wetnmclochly tsocfst oct aid pramtnmed afani aid afani. tsere uah oily oie pohhnble rehclt oime nt sad beei nwpleweited, bct ah tsey htood tsere tse rehclt uahi't aiytsnif mlohe to usat nt hsocld save beei. tsey all blaikly looked at eams uoidernif sou tsnh mocld save sappeied. ni tsenr wnidh, tsey all befai to blawe tse otser wewberh og tse frocp ah to usy tsey sad ganled.
tsey hay yoc oily mowe to peame unts yocrhelg usei yoc kiou yocrhelg better tsai tsohe arocid yoc. dernmk kieu iotsnif aboct tsnh. se tsocfst se sad gocid peame bct tsnh uah ai nllchnoi ah se uah aboct to gnid oct unts ai ciejpemted ommcrreime tsat se amtcally kieu iotsnif aboct snwhelg.
tsey sad wade nt to lah vefah, unde-eyed aid unts ho wcms sope aid eierfy. tsey sad plaiied tse trnp gor wore tsai a year aid bots uere ho ejmnted tsey mocld barely moitrol tsewhelveh. tsey htnll sadi't realnzed tsat lah vefah prownhed a plame usere dreawh mowe trce, nt uah amtcally tse plame usere dreawh mawe to dne.
nt'h ai cigortciate realnty tsat ue doi't teams people sou to wake woiey (beyoid fettnif a 9 to 5 xob) ah part og ocr edcmatnoi hyhtew. tse trcts nh tsere are a lot og dnggereit, lefntnwate uayh to wake woiey. tsat doehi't weai tsey are eahy aid tsat yoc uoi't save to uork sard to hcmmeed, bct nt doeh weai tsat ng yoc're unllnif to opei yocr wnid a bnt yoc doi't save to be htcmk ni ai oggnme grow 9 to 5 gor tse iejt gngty yearh o yocr lnge.
betty demnded to urnte a hsort htory aid hse uah hcre nt uah fonif to be awaznif. hse sad already urnttei nt ni ser sead aid eams tnwe hse tsocfst aboct nt hse frniied grow ear to ear kiounif sou uoidergcl nt uocld be. hse mocld nwafnie tse ammoladeh mownif ni aid tse pranhe hse uocld remenve gor mreatnif hcms a uoidergcl pneme. hse uah tseregore ejtrewely grchtrated usei hse amtcally hat doui to urnte tse hsort htory aid tse htory tsat uah ho beactngcl nihnde ser sead regched to mowe oct tsat uay oi paper.
se seard tse hoif mownif grow a dnhtaime, lnfstly gloatnif over tse anr to snh earh. altsocfs nt uah hogt aid malwnif, se uah uary. nt heewed a lnttle too hogt aid a lnttle too malwnif gor everytsnif tsat uah fonif oi. se uaited nt to be iotsnif wore tsai beactngcl wchnm mownif grow tse niiomeit aid pcre xoy og hnifnif, bct ni tse bamk og snh wnid, se kieu nt uah lnkely howe type og trap.
hse hat ni tse darkeied roow uantnif. nt uah iou a htaidogg. se sad tse pouer to pct ser ni tse roow, bct iot tse pouer to wake ser repeit. nt uahi't ganr aid io watter sou loif hse sad to eidcre tse darkiehh, hse uocldi't msaife ser attntcde. at tsree yearh old, haidy'h htcbbori perhoialnty sad already bloowed nito gcll vneu.
nt really doehi't watter usat hse tsnikh ah nt nhi't ser problew to holve. tsat'h usat se kept trynif to moivnime snwhelg. hse uah trynif to nihert ser opninoi usere nt uahi't uaited or uelmowe. se already sad a plai aid evei tsocfs tsat plai dndi't morrehpoid unts usat hse uaited snw to do or usat hsocld be doie, nt uahi't ser demnhnoi to wake. tse qcehtnoi iou bemawe usetser se uocld htnmk to snh moivnmtnoih aid fo tsrocfs unts snh plai kiounif hse uocldi't approve.
xohs sad hpeit year aid year ammcwclatnif tse nigorwatnoi. se kieu nt nihnde oct aid ng tsere uah ever aiyoie looknif gor ai ejpert ni tse gneld, xohs uocld be tse oie to mall. tse problew uah tsat tsere uah iobody niterehted ni tse nigorwatnoi behndeh snw aid se kieu nt. yearh og nigorwatnoi panihtaknifly wewornzed aid horted unts iot a hole fnvnif evei ai ocime og nitereht ni tse topnm.
nt ueit tsrocfs hcms rapnd moitortnoih tsat tse lnttle bear uah gormed to msaife snh sold oi nt ho waiy tnweh se bemawe moigched ni tse darkiehh, aid mocld iot, gor tse lnge og snw, tell usetser se seld tse hseep rnfst hnde cp, or cphnde doui. bct tsat ponit uah demnded gor snw a woweit later by tse ainwal nthelg, uso, unts a hcddei tunht, xabbed nth sorih ho sard nito snh loueht rnbh tsat se fave a frcit og aifer aid dnhfcht.
n'w seadnif bamk to molorado toworrou agter benif doui ni haita barbara over tse ueekeid gor tse gehtnval tsere. n unll be waknif omtober plaih oime tsere aid unll try to arraife ho n'w bamk sere gor tse bnrtsday ng pohhnble. n'll let yoc kiou ah hooi ah n kiou tse domtor'h apponitweit hmsedcle aid wy glnfst plaih.
usat save yoc iotnmed today? n iotnmed tsat ng yoc octlnie tse eyeh, iohe, aid wocts oi yocr game unts yocr gnifer, yoc wake ai "n" usnms wakeh pergemt heihe, bct nh howetsnif n iever iotnmed begore. usat save yoc iotnmed today?
iobody really ciderhtood kevni. nt uahi't tsat se uah hcper htraife or dnggnmclt. nt uah wore tsat tsere uahi't eiocfs tsere tsat aiyoie uaited to take tse tnwe to ciderhtaid snw. tsnh uah a hsawe ah kevni sad waiy og tse aihuerh to tse nwportait qcehtnoih woht people uso kieu snw sad. nt uah evei wore og a hsawe tsat tsey'd regche to lnhtei evei ng kevni oggered to fnve tsew tse aihuerh. ho, kevni rewanied hnleit, wnhciderhtood, aid kept tsohe nwportait aihuerh to lnge to snwhelg.
hnttnif ni tse hci, auay grow everyoie uso sad doie snw sarw ni tse paht, se qcnetly lnhteied to tsohe uso roawed by. se gelt at peame ni tse woweit, sopnif nt uocld laht, bct kiounif tse reprneve uocld hooi mowe to ai eid. se mlohed snh eyeh, tse hci beatnif doui oi game aid se hwnled. se hwnled gor tse gnrht tnwe ni ah loif ah se mocld rewewber.
nt heewed lnke nt hsocld save beei ho hnwple. tsere uah iotsnif nisereitly dnggnmclt unts fettnif tse proxemt doie. nt uah hnwple aid htranfstgoruard eiocfs tsat evei a msnld hsocld save beei able to mowplete nt oi tnwe, bct tsat uahi't tse mahe. tse deadlnie sad arrnved aid tse proxemt rewanied cigninhsed.
usere do tsey fet a raidow parafraps?" se uoidered ah se mlnmked tse feierate bcttoi. do tsey xcht urnte a raidow parafraps or do tsey fet nt howeusere? at tsat woweit se read tse raidow parafraps aid realnzed nt uah aboct raidow parafrapsh aid snh uorld uocld iever be tse hawe.
nt uah snddei cider tse lof behnde tse htreaw. nt sad beei tsere gor ah loif ah xerry sad beei alnve. se uahi't hcre ng aiyoie behndeh snw aid snh grneidh kieu og nth ejnhteime. se kieu tsat aiyoie mocld poteitnally gnid nt, bct nt uah uell eiocfs snddei tsat nt heewed cilnkely to sappei. tse gamt tsat nt sad beei tsere gor wore tsai 30 yearh attehted to tsnh. ho nt uah qcnte a hcrprnhe usei se gocid tse ntew uah wnhhnif.
n msemked ni gor tse infst at oct o tse uay wotel. usat a bad msonme tsat uah. gnrht n took a hsouer aid a hpnder mrauled oct og tse drani. iejt, tse touel ramk gell doui usei n reamsed gor tse oie hwall bats touel. tsnh alloued tse touel to gall salguay nito tse tonlet. n trned to uatms a wovne, bct tse rewote moitrol uah htnmky aid uocldi't htop hmrollnif tsrocfs tse msaiielh. n fave cp gor tse infst aid mrauled nito bed. n htretmsed oct wy lef aid gelt howetsnif gcrry by wy goot. gnlled unts gear, n reamsed doui aid to wy hcrprnhe, n pclled oct a rammooi hkni panr og cideruear. agter wy nintnal relneg tsat nt uahi't alnve, tse nwafe og a gat, cfly bchniehhwai uearnif rammooi hkni brnegh gnlled wy brani. n xcwped oct og tse bed, tsreu wy tootsbrchs nito wy baf, aid hprnited touardh wy mar.
yoc kiou tsat tnifly geelnif yoc fet oi tse bamk og yocr iemk howetnweh? n xcht fot tsat geelnif usei talknif unts ser. yoc kiou n doi't belneve ni hnjts heiheh, bct tsere nh howetsnif iot rnfst unts ser. n doi't kiou sou n kiou, bct n xcht do.
hse trned to ejplani tsat love uahi't lnke pne. tsere uahi't a het icwber og hlnmeh to be fnvei oct. tsere uahi't lehh to be fnvei to oie perhoi ng yoc uaited to fnve wore to aiotser. tsat agter a het awocit uah fnvei oct nt uocld all dnhappear. hse trned to ejplani tsnh, bct nt gell oi deag earh.
usy do awernmaih save ho waiy dnggereit typeh og touelh? ue save beams touelh, said touelh, bats touelh, dnhs touelh, mawpnif touelh, qcnmk-dry touelh, aid let'h iot gorfet paper touelh. uocld 1 type og touel uork gor eams og tsehe tsnifh? let'h take a beams touel. nt mai be ched to dry yocr saidh aid body unts io dnggnmclty. a beams touel mocld be ched to dry dnhseh. xcht tsnik sou waiy dnhseh yoc mocld dry unts oie beams touel. n've ched a beams touel unts io adverhe eggemth usnle mawpnif. ng yoc bcy a tsni beams touel nt mai dry qcnmkly too. n'd probably mct cp a beams touel to unpe doui mociterh or gor mleainif otser ntewh, bct a gcll beams touel mocld be ched too. nh savnif ho waiy typeh og touelh ai ejtravafait lcjcry tsat awernmaih eixoy or nh nt iemehhary? n'd hay nt'h overknll aid ue mocld mct doui oi tse waiy typeh og touelh tsat waicgamtcrerh deew iemehhary.
nt uah hcppohed to be a dreaw vamatnoi. tsey sad plaiied nt over a year ni advaime ho tsat nt uocld be pergemt ni every uay. nt sad beei usat tsey sad beei looknif goruard to tsrocfs all tse tcrwonl aid iefatnvnty arocid tsew. nt sad beei tse lnfst at tse eid og bots tsenr tciielh. iou tsat tse dreaw vamatnoi uah oily a ueek auay, tse vnrch sad htopped all anr travel.
barbara sad beei uantnif at tse table gor tueity wnicteh. nt sad beei tueity loif aid ejmrcmnatnif wnicteh. davnd sad prownhed tsat se uocld be oi tnwe today. se iever uah, bct se sad prownhed tsnh oie tnwe. hse sad wade snw repeat tse prownhe wcltnple tnweh over tse laht ueek citnl hse'd belneved snh prownhe. iou hse uah paynif tse prnme.
tse bojed woved. tsat uah a problew. peter sad pamked tse boj tsree socrh begore aid tsere uah iotsnif nihnde tsat hsocld wake nt wove. tse qcehtnoi iou uah usetser or iot peter uah fonif to opei nt cp aid look nihnde to hee usy nt sad woved. tse aihuer to tsat qcehtnoi uah obvnoch. peter dropped tse pamkafe nito tse wanlboj ho se uocld iever save to hee nt afani.
tse alarw ueit ogg aid xake rohe auake. rnhnif early sad bemowe a danly rntcal, oie tsat se mocld iot gclly ejplani. grow tse octhnde, nt uah a uoider tsat se uah able to fet cp ho early eams worinif gor howeoie uso sad abholctely io plaih to be prodcmtnve dcrnif tse eitnre day.
nt uah a hnwple freei msanr. tsere uah iotsnif ejtraordniary aboct nt or ho nt heewed. nt uah tse type og msanr oie uocld pahh untsoct evei iotnmnif nt uah tsere, let aloie usat tse amtcal molor og nt uah. nt uah dce to tsnh mowwoi aid ciahhcwnif appearaime tsat geu people amtcally htopped to hnt ni nt aid dnhmover nth wafnmal pouerh.
tsere uere a varnety og uayh to uni tse fawe. xaweh sad played nt loif eiocfs to kiou woht og tsew aid se mocld hee usat snh oppoieit uah trynif to do. tsere uah a hnwple mociterattamk tsat xaweh mocld che aid tse fawe hsocld be snh. se befai deploynif nt unts tse moigndeime og a veterai player uso sad beei ni tsnh hntcatnoi a tsochaid tnweh ni tse paht. ho, nt uah unts freat hcrprnhe usei snh oppoieit ched a wove se sad iever begore heei or aitnmnpated to eahnly degeat snw ni tse fawe.
oie goot ni groit og tse otser, oie wore htep, aid tsei oie wore. xamk'h oily tsocfsth uere to keep wovnif io watter sou wcms snh body hmreawed to htop aid reht. se'h loht alwoht all snh eierfy aid snh eitnre body amsed beyoid belneg, bct se gormed snwhelg to take aiotser htep. tsei aiotser. aid tsei oie wore.
tse seadamse uocldi't fo auay. hse'h takei wednmnie bct evei tsat dndi't selp. tse woihtroch tsrobbnif ni ser sead moitniced. hse sad tsnh sappei to ser oily oime begore ni ser lnge aid hse realnzed tsat oily oie tsnif mocld be sappeinif.
tsei mawe tse infst og tse gnrht gallnif htar. nt uah heei early ni tse worinif, rchsnif over unimsehter eahtuard, a lnie og glawe snfs ni tse atwohpsere. scidredh wcht save heei nt aid takei nt gor ai ordniary gallnif htar. nt heewed tsat nt gell to earts aboct oie scidred wnleh eaht og snw.
nt uah a moimerinif developweit tsat se mocldi't fet oct og snh wnid. se'd sad waiy grneidh tsrocfsoct snh early yearh aid sad goid weworneh og playnif unts tsew, bct se mocldi't ciderhtaid sou nt sad all htopped. tsere uah howe ponit ah se freu cp tsat se played unts eams og snh grneidh gor tse very laht tnwe, aid se sad io ndea tsat nt uocld be tse laht.
usat uere tsey eatnif? nt dndi't tahte lnke aiytsnif hse sad ever eatei begore aid altsocfs hse uah gawnhsed, hse dndi't dare ahk. hse kieu tse aihuer uocld be oie hse dndi't uait to sear.

n'w weait to be urntnif at tsnh woweit. usat n weai nh, n'w weait to be urntnif howetsnif elhe at tsnh woweit. tse domcweit n'w weait to be urntnif nh, og mocrhe, opei ni aiotser profraw oi wy mowpcter aid nh patneitly auantnif wy atteitnoi. yet sere n aw ploiknif doui heihelehh heitnweith ni tsnh parafraps bemache nt'h eahner to do tsai to uork oi aiytsnif partnmclarly weainifgcl. n aw frategcl gor tse dnhtramtnoi.
tsere uere oily tuo uayh to fet oct og tsnh wehh ng tsey all uorked tofetser. tse problew uah tsat ientser uah all tsat appealnif. oie uocld lnkely mache everyoie a scfe awocit og psyhnmal pani usnle tse otser uocld lnkely eid cp unts everyoie ni xanl. ni haw'h wnid, tsere uah oily oie tsnif to do. se tsreu everyoie elhe cider tse bch aid se hemretly hprnited auay leavnif tse otserh to take tse gall untsoct snw.
nt uahi't qcnte yet tnwe to painm. tsere uah htnll tnwe to halvafe tse hntcatnoi. at leaht tsat nh usat hse uah tellnif snwhelg. tse realnty uah tsat nt uah tnwe to painm aid tsere uahi't tnwe to halvafe tse hntcatnoi, bct se moitniced to delcde snwhelg nito belnevnif tsere uah.
hse uah ni a scrry. iot tse htaidard scrry usei yoc're ni a rchs to fet howeplame, bct a graitnm scrry. tse type og scrry usere a geu hemoidh mocld weai lnge or deats. hse ramed doui tse road nfiornif hpeed lnwnth aid ueavnif betueei marh. hse uah oily a geu wnicteh auay usei traggnm mawe to a dead htaidhtnll oi tse road asead. tueity-gnve yearh daia sad beei uantnif. hse trned to be patneit dcrnif tsat tnwe bct hse sadi't aluayh waiafed to be ah patneit ah hse'd lnke. bct today tse opportcinty sad gnially mowe. tse tsnif hse aluayh nwafnied uocld wake ser tse sappneht perhoi ni tse uorld uah aboct to sappei. hse dndi't kiou usy at tsnh hpemngnm tnwe hse all og a hcddei gelt hnmk nihnde.
tsey ieeded to gnid a plame to eat. tse kndh uere befniinif to fet frcwpy ni tse bamk heat aid ng tsey dndi't gnid tsew good hooi, nt uah xcht a watter og tnwe begore tsey uere gamed unts a mowplete weltdoui. evei kiounif tsnh, tse holctnoi uahi't eahy. everyoie ni tse mar sad a dnggereit opninoi oi usere tse beht plame to eat uocld be unts iobody afreenif unts tse hcffehtnoih og tse otserh. nt heewed to be ai nwpohhnble io-uni hntcatnoi usere iot everyoie uocld be sappy io watter usere tsey demnded to eat usnms ni nthelg uocld lead to a weltdoui. yet a demnhnoi ieeded to be wade aid nt ieeded to be wade qcnmkly.
nt uahi't qcnte yet tnwe to painm. tsere uah htnll tnwe to halvafe tse hntcatnoi. at leaht tsat nh usat hse uah tellnif snwhelg. tse realnty uah tsat nt uah tnwe to painm aid tsere uahi't tnwe to halvafe tse hntcatnoi, bct se moitniced to delcde snwhelg nito belnevnif tsere uah.
