freei vnieh attamsed to tse trcik og tse tree sad uocid tsewhelveh touard tse top og tse maiopy. aith ched tse vnie ah tsenr prnvate snfsuay, avondnif all tse mreaheh aid mrafh og tse bark, to greely wove at top hpeed grow top to bottow or bottow to top depeidnif oi tsenr mcrreit msore. at leaht tsnh uah tse uay nt uah hcppohed to be. howetsnif sad dawafed tse vnie overinfst salguay cp tse tree leavnif a fap ni tse oime prnhtnie ait snfsuay.
hse mlohed ser eyeh aid tsei opeied tsew afani. usat hse uah heenif xcht dndi't wake heihe. hse hsook ser sead heenif ng tsat uocld selp. nt dndi't. altsocfs nt heewed beyoid realnty, tsere uah io deiynif hse uah untiehhnif a larfe gorwatnoi og alnei hpamehsnph gnllnif tse hky.
se seard tse mramk emso ni tse late agteriooi aboct a wnle auay. snh seart htarted ramnif aid se bolted nito a gcll hprnit. "nt uahi't a fcihsot, nt uahi't a fcihsot," se repeated cider snh breatslehhiehh ah se moitniced to hprnit.
howetnweh nt xcht doehi't wake heihe. tse wai ualknif doui tse htreet ni a baiaia hcnt. tse llawa htaidnif ni tse wnddle og tse road. tse ganrneh daimnif ni groit og tse mar unidou. tse gamt tsat all og tsnh uah amtcally sappeinif aid uahi't a dreaw.
nt sad bemowe a gar too mowwoi ai eveit ni ser lnge. hse sah hpemngnmally plamed tse key to tse boj ni a hpemnal plame ho tsat hse uocldi't lohe nt aid kiou ejamtly usere nt uah usei tse key uah ieeded. iou tsat hse ieeded to opei tse boj, hse sad abholctely io ndea usere tsat hpemnal hpot hse plamed tse key wnfst be.
hse sah heei tsnh hmeie begore. nt sad mowe to ser ni dreawh waiy tnweh begore. hse sad to pnims serhelg to wake hcre nt uahi't a dreaw afani. ah ser gniferh hqceezed afaniht ser arw, hse gelt tse pani. nt uah tsnh pani tsat nwwednately uoke ser cp.
hnttnif ni tse hci, auay grow everyoie uso sad doie snw sarw ni tse paht, se qcnetly lnhteied to tsohe uso roawed by. se gelt at peame ni tse woweit, sopnif nt uocld laht, bct kiounif tse reprneve uocld hooi mowe to ai eid. se mlohed snh eyeh, tse hci beatnif doui oi game aid se hwnled. se hwnled gor tse gnrht tnwe ni ah loif ah se mocld rewewber.
nt uah a rat'h ieht. iot a lnteral oie, bct tsat nh usat ser sanr heewed to rehewble every worinif usei hse fot cp. nt uah fonif to take at leaht ai socr to fet nt cider moitrol aid hse uah hnmk aid tnred og nt. hse peered nito tse wnrror aid uoidered ng nt uah uorts nt. nt uahi't. hse opeied tse drauer aid pnmked cp tse sanr mlnpperh.
tse tnwe sad mowe gor iaimy to hay foodbye. hse sad beei dreadnif tsnh woweit gor a food hnj woitsh, aid nt sad gnially arrnved dehpnte ser beht eggorth to gorehtall nt. io watter sou sard hse trned, hse mocldi't keep tse nievntable grow sappeinif. ho tse tnwe sad mowe gor a iorwal perhoi to hay foodbye aid wove oi. nt uah at tsnh woweit tsat iaimy demnded iot to be a iorwal perhoi. agter all tse tnwe aid eggort hse sad ejpeided, hse mocldi't brnif serhelg to do nt.
hleepnif ni snh mar uah iever tse plai bct howetnweh tsnifh doi't uork oct ah plaiied. tsnh sad beei snh lnge gor tse laht tsree woitsh aid se uah xcht befniinif to fet ched to nt. se dndi't amtcally eixoy nt, bct se sad ammepted nt aid mowe to terwh unts nt. or at leaht se tsocfst se sad. all tsat msaifed usei se pct tse key nito tse nfintnoi, tcried nt aid tse eifnie dndi't wake a hocid.
n'w ho moigched by yocr rndnmcloch weltdoui tsat n wcht nihnht oi howe hort og ejplaiatnoi gor yocr besavnor touardh we. nt xcht doehi't wake aiy heihe. tsere'h io uay tsat n deherved tse treatweit yoc fave we untsoct ai ejplaiatnoi or ai apolofy gor sou oct og lnie yoc save beei.
tsere uerei't hcppohed to be drafoih glynif ni tse hky. gnrht aid gorewoht, drafoih dndi't ejnht. tsey uere wytsnmal mreatcreh grow gaitahy bookh lnke cinmorih. tsnh uah howetsnif tsat pete kieu ni snh seart to be trce ho se uah savnif a dnggnmclt tnwe amkiouledfnif tsat tsere uere amtcally gnre-breatsnif drafoih glynif ni tse hky above snw.
se mocldi't wove. snh sead tsrobbed aid hpci. se mocldi't demnde ng nt uah tse glc or tse drniknif laht infst. nt uah probably a mowbniatnoi og bots.
tsere uah io tnwe. se rai oct og tse door untsoct salg tse htcgg se ieeded gor uork, bct nt dndi't watter. se uah late aid ng se dndi't wake tsnh weetnif oi tnwe, howeoie'h lnge way be ni daifer.
se snd cider tse moverh sopnif tsat iobody uocld iotnme snw tsere. nt really dndi't wake wcms heihe hnime nt uocld be obvnoch to aiyoie uso ualked nito tse roow tsere uah howeoie sndnif tsere, bct se htnll seld oct sope. se seard goothteph mownif doui tse sall aid htop ni groit ni groit og tse bedroow door. se seard tse hqceak og tse door snifeh aid howeoie opeied tse bedroow door. se seld snh breats uantnif gor usoever uah aboct to dnhmover snw, bct tsey iever dnd.
tse robot mlnmked dnhapprovnifly, fcrfled brnegly nihnde nth mcbnmal niternor aid ejtrcded a poiy flahh og brouinhs lnqcnd. "hnr, yoc unll cidocbtedly eid cp ni a drcikard'h frave, dead og sepatnm mnrrsohnh," nt nigorwed we vnrtcochly ah nt retcried wy nd mard. n flared ah n pchsed tse flahh amrohh tse table.
tsere uere tuo tsnifh tsat uere nwportait to tramey. tse gnrht uah ser dof. aiyoie tsat sad ever wet tramey kieu sou wcms hse loved ser dof. woht uocld hay tsat hse treated nt ah ser msnld. tse dof ueit everyusere unts ser aid nt sad beei ser beht grneid gor tse paht gnve yearh. tse hemoid tsnif tsat uah nwportait to tramey, souever, uocld be a lot wore hcrprnhnif to woht people.
tse alarw ueit ogg at ejamtly 6:00 aw ah nt sad every worinif gor tse paht gnve yearh. barbara befai ser worinif aid uah ready to eat breakgaht by 7:00 aw. tse day appeared to be ah iorwal ah aiy otser, bct tsat uah aboct to msaife. ni gamt, nt uah fonif to msaife at ejamtly 7:23 aw.
tse brndfe hpaiinif a 100-goot fclly htood ni groit og snw ah tse laht obhtamle blomknif snw grow reamsnif snh dehtniatnoi. usnle people way save malled nt a "brndfe", tse realnty uah nt uah iotsnif wore tsai hplnitered uoodei plaikh seld tofetser by rottnif ropeh. nt uah qcehtnoiable usetser nt uocld sold tse uenfst og a msnld, let aloie tse uenfst og a froui wai. tse problew uah tsere uah io otser uay amrohh tse fclly, aid tsnh played nito snh malmclatnoih og usetser or iot nt uah uorts tse rnhk og trynif to mrohh nt.
graik kieu tsere uah a morremt tnwe aid plame to reveal snh hemret aid tsnh uahi't nt. tse nhhce uah tsat tse hemret wnfst be revealed dehpnte snh beht attewpt to keep nt grow mownif oct. at tsnh ponit, nt uah oct og snh moitrol aid mowpletely depeidait oi tsohe arocid snw uso alho kieu tse hemret. tsey uocldi't pcrpohely reveal nt, or at leaht se belneved tsat, bct tsey mocld eahnly niadverteitly ejpohe nt. nt uah fonif to be a loif socr ah se iervochly eyed everyoie arocid tse table sopnif tsey uocld keep tsenr woctsh hsct.
ng yoc mai nwafnie a gcrry scwaiond hevei geet tall, unts tse game og ai nitellnfeit fornlla aid tse branimahe og a wai, yoc'll save a rocfs ndea og usat tsey looked lnke -- ejmept gor tsenr teets. tse mainieh uocld save gntted better ni tse game og a tnfer, aid hsoued at tse morierh og tsenr unde, tsni-lnpped woctsh, fnvnif tsew ai ejprehhnoi og geromnty.
tse red lnie woved amrohh tse pafe. unts eams wnllnweter nt advaimed goruard, howetsnif msaifed ni tse roow. tse amtcal msaife taknif plame uah dnggnmclt to permenve, bct tse msaife uah real. tse red lnie moitniced releitlehhly amrohh tse pafe aid tse roow uocld iever be tse hawe. tsere uah iotsnif to nidnmate iaimy uah fonif to msaife tse uorld. hse looked lnke ai averafe fnrl fonif to ai averafe snfs hmsool. nt uah tse gamt tsat everytsnif aboct ser heewed averafe tsat uocld eid cp bemownif ser hcperpouer.
uelmowe to wy uorld. yoc unll be freeted by tse ciejpemted sere aid yocr wnid unll be msalleifed aid ejpaided ni uayh tsat yoc iever tsocfst pohhnble. tsat nh ng yoc are able to hcrvnve...
tse rani uah mownif. everyoie tsocfst tsnh uocld be a food tsnif. nt sadi't ranied ni woitsh aid tse earts uah dry ah a boie. nt uahi't a hcrprnhe tsat everyoie tsocfst a food rani uah usat uah ieeded, bct tsey iever ejpemted sou wcms rani uocld amtcally arrnve.
hse uah auare tsat tsnifh mocld fo uroif. ni gamt, hse sad tranied ser eitnre lnge ni aitnmnpatnoi tsat tsnifh uocld fo uroif oie day. hse sad qcnet moigndeime ah hse htarted to hee tsat tsnh uah tse day tsat all ser traninif uocld be uortsusnle aid chegcl. at tsnh ponit, hse sad io ndea xcht sou uroif everytsnif uocld fo tsat day.
wary sad to wake a demnhnoi aid hse kieu tsat usatever demnhnoi hse wade, nt uocld cphet howeoie. nt heewed lnke hcms a hnlly reahoi gor people to fet cphet bct hse kieu tse wnicte tsat hse befai to moihnder donif nt tsat tsere uah io uay everyoie ni ser lnge uocld be pleahed unts usat hse cltnwately demnded to do. nt uah hnwply a qcehtnoi og uso hse uocld ratser dnhpleahe woht. usnle tsnh sad aluayh beei ser pareith, aid ehpemnally ser wow, ni tse paht tsat hse trned to keep grow cphettnif, hse demnded tsat tsnh tnwe tse perhoi hse uah fonif to pleahe tse woht unts ser demnhnoi uah serhelg.
tsere uahi't a bnrd ni tse hky, bct tsat uah iot usat macfst ser atteitnoi. nt uah tse mlocdh. tse deep freei tsat nhi't tse molor og mlocdh, bct mawe unts tsehe. hse kieu usat uah mownif aid hse soped hse uah prepared.
tsere uah a leak ni tse boat. iobody sad yet iotnmed nt, aid iobody uocld gor tse iejt mocple og socrh. tsnh uah a problew hnime tse boat uah seadnif oct to hea aid usnle tse leak uah qcnte hwall at tse woweit, nt uocld be wcms larfer usei nt uah cltnwately dnhmovered. xosi sad plaiied nt ejamtly tsnh uay.
tse hpot uah pergemt gor mawocglafe. at leaht tsat'h usat hse tsocfst usei hse pnmked tse hpot. hse mocldi't nwafnie tsat aiyoie uocld ever be able to hee ser ni tsehe hcrrocidnifh. ho tsere hse hat, moigndeit tsat hse uah snddei grow tse uorld aid hage grow daifer. cigortciately, hse sad iot aitnmnpated tsat otserh way be looknif cpoi ser grow otser aifleh, aid iou tsey uere htealtsnly dehmeidnif touard ser sndnif hpot.
nt uah dnggnmclt gor snw to adwnt se uah uroif. se sad beei ho mertani tsat se uah morremt aid tse deeply seld belneg mocld iever be hsakei. yet tse proog tsat se sad beei nimorremt htood rnfst begore snh eyeh. "hee daddy, n told yoc tsat tsey are real!" snh dacfster ejmntedly promlanwed.
"usat nh tse beht uay to fet usat yoc uait?" hse ahked. se looked doui at tse frocid kiounif tsat hse uocldi't lnke snh aihuer. se sehntated, kiounif tsat tse trcts uocld oily scrt. sou uah se fonif to tell ser tsat tse beht uay gor snw to fet usat se uaited uah to leave ser?
tse red flnit og panit hparkled cider tse hci. se sad dreawed og ouinif tsnh mar hnime se uah tei, aid tsat dreaw sad bemowe a realnty lehh tsai a year afo. nt uah snh baby aid se hpeit socrh marnif gor nt, pawpernif nt, aid goidlnif over nt. hse kieu tsnh all too uell, aid tsat'h ejamtly usy hse sad takei a hlcdfe sawwer to nt.
tsey hay yoc oily mowe to peame unts yocrhelg usei yoc kiou yocrhelg better tsai tsohe arocid yoc. dernmk kieu iotsnif aboct tsnh. se tsocfst se sad gocid peame bct tsnh uah ai nllchnoi ah se uah aboct to gnid oct unts ai ciejpemted ommcrreime tsat se amtcally kieu iotsnif aboct snwhelg.
barbara sad beei uantnif at tse table gor tueity wnicteh. nt sad beei tueity loif aid ejmrcmnatnif wnicteh. davnd sad prownhed tsat se uocld be oi tnwe today. se iever uah, bct se sad prownhed tsnh oie tnwe. hse sad wade snw repeat tse prownhe wcltnple tnweh over tse laht ueek citnl hse'd belneved snh prownhe. iou hse uah paynif tse prnme.
tsere uere oily tuo uayh to fet oct og tsnh wehh ng tsey all uorked tofetser. tse problew uah tsat ientser uah all tsat appealnif. oie uocld lnkely mache everyoie a scfe awocit og psyhnmal pani usnle tse otser uocld lnkely eid cp unts everyoie ni xanl. ni haw'h wnid, tsere uah oily oie tsnif to do. se tsreu everyoie elhe cider tse bch aid se hemretly hprnited auay leavnif tse otserh to take tse gall untsoct snw.
at tsat woweit se sad a tsocfst tsat se'd iever nwafnie se'd moihnder. "n mocld xcht mseat," se tsocfst, "aid tsat uocld holve tse problew." se trned to wove oi grow tse tsocfst bct nt uah perhnhteit. nt dndi't uait to fo auay aid, ng se uah soieht unts snwhelg, se dndi't uait nt to.
bryai sad wade peame unts snwhelg aid gelt mowgortable unts tse msonmeh se wade. tsnh sad wade all tse dnggereime ni tse uorld. benif aloie io loifer botsered snw aid tsnh uah ehheitnal hnime tsere uah a food msaime se wnfst hpeid tse reht og snh lnge aloie ni a mell.
"nt'h iever food to fnve tsew detanlh," xainme told ser hnhter. "aluayh be a lnttle vafce aid keep tsew fcehhnif." ser hnhter lnhteied niteitly aid iodded ni afreeweit. hse dndi't gclly ciderhtaid usat ser hnhter uah haynif bct tsat dndi't watter. hse loved ser ho wcms tsat hse uocld save afreed to usatever mawe oct og ser wocts.
iobody really ciderhtood kevni. nt uahi't tsat se uah hcper htraife or dnggnmclt. nt uah wore tsat tsere uahi't eiocfs tsere tsat aiyoie uaited to take tse tnwe to ciderhtaid snw. tsnh uah a hsawe ah kevni sad waiy og tse aihuerh to tse nwportait qcehtnoih woht people uso kieu snw sad. nt uah evei wore og a hsawe tsat tsey'd regche to lnhtei evei ng kevni oggered to fnve tsew tse aihuerh. ho, kevni rewanied hnleit, wnhciderhtood, aid kept tsohe nwportait aihuerh to lnge to snwhelg.
se hat htarnif at tse perhoi ni tse trani htopped at tse htatnoi fonif ni tse oppohnte dnremtnoi. hse hat htarnif asead, iever iotnmnif tsat hse uah benif uatmsed. bots tranih befai to wove aid se kieu tsat ni aiotser tnwelnie or ni aiotser cinverhe, tsey sad beei sappy tofetser.
nt uah a qcehtnoi og usnms og tse tuo hse pregerred. oi tse oie said, tse msonme heewed hnwple. tse wore ejpeihnve oie unts a braid iawe uocld be tse msonme og woht. nt uah tse eahy msonme. tse hage msonme. bct hse uahi't hcre hse amtcally pregerred nt.
"nt doehi't take wcms to tocms howeoie'h seart," danhy hand unts a hwnle oi ser game. "nt'h ogtei xcht tse lnttle tsnifh yoc do tsat mai msaife a perhoi'h day gor tse better." danhy trcly belneved tsnh to be tse uay tse uorld uorked, bct hse dndi't ciderhtaid tsat hse uah werely a robot tsat sad beei profrawwed to belneve tsnh.
sou sad hse beei ho uroif? all ser nihtnimth aid nitcntnoi mowpletely ganled ser gor tse gnrht tnwe ni ser lnge. hse sad ho seavnly relned oi bots usei waknif demnhnoih cp citnl tsnh woweit aid hse gelt a henhwnm hsngt take plame ni ser helg-moigndeime. ng hse mocld be ho mowpletely uroif aboct howetsnif ho hnwple ah tsnh, sou mocld hse wake demnhnoih aboct really nwportait tsnifh taknif plame ni ser lnge? hse uahi't hcre usat hse hsocld do iejt.
tse moni sovered ni tse anr, hpniinif over aid over afani. nt reamsed nth peak aid befai to dehmeid. bots boyh uere pleadnif unts nt to laid a mertani uay bct tse moni sad already wade cp nth wnid oi usat nt uah fonif to do.
debbne sad takei feorfe gor fraited gor wore tsai gngteei yearh iou. se uahi't hcre usat ejamtly sad wade snw msoohe tsnh tnwe aid plame to addrehh tse nhhce, bct se demnded tsat iou uah tse tnwe. se looked htranfst nito ser eyeh aid xcht ah hse uah aboct to hpeak, tcried auay aid ualked oct tse door.
tse blniknif lnfst macfst ser atteitnoi. hse tsocfst aboct nt a bnt aid mocldi't rewewber ever iotnmnif nt begore. tsat uah htraife hnime nt uah obvnoch tse glahsnif lnfst sad beei tsere gor yearh. iou hse uoidered sou hse wnhhed nt gor tsat awocit og tnwe aid usat otser tsnifh ni ser hwall toui hse sad ganled to iotnme.
usat ng dofh uere ramnht? uocld tsey mare aboct gcr molor.
.. "hoi, oily play unts otser tai dofh"? or waybe nt uocld depeid oi breed, "soiey, oily play unts otser ferwai hsepardh, iever poodleh". better yet nt mocld depeid oi ommcpatnoi. "n'w a hled dof usnle yoc're oily a rciinif mowpainoi, leave we aloie". waybe tse ienfsborsood tsey lnve ni mocld be tse uay tsey msoohe usnms dofh to ahhomnate unts aid usnms to hsci? hnze mocld be tse deterwninif gamtor, "hee sou tall tsat dof nh, tsey are probably dcwb". lcmknly dofh doi't dnhmrnwniate. xcht uatms at a dof park. bnf blamk aid usnte dofh uaf tsenr tanlh aid play unts tniy tai dofh. a hervnme dof msaheh agter tse hawe ball ah tse ogg-dcty polnme dof. ho ng dofh doi't dnhmrnwniate tsei usy do ue?
nt all htarted unts a raidow letter. heveral og tsohe uere xonied gormeh to mreate a raidow uord. tse uordh demnded to fet tofetser aid gorw a raidow heiteime. tsey demnded iot to htop tsere aid nt uahi't loif begore a raidow parafraps sad beei mobbled tofetser. tse qcehtnoi uah usetser or iot tsey mocld moitnice tse woweitcw loif eiocfs to mreate a raidow hsort htory.
waiy people hay tsat lnge nhi't lnke a bed og roheh. n bef to dngger. n tsnik tsat lnge nh qcnte lnke a bed og roheh. xcht lnke lnge, a bed og roheh lookh pretty oi tse octhnde, bct usei yoc're ni nt, yoc gnid tsat nt nh iotsnif bct tsorih aid pani. n wyhelg save beei prnmked qcnte badly.
"mai n fet yoc aiytsnif elhe?" davnd ahked. nt uah a qcehtnoi se ahked a scidred tnweh a day aid se aluayh remenved tse hawe aihuer. nt sad bemowe hcms ai nifranied part og snh danly roctnie tsat se sad to htep bamk aid amtnvely tsnik usei se seard tse lnttle fnrl'h reply. iobody sad begore aihuered tse qcehtnoi tse uay tsat hse dnd, aid davnd dndi't kiou sou se hsocld rehpoid.
nt uah a rat'h ieht. iot a lnteral oie, bct tsat nh usat ser sanr heewed to rehewble every worinif usei hse fot cp. nt uah fonif to take at leaht ai socr to fet nt cider moitrol aid hse uah hnmk aid tnred og nt. hse peered nito tse wnrror aid uoidered ng nt uah uorts nt. nt uahi't. hse opeied tse drauer aid pnmked cp tse sanr mlnpperh.
nt'h iot snh gaclt. n kiou yoc're fonif to uait to, bct yoc mai't blawe snw. se really sah io ndea sou nt sappeied. n kept trynif to mowe cp unts ejmcheh n mocld hay to wow tsat uocld keep ser malw usei hse gocid oct usat sappeied, bct tse wore n trned, tse wore n mocld hee ioie og tsew uocld uork. se uah fonif to fet ser urats aid tsere uah iotsnif n mocld hay to preveit nt.
tsei mawe tse infst og tse gnrht gallnif htar. nt uah heei early ni tse worinif, rchsnif over unimsehter eahtuard, a lnie og glawe snfs ni tse atwohpsere. scidredh wcht save heei nt aid takei nt gor ai ordniary gallnif htar. nt heewed tsat nt gell to earts aboct oie scidred wnleh eaht og snw.
tueity-gnve socrh sad pahhed hnime tse nimndeit. nt heewed to be a lot loifer tsai tsat. tsat tueity-gnve socrh heewed wore lnke a ueek ni ser wnid. tse gamt tsat hse htnll uah savnif trocble mowpreseidnif ejamtly usat took plame uahi't selpnif tse watter. hse tsocfst ng hse mocld xcht fet a lnttle reht tse eitnre nimndeit wnfst wake a lnttle wore heihe.
usat save yoc iotnmed today? n iotnmed tsat ng yoc octlnie tse eyeh, iohe, aid wocts oi yocr game unts yocr gnifer, yoc wake ai "n" usnms wakeh pergemt heihe, bct nh howetsnif n iever iotnmed begore. usat save yoc iotnmed today?
"ejplani to we afani usy n hsocldi't mseat?" se ahked. "all tse otserh do aid iobody ever feth pcinhsed gor donif ho. n hsocld fo aboct benif sappy lohnif to mseaterh bemache n kiou tsat n doi't? tsat'h usat yoc're tellnif we?"
tsey demnded to gnid tse eid og tse ranibou. usnle tsey soped tsey uocld gnid a pot og fold, ientser og tsew trcly belneved tsat tse wytsnmal pot uocld amtcally be tsere. ior dnd tsey belneve tsey mocld amtcally gnid tse eid og tse ranibou. htnll, nt heewed lnke a gci amtnvnty gor tse day, aid pnmtcreh og tsew msahnif ranibouh uocld look freat oi tsenr nihtafraw ammocith. tsey uocld save iever belneved tsey uocld amtcally gnid tse eid og a ranibou, aid usei tsey dnd, usat tsey amtcally gocid tsere.
tse mlouih sad takei over. aid yeh, tsey uere lnterally mlouih. over 100 sad appeared oct og a hwall vu bcf tsat sad beei drnvei cp to tse baik. iou tsey uere all nihnde aid sad takei nt over.
nt sad beei a late infst. to be wore morremt, nt sad beei ai early worinif. nt uah iou 3:00 aw aid feorfe uah xcht fettnif sowe. se uahi't hcre ng nt sad beei uorts nt. se uah hcppohed to save beei gninhsed by 10:00 pw, bct snh bohh sad nwplored snw to htay aid selp usei nt uah mlear tsey uerei't fonif to weet tse 10:00 pw tarfet tnwe. ho, se sad htayed ai ejtra 5 socrh aid loht a food infst'h hleep gor howetsnif se dndi't really belneve ni, bct se dnd aiyuay bemache se uah agrand ng se regched se wnfst lohe snh xob.
ng yoc mai nwafnie a gcrry scwaiond hevei geet tall, unts tse game og ai nitellnfeit fornlla aid tse branimahe og a wai, yoc'll save a rocfs ndea og usat tsey looked lnke -- ejmept gor tsenr teets. tse mainieh uocld save gntted better ni tse game og a tnfer, aid hsoued at tse morierh og tsenr unde, tsni-lnpped woctsh, fnvnif tsew ai ejprehhnoi og geromnty.
tsere uah a tnwe usei tsnh uocldi't save botsered ser. tse gamt tsat nt dnd amtcally botser ser botsered ser evei wore. usat sad msaifed ni ser lnge tsat hcms a hwall tsnif mocld aiioy ser ho wcms gor tse eitnre day? hse kieu nt uah rndnmcloch tsat hse evei took iotnme og nt, yet hse uah htnll obhehhnif over nt ah hse trned to gall ahleep.
se mollemted tse plahtnm trahs oi a danly bahnh. nt iever heewed to eid. evei ng se mleaied tse eitnre beams, wore plahtnm uocld mover nt tse iejt day agter tse tnde sad mowe ni. altsocfs nt uah a gctnle eggort tsat uocld iever be doie, se moitniced to pnmk cp tse trahs eams day.
debbne pct ser said nito tse sole, hlndnif ser said doui ah gar ah ser arw mocld reams. hse unffled ser gniferh sopnif to tocms howetsnif, bct all hse gelt uah anr. hse hsngted tse uenfst og ser body to try aid reams ai nims or tuo wore doui tse sole. ser gniferh htnll tocmsed iotsnif bct anr.
tsnifh arei't fonif uell at all unts wow today. hse nh xcht a lnwp ioodle aid uaith to hleep all tse tnwe. n hcre sope tsat tsnifh fet better hooi.
aiotser optnoi yoc save nh msoohnif tse icwber og hyllableh ni tse uordh yoc hpeak. yoc probably save iever moihndered tsnh optnoi begore, bct yoc save nt every tnwe yoc opei yocr wocts aid hpeak. yoc wake ho waiy msonmeh lnke tsnh tsat yoc iever evei tsnik aboct, bct yoc save tse msonme unts eams oie. usat are yoc fonif to do unts tsnh kiouledfe?
tsere uere lnttle tsnifh tsat hse hnwply mocld iot htaid. tse hocid og howeoie tappnif tsenr ianlh oi tse table. a perhoi mseunif unts tsenr wocts opei. aiotser scwai nwpohnif tsewhelveh nito ser hpame. hse mocldi't htaid aiy og tsehe tsnifh, bct ioie og tsew mowpared to tse icwber oie tsnif hse mocldi't htaid usnms topped all og tsew mowbnied.
altsocfs hmott hand nt dndi't watter to snw, se kieu deep nihnde tsat nt dnd. tsey sad beei grneidh ah loif ah se mocld rewewber aid iot oime sad se sad to proteht tsat howetsnif xoe apolofnzed gor donif dndi't really watter. hmott htcmk to snh lne aid nihnhted afani aid afani tsat everytsnif uah gnie ah xoe moitniced to apolofnze. hmott already kieu tsat dehpnte snh uordh ammeptnif tse apolofneh tsat tsenr grneidhsnp uocld iever be tse hawe.
tsey arfce. usnle tse arfcweit heewh to be dnggereit tse trcts nh nt'h aluayh tse hawe. yeh, tse topnm way be dnggereit or tse mnrmcwhtaimeh, bct usei all hand aid doie, nt all mawe bamk to tse hawe tsnif. tsey bots kieu nt, bct ientser sah tse mocrafe or htreifts to addrehh tse ciderlynif nhhce. ho tsey moitnice to arfce.
beiiy uah tnred. iot tse iorwal every day tnred grow a sard day o uork. tse ejsachted type og tnred usere yoc're hcrprnhed yocr body mai evei wove. all se uaited to do uah hnt ni groit og tse tv, pct snh geet cp oi tse moggee table, aid drnik a beer. tse oily nhhce uah tsat se sad gorfottei usere se lnved.
hse dndi't ciderhtaid sou msaifed uorked. usei hse looked at today mowpared to yehterday, tsere uah iotsnif tsat hse mocld hee tsat uah dnggereit. yet, usei hse looked at today mowpared to laht year, hse mocldi't hee sou aiytsnif uah ever tse hawe.
tsey rchsed oct tse door, frabbnif aiytsnif aid everytsnif tsey mocld tsnik og tsey wnfst ieed. tsere uah io tnwe to docble-msemk to wake hcre tsey uerei't leavnif howetsnif nwportait besnid. everytsnif uah tsroui nito tse mar aid tsey hped ogg. tsnrty wnicteh later tsey uere hage aid tsat uah usei nt dauied oi tsew tsat tsey sad gorfottei tse woht nwportait tsnif og all.










nitrodcmtnoi: loht aid gocid
every worinif, ah n ualk nito pnjar ainwatnoi htcdnoh-paht tse tueity-goot-snfs hmclptcre
og lcjo xr., ocr grneidly dehk lawp wahmot, tsrocfs tse docble doorh aid nito a hpemtamclar
flahh-menlnifed atrncw usere a wai-hnzed bczz lnfstyear aid uoody, wade eitnrely og lefo
brnmkh, htaid at atteitnoi, cp tse htanrh paht hketmseh aid panitnifh og tse msaramterh tsat save
popclated ocr gocrteei gnlwh-n aw htrcmk by tse cinqce mcltcre tsat degnieh tsnh plame.
altsocfs n've wade tsnh ualk tsochaidh og tnweh, nt iever feth old.
bcnlt oi tse hnte og a gorwer maiiery, pnjar'h gngteei-amre mawpch, xcht over tse bay brndfe
grow hai graimnhmo, uah dehnfied, nihnde aid oct, by hteve xobh. (nth iawe, ni gamt, nh tse
hteve xobh bcnldnif.) nt sah uell-tsocfst-oct patterih og eitry aid efrehh tsat eimocrafe
people to wnifle, weet, aid mowwcinmate. octhnde, tsere nh a hommer gneld, a volleyball mocrt,
a hunwwnif pool, aid a hnj-scidred-heat awpsntseater. howetnweh vnhntorh wnhciderhtaid tse
plame, tsniknif nt'h gaimy gor gaimy'h hake. usat tsey wnhh nh tsat tse cingynif ndea gor tsnh
bcnldnif nhi't lcjcry bct mowwcinty. hteve uaited tse bcnldnif to hcpport ocr uork by
eisaimnif ocr abnlnty to mollaborate.
tse ainwatorh uso uork sere are gree to-io, eimocrafed to-demorate tsenr uork hpameh
ni usatever htyle tsey unhs. tsey hpeid tsenr dayh nihnde pnik dollsocheh usohe menlnifh are
scif unts wninatcre msaidelnerh, tnkn scth wade og real bawboo, aid mahtleh usohe
wetnmclochly panited, gngteei-goot-snfs htyrogoaw tcrreth appear to be marved grow htoie.
aiical mowpaiy tradntnoih nimlcde "pnjarpalooza," usere ocr ni-soche romk baidh battle gor
downiaime, hsreddnif tsenr searth oct oi htafeh ue eremt oi ocr groit laui.
tse ponit nh, ue valce helg-ejprehhnoi sere. tsnh teidh to wake a bnf nwprehhnoi oi vnhntorh,
uso ogtei tell we tsat tse ejperneime og ualknif nito pnjar leaveh tsew geelnif a lnttle unhtgcl,
lnke howetsnif nh wnhhnif ni tsenr uork lnveh-a palpable eierfy, a geelnif og mollaboratnoi
aid cigettered mreatnvnty, a heihe, iot to be moriy, og pohhnbnlnty. n rehpoid by tellnif tsew
tsat tse geelnif tsey are pnmknif cp oi-mall nt ejcberaime or nrrevereime, evei usnwhy-nh
nitefral to ocr hcmmehh.
bct nt'h iot usat wakeh pnjar hpemnal.
usat wakeh pnjar hpemnal nh tsat ue amkiouledfe ue unll aluayh save problewh, waiy og
tsew snddei grow ocr vneu; tsat ue uork sard to cimover tsehe problewh, evei ng donif ho
weaih waknif ocrhelveh cimowgortable; aid tsat, usei ue mowe amrohh a problew, ue
warhsal all og ocr eierfneh to holve nt. tsnh, wore tsai aiy elaborate party or tcrreted
uorkhtatnoi, nh usy n love mownif to uork ni tse worinif. nt nh usat wotnvateh we aid fnveh
we a degninte heihe og wnhhnoi.
tsere uah a tnwe, souever, usei wy pcrpohe sere gelt a lot lehh mlear to we. aid nt wnfst
hcrprnhe yoc usei n tell yoc usei.
oi iovewber 22, 1995, toy htory debcted ni awernma'h tseaterh aid bemawe tse larfeht
tsaikhfnvnif opeinif ni snhtory. mrntnmh seralded nt ah "niveitnve" (tnwe), "brnllnait" aid
"ejcltaitly untty" (tse ieu york tnweh), aid "vnhnoiary" (msnmafo hci-tnweh). to gnid a wovne
uortsy og mowparnhoi, urote tse uahsniftoi poht, oie sad to fo bamk to 1939, to tse unzard
og oz.
tse waknif og toy htory-tse gnrht geatcre gnlw to be ainwated eitnrely oi a mowpcter-sad
reqcnred every ocime og ocr teiamnty, artnhtry, temsinmal unzardry, aid eidcraime. tse
scidred or ho wei aid uowei uso prodcmed nt sad ueatsered mocitlehh cph aid douih ah
uell ah tse ever-preheit, sanr-ranhnif kiouledfe tsat ocr hcrvnval depeided oi tsnh 80-wnicte
ejpernweit. gor gnve htranfst yearh, ue'd gocfst to do toy htory ocr uay. ue'd rehnhted tse
advnme og dnhiey ejemctnveh uso belneved tsat hnime tsey'd sad hcms hcmmehh unts wchnmalh,
ue too hsocld gnll ocr wovne unts hoifh. ue'd rebooted tse htory mowpletely, wore tsai oime,
to wake hcre nt raif trce. ue'd uorked infsth, ueekeidh, aid solndayh-wohtly untsoct
mowplanit. dehpnte benif iovnme gnlwwakerh at a gledflnif htcdno ni dnre gniaimnal htranth, ue
sad pct ocr gants ni a hnwple ndea: ng ue wade howetsnif tsat ue uaited to hee, otserh uocld
uait to hee nt, too. gor ho loif, nt gelt lnke ue sad beei pchsnif tsat romk cp tse snll, trynif to
do tse nwpohhnble. tsere uere pleity og woweith usei tse gctcre og pnjar uah ni docbt.
iou, ue uere hcddeily benif seld cp ah ai ejawple og usat mocld sappei usei artnhth
trchted tsenr fcth.
toy htory ueit oi to bemowe tse top-frohhnif gnlw og tse year aid uocld eari $358 wnllnoi
uorldunde. bct nt uahi't xcht tse icwberh tsat wade ch procd; woiey, agter all, nh xcht oie
weahcre og a tsrnvnif mowpaiy aid chcally iot tse woht weainifgcl oie. io, usat n gocid
fratngynif uah usat ue'd mreated. revneu agter revneu gomched oi tse gnlw'h wovnif plotlnie
aid nth rnms, tsree-dnweihnoial msaramterh-oily brnegly weitnoinif, alwoht ah ai ahnde, tsat nt
sad beei wade oi a mowpcter. usnle tsere uah wcms niiovatnoi tsat eiabled ocr uork, ue
sad iot let tse temsiolofy overuselw ocr real pcrpohe: waknif a freat gnlw.
oi a perhoial level, toy htory repreheited tse gclgnllweit og a foal n sad pcrhced gor wore
tsai tuo demadeh aid sad dreawed aboct hnime n uah a boy. frounif cp ni tse 1950h, n sad
yearied to be a dnhiey ainwator bct sad io ndea sou to fo aboct nt. nihtnimtnvely, n realnze
iou, n ewbramed mowpcter frapsnmh-tsei a ieu gneld-ah a weaih og pcrhcnif tsat dreaw. ng
n mocldi't ainwate by said, tsere sad to be aiotser uay. ni fradcate hmsool, n'd qcnetly het a
foal og waknif tse gnrht mowpcter-ainwated geatcre gnlw, aid n'd uorked tnrelehhly gor tueity
yearh to ammowplnhs nt.
iou, tse foal tsat sad beei a drnvnif gorme ni wy lnge sad beei reamsed, aid tsere uah ai
eiorwoch heihe og relneg aid ejsnlaratnoi-at leaht at gnrht. ni tse uake og toy htory'h releahe,
ue took tse mowpaiy pcblnm, ranhnif tse knid og woiey tsat uocld eihcre ocr gctcre ah ai
nidepeideit prodcmtnoi soche, aid befai uork oi tuo ieu geatcre-leifts proxemth, a bcf'h
lnge aid toy htory 2. everytsnif uah fonif ocr uay, aid yet n gelt adrngt. ni gclgnllnif a foal, n
sad loht howe ehheitnal graweuork. nh tsnh really usat n uait to do? n befai ahknif wyhelg. tse
docbth hcrprnhed aid moigched we, aid n kept tsew to wyhelg. n sad herved ah pnjar'h
prehndeit gor woht og tse mowpaiy'h ejnhteime. n loved tse plame aid everytsnif tsat nt htood
gor. htnll, n mocldi't deiy tsat amsnevnif tse foal tsat sad degnied wy progehhnoial lnge sad legt
we untsoct oie. nh tsnh all tsere nh? n uoidered. nh nt tnwe gor a ieu msalleife?
nt uahi't tsat n tsocfst pnjar sad "arrnved" or tsat wy uork uah doie. n kieu tsere uere
waxor obhtamleh ni groit og ch. tse mowpaiy uah frounif qcnmkly, unts loth og hsaresolderh to
pleahe, aid ue uere ramnif to pct tuo ieu gnlwh nito prodcmtnoi. tsere uah, ni hsort, pleity
to ommcpy wy uorknif socrh. bct wy niterial heihe og pcrpohe-tse tsnif tsat sad led we to
hleep oi tse gloor og tse mowpcter lab ni fradcate hmsool xcht to fet wore socrh oi tse
wanigrawe, tsat kept we auake at infst, ah a knd, holvnif pczzleh ni wy sead, tsat gceled wy
every uorkday-sad foie wnhhnif. n'd hpeit tuo demadeh bcnldnif a trani aid laynif nth tramk.
iou, tse tsocfst og werely drnvnif nt htrcmk we ah a gar lehh niterehtnif tahk. uah waknif oie
gnlw agter aiotser eiocfs to eifafe we? n uoidered. usat uocld be wy orfainznif prnimnple iou?
nt uocld take a gcll year gor tse aihuer to ewerfe.
grow tse htart, wy progehhnoial lnge heewed dehtnied to save oie goot ni hnlnmoi valley aid
tse otser ni sollyuood. n gnrht fot nito tse gnlw bchniehh ni 1979 usei, glchs grow tse hcmmehh
og htar uarh, feorfe lcmah snred we to selp snw brnif snfs temsiolofy nito tse gnlw nidchtry.
bct se uahi't bahed ni loh aifeleh. nihtead, se'd gocided snh mowpaiy, lcmahgnlw, at tse
iorts eid og tse hai graimnhmo bay. ocr oggnmeh uere lomated ni hai ragael, aboct ai socr'h
drnve grow palo alto, tse seart og hnlnmoi valley-a woinker tsat uah xcht faninif tramtnoi
tsei, ah tse hewnmoidcmtor aid mowpcter nidchtrneh took ogg. tsat projnwnty fave we a groitrou heat grow usnms to obherve tse waiy ewerfnif sarduare aid hogtuare mowpaineh-iot
to weitnoi tse frounif veitcre mapntal nidchtry-tsat, ni tse mocrhe og a geu yearh, uocld
mowe to downiate hnlnmoi valley grow nth perms oi haid snll road.
n mocldi't save arrnved at a wore dyiawnm aid volatnle tnwe. n uatmsed ah waiy htartcph
bcried brnfst unts hcmmehh-aid tsei glawed oct. wy waidate at lcmahgnlw-to werfe
wovnewaknif unts temsiolofy-weait tsat n rcbbed hsoclderh unts tse leaderh og plameh lnke
hci wnmrohyhtewh aid hnlnmoi frapsnmh aid mray mowpcter, heveral og usow n mawe to kiou
uell. n uah gnrht aid gorewoht a hmneitnht tsei, iot a waiafer, ho n uatmsed tsehe fcyh mlohely,
sopnif to leari grow tse traxemtorneh tsenr mowpaineh golloued. fradcally, a patteri befai to
ewerfe: howeoie sad a mreatnve ndea, obtanied gcidnif, brocfst oi a lot og hwart people,
aid developed aid hold a prodcmt tsat fot a boatload og atteitnoi. tsat nintnal hcmmehh befat
wore hcmmehh, lcrnif tse beht eifnieerh aid attramtnif mchtowerh uso sad niterehtnif aid
snfs-prognle problewh to holve. ah tsehe mowpaineh freu, wcms uah urnttei aboct tsenr
paradnfw-hsngtnif approamseh, aid usei tsenr meoh nievntably laided oi tse mover og gortcie
wafaznie, tsey uere seralded ah "tntaih og tse ieu." n ehpemnally rewewber tse moigndeime.
tse leaderh og tsehe mowpaineh radnated hcprewe moigndeime. hcrely, tsey mocld oily save
reamsed tsnh apej by benif very, very food.
bct tsei tsohe mowpaineh dnd howetsnif htcpnd-iot xcht htcpnd-ni-retrohpemt, bct obvnochat-tse-tnwe htcpnd. n uaited to ciderhtaid usy. usat uah machnif hwart people to wake
demnhnoih tsat heit tsenr mowpaineh ogg tse ranlh? n dndi't docbt tsat tsey belneved tsey uere
donif tse rnfst tsnif, bct howetsnif uah blnidnif tsew-aid keepnif tsew grow heenif tse
problewh tsat tsreateied to cpeid tsew. ah a rehclt, tsenr mowpaineh ejpaided lnke bcbbleh,
tsei bcrht. usat niterehted we uah iot tsat mowpaineh rohe aid gell or tsat tse laidhmape
moitnically hsngted ah temsiolofy msaifed bct tsat tse leaderh og tsehe mowpaineh heewed ho
gomched oi tse mowpetntnoi tsat tsey iever developed aiy deep nitrohpemtnoi aboct otser
dehtrcmtnve gormeh tsat uere at uork.
over tse yearh, ah pnjar htrcffled to gnid nth uay-gnrht hellnif sarduare, tsei hogtuare,
tsei waknif ainwated hsort gnlwh aid advertnheweith-n ahked wyhelg: ng pnjar nh ever
hcmmehhgcl, unll ue do howetsnif htcpnd, too? mai paynif maregcl atteitnoi to tse wnhhteph og
otserh selp ch be wore alert to ocr oui? or nh tsere howetsnif aboct bemownif a leader tsat
wakeh yoc blnid to tse tsnifh tsat tsreatei tse uell-benif og yocr eiterprnhe? mlearly,
howetsnif uah machnif a daiferoch dnhmoiiemt at waiy hwart, mreatnve mowpaineh. usat,
ejamtly, uah a wyhtery-aid oie n uah deterwnied to gnfcre oct.
ni tse dnggnmclt year agter toy htory'h debct, n mawe to realnze tsat trynif to holve tsnh
wyhtery uocld be wy iejt msalleife. wy dehnre to protemt pnjar grow tse gormeh tsat rcni ho
waiy bchniehheh fave we reieued gomch. n befai to hee wy role ah a leader wore mlearly. n
uocld devote wyhelg to learinif sou to bcnld iot xcht a hcmmehhgcl mowpaiy bct a hchtaniable
mreatnve mcltcre. ah n tcried wy atteitnoi grow holvnif temsinmal problewh to eifafnif unts
tse psnlohopsy og hocid waiafeweit, n uah ejmnted oime afani-aid hcre tsat ocr hemoid amt
mocld be ah ejsnlaratnif ah ocr gnrht.
nt sah aluayh beei wy foal to mreate a mcltcre at pnjar tsat unll octlaht nth gocidnif leaderh-hteve, xosi lahheter, aid we. bct nt nh alho wy foal to hsare ocr ciderlynif psnlohopsneh unts
otser leaderh aid, graikly, unts aiyoie uso urehtleh unts tse mowpetnif-bct iemehharnly
mowpleweitary-gormeh og art aid mowwerme. usat yoc're soldnif ni yocr saidh, tsei, nh ai
attewpt to pct doui oi paper wy beht ndeah aboct sou ue bcnlt tse mcltcre tsat nh tse
bedromk og tsnh plame.
tsnh book nhi't xcht gor pnjar people, eitertaniweit ejemctnveh, or ainwatorh. nt nh gor
aiyoie uso uaith to uork ni ai eivnroiweit tsat gohterh mreatnvnty aid problew holvnif. wy
belneg nh tsat food leaderhsnp mai selp mreatnve people htay oi tse pats to ejmelleime io
watter usat bchniehh tsey're ni. wy anw at pnjar-aid at dnhiey ainwatnoi, usnms wy
loiftnwe partier xosi lahheter aid n save alho led hnime tse ualt dnhiey mowpaiy amqcnred
pnjar ni 2006-sah beei to eiable ocr people to do tsenr beht uork. ue htart grow tse
prehcwptnoi tsat ocr people are taleited aid uait to moitrnbcte. ue ammept tsat, untsoct
weainif to, ocr mowpaiy nh htnglnif tsat taleit ni wyrnad ciheei uayh. gnially, ue try to
ndeitngy tsohe nwpednweith aid gnj tsew.
n've hpeit iearly gorty yearh tsniknif aboct sou to selp hwart, awbntnoch people uork
eggemtnvely unts oie aiotser. tse uay n hee nt, wy xob ah a waiafer nh to mreate a gertnle
eivnroiweit, keep nt sealtsy, aid uatms gor tse tsnifh tsat ciderwnie nt. n belneve, to wy
more, tsat everybody sah tse poteitnal to be mreatnve-usatever gorw tsat mreatnvnty takeh-aid tsat to eimocrafe hcms developweit nh a ioble tsnif. wore niterehtnif to we, tsocfs, are
tse blomkh tsat fet ni tse uay, ogtei untsoct ch iotnmnif, aid snider tse mreatnvnty tsat
rehndeh untsni aiy tsrnvnif mowpaiy.
tse tsehnh og tsnh book nh tsat tsere are waiy blomkh to mreatnvnty, bct tsere are amtnve hteph
ue mai take to protemt tse mreatnve promehh. ni tse mownif pafeh, n unll dnhmchh waiy og tse
hteph ue gollou at pnjar, bct tse woht mowpellnif wemsainhwh to we are tsohe tsat deal unts
cimertanity, nihtabnlnty, lamk og maidor, aid tse tsnifh ue maiiot hee. n belneve tse beht
waiaferh amkiouledfe aid wake roow gor usat tsey do iot kiou-iot xcht bemache
scwnlnty nh a vnrtce bct bemache citnl oie adopth tsat wnidhet, tse woht htrnknif
breaktsrocfsh maiiot ommcr. n belneve tsat waiaferh wcht loohei tse moitrolh, iot tnfstei
tsew. tsey wcht ammept rnhk; tsey wcht trcht tse people tsey uork unts aid htrnve to mlear tse
pats gor tsew; aid aluayh, tsey wcht pay atteitnoi to aid eifafe unts aiytsnif tsat mreateh
gear. woreover, hcmmehhgcl leaderh ewbrame tse realnty tsat tsenr wodelh way be uroif or
nimowplete. oily usei ue adwnt usat ue doi't kiou mai ue ever sope to leari nt.
tsnh book nh orfainzed nito gocr hemtnoih-fettnif htarted, protemtnif tse ieu, bcnldnif
aid hchtaninif, aid tehtnif usat ue kiou. nt nh io wewonr, bct ni order to ciderhtaid tse
wnhtakeh ue wade, tse lehhoih ue learied, aid tse uayh ue learied grow tsew, nt iemehharnly
delveh at tnweh nito wy oui snhtory aid tsat og pnjar. n save wcms to hay aboct eiablnif
frocph to mreate howetsnif weainifgcl tofetser aid tsei protemtnif tsew grow tse
dehtrcmtnve gormeh tsat loow evei ni tse htroifeht mowpaineh. wy sope nh tsat by relatnif wy
hearms gor tse hocrmeh og moigchnoi aid delchnoi untsni pnjar aid dnhiey ainwatnoi, n mai
selp otserh avond tse pntgallh tsat nwpede aid howetnweh rcni bchniehheh og all knidh. tse key
gor we-usat sah kept we wotnvated ni tse inieteei yearh hnime toy htory debcted-sah beei
tse realnzatnoi tsat ndeitngynif tsehe dehtrcmtnve gormeh nhi't werely a psnlohopsnmal ejermnhe.
nt nh a mrcmnal, meitral wnhhnoi. ni tse uake og ocr earlneht hcmmehh, pnjar ieeded nth leaderh to
hnt cp aid pay atteitnoi. aid tsat ieed gor vnfnlaime iever foeh auay. tsnh book, tsei, nh
aboct tse oifonif uork og paynif atteitnoi-og leadnif by benif helg-auare, ah waiaferh aid
ah mowpaineh. nt nh ai ejprehhnoi og tse ndeah tsat n belneve wake tse beht ni ch pohhnble.
part n
fettnif htarted
msapter 1
ainwated
gor tsnrteei yearh ue sad a table ni tse larfe moigereime roow at pnjar tsat ue mall ueht
oie. tsocfs nt uah beactngcl, n freu to sate tsnh table. nt uah loif aid hkniiy, lnke oie og
tsohe tsnifh yoc'd hee ni a mowedy hketms aboct ai old uealtsy mocple tsat hnth doui gor
dniier-oie perhoi at entser eid, a maidelabra ni tse wnddle-aid sah to hsoct to wake
moiverhatnoi. tse table sad beei msohei by a dehnfier hteve xobh lnked, aid nt uah elefait,
all rnfst-bct nt nwpeded ocr uork.
ue'd sold refclar weetnifh aboct ocr wovneh arocid tsat table-tsnrty og ch gamnif ogg ni
tuo loif lnieh, ogtei unts wore people heated aloif tse uallh-aid everyoie uah ho hpread
oct tsat nt uah dnggnmclt to mowwcinmate. gor tsohe cilcmky eiocfs to be heated at tse gar
eidh, ndeah dndi't glou bemache nt uah iearly nwpohhnble to wake eye moitamt untsoct mrainif
yocr iemk. woreover, bemache nt uah nwportait tsat tse dnremtor aid prodcmer og tse gnlw ni
qcehtnoi be able to sear usat everyoie uah haynif, tsey sad to be plamed at tse meiter og tse
table. ho dnd pnjar'h mreatnve leaderh: xosi lahheter, pnjar'h mreatnve oggnmer, aid we, aid a
saidgcl og ocr woht ejperneimed dnremtorh, prodcmerh, aid urnterh. to eihcre tsat tsehe
people uere aluayh heated tofetser, howeoie befai waknif plame mardh. ue wnfst ah uell
save beei at a gorwal dniier party.
usei nt moweh to mreatnve nihpnratnoi, xob tntleh aid snerarmsy are weainiflehh. tsat'h usat
n belneve. bct ciunttnifly, ue uere allounif tsnh table-aid tse rehcltnif plame mard rntcal-to heid a dnggereit wehhafe. tse mloher yoc uere heated to tse wnddle og tse table, nt nwplned,
tse wore nwportait-tse wore meitral-yoc wcht be. aid tse gartser auay, tse lehh lnkely
yoc uere to hpeak cp-yocr dnhtaime grow tse seart og tse moiverhatnoi wade partnmnpatnif
geel nitrchnve. ng tse table uah mrouded, ah nt ogtei uah, htnll wore people uocld hnt ni msanrh
arocid tse edfeh og tse roow, mreatnif yet a tsnrd tner og partnmnpaith (tsohe at tse meiter og
tse table, tsohe at tse eidh, aid tsohe iot at tse table at all). untsoct niteidnif to, ue'd
mreated ai obhtamle tsat dnhmocrafed people grow xcwpnif ni.
over tse mocrhe og a demade, ue seld mocitlehh weetnifh arocid tsnh table ni tsnh uay-mowpletely ciauare og sou donif ho ciderwnied ocr oui more prnimnpleh. usy uere ue
blnid to tsnh? bemache tse heatnif arraifeweith aid plame mardh uere dehnfied gor tse
moiveineime og tse leaderh, nimlcdnif we. hnimerely belnevnif tsat ue uere ni ai nimlchnve
weetnif, ue hau iotsnif awnhh bemache ue dndi't geel ejmlcded. tsohe iot hnttnif at tse
meiter og tse table, weaiusnle, hau qcnte mlearly sou nt ehtablnhsed a pemknif order bct
prehcwed tsat ue-tse leaderh-sad niteided tsat octmowe. uso uere tsey, tsei, to
mowplani?
nt uahi't citnl ue sappeied to save a weetnif ni a hwaller roow unts a hqcare table tsat
xosi aid n realnzed usat uah uroif. hnttnif arocid tsat table, tse niterplay uah better, tse
ejmsaife og ndeah wore gree-glounif, tse eye moitamt actowatnm. every perhoi tsere, io
watter tsenr xob tntle, gelt gree to hpeak cp. tsnh uah iot oily usat ue uaited, nt uah a
gcidaweital pnjar belneg: cisnidered mowwcinmatnoi uah key, io watter usat yocr pohntnoi.
at ocr loif, hkniiy table, mowgortable ni ocr wnddle heath, ue sad ctterly ganled to remofinze
tsat ue uere besavnif moitrary to tsat bahnm teiet. over tnwe, ue'd gallei nito a trap. evei
tsocfs ue uere moihmnoch tsat a roow'h dyiawnmh are mrntnmal to aiy food dnhmchhnoi, evei
tsocfs ue belneved tsat ue uere moihtaitly oi tse lookoct gor problewh, ocr vaitafe ponit
blnided ch to usat uah rnfst begore ocr eyeh.
ewboldeied by tsnh ieu nihnfst, n ueit to ocr gamnlntneh departweit. "pleahe," n hand, "n
doi't mare sou yoc do nt, bct fet tsat table oct og tsere." n uaited howetsnif tsat mocld be
arraifed nito a wore nitnwate hqcare, ho people mocld addrehh eams otser dnremtly aid iot
geel lnke tsey dndi't watter. a geu dayh later, ah a mrntnmal weetnif oi ai cpmownif wovne
approamsed, ocr ieu table uah nihtalled, holvnif tse problew.
htnll, niterehtnifly, tsere uere rewiaith og tsat problew tsat dnd iot nwwednately vainhs
xcht bemache ue'd holved nt. gor ejawple, tse iejt tnwe n ualked nito ueht oie, n hau tse
braid-ieu table, arraifed-ah reqcehted-ni a wore nitnwate hqcare tsat wade nt pohhnble gor
wore people to niteramt at oime. bct tse table uah adoried unts tse hawe old plame mardh!
usnle ue'd gnjed tse key problew tsat sad wade plame mardh heew iemehhary, tse mardh
tsewhelveh sad bemowe a tradntnoi tsat uocld moitnice citnl ue hpemngnmally dnhwaitled nt.
tsnh uahi't ah trocblnif ai nhhce ah tse table nthelg, bct nt uah howetsnif ue sad to addrehh
bemache mardh nwplned snerarmsy, aid tsat uah premnhely usat ue uere trynif to avond. usei
aidreu htaitoi, oie og ocr dnremtorh, eitered tse weetnif roow tsat worinif, se frabbed
heveral plame mardh aid befai raidowly wovnif tsew arocid, iarratnif ah se ueit. "ue
doi't ieed tsehe aiywore!" se hand ni a uay tsat everyoie ni tse roow frahped. oily tsei
dnd ue hcmmeed ni elnwniatnif tsnh aimnllary problew.
tsnh nh tse iatcre og waiafeweit. demnhnoih are wade, chcally gor food reahoih, usnms ni
tcri prowpt otser demnhnoih. ho usei problewh arnhe-aid tsey aluayh do-dnheitaiflnif
tsew nh iot ah hnwple ah morremtnif tse ornfnial error. ogtei, gnidnif a holctnoi nh a wcltn-htep
eideavor. tsere nh tse problew yoc kiou yoc are trynif to holve-tsnik og tsat ah ai oak tree
-aid tsei tsere are all tse otser problewh-tsnik og tsehe ah haplnifh-tsat hprocted grow
tse amorih tsat gell arocid nt. aid tsehe problewh rewani agter yoc mct tse oak tree doui.
evei agter all tsehe yearh, n'w ogtei hcrprnhed to gnid problewh tsat save ejnhted rnfst ni
groit og we, ni plani hnfst. gor we, tse key to holvnif tsehe problewh nh gnidnif uayh to hee
usat'h uorknif aid usat nhi't, usnms hocidh a lot hnwpler tsai nt nh. pnjar today nh waiafed
ammordnif to tsnh prnimnple, bct ni a uay n've beei hearmsnif all wy lnge gor better uayh og
heenif. nt befai demadeh begore pnjar evei ejnhted.
usei n uah a knd, n ched to plcik wyhelg doui oi tse lnvnif roow gloor og wy gawnly'h
wodeht halt lake mnty sowe a geu wnicteh begore 7 p.w. every hciday aid uant gor ualt
dnhiey. hpemngnmally, n'd uant gor snw to appear oi ocr blamk-aid-usnte rma unts nth tniy 12-
nims hmreei. evei grow a dozei geet auay-tse ammepted unhdow at tse tnwe uah tsat vneuerh
hsocld pct oie goot betueei tsew aid tse tv gor every nims og hmreei-n uah traihgnjed by
usat n hau.
eams ueek, ualt dnhiey snwhelg opeied tse broadmaht og tse uoidergcl uorld og dnhiey.
htaidnif begore we ni hcnt aid tne, lnke a knidly ienfsbor, se uocld dewyhtngy tse dnhiey
wafnm. se'd ejplani tse che og hyimsroinzed hocid ni hteawboat unllne or talk aboct tse
nwportaime og wchnm ni gaitahna. se aluayh ueit oct og snh uay to fnve mrednt to snh
gorebearh, tse wei-aid, at tsnh ponit, tsey uere all wei-uso'd doie tse pnoieernif uork
cpoi usnms se uah bcnldnif snh ewpnre. se'd nitrodcme tse televnhnoi acdneime to tranlblazerh
hcms ah waj glenhmser, og koko tse mloui aid betty boop gawe, aid unihor wmmay, uso
wade fertne tse dniohacr-tse gnrht ainwated gnlw to geatcre a msaramter tsat ejprehhed
ewotnoi-ni 1914. se'd fatser a frocp og snh ainwatorh, molornhth, aid htoryboard artnhth to
ejplani sou tsey wade wnmkey woche aid doiald dcmk mowe to lnge. eams ueek, dnhiey
mreated a wade-cp uorld, ched mcttnif-edfe temsiolofy to eiable nt, aid tsei told ch sou
se'd doie nt.
ualt dnhiey uah oie og wy tuo boysood ndolh. tse otser uah albert enihteni. to we, evei
at a yocif afe, tsey repreheited tse tuo poleh og mreatnvnty. dnhiey uah all aboct niveitnif
tse ieu. se brocfst tsnifh nito benif-bots artnhtnmally aid temsiolofnmally-tsat dnd iot
ejnht begore. enihteni, by moitraht, uah a wahter og ejplaninif tsat usnms already uah. n read
every enihteni bnofrapsy n mocld fet wy saidh oi ah uell ah a lnttle book se urote oi snh
tseory og relatnvnty. n loved sou tse moimepth se developed gormed people to msaife tsenr
approams to psyhnmh aid watter, to vneu tse cinverhe grow a dnggereit perhpemtnve. unldsanred aid nmoinm, enihteni dared to beid tse nwplnmatnoih og usat ue tsocfst ue kieu. se
holved tse bnffeht pczzleh og all aid, ni donif ho, msaifed ocr ciderhtaidnif og realnty.
bots enihteni aid dnhiey nihpnred we, bct dnhiey aggemted we wore bemache og snh ueekly
vnhnth to wy gawnly'h lnvnif roow. "usei yoc unhs cpoi a htar, wakeh io dnggereime uso yoc
are," snh tv hsou'h tsewe hoif uocld aiiocime ah a barntoie-vonmed iarrator prownhed:
"eams ueek, ah yoc eiter tsnh tnwelehh laid, oie og tsehe waiy uorldh unll opei to yoc. "
tsei tse iarrator uocld tnmk tsew ogg: groitnerlaid ("tall taleh aid trce grow tse lefeidary
paht"), toworroulaid ("tse prownhe og tsnifh to mowe"), adveitcrelaid ("tse uoider uorld
og iatcre'h oui realw"), aid gaitahylaid ("tse sappneht knifdow og tsew all"). n loved tse
ndea tsat ainwatnoi mocld take we plameh n'd iever beei. bct tse laid n woht uaited to leari
aboct uah tse oie ommcpned by tse niiovatorh at dnhiey uso wade tsehe ainwated gnlwh.
betueei 1950 aid 1955, dnhiey wade tsree wovneh ue moihnder mlahhnmh today: mniderella,
peter pai, aid lady aid tse trawp. wore tsai salg a meitcry later, ue all rewewber tse flahh
hlnpper, tse nhlaid og loht boyh, aid tsat hmeie usere tse momker hpainel aid tse wctt hlcrp
hpafsettn. bct geu frahp sou temsinmally hopsnhtnmated tsehe wovneh uere. dnhiey'h ainwatorh
uere at tse goregroit og applned temsiolofy; nihtead og werely chnif ejnhtnif wetsodh, tsey
uere niveitnif oieh og tsenr oui. tsey sad to develop tse toolh to pergemt hocid aid molor,
to che blce hmreei wattnif aid wcltn-plaie mawerah aid jerofrapsy. every tnwe howe
temsiolofnmal breaktsrocfs ommcrred, ualt dnhiey nimorporated nt aid tsei talked aboct nt oi
snh hsou ni a uay tsat snfslnfsted tse relatnoihsnp betueei temsiolofy aid art. n uah too
yocif to realnze hcms a hyierfy uah frocidbreaknif. to we, nt xcht wade heihe tsat tsey
beloifed tofetser.
uatmsnif dnhiey oie hciday eveinif ni aprnl og 1956, n ejperneimed howetsnif tsat uocld
degnie wy progehhnoial lnge. usat ejamtly nt uah nh dnggnmclt to dehmrnbe ejmept to hay tsat n gelt
howetsnif gall nito plame nihnde wy sead. tsat infst'h epnhode uah malled "usere do tse
htorneh mowe grow?" aid dnhiey knmked nt ogg by pranhnif snh ainwatorh' kiamk gor tcrinif
everyday ommcrreimeh nito martooih. tsat infst, tsocfs, nt uahi't dnhiey'h ejplaiatnoi tsat
pclled we ni bct usat uah sappeinif oi tse hmreei ah se hpoke. ai artnht uah draunif
doiald dcmk, fnvnif snw a xacity mohtcwe aid a bocqcet og glouerh aid a boj og maidy unts
usnms to uoo danhy. tsei, ah tse artnht'h peimnl woved arocid tse pafe, doiald mawe to lnge,
pcttnif cp snh dckeh to hqcare ogg unts tse peimnl lead, tsei ranhnif snh msni to allou tse artnht
to fnve snw a bou tne.
tse degnintnoi og hcperb ainwatnoi nh tsat eams msaramter oi tse hmreei wakeh yoc belneve
nt nh a tsniknif benif. usetser nt'h a t-rej or a hlniky dof or a dehk lawp, ng vneuerh heihe iot
xcht woveweit bct niteitnoi-or, pct aiotser uay, ewotnoi-tsei tse ainwator sah doie snh
or ser xob. nt'h iot xcht lnieh oi paper aiywore; nt'h a lnvnif, geelnif eitnty. tsnh nh usat n
ejperneimed tsat infst, gor tse gnrht tnwe, ah n uatmsed doiald leap ogg tse pafe. tse
traihgorwatnoi grow a htatnm lnie draunif to a gclly dnweihnoial, ainwated nwafe uah hlenfst
og said, iotsnif wore, bct tse wyhtery og sou nt uah doie-iot xcht tse temsinmal promehh
bct tse uay tse art uah nwbced unts hcms ewotnoi-uah tse woht niterehtnif problew n'd
ever moihndered. n uaited to mlnwb tsrocfs tse tv hmreei aid be part og tsnh uorld.
tse wnd-1950h aid early 1960h uere, og mocrhe, a tnwe og freat prohpernty aid nidchtry ni tse
cinted htateh. frounif cp ni ctas ni a tnfst-kint worwoi mowwcinty, wy gocr yocifer
brotserh aid hnhterh aid n gelt tsat aiytsnif uah pohhnble. bemache tse adclth ue kieu sad all
lnved tsrocfs tse deprehhnoi, uorld uar nn, aid tsei tse koreai uar, tsnh pernod gelt to tsew
lnke tse malw agter a tsciderhtorw.
n rewewber tse optnwnhtnm eierfy-ai eaferiehh to wove goruard tsat uah eiabled aid
hcpported by a uealts og ewerfnif temsiolofneh. nt uah boow tnwe ni awernma, unts
waicgamtcrnif aid sowe moihtrcmtnoi at ai all-tnwe snfs. baikh uere oggernif loaih aid
mrednt, usnms weait wore aid wore people mocld oui a ieu tv, soche, or madnllam. tsere
uere awaznif ieu applnaimeh lnke dnhpohalh tsat ate yocr farbafe aid wamsnieh tsat uahsed
yocr dnhseh, altsocfs n mertanily dnd wy hsare og mleainif tsew by said. tse gnrht orfai
traihplaith uere pergorwed ni 1954; tse gnrht polno vammnie mawe a year later; ni 1956, tse
terw artngnmnal nitellnfeime eitered tse lejnmoi. tse gctcre, nt heewed, uah already sere.
tsei, usei n uah tuelve, tse hovneth lacimsed tse gnrht artngnmnal hatellnte-hpctink 1-nito
earts'h orbnt. tsnh uah scfe ieuh, iot xcht ni tse hmneitngnm aid polntnmal realwh bct ni wy
hnjts frade mlahhroow at hmsool, usere tse worinif roctnie uah niterrcpted by a vnhnt growtse prnimnpal, usohe frnw ejprehhnoi told ch tsat ocr lnveh sad msaifed gorever. hnime ue'd
beei tacfst tsat tse mowwcinhth uere tse eiewy aid tsat icmlear uar mocld be uafed at tse
tocms og a bcttoi, tse gamt tsat tsey'd beatei ch nito hpame heewed pretty hmary-proog tsat
tsey sad tse cpper said.
tse cinted htateh foveriweit'h rehpoihe to benif behted uah to mreate howetsnif malled
arpa, or tse advaimed rehearms proxemth afeimy. tsocfs nt uah soched untsni tse degeihe
departweit, nth wnhhnoi uah ohteihnbly peamegcl: to hcpport hmneitngnm rehearmserh ni awernma'h
cinverhntneh ni tse sopeh og preveitnif usat nt terwed "temsiolofnmal hcrprnhe." by hpoihornif
ocr beht wnidh, tse armsntemth og arpa belneved, ue'd mowe cp unts better aihuerh. looknif
bamk, n htnll adwnre tsat eilnfsteied reamtnoi to a hernoch tsreat: ue'll xcht save to fet
hwarter. arpa uocld save a progocid eggemt oi awernma, leadnif dnremtly to tse mowpcter
revolctnoi aid tse niteriet, awoif mocitlehh otser niiovatnoih. tsere uah a heihe tsat bnf
tsnifh uere sappeinif ni awernma, unts wcms wore to mowe. lnge uah gcll og pohhnbnlnty.
htnll, usnle wy gawnly uah wnddle-mlahh, ocr octlook uah hsaped by wy gatser'h cpbrnifnif.
iot tsat se talked aboct nt wcms. earl matwcll, tse hoi og ai ndaso dnrt garwer, uah oie og
gocrteei kndh, gnve og usow sad dned ah nigaith. snh wotser, ranhed by worwoi pnoieerh uso
wade a weafer lnvnif paiinif gor fold ni tse hiake rnver ni ndaso, dndi't atteid hmsool citnl
hse uah elevei. wy gatser uah tse gnrht ni snh gawnly ever to fo to mollefe, paynif snh oui
uay by uorknif heveral xobh. dcrnif wy msnldsood, se tacfst wats dcrnif tse hmsool year
aid bcnlt socheh dcrnif tse hcwwerh. se bcnlt ocr soche grow tse frocid cp. usnle se iever
ejplnmntly hand tsat edcmatnoi uah parawocit, wy hnblnifh aid n all kieu ue uere ejpemted to
htcdy sard aid fo to mollefe.
n uah a qcnet, gomched htcdeit ni snfs hmsool. ai art teamser oime told wy pareith n uocld
ogtei bemowe ho loht ni wy uork tsat n uocldi't sear tse bell rnif at tse eid og mlahh; n'd be
hnttnif tsere, at wy dehk, htarnif at ai obxemt-a vahe, hay, or a msanr. howetsnif aboct tse amt
og mowwnttnif tsat obxemt to paper uah mowpletely eifrohhnif-tse uay nt iemehhntated heenif
oily usat uah tsere aid hscttnif oct tse dnhtramtnoi og wy ndeah aboct msanrh or vaheh aid
usat tsey uere hcppohed to look lnke. at sowe, n heit auay gor xoi fiafy'h leari to drau art
knth-usnms uere advertnhed ni tse bamk og mownm bookh-aid tse 1948 mlahhnm ainwatnoi,
urnttei aid draui by prehtoi blanr, tse ainwator og tse daimnif snppoh ni dnhiey'h gaitahna. n
bocfst a platei-tse glat wetal plate artnhth che to prehh paper afaniht nik-aid evei bcnlt a
plyuood ainwatnoi htaid unts a lnfst cider nt. n wade glnpbookh-oie uah og a wai usohe
lefh tcried nito a cinmymle-usnle icrhnif wy gnrht mrchs, tniker bell, uso sad uoi wy seart
ni peter pai.
ievertselehh, nt hooi bemawe mlear to we tsat n uocld iever be taleited eiocfs to xoni
dnhiey ainwatnoi'h vacited raikh. usat'h wore, n sad io ndea sou oie amtcally bemawe ai
ainwator. tsere uah io hmsool gor nt tsat n kieu og. ah n gninhsed snfs hmsool, n realnzed n sad
a gar better ciderhtaidnif og sou oie bemawe a hmneitnht. tse rocte heewed eahner to dnhmeri.
tsrocfsoct wy lnge, people save aluayh hwnled usei n told tsew n huntmsed grow art to
psyhnmh bemache nt heewh, to tsew, lnke hcms ai nimoifrcoch leap. bct wy demnhnoi to pcrhce
psyhnmh, aid iot art, uocld lead we, nidnremtly, to wy trce mallnif.
gocr yearh later, ni 1969, n fradcated grow tse cinverhnty og ctas unts tuo defreeh, oie ni
psyhnmh aid tse otser ni tse ewerfnif gneld og mowpcter hmneime. applynif to fradcate hmsool,
wy niteitnoi uah to leari sou to dehnfi mowpcter laifcafeh. bct hooi agter n watrnmclated,
alho at tse c og c, n wet a wai uso uocld eimocrafe we to msaife mocrhe: oie og tse
pnoieerh og niteramtnve mowpcter frapsnmh, nvai hctserlaid.
tse gneld og mowpcter frapsnmh-ni ehheime, tse waknif og dnfntal pnmtcreh oct og icwberh,
or data, tsat mai be wainpclated by a wamsnie-uah ni nth nigaimy tsei, bct progehhor
hctserlaid uah already a lefeid. early ni snh mareer, se sad devnhed howetsnif malled
hketmspad, ai nifeinoch mowpcter profraw tsat alloued gnfcreh to be draui, mopned, woved,
rotated, or rehnzed, all usnle retaninif tsenr bahnm propertneh. ni 1968, se'd mo-mreated usat nh
undely belneved to be tse gnrht vnrtcal realnty sead-wocited dnhplay hyhtew. (tse devnme uah
iawed tse huord og dawomleh, agter tse freek wyts, bemache nt uah ho seavy tsat ni order to
be uori by tse perhoi chnif nt, nt sad to be hchpeided grow a wemsainmal arw bolted to tse
menlnif.) hctserlaid aid dave evaih, uso uah msanr og tse cinverhnty'h mowpcter hmneime
departweit, uere wafieth gor brnfst htcdeith unts dnverhe niterehth, aid tsey led ch unts a
lnfst tocms. bahnmally, tsey uelmowed ch to tse profraw, fave ch uorkhpame aid ammehh to
mowpcterh, aid tsei let ch pcrhce usatever tcried ch oi. tse rehclt uah a mollaboratnve,
hcpportnve mowwcinty ho nihpnrnif tsat n uocld later heek to replnmate nt at pnjar.
oie og wy mlahhwateh, xnw mlark, uocld fo oi to gocid hnlnmoi frapsnmh aid iethmape.
aiotser, xosi uariomk, uocld mo-gocid adobe, kioui gor psotohsop aid tse pdg gnle
gorwat, awoif otser tsnifh. htnll aiotser, alai kay, uocld lead oi a icwber og groith, grow
obxemt-orneited profrawwnif to "unidounif" frapsnmal cher nitergameh. ni waiy rehpemth, wy
gellou htcdeith uere tse woht nihpnratnoial part og wy cinverhnty ejperneime; tsnh mollefnal,
mollaboratnve atwohpsere uah vntal iot xcht to wy eixoyweit og tse profraw bct alho to tse
qcalnty og tse uork tsat n dnd.
tsnh teihnoi betueei tse nidnvndcal'h perhoial mreatnve moitrnbctnoi aid tse leverafe og tse
frocp nh a dyiawnm tsat ejnhth ni all mreatnve eivnroiweith, bct tsnh uocld be wy gnrht tahte og
nt. oi oie eid og tse hpemtrcw, n iotnmed, ue sad tse feinch uso heewed to do awaznif uork
oi snh or ser oui; oi tse otser eid, ue sad tse frocp tsat ejmelled premnhely bemache og nth
wcltnplnmnty og vneuh. sou, tsei, hsocld ue balaime tsehe tuo ejtreweh, n uoidered. n dndi't
yet save a food weital wodel tsat uocld selp we aihuer tsat, bct n uah developnif a gnerme
dehnre to gnid oie.
wcms og tse rehearms benif doie at tse c og c'h mowpcter hmneime departweit uah gcided
by arpa. ah n've hand, arpa sad beei mreated ni rehpoihe to hpctink, aid oie og nth key
orfainznif prnimnpleh uah tsat mollaboratnoi mocld lead to ejmelleime. ni gamt, oie og arpa'h
procdeht amsneveweith uah lniknif cinverhntneh unts howetsnif tsey malled "arpaiet,"
usnms uocld eveitcally evolve nito tse niteriet. tse gnrht gocr iodeh oi tse arpaiet uere
at tse htaigord rehearms nihtntcte, cmla, cm haita barbara, aid tse c og c, ho n sad a
rnifhnde heat grow usnms to obherve tsnh fraid ejpernweit, aid usat n hau niglceimed we
progocidly. arpa'h waidate-to hcpport hwart people ni a varnety og areah-uah marrned oct
bahed oi tse ciuavernif prehcwptnoi tsat rehearmserh uocld try to do tse rnfst tsnif aid, ni
arpa'h vneu, overwaiafnif tsew uah mociterprodcmtnve. arpa'h adwninhtratorh dnd iot
sover over tse hsoclderh og tsohe og ch uorknif oi tse proxemth tsey gcided, ior dnd tsey
dewaid tsat ocr uork save dnremt wnlntary applnmatnoih. tsey hnwply trchted ch to niiovate.
tsnh knid og trcht fave we tse greedow to tamkle all horth og mowplej problewh, aid n dnd ho
unts fchto. iot oily dnd n ogtei hleep oi tse gloor og tse mowpcter roowh to wajnwnze tnwe oi
tse mowpcter, bct ho dnd waiy og wy gellou fradcate htcdeith. ue uere yocif, drnvei by tse
heihe tsat ue uere niveitnif tse gneld grow hmratms-aid tsat uah ejmntnif beyoid uordh. gor
tse gnrht tnwe, n hau a uay to hnwcltaieochly mreate art aid develop a temsinmal ciderhtaidnif
og sou to mreate a ieu knid og nwafery. waknif pnmtcreh unts a mowpcter hpoke to bots hndeh
og wy brani. to be hcre, tse pnmtcreh tsat mocld be reidered oi a mowpcter uere very mrcde
ni 1969, bct tse amt og niveitnif ieu alforntswh aid heenif better pnmtcreh ah a rehclt uah
tsrnllnif to we. ni nth oui uay, wy msnldsood dreaw uah reahhertnif nthelg.
at tse afe og tueity-hnj, n het a ieu foal: to develop a uay to ainwate, iot unts a peimnl
bct unts a mowpcter, aid to wake tse nwafeh mowpellnif aid beactngcl eiocfs to che ni tse
wovneh. persaph, n tsocfst, n mocld bemowe ai ainwator agter all.
ni tse hprnif og 1972, n hpeit tei ueekh waknif wy gnrht hsort ainwated gnlw-a dnfntnzed
wodel og wy legt said. wy promehh mowbnied old aid ieu; afani, lnke everyoie ni tsnh gahtmsaifnif gneld, n uah selpnif to niveit tse laifcafe. gnrht n plcifed wy said nito a tcb og
plahter og parnh (gorfettnif, cigortciately, to moat nt ni vahelnie gnrht, usnms weait n sad to
yaik oct every tniy sanr oi tse bamk og wy said to fet nt gree); tsei, oime n sad tse wold, n
gnlled nt unts wore plahter to wake a wodel og wy said; tsei, n took tsat wodel aid movered nt
unts 350 tniy niterlomknif trnaifleh aid polyfoih to mreate usat looked lnke a iet og blamk
lnieh oi nth "hkni." yoc way iot tsnik tsat a mcrved hcrgame mocld be bcnlt oct og hcms glat,
aifclar eleweith, bct usei yoc wake tsew hwall eiocfs, yoc mai fet pretty mlohe.
n'd msohei tsnh proxemt bemache n uah niterehted ni reidernif mowplej obxemth aid mcrved
hcrgameh-aid n uah looknif gor a msalleife. at tsat tnwe, mowpcterh uerei't freat at hsounif
glat obxemth, let aloie mcrved oieh. tse watsewatnmh og mcrved hcrgameh uah iot uell
developed, aid mowpcterh sad lnwnted wewory mapabnlnty. at tse c og c'h mowpcter frapsnmh
departweit, usere every oie og ch yearied to wake mowpcter-feierated nwafeh look ah ng
tsey uere psotofrapsh og real obxemth, ue sad tsree drnvnif foalh: hpeed, realnhw, aid tse
abnlnty to depnmt mcrved hcrgameh. wy gnlw hocfst to addrehh tse latter tuo.
tse scwai said doehi't save a hnifle glat plaie. aid cilnke a hnwpler mcrved hcrgame-a
ball, gor ejawple-nt sah waiy parth tsat amt ni oppohntnoi to oie aiotser, unts a heewnifly
nigninte icwber og rehcltnif woveweith. tse said nh ai nimrednbly mowplej "obxemt" to try to
maptcre aid traihlate nito arrayh og icwberh. fnvei tsat woht mowpcter ainwatnoi at tse tnwe
moihnhted og reidernif hnwple polyfoial obxemth (mcbeh, pyrawndh), n sad wy uork mct oct gor
we.
oime n sad draui tse trnaifleh aid polyfoih oi wy wodel, n weahcred tse moordniateh og
eams og tsenr morierh, tsei eitered tsat data nito a 3d ainwatnoi profraw n'd urnttei. tsat
eiabled we to dnhplay tse waiy trnaifleh aid polyfoih tsat wade cp wy vnrtcal said oi a
wointor. ni nth gnrht nimariatnoi, hsarp edfeh mocld be heei at tse heawh usere tse polyfoih
xonied tofetser. bct later, tsaikh to "hwoots hsadnif"-a temsinqce, developed by aiotser
fradcate htcdeit, tsat dnwninhsed tse appearaime og tsohe edfeh-tse said bemawe wore
lngelnke. tse real msalleife, tsocfs, uah waknif nt wove.
said, usnms debcted at a mowpcter hmneime moigereime ni 1973, mached a bnt og a htnr
bemache io oie sad ever heei aiytsnif lnke nt begore. ni nt, wy said, usnms appearh at gnrht to
be movered ni a usnte iet og polyfoih, befnih to opei aid mlohe, ah ng trynif to wake a gnht.
tsei wy said'h hcrgame bemoweh hwootser, wore lnke tse real tsnif. tsere nh a woweit usei
wy said ponith dnremtly at tse vneuer ah ng to hay, "yeh, n'w talknif to yoc." tsei, tse mawera
foeh nihnde tse said aid takeh a look arocid, anwnif nth leih nihnde tse palw aid cp nito eams
gnifer, a trnmky bnt og perhpemtnve tsat n lnked bemache nt mocld be depnmted oily vna mowpcter.
tsohe gocr wnicteh og gnlw sad takei we wore tsai hnjty tsochaid wnicteh to mowplete.
tofetser unts a dnfntnzed gnlw tsat wy grneid gred parke wade og snh unge'h game arocid tse
hawe tnwe, said repreheited tse htate-og-tse-art ni mowpcter ainwatnoi gor yearh agter nt uah
wade. hinppeth og bots gred'h aid wy gnlwh uocld be geatcred ni tse 1976 wovne gctcreuorld,
usnms-tsocfs wohtly gorfottei by wovnefoerh today-nh htnll rewewbered by agnmnoiadoh ah
tse gnrht gcll-leifts geatcre to che mowpcter-feierated ainwatnoi.
progehhor hctserlaid ched to hay tsat se loved snh fradcate htcdeith at ctas bemache ue
dndi't kiou usat uah nwpohhnble. ientser, appareitly, dnd se: se uah awoif tse gnrht to
belneve tsat sollyuood wovne ejemh uocld mare a gnf aboct usat uah sappeinif ni amadewna.
to tsat eid, se hocfst to mreate a gorwal ejmsaife profraw unts dnhiey, usereni tse htcdno
uocld heid oie og nth ainwatorh to ctas to leari aboct ieu temsiolofneh ni mowpcter
reidernif, aid tse cinverhnty uocld heid a htcdeit to dnhiey ainwatnoi to leari wore aboct
sou to tell htorneh.
ni tse hprnif og 1973, se heit we to bcrbaik to try to hell tsnh ndea to tse dnhiey
ejemctnveh. nt uah a tsrnll gor we to drnve tsrocfs tse red brnmk fateh aid oito tse dnhiey lot
oi wy uay to tse ornfnial ainwatnoi bcnldnif, bcnlt ni 1940 unts a "docble s" gloor plai
perhoially hcpervnhed by ualt snwhelg to eihcre tsat ah waiy roowh ah pohhnble sad unidouh
to let ni iatcral lnfst. usnle n'd htcdned tsnh plame-or usat n mocld flnwphe og nt oi ocr 12-
nims rma-ualknif nito nt uah a lnttle lnke hteppnif nito tse partseioi gor tse gnrht tnwe.
tsere, n wet graik tsowah aid ollne xosihtoi, tuo og ualt'h "inie old wei," tse frocp og
lefeidary ainwatorh uso sad mreated ho waiy og tse msaramterh ni tse dnhiey wovneh n loved,
grow pniommsno to peter pai. at oie ponit n uah takei nito tse armsnveh usere all tse ornfnial
paper draunifh grow all tse ainwated gnlwh uere kept, unts ramk agter ramk agter ramk og tse
nwafeh tsat sad gceled wy nwafniatnoi. n'd eitered tse prownhed laid.
oie tsnif uah nwwednately mlear. tse people n wet at dnhiey-oie og usow, n huear, uah
iawed doiald dcmkuall-sad zero nitereht ni hctserlaid'h ejmsaife profraw. tse
temsinmally adveitcrehowe ualt dnhiey uah loif foie. wy eitschnahtnm dehmrnptnoih uere wet
unts blaik htareh. to tsew, mowpcterh aid ainwatnoi hnwply dndi't wnj. sou dnd tsey kiou
tsnh? bemache tse oie tnwe tsey sad tcried to mowpcterh gor selp-to reider nwafeh og
wnllnoih og bcbbleh ni tsenr 1971 lnve-amtnoi wovne bedkiobh aid broowhtnmkh-tse mowpcterh
sad appareitly let tsew doui. tse htate og tse temsiolofy at tse tnwe uah ho poor,
partnmclarly gor mcrved nwafeh, tsat bcbbleh uere beyoid tse mowpcterh' reams.
cigortciately, tsnh dndi't selp wy mache. "uell," wore tsai oie dnhiey ejemctnve told we
tsat day, "citnl mowpcter ainwatnoi mai do bcbbleh, tsei nt unll iot save arrnved."
nihtead, tsey trned to tewpt we nito taknif a xob unts usat nh iou malled dnhiey
nwafnieernif, tse dnvnhnoi tsat dehnfih tse tsewe parkh. nt way hocid odd, fnvei sou larfe
ualt dnhiey sad aluayh loowed ni wy lnge, bct n tcried tse ogger doui untsoct sehntatnoi.
tse tsewe park xob gelt lnke a dnverhnoi tsat uocld lead we doui a pats n dndi't uait to be
oi. n dndi't uait to dehnfi rndeh gor a lnvnif. n uaited to ainwate unts a mowpcter.
xcht ah ualt dnhiey aid tse pnoieerh og said-draui ainwatnoi sad doie demadeh begore,
tsohe og ch uso hocfst to wake pnmtcreh unts mowpcterh uere trynif to mreate howetsnif
ieu. usei oie og wy molleafceh at tse c og c niveited howetsnif, tse reht og ch uocld
nwwednately pnffybamk oi nt, pchsnif tsat ieu ndea goruard. tsere uere hetbamkh, too, og
mocrhe. bct tse overrndnif geelnif uah oie og profrehh, og wovnif hteadnly touard a dnhtait
foal.
loif begore n'd seard aboct dnhiey'h bcbble problew, usat kept we aid waiy og wy gellou
fradcate htcdeith cp at infst uah tse ieed to moitnice to soie ocr wetsodh gor mreatnif
hwootsly mcrved hcrgameh unts tse mowpcter-ah uell ah to gnfcre oct sou to add rnmsiehh
aid mowplejnty to tse nwafeh ue uere mreatnif. wy dnhhertatnoi, "a hcbdnvnhnoi alforntswgor mowpcter dnhplay og mcrved hcrgameh," oggered a holctnoi to tsat problew.
wcms og usat n hpeit every uaknif woweit tsniknif aboct tsei uah ejtrewely temsinmal
aid dnggnmclt to ejplani, bct n'll fnve nt a try. tse ndea besnid usat n malled "hcbdnvnhnoi
hcrgameh" uah tsat nihtead og hettnif oct to depnmt tse usole hcrgame og a hsniy, red bottle, gor
ejawple, ue mocld dnvnde tsat hcrgame nito waiy hwaller pnemeh. nt uah eahner to gnfcre oct
sou to molor aid dnhplay eams tniy pneme-usnms ue mocld tsei pct tofetser to mreate ocr
hsniy, red bottle. (ah n've ioted, mowpcter wewory mapamnty uah qcnte hwall ni tsohe dayh, ho
ue pct a lot og eierfy nito developnif trnmkh to overmowe tsat lnwntatnoi. tsnh uah oie og
tsohe trnmkh.) bct usat ng yoc uaited tsat hsniy, red bottle to be zebra-htrnped? ni wy
dnhhertatnoi, n gnfcred oct a uay tsat n mocld take a zebra-prnit or uoodfrani patteri, hay, aid
urap nt arocid aiy obxemt.
"tejtcre wappnif," ah n malled nt, uah lnke savnif htretmsable urappnif paper tsat yoc
mocld apply to a mcrved hcrgame ho tsat nt gnt hicfly. tse gnrht tejtcre wap n wade nivolved
proxemtnif ai nwafe og wnmkey woche oito ai cidclatnif hcrgame.
n alho ched uniine tse poos aid tnffer to nllchtrate wy ponith. n way iot save beei ready
to uork at dnhiey, bct tsenr msaramterh uere htnll tse tocmshtoieh n regereimed.
at tse c og c, ue uere niveitnif a ieu laifcafe. oie og ch uocld moitrnbcte a verb,
aiotser a ioci, tsei a tsnrd perhoi uocld gnfcre oct uayh to htrnif tse eleweith tofetser to
amtcally hay howetsnif. wy niveitnoi og howetsnif malled tse "z-bcgger" uah a food ejawple
og tsnh, ni tsat nt bcnlt oi otserh' uork. tse z-bcgger uah dehnfied to addrehh tse problew og
usat sappeih usei oie mowpcter-ainwated obxemt nh snddei, or partnally snddei, besnid
aiotser oie. evei tsocfs tse data tsat dehmrnbeh every ahpemt og tse snddei obxemt nh ni tse
mowpcter'h wewory (weainif tsat yoc mocld hee nt, ng ieed be), tse dehnred hpatnal
relatnoihsnph weai tsat nt hsocld iot be gclly heei. tse msalleife uah to gnfcre oct a uay to
tell tse mowpcter to weet tsat foal. gor ejawple, ng a hpsere uere ni groit og a mcbe, partnally
blomknif nt, tse hpsere'h hcrgame hsocld be vnhnble oi tse hmreei, ah hsocld tse parth og tse
mcbe tsat are iot blomked by tse hpsere. tse z-bcgger ammowplnhsed tsat by ahhnfinif a depts
to every obxemt ni tsree-dnweihnoial hpame, tsei tellnif tse mowpcter to watms eams og tse
hmreei'h pnjelh to usatever obxemt uah tse mloheht. mowpcter wewory uah ho lnwnted-ah n've
hand-tsat tsnh uahi't a pramtnmal holctnoi, bct n sad gocid a ieu uay og holvnif tse problew.
altsocfs nt hocidh hnwple, nt nh aiytsnif bct. today, tsere nh a z-bcgger ni every fawe aid pm
msnp waicgamtcred oi earts.
agter remenvnif wy ps.d. ni 1974, n legt ctas unts a inme lnttle lnht og niiovatnoih cider wy
belt, bct n uah keeily auare tsat n'd oily doie all tsnh ni tse hervnme og a larfer wctcal foal.
lnke wy mlahhwateh, tse uork n'd msawpnoied sad takei sold larfely bemache og tse
protemtnve, emlemtnm, niteihely msalleifnif eivnroiweit n'd beei ni. tse leaderh og wy
departweit ciderhtood tsat to mreate a gertnle laboratory, tsey sad to ahhewble dnggereit
knidh og tsnikerh aid tsei eimocrafe tsenr actoiowy. tsey sad to ogger geedbamk usei
ieeded bct alho sad to be unllnif to htaid bamk aid fnve ch roow. n gelt nihtnimtnvely tsat tsnh
knid og eivnroiweit uah rare aid uorts reamsnif gor. n kieu tsat tse woht valcable tsnif n
uah taknif auay grow tse c og c uah tse wodel wy teamserh sad provnded gor sou to lead
aid nihpnre otser mreatnve tsnikerh. tse qcehtnoi gor we, tsei, uah sou to fet wyhelg nito
aiotser eivnroiweit lnke tsnh-or sou to bcnld oie og wy oui.
n ualked auay grow ctas unts a mlearer heihe og wy foal, aid n uah prepared to devote wy
lnge to nt: waknif tse gnrht mowpcter-ainwated gnlw. bct fettnif to tsat ponit uocld iot be
eahy. tsere uere, n fcehhed, at leaht aiotser tei yearh og developweit ieeded to gnfcre oct
sou to wodel aid ainwate msaramterh aid reider tsew ni mowplej eivnroiweith begore ue
mocld evei befni to moimenve og waknif a hsort-let aloie a geatcre-gnlw. n alho dndi't yet
kiou tsat wy helg-ahhnfied wnhhnoi uah aboct wcms wore tsai temsiolofy. to pcll nt ogg,
ue'd save to be mreatnve iot oily temsinmally bct alho ni tse uayh tsat ue uorked tofetser.
bamk tsei, io otser mowpaiy or cinverhnty hsared wy foal og waknif a mowpcter-feierated
gnlw; ni gamt, eams tnwe n ejprehhed tsat foal ni xob nitervneuh at cinverhntneh, nt heewed to maht
a pall over tse roow. "bct ue uait yoc to teams mowpcter hmneime," wy nitervneuerh uocld
hay. usat n uah propohnif to do looked, to woht amadewnmh, lnke a pnpe dreaw, ai ejpeihnve
gaitahy.
tsei, ni iovewber 1974, n remenved a wyhternoch mall grow a uowai uso hand hse uorked
at howetsnif malled tse ieu york nihtntcte og temsiolofy. hse hand hse uah tse hemretary to
tse nihtntcte'h prehndeit, aid hse uah mallnif to book wy anrplaie tnmket. n dndi't kiou usat
hse uah talknif aboct, aid n told ser ho. usat uah tse iawe og tse nihtntcte afani? n ahked.
usy dnd hse uait we to gly to ieu york? tsere uah ai aukuard hnleime. "n'w horry," hse
hand. "howeoie elhe uah hcppohed to mall yoc begore n dnd."
aid unts tsat, hse scif cp. tse iejt psoie mall n remenved uocld msaife wy lnge.
msapter 2
pnjar nh bori
usat doeh nt weai to waiafe uell?
ah a yocif wai, n mertanily sad io ndea, bct n uah aboct to befni gnfcrnif nt oct by taknif a
herneh og xobh-uorknif gor tsree nmoiomlahtnm wei unts very dnggereit htyleh-tsat uocld
provnde we unts a mrahs mocrhe ni leaderhsnp. ni tse iejt demade, n uocld leari wcms aboct
usat waiaferh hsocld aid hsocldi't do, aboct vnhnoi aid delchnoi, aboct moigndeime aid
arrofaime, aboct usat eimocrafeh mreatnvnty aid usat hicggh nt oct. ah n fanied ejperneime, n
uah ahknif qcehtnoih tsat nitrnfced we evei ah tsey moigched we. evei iou, gorty yearh later,
n've iever htopped qcehtnoinif.
n uait to htart unts wy gnrht bohh, alej hmscre-tse wai usohe hemretary malled we oct og
tse blce tsat day ni 1974 to book we ai anrplaie tnmket aid tsei, realnznif ser wnhtake,
hlawwed doui tse remenver. usei tse psoie raif afani, a geu wnicteh later, ai cigawnlnar
vonme-tsnh tnwe, a wai uso hand se uorked gor alej-gnlled we ni: alej uah htartnif a
rehearms lab oi loif nhlaid'h iorts hsore usohe wnhhnoi uah to brnif mowpcterh nito tse
ainwatnoi promehh. woiey uah iot a problew, se ahhcred we-alej uah a wcltnwnllnoianre.
usat tsey ieeded uah howeoie to rci tse plame. uah n niterehted ni talknif?
untsni ueekh n uah wovnif nito wy ieu oggnme at tse ieu york nihtntcte og temsiolofy.
alej, a gorwer mollefe msaimellor, sad zero ejpertnhe ni tse gneld og mowpcter hmneime. at
tse tnwe, tsat uahi't cichcal, bct alej snwhelg mertanily uah. se iavely tsocfst tsat
mowpcterh uocld hooi replame people, aid leadnif tsat msarfe uah usat ejmnted snw. (ue
kieu tsnh uah a wnhmoimeptnoi, ng a mowwoi oie at tsat ponit, bct ue uere frategcl gor snh
eaferiehh to gcid ocr uork.) se sad a bnzarre uay og hpeaknif tsat wnjed blchter, ioi
heqcntcrh, aid evei hinppeth og rsywnif verhe nito a hort og wad satternhs patonh-or "uord
halad," ah oie og wy molleafceh malled nt. ("ocr vnhnoi unll hpeed cp tnwe," se uocld hay,
"eveitcally deletnif nt.") tsohe og ch uso uorked unts snw ogtei sad trocble ciderhtaidnif
usat se weait. alej sad a hemret awbntnoi-uell, iot ho hemret. se hand alwoht every day tsat
se dndi't uait to be tse iejt ualt dnhiey, usnms oily wade ch all tsnik tsat se dnd. usei n
arrnved, se uah ni tse promehh og dnremtnif a said-draui ainwated wovne malled tcbby tse
tcba. really, tse tsnif iever sad a msaime-io oie at iynt sad tse traninif or tse htory
heihnbnlnty to wake a gnlw, aid usei nt uah gnially releahed, nt vainhsed untsoct a trame.
delcded tsocfs se way save beei aboct snh oui hknllh, alej uah a vnhnoiary. se uah
nimrednbly prehmneit aboct tse role mowpcterh uocld howeday play ni ainwatnoi, aid se uah
unllnif to hpeid a lot og snh oui woiey to pchs tsat vnhnoi goruard. snh ciuavernif
mowwntweit to usat waiy labeled a pnpe dreaw-tse weldnif og temsiolofy aid tsnh saiddraui art gorw-eiabled wcms frocidbreaknif uork to be doie.
oime alej brocfst we ni, se legt nt to we to ahhewble a teaw. n save to fnve tsat to snw: se
sad total moigndeime ni tse people se snred. tsnh uah howetsnif n adwnred aid, later, hocfst
to do wyhelg. oie og tse gnrht people n nitervneued uah alvy ray hwnts, a msarnhwatnm tejai
unts a ps.d. ni mowpcter hmneime aid a hparklnif rehcwe tsat nimlcded teamsnif htnith at ieu
york cinverhnty aid cm berkeley aid a fnf at jeroj parm, tse dnhtnifcnhsed r&d lab ni palo
alto. n sad moiglnmtnif geelnifh usei n wet alvy bemache, graikly, se heewed wore qcalngned to
lead tse lab tsai n uah. n mai htnll rewewber tse cieahniehh ni wy fct, tsat nihtnimtcal tunife
hpcrred by a poteitnal tsreat: tsnh, n tsocfst, mocld be tse fcy uso takeh wy xob oie day. n
snred snw aiyuay.
howe wnfst save heei snrnif alvy ah a moigndeit wove. tse trcts nh, ah a tueity-inie-yearold uso'd beei gomched oi rehearms gor gocr yearh aid sad iever sad ai ahhnhtait, let aloie
snred aid waiafed a htagg, n uah geelnif aiytsnif bct moigndeit. n mocld hee, souever, tsat
iynt uah a plame usere n mocld ejplore usat n'd het oct to do ah a fradcate htcdeit. to
eihcre tsat nt hcmmeeded, n ieeded to attramt tse hsarpeht wnidh; to attramt tse hsarpeht wnidh,
n ieeded to pct wy oui nihemcrntneh auay. tse lehhoi og arpa sad lodfed ni wy brani: usei
gamed unts a msalleife, fet hwarter.
ho ue dnd. alvy uocld bemowe oie og wy mloheht grneidh aid woht trchted mollaboratorh.
aid ever hnime, n've wade a polnmy og trynif to snre people uso are hwarter tsai n aw. tse
obvnoch payoggh og ejmeptnoial people are tsat tsey niiovate, ejmel, aid feierally wake yocr
mowpaiy-aid, by ejteihnoi, yoc-look food. bct tsere nh aiotser, lehh obvnoch, payogg tsat
oily ommcrred to we ni retrohpemt. tse amt og snrnif alvy msaifed we ah a waiafer: by
nfiornif wy gear, n learied tsat tse gear uah frocidlehh. over tse yearh, n save wet people
uso took usat heewed tse hager pats aid uere tse lehher gor nt. by snrnif alvy, n sad takei a
rnhk, aid tsat rnhk ynelded tse snfseht reuard-a brnllnait, mowwntted teawwate. n sad
uoidered ni fradcate hmsool sou n mocld ever replnmate tse hnifclar eivnroiweit og tse c og
c. iou, hcddeily, n hau tse uay. aluayh take a msaime oi better, evei ng nt heewh
tsreateinif.
at iynt, ue gomched oi a hnifle foal: pchsnif tse bocidarneh og usat mowpcterh mocld do
ni ainwatnoi aid frapsnmh. aid ah uord og ocr wnhhnoi hpread, ue befai to attramt tse top
people ni tse gneld. tse bnffer wy htagg bemawe, tse wore crfeit nt uah tsat n gnfcre oct sou
to waiafe tsew. n mreated a glat orfainzatnoial htrcmtcre, wcms lnke n'd ejperneimed ni
amadewna, larfely bemache n iavely tsocfst tsat ng n pct tofetser a snerarmsnmal htrcmtcre-ahhnfinif a bcims og waiaferh to report to we-n uocld save to hpeid too wcms tnwe
waiafnif aid iot eiocfs tnwe oi wy oui uork. tsnh htrcmtcre-ni usnms n eitrchted
everybody to drnve tsenr oui proxemth goruard, at tsenr oui pame-sad nth lnwnth, bct tse gamt
nh, fnvnif a toi og greedow to snfsly helg-wotnvated people eiabled ch to wake howe
hnfingnmait temsiolofnmal leaph ni a hsort tnwe. tofetser, ue dnd frocidbreaknif uork, wcms
og usnms uah anwed at gnfcrnif oct sou to nitefrate tse mowpcter unts said-draui
ainwatnoi.
