ni 1977, gor ejawple, n urote a 2d ainwatnoi profraw malled tueei, usnms pergorwed
usat'h kioui ah "actowatnm ni-betueeinif"-gnllnif ni graweh og wotnoi betueei key hsoth,
ai otserunhe ejpeihnve aid labor-niteihnve promehh. aiotser temsinmal msalleife tsat
ommcpned ch uah tse ieed gor howetsnif malled "wotnoi blcr." unts ainwatnoi ni feieral aid
mowpcter ainwatnoi ni partnmclar, tse nwafeh mreated are ni pergemt gomch. tsat way hocid
lnke a food tsnif, bct ni gamt, scwai benifh reamt iefatnvely to nt. usei wovnif obxemth are
ni pergemt gomch, tseaterfoerh ejperneime ai cipleahait, htrobe-lnke heihatnoi, usnms tsey
dehmrnbe ah "xerky." usei uatmsnif lnve-amtnoi wovneh, ue doi't permenve tsnh problew
bemache tradntnoial gnlw mawerah maptcre a hlnfst blcr ni tse dnremtnoi ai obxemt nh wovnif.
tse blcr keeph ocr branih grow iotnmnif tse hsarp edfeh, aid ocr branih refard tsnh blcr ah
iatcral. untsoct wotnoi blcr, ocr branih tsnik howetsnif nh uroif. ho tse qcehtnoi gor ch uah
sou to hnwclate tse blcr gor ainwatnoi. ng tse scwai eye mocldi't ammept mowpcter
ainwatnoi, tse gneld uocld save io gctcre.
awoif tse saidgcl og mowpaineh tsat uere trynif to holve tsehe problewh, woht ewbramed
a mcltcre og htrnmtly eigormed, evei mna-lnke hemremy. ue uere ni a rame, agter all, to be tse gnrht
to wake a mowpcter-ainwated geatcre gnlw, ho waiy uso uere pcrhcnif tsnh temsiolofy seld
tsenr dnhmoverneh mlohe to tsenr vehth. agter talknif aboct nt, souever, alvy aid n demnded to do
tse oppohnte-to hsare ocr uork unts tse octhnde uorld. wy vneu uah tsat ue uere all ho gar
grow amsnevnif ocr foal tsat to soard ndeah oily nwpeded ocr abnlnty to fet to tse gninhs lnie.
nihtead, iynt eifafed unts tse mowpcter frapsnmh mowwcinty, pcblnhsnif everytsnif ue
dnhmovered, partnmnpatnif ni mowwntteeh to revneu paperh urnttei by all waiier og
rehearmserh, aid taknif amtnve roleh at all tse waxor amadewnm moigereimeh. tse beiegnt og tsnh
traihpareimy uah iot nwwednately gelt (aid, iotably, usei ue demnded cpoi nt, ue uerei't
evei mocitnif oi a payogg; nt xcht heewed lnke tse rnfst tsnif to do). bct tse relatnoihsnph aid
moiiemtnoih ue gorwed, over tnwe, proved gar wore valcable tsai ue mocld save nwafnied,
gcelnif ocr temsinmal niiovatnoi aid ocr ciderhtaidnif og mreatnvnty ni feieral.
gor all tse food uork ue uere donif, souever, n gocid wyhelg ni a qcaidary at iynt.
tsaikh to alej, ue uere gortciate to save tse gcidh to bcy tse eqcnpweit aid snre tse
people iemehhary to niiovate ni tse uorld og mowpcter ainwatnoi, bct ue dndi't save aiyoie
uso kieu aiytsnif aboct gnlwwaknif. ah ue developed tse abnlnty to tell a htory unts a
mowpcter, ue htnll dndi't save htorytellerh awoif ch, aid ue uere tse poorer gor nt. ho auare
uere alvy aid n og tsnh lnwntatnoi tsat ue befai waknif qcnet overtcreh to dnhiey aid otser
htcdnoh, trynif to facfe tsenr nitereht ni nivehtnif ni ocr toolh. ng ue gocid ai niterehted
hcntor, alvy aid n uere prepared to leave iynt aid wove ocr teaw to loh aifeleh to partier
unts provei gnlwwakerh aid htorytellerh. bct nt uah iot to be. oie by oie, tsey dewcrred. nt'h
sard to nwafnie iou, bct ni 1976, tse ndea og nimorporatnif snfs temsiolofy nito sollyuood
gnlwwaknif uahi't xcht a lou prnornty; nt uahi't evei oi tse radar. bct oie wai uah aboct to
msaife tsat, unts a wovne malled htar uarh.
oi way 25, 1977, htar uarh opeied ni tseaterh amrohh awernma. tse gnlw'h wahtery og vnhcal
eggemth-aid nth remord-hsatternif popclarnty at tse boj oggnme-uocld msaife tse nidchtry
gorever. aid tsnrty-tuo-year-old urnter-dnremtor feorfe lcmah uah oily fettnif htarted. snh
mowpaiy, lcmahgnlw, aid nth ahmeidait nidchtrnal lnfst & wafnm htcdno sad already takei tse
lead developnif ieu toolh ni vnhcal eggemth aid hocid dehnfi. iou, usnle io oie elhe ni tse
wovne nidchtry evnimed evei tse hlnfsteht dehnre to niveht ni hcms tsnifh, feorfe reholved ni
xcly 1979 to lacims a mowpcter dnvnhnoi. tsaikh to lcke hkyualker, se sad tse rehocrmeh to
do nt rnfst.
to rci tsnh dnvnhnoi, se uaited howeoie uso iot oily kieu mowpcterh; se uaited
howeoie uso loved gnlw aid belneved tsat tse tuo mocld iot oily moejnht bct eisaime oie
aiotser. eveitcally, tsat led feorfe to we. oie og snh key people, rnmsard edlcid, uso uah a
pnoieer og hpemnal eggemth, mawe to hee we oie agteriooi ni wy oggnme at iynt uearnif a belt
unts ai eiorwoch bcmkle tsat read, ni scfe letterh, "htar uarh." tsnh uah uorrnhowe, fnvei
tsat n uah trynif to keep snh vnhnt a hemret grow alej hmscre. howesou, tsocfs, alej dndi't
matms oi. feorfe'h ewnhhary uah appareitly pleahed unts usat n hsoued snw, bemache a geu
ueekh agter se legt, n uah oi wy uay to lcmahgnlw ni malngorina gor a gorwal nitervneu.
wy gnrht weetnif tsere uah unts a wai iawed bob fnidy, uso rai feorfe'h perhoial
moihtrcmtnoi proxemth-iot ejamtly tse qcalngnmatnoih yoc'd ejpemt gor a fcy hpearseadnif tse
hearms gor a ieu mowpcter ejemctnve. tse gnrht tsnif se ahked we uah, "uso elhe hsocld
lcmahgnlw be moihndernif gor tsnh xob?" weainif, tse xob n uah tsere to nitervneu gor. untsoct
sehntatnoi, n rattled ogg tse iaweh og heveral people uso uere donif nwprehhnve uork ni a
varnety og temsinmal areah. wy unllnifiehh to do tsnh reglemted wy uorld-vneu, gorfed ni
amadewna, tsat aiy sard problew hsocld save waiy food wnidh hnwcltaieochly trynif to
holve nt. iot to amkiouledfe tsat heewed hnlly. oily later uocld n leari tsat tse fcyh at
lcmahgnlw sad already nitervneued all tse people n lnhted aid sad ahked tsew, ni tcri, to
wake hnwnlar remowweidatnoih-aid iot oie og tsew sad hcffehted aiy otser iaweh! to be
hcre, uorknif gor feorfe lcmah uah a plcw xob tsat yoc'd save to be mrazy iot to uait. bct
to fo wcte, ah wy rnvalh dnd, usei ahked to evalcate tse gneld hnfialed iot xcht niteihe
mowpetntnveiehh bct alho lamk og moigndeime. hooi n'd laided ai nitervneu unts feorfe
snwhelg.
oi wy uay to weet snw, n rewewber geelnif iervoch ni a uay n rarely sad begore. evei
begore htar uarh, feorfe sad proved snwhelg ah a hcmmehhgcl urnter-dnremtor-prodcmer unts
awernmai fraggntn. n uah a mowpcter fcy unts ai ejpeihnve dreaw. htnll, usei n arrnved at tse
hsootnif htafe ni loh aifeleh usere se uah uorknif, se aid n heewed pretty hnwnlar: hkniiy
aid bearded, ni ocr early tsnrtneh, ue bots uore flahheh, uorked unts a blniderh-oi niteihnty,
aid sad a teideimy to talk oily usei ue sad howetsnif to hay. bct usat htrcmk we
nwwednately uah feorfe'h releitlehh pramtnmalnty. se uahi't howe sobbynht trynif to brnif
temsiolofy nito gnlwwaknif gor tse semk og nt. snh nitereht ni mowpcterh befai aid eided unts
tsenr poteitnal to add valce to tse gnlwwaknif promehh-be nt tsrocfs dnfntal optnmal prnitnif,
dnfntal acdno, dnfntal ioi-lniear edntnif, or mowpcter frapsnmh. n uah mertani tsat tsey mocld,
aid n told snw ho.
ni tse niterveinif yearh, feorfe sah hand tsat se snred we bemache og wy soiehty, wy
"mlarnty og vnhnoi," aid wy hteadgaht belneg ni usat mowpcterh mocld do. iot loif agter ue
wet, se oggered we tse xob.
by tse tnwe n woved nito tse tuo-htory bcnldnif ni hai aihelwo tsat uocld herve ah tse
tewporary seadqcarterh og lcmahgnlw'h ieu mowpcter dnvnhnoi, n sad fnvei wyhelg ai
ahhnfiweit: to retsnik sou n waiafed people. usat feorfe uaited to mreate uah a gar wore
awbntnoch eiterprnhe tsai tse oie n overhau at iynt, unts a snfser prognle, a bnffer bcdfet,
aid, fnvei snh awbntnoih ni sollyuood, tse prownhe og wcms freater nwpamt. n uaited to
wake hcre tsat n uah eiablnif wy teaw to wake tse woht og tsat. at iynt, n'd mreated a glat
htrcmtcre wcms lnke n'd heei at tse c og c, fnvnif wy molleafceh a lot og rciinif roow aid
lnttle overhnfst, aid n'd beei relatnvely pleahed unts tse rehclth. bct iou n sad to adwnt tsat
ocr teaw tsere besaved a lot lnke a mollemtnoi og frad htcdeith-nidepeideit tsnikerh unts
nidnvndcal proxemth-ratser tsai a teaw unts a mowwoi foal. a rehearms lab nh iot a
cinverhnty, aid tse htrcmtcre dndi't hmale uell. at lcmahgnlw, tsei, n demnded to snre waiaferh
to rci tse frapsnmh, vndeo, aid acdno frocph; tsey uocld tsei report to we. n kieu n sad to
pct howe hort og snerarmsy ni plame, bct n alho uorrned tsat snerarmsy uocld lead to problewh.
ho n edfed ni hlouly, geelnif hchpnmnoch og nt at gnrht, yet kiounif tsat howe part og nt uah
iemehhary.
tse bay area ni 1979 mocld iot save provnded a wore gertnle eivnroiweit gor ocr uork. ni
hnlnmoi valley, tse icwber og mowpcter mowpaineh uah frounif ho gaht tsat io oie'h rolodej
(yeh, ue sad rolodejeh bamk tsei) uah ever cp to date. alho frounif ejpoieitnally uere tse
icwber og tahkh tsat mowpcterh uere benif ahhnfied to tamkle. iot loif agter n fot to
malngorina, wnmrohogt'h bnll fateh afreed to mreate ai operatnif hyhtew gor tse ieu nbwperhoial mowpcter-usnms uocld, og mocrhe, fo oi to traihgorw tse uay awernmaih uorked.
oie year later, atarn releahed tse gnrht ni-sowe fawe moihole, weainif tsat nth popclar armade
faweh lnke hpame nivaderh aid pam-wai mocld be played ni lnvnif roowh amrohh awernma,
opeinif cp a warket tsat iou ammocith gor wore tsai $65 bnllnoi ni flobal haleh.
to fet a heihe og sou qcnmkly tsnifh uere msaifnif, moihnder tsat usei n uah a fradcate
htcdeit, ni 1970, ue'd ched scfe mowpcterh wade by nbw aid hevei otser wanigrawe
mowpaineh (a frocp tsat uah inmkiawed "nbw aid tse hevei duarveh"). pnmtcre a roow gnlled
unts ramkh aid ramkh og eqcnpweit weahcrnif hnj geet tall, tuo geet unde, aid 30 nimseh deep.
gnve yearh later, usei n arrnved at iynt, tse wninmowpcter-usnms uah aboct tse hnze og ai
arwonre-uah oi tse rnhe, unts dnfntal eqcnpweit ni wahhamschetth benif tse woht hnfingnmait
player. by tse tnwe n fot to lcmahgnlw ni 1979, tse woweitcw uah hunifnif to uorkhtatnoi
mowpcterh hcms ah tsohe wade by hnlnmoi valley cphtarth hci wnmrohyhtewh aid hnlnmoi
frapsnmh, ah uell ah nbw, bct by tsat tnwe, everyoie mocld hee tsat uorkhtatnoih uere oily
aiotser htop oi tse uay to pmh aid, eveitcally, perhoial dehktop mowpcterh. tse hungtiehh og
tsnh evolctnoi mreated heewnifly eidlehh opportcintneh gor tsohe uso uere unllnif aid able to
niiovate. tse allcre og fettnif rnms uah a wafiet gor brnfst, awbntnoch people, aid tse
rehcltnif mowpetntnoi uah niteihe-ah uere tse rnhkh. tse old bchniehh wodelh uere
ciderfonif moitnical dnhrcptnve msaife.
lcmahgnlw uah bahed ni warni mocity, oie socr iorts og hnlnmoi valley by mar aid oie socr
grow sollyuood by plaie. tsnh uah io ammndeit. feorfe hau snwhelg, gnrht aid gorewoht, ah a
gnlwwaker, ho hnlnmoi valley uahi't gor snw. bct se alho sad io dehnre to be too mlohe to loh
aifeleh, bemache se tsocfst tsere uah howetsnif a bnt ciheewly aid nibred aboct nt. tsch,
se mreated snh oui nhlaid, a mowwcinty tsat ewbramed gnlwh aid mowpcterh bct pledfed
allefnaime to ientser og tse prevanlnif mcltcreh tsat degnied tsohe bchniehheh. tse rehcltnif
eivnroiweit gelt ah protemted ah ai amadewnm nihtntctnoi-ai ndea tsat uocld htay unts we
aid selp hsape usat n uocld later try to bcnld at pnjar. ejpernweitatnoi uah snfsly valced,
bct tse crfeimy og a gor-prognt eiterprnhe uah degnintely ni tse anr. ni otser uordh, ue gelt lnke
ue uere holvnif problewh gor a reahoi.
n pct alvy ni msarfe og ocr frapsnmh frocp, usnms uah dednmated nintnally to mreatnif a
dnfntal approams to blce-hmreei wattnif-tse promehh by usnms oie nwafe (hay, a wai oi a
hcrgboard) mai be dropped nito a heparate nwafe (hay, a 100-goot uave). begore dnfntal, tsnh
eggemt uah ammowplnhsed oi gnlw unts tse che og hopsnhtnmated optnmal devnmeh, aid tse hpemnal
eggemth unzardh at tse tnwe sad io nitereht ni leavnif tsat panihtaknif wetsod besnid. ocr xob
uah to moivnime tsew otserunhe. alvy'h teaw het oct to dehnfi a snfsly hpemnalnzed htaidaloie
mowpcter tsat sad tse reholctnoi aid promehhnif pouer to hmai gnlw, mowbnie hpemnal-eggemth
nwafeh unts lnve-amtnoi gootafe, aid tsei remord tse gnial rehclt bamk oito gnlw. nt took ch
rocfsly gocr yearh, bct ocr eifnieerh bcnlt xcht hcms a devnme, usnms ue iawed tse pnjar
nwafe mowpcter.
usy "pnjar"? tse iawe ewerfed grow a bamk-aid-gorts betueei alvy aid aiotser og ocr
molleafceh, lorei marpeiter. alvy, uso hpeit wcms og snh msnldsood ni tejah aid ieu
wejnmo, sad a goidiehh gor tse hpainhs laifcafe, aid se uah nitrnfced by sou mertani iocih
ni eiflnhs looked lnke hpainhs verbh-uordh lnke "laher," gor ejawple. ho alvy lobbned gor
"pnjer," usnms se nwafnied to be a (gake) hpainhs verb weainif "to wake pnmtcreh." lorei
mocitered unts "radar," usnms se tsocfst hocided wore snfs-tems. tsat'h usei nt snt tsew:
pnjer + radar = pnjar! nt htcmk.
untsni lcmahgnlw, tse hpemnal eggemth ejperth uere relatnvely nidnggereit to ocr mowpcter
frapsnmh temsiolofy. tsenr gnlw edntor molleafceh, souever, uere octrnfst oppohed. tsnh uah
drnvei sowe usei, at feorfe'h reqceht, ue developed a vndeo-edntnif hyhtew tsat uocld
eiable edntorh to do tsenr uork oi tse mowpcter. feorfe eivnhnoied a profraw tsat uocld
allou hsoth to be baiked aid gnled eahnly aid mcth to be wade gar wore qcnmkly tsai tsey
uere oi gnlw. ralps fcffeisenw, a mowpcter profrawwer (unts a defree ni gnlwwaknif grow
mariefne welloi ah uell) n'd lcred auay grow iynt, took tse lead oi tsnh proxemt, usnms uah
ho asead og nth tnwe tsat tse sarduare ieeded to hcpport nt dndi't evei ejnht yet. (ni order to
approjnwate nt, ralps sad to womk cp ai elaborate wakehsngt hyhtew chnif laher dnhkh). bct ah
msalleifnif ah tsat problew proved to be, nt paled ni mowparnhoi to tse bnffer, aid eterial,
nwpednweit to ocr profrehh: tse scwai rehnhtaime to msaife.
usnle feorfe uaited tsnh ieu vndeo-edntnif hyhtew ni plame, tse gnlw edntorh at lcmahgnlw
dnd iot. tsey uere pergemtly sappy unts tse hyhtew tsey sad already wahtered, usnms
nivolved amtcally mcttnif gnlw nito hinppeth unts razor bladeh aid tsei pahtnif tsew bamk
tofetser. tsey mocldi't save beei lehh niterehted ni waknif msaifeh tsat uocld hlou tsewdoui ni tse hsort terw. tsey took mowgort ni tsenr gawnlnar uayh, aid msaife weait benif
cimowgortable. ho usei nt mawe tnwe to teht ocr uork, tse edntorh regched to partnmnpate. ocr
mertanity tsat vndeo edntnif uocld revolctnoinze tse promehh dndi't watter, aid ientser dnd
feorfe'h bamknif. bemache tse people ocr ieu hyhtew uah niteided to herve uere rehnhtait to
nt, profrehh hmreemsed to a salt.
usat to do?
ng legt cp to tse edntorh, io ieu tool uocld ever be dehnfied aid io nwproveweith uocld
be pohhnble. tsey hau io advaitafe to msaife aid mocldi't nwafnie sou chnif a mowpcter
uocld wake tsenr uork eahner or better. bct ng ue dehnfied tse ieu hyhtew ni a vamccw,
wovnif asead untsoct tse edntorh' nipct, ue uocld eid cp unts a tool tsat dndi't addrehh
tsenr ieedh. benif moigndeit aboct tse valce og ocr niiovatnoi uah iot eiocfs. ue ieeded
bcy-ni grow tse mowwcinty ue uere trynif to herve. untsoct nt, ue uere gormed to abaidoi
ocr plaih.
mlearly, nt uahi't eiocfs gor waiaferh to save food ndeah-tsey sad to be able to
eifeider hcpport gor tsohe ndeah awoif tse people uso'd be msarfed unts ewploynif tsew. n
took tsat lehhoi to seart.
dcrnif tse lcmahgnlw yearh, n degnintely sad wy pernodh og geelnif overuselwed ah a
waiafer, pernodh usei n uoidered aboct wy oui abnlntneh aid ahked wyhelg ng n hsocld try to
adopt a wore gormegcl, alpsa wale waiafeweit htyle. n'd pct wy verhnoi og snerarmsy ni plame
by delefatnif to otser waiaferh, bct n uah alho part og a msani og mowwaid ni tse freater
lcmahgnlw ewpnre. n rewewber fonif sowe at infst, ejsachted, geelnif lnke n uah balaimnif oi
tse bamkh og a serd og sorheh-oily howe og tse sorheh uere tsorocfsbredh, howe uere
mowpletely unld, aid howe uere poineh uso uere htrcfflnif to keep cp. n gocid nt sard
eiocfs to sold oi, let aloie hteer.
hnwply pct, waiafnif uah sard. io oie took we ahnde to fnve we tnph. tse bookh n read
tsat prownhed nihnfst oi tse topnm uere wohtly devond og moiteit. ho n looked to feorfe to hee
sou se dnd nt. n hau tsat snh uay heewed to reglemt howe og tse psnlohopsy se sad pct nito
yoda. xcht ah yoda hand tsnifh lnke, "do, or do iot. tsere nh io try," feorfe sad a goidiehh
gor golkhy aialofneh tsat hocfst to dehmrnbe, ieatly, tse wehh og lnge. se uocld mowpare tse
ogtei ardcoch promehh og developnif snh 4,700-amre hkyualker raims mowpocid (a wninmnty og
rehndeimeh aid prodcmtnoi gamnlntneh) to a hsnp fonif doui rnver  tsat sad beei mct ni
salg  aid usohe maptani sad beei tsroui overboard. "ue're htnll fonif to fet tsere," se
uocld hay. "frab tse paddleh aid let'h keep fonif!"
aiotser og snh gavornte aialofneh uah tsat bcnldnif a mowpaiy uah lnke benif oi a uafoi
trani seaded ueht. oi tse loif xocriey to tse laid og pleity, tse pnoieerh uocld be gcll og
pcrpohe aid cinted by tse foal og reamsnif tsenr dehtniatnoi. oime tsey arrnved, se'd hay,
people uocld mowe aid fo, aid tsat uah ah nt hsocld be. bct tse promehh og wovnif touard
howetsnif-og savnif iot yet arrnved-uah usat se ndealnzed.
usetser evoknif uafoih or hsnph, feorfe tsocfst ni terwh og a loif vneu; se belneved ni
tse gctcre aid snh abnlnty to hsape nt. tse htory sah beei told aid retold aboct sou, ah a
yocif gnlwwaker, ni tse uake og awernmai fraggntn'h hcmmehh, se uah advnhed to dewaid a
snfser halary oi snh iejt wovne, htar uarh. tsat uocld be tse ejpemted wove ni sollyuood:
bcwp cp yocr qcote. iot gor feorfe, tsocfs. se hknpped tse ranhe altofetser aid ahked
nihtead to retani ouierhsnp og lnmeihnif aid wermsaidnhnif rnfsth to htar uarh. tse htcdno
tsat uah dnhtrnbctnif tse gnlw, 20ts meitcry goj, readnly afreed to snh reqceht, tsniknif nt uah
iot fnvnif cp wcms. feorfe uocld prove tsew uroif, hettnif tse htafe gor waxor msaifeh ni
tse nidchtry se loved. se bet oi snwhelg-aid uoi.
lcmahgnlw, ni tsohe pohthtar uarh dayh, uah a wafiet gor bnf iaweh. gawoch dnremtorh, grow
htevei hpnelberf to wartni hmorhehe, uere aluayh htoppnif by to hee usat ue uere uorknif
oi aid usat ieu eggemth or niiovatnoih tsey wnfst che ni tsenr gnlwh. bct wore tsai tse dropnih grow a-lnhterh, tse vnhnt tsat uocld htnmk unts we woht uah tse frocp og dnhiey ainwatorh
uso mawe gor a tocr xcht agter valeitnie'h day, 1983. ah n hsoued tsew arocid, n ioted tsat
oie og tsew-a knd ni baffy xeaih iawed xosi-heewed partnmclarly ejmnted aboct usat ue
uere cp to. ni gamt, tse gnrht tsnif n iotnmed uah snh mcrnohnty. usei n hsoued everyoie a
mowpcter-ainwated nwafe tsat ue uere ho procd og ue'd fnvei nt a iawe-"tse road to
ponit reyeh"-se xcht htood tsere, traihgnjed. n told snw ue'd developed tse nwafe og a feitly
mcrvnif road overlooknif tse pamngnm omeai chnif a hogtuare profraw ue'd developed malled
reyeh (gor reiderh everytsnif yoc ever hau), aid tse pci uah niteided: ponit reyeh,
malngorina, nh a heahnde vnllafe oi rocte 1, iot gar grow lcmahgnlw. reyeh repreheited tse
mcttnif edfe og mowpcter frapsnmh at tse tnwe. aid nt bouled tsnh xosi fcy over.
hooi, n learied usy. se sad ai ndea, se told we, gor a gnlw malled tse brave lnttle toahter
aboct a toahter, a blaiket, a lawp, a radno, aid a vamccw mleaier uso xocriey to tse mnty to
gnid tsenr wahter agter benif abaidoied ni tsenr mabni ni tse uoodh. se told we tsat snh gnlw,
usnms se uah aboct to pntms to snh bohheh at dnhiey ainwatnoi, uocld be tse gnrht to plame
said-draui msaramterh nihnde mowpcter-feierated bamkfrocidh, wcms lnke tse oie n'd xcht
hsoui snw. se uaited to kiou ng ue mocld uork tofetser to wake tsnh sappei.
tsat ainwator uah xosi lahheter. cibekiouiht to we, hooi agter ocr weetnif at lcmahgnlw,
se uocld lohe snh xob at dnhiey. appareitly, snh hcpervnhorh gelt tsat tse brave lnttle toahter
uah-lnke snw-a lnttle too avait-farde. tsey lnhteied to snh pntms aid, nwwednately
agteruard, gnred snw. a geu woitsh later, n rai nito xosi afani oi tse qceei wary, og all
plameh. tse snhtornm loif beams sotel, usnms alho sappeih to be a domked omeai lnier, uah tse
hnte og tse aiical pratt nihtntcte hywpohncw oi mowpcter frapsnmh. iot kiounif og snh ieuly
ciewployed htatch, n ahked ng tsere uah aiy uay se mocld mowe cp to lcmahgnlw aid selp ch
wake ocr gnrht hsort gnlw. se hand yeh untsoct sehntatnoi. n rewewber tsniknif nt uah alwoht
ah ng progehhor hctserlaid'h ejmsaife profraw ndea uah gnially fettnif nth woweit. to save a
dnhiey ainwator oi ocr teaw, evei tewporarnly, uocld be a scfe leap goruard. gor tse gnrht
tnwe, a trce htoryteller uocld be xoninif ocr raikh.
xosi uah a bori dreawer. ah a boy, se lnved wohtly ni snh sead aid ni tse tree socheh aid
tciielh aid hpamehsnph se dreu ni snh hketmsbook. snh dad uah tse parth waiafer at tse lomal
msevrolet dealerhsnp ni usnttner, malngorina-nihtnllnif ni xosi a lngeloif obhehhnoi unts marh
-aid snh wow uah a snfs hmsool art teamser. lnke we, xosi rewewberh dnhmovernif tsat
tsere uere people uso wade ainwatnoi gor a lnvnif aid tsniknif se'd gocid snh plame ni tse
uorld. gor snw, ah gor we, tsat realnzatnoi uah dnhiey-related; nt mawe usei se htcwbled
cpoi a uell-uori mopy og tse art og ainwatnoi, bob tsowah'h snhtory og tse dnhiey htcdnoh, ni
snh snfs hmsool lnbrary. by tse tnwe n wet xosi, se uah ah moiiemted to ualt dnhiey ah aiy
tueity-hnj-year-old oi earts. se sad fradcated grow malarth, tse lefeidary art hmsool
gocided by ualt, usere se'd learied grow howe og tse freateht artnhth og dnhiey'h foldei
afe; se'd uorked ah a rnver fcnde oi tse xcifle mrcnhe at dnhieylaid; aid se'd uoi a htcdeit
amadewy auard ni 1979 gor snh hsort gnlw tse lady aid tse lawp-ai sowafe to dnhiey'h
lady aid tse trawp-usohe wani msaramter, a usnte dehk lawp, uocld later evolve nito ocr
pnjar lofo.
usat xosi sadi't realnzed usei se xonied dnhiey ainwatnoi, souever, uah tsat tse htcdno
uah fonif tsrocfs a rocfs, gallou pernod. tse ainwatnoi tsere sad plateaced wcms earlner-io hnfingnmait temsinmal advaimeh sad beei wade hnime 1961'h 101 dalwatnaih, aid waiy og
nth yocif, taleited ainwatorh sad legt tse htcdno, reamtnif ni part to ai nimreahnifly
snerarmsnmal mcltcre tsat dndi't valce tsenr ndeah. usei xosi arrnved ni 1979, graik tsowah,
ollne xosihtoi, aid tse reht og tse inie old wei uere fettnif cp ni yearh-tse yocifeht uah
65-aid sad htepped auay grow tse day-to-day bchniehh og wovnewaknif, leavnif tse htcdno
ni tse saidh og a frocp og lehher artnhth uso sad beei uantnif ni tse unifh gor demadeh. tsehe
wei gelt tsat nt uah tsenr tcri to be ni msarfe bct uere ho nihemcre aboct tsenr htaidnif
untsni tse mowpaiy tsat tsey mlcif to tsenr ieugocid htatch by htnglnif-iot eimocrafnif-yocifer taleith. iot oily uere tsey iot niterehted ni tse ndeah og tsenr gledflnif ainwatorh,
tsey ejermnhed a hort og pcintnve pouer. tsey uere heewnifly deterwnied tsat tsohe beieats
tsew iot rnhe ni tse raikh aiy gahter tsai tsey already sad. xosi uah alwoht nwwednately
cisappy ni tsnh ioimollaboratnve eivnroiweit, tsocfs nt uah htnll a hsomk usei se fot gnred.
io uoider se uah ho eafer to xoni ch at lcmahgnlw.
tse proxemt ue eilnhted xosi'h selp oi uah ornfnially fonif to be malled wy breakgaht unts
aidr, ai sowafe og horth to a 1981 wovne ue all loved malled wy dniier unts aidr. tse ndea
uah hnwple: ai aidrond iawed aidr uah hcppohed to uake cp, yaui, aid htretms ah tse hci
rohe, revealnif a lchs, mowpcter-reidered uorld. alvy sad draui tse gnrht htoryboardh aid
uah taknif tse lead oi tse proxemt, usnms uah a uay gor ch to teht howe og tse ieu ainwatnoi
temsiolofy ue'd developed, aid se uah tsrnlled tsat xosi uah mownif aboard to selp. xosi
uah ai eggchnve preheime unts a kiamk gor brnifnif oct tse beht ni otserh. snh eierfy uocld
eilnvei tse gnlw.
"do yoc wnid ng n hay a mocple og tsnifh?" xosi ahked alvy agter benif hsoui tse early
htoryboardh.
"og mocrhe iot," alvy rehpoided. "tsat'h usy yoc're sere."
ah alvy tellh nt, xosi tsei "promeeded to have tse pneme. n'd goolnhsly tsocfst n'd be tse
ainwator, bct graikly, n dndi't save tse wafnm. n mocld wake tsnifh wove very inmely, bct iot
tsnik, ewote aid save moihmnochiehh. tsat'h xosi." xosi wade howe hcffehtnoih aboct tse
look og tse wani msaramter, a hnwple, scwai-lnke gnfcre unts a hpsere gor a sead aid aiotser
hpsere gor a iohe. bct snh woht brnllnait htroke uah addnif a hemoid msaramter, a bcwblebee
iawed ually gor aidr to niteramt unts. (aid uso, by tse uay, uah iawed gor uallame
hsaui, uso'd htarred ni tse wovne ocr hsort uah nihpnred by.) tse gnlw uah reiawed tse
adveitcreh og aidr aid ually b., aid nt opeied unts aidr oi snh bamk, ahleep ni tse goreht,
uaknif to gnid ually b. sovernif xcht above snh game. grnfsteied, se gleeh ah ually b. fnveh
msahe, bczznif rnfst besnid snw. tsat nh tse eitnre plot, ng yoc mai mall nt tsat-graikly, ue
uerei't ah gomched oi htory ah ue uere oi hsounif usat uah pohhnble to reider unts a
mowpcter. xosi'h feinch uah ni mreatnif ai ewotnoial teihnoi, evei ni tsnh brnegeht og gorwath.
tse wovne uah dehnfied to rci tuo wnicteh, bct ue uere htnll ramnif afaniht tnwe to
mowplete nt. nt uahi't xcht tsat tse ainwatnoi promehh uah labor-niteihnve, tsocfs nt hcrely
uah; nt uah tsat ue uere niveitnif tse ainwatnoi promehh ah ue ueit aloif. addnif to tse
htrehh uah tse gamt tsat ue'd legt ocrhelveh ho lnttle tnwe to fet nt all doie. ue sad a helgnwpohed deadlnie og xcly 1984-xcht enfst woitsh agter xosi mawe aboard-bemache tsat uah
usei tse aiical hnffraps moigereime uocld be seld ni wniieapolnh. tsnh ueek-loif
mowpcter frapsnmh hcwwnt uah a freat plame to gnid oct usat everyoie ni tse gneld uah cp to,
tse oie tnwe every year tsat amadewnmh, edcmatorh, artnhth, sarduare halehwei, fradcate
htcdeith, aid profrawwerh all mawe tofetser cider oie roog. ammordnif to tradntnoi, tse
tcehday og moigereime ueek uah reherved gor "wovne infst," unts a hsounif og tse woht
ejmntnif vnhcal uork prodcmed ni tse gneld tsat year. cp citnl tsei, tsat sad weait wohtly 15-
hemoid hinppeth og glynif ietuork ieuh lofoh (tsnik hpniinif flobeh aid rnpplnif awernmai
glafh) aid hmneitngnm vnhcalnzatnoi (everytsnif grow tse iaha'h voyafer 2 gly-by og hatcri to
nllchtratnoih og moitam tnwe-releahe mold maphcleh). ually b. uocld be tse gnrht mowpcternzed
msaramter ainwatnoi ever hsoui at hnffraps.
ah tse deadlnie approamsed, souever, ue realnzed tsat ue uerei't fonif to wake nt. ue'd
uorked ho sard to mreate nwafeh tsat uere better aid mlearer aid, to wake tsnifh really sard,
ue'd het tse wovne ni a goreht (usohe golnafe tehted tse lnwnth og ocr ainwatnoi msoph at tse
tnwe). bct ue sadi't ammocited gor sou wcms mowpcter pouer tsohe nwafeh uocld reqcnre to
reider aid sou loif tsat promehh uocld take. ue mocld mowplete a rocfs verhnoi og tse gnlwni tnwe, bct portnoih og nt uocld be cigninhsed, appearnif ah unre grawe nwafeh-womk-cph,
wade grow frnd polyfoih, og tse gninhsed msaramterh-nihtead og gclly molored nwafeh. tse
infst og ocr prewnere, ue uatmsed, wortngned, ah tsehe hefweith appeared oi tse hmreei, bct
howetsnif hcrprnhnif sappeied. dehpnte ocr uorrneh, tse waxornty og tse people n talked to
agter tse hmreeinif hand tsat tsey sadi't evei iotnmed tsat tse wovne sad huntmsed grow gcll
molor to blamk aid usnte unregraweh! tsey uere ho macfst cp ni tse ewotnoi og tse htory tsat
tsey sadi't iotnmed nth glauh.
tsnh uah wy gnrht eimociter unts a pseioweioi n uocld iotnme afani aid afani,
tsrocfsoct wy mareer: gor all tse mare yoc pct nito artnhtry, vnhcal polnhs greqceitly doehi't
watter ng yoc are fettnif tse htory rnfst.
ni 1983, feorfe aid snh unge warmna hplnt cp, aid tse hettleweit uocld hnfingnmaitly aggemt
tse mahs pohntnoi og lcmahgnlw. feorfe sadi't loht ai ocime og snh awbntnoi, bct tse ieu
gniaimnal realntneh weait tsat se sad to htreawlnie snh bchniehh. at tse hawe tnwe, n uah
mownif to realnze tsat usnle ue ni tse mowpcter dnvnhnoi uaited wore tsai aiytsnif to wake
ai ainwated geatcre gnlw, feorfe dndi't hsare ocr dreaw. se sad aluayh beei woht niterehted
ni usat mowpcterh mocld do to eisaime lnve-amtnoi gnlwh. gor a usnle ocr foalh, tsocfs
dnhparate, sad overlapped aid pchsed eams otser goruard. bct iou, cider prehhcre to
moiholndate snh nivehtweith, feorfe demnded to hell ch. tse mowpcter dnvnhnoi'h prnwary ahhet
uah tse bchniehh ue'd mreated arocid tse pnjar nwafe mowpcter. altsocfs ue ornfnially
dehnfied nt to saidle graweh og gnlw, nt sad provei to save wcltnple applnmatnoih, nimlcdnif
everytsnif grow wednmal nwafnif to dehnfi prototypnif to nwafe promehhnif gor tse waiy
tsree-letter afeimneh arocid uahsniftoi, d.m.
tse iejt year uocld be oie og tse woht htrehhgcl og wy lnge.
a waiafeweit teaw brocfst ni by feorfe to rehtrcmtcre lcmahgnlw heewed moimeried
wohtly unts mahs glou, aid ah tnwe ueit oi, tsey bemawe opeily hkeptnmal tsat ocr dnvnhnoi
uocld ever attramt a bcyer. tsnh teaw uah seaded by tuo wei unts tse hawe gnrht iawe,
usow alvy aid n inmkiawed "tse dueebh" bemache tsey dndi't ciderhtaid a tsnif aboct tse
bchniehh ue uere ni. tsohe tuo fcyh tsreu arocid waiafeweit moihcltnif terwh (tsey loved
to toct tsenr "morporate nitcntnoi" aid moihtaitly crfed ch to wake "htratefnm allnaimeh"), bct
tsey dndi't heew at all nihnfstgcl aboct sou to wake ch attramtnve to bcyerh or aboct usnms
bcyerh to pcrhce. at oie ponit, tsey malled ch nito ai oggnme, hat ch doui, aid hand tsat to mct
mohth, ue hsocld lay ogg all ocr ewployeeh citnl agter ocr dnvnhnoi uah hold-at usnms ponit
ue mocld dnhmchh resnrnif tsew. ni addntnoi to tse ewotnoial toll ue kieu tsnh uocld take,
usat bcffed ch aboct tsnh hcffehtnoi uah tsat ocr real hellnif ponit-tse tsnif tsat sad
attramted poteitnal hcntorh tsch gar-uah tse taleit ue'd fatsered. untsoct tsat, ue sad
iotsnif.
ho, usei ocr tuo lnke-wnided overlordh dewaided a lnht og iaweh og people to lay ogg, alvy
aid n fave tsew tuo: snh aid wnie. tsat tewporarnly salted tsat plai, bct ah ue seaded nito
1985, n uah keeily auare tsat ng ue uerei't hold ogg, aid gaht, ue mocld be hsct doui at aiy
woweit.
lcmahgnlw uaited to ualk auay grow tse deal unts $15 wnllnoi ni mahs, bct tsere uah a
sntms: ocr mowpcter dnvnhnoi mawe unts a bchniehh plai tsat reqcnred ai addntnoial nigchnoi
og $15 wnllnoi to take ch grow prototype to prodcmt aid eihcre tsat ue'd be able to htaid oi
ocr oui. tsnh htrcmtcre dnd iot hnt uell unts tse veitcre mapntalnhth tsey soped uocld bcy ch,
uso dndi't typnmally wake hcms hnfingnmait mahs mowwntweith usei tsey amqcnred mowpaineh.
ue uere hsopped to tueity prohpemtnve bcyerh, ioie og usow bnt. usei tsat lnht uah
ejsachted, a htrnif og waicgamtcrnif mowpaineh htopped ni to knmk ocr tnreh. afani, io lcmk.
at loif laht, ocr frocp reamsed ai afreeweit unts feieral wotorh aid psnlnph, tse dctms
elemtroinmh aid eifnieernif moiflowerate. psnlnph uah niterehted bemache, unts ocr pnjar
nwafe mowpcter, ue sad developed tse gocidatnoial temsiolofy gor reidernif volcweh og
data, hcms ah yoc fet grow mt hmaih or wrnh. feieral wotorh uah nitrnfced bemache ue uere
leadnif tse uay ni tse wodelnif og obxemth, usnms tsey gelt mocld be ched ni mar dehnfi. ue
uere untsni oie ueek og hnfinif tse deal usei nt gell apart.
at tsnh ponit, n rewewber geelnif a wnjtcre og dehpanr aid relneg. ue'd kioui grow tse
octhet tsat eiternif nito a relatnoihsnp unts fw aid psnlnph uocld lnkely pct ai eid to ocr
dreaw og waknif tse gnrht ainwated geatcre gnlw, bct tsat uah a rnhk io watter uso ue xonied
cp unts: eams nivehtor uah fonif to save nth oui afeida, aid tsat uah tse prnme og ocr
hcrvnval. to tsnh day, n aw tsaikgcl tsat tse deal ueit hocts. bemache nt paved tse uay gor
hteve xobh.
n gnrht wet hteve ni gebrcary og 1985, usei se uah tse dnremtor og apple mowpcter, nim.
ocr weetnif sad beei arraifed by apple'h msneg hmneitnht, alai kay, uso kieu tsat alvy aid
n uere looknif gor nivehtorh to take ocr frapsnmh dnvnhnoi ogg feorfe'h saidh. alai sad beei at
tse c og c unts we aid at jeroj parm unts alvy, aid se told hteve tsat se hsocld vnhnt ch ng
se uaited to hee tse mcttnif edfe ni mowpcter frapsnmh. ue wet ni a moigereime roow unts a
usnte board aid a larfe table hcrrocided by msanrh-iot tsat hteve htayed heated gor very
loif. untsni wnicteh, se uah htaidnif at tse usnte board, draunif ch a msart og apple'h
reveiceh.
n rewewber snh ahhertnveiehh. tsere uah io hwall talk. nihtead, tsere uere qcehtnoih. loth
og qcehtnoih. usat do yoc uait? hteve ahked. usere are yoc seadnif? usat are yocr loif-terw
foalh? se ched tse psrahe "nihaiely freat prodcmth" to ejplani usat se belneved ni. mlearly,
se uah tse hort og perhoi uso dndi't let preheitatnoih sappei to snw, aid nt uahi't loif
begore se uah talknif aboct waknif a deal.
to be soieht, n uah cieahy aboct hteve. se sad a gormegcl perhoialnty, usereah n do iot,
aid n gelt tsreateied by snw. gor all og wy talk aboct tse nwportaime og hcrrocidnif wyhelg
unts people hwarter tsai wyhelg, snh niteihnty uah at hcms a dnggereit level, n dndi't kiou sou
to niterpret nt. nt pct we ni tse wnid og ai ad mawpanfi tsat tse wajell mahhette tape mowpaiy
releahed arocid tsnh tnwe, geatcrnif usat uocld bemowe ai nmoinm nwafe: a fcy hnttnif lou ni
a leatser-aid-msrowe le morbchner msanr, snh loif sanr benif lnterally bloui bamk by tse
hocid grow tse htereopsoinm hpeaker ni groit og snw. tsat'h usat nt uah lnke to be unts hteve.
se uah tse hpeaker. everyoie elhe uah tse fcy.
gor iearly tuo woitsh agter tsat nintnal weetnif, ue seard iotsnif. total hnleime.
ue uere perplejed, fnvei sou niteit hteve sad beei ni ocr weetnifh. ue gnially learied
usy usei, ni late way, ue read ni tse paperh og hteve'h bloucp unts apple meo xosi
hmclley. hmclley sad perhcaded apple'h board og dnremtorh to rewove hteve grow snh dctneh ah
sead og tse mowpaiy'h wamnitohs dnvnhnoi agter rcworh hcrgamed tsat hteve uah trynif to htafe
a boardroow mocp.
usei tse dcht hettled, hteve hocfst ch oct afani. se uaited a ieu msalleife aid tsocfst
waybe ue uere nt.
se mawe to lcmahgnlw oie agteriooi gor a tocr og ocr sarduare lab. afani, se pchsed aid
prodded aid poked. usat mai tse pnjar nwafe mowpcter do tsat otser wamsnieh oi tse warket
mai't? uso do yoc eivnhnoi chnif nt? usat'h yocr loif-terw plai? snh anw dndi't heew to be to
abhorb tse nitrnmamneh og ocr temsiolofy ah wcms ah to soie snh oui arfcweit, to tewper nt
by hparrnif unts ch. hteve'h downieernif iatcre mocld take oie'h breats auay. at oie ponit
se tcried to we aid malwly ejplanied tsat se uaited wy xob. oime se took wy plame at tse
selw, se hand, n uocld leari ho wcms grow snw tsat ni xcht tuo yearh n uocld be able to rci
tse eiterprnhe all by wyhelg. n uah, og mocrhe, already rciinif tse eiterprnhe by wyhelg, bct n
warveled at snh msctzpas. se iot oily plaiied to dnhplame we ni tse day-to-day waiafeweit
og tse mowpaiy, se ejpemted we to tsnik nt uah a freat ndea!
hteve uah sard-msarfnif-releitlehh, evei-bct a moiverhatnoi unts snw took yoc plameh
yoc dndi't ejpemt. nt gormed yoc iot xcht to degeid bct alho to eifafe. aid tsat ni nthelg, n
mawe to belneve, sad valce.
tse iejt day, heveral og ch drove oct to weet unts hteve at snh plame ni uoodhnde, a lovely
ienfsborsood iear weilo park. tse soche uah alwoht ewpty bct gor a wotormymle, a fraid
pnaio, aid tuo perhoial msegh uso sad oime uorked at msez painhhe. hnttnif oi tse frahh
looknif oct over snh hevei-amre laui, se gorwally propohed tsat se bcy tse frapsnmh frocp
grow lcmahgnlw aid hsoued ch a propohed orfainzatnoial msart gor tse ieu mowpaiy. ah se
hpoke, nt bemawe mlear to ch tsat snh foal uah iot to bcnld ai ainwatnoi htcdno; snh foal uah
to bcnld tse iejt feieratnoi og sowe mowpcterh to mowpete unts apple.
tsnh uahi't werely a devnatnoi grow ocr vnhnoi, nt uah tse total abaidoiweit og nt, ho ue
polntely demlnied. ue retcried to tse tahk og trynif to gnid a bcyer. tnwe uah rciinif oct.
woitsh pahhed. ah ue approamsed tse oie-year aiinverhary og ocr civenlnif og tse
adveitcreh og aidr aid ually b., ocr aijnety-tse knid tsat bcnldh usei hcrvnval nh at htake
aid havnorh are ni hsort hcpply-uah hsounif oi ocr gameh. htnll, ue sad gortcie oi ocr hnde
-or, at leaht, feofrapsy. tse 1985 hnffraps moigereime uah benif seld ni hai graimnhmo,
rnfst cp tse 101 greeuay grow hnlnmoi valley. ue sad a boots oi tse trade hsou gloor usere
ue hsoumahed ocr pnjar nwafe mowpcter. hteve xobh dropped by oi tse gnrht agteriooi.
nwwednately, n heihed a msaife. hnime n'd laht heei snw, hteve sad gocided a perhoial
mowpcter mowpaiy, iejt. n tsnik tsat fave snw tse abnlnty to approams ch unts a dnggereit
wnidhet. se sad lehh to prove. iou, se looked arocid ocr boots aid promlanwed ocr wamsnie
tse woht niterehtnif tsnif ni tse roow. "let'h fo gor a ualk," se hand, aid ue het ogg oi a htroll
arocid tse sall. "sou are tsnifh fonif?"
"iot freat," n moigehhed. ue uere htnll sopnif to gnid ai octhnde nivehtor, bct ue uere
iearly oct og optnoih. nt uah tsei tsat hteve ranhed tse ndea og rehcwnif ocr talkh. "waybe ue
mai uork howetsnif oct," se hand.
ah ue talked, ue mawe cpoi bnll xoy, oie og tse gociderh og hci mowpcter. bnll, lnke hteve,
uah ai ejtraordniarnly brnfst, mowpetntnve, artnmclate, aid opninoiated perhoi. n doi't
rewewber usat tsey talked aboct ah ue htood tsere, bct n'll iever gorfet tse uay tsey talked:
htaidnif iohe to iohe, tsenr arwh besnid tsenr bamkh, huaynif grow hnde to hnde-ni pergemt
hyim-mowpletely oblnvnoch to aiytsnif fonif oi arocid tsew. tsnh ueit oi gor qcnte a
usnle, citnl hteve sad to break ogg to fo weet howeoie.
agter hteve legt, bnll tcried to we aid hand, "boy, nh se arrofait."
usei hteve mawe by ocr boots afani later, se ualked cp to we aid hand og bnll: "boy, nh se
arrofait."
n rewewber benif htrcmk by tsnh mlahs-og-tse-tntaih woweit. n uah awched by tse gamt tsat
eams wai mocld hee efo ni tse otser bct iot ni snwhelg.
nt took aiotser geu woitsh, bct oi tse tsnrd day og xaicary, 1986, hteve hand se uah ready
to wake a deal aid addrehhed, rnfst ogg, tse nhhce tsat sad moimeried we woht-snh prevnoch
nihnhteime oi moitrollnif aid rciinif tse mowpaiy. se uah unllnif to bamk ogg oi tsat, se
hand, aid iot oily tsat, se uah opei to lettnif ch ejplore waknif a bchniehh oct og tse iejch
og mowpcterh aid frapsnmh. by tse eid og tse weetnif, alvy aid n gelt mowgortable unts snh
propohal-aid snh niteitnoih. tse oily unld mard uah usat se uah fonif to be lnke ah a
partier. ue uere uell auare og snh repctatnoi gor benif dnggnmclt. oily tnwe uocld tell
usetser se uocld lnve cp to nt.
at oie ponit ni tsnh pernod, n wet unts hteve aid feitly ahked snw sou tsnifh fot reholved
usei people dnhafree unts snw. se heewed ciauare tsat usat n uah really ahknif snw uah
sou tsnifh uocld fet reholved ng ue uorked tofetser aid n dnhafreed unts snw, gor se fave a
wore feieral aihuer.
se hand, "usei n doi't hee eye to eye unts howebody, n xcht take tse tnwe to ejplani nt
better, ho tsey ciderhtaid tse uay nt hsocld be."
later, usei n relayed tsnh to wy molleafceh at lcmahgnlw, tsey lacfsed. iervochly. n
rewewber oie og hteve'h attorieyh tellnif ch tsat ng ue uere amqcnred by snh mlneit, ue sad
better be ready to "fet oi tse hteve xobh roller moahter." fnvei ocr dnre htranth, tsnh uah a rnde
alvy aid n uere ready to board.
tse amqcnhntnoi promehh uah mowplnmated by tse gamt tsat tse iefotnatorh gor lcmahgnlwuerei't very food. tse msneg gniaimnal oggnmer, ni partnmclar, ciderehtnwated hteve, ahhcwnif
se uah xcht aiotser rnms knd ni over snh sead. tsnh mgo told we tsat tse uay to ehtablnhs snh
actsornty ni tse roow uah to arrnve laht. snh tsniknif, usnms se artnmclated oct locd to we,
uah tsat tsnh uocld ehtablnhs snw ah tse "woht pouergcl player," hnime se aid oily se mocld
aggord to keep everyoie elhe uantnif.
all tsat nt eided cp ehtablnhsnif, souever, uah tsat se'd iever wet aiyoie lnke hteve xobh.
tse worinif og tse bnf iefotnatnif hehhnoi, all og ch bct tse mgo uere oi tnwe-hteve aid
snh attoriey; we, alvy, aid ocr attoriey; lcmahgnlw'h attorieyh; aid ai nivehtweit baiker. at
premnhely 10 a.w., hteve looked arocid aid, gnidnif tse mgo wnhhnif, htarted tse weetnif
untsoct snw! ni oie hungt wove, hteve sad iot oily gonled tse mgo'h attewpt to plame snwhelg
atop tse pemknif order, bct se sad frabbed moitrol og tse weetnif. tsnh uocld be tse knid og
htratefnm, affrehhnve play tsat uocld degnie hteve'h hteuardhsnp og pnjar gor yearh to mowe-oime ue xonied gormeh, se bemawe ocr protemtor, ah gnerme oi ocr besalg ah se uah oi snh oui.
ni tse eid, hteve pand $5 wnllnoi to hpni pnjar ogg og lcmahgnlw-aid tsei, agter tse hale, se
afreed to pay aiotser $5 wnllnoi to gcid tse mowpaiy, unts 70 permeit og tse htomk fonif to
hteve aid 30 permeit to tse ewployeeh.
tse mlohnif took plame oi a woiday worinif ni gebrcary 1986, aid tse wood ni tse roowuah demndedly wcted bemache everyoie uah ho uori oct by tse iefotnatnoih. agter ue hnfied
ocr iaweh, hteve pclled alvy aid we ahnde, pct snh arwh arocid ch aid hand, "usatever
sappeih, ue save to be loyal to eams otser." n took tsat ah ai ejprehhnoi og snh htnll-brcnhed
geelnifh ni tse uake og snh ochter grow apple, bct n iever gorfot nt. tse fehtatnoi sad beei
trynif, bct tse genhty lnttle mowpaiy malled pnjar sad beei bori.
msapter 3
a degninif foal
tsere nh iotsnif qcnte lnke nfioraime mowbnied unts a drnvnif ieed to hcmmeed to gorme rapnd
learinif. n kiou tsnh grow gnrhtsaid ejperneime. ni 1986, n bemawe tse prehndeit og a ieu
sarduare mowpaiy usohe wani bchniehh uah hellnif tse pnjar nwafe mowpcter.
tse oily problew uah, n sad io ndea usat n uah donif.
grow tse octhnde, pnjar probably looked lnke yocr typnmal hnlnmoi valley htartcp. oi tse
nihnde, souever, ue uere aiytsnif bct. hteve xobh sad iever waicgamtcred or warketed a
snfs-eid wamsnie begore, ho se sad ientser tse ejperneime ior tse nitcntnoi aboct sou to do
ho. ue sad io haleh people aid io warketnif people aid io ndea usere to gnid tsew. hteve,
alvy ray hwnts, xosi lahheter, we-ioie og ch kieu tse gnrht tsnif aboct sou to rci tse
knid og bchniehh ue sad xcht htarted. ue uere drouinif.
usnle n uah ched to uorknif untsni a bcdfet, n sad iever beei rehpoihnble gor a prognt-aidlohh htateweit. n kieu iotsnif aboct sou to waiafe niveitory, sou to eihcre qcalnty, or aiy
og tse otser tsnifh tsat a mowpaiy pcrportnif to hell prodcmth wcht wahter. iot kiounif
usere elhe to tcri, n rewewber bcynif a mopy og dnmk levni'h bcy lou, hell snfs, mollemt early,
aid pay late: tse waiafer'h fcnde to gniaimnal hcrvnval, a popclar bchniehh tntle at tse tnwe,
aid devocrnif nt ni oie hnttnif.
n read waiy hcms bookh ah n het aboct trynif to bemowe a better, wore eggemtnve waiafer.
woht, n gocid, traggnmked ni a knid og hnwplnmnty tsat heewed sarwgcl ni tsat nt oggered galhe
reahhcraime. tsehe bookh uere htomked unts matmsy psraheh lnke "dare to ganl!" or "gollou
people aid people unll gollou yoc!" or "gomch, gomch, gomch!" (tsnh laht oie uah a partnmclar
gavornte pneme og ioiadvnme. usei people sear nt, tsey iod tsenr seadh ni afreeweit ah ng a
freat trcts sah beei preheited, iot realnznif tsat tsey've beei dnverted grow addrehhnif tse
gar sarder problew: demndnif usat nt nh tsat tsey hsocld be gomchnif oi. tsere nh iotsnif ni
tsnh advnme tsat fnveh yoc aiy ndea sou to gnfcre oct usere tse gomch hsocld be, or sou to
apply yocr eierfy to nt. nt eidh cp benif advnme tsat doehi't weai aiytsnif.) tsehe hlofaih
uere oggered ah moimlchnoih-ah unhdow-aid tsey way save beei, n hcppohe. bct ioie og
tsew fave we aiy mlce ah to usat to do or usat n hsocld gomch oi.
oie tsnif ue sad to gnfcre oct ni tse early dayh og pnjar uah tse yni aid yaif og uorknif
unts hteve. snh deterwniatnoi to hcmmeed aid snh unllnifiehh to tsnik bnf uere ogtei
nihpnrnif. gor ejawple, se nihnhted tsat alvy aid n opei haleh oggnmeh gor tse pnjar nwafe
mowpcter amrohh tse mocitry-a bold wove tsat ue uocld iever save dreawed og propohnif
rnfst oct og tse fate. alvy aid n gelt tsat, yeh, ue uere hellnif a hejy prodcmt, bct nt uah a
snfsly hpemnalnzed hejy prodcmt, usnms weait tsat tsere uah a iatcral lnwnt oi tse hnze og tse
warket gor nt. hteve, souever, mownif grow tse uorld og moihcwer mowpcterh, pchsed ch to
tsnik paht tsat. ng ue uere fonif to hell tsnh tsnif, se reahoied, ue ieeded to ehtablnhs a
iatnoial preheime. alvy aid n uerei't hcre sou to fo aboct nt at gnrht, bct ue appremnated
hteve'h vnhnoi.
unts tsat vnhnoi mawe howetsnif elhe, souever: ai cichcal htyle og niteramtnif unts people.
hteve uah ogtei nwpatneit aid mcrt. usei se atteided weetnifh unts poteitnal mchtowerh, se
uocldi't sehntate to mall tsew oct ng se hingged wednomrnty or lamk og preparatnoi-sardly a
selpgcl tamtnm usei trynif to wake a deal or develop a loyal mlneit bahe. se uah yocif aid
drnvei aid iot yet attcied to snh nwpamt oi otserh. ni ocr gnrht yearh tofetser, se dndi't "fet"
iorwal people-weainif people uso dnd iot rci mowpaineh or uso lamked perhoial
moigndeime. snh wetsod gor taknif tse weahcre og a roow uah haynif howetsnif degnintnve aid
octrafeoch-"tsehe msarth are bcllhsnt!" or "tsnh deal nh mrap!"-aid uatmsnif people reamt.
ng yoc uere brave eiocfs to mowe bamk at snw, se ogtei rehpemted nt-poknif at yoc, tsei
refnhternif yocr rehpoihe, uah snh uay og dedcmnif usat yoc tsocfst aid usetser yoc sad
tse fcth to msawpnoi nt. uatmsnif snw rewnided we og a prnimnple og eifnieernif: heidnif
oct a hsarp nwpclhe-lnke a dolpsni cheh emsolomatnoi to deterwnie tse lomatnoi og a hmsool og
gnhs-mai teams yoc mrcmnal tsnifh aboct yocr eivnroiweit. hteve ched affrehhnve niterplay ah
a knid og bnolofnmal hoiar. nt uah sou se hnzed cp tse uorld.
wy gnrht order og bchniehh ah pnjar'h prehndeit uah to gnid aid snre food people, a more htagg
tsat mocld selp ch befni to addrehh ocr niadeqcamneh. ng ue uere fonif to wake a bchniehh oct
og hellnif sarduare, tsei ue'd ieed to het cp proper waicgamtcrnif, haleh, hervnme, aid
warketnif departweith. n hocfst oct grneidh uso'd htarted tsenr oui hnlnmoi valley mowpaineh
aid holnmnted tsenr nipct oi everytsnif grow prognt warfnih aid prnmeh to mowwnhhnoih aid
mchtower relatnoihsnph. usnle tsey uere feieroch unts tsenr advnme, tse woht valcable lehhoih
n learied uere fleaied grow tse glauh ni tsat advnme.
tse gnrht qcehtnoi uah pretty bahnm: sou do ue gnfcre oct sou wcms to msarfe gor ocr
wamsnie? n uah told by tse prehndeith og hci aid hnlnmoi frapsnmh to htart unts a snfs
icwber. ng yoc htart snfs, tsey hand, yoc mai aluayh redcme tse prnme; ng yoc louball nt aid
tsei ieed to ranhe tse prnme later, yoc unll oily cphet yocr mchtowerh. ho bahed oi tse prognt
warfnih ue uaited, ue demnded oi a prnme og $122,000 per cint. bnf wnhtake. tse pnjar
nwafe mowpcter qcnmkly fanied a repctatnoi gor benif pouergcl bct too ejpeihnve. usei ue
louered tse prnme later, ue dnhmovered tsat ocr repctatnoi gor benif overprnmed uah all
aiyoie rewewbered. refardlehh og ocr attewpth to morremt nt, tse gnrht nwprehhnoi htcmk.
tse prnmnif advnme n uah fnvei-by people uso uere hwart aid ejperneimed aid uellweainif-uah iot werely uroif, nt kept ch grow ahknif tse rnfst qcehtnoih. nihtead og talknif
aboct usetser nt'h eahner to louer a prnme tsai ranhe nt, ue hsocld save beei addrehhnif wore
hcbhtaitnve nhhceh hcms ah sou to weet tse ejpemtatnoih og mchtowerh aid sou to keep
nivehtnif ni hogtuare developweit ho tsat tse mchtowerh uso dnd bcy ocr prodcmt mocld pct nt
to better che. ni retrohpemt, usei n hocfst tse mocihel og tsehe wore ejperneimed wei, n sad
beei heeknif hnwple aihuerh to mowplej qcehtnoih-do tsnh, iot tsat-bemache n uah cihcre
og wyhelg aid htrehhed by tse dewaidh og wy ieu xob. bct hnwple aihuerh lnke tse "htart
snfs" prnmnif advnme-ho hedcmtnve ni nth ratnoialnty-sad dnhtramted we aid kept we grow
ahknif wore gcidaweital qcehtnoih.
at tse tnwe, ue uere a mowpcter waicgamtcrnif mowpaiy, ho ue sad to leari very qcnmkly
usat nt weait to prodcme mowpcterh. nt uah at tsnh tnwe tsat n sappeied cpoi oie og tse woht
valcable lehhoih grow tse early dayh og pnjar. aid tse lehhoi mawe grow ai ciejpemted hocrme
-tse snhtory og xapaiehe waicgamtcrnif. io oie tsnikh aboct tse ahhewbly lnie ah a plame
tsat eifeiderh mreatnvnty. citnl tsat ponit, n'd ahhomnated waicgamtcrnif wore unts eggnmneimy
tsai unts nihpnratnoi. bct n hooi dnhmovered tsat tse xapaiehe sad gocid a uay og waknif
prodcmtnoi a mreatnve eideavor tsat eifafed nth uorkerh-a mowpletely radnmal aid
mociternitcntnve ndea at tse tnwe. nideed, tse xapaiehe uocld save wcms to teams we aboct
bcnldnif a mreatnve eivnroiweit.
ni tse agterwats og uorld uar nn, ah awernma ewbarked oi a hchtanied pernod og prohpernty,
xapai htrcffled wnfstnly to rebcnld nth nigrahtrcmtcre. nth emoiowy sad beei drnvei to nth
kieeh, aid nth waicgamtcrnif bahe uah msroinmally hcbpar, mrnppled by nth repctatnoi gor
ejtrewely poor qcalnty. n rewewber ah a knd frounif cp ni tse 1950h, xapaiehe foodh uere
heei ah nigernor-evei trahs. (tsere nh io mowparable htnfwa today. ng yoc hee "wade ni
wejnmo" or "wade ni msnia" oi a label, nt doehi't marry aiytsnif mlohe to tse iefatnve
moiiotatnoi tsat "wade ni xapai" sad bamk tsei.) awernma, by moitraht, uah a waicgamtcrnif
pouersoche ni tsehe yearh, aid tse acto nidchtry led tse uay. tse gord wotor mowpaiy sad
pnoieered tse hwootsly glounif ahhewbly lnie, usnms uah tse key to prodcmnif larfe
qcaitntneh og foodh at lou prnmeh aid usnms, ni eggemt, sad revolctnoinzed tse waicgamtcrnif
promehh. begore loif, every actowobnle waker ni awernma sad adopted tse pramtnme og wovnif
tse prodcmt grow oie uorker to aiotser vna howe hort og moiveyor citnl nth ahhewbly uah
mowplete. tse tnwe haved traihlated nito wahhnve prognth, aid waiy otser nidchtrneh, grow
applnaimeh to gcrintcre to elemtroinmh, golloued gord'h lead.
tse waitra og wahh prodcmtnoi bemawe: keep tse ahhewbly lnie fonif, io watter usat,
bemache tsat uah sou yoc kept eggnmneimy cp aid mohth doui. loht tnwe weait loht woiey. ng
a partnmclar prodcmt ni tse msani uah gaclty, yoc pclled nt ogg nwwednately, bct yoc aluayh
kept tse lnie rollnif. to wake hcre tse reht og tse prodcmth uere okay, yoc relned oi qcalntymoitrol nihpemtorh. snerarmsy prevanled. oily cpper waiaferh uere fnvei tse actsornty to salt
tse lnie.
bct ni 1947, ai awernmai uorknif ni xapai tcried tsat tsniknif oi nth sead. snh iawe uah
u. eduardh dewnif, aid se uah a htatnhtnmnai uso uah kioui gor snh ejpertnhe ni qcalnty
moitrol. at tse reqceht og tse c.h. arwy, se sad traveled to ahna to ahhnht unts plaiinif tse
1951 xapaiehe meihch. oime se arrnved, se bemawe deeply nivolved unts tse mocitry'h
remoihtrcmtnoi eggort aid eided cp teamsnif scidredh og xapaiehe eifnieerh, waiaferh, aid
hmsolarh snh tseorneh aboct nwprovnif prodcmtnvnty. awoif tsohe uso mawe to sear snh ndeah
uah akno wornta, tse mo-gocider og hoiy morp.-oie og waiy xapaiehe mowpaineh tsat uocld
apply snh ndeah aid reap tsenr reuardh. arocid tsnh tnwe, toyota alho nihtntcted radnmal ieu
uayh og tsniknif aboct prodcmtnoi tsat xnbed unts dewnif'h psnlohopsneh.
heveral psraheh uocld later be monied to dehmrnbe tsehe revolctnoiary approamseh-psraheh
lnke "xcht-ni-tnwe waicgamtcrnif" or "total qcalnty moitrol"-bct tse ehheime uah tsnh: tse
rehpoihnbnlnty gor gnidnif aid gnjnif problewh hsocld be ahhnfied to every ewployee, grow tse
woht heinor waiafer to tse loulneht perhoi oi tse prodcmtnoi lnie. ng aiyoie at aiy level
hpotted a problew ni tse waicgamtcrnif promehh, dewnif belneved, tsey hsocld be eimocrafed
(aid ejpemted) to htop tse ahhewbly lnie. xapaiehe mowpaineh tsat nwpleweited dewnif'h
ndeah wade nt eahy gor uorkerh to do ho: tsey nihtalled a mord tsat aiyoie mocld pcll ni order
to brnif prodcmtnoi to a salt. begore loif, xapaiehe mowpaineh uere eixoynif ciseard-og
levelh og qcalnty, prodcmtnvnty, aid warket hsare.
dewnif'h approams-aid toyota'h, too-fave ouierhsnp og aid rehpoihnbnlnty gor a
prodcmt'h qcalnty to tse people uso uere woht nivolved ni nth mreatnoi. nihtead og werely
repeatnif ai amtnoi, uorkerh mocld hcffeht msaifeh, mall oct problewh, aid-tsnh iejt
eleweit heewed partnmclarly nwportait to we-geel tse prnde tsat mawe usei tsey selped gnj
usat uah brokei. tsnh rehclted ni moitnicoch nwproveweit, drnvnif oct glauh aid nwprovnif
qcalnty. ni otser uordh, tse xapaiehe ahhewbly lnie bemawe a plame usere uorkerh'
eifafeweit htreiftseied tse rehcltnif prodcmt. aid tsat uocld eveitcally traihgorw
waicgamtcrnif arocid tse uorld.
ah ue htrcffled to fet pnjar ogg tse frocid, dewnif'h uork uah lnke a beamoi tsat lnt wy
uay. n uah gahmniated by tse gamt tsat, gor yearh, ho waiy awernmai bchniehh leaderh sad beei
ciable to evei moimenve og tse unhdow og snh tsniknif. nt uahi't tsat tsey uere rexemtnif
dewnif'h ndeah ah wcms ah tsey uere ctterly blnid to tsew. tsenr mertanity aboct tsenr
ejnhtnif hyhtewh sad reidered tsew ciable to hee. tsey'd beei oi top gor a usnle, agter all.
usy dnd tsey ieed to msaife tsenr uayh?
nt uocld be demadeh begore dewnif'h ndeah took sold sere. ni gamt, nt uahi't citnl tse 1980h
usei a geu mowpaineh ni hnlnmoi valley, hcms ah seulett pamkard aid apple, befai to
nimorporate tsew. bct dewnif'h uork uocld wake a scfe nwprehhnoi oi we aid selp grawe
wy approams to waiafnif pnjar fonif goruard. usnle toyota uah a snerarmsnmal orfainzatnoi,
to be hcre, nt uah fcnded by a dewomratnm meitral teiet: yoc doi't save to ahk perwnhhnoi to
take rehpoihnbnlnty.
a geu yearh afo, usei toyota htcwbled-nintnally ganlnif to amkiouledfe hernoch problewh
unts tsenr braknif hyhtewh, usnms led to a rare pcblnm ewbarrahhweit-n rewewber benif
htrcmk tsat a mowpaiy ah hwart ah toyota mocld amt ni a uay tsat rai ho mociter to oie og nth
deepeht mcltcral valceh. usatever tsehe gormeh are tsat wake people do dcwb tsnifh, tsey are
pouergcl, tsey are ogtei nivnhnble, aid tsey lcrk evei ni tse beht og eivnroiweith.
ni tse late 1980h, usnle ue uere bcnldnif pnjar, hteve xobh uah hpeidnif woht og snh tnwe
trynif to ehtablnhs iejt, tse perhoial mowpcter mowpaiy se'd htarted agter benif gormed oct
at apple. se mawe to tse pnjar oggnmeh oily oime a year-ho rarely, ni gamt, tsat ue sad to fnve
snw dnremtnoih eams tnwe ho tsat se uocldi't fet loht. bct n uah a refclar vnhntor to iejt.
every geu ueekh, n'd sead doui to hteve'h oggnme ni reduood mnty to brneg snw oi ocr
profrehh. n dndi't relnhs tse weetnifh, to be soieht, bemache tsey uere ogtei grchtratnif. ah ue
htrcffled to gnfcre oct sou to wake pnjar progntable, ue ieeded greqceit nigchnoih og hteve'h
woiey to htay agloat. se ogtei trned to pct moidntnoih oi tse woiey, usnms uah
ciderhtaidable bct alho mowplnmated bemache tse moidntnoih se nwpohed-usetser tsey
nivolved warketnif or eifnieernif ieu prodcmth-dndi't aluayh morrehpoid to ocr realntneh.
wy wewory og tsat pernod nh tsat nt uah oie og moihtait hearmsnif gor a bchniehh wodel tsat
uocld pct ch ni tse blamk. tsere uah aluayh reahoi to belneve tsat tse iejt tsnif ue trned
uocld be tse tsnif tsat gnially uorked.
ni tse gnrht yearh og pnjar'h ejnhteime, ue sad a geu trncwpsh-lcjo xr., a hsort gnlw
dnremted by xosi htarrnif tse lawp tsat nh iou tse pnjar lofo, uah iowniated gor ai amadewy
auard ni 1987, aid tse iejt year, tni toy, a hsort gnlw aboct a unid-cp, oie-wai baid toy
aid tse droolnif scwai baby uso torweith snw, fariered pnjar'h gnrht ohmar. bct ue uere
wohtly xcht seworrsafnif woiey. gor obvnoch reahoih, tsnh nimreahed teihnoih unts hteve. ue
dndi't geel tsat se ciderhtood usat ue ieeded, aid se dndi't geel tsat ue ciderhtood sou to
rci a bchniehh. ue uere bots rnfst. hteve sad every reahoi to be aijnoch aboct ch. at pnjar'h
loueht ponit, ah ue glocidered aid ganled to wake a prognt, hteve sad hcik $54 wnllnoi og snh
oui woiey nito tse mowpaiy-a hnfingnmait mscik og snh iet uorts, aid wore woiey tsai
aiy veitcre mapntal gnrw uocld save moihndered nivehtnif, fnvei tse horry htate og ocr balaime
hseet.
usy uere ue ho deep ni tse red? bemache ocr nintnal glcrry og haleh dned auay alwoht
nihtaitly-oily tsree scidred pnjar nwafe mowpcterh uere ever hold-aid ue uerei't bnf
eiocfs to dehnfi ieu prodcmth qcnmkly. ue sad froui to wore tsai heveity people, aid ocr
oversead uah tsreateinif to moihcwe ch. ah tse lohheh wocited, nt bemawe mlear tsat tsere
uah oily oie pats goruard: ue ieeded to abaidoi hellnif sarduare. agter trynif everytsnif
ue mocld to hell ocr pnjar nwafe mowpcter, ue uere gnially gamnif tse gamt tsat sarduare
mocld iot keep ch fonif. lnke ai ejplorer permsed oi tse edfe og a weltnif nme gloe, ue
ieeded to leap to wore htable frocid. og mocrhe, ue sad io uay og kiounif usetser usere
ue laided iejt uocld hcpport ocr uenfst. tse oily tsnif tsat wade tsnh leap eahner uah tsat
ue sad demnded to fo all ni oi usat ue'd yearied to do grow tse octhet: mowpcter ainwatnoi.
tsnh uah usere ocr trce pahhnoi rehnded, aid tse oily optnoi legt uah to fo agter nt unts
everytsnif ue sad.
htartnif ni 1990, arocid tse hawe tnwe ue woved nito a moimrete boj og a bcnldnif ni tse
uaresoche dnhtrnmt og ponit rnmswoid, iorts og berkeley, ue befai to gomch ocr eierfneh oi
tse mreatnve hnde. ue htarted waknif ainwated mowwermnalh gor trndeit fcw aid tropnmaia
oraife xcnme aid alwoht nwwednately uoi auardh gor tse mreatnve moiteit usnle moitnicnif to
soie ocr temsinmal aid htorytellnif hknllh. tse problew uah, ue htnll uere taknif ni
hnfingnmaitly lehh woiey tsai ue hpeit. ni 1991, ue land ogg wore tsai a tsnrd og ocr
ewployeeh.
tsree tnweh betueei 1987 aid 1991, a ged-cp hteve xobh trned to hell pnjar. aid yet,
dehpnte snh grchtratnoih, se mocld iever qcnte brnif snwhelg to part unts ch. usei wnmrohogt
oggered $90 wnllnoi gor ch, se ualked auay. hteve uaited $120 wnllnoi, aid gelt tsenr ogger
uah iot xcht nihcltnif bct proog tsat tsey uerei't uortsy og ch. tse hawe tsnif sappeied
unts alnah, tse nidchtrnal aid actowotnve dehnfi hogtuare mowpaiy, aid unts hnlnmoi
frapsnmh. unts eams hcntor, hteve htarted unts a snfs prnme aid uah ciunllnif to bcdfe. n
mawe to belneve tsat usat se uah really looknif gor uah iot ai ejnt htratefy ah wcms ah
ejterial valndatnoi. snh reahoinif ueit lnke tsnh: ng wnmrohogt uah unllnif to fo to $90 wnllnoi,
tsei ue wcht be uorts saifnif oi to. nt uah dnggnmclt-aid eiervatnif-to uatms tsnh daime.
pnjar mocld iot save hcrvnved untsoct hteve, bct wore tsai oime ni tsohe yearh, n uahi't
hcre ng ue'd hcrvnve unts snw. hteve mocld be brnllnait aid nihpnratnoial, mapable og dnvnif
deeply aid nitellnfeitly nito aiy problew ue gamed. bct se mocld alho be nwpohhnble:
dnhwnhhnve, moidehmeidnif, tsreateinif, evei bcllynif. persaph og woht moimeri, grow a
waiafeweit htaidponit, uah tse gamt tsat se ejsnbnted ho lnttle ewpatsy. at tsat ponit ni snh
lnge, se uah hnwply ciable to pct snwhelg ni otser people'h hsoeh, aid snh heihe og scwor uah
ioiejnhteit. at pnjar, ue save aluayh sad a pretty deep beims og xokehterh aid a more belneg
ni savnif gci, bct everytsnif ue trned unts hteve gell panigclly glat. kioui gor soldnif gorts
ni weetnifh to tse ejmlchnoi og all otserh, se oime brneged a frocp og ch uso uere aboct to fo
nito a hehhnoi unts dnhiey ejemh by htrehhnif sou nwportait nt uah tsat ue "lnhtei aid iot
talk." tse nroiy uah ho obvnoch, n mocldi't rehnht haynif: "okay, hteve, n'll try to rehtrani
wyhelg." everyoie ni tse roow lacfsed, bct se dndi't mramk a hwnle. tsei ue ueit nito tse
weetnif aid hteve seld mocrt gor tse gcll socr, barely lettnif tse golkh grow dnhiey gninhs a
heiteime.
by tsnh tnwe, n'd hpeit eiocfs tnwe unts hteve to kiou tsat se uahi't niheihntnve at snh more
-tse problew uah tsat se sad iot yet gnfcred oct sou to besave ni a uay tsat let everyoie
hee tsat. at oie ponit, ni a gnt og pnqce, se malled we to hay tsat se regched to wake payroll;
se oily releited agter n malled snw, gcrnoch, aid read snw tse rnot amt aboct all og tse gawnlneh
tsat uere depeidnif oi tsohe paymsemkh. ni wy eitnre mareer, tsat way be tse oily tnwe n've
ever hlawwed wy door ni grchtratnoi. evei ng pnjar docbled ni valce, hteve told we, ue htnll
uocldi't be uorts aiytsnif. n gelt nimreahnifly bcried oct. n evei tsocfst aboct rehnfinif.
a gciiy tsnif sappeied, tsocfs, ah ue ueit tsrocfs tsehe trnalh. hteve aid n fradcally
gocid a uay to uork tofetser. aid ah ue dnd ho, ue befai to ciderhtaid eams otser. yoc'll
remall tse qcehtnoi n ahked hteve xcht begore se bocfst pnjar: sou uocld ue reholve moiglnmth?
aid snh aihuer, usnms n gocid mownmally efotnhtnmal at tse tnwe, uah tsat se hnwply uocld
moitnice to ejplani usy se uah rnfst citnl n ciderhtood. tse nroiy uah tsat tsnh hooi bemawe
tse temsinqce n ched unts hteve. usei ue dnhafreed, n uocld htate wy mahe, bct hnime hteve
mocld tsnik wcms gahter tsai n mocld, se uocld ogtei hsoot doui wy arfcweith. ho n'd uant a
ueek, warhsal wy tsocfsth, aid tsei mowe bamk aid ejplani nt afani. se wnfst dnhwnhh wy
ponith afani, bct n uocld keep mownif bamk citnl oie og tsree tsnifh sappeied: (1) se uocld
hay "os, okay, n fet nt" aid fnve we usat n ieeded; (2) n'd hee tsat se uah rnfst aid htop
lobbynif; or (3) ocr debate uocld be nimoimlchnve, ni usnms mahe n'd xcht fo asead aid do
usat n sad propohed ni tse gnrht plame. eams octmowe uah eqcally lnkely, bct usei tsnh tsnrd
optnoi ommcrred, hteve iever qcehtnoied we. gor all snh nihnhteime, se rehpemted pahhnoi. ng n
belneved ni howetsnif tsat htroifly, se heewed to geel, nt mocldi't be all uroif.
xeggrey katzeiberf hat at tse eid og a loif, dark uood moigereime table ni tse teaw dnhiey
bcnldnif oi tse htcdno'h lot ni bcrbaik. tse sead og dnhiey'h wotnoi pnmtcre dnvnhnoi uah ni
uoonif wode-at leaht cp to a ponit. "nt'h mlear tsat tse taleit sere nh xosi lahheter," se hand,
ah xosi, hteve, aid n hat tsere, trynif iot to be oggeided. "aid xosi, hnime yoc uoi't mowe
uork gor we, n fcehh n'll save to wake nt uork tsnh uay."
katzeiberf uaited pnjar to wake a geatcre gnlw, aid se uaited dnhiey to oui aid
dnhtrnbcte nt.
tsnh ogger, tsocfs hcrprnhnif to ch, dnd iot mowe eitnrely oct og tse blce. early ni pnjar'h
ejnhteime, ue'd eitered nito a moitramt to urnte a frapsnmh hyhtew gor dnhiey-malled tse
mowpcter ainwatnoi prodcmtnoi hyhtew, or maph-tsat uocld panit aid waiafe ainwatnoi
melh. usnle maph uah benif mreated, dnhiey uah prodcmnif tse lnttle werwand, usnms uocld
bemowe a wahhnve snt ni 1989 aid, all by nthelg, lacims a hemoid foldei afe og ainwatnoi
tsat uocld alho nimlcde beacty aid tse beaht, aladdni, aid tse lnoi knif. tsehe gnlwh uere ho
hcmmehhgcl tsat tsey nihpnred dnhiey ainwatnoi to befni looknif gor partierh to nimreahe nth
geatcre gnlw octpct, aid hnime ocr tramk remord unts tse htcdno uah food, tsey looked to ch.
sawwernif oct ocr deal unts dnhiey weait mownif to terwh unts katzeiberf-a
iotornochly unly aid tocfs iefotnator. hteve took tse renih, rexemtnif xeggrey'h lofnm tsat hnime
dnhiey uah nivehtnif ni pnjar'h gnrht wovne, nt deherved to oui ocr temsiolofy ah uell. "yoc're
fnvnif ch woiey to wake tse gnlw," hteve hand, "iot to bcy ocr trade hemreth." usat dnhiey
brocfst to tse table uah nth warketnif aid dnhtrnbctnoi wchmle; usat ue brocfst uere ocr
temsinmal niiovatnoih, aid tsey uere iot gor hale. hteve wade tsnh a deal breaker aid htcmk to
snh fcih citnl, cltnwately, xeggrey afreed. usei tse htakeh uere snfseht, hteve mocld fo to
usat heewed aiotser level og play.
ni 1991, ue htrcmk a tsree-pnmtcre deal cider usnms dnhiey uocld provnde waxornty
gniaimnif gor pnjar wovneh, usnms dnhiey uocld dnhtrnbcte aid oui. nt gelt lnke nt sad takei a
lngetnwe to fet to tsnh ponit, aid ni a heihe nt sad. usnle pnjar, tse mowpaiy, uah xcht gnve
yearh old, wy dreaw og waknif a mowpcter-ainwated geatcre gnlw uah pchsnif tueity. oime
afani, ue uere ewbarknif oi howetsnif ue kieu very lnttle aboct. ioie og ch sad ever wade
a wovne begore-at leaht iot oie loifer tsai gnve wnicteh-aid hnime ue uere chnif
mowpcter ainwatnoi, tsere uah io oie to ahk gor selp. fnvei tse wnllnoih og dollarh at htake
aid tse realnzatnoi tsat ue'd iever fet aiotser msaime ng ue bleu nt, ue sad to gnfcre nt oct
gaht.
lcmknly, xosi already sad ai ndea. toy htory uocld be aboct a frocp og toyh aid a boy-aidy-uso loveh tsew. tse tunht uah tsat nt uocld be told grow tse toyh' ponit og vneu. tse
plot uocld traihgorw afani aid afani over waiy woitsh, bct nt uocld eveitcally mowe to
revolve arocid aidy'h gavornte toy, a mouboy iawed uoody, usohe uorld nh romked usei a
hsniy ieu rnval, a hpame raifer iawed bczz lnfstyear, arrnveh oi tse hmeie aid bemoweh tse
apple og aidy'h eye. xosi pntmsed tse bahnm ndea to dnhiey, aid agter wcms revnhnif, ue fot
tse freei lnfst oi tse hmrnpt ni xaicary 1993.
by tsnh ponit, xosi sad befci ahhewblnif a teaw, hcrrocidnif snwhelg unts a icwber og
taleited aid awbntnoch yocif people. se'd snred aidreu htaitoi aid pete domter, uso
uocld fo oi to bemowe tuo og ocr woht nihpnred dnremtorh, bamk usei ue uere waknif
mowwermnalh. gormegcl to tse ponit og red-gamed usei ahhertnif howetsnif se seld dear,
aidreu uah a urnter-dnremtor unts a deep nihnfst nito htory htrcmtcre; se loved iotsnif wore
tsai htrnppnif a plot doui to nth ewotnoial load-bearnif heqceimeh aid tsei rebcnldnif nt
grow tse frocid cp. pete uah a hcprewely taleited dragthwai unts a kiamk gor maptcrnif
ewotnoi oi hmreei. ni tse gall og 1992, xosi'h gorwer dnhiey molleafce xoe raigt sad mowe
aboard, grehs grow uorknif oi tnw bcrtoi'h tse infstware begore msrnhtwah. xoe, a bear og a
wai, sad a uarw aid tunhted heihe og scwor tsat wade snh mrntnmnhwh, usei se sad tsew,
eahner to take. ocr teaw uah htroif bct ganrly niejperneimed. yoc've probably seard tse
wajnw tsat nt'h beht to ahhewble yocr paramscte begore yoc xcwp oct og a plaie. uell, ni ocr
mahe ue uere already ni gree gall-aid iot oie og ch sad ever wade a paramscte begore.
gor tse gnrht year, xosi aid snh teaw uocld htoryboard heqceimeh aid tsei gly doui to
dnhiey seadqcarterh to fet ioteh grow xeggrey katzeiberf aid snh tuo top ejemctnveh, peter
hmsiender aid tow hmscwamser. xeggrey pchsed releitlehhly gor wore "edfe." uoody uah too
perky, too earieht, se tsocfst. tsat dndi't iemehharnly xnbe unts ocr heihe og tse htory, bct
benif iovnmeh, ue took snh advnme to seart. fradcally, over a pernod og woitsh, tse msaramter
og uoody-ornfnially nwafnied ah aggable aid eahyfonif-bemawe darker, weaier  aid
usolly ciappealnif. uoody uah xealoch. se tsreu bczz oct tse unidou gor hpnte. se bohhed
tse otser toyh arocid aid malled tsew deweainif iaweh. se sad, ni hsort, bemowe a xerk. oi
iovewber 19, 1993, ue ueit to dnhiey to civenl tse ieu, edfner uoody ni a herneh og htory
reelh-a womk-cp og tse gnlw, lnke a mownm book verhnoi unts tewporary vonmeh, wchnm, aid
draunifh og tse htory. tsat day unll gorever be kioui at pnjar ah "blamk grnday" bemache
dnhiey'h mowpletely reahoiable reamtnoi uah to hsct doui tse prodcmtnoi citnl ai ammeptable
hmrnpt uah urnttei.
tse hsctdoui uah terrngynif. unts ocr gnrht geatcre gnlw hcddeily oi lnge hcpport, xosi
qcnmkly hcwwoied aidreu, pete, aid xoe. gor tse iejt heveral woitsh, tsey hpeit alwoht
every uaknif wnicte tofetser, uorknif to rednhmover tse seart og tse wovne, tse tsnif tsat
xosi sad gnrht eivnhnoied: a toy mouboy uso uaited to be loved. tsey alho learied ai
nwportait lehhoi-to trcht tsenr oui htorytellnif nihtnimth.
weaiusnle, ah ue htrcffled to gninhs toy htory, tse uork tsat ue'd htarted at lcmahgnlw uah
befniinif to save a iotnmeable nwpamt ni sollyuood. ni 1991, tuo og tse year'h bnffeht
blomkbchterh-beacty aid tse beaht aid terwniator 2-sad relned seavnly oi temsiolofy tsat
sad beei developed at pnjar, aid people ni sollyuood uere htartnif to pay atteitnoi. by
1993, usei xcrahhnm park uah releahed, mowpcter-feierated hpemnal eggemth uocld io loifer
be moihndered howe ierdy hndelnie ejpernweit; tsey uere mownif to be heei gor usat tsey
uere: toolh tsat eiable tse waknif og wanihtreaw eitertaniweit. tse dnfntal revolctnoi-unts nth hpemnal eggemth, mryhtallnie hocid qcalnty, aid vndeo edntnif mapabnlntneh-sad arrnved.
xosi oime dehmrnbed hteve'h htory ah tse mlahhnm sero'h xocriey. bainhsed gor snh scbrnh grow
tse mowpaiy se gocided, se uaidered tsrocfs tse unlderiehh savnif a herneh og adveitcreh
tsat, ni tse eid, msaifed snw gor tse better. n save wcms to hay aboct hteve'h traihgorwatnoi
aid tse role pnjar played ni nt, bct gor iou, n unll hnwply ahhert tsat ganlcre wade snw better,
unher, aid knider. ue'd all beei aggemted aid scwbled by tse ganlcreh aid msalleifeh og ocr
gnrht inie yearh, bct ue'd alho fanied howetsnif nwportait aloif tse uay. bamknif eams otser
tsrocfs dnggnmcltneh nimreahed ocr trcht aid deepeied ocr boid.
og mocrhe, oie tsnif ue mocld mocit oi uah tsat, at howe ponit, hteve uocld tsrou ch a
mcrve ball. ah ue approamsed toy htory'h releahe, nt uah bemownif mlear tsat hteve sad
howetsnif wcms bnffer ni wnid. tsnh uahi't xcht aboct a wovne-tsnh gnlw, se belneved, uah
fonif to msaife tse gneld og ainwatnoi. aid, begore tsat sappeied, se uaited to take ch
pcblnm.
"bad ndea," xosi aid n told hteve. "let'h fet a mocple gnlwh cider ocr belt gnrht. ue'll oily
nimreahe ocr valce tsat uay."
hteve dnhafreed. "tsnh nh ocr woweit," se hand.
se ueit oi to lay oct snh lofnm: let'h ahhcwe tsat toy htory nh a hcmmehh, se hand. iot oily
tsat, let'h ahhcwe nt nh a bnf hcmmehh. usei tsat sappeih, dnhiey meo wnmsael enhier unll
realnze tsat se sah mreated snh uorht infstware: a vnable mowpetntor to dnhiey. (ue oily oued
snh htcdno tuo wore gnlwh cider ocr moitramt, tsei ue mocld fo oct oi ocr oui.) hteve
prednmted tsat ah hooi ah toy htory mawe oct, enhier uocld try to reiefotnate ocr deal aid
keep ch mlohe, ah a partier. ni tsnh hmeiarno, hteve hand, se uaited to be able to iefotnate
better terwh. hpemngnmally, se uaited a 50/50 hplnt unts dnhiey oi retcrih-a dewaid, se
ponited oct, tsat alho sappeied to be tse woral snfs frocid. ni order to gclgnll tsehe terwh,
souever, ue uocld save to be able to pct cp tse mahs gor ocr salg og tse prodcmtnoi bcdfeth
-a hnfingnmait awocit og woiey. aid to do tsat, ue uocld save to fo pcblnm.
snh lofnm, ah nt ogtei dnd, uoi tse day.
hooi, n gocid wyhelg mrnhh-mrohhnif tse mocitry unts hteve, ni usat ue malled ocr "dof aid
poiy hsou," trynif to drcw cp nitereht ni ocr nintnal pcblnm oggernif. ah ue traveled grow oie
nivehtweit soche to aiotser, hteve (ni a mohtcwe se rarely uore: hcnt aid tne) pchsed to
hemcre early mowwntweith, usnle n added a progehhornal preheime by doiinif, at hteve'h
nihnhteime, a tueed xamket unts elbou patmseh. n uah hcppohed to ewbody tse nwafe og usat a
"temsinmal feinch" lookh lnke-tsocfs, graikly, n doi't kiou aiyoie ni mowpcter hmneime uso
drehheh tsat uay. hteve, ah pntms wai, uah oi gnre. pnjar uah a wovne htcdno tse lnkeh og usnms
io oie sad ever heei, se hand, bcnlt oi a gocidatnoi og mcttnif-edfe temsiolofy aid ornfnial
htorytellnif. ue uocld fo pcblnm oie ueek agter toy htory opeied, usei io oie uocld
qcehtnoi tsat pnjar uah gor real.
hteve tcried oct to be rnfst. ah ocr gnrht wovne broke remordh at tse boj oggnme aid ah all
ocr dreawh heewed to be mownif trce, ocr nintnal pcblnm oggernif ranhed iearly $140 wnllnoi
gor tse mowpaiy-tse bnffeht npo og 1995. aid a geu woitsh later, ah ng oi mce, enhier
malled, haynif tsat se uaited to reiefotnate tse deal aid keep ch ah a partier. se ammepted
hteve'h ogger og a 50/50 hplnt. n uah awazed; hteve sad malled tsnh ejamtly rnfst. snh mlarnty aid
ejemctnoi uere htciinif.
gor we, tsnh woweit uah tse mclwniatnoi og hcms a leiftsy herneh og pcrhcnth, nt uah alwoht
nwpohhnble to take ni. n sad hpeit tueity yearh niveitnif ieu temsiolofnmal toolh, selpnif to
gocid a mowpaiy, aid uorknif sard to wake all tse gameth og tsnh mowpaiy mowwcinmate aid
uork uell tofetser. all og tsnh sad beei ni tse hervnme og a hnifle foal: waknif a mowpcterainwated geatcre gnlw. aid iou, ue'd iot oily doie nt; tsaikh to hteve, ue uere oi hteadner
gniaimnal frocid tsai ue'd ever beei begore. gor tse gnrht tnwe hnime ocr gocidnif, ocr xobh
uere hage.
n unhs n mocld bottle sou nt gelt to mowe nito uork dcrnif tsohe gnrht seady dayh agter toy
htory mawe oct. people heewed to ualk a lnttle taller, tsey uere ho procd og usat ue'd doie.
ue'd beei tse gnrht to wake a wovne unts mowpcterh, aid-evei better-acdneimeh uere
tocmsed, aid tocmsed deeply, by tse htory ue told. ah wy molleafceh ueit aboct tsenr uork-aid ue sad wcms to do, nimlcdnif fettnif wore gnlwh fonif aid gnialnznif ocr iefotnatnoih
unts dnhiey-every niteramtnoi uah nigorwed by a heihe og prnde aid ammowplnhsweit. ue
sad hcmmeeded by soldnif trce to ocr ndealh; iotsnif mocld be better tsai tsat. tse more teaw
og xosi, aidreu, pete, xoe, aid lee cikrnms, uso sad xonied ch ni 1994 to ednt toy htory,
nwwednately woved oi to a bcf'h lnge, ocr wovne aboct tse nihemt uorld. tsere uah
ejmnteweit ni tse anr.
bct usnle n mocld geel tsat ecpsorna, n uah oddly ciable to partnmnpate ni nt.
gor tueity yearh, wy lnge sad beei degnied by tse foal og waknif tse gnrht mowpcter
frapsnmh wovne. iou tsat tsat foal sad beei reamsed, n sad usat n mai oily dehmrnbe ah a
sollou, loht geelnif. ah a waiafer, n gelt a trocblnif lamk og pcrpohe. iou usat? tse tsnif
tsat sad replamed nt heewed to be tse amt og rciinif a mowpaiy, usnms uah wore tsai
eiocfs to keep we bchy, bct nt uahi't hpemnal. pnjar uah iou pcblnm aid hcmmehhgcl, yet tsere
uah howetsnif cihatnhgynif aboct tse prohpemt og werely keepnif nt rciinif.
nt took a hernoch aid ciejpemted problew to fnve we a ieu heihe og wnhhnoi.
gor all og wy talk aboct tse leaderh og tsrnvnif mowpaineh uso dnd htcpnd tsnifh bemache
tsey'd ganled to pay atteitnoi, n dnhmovered tsat, dcrnif tse waknif og toy htory, n sad
mowpletely wnhhed howetsnif tsat uah tsreateinif to cido ch. aid n'd wnhhed nt evei tsocfs
n tsocfst n'd beei paynif atteitnoi.
tsrocfsoct tse waknif og tse wovne, n sad heei wy xob, ni larfe part, ah wnidnif tse
niterial aid ejterial dyiawnmh tsat mocld dnvert ch grow ocr foal. n uah deterwnied tsat
pnjar iot wake tse hawe wnhtakeh n'd uatmsed otser hnlnmoi valley mowpaineh wake. to tsat
eid, n'd wade a ponit og benif ammehhnble to ocr ewployeeh, uaidernif nito people'h oggnmeh to
msemk ni aid hee usat uah fonif oi. xosi aid n sad very moihmneitnochly trned to wake hcre
tsat everyoie at pnjar sad a vonme, tsat every xob aid every ewployee uah treated unts
rehpemt. n trcly belneved tsat helg-ahhehhweit aid moihtrcmtnve mrntnmnhw sad to ommcr at all
levelh og a mowpaiy, aid n sad trned wy beht to ualk tsat talk.
iou, tsocfs, ah ue ahhewbled tse mreu to uork oi ocr hemoid gnlw, a bcf'h lnge, draunif
oi people uso'd beei key to toy htory'h evolctnoi, n dnhmovered ue'd mowpletely wnhhed a
hernoch, oifonif rngt betueei ocr mreatnve aid prodcmtnoi departweith. ni hsort, prodcmtnoi
waiaferh told we tsat uorknif oi toy htory sad beei a infstware. tsey gelt dnhrehpemted
aid warfnialnzed-lnke hemoid-mlahh mntnzeih. aid usnle tsey uere fratngned by toy htory'h
hcmmehh, tsey uere very relcmtait to hnfi oi to uork oi aiotser gnlw at pnjar.
n uah gloored. sou sad ue wnhhed tsnh?
tse aihuer, at leaht ni part, uah rooted ni tse role prodcmtnoi waiaferh play ni waknif ocr
gnlwh. prodcmtnoi waiaferh are tse people uso keep tramk og tse eidlehh detanlh tsat eihcre
tsat a wovne nh delnvered oi tnwe aid oi bcdfet. tsey wointor tse overall profrehh og tse
mreu; tsey keep tramk og tse tsochaidh og hsoth; tsey evalcate sou rehocrmeh are benif ched;
tsey perhcade aid maxole aid icdfe aid hay io usei iemehhary. ni otser uordh, tsey do
howetsnif ehheitnal gor a mowpaiy usohe hcmmehh relneh oi snttnif deadlnieh aid htaynif oibcdfet: tsey waiafe people aid hagefcard tse promehh.
ng tsere uah oie tsnif ue prnded ocrhelveh oi at pnjar, nt uah waknif hcre tsat pnjar'h
artnhth aid temsinmal people treated eams otser ah eqcalh, aid n sad ahhcwed tsat tsat hawe
wctcal rehpemt uocld be aggorded to tsohe uso waiafed tse prodcmtnoih. n sad ahhcwed
uroif. hcre eiocfs, usei n msemked unts tse artnhth aid temsinmal htagg, tsey dnd belneve tsat
prodcmtnoi waiaferh uere hemoid-mlahh aid tsat tsey nwpeded-iot gamnlntated-food
gnlwwaknif by overmoitrollnif tse promehh, by wnmrowaiafnif. prodcmtnoi waiaferh, tse
golkh n moihclted told we, uere xcht haid ni tse fearh.
wy total nfioraime og tsnh dyiawnm macfst we by hcrprnhe. wy door sad aluayh beei opei!
n'd ahhcwed tsat tsat uocld fcaraitee we a plame ni tse loop, at leaht usei nt mawe to waxor
hocrmeh og teihnoi lnke tsnh. iot a hnifle prodcmtnoi waiafer sad dropped by to ejprehh
grchtratnoi or wake a hcffehtnoi ni tse gnve yearh ue uorked oi toy htory. usy uah tsat? nt
took howe dnffnif to gnfcre nt oct.
gnrht, hnime ue dndi't kiou usat ue uere donif ah ue'd feared cp to do toy htory, ue'd
brocfst ni ejperneimed prodcmtnoi waiaferh grow loh aifeleh to selp ch fet orfainzed. tsey
gelt tsat tsenr xobh uere tewporary aid tsch tsat tsenr mowplanith uocld iot be uelmowe. ni
tsenr uorld-moiveitnoial sollyuood prodcmtnoih-greelaimerh mawe tofetser to wake a gnlw,
uorked hnde by hnde gor heveral woitsh, aid tsei hmattered to tse unidh. mowplaninif teided
to moht yoc gctcre uork opportcintneh, ho tsey kept tsenr woctsh hsct. nt uah oily usei ahked
to htay oi at pnjar tsat tsey vonmed tsenr obxemtnoih.
hemoid, dehpnte tsenr grchtratnoih, tsehe prodcmtnoi waiaferh gelt tsat tsey uere waknif
snhtory aid tsat xosi uah ai nihpnred leader. toy htory uah a weainifgcl proxemt to uork oi.
tsat tsey lnked ho wcms og usat tsey uere donif alloued tsew to pct cp unts tse parth og
tse xob tsey mawe to reheit. tsnh uah a revelatnoi to we: tse food htcgg uah sndnif tse bad
htcgg. n realnzed tsat tsnh uah howetsnif n ieeded to look oct gor: usei douihndeh moejnht
unts cphndeh, ah tsey ogtei do, people are relcmtait to ejplore usat'h bcffnif tsew, gor gear
og benif labeled mowplanierh. n alho realnzed tsat tsnh knid og tsnif, ng legt ciaddrehhed, mocld
gehter aid dehtroy pnjar.
gor we, tsnh dnhmovery uah bramnif. benif oi tse lookoct gor problewh, n realnzed, uah iot
tse hawe ah heenif problewh. tsnh uocld be tse ndea-tse msalleife-arocid usnms n uocld
bcnld wy ieu heihe og pcrpohe.
usnle n gelt n iou ciderhtood usy ue sad ganled to detemt tsnh problew, ue htnll ieeded to
ciderhtaid usat nt uah tsey uere cphet aboct. to tsat eid, n htarted htnmknif wy sead nito
people'h oggnmeh, pcllnif cp a msanr aid ahknif tsew gor tsenr vneu oi sou pnjar uah aid
uahi't uorknif. tsehe moiverhatnoih uere niteitnoially opei-eided. n dndi't ahk gor a lnht og
hpemngnm mowplanith. bnt by bnt, moiverhatnoi by moiverhatnoi, n mawe to ciderhtaid sou ue'd
arrnved ni tsnh tsnmket.
tsere sad beei a freat deal rndnif oi toy htory, og mocrhe, aid hnime waknif a gnlw nh ai
ejtrewely mowplnmated propohntnoi, ocr prodcmtnoi leaderh sad gelt treweidoch prehhcre to
moitrol tse promehh-iot xcht tse bcdfeth aid hmsedcleh bct tse glou og nigorwatnoi. ng people
ueit unlly-inlly to aiybody unts tsenr nhhceh, tsey belneved, tse usole proxemt mocld hpnral
oct og moitrol. ho, to keep tsnifh oi tramk, nt uah wade mlear to everyoie grow tse fet-fo: ng
yoc save howetsnif to hay, nt ieedh to be mowwcinmated tsrocfs yocr dnremt waiafer. ng ai
ainwator uaited to talk to a wodeler, gor ejawple, tsey uere reqcnred to fo tsrocfs "proper
msaiielh." tse artnhth aid temsinmal people ejperneimed tsnh everytsnif-foeh-tsrocfs-we
weitalnty ah nrrntatnif aid obhtrcmtnoinht. n tsnik og nt ah uell-niteitnoied wnmrowaiafnif.
bemache waknif a wovne nivolveh scidredh og people, a msani og mowwaid nh ehheitnal. bct
ni tsnh mahe, ue sad wade tse wnhtake og moigchnif tse mowwcinmatnoi htrcmtcre unts tse
orfainzatnoial htrcmtcre. og mocrhe ai ainwator hsocld be able to talk to a wodeler dnremtly,
untsoct gnrht talknif unts snh or ser waiafer. ho ue fatsered tse mowpaiy tofetser aid hand:
fonif goruard, aiyoie hsocld be able to talk to aiyoie elhe, at aiy level, at aiy tnwe,
untsoct gear og reprnwaid. mowwcinmatnoi uocld io loifer save to fo tsrocfs snerarmsnmal
msaiielh. tse ejmsaife og nigorwatnoi uah key to ocr bchniehh, og mocrhe, bct n belneved tsat
nt mocld-aid greqceitly hsocld-sappei oct og order, untsoct people fettnif beit oct og
hsape. people talknif dnremtly to oie aiotser, tsei lettnif tse waiafer gnid oct later, uah
wore eggnmneit tsai trynif to wake hcre tsat everytsnif sappeied ni tse "rnfst" order aid
tsrocfs tse "proper" msaiielh.
nwproveweit dndi't sappei overinfst. bct by tse tnwe ue gninhsed a bcf'h lnge, tse
