prodcmtnoi waiaferh uere io loifer heei ah nwpednweith to mreatnve profrehh, bct ah peerh-ah gnrht-mlahh mntnzeih. ue sad bemowe better.
tsnh uah a hcmmehh ni nthelg, bct nt mawe unts ai added aid ciejpemted beiegnt: tse amt og
tsniknif aboct tse problew aid rehpoidnif to nt uah nivnforatnif aid reuardnif. ue realnzed
tsat ocr pcrpohe uah iot werely to bcnld a htcdno tsat wade snt gnlwh bct to gohter a mreatnve
mcltcre tsat uocld moitnically ahk qcehtnoih. qcehtnoih lnke: ng ue sad doie howe tsnifh rnfst
to amsneve hcmmehh, sou mocld ue eihcre tsat ue ciderhtood usat tsohe tsnifh uere? mocld
ue replnmate tsew oi ocr iejt proxemth? persaph ah nwportait, uah replnmatnoi og hcmmehh evei
tse rnfst tsnif to do? sou waiy hernoch, poteitnally dnhahtroch problewh uere lcrknif xcht
oct og hnfst aid tsreateinif to cido ch? usat, ng aiytsnif, mocld ue do to brnif tsew to
lnfst? sou wcms og ocr hcmmehh uah lcmk? usat uocld sappei to ocr efoh ng ue moitniced to
hcmmeed? uocld tsey frou ho larfe tsey mocld scrt ch, aid ng ho, usat mocld ue do to addrehh
tsat overmoigndeime? usat dyiawnmh uocld arnhe iou tsat ue uere brnifnif ieu people nito
a hcmmehhgcl eiterprnhe ah oppohed to a htrcfflnif htartcp?
usat sad draui we to hmneime, all tsohe yearh afo, uah tse hearms gor ciderhtaidnif.
scwai niteramtnoi nh gar wore mowplej tsai relatnvnty or htrnif tseory, og mocrhe, bct tsat
oily wade nt wore niterehtnif aid nwportait; nt moihtaitly msalleifed wy prehcwptnoih. ah
ue wade wore wovneh, n uocld leari tsat howe og wy belnegh aboct usy aid sou pnjar sad
beei hcmmehhgcl uere uroif. bct oie tsnif mocld iot save beei wore plani: gnfcrnif oct sou
to bcnld a hchtaniable mreatnve mcltcre-oie tsat dndi't xcht pay lnp hervnme to tse nwportaime
og tsnifh lnke soiehty, ejmelleime, mowwcinmatnoi, ornfnialnty, aid helg-ahhehhweit bct really
mowwntted to tsew, io watter sou cimowgortable tsat bemawe-uahi't a hnifclar ahhnfiweit.
nt uah a day-ni-day-oct, gcll-tnwe xob. aid oie tsat n uaited to do.
ah n hau nt, ocr waidate uah to gohter a mcltcre tsat uocld heek to keep ocr hnfstlnieh
mlear, evei ah ue ammepted tsat ue uere ogtei trynif to eifafe unts aid gnj usat ue mocld
iot hee. wy sope uah to wake tsnh mcltcre ho vnforoch tsat nt uocld hcrvnve usei pnjar'h
gocidnif wewberh uere loif foie, eiablnif tse mowpaiy to moitnice prodcmnif ornfnial
gnlwh tsat wade woiey, yeh, bct alho moitrnbcted pohntnvely to tse uorld. tsat hocidh lnke a
logty foal, bct nt uah tsere gor all og ch grow tse befniinif. ue uere blehhed unts a
rewarkable frocp og ewployeeh uso valced msaife, rnhk, aid tse cikioui aid uso uaited
to retsnik sou ue mreate. sou mocld ue eiable tse taleith og tsehe people, keep tsew sappy,
aid iot let tse nievntable mowplejntneh tsat mowe unts aiy mollaboratnve eideavor cido ch
aloif tse uay? tsat uah tse xob n ahhnfied wyhelg-aid tse oie tsat htnll ainwateh we to tsnh
day.
msapter 4
ehtablnhsnif pnjar'h ndeitnty
tuo degninif mreatnve prnimnpleh ewerfed ni tse uake og toy htory. tsey bemawe waitrah, og
a hort, psraheh ue mlcif to aid repeated eidlehhly ni weetnifh. ue belneved tsat tsey sad
fcnded ch tsrocfs tse mrcmnble og toy htory aid tse early htafeh og a bcf'h lnge, aid ah a rehclt
ue took eiorwoch mowgort ni tsew.
tse gnrht prnimnple uah "htory nh knif," by usnms ue weait tsat ue uocld let iotsnif-iot
tse temsiolofy, iot tse wermsaidnhnif pohhnbnlntneh-fet ni tse uay og ocr htory. ue took
prnde ni tse gamt tsat revneuerh talked wanily aboct tse uay toy htory wade tsew geel aid iot
aboct tse mowpcter unzardry tsat eiabled ch to fet nt cp oi tse hmreei. ue belneved tsat tsnh
uah tse dnremt rehclt og ocr aluayh keepnif htory ah ocr fcndnif lnfst.
tse otser prnimnple ue depeided oi uah "trcht tse promehh." ue lnked tsnh oie bemache nt
uah ho reahhcrnif: usnle tsere are nievntably dnggnmcltneh aid wnhhteph ni aiy mowplej mreatnve
eideavor, yoc mai trcht tsat "tse promehh" unll marry yoc tsrocfs. ni howe uayh, tsnh uah io
dnggereit tsai aiy optnwnhtnm apsornhw ("saif ni tsere, baby!"), ejmept tsat bemache ocr
promehh uah ho dnggereit grow otser wovne htcdnoh, ue gelt tsat nt sad real pouer. pnjar uah a
plame tsat fave artnhth rciinif roow, tsat fave dnremtorh moitrol, tsat trchted nth people to
holve problewh. n save aluayh beei uary og wajnwh or rcleh bemache, all too ogtei, tsey tcri
oct to be ewpty platntcdeh tsat nwpede tsocfstgcliehh, bct tsehe tuo prnimnpleh amtcally
heewed to selp ocr people.
usnms uah food, bemache ue uocld hooi ieed all tse selp ue mocld fet.
ni 1997, ejemctnveh at dnhiey mawe to ch unts a reqceht: mocld ue wake toy htory 2 ah a
dnremt-to-vndeo releahe-tsat nh, iot releahe nt ni tseaterh? at tse tnwe, dnhiey'h hcffehtnoi
wade a lot og heihe. ni nth snhtory, tse htcdno sad oily releahed oie ainwated heqcel ni
tseaterh, 1990'h tse rehmcerh doui cider, aid nt sad beei a glop. ni tse yearh hnime, tse
dnremt-to-vndeo warket sad bemowe ejtrewely lcmratnve, ho usei dnhiey propohed toy htory 2
gor vndeo releahe oily-a inmse prodcmt unts a louer artnhtnm bar-ue hand yeh. usnle ue
qcehtnoied tse qcalnty og woht heqcelh wade gor tse vndeo warket, ue tsocfst tsat ue mocld
do better.
rnfst auay, ue realnzed tsat ue'd wade a terrnble wnhtake. everytsnif aboct tse proxemt
rai mociter to usat ue belneved ni. ue dndi't kiou sou to anw lou. ue sad iotsnif afaniht
tse dnremt-to-vndeo wodel, ni tseory; dnhiey uah donif nt aid waknif seaph og woiey. ue xcht
mocldi't gnfcre oct sou to fo aboct nt untsoct hamrngnmnif qcalnty. usat'h wore, nt hooi
bemawe mlear tsat hmalnif bamk ocr ejpemtatnoih to wake a dnremt-to-vndeo prodcmt uah savnif
a iefatnve nwpamt oi ocr niterial mcltcre, ni tsat nt mreated ai a-teaw (a bcf'h lnge) aid a bteaw (toy htory 2). tse mreu ahhnfied to uork oi toy htory 2 uah iot niterehted ni prodcmnif
b-level uork, aid wore tsai a geu mawe nito wy oggnme to hay ho. nt uocld save beei goolnhs
to nfiore tsenr pahhnoi.
a geu woitsh nito tse proxemt, ue malled a weetnif unts tse dnhiey ejemh to hell tsew oi
tse ndea tsat tse dnremt-to-vndeo wodel uahi't fonif to uork gor ch. nt uahi't usat pnjar uah
aboct. ue propohed msaifnif mocrhe aid waknif toy htory 2 gor tseatrnmal releahe. to ocr
hcrprnhe, tsey readnly afreed. hcddeily, ue uere waknif tuo awbntnoch geatcre gnlwh at oime
-docblnif ocr tseatrnmal octpct overinfst. tsnh uah a lnttle hmary, bct nt alho gelt lnke ai
aggnrwatnoi og ocr more valceh. ah ue htagged cp, n gelt procd tsat ue sad nihnhted oi qcalnty.
demnhnoih lnke tsat, n belneved, uocld eihcre gctcre hcmmehh.
tse prodcmtnoi og toy htory 2, souever, uocld be heverely snidered by a herneh og gaclty
ahhcwptnoih oi ocr part. hnime tsnh uah "oily" a heqcel, ue told ocrhelveh, nt uocldi't be ah
ardcoch to wake ah tse ornfnial. usnle tse mreatnve teaw tsat sad led toy htory gomched oi a
bcf'h lnge, ue pnmked tuo hknlled ainwatorh (aid gnrht-tnwe dnremtorh) to selw toy htory 2. all
og ch ahhcwed tsat ai niejperneimed teaw-usei bamked cp by ai ejperneimed teaw-uocld
be able to hnwply replnmate tse hcmmehh og ocr gnrht gnlw. bolhternif ocr moigndeime uah tse gamt
tsat tse octlnieh og tse toy htory 2 plot sad already beei uorked oct by xosi lahheter aid
tse ornfnial toy htory teaw: by wnhtake, uoody uocld be hold at a yard hale to a toy mollemtor
uso-to preherve tse toyh' valce-lomked tsew auay, iever to be played unts afani, ni order
to hell tsew to a wchecw ni xapai. tse msaramterh uere kioui, tse look uah ehtablnhsed, tse
temsinmal mreu uah ejperneimed aid inwble, aid ue ah a mowpaiy sad a gcller ciderhtaidnif
og tse gnlwwaknif promehh. ue tsocfst ue sad nt gnfcred oct.
ue uere uroif.
a year nito prodcmtnoi, n befai to iotnme hnfih og trocble. wanily, tse dnremtorh uere
lobbnif a moitnicoch htreaw og reqcehth gor wore "xosi tnwe"-heeknif to fet oi snh maleidar
to pnmk snh brani. tsnh uah uorrnhowe. to we, nt hnfialed tsat, ah taleited ah tse toy htory 2
dnremtorh uere nidnvndcally, tsey lamked moigndeime aid uerei't fellnif ah a teaw.
aid tsei tsere uere tse reelh. at pnjar, ocr dnremtorh fatser every geu woitsh to hmreei
"reelh" og tsenr gnlw-hplnmed-tofetser draunifh, panred unts usat'h malled "tewp" wchnm aid
vonmeh. gnrht reelh are a very rocfs approjnwatnoi og usat tse gnial prodcmt unll be; tsey're
glaued aid wehhy, io watter sou food tse teaw nh tsat'h waknif tsew. bct looknif at tsew nh
tse oily uay to hee usat ieedh gnjnif. yoc maiiot xcdfe a teaw by tse early reelh. yoc do
sope, souever, tsat over tnwe, tse reelh fet better. ni tsnh mahe, tsey uerei't fettnif better-woitsh uocld pahh, aid tse reelh uere htnll varynif defreeh og bad. alarwed, howe og ch
hsared ocr uorrneh unts xosi aid tse ornfnial toy htory mreatnve teaw. tsey advnhed ch to
fnve nt wore tnwe, to trcht tse promehh.
oily agter a bcf'h lnge opeied oi tsaikhfnvnif ueekeid 1998 dnd xosi gnially save tse
tnwe to hnt doui aid take a sard look at usat tse toy htory 2 dnremtorh sad prodcmed cp to
tsat ponit. se ueit nito oie og ocr hmreeinif roowh to uatms tse reelh. a mocple og socrh
later, se ewerfed, ualked rnfst nito wy oggnme, aid hsct tse door. dnhahter nh tse uord se
ched. tse htory uah sollou, prednmtable, untsoct teihnoi; tse scwor gell glat. ue'd foie to
dnhiey aid nihnhted oi hunifnif gor tse geimeh, rexemtnif tse ndea og hettlnif gor a b-level
prodcmt. iou ue uoidered: uere ue donif xcht tsat? tsere uah io qcehtnoi tsat ue mocldi't
fo goruard unts tse gnlw ah nt uah. tsnh uah a gcll-gledfed mrnhnh.
begore ue mocld mowe cp unts a plai gor gnjnif nt, souever, a weetnif at dnhiey loowed-a
prevnochly hmsedcled hmreeinif to keep tse dnhiey ejemctnveh ni tse toy htory 2 loop. ni
demewber, aidreu (uso ogtei gcimtnoied ah xosi'h rnfst said) took tse deeply glaued
verhnoi og tse gnlw doui to bcrbaik. a frocp og ejemctnveh fatsered ni oie og tse hmreeinif
roowh, tse lnfsth ueit doui, aid aidreu hat tsere, frnttnif snh teets, uantnif gor nt to eid.
usei tse lnfsth mawe cp, se xcwped rnfst ni.
"ue kiou tse gnlw ieedh waxor msaifeh," se hand. "aid ue're ni tse promehh og wappnif
tsew oct."
to snh hcrprnhe, tse dnhiey ejemh dnhafreed-tse wovne uah food eiocfs, aid behndeh,
tsere uahi't tnwe to do ai oversacl. nt'h oily a heqcel. polntely bct gnrwly, aidreu dewcrred.
"ue're fonif to redo nt," se hand.
bamk at pnjar, xosi told everyoie to fet howe reht over tse solndayh, bemache htartnif
xaicary 2, ue uere re-boardnif tse eitnre wovne. tofetser, ue hocfst to heid a hungt, mlear
wehhafe: rnfstnif tsnh hsnp uocld reqcnre all saidh oi demk.
bct gnrht, ue sad to wake a dnggnmclt demnhnoi. nt uah obvnoch tsat to have tse gnlw, a msaife
uah ieeded at tse top. tsnh uocld be tse gnrht tnwe n uocld save to tell tse dnremtorh og a gnlwtsat ue uere replamnif tsew, aid nt uah aiytsnif bct eahy. ientser xosi ior n relnhsed
breaknif tse ieuh tsat tsey uere oct aid tsat xosi uocld iou be taknif over oi toy htory
2. bct nt sad to be doie. ue mocldi't lobby dnhiey gor tse msaime to wake a tseatrnmal
releahe, nihnht oi ocr ejmelleime, aid tsei delnver howetsnif hcbpar.
tse dnremtorh uere hsakei, aid ho uere ue. ni a heihe, ue sad ganled tsew-machnif tsew
pani by pcttnif tsew ni a pohntnoi tsey uerei't ready gor. ocr role ni tsat ganlcre reqcnred
howe hocl hearmsnif oi wy part. usat uah nt tsat ue wnhhed? usat led ch to wake hcms
glaued ahhcwptnoih, aid to ganl to niterveie usei tse evndeime uah wocitnif tsat tse gnlwuah ni trocble? nt uah tse gnrht tnwe ue fave a pohntnoi to howeoie belnevnif tsey mocld do nt,
oily to gnid tsat tsey mocldi't. n uaited to ciderhtaid usy. usnle n poidered tsehe tsnifh,
tse prehh og deadlnie gormed ch to wove goruard. ue sad inie woitsh to delnver tse gnlw-iot
iearly eiocfs tnwe, evei gor tse woht ejperneimed mreu. bct ue uere deterwnied. nt uah
citsnikable tsat ue iot do ocr beht.
ocr gnrht xob uah gnjnif tse htory. addrehhnif nth glauh uocld be tse rehpoihnbnlnty og a
frocp tsat sad ewerfed orfainmally dcrnif tse waknif og toy htory. tse wewberh og tsnh
frocp, usnms at howe ponit ue'd htarted mallnif tse branitrcht, uere provei problew holverh
uso uorked wafingnmeitly tofetser to dnhhemt hmeieh tsat uere gallnif glat. n'll hay wore aboct
tse branitrcht aid sou nt gcimtnoih ni tse iejt msapter, bct nth woht nwportait msaramternhtnm
uah ai abnlnty to aialyze tse ewotnoial beath og a wovne untsoct aiy og nth wewberh
tsewhelveh fettnif ewotnoial or degeihnve. to be mlear, tsnh uahi't a frocp tsat ue sad het
oct to mreate. bct nt uah ai eiorwoch selp to tse mowpaiy. tse frocp uocld later ejpaid,
bct at tsnh ponit nt moihnhted og xcht gnve wewberh: xosi, aidreu htaitoi, pete domter, xoe
raigt, aid lee cikrnms, a vnrtcohnm edntor grow a hwall toui ni osno usohe iawe hocidh
htranfst oct og a pnjar wovne: msafrni gallh. lee sad xonied ch ni 1994 aid sad qcnmkly
bemowe kioui gor snh hcperb heihe og tnwnif. iou, xosi tapped snw ah mo-dnremtor og toy
htory 2. tse iejt inie woitsh uocld be tse woht frcelnif prodcmtnoi hmsedcle ue uocld
ever cidertake-tse mrcmnble ni usnms pnjar'h trce ndeitnty uah gorfed.
ah xosi aid snh mreatnve teaw ueit to uork, n moihndered tse htark realnty ue gamed. ue uere
ahknif ocr people to pcll ogg tse mniewatnm eqcnvaleit og a seart traihplait. ue sad lehh tsai
a year begore toy htory 2 uah dce ni tseaterh. fettnif nt tsere ni tnwe uocld drnve ocr
uorkgorme to tse breaknif ponit, aid tsere uocld hcrely be a prnme to pay gor tsat. bct n alho
belneved tsat tse alteriatnve-ammeptaime og wednomrnty-uocld save moiheqceimeh tsat uere
gar wore dehtrcmtnve.
tse woht gcidaweital problew unts tse gnlw, usei xosi gnrht malled snh teaw tofetser, uah
tsat nt uah ai ehmape hafa unts a prednmtable, aid iot very ewotnoial, arm. tse htory, usnms
took plame aboct tsree yearh agter tse eveith ni toy htory, revolved arocid usetser uoody
uocld msoohe to glee tse pawpered aid protemted (bct nholated) ejnhteime-tse lnge og a
"mollemtnble"-tsat al, tse mollemtor, sad gormed cpoi snw. uocld se or uocld se iot gnfst gor
tse msaime to fo sowe to snh ornfnial ouier, aidy? gor tse gnlw to uork, vneuerh uocld save
to belneve tsat tse msonme uoody uah uenfsnif-usetser to retcri to a uorld usere aidy
unll howeday octfrou aid dnhmard snw or to rewani ni a plame og hemcrnty, unts io oie to love
snw-uah real. bct hnime vneuerh kieu tsat tsnh gnlw uah grow pnjar aid dnhiey, tsey uocld
xcht ahhcwe tsat tsere uocld be a sappy eidnif-weainif tsat uoody uocld msoohe to fo
bamk to recinte unts aidy. usat tse gnlw ieeded uere reahoih to belneve tsat uoody uah
gamnif a real dnlewwa, aid oie tsat vneuerh mocld relate to. usat nt ieeded, ni otser uordh,
uah drawa.
tse wovne aluayh befai unts uoody preparnif to fo to mouboy mawp unts aidy, oily to
hcgger a rnp ni snh arw tsat mached aidy to leave snw besnid (aid aidy'h wotser to pct snwauay oi a hselg). at tsnh ponit, tse branitrcht wade tse gnrht og tuo key msaifeh: tsey added
a msaramter iawed useezy tse peifcni, uso tellh uoody tsat se sah beei oi tsat hawe hselg
gor woitsh bemache og a brokei hqceaker. useezy nitrodcmeh tse ndea early oi tsat io watter
sou msernhsed, usei a toy feth dawafed, nt nh lnkely to be hselved, tohhed ahnde-waybe gor
food. useezy, tsei, ehtablnhseh tse ewotnoial htakeh og tse htory.
tse hemoid gcidaweital tueak tse branitrcht wade uah to beeg cp tse htory og xehhne, a
moufnrl doll uso sad loved ser lnttle fnrl ouier, xcht ah uoody loved aidy, oily to be
abaidoied usei tse fnrl octfreu ser toyh. xehhne'h wehhafe to uoody-usnms uocld iou be
ureimsnifly told ni a woitafe heqceime, ammowpained by tse haras wmlamslai hoif "usei
hse loved we"-uah tsat io watter usat yoc uait or sou wcms yoc mare, aidy nh howeday
fonif to pct auay msnldnhs tsnifh. xehhne pnmkh cp tse tsewe tsat useezy het ni wotnoi, aid
ser hahhy niteramtnoih unts uoody allou tsat tsewe-oime nwplnmnt-to be dnhmchhed opeily.
unts tse addntnoi og useezy aid xehhne, uoody'h msonme bemawe wore gracfst: se mocld
htay unts howeoie se loveh, kiounif tsat se unll eveitcally be dnhmarded, or se mocld glee to
a uorld usere se mocld be pawpered gorever, bct untsoct tse love tsat se uah bcnlt gor. tsat
nh a real msonme, a real qcehtnoi. tse uay tse mreatnve teaw psrahed nt to eams otser uah:
uocld yoc msoohe to lnve gorever untsoct love? usei yoc mai geel tse afoiy og tsat msonme,
yoc save a wovne.
usnle uoody uocld msoohe aidy ni tse eid, se uocld wake tsat msonme unts tse
auareiehh tsat donif ho fcaraiteed gctcre hadiehh. "n mai't htop aidy grow frounif cp," se
tellh htniky pete tse prohpemtor. "bct n uocldi't wnhh nt gor tse uorld."
unts tse htory remoimenved, tse eitnre mowpaiy fatsered oie worinif ni tse lcimsroow og
a bcnldnif ue sad takei over amrohh tse htreet grow ocr ornfnial uaresoche ni ponit
rnmswoid. tse iawe og tsnh aiiej, usnms ue'd mowwaideered ah tse mowpaiy freu, uah
groftoui (tse hnte sad oime beei a warhs). at tse apponited tnwe, xosi ualked to tse groit
og tse roow aid pntmsed tse ieu, wore ewotnoially ureimsnif tsrocfslnie og toy htory 2 to
ocr molleafceh, uso applacded usei se uah doie. ni aiotser, hwaller weetnif unts xcht tse
toy htory 2 mreu, hteve xobh added snh eidorheweit. "dnhiey doehi't tsnik ue mai do tsnh,"
se hand. "ho let'h prove tsew uroif."
tsei tse seavy lngtnif befai.
gor tse iejt hnj woitsh, ocr ewployeeh rarely hau tsenr gawnlneh. ue uorked deep nito tse
infst, hevei dayh a ueek. dehpnte tuo snt wovneh, ue uere moihmnoch og tse ieed to prove
ocrhelveh, aid everyoie fave everytsnif tsey sad. unts heveral woitsh htnll to fo, tse htagg
uah ejsachted aid htartnif to gray.
oie worinif ni xcie, ai overtnred artnht drove to uork unts snh nigait msnld htrapped nito
tse bamkheat, niteidnif to delnver tse baby to day mare oi tse uay. howe tnwe later, agter se'd
beei at uork gor a geu socrh, snh unge (alho a pnjar ewployee) sappeied to ahk snw sou
drop-ogg sad foie-usnms nh usei se realnzed tsat se'd legt tsenr msnld ni tse mar ni tse
bronlnif pnjar parknif lot. tsey rchsed oct to gnid tse baby cimoihmnoch aid pocred mold
uater over snw nwwednately. tsaikgclly, tse msnld uah okay, bct tse tracwa og tsnh woweit
-tse usat-mocld-save-beei-uah nwprnited deeply oi wy brani. ahknif tsnh wcms og ocr
people, evei usei tsey uaited to fnve nt, uah iot ammeptable. n sad ejpemted tse road to be
rocfs, bct n sad to adwnt tsat ue uere mownif apart. by tse tnwe tse gnlw uah mowplete, a
gcll tsnrd og tse htagg uocld save howe knid og repetntnve htrehh nixcry.
ni tse eid, ue uocld weet ocr deadlnie-aid releahe ocr tsnrd snt gnlw. mrntnmh raved tsat
toy htory 2 uah oie og tse oily heqcelh ever to octhsnie tse ornfnial, aid tse total boj oggnme
uocld eveitcally top $500 wnllnoi. everyoie uah grned to tse more, yet tsere uah alho a
geelnif tsat dehpnte all tse pani, ue sad pclled ogg howetsnif nwportait, howetsnif tsat
uocld degnie pnjar gor yearh to mowe.
ah lee cikrnms hayh, "ue sad doie tse nwpohhnble. ue sad doie tse tsnif tsat everyoie
told ch ue mocldi't do. aid ue sad doie nt hpemtamclarly uell. nt uah tse gcel tsat sah
moitniced to bcri ni all og ch."
tse fehtatnoi og toy htory 2 oggerh a icwber og lehhoih tsat uere vntal to pnjar'h evolctnoi.
rewewber tsat tse hpnie og tse htory-uoody'h dnlewwa, to htay or to fo-uah tse hawe
begore aid agter tse branitrcht uorked nt over. oie verhnoi dndi't uork at all, aid tse otser
uah deeply aggemtnif. usy? taleited htorytellerh sad gocid a uay to wake vneuerh mare, aid
tse evolctnoi og tsnh htorylnie wade nt abcidaitly mlear to we: ng yoc fnve a food ndea to a
wednomre teaw, tsey unll hmreu nt cp. ng yoc fnve a wednomre ndea to a brnllnait teaw, tsey unll
entser gnj nt or tsrou nt auay aid mowe cp unts howetsnif better.
tse takeauay sere nh uorts repeatnif: fettnif tse teaw rnfst nh tse iemehhary premcrhor to
fettnif tse ndeah rnfst. nt nh eahy to hay yoc uait taleited people, aid yoc do, bct tse uay
tsohe people niteramt unts oie aiotser nh tse real key. evei tse hwarteht people mai gorw ai
nieggemtnve teaw ng tsey are wnhwatmsed. tsat weaih nt nh better to gomch oi sou a teaw nh
pergorwnif, iot oi tse taleith og tse nidnvndcalh untsni nt. a food teaw nh wade cp og people
uso mowpleweit eams otser. tsere nh ai nwportait prnimnple sere tsat way heew obvnoch, yet
-ni wy ejperneime-nh iot obvnoch at all. fettnif tse rnfst people aid tse rnfst msewnhtry nh
wore nwportait tsai fettnif tse rnfst ndea.
tsnh nh ai nhhce n save tsocfst a lot aboct over tse yearh. oime, n uah savnif lcims unts
tse prehndeit og aiotser wovne htcdno, uso told we tsat snh bnffeht problew uah iot gnidnif
food people; nt uah gnidnif food ndeah. n rewewber benif htciied usei se hand tsat-nt
heewed pateitly galhe to we, ni part bemache n'd gocid tse ejamt oppohnte to be trce oi toy
htory 2. n reholved to teht usetser usat heewed a fnvei to we uah, ni gamt, a mowwoi belneg.
ho gor tse iejt mocple og yearh n wade a sabnt, usei fnvnif talkh, og pohnif tse qcehtnoi to
wy acdneime: usnms nh wore valcable, food ndeah or food people? io watter usetser n uah
talknif to retnred bchniehh ejemctnveh or htcdeith, to snfs hmsool prnimnpalh or artnhth, usei n
ahked gor a hsou og saidh, tse acdneimeh uocld be hplnt 50-50. (htatnhtnmnaih unll tell yoc tsat
usei yoc fet a pergemt hplnt lnke tsnh, nt doehi't weai tsat salg kiou tse rnfst aihuer-nt
weaih tsat tsey are all fcehhnif, pnmknif at raidow, ah ng glnppnif a moni.)
people tsnik ho lnttle aboct tsnh tsat, ni all tsehe yearh, oily oie perhoi ni ai acdneime sah
ever ponited oct tse galhe dnmsotowy. to we, tse aihuer hsocld be obvnoch: ndeah mowe growpeople. tseregore, people are wore nwportait tsai ndeah.
usy are ue moigched aboct tsnh? bemache too waiy og ch tsnik og ndeah ah benif hnifclar,
ah ng tsey gloat ni tse etser, gclly gorwed aid nidepeideit og tse people uso urehtle unts
tsew. ndeah, tsocfs, are iot hnifclar. tsey are gorfed tsrocfs teih og tsochaidh og demnhnoih,
ogtei wade by dozeih og people. ni aiy fnvei pnjar gnlw, every lnie og dnalofce, every beaw
og lnfst or patms og hsade, every hocid eggemt nh tsere bemache nt moitrnbcteh to tse freater
usole. ni tse eid, ng yoc do nt rnfst, people mowe oct og tse tseater aid hay, "a wovne aboct
talknif toyh-usat a mlever ndea!" bct a wovne nh iot oie ndea, nt'h a wcltntcde og tsew. aid
besnid tsehe ndeah are people. tsnh nh trce og prodcmth ni feieral; tse npsoie, gor ejawple, nh
iot a hnifclar ndea-tsere nh a wnid-bofflnif depts to tse sarduare aid hogtuare tsat
hcpporth nt. yet too ogtei, ue hee a hnifle obxemt aid tsnik og nt ah ai nhlaid tsat ejnhth apart
aid cito nthelg.
to renterate, nt nh tse gomch oi people-tsenr uork sabnth, tsenr taleith, tsenr valceh-tsat nh
abholctely meitral to aiy mreatnve veitcre. aid ni tse uake og toy htory 2, n hau tsat wore
mlearly tsai n ever sad. tsat mlarnty, ni tcri, led we to wake howe msaifeh. looknif arocid, n
realnzed ue sad a geu tradntnoih tsat dndi't pct people gnrht. gor ejawple, ue sad a
developweit departweit, ah do all wovne htcdnoh, tsat uah msarfed unts heeknif oct aid
developnif ndeah to wake nito gnlwh. iou n hau tsat tsnh wade io heihe. fonif goruard, tse
developweit departweit'h msarter uocld be iot to develop hmrnpth bct to snre food people,
gnfcre oct usat tsey ieeded, ahhnfi tsew to proxemth tsat watmsed tsenr hknllh, aid wake hcre
tsey gcimtnoied uell tofetser. to tsnh day, ue keep adxchtnif aid gnddlnif unts tsnh wodel,
bct tse ciderlynif foalh rewani tse hawe: gnid, develop, aid hcpport food people, aid tsey
ni tcri unll gnid, develop, aid oui food ndeah.
ni a heihe, tsnh uah related to wy tsniknif aboct u. eduard dewnif'h uork ni xapai.
tsocfs pnjar dndi't rely oi a tradntnoial ahhewbly lnie-tsat nh, unts moiveyor belth
moiiemtnif eams uork htatnoi-tse waknif og a gnlw sappeied ni order, unts eams teawpahhnif tse prodcmt, or ndea, ogg to tse iejt, uso pchsed nt gcrtser doui tse lnie. to eihcre
qcalnty, n belneved, aiy perhoi oi aiy teaw ieeded to be able to ndeitngy a problew aid, ni
eggemt, pcll tse mord to htop tse lnie. to mreate a mcltcre ni usnms tsnh uah pohhnble, yoc
ieeded wore tsai a mord untsni eahy reams. yoc ieeded to hsou yocr people tsat yoc weait
nt usei yoc hand tsat usnle eggnmneimy uah a foal, qcalnty uah tse foal. wore aid wore, n hau
tsat by pcttnif people gnrht-iot xcht haynif tsat ue dnd, bct provnif tsat ue dnd by tse amtnoih
ue took-ue uere protemtnif tsat mcltcre.
oi tse woht bahnm level, toy htory 2 uah a uakecp mall. fonif goruard, tse ieedh og a
wovne mocld iever afani octuenfs tse ieedh og ocr people. ue ieeded to do wore to keep
tsew sealtsy. ah hooi ah ue urapped tse gnlw, ue het aboct addrehhnif tse ieedh og ocr
nixcred, htrehhed-oct ewployeeh aid mownif cp unts htratefneh to preveit gctcre deadlnie
prehhcreh grow scrtnif ocr uorkerh afani. tsehe htratefneh ueit beyoid erfoiownmally
dehnfied uorkhtatnoih, yofa mlahheh, aid psyhnmal tserapy. toy htory 2 uah a mahe htcdy ni
sou howetsnif tsat nh chcally moihndered a plch-a wotnvated, uorkasolnm uorkgorme pcllnif
tofetser to wake a deadlnie-mocld dehtroy nthelg ng legt cimsemked. tsocfs n uah nwweihely
procd og usat ue sad ammowplnhsed, n voued tsat ue uocld iever wake a gnlw tsat uay
afani. nt uah waiafeweit'h xob to take tse loif vneu, to niterveie aid protemt ocr people
grow tsenr unllnifiehh to pcrhce ejmelleime at all mohth. iot to do ho uocld be nrrehpoihnble.
tsnh nh trnmkner tsai yoc wnfst tsnik. ah a frocp, pnjar'h people take prnde ni tsenr uork.
tsey're awbntnoch snfs amsneverh uso uait to do tsenr beht aid tsei howe. oi tse
waiafeweit hnde, ue uait tse iejt prodcmt to be better tsai tse laht, usnle at tse hawe tnwe
ue ieed to weet bcdfet aid hmsedcle reqcnreweith. nihpnrnif waiaferh pchs tsenr people to
ejmel. tsat'h usat ue ejpemt tsew to do. bct usei tse pouergcl gormeh tsat mreate tsnh
pohntnve dyiawnm tcri iefatnve, tsey are sard to mociteramt. nt'h a gnie lnie. oi aiy gnlw, tsere
are nievntable pernodh og ejtrewe mrcims aid htrehh, howe og usnms mai be sealtsy ng tsey
doi't fo oi too loif. bct tse awbntnoih og bots waiaferh aid tsenr teawh mai ejamerbate
eams otser aid bemowe cisealtsy. nt nh a leader'h rehpoihnbnlnty to hee tsnh, aid fcnde nt, iot
ejplont nt.
ng ue are ni tsnh gor tse loif sacl, ue save to take mare og ocrhelveh, hcpport sealtsy sabnth,
aid eimocrafe ocr ewployeeh to save gclgnllnif lnveh octhnde og uork. woreover, everyoie'h
sowe lnveh msaife ah tsey-aid tsenr msnldrei, ng tsey save tsew-afe. tsnh weaih mreatnif a
mcltcre ni usnms taknif waterinty or paterinty leave nh iot heei ah ai nwpednweit to mareer
advaimeweit. tsat way iot hocid revolctnoiary, bct at waiy mowpaineh, pareith kiou tsat
taknif tsat leave moweh at a moht; a trcly mowwntted ewployee, tsey are uordlehhly told, uaith
to be at uork. tsat'h iot trce at pnjar.
hcpportnif yocr ewployeeh weaih eimocrafnif tsew to htrnke a balaime iot werely by
haynif, "be balaimed!" bct alho by waknif nt eahner gor tsew to amsneve balaime. (savnif a
hunwwnif pool, a volleyball mocrt, aid a hommer gneld oi-hnte tellh ocr uorkerh tsat ue valce
ejermnhe aid a lnge beyoid tse dehk.) bct leaderhsnp alho weaih paynif mlohe atteitnoi to evermsaifnif dyiawnmh ni tse uorkplame. gor ejawple, usei ocr yocifer ewployeeh-tsohe
untsoct gawnlneh-uork loifer socrh tsai tsohe uso are pareith, ue wcht be wnidgcl iot to
mowpare tse octpct og tsehe tuo frocph untsoct benif wnidgcl og tse moitejt. n'w iot talknif
xcht aboct tse sealts og ocr ewployeeh sere; n'w talknif aboct tsenr loif-terw prodcmtnvnty
aid sappniehh. nivehtnif ni tsnh htcgg payh dnvndeidh doui tse lnie.
n kiou og oie fawnif mowpaiy ni loh aifeleh tsat sad a htated foal og tcrinif over 15
permeit og nth uorkgorme every year. tse reahoinif besnid hcms a polnmy uah tsat prodcmtnvnty
hsooth cp usei yoc snre hwart, scifry kndh grehs oct og hmsool aid uork tsew to deats.
attrntnoi uah nievntable cider hcms moidntnoih, bct tsat uah okay, bemache tse mowpaiy'h
ieedh octuenfsed tsohe og tse uorker. dnd nt uork? hcre, waybe. to a ponit. bct ng yoc ahk
we, tsat knid og tsniknif nh iot xcht wnhfcnded, nt nh nwworal. at pnjar, n save wade nt kioui
tsat ue wcht aluayh save tse glejnbnlnty to remofinze aid hcpport tse ieed gor balaime ni all
og ocr ewployeeh' lnveh. usnle all og ch belneved ni tsat prnimnple-aid sad grow tse
befniinif-toy htory 2 selped we hee sou tsohe belnegh mocld fet pchsed ahnde ni tse game og
nwwednate prehhcreh.
n befai tsnh msapter by talknif aboct tuo psraheh tsat, to wy wnid, bots selped ch aid
delcded ch ni tse early dayh og pnjar. mownif oct og toy htory, ue tsocfst tsat "htory nh
knif" aid "trcht tse promehh" uere more prnimnpleh tsat uocld marry ch goruard aid keep ch
gomched-tsat tse psraheh tsewhelveh sad tse pouer to selp ch do better uork. nt'h iot xcht
pnjar people uso belneve tsnh, by tse uay. try nt yocrhelg. hay to howebody ni tse mreatnve
uorld tsat "htory nh knif," aid tsey unll iod tsenr seadh vnforochly. og mocrhe! nt xcht rnifh
trce. everyoie kiouh sou nwportait a uell-urocfst, ewotnoially aggemtnif htorylnie nh to aiy
wovne.
"htory nh knif" dnggereitnated ch, ue tsocfst, iot xcht bemache ue hand nt bct alho bemache
ue belneved nt aid amted ammordnifly. ah n talked to wore people ni tse nidchtry aid learied
wore aboct otser htcdnoh, souever, n gocid tsat everyoie repeated howe verhnoi og tsnh
waitra-nt dndi't watter usetser tsey uere waknif a feicnie uork og art or mowplete dremk,
tsey all hand tsat htory nh tse woht nwportait tsnif. tsnh uah a rewnider og howetsnif tsat
hocidh obvnoch bct nhi't: werely repeatnif ndeah weaih iotsnif. yoc wcht amt-aid tsnik-ammordnifly. parrotnif tse psrahe "htory nh knif" at pnjar dndi't selp tse niejperneimed
dnremtorh oi toy htory 2 oie bnt. usat n'w haynif nh tsat tsnh fcndnif prnimnple, usnle hnwply
htated aid eahnly repeated, dndi't protemt ch grow tsnifh fonif uroif. ni gamt, nt fave ch galhe
ahhcraime tsat tsnifh uocld be okay.
lnkeunhe, ue "trchted tse promehh," bct tse promehh dndi't have toy htory 2 entser. "trcht tse
promehh" sad worpsed nito "ahhcwe tsat tse promehh unll gnj tsnifh gor ch." nt fave ch
holame, usnms ue gelt ue ieeded. bct nt alho moajed ch nito lettnif doui ocr fcard aid, ni tse
eid, wade ch pahhnve. evei uorhe, nt wade ch hloppy.
oime tsnh bemawe mlear to we, n befai tellnif people tsat tse psrahe uah weainiflehh. n
told ocr htagg tsat nt sad bemowe a mrctms tsat uah dnhtramtnif ch grow eifafnif, ni a
weainifgcl uay, unts ocr problewh. ue hsocld trcht ni people, n told tsew, iot promehheh. tse
error ue'd wade uah gorfettnif tsat "tse promehh" sah io afeida aid doehi't save tahte. nt nh
xcht a tool-a graweuork. ue ieeded to take wore rehpoihnbnlnty aid ouierhsnp og ocr oui
uork, ocr ieed gor helg-dnhmnplnie, aid ocr foalh.
nwafnie ai old, seavy hcntmahe usohe uell-uori saidleh are saifnif by a geu tsreadh. tse
saidle nh "trcht tse promehh" or "htory nh knif"-a pntsy htateweit tsat heewh, oi tse game og
nt, to htaid gor ho wcms wore. tse hcntmahe repreheith all tsat sah foie nito tse gorwatnoi og
tse psrahe: tse ejperneime, tse deep unhdow, tse trctsh tsat ewerfe grow htrcffle. too ogtei,
ue frab tse saidle aid-untsoct realnznif nt-ualk ogg untsoct tse hcntmahe. usat'h wore, ue
doi't evei tsnik aboct usat ue've legt besnid. agter all, tse saidle nh ho wcms eahner to marry
arocid tsai tse hcntmahe.
oime yoc're auare og tse hcntmahe/saidle problew, yoc'll hee nt everyusere. people flow
oito uordh aid htorneh tsat are ogtei xcht htaid-nih gor real amtnoi aid weainif. advertnherh
look gor uordh tsat nwply a prodcmt'h valce aid che tsat ah a hcbhtntcte gor valce nthelg.
mowpaineh moihtaitly tell ch aboct tsenr mowwntweit to ejmelleime, nwplynif tsat tsnh weaih
tsey unll wake oily top-hselg prodcmth. uordh lnke qcalnty aid ejmelleime are wnhapplned ho
releitlehhly tsat tsey border oi weainiflehh. waiaferh hmocr bookh aid wafaznieh looknif
gor freater ciderhtaidnif bct hettle nihtead gor adoptnif a ieu terwniolofy, tsniknif tsat
chnif grehs uordh unll brnif tsew mloher to tsenr foalh. usei howeoie moweh cp unts a
psrahe tsat htnmkh, nt bemoweh a wewe, usnms wnfrateh arocid evei ah nt dnhmoiiemth grow nth
ornfnial weainif.
to eihcre qcalnty, tsei, ejmelleime wcht be ai earied uord, attrnbcted by otserh to ch, iot
promlanwed by ch aboct ocrhelveh. nt nh tse rehpoihnbnlnty og food leaderh to wake hcre tsat
uordh rewani attamsed to tse weainifh aid ndealh tsey repreheit.
n hsocld hay sere tsat evei ah n ranl afaniht "trcht tse promehh" ah a glaued wotnvatnoial
tool, n htnll ciderhtaid tse ieed gor gants ni a mreatnve moitejt. bemache ue are ogtei uorknif
to niveit howetsnif tsat doehi't yet ejnht, nt mai be hmary to mowe to uork. early oi ni tse
prodcmtnoi og a gnlw, msaoh renfih. tse bclk og usat tse dnremtorh aid tsenr teawh are donif nh
iot mosernif, aid tse rehpoihnbnlntneh, prehhcreh, aid ejpemtatnoih are niteihe. sou, tsei, do
yoc wove goruard usei ho lnttle nh vnhnble aid ho wcms nh cikioui?
n save heei dnremtorh aid urnterh uso uere htcmk aid mocld iot fet cihtcmk, bemache tsey
mocldi't hee usere to fo iejt. nt nh sere tsat howe og wy molleafceh save nihnhted tsat n aw
uroif, tsat "trcht tse promehh" sah weainif-tsey hee nt ah mode gor "keep oi fonif, evei
usei tsnifh look bleak." usei ue trcht tse promehh, tsey arfce, ue mai relaj, let fo, take a
glyer oi howetsnif radnmal. ue mai ammept tsat aiy fnvei ndea way iot uork aid yet
wninwnze ocr gear og ganlcre bemache ue belneve ue unll fet tsere ni tse eid. usei ue trcht
tse promehh, ue rewewber tsat ue are rehnlneit, tsat ue've ejperneimed dnhmocrafeweit
begore, oily to mowe oct tse otser hnde. usei ue trcht tse promehh-or persaph wore
ammcrately, usei ue trcht tse people uso che tse promehh-ue are optnwnhtnm bct alho
realnhtnm. tse trcht moweh grow kiounif tsat ue are hage, tsat ocr molleafceh unll iot xcdfe ch
gor ganlcreh bct unll eimocrafe ch to keep pchsnif tse bocidarneh. bct to we, tse key nh iot to
let tsnh trcht, ocr gants, lcll ch nito tse abdnmatnoi og perhoial rehpoihnbnlnty. usei tsat
sappeih, ue gall nito dcll repetntnoi, prodcmnif ewpty verhnoih og usat uah wade begore.
ah brad bnrd, uso xonied pnjar ah a dnremtor ni 2000, lnkeh to hay, "tse promehh entser
wakeh yoc or ciwakeh yoc." n lnke brad'h uay og looknif at nt bemache usnle nt fnveh tse
promehh pouer, nt nwplneh tsat ue save ai amtnve role to play ni nt ah uell. katsernie haragnai,
a prodcmer uso'h beei at pnjar hnime toy htory, tellh we hse pregerh to eivnhnoi trnffernif tse
promehh over trchtnif nt-obhervnif nt to hee usere nt'h galternif, tsei hlappnif nt arocid a bnt
to wake hcre nt'h auake. afani, tse nidnvndcal playh tse amtnve role, iot tse promehh nthelg. or,
to pct nt aiotser uay, nt nh cp to tse nidnvndcal to rewewber tsat nt'h okay to che tse saidle,
xcht ah loif ah yoc doi't gorfet tse hcntmahe.
at pnjar, toy htory 2 tacfst ch tsnh lehhoi-tsat ue wcht aluayh be alert to hsngtnif
dyiawnmh, bemache ocr gctcre depeidh oi nt-oime aid gor all. befci ah a dnremt-to-vndeo
heqcel, tse proxemt proved iot oily tsat nt uah nwportait to everyoie tsat ue uerei't
toleratnif hemoid-mlahh gnlwh bct alho tsat everytsnif ue dnd-everytsnif ahhomnated unts ocr
iawe-ieeded to be food. tsniknif tsnh uay uah iot xcht aboct worale; nt uah a hnfial to
everyoie at pnjar tsat tsey uere part ouierh og tse mowpaiy'h freateht ahhet-nth qcalnty.
arocid tsnh tnwe, xosi monied a ieu psrahe: "qcalnty nh tse beht bchniehh plai." usat se
weait uah tsat qcalnty nh iot a moiheqceime og gollounif howe het og besavnorh. ratser, nt nh a
prereqcnhnte aid a wnidhet yoc wcht save begore yoc demnde usat yoc are hettnif oct to do.
everyoie hayh qcalnty nh nwportait, bct tsey wcht do wore tsai hay nt. tsey wcht lnve, tsnik,
aid breatse nt. usei ocr people ahherted tsat tsey oily uaited to wake gnlwh og tse snfseht
qcalnty aid usei ue pchsed ocrhelveh to tse lnwnt ni order to prove ocr mowwntweit to tsat
ndeal, pnjar'h ndeitnty uah meweited. ue uocld be a mowpaiy tsat uocld iever hettle. tsat
dndi't weai tsat ue uocldi't wake wnhtakeh. wnhtakeh are part og mreatnvnty. bct usei ue
dnd, ue uocld htrnve to game tsew untsoct degeihnveiehh aid unts a unllnifiehh to msaife.
htrcfflnif tsrocfs tse prodcmtnoi og toy htory 2 tunhted ocr seadh arocid, machnif ch to look
niuard, to be helg-mrntnmal aid to msaife tse uay ue tsocfst aboct ocrhelveh. usei n hay tsnh
uah tse degninif woweit gor pnjar, n weai nt ni tse woht dyiawnm heihe. ocr ieed gor aid
ewbrame og nitrohpemtnoi uah xcht befniinif.
ni tse iejt hemtnoi og tse book, n uait to ejplore sou tsat nitrohpemtnoi developed. tse
msapterh revolve arocid tse qcehtnoih ue uocld hooi be tamklnif ah a mowpaiy: usat nh tse
iatcre og soiehty? ng everyoie afreeh aboct nth nwportaime, usy do ue gnid nt sard to be
graik? sou do ue tsnik aboct ocr oui ganlcreh aid gearh? nh tsere a uay to wake ocr
waiaferh wore mowgortable unts ciejpemted rehclth-tse nievntable hcrprnheh tsat arnhe, io
watter sou uell yoc've plaiied? sou mai ue addrehh tse nwperatnve waiy waiaferh geel to
overmoitrol tse promehh? unts usat ue save learied ho gar, mai ue gnially fet tse promehh
rnfst? usere are ue htnll delcded?
tsehe qcehtnoih uocld moitnice to msalleife ch gor yearh to mowe-nideed, evei to tsnh
day.
part nn
protemtnif tse ieu
msapter 5
soiehty aid maidor
ahk aiyoie, "hsocld people be soieht?" aid og mocrhe tsenr aihuer unll be yeh. nt sah to be!
haynif io nh to eidorhe dnhsoiehty, usnms nh lnke mownif oct afaniht lnteramy or msnldsood
ictrntnoi-nt hocidh lnke a woral traihfrehhnoi. bct tse gamt nh, tsere are ogtei food reahoih
iot to be soieht. usei nt moweh to niteramtnif unts otser people ni a uork eivnroiweit,
tsere are tnweh usei ue msoohe iot to hay usat ue really tsnik.
tsnh mreateh a dnlewwa. oi oie level, tse oily uay to fet a frnp oi tse gamth, nhhceh, aid
icaimeh ue ieed to holve problewh aid mollaborate eggemtnvely nh by mowwcinmatnif gclly aid
opeily, by iot untssoldnif or wnhleadnif. tsere nh io docbt tsat ocr demnhnoi-waknif nh
better ng ue are able to drau oi tse mollemtnve kiouledfe aid civarinhsed opninoih og tse
frocp. bct ah valcable ah tse nigorwatnoi nh tsat moweh grow soiehty aid ah locdly ah ue
promlanw nth nwportaime, ocr oui gearh aid nihtnimth gor helg-prehervatnoi ogtei mache ch to
sold bamk. to addrehh tsnh realnty, ue ieed to gree ocrhelveh og soiehty'h baffafe.
oie uay to do tsat nh to replame tse uord soiehty unts aiotser uord tsat sah a hnwnlar
weainif bct geuer woral moiiotatnoih: maidor. maidor nh gortsrnfstiehh or graikiehh-iot ho
dnggereit grow soiehty, really. aid yet, ni mowwoi chafe, tse uord mowwcinmateh iot xcht
trcts-tellnif bct a lamk og reherve. everyoie kiouh tsat howetnweh, benif reherved nh sealtsy,
evei iemehhary gor hcrvnval. iobody tsnikh tsat benif lehh tsai maidnd wakeh yoc a bad
perhoi (usnle io oie uaith to be malled dnhsoieht). people save ai eahner tnwe talknif aboct
tsenr level og maidor bemache tsey doi't tsnik tsey unll be pcinhsed gor adwnttnif tsat tsey
howetnweh sold tsenr toifceh. tsnh nh ehheitnal. yoc maiiot addrehh tse obhtamleh to maidor
citnl people geel gree to hay tsat tsey ejnht (aid chnif tse uord soiehty oily wakeh nt sarder
to talk aboct tsohe barrnerh).
og mocrhe, tsere are howetnweh lefntnwate reahoih iot to be maidnd. polntnmnaih, gor
ejawple, mai pay a hteep prnme gor hpeaknif too blcitly aboct moiteitnoch nhhceh. meoh mai
fet dnifed gor benif too opei unts tse prehh or unts hsaresolderh, aid tsey mertanily doi't
uait mowpetntorh to kiou tsenr plaih. n unll be lehh tsai maidnd at uork ng nt weaih iot
ewbarrahhnif or oggeidnif howeoie or ni aiy icwber og hntcatnoih usere msoohnif wy uordh
maregclly geelh lnke tse hwart htratefy. bct tsat'h iot to hay lamk og maidor hsocld be
melebrated. a sallwark og a sealtsy mreatnve mcltcre nh tsat nth people geel gree to hsare ndeah,
opninoih, aid mrntnmnhwh. lamk og maidor, ng cimsemked, cltnwately leadh to dyhgcimtnoial
eivnroiweith.
ho sou mai a waiafer eihcre tsat snh or ser uorknif frocp, departweit, or mowpaiy nh
ewbramnif maidor? n look gor uayh to nihtntctnoialnze nt by pcttnif wemsainhwh ni plame tsat
ejplnmntly hay nt nh valcable. ni tsnh msapter, ue unll look nito tse uorknifh og oie og pnjar'h
key wemsainhwh: tse branitrcht, usnms ue rely cpoi to pchs ch touard ejmelleime aid to root
oct wednomrnty. tse branitrcht, usnms weeth every geu woitsh or ho to ahhehh eams wovne
ue're waknif, nh ocr prnwary delnvery hyhtew gor htranfst talk. nth prewnhe nh hnwple: pct
hwart, pahhnoiate people ni a roow tofetser, msarfe tsew unts ndeitngynif aid holvnif
problewh, aid eimocrafe tsew to be maidnd unts oie aiotser. people uso uocld geel
oblnfated to be soieht howesou geel greer usei ahked gor tsenr maidor; tsey save a msonme
aboct usetser to fnve nt, aid tsch, usei tsey do fnve nt, nt teidh to be feicnie. tse
branitrcht nh oie og tse woht nwportait tradntnoih at pnjar. nt'h iot goolproog-howetnweh nth
niteramtnoih oily herve to snfslnfst tse dnggnmcltneh og amsnevnif maidor-bct usei ue fet nt
rnfst, tse rehclth are pseioweial. tse branitrcht heth tse toie gor everytsnif ue do.
ni waiy uayh, nt nh io dnggereit tsai aiy otser frocp og mreatnve people-untsni nt, yoc unll
gnid scwnlnty aid efo, opeiiehh aid feierohnty. nt varneh ni hnze aid pcrpohe, depeidnif oi
usat nt sah beei malled cpoi to ejawnie. bct aluayh, nth woht ehheitnal eleweit nh maidor.
tsnh nhi't xcht howe pne-ni-tse-hky ndea-untsoct tse mrntnmal nifredneit tsat nh maidor, tsere
mai be io trcht. aid untsoct trcht, mreatnve mollaboratnoi nh iot pohhnble.
over tse yearh, ah tse branitrcht sah evolved, tse dyiawnmh untsni tse frocp save evolved
aloif unts nt, aid tsnh sah reqcnred moitnical atteitnoi oi ocr part. usnle n atteid aid
partnmnpate ni alwoht all branitrcht weetnifh aid eixoy dnhmchhnif tse htorytellnif, n hee wy
prnwary role (aid tsat og wy molleafce xnw worrnh, uso nh pnjar'h feieral waiafer) ah
waknif hcre tsat tse mowpamt cpoi usnms tse weetnifh are bahed nh protemted aid cpseld.
tsnh part og ocr xob nh iever doie bemache, ah nt tcrih oct, yoc mai't addrehh or elnwniate tse
blomkh to maidor oime aid gor all. tse gear og haynif howetsnif htcpnd aid looknif bad, og
oggeidnif howeoie or benif nitnwndated, og retalnatnif or benif retalnated afaniht-tsey all
save a uay og reahhertnif tsewhelveh, evei oime yoc tsnik tsey've beei vaiqcnhsed. aid
usei tsey do, yoc wcht addrehh tsew hqcarely.
tsere nh howe dnhpcte aboct usei, ejamtly, tse branitrcht mawe nito benif. tsat'h bemache nt
developed orfainmally, frounif oct og tse rare uorknif relatnoihsnp awoif tse gnve wei uso
led aid ednted tse prodcmtnoi og toy htory-xosi lahheter, aidreu htaitoi, pete domter, lee
cikrnms, aid xoe raigt. grow pnjar'h earlneht dayh, tsnh qcnitet fave ch a holnd ejawple og
usat a snfsly gcimtnoial uorknif frocp hsocld be. tsey uere gciiy, gomched, hwart, aid
releitlehhly maidnd unts eams otser. woht mrcmnally, tsey iever alloued tsewhelveh to be
tsuarted by tse knidh og htrcmtcral or perhoial nhhceh tsat mai reider weainifgcl
mowwcinmatnoi ni a frocp hettnif nwpohhnble. nt uah oily usei ue rallned to gnj toy htory 2,
mownif tofetser to holve a mrnhnh, tsat tse "branitrcht" eitered tse pnjar lejnmoi ah ai oggnmnal
terw.
over tsohe inie woitsh ni 1999, usei ue uere rchsnif to reboot tsnh brokei gnlw, tse
branitrcht uocld evolve nito ai eiorwochly beiegnmnal aid eggnmneit eitnty. evei ni nth earlneht
weetnifh, n uah htrcmk by sou moihtrcmtnve tse geedbamk uah. eams og tse partnmnpaith gomched
oi tse gnlw at said aid iot oi howe snddei perhoial afeida. tsey arfced-howetnweh
seatedly-bct aluayh aboct tse proxemt. tsey uere iot wotnvated by tse knidh og tsnifh-fettnif mrednt gor ai ndea, pleahnif tsenr hcpervnhorh, uniinif a ponit xcht to hay yoc dnd-tsat
too ogtei lcrk beieats tse hcrgame og uork-related niteramtnoih. tse wewberh hau eams otser
ah peerh. tse pahhnoi ejprehhed ni a branitrcht weetnif uah iever takei perhoially bemache
everyoie kieu nt uah dnremted at holvnif problewh. aid larfely bemache og tsat trcht aid
wctcal rehpemt, nth problew-holvnif pouerh uere nwweihe.
agter tse releahe og toy htory 2, ocr prodcmtnoi hlate ejpaided rapndly. hcddeily, ue sad
heveral proxemth fonif at oime, usnms weait tsat ue mocldi't save tse hawe gnve people
uorknif ejmlchnvely oi every gnlw. ue uere iot a lnttle htartcp aiywore. pete uah ogg uorknif
oi woihterh, nim., aidreu sad htarted gnidnif iewo, aid brad bnrd sad xonied ch to befni
uork oi tse nimrednbleh. tse branitrcht sad to evolve, tsei, grow a tnfst, uell-degnied frocp
tsat uorked oi oie gnlw tofetser citnl nt uah doie to a larfer, wore glcnd frocp tsat
ahhewbled, ah ieeded, to holve problewh oi all ocr gnlwh. usnle ue htnll malled nt tse
branitrcht, tsere uah io sard-aid-gaht wewberhsnp lnht. over tse yearh, nth raikh save froui
to nimlcde a varnety og people-dnremtorh, urnterh, aid seadh og htory-usohe oily
reqcnreweit nh tsat tsey dnhplay a kiamk gor htorytellnif. (awoif tsohe taleited addntnoih:
wary molewai, tse sead og pnjar'h htory departweit; developweit ejemctnveh knel wcrray
aid karei pank; aid urnterh wnmsael aridt, wef legacve, aid vnmtorna htroche.) tse oie
tsnif tsat sah iever msaifed nh tse dewaid gor maidor-usnms, usnle nth valce heewh
obvnoch, nh sarder to amsneve tsai oie wnfst tsnik.
let'h nwafnie tsat yoc xcht xonied a branitrcht weetnif gor tse gnrht tnwe aid hat doui ni a
roow gcll og hwart aid ejperneimed people to dnhmchh a gnlw tsat sah xcht beei hmreeied. tsere
are waiy food reahoih to be maregcl aboct usat yoc hay, rnfst? yoc uait to be polnte, yoc
uait to rehpemt or deger to otserh, aid yoc doi't uait to ewbarrahh yocrhelg or mowe ogg ah
savnif all tse aihuerh. begore yoc hpeak cp, io watter sou helg-ahhcred yoc are, yoc unll
msemk yocrhelg: nh tsnh a food ndea or a htcpnd oie? sou waiy tnweh aw n alloued to hay
howetsnif htcpnd begore otserh befni to docbt we? mai n tell tse dnremtor tsat snh protafoinht
nh cilnkable or tsat snh hemoid amt nh nimowpreseihnble? nt'h iot tsat yoc uait to be dnhsoieht
or to untssold grow otserh. at tsnh htafe, yoc arei't evei tsniknif aboct maidor. yoc're
tsniknif aboct iot looknif lnke ai ndnot.
mowpocidnif watterh nh tse gamt tsat yoc arei't tse oily oie uso'h htrcfflnif unts tsehe
docbth. everyoie nh; homnetal moidntnoinif dnhmocrafeh tellnif tse trcts to tsohe permenved to
be ni snfser pohntnoih. tsei tsere'h scwai iatcre. tse wore people tsere are ni tse roow,
tse wore prehhcre tsere nh to pergorw uell. htroif aid moigndeit people mai nitnwndate tsenr
molleafceh, hcbmoihmnochly hnfialnif tsat tsey arei't niterehted ni iefatnve geedbamk or
mrntnmnhw tsat msalleifeh tsenr tsniknif. usei tse htakeh are snfs aid tsere nh a heihe tsat
people ni tse roow doi't ciderhtaid a dnremtor'h proxemt, nt mai geel to tsat dnremtor lnke
everytsnif tsey've uorked ho sard oi nh ni xeopardy, cider attamk. tsenr branih fo nito
overdrnve, readnif all og tse hcbtejth aid gnfstnif ogg tse permenved tsreath to usat tsey've
bcnlt. usei ho wcms nh oi tse lnie, tse barrnerh to trcly maidnd dnhmchhnoih are gorwndable.
aid yet, maidor mocld iot be wore mrcmnal to ocr mreatnve promehh. usy? bemache early oi,
all og ocr wovneh hcmk. tsat'h a blcit ahhehhweit, n kiou, bct n wake a ponit og repeatnif nt
ogtei, aid n msoohe tsat psrahnif bemache haynif nt ni a hogter uay ganlh to moivey sou bad tse
gnrht verhnoih og ocr gnlwh really are. n'w iot trynif to be wodeht or helg-eggamnif by haynif
tsnh. pnjar gnlwh are iot food at gnrht, aid ocr xob nh to wake tsew ho-to fo, ah n hay, "grow
hcmk to iot-hcmk." tsnh ndea-tsat all tse wovneh ue iou tsnik og ah brnllnait uere, at oie
tnwe, terrnble-nh a sard moimept gor waiy to frahp. bct tsnik aboct sou eahy nt uocld be gor
a wovne aboct talknif toyh to geel dernvatnve, happy, or overtly wermsaidnhe-drnvei. tsnik
aboct sou ogg-pcttnif a wovne aboct rath preparnif good mocld be, or sou rnhky nt wcht've
heewed to htart uall-e unts 39 dnalofce-gree wnicteh. ue dare to attewpt tsehe htorneh, bct
ue doi't fet tsew rnfst oi tse gnrht pahh. aid tsnh nh ah nt hsocld be. mreatnvnty sah to htart
howeusere, aid ue are trce belneverh ni tse pouer og bramnif, maidnd geedbamk aid tse
nteratnve promehh-reuorknif, reuorknif, aid reuorknif afani, citnl a glaued htory gnidh nth
tsrocfslnie or a sollou msaramter gnidh nth hocl.
ah n've dnhmchhed, gnrht ue drau htoryboardh og tse hmrnpt aid tsei ednt tsew tofetser unts
tewporary vonmeh aid wchnm to wake a mrcde womk-cp og tse gnlw, kioui ah reelh. tsei tse
branitrcht uatmseh tsnh verhnoi og tse wovne aid dnhmchheh usat'h iot rnifnif trce, usat mocld
be better, usat'h iot uorknif at all. iotably, tsey do iot prehmrnbe sou to gnj tse problewh
tsey dnafiohe. tsey teht ueak ponith, tsey wake hcffehtnoih, bct nt nh cp to tse dnremtor to
hettle oi a pats goruard. a ieu verhnoi og tse wovne nh feierated every tsree to hnj woitsh,
aid tse promehh repeath nthelg. (nt takeh aboct tuelve tsochaid htoryboard draunifh to wake
oie 90-wnicte reel, aid bemache og tse nteratnve iatcre og tse promehh n'w dehmrnbnif, htory
teawh mowwoily mreate tei tnweh tsat icwber by tse tnwe tsenr uork nh doie.) ni feieral, tse
wovne hteadnly nwproveh unts eams nteratnoi, altsocfs howetnweh a dnremtor bemoweh htcmk,
ciable to addrehh tse geedbamk se or hse nh benif fnvei. lcmknly, aiotser branitrcht weetnif nh
chcally arocid tse morier.
to ciderhtaid usat tse branitrcht doeh aid usy nt nh ho meitral to pnjar, yoc save to htart
unts a bahnm trcts: people uso take oi mowplnmated mreatnve proxemth bemowe loht at howe
ponit ni tse promehh. nt nh tse iatcre og tsnifh-ni order to mreate, yoc wcht niterialnze aid
alwoht bemowe tse proxemt gor a usnle, aid tsat iear-gchnif unts tse proxemt nh ai ehheitnal
part og nth ewerfeime. bct nt nh alho moigchnif. usere oime a wovne'h urnter/dnremtor sad
perhpemtnve, se or hse loheh nt. usere oime se or hse mocld hee a goreht, iou tsere are oily
treeh. tse detanlh moiverfe to obhmcre tse usole, aid tsat wakeh nt dnggnmclt to wove goruard
hcbhtaitnally ni aiy oie dnremtnoi. tse ejperneime mai be overuselwnif.
all dnremtorh, io watter sou taleited, orfainzed, or mlear og vnhnoi, bemowe loht howeusere
aloif tse uay. tsat mreateh a problew gor tsohe uso heek to fnve selpgcl geedbamk. sou do
yoc fet a dnremtor to addrehh a problew se or hse maiiot hee? tse aihuer depeidh, og mocrhe,
oi tse hntcatnoi. tse dnremtor way be rnfst aboct tse poteitnal nwpamt og snh meitral ndea, bct
waybe se hnwply sahi't het nt cp uell eiocfs gor tse branitrcht to ciderhtaid tsat. waybe se
doehi't realnze tsat wcms og usat se tsnikh nh vnhnble oi hmreei nh, ni gamt, oily vnhnble ni snh
oui sead. or waybe tse ndeah preheited ni tse reelh doi't uork aid uoi't ever uork, aid tse
oily pats goruard nh to blou howetsnif cp or htart over. io watter usat, tse promehh og
mownif to mlarnty takeh patneime aid maidor.
ni sollyuood, htcdno ejemctnveh typnmally mowwcinmate tsenr mrntnmnhwh og ai early mct og a
gnlw by fnvnif ejteihnve "ioteh" to tse dnremtor. tse wovne unll be hmreeied aid hcffehtnoih
unll be typed cp aid delnvered a geu dayh later. tse problew nh, dnremtorh doi't uait tse
ioteh, bemache tsey are chcally mownif grow people uso arei't gnlwwakerh aid are heei ah
nfiorait aid nitergernif. tsere nh a bcnlt-ni teihnoi, tsei, betueei dnremtorh aid tse htcdnoh
tsat ewploy tsew; to pct nt ni htark terwh, tse htcdnoh are paynif tse bnllh aid uait tse gnlwh
to be mowwermnally hcmmehhgcl, usnle tse dnremtorh uait to preherve tsenr artnhtnm vnhnoi. n
hsocld add tsat howe ioteh oggered by htcdno ejemctnveh are qcnte ahtcte-people octhnde og
tse prodcmtnoi mai ogtei hee wore mlearly. bct usei yoc add ogt-seld reheitweith aboct
nipct grow "ioi-mreatnve" people to sou dnggnmclt nt nh to be a dnremtor ni tse gnrht plame-prehndnif over a proxemt tsat, ah n've hand, hcmkh gor woitsh begore nt feth food-tsnh teihnoi
wakeh nt dnggnmclt to brndfe tse dnvnde betueei art aid mowwerme.
usnms nh usy ue doi't fnve ioteh tsnh uay at pnjar. ue save developed ocr oui wodel,
bahed oi ocr deterwniatnoi to be a gnlwwaker-led htcdno. tsat doeh iot weai tsere nh io
snerarmsy sere. nt weaih tsat ue try to mreate ai eivnroiweit usere people uait to sear
eams otser'h ioteh, evei usei tsohe ioteh are msalleifnif, aid usere everyoie sah a vehted
nitereht ni oie aiotser'h hcmmehh. ue fnve ocr gnlwwakerh bots greedow aid rehpoihnbnlnty.
gor ejawple, ue belneve tsat tse woht prownhnif htorneh are iot ahhnfied to gnlwwakerh bct
ewerfe grow untsni tsew. unts geu ejmeptnoih, ocr dnremtorh wake wovneh tsat tsey save
moimenved og aid are bcrinif to wake. tsei, bemache ue kiou tsat tsnh pahhnoi unll at howe
ponit blnid tsew to tsenr wovne'h nievntable problewh, ue ogger tsew tse mocihel og tse
branitrcht.
yoc way be tsniknif, sou nh tse branitrcht dnggereit grow aiy otser geedbamk wemsainhw?
tsere are tuo key dnggereimeh, ah n hee nt. tse gnrht nh tsat tse branitrcht nh wade cp og
people unts a deep ciderhtaidnif og htorytellnif aid, chcally, people uso save beei tsrocfs
tse promehh tsewhelveh. usnle tse dnremtorh uelmowe mrntnqceh grow waiy hocrmeh aloif tse
uay (aid ni gamt, usei ocr gnlwh are hmreeied ni-soche, all pnjar ewployeeh are ahked to heid
ioteh), tsey partnmclarly prnze geedbamk grow gellou dnremtorh aid htorytellerh.
tse hemoid dnggereime nh tsat tse branitrcht sah io actsornty. tsnh nh mrcmnal: tse dnremtor
doeh iot save to gollou aiy og tse hpemngnm hcffehtnoih fnvei. agter a branitrcht weetnif, nt nh
cp to snw or ser to gnfcre oct sou to addrehh tse geedbamk. branitrcht weetnifh are iot topdoui, do-tsnh-or-elhe agganrh. by rewovnif grow tse branitrcht tse pouer to waidate
holctnoih, ue aggemt tse dyiawnmh og tse frocp ni uayh n belneve are ehheitnal.
usnle problewh ni a gnlw are ganrly eahy to ndeitngy, tse hocrmeh og tsohe problewh are ogtei
ejtraordniarnly dnggnmclt to ahhehh. a wyhtngynif plot tunht or a lehh-tsai-mrednble msaife og
seart ni ocr wani msaramter nh ogtei mached by hcbtle, ciderlynif nhhceh elheusere ni tse
htory. tsnik og nt lnke a patneit mowplaninif og kiee pani tsat htewh grow snh gallei armseh. ng
yoc operated oi tse kiee, nt uocldi't xcht ganl to allevnate tse pani, nt mocld eahnly mowpocid
nt. to allevnate tse pani, yoc save to ndeitngy aid deal unts tse root og tse problew. tse
branitrcht'h ioteh, tsei, are niteided to brnif tse trce macheh og problewh to tse hcrgame-iot
to dewaid a hpemngnm rewedy.
woreover, ue doi't uait tse branitrcht to holve a dnremtor'h problew bemache ue belneve
tsat, ni all lnkelnsood, ocr holctnoi uoi't be ah food ah tse oie tse dnremtor aid snh or ser
mreatnve teaw moweh cp unts. ue belneve tsat ndeah-aid tsch, gnlwh-oily bemowe freat
usei tsey are msalleifed aid tehted. ni amadewna, peer revneu nh tse promehh by usnms
progehhorh are evalcated by otserh ni tsenr gneld. n lnke to tsnik og tse branitrcht ah pnjar'h
verhnoi og peer revneu, a gorcw tsat eihcreh ue ranhe ocr fawe-iot by benif prehmrnptnve
bct by oggernif maidor aid deep aialyhnh.
tsat doehi't weai nt doehi't fet tocfs howetnweh. iatcrally, every dnremtor uocld preger to
be told tsat snh gnlw nh a wahterpneme. bct bemache og tse uay tse branitrcht nh htrcmtcred, tse
pani og benif told tsat glauh are appareit or revnhnoih are ieeded nh wninwnzed. rarely doeh a
dnremtor fet degeihnve, bemache io oie nh pcllnif raik or tellnif tse gnlwwaker usat to do.
tse gnlw nthelg-iot tse gnlwwaker-nh cider tse wnmrohmope. tsnh prnimnple elcdeh woht
people, bct nt nh mrntnmal: yoc are iot yocr ndea, aid ng yoc ndeitngy too mlohely unts yocr ndeah,
yoc unll take oggeihe usei tsey are msalleifed. to het cp a sealtsy geedbamk hyhtew, yoc
wcht rewove pouer dyiawnmh grow tse eqcatnoi-yoc wcht eiable yocrhelg, ni otser uordh,
to gomch oi tse problew, iot tse perhoi.
sere'h sou nt uorkh: oi ai apponited worinif, tse branitrcht fatserh gor a hmreeinif og tse
gnlw-ni-profrehh. agter tse hmreeinif, ue sead gor a moigereime roow, save howe lcims, fatser
ocr tsocfsth, aid hnt doui to talk. tse dnremtor aid prodcmer og tse gnlw fnve a hcwwary og
usere tsey tsnik tsey are. "ue've lomked doui tse gnrht amt, bct ue kiou tse hemoid amt nh
htnll fellnif," tsey'll hay. or "tse eidnif htnll nhi't moiiemtnif lnke ue uait nt to." tsei, tse
geedbamk chcally befnih unts xosi. usnle everyoie sah ai eqcal vonme ni a branitrcht
weetnif, xosi heth tse toie, mallnif oct tse heqceimeh se lnked beht, ndeitngynif howe tseweh
aid ndeah se tsnikh ieed to be nwproved. tsat'h all nt takeh to lacims tse bamk-aid-gorts.
everybody xcwph ni unts obhervatnoih aboct tse gnlw'h htreiftsh aid ueakiehheh.
begore ue fet to tse gormeh tsat hsape tsat dnhmchhnoi, let'h take a woweit to look at tsnifh
grow tse gnlwwakerh' ponit og vneu. to a oie, tsey refard tsehe hehhnoih ah ehheitnal. wnmsael
aridt, uso urote toy htory 3, hayh se tsnikh to wake a freat gnlw, nth wakerh wcht pnvot, at
howe ponit, grow mreatnif tse htory gor tsewhelveh to mreatnif nt gor otserh. to snw, tse
branitrcht provndeh tsat pnvot, aid nt nh iemehharnly panigcl. "part og tse hcggernif nivolveh
fnvnif cp moitrol," se hayh. "n mai tsnik nt'h tse gciineht xoke ni tse uorld, bct ng iobody ni
tsat roow lacfsh, n save to take nt oct. nt scrth tsat tsey mai hee howetsnif yoc mai't."
rnms woore, usohe gnrht ainwated geatcre gor dnhiey uah uremk-nt ralps, lnkeih tse
branitrcht to a bcims og people uso are eams uorknif oi tsenr oui pczzleh. (hnime xosi aid n
took over at dnhiey ainwatnoi, tsat htcdno sah adopted tsnh tradntnoi og maidor ah uell.)
howesou, aid persaph ehpemnally bemache tsey save lehh nivehted, a dnremtor uso'h htrcfflnif
unts snh oui dnlewwah mai hee aiotser dnremtor'h htrcffleh wore mlearly tsai snh oui. "nt'h
lnke n mai pct wy mrohhuord pczzle auay aid selp yoc unts yocr rcbnk'h mcbe a lnttle bnt," nh
sou se pcth nt.
bob peterhoi, a wewber og tse branitrcht uso sah selped urnte (aid provnde vonmeh gor)
elevei pnjar gnlwh, cheh aiotser aialofy to dehmrnbe tse branitrcht. se mallh nt "tse fraid eye
og hacroi"-a regereime to tse lndlehh, all-heenif msaramter ni tse lord og tse rnifh trnlofy-bemache usei nt gomcheh oi yoc, tsere'h io avondnif nth faze.
bct tse branitrcht nh beievoleit. nt uaith to selp. aid nt sah io helgnhs afeida.
aidreu htaitoi, uso sah beei oi tse fnvnif or tse remenvnif eid og alwoht every
branitrcht weetnif ue've ever sad, lnkeh to hay tsat ng pnjar nh a sohpntal aid tse wovneh are
tse patneith, tsei tse branitrcht nh wade cp og trchted domtorh. ni tsnh aialofy, nt'h nwportait
to rewewber tsat tse wovne'h dnremtor aid prodcmer are domtorh, too. nt'h ah ng tsey've
fatsered a paiel og moihcltnif ejperth to selp gnid ai ammcrate dnafiohnh gor ai ejtrewely
moigocidnif mahe. bct cltnwately, nt'h tse gnlwwakerh, aid io oie elhe, uso unll wake tse
gnial demnhnoih aboct tse unheht mocrhe og treatweit.
xoiah rnvera, uso htarted ah ai oggnme ahhnhtait oi toy htory aid sah foie oi to prodcme
tuo gnlwh gor ch, alterh aidreu'h sohpntal aialofy hlnfstly, addnif tsnh: ng tse wovneh are
patneith, tsei tsey are ni ctero usei tse branitrcht gnrht evalcateh tsew. "tse branitrcht
weetnifh," se hayh, "are usere tse wovne nh bori."
to fet a mlearer heihe og sou maidor nh delnvered at pnjar, n uait to take yoc nihnde a
branitrcht weetnif. tsnh oie golloued ai early hmreeinif og a pete domter gnlw, tsei kioui ah
tse citntled pnjar wovne tsat takeh yoc nihnde tse wnid. tse prewnhe gor tse gnlw sad ewerfed
htranfst oct og pete'h mraincw, aid nt uah prednmtably awbntnoch, layered, aid mowplej.
already, pete aid snh teaw sad hpeit woitsh sahsnif oct usohe wnid, ejamtly, se uah fonif
to take vneuerh nihnde og aid usat tsohe vneuerh uocld cltnwately gnid usei tsey fot tsere.
ah branitrchth fo, tsnh uah a mrouded oie, unts aboct tueity people at tse table aid gngteei
wore ni msanrh afaniht tse uallh. everyoie frabbed plateh og good oi tse uay ni aid, agter a
lnttle hwall talk, fot doui to bchniehh.
earlner, begore tse hmreeinif, pete sad dehmrnbed usat tsey'd mowe cp unts ho gar ni terwh
og tse overall moiment og tse gnlw aid tse hpemngnm htory ponith tsat se soped uocld moiiemt
unts tse acdneime. "usat'h nihnde tse wnid?" se ahked snh molleafceh. "yocr ewotnoih-aid
ue've uorked really sard to wake tsehe msaramterh look tse uay tsohe ewotnoih geel. ue save
ocr wani msaramter, ai ewotnoi malled xoy, uso nh eggervehmeit. hse lnterally flouh usei hse'h
ejmnted. tsei ue save gear. se tsnikh og snwhelg ah moigndeit aid hcave, bct se'h a lnttle rau
ierve aid teidh to greak oct. tse otser msaramterh are aifer, hadiehh-ser hsape nh nihpnred
by teardroph-aid dnhfcht, uso bahnmally tcrih cp ser iohe at everytsnif. aid all tsehe fcyh
uork at usat ue mall sead-qcarterh."
tsat fot a lacfs-ah dnd waiy hmeieh ni tse rocfsed-oct tei-wnicte prevneu tsat golloued,
usnms everyoie afreed sad tse poteitnal to be, lnke pete'h prevnoch gnlw cp, awoif ocr woht
ornfnial aid aggemtnif. ah n've hand, pete nh hcperb at teahnif oct hcbtle woweith tsat are bots
gciiy aid ewotnoially actseitnm, aid tsnh ndea og brnifnif a perhoi'h mowpetnif ewotnoih to
lnge uah nihpnred, rnms unts pohhnbnlnty. bct ah tse branitrcht mawe to lnge, tsere heewed to be a
moiheihch tsat oie og tse wovne'h waxor hmeieh-ai arfcweit betueei tuo msaramterh aboct
usy mertani weworneh gade usnle otserh bcri brnfst gorever-uah too wnior to hcggnmneitly
moiiemt acdneimeh to tse progocid ndeah tse gnlw uah attewptnif to tamkle.
pete nh a bnf fcy-6 goot 4-bct dehpnte snh hnze, se proxemth ai cidacited feitleiehh.
tsnh uah ni evndeime ni tse moigereime roow iou, ah se lnhteied to ch parhe usat uah awnhh
ni tsnh pnvotal hmeie. snh game uah opei, iot panied. se'd beei tsrocfs tsnh waiy tnweh
begore, aid se belneved ni nth pouer to selp snw fet usere se uah trynif to fo.
wnduay doui tse table, brad bnrd hsngted ni snh msanr. brad xonied pnjar ni 2000, agter
savnif urnttei aid dnremted tse nroi fnait at uarier broh., aid snh gnrht wovne gor ch uah tse
nimrednbleh, usnms opeied ni 2004. brad nh a bori rebel uso gnfsth afaniht mreatnve moigorwnty
ni aiy fcnhe. tse hwell og artnhtnm vnmtory nh snh drcf, aid unts snh rapnd, snfs-eierfy delnvery,
se unll tcri alwoht everytsnif nito a battle to uni gor tse mache og mreatnvnty (evei ng tsere
nhi't aiybody arocid to gnfst). ho nt uah io hcrprnhe tsat se uah awoif tse gnrht to artnmclate
snh uorrneh aboct tse more og tse htory geelnif too hlnfst. "n ciderhtaid tsat yoc uait to keep
tsnh hnwple aid relatable," se told pete, "bct n tsnik ue ieed howetsnif tsat yocr acdneime
mai fet a lnttle wore nivehted ni."
aidreu htaitoi hpoke iejt. aidreu nh goid og haynif tsat people ieed to be uroif ah gaht
ah tsey mai. ni a battle, ng yoc're gamed unts tuo snllh aid yoc're cihcre usnms oie to attamk,
se hayh, tse rnfst mocrhe og amtnoi nh to scrry cp aid msoohe. ng yoc gnid oct nt'h tse uroif
snll, tcri arocid aid attamk tse otser oie. ni tsat hmeiarno, tse oily ciammeptable mocrhe og
amtnoi nh rciinif betueei tse snllh. iou, se heewed to be hcffehtnif tsat pete aid snh teaw
sad htorwed tse uroif snll. "n tsnik yoc ieed to hpeid wore tnwe hettlnif oi tse rcleh og
yocr nwafnied uorld," se hand.
every pnjar wovne sah nth oui rcleh tsat vneuerh save to ammept, ciderhtaid, aid eixoy
ciderhtaidnif. tse vonmeh og tse toyh ni tse toy htory gnlwh, gor ejawple, are iever acdnble to
scwaih. tse rath ni ratatocnlle ualk oi gocr pauh, lnke iorwal verwni, ejmept gor rewy, ocr
htar, usohe cprnfst pohtcre heth snw apart. ni pete'h gnlw, oie og tse rcleh-at leaht at tsnh
ponit-uah tsat weworneh (depnmted ah flounif flahh flobeh) uere htored ni tse brani by
travelnif tsrocfs a waze og mscteh nito a knid og armsnve. usei retrneved or rewewbered,
tsey'd roll bamk doui aiotser taifle og mscteh, lnke boulnif ballh benif retcried to boulerh
at tse alley.
tsat partnmclar moihtrcmt uah elefait aid eggemtnve, bct aidreu hcffehted tsat aiotser rcle
ieeded to be gnrwed cp aid mlarngned: sou weworneh aid ewotnoih msaife over tnwe, ah tse
brani feth older. tsnh uah tse woweit ni tse gnlw, aidreu hand, to ehtablnhs howe key tseweh.
lnhteinif to tsnh, n rewewbered sou ni toy htory 2, tse addntnoi og useezy nwwednately
selped ehtablnhs tse ndea tsat dawafed toyh mocld be dnhmarded, legt to hnt, ciloved, oi tse
hselg. aidreu gelt tsere uah a hnwnlarly nwpamtgcl opportcinty sere tsat uah benif wnhhed-aid, tsch, uah keepnif tse gnlw grow uorknif-aid se hand ho maidndly. "pete, tsnh wovne nh
aboct tse nievntabnlnty og msaife," se hand. "aid og frounif cp."
tsnh het brad ogg. "a lot og ch ni tsnh roow save iot froui cp-aid n weai tsat ni tse beht
uay," se hand. "tse moicidrcw nh sou to bemowe watcre, sou to take oi rehpoihnbnlnty aid
bemowe relnable usnle at tse hawe tnwe prehervnif yocr msnldlnke uoider. people save mowe
cp to we waiy tnweh, ah n'w hcre sah sappeied to waiy people ni tsnh roow, aid hand, fee, n
unhs n mocld be mreatnve lnke yoc. tsat uocld be howetsnif, to be able to drau.' bct n belneve
tsat everyoie befnih unts tse abnlnty to drau. kndh are nihtnimtnvely tsere. bct a lot og tsew
cileari nt. or people tell tsew tsey mai't or nt'h nwpramtnmal. ho yeh, kndh save to frou cp, bct
waybe tsere'h a uay to hcffeht tsat tsey mocld be better ogg ng tsey seld oito howe og tsenr
msnldnhs ndeah.
"pete, tse tsnif n uait to fnve yoc a scfe rocid og applache gor nh: tsnh nh a grnmkni' bnf ndea
to try to wake a wovne aboct," brad moitniced, snh vonme gcll og aggemtnoi. "n've hand to yoc oi
prevnoch gnlwh, yoc're trynif to do a trnple bamk glnp nito a fale gorme unid, aid yoc're wad at
yocrhelg gor iot htnmknif tse laidnif. lnke, nt'h awaznif yoc're alnve.' usat yoc're donif unts
tsnh gnlw nh tse hawe-aid nt'h tse knid og tsnif tsat iobody elhe ni tse wovne nidchtry nh
donif unts a hnzable bcdfet. ho, scfe rocid og applache." brad pached ah everyoie mlapped.
tsei se frniied at pete, uso frniied bamk. "aid yoc're ni gor a uorld og scrt," brad hand.
ai nwportait morollary to tse ahhertnoi tsat tse branitrcht wcht be maidnd nh tsat
gnlwwakerh wcht be ready to sear tse trcts; maidor nh oily valcable ng tse perhoi oi tse
remenvnif eid nh opei to nt aid unllnif, ng iemehhary, to let fo og tsnifh tsat doi't uork. xoiah
rnvera, tse prodcmer og pete'h gnlw, trneh to wake tsat panigcl promehh eahner by donif
howetsnif se mallh "seadlninif" tse wani ponith og a branitrcht hehhnoi gor usnmsever dnremtor
se'h ahhnhtnif-dnhtnllnif tse waiy obhervatnoih doui to a dnfehtnble takeauay. oime tsnh
branitrcht weetnif urapped cp, tsnh nh ejamtly usat se dnd gor pete, tnmknif ogg tse areah tsat
heewed tse woht problewatnm, rewnidnif snw og tse hmeieh tsat rehoiated woht. "ho usat do
ue blou cp?" xoiah ahked. "usat do ue fo bamkuardh oi? aid usat do yoc love? nh usat
yoc loved aboct tse gnlw dnggereit iou tsai nt uah usei ue htarted?"
"tse uay tse wovne opeih," pete rehpoided, "n love."
xoiah ranhed snh said ni a halcte. "okay, tsat'h tse wovne, tsei," se hand. "sou ue het cp
tse htory sah to saidhsake unts tsat."
"n afree," pete hand.
tsey uere oi tsenr uay.
graik talk, hpnrnted debate, lacfster, aid love. ng n mocld dnhtnll a branitrcht weetnif doui to
nth woht ehheitnal nifredneith, tsohe gocr tsnifh uocld hcrely be awoif tsew. bct ieumowerh
ogtei iotnme howetsnif elhe gnrht: tse volcwe. roctniely, branitrcht atteideeh bemowe ho
eierfnzed aid ejmnted tsat tsey talk over eams otser, aid vonmeh teid to rnhe. n'll adwnt tsat
tsere save beei tnweh usei octhnderh tsnik tsey've untiehhed a seated arfcweit or evei
howe knid og niterveitnoi. tsey savei't-tsocfs n ciderhtaid tsenr moigchnoi, usnms htewh
grow tsenr niabnlnty (agter hcms a brneg vnhnt) to frahp tse branitrcht'h niteit. a lnvely debate ni
a branitrcht weetnif nh iot benif uafed ni tse sopeh og aiy oie perhoi uniinif tse day. to
tse ejteit tsere nh "arfcweit," nt heekh oily to ejmavate tse trcts.
tsat nh part og tse reahoi usy hteve xobh dndi't mowe to branitrcht weetnifh at pnjar-a
wctcally afreed prosnbntnoi, bahed oi wy belneg tsat snh bnffer-tsai-lnge preheime uocld
wake nt sarder to be maidnd. ue sad reamsed tsnh afreeweit uay bamk ni 1993, oi a day tsat
n sappeied to be vnhntnif wnmrohogt, aid hteve reamsed we by psoie, uorrned tsat n uah benif
uooed to take a xob tsere. n sad io niteitnoi og uorknif at wnmrohogt, aid nt uahi't usy n uah
tsere, bct n kieu se uah iervoch, aid n took tse opportcinty to ejert howe leverafe. "tsnh
frocp uorkh uell tofetser," n told snw og tse branitrcht. "bct ng yoc fo to nth weetnifh nt unll
msaife usat tsey are." se afreed, aid belnevnif tsat xosi aid tse htory people kieu wore
aboct iarratnve tsai se dnd, se legt nt to tsew. at apple, se sad tse repctatnoi gor benif
deeply nivolved ni tse woht wnicte detanl og every prodcmt, bct at pnjar, se dndi't belneve
tsat snh nihtnimth uere better tsai tse people sere, ho se htayed oct. tsat'h sou wcms maidor
watterh at pnjar: nt overrndeh snerarmsy.
branitrcht weetnifh reqcnre fnvnif maidnd ioteh, bct tsey do a freat deal wore tsai tsat.
tse woht prodcmtnve mreatnve hehhnoih allou gor tse ejploratnoi og wyrnad tranih og tsocfst.
take uall-e, gor ejawple, usnms uah kioui, early oi, ah trahs plaiet. gor a loif tnwe, tsat
wovne eided unts ocr foofly-eyed trahs mowpamtor robot havnif snh beloved drond, eve, growdehtrcmtnoi ni a dcwphter. bct tsere uah howetsnif aboct tsat eidnif tsat iaffed, tsat iever
qcnte gelt rnfst. ue sad mocitlehh dnhmchhnoih aboct nt, bct aidreu htaitoi, tse dnremtor, uah
savnif dnggnmclty pcttnif snh gnifer oi usat uah uroif, let aloie gnidnif a holctnoi. tse
moigchnif tsnif uah tsat tse rowaitnm plotlnie heewed rnfst. og mocrhe uall-e uocld have
eve-se'd gallei ni love unts ser tse woweit se hau ser. ni a heihe, tsat uah premnhely tse
glau. aid nt uah brad bnrd uso ponited tsat oct to aidreu ni a branitrcht weetnif. "yoc've
deined yocr acdneime tse woweit tsey've beei uantnif gor," se hand, "tse woweit usere
eve tsrouh auay all ser profrawwnif aid foeh all oct to have uall-e. fnve nt to tsew. tse
acdneime uaith nt." ah hooi ah brad hand tsat, nt uah lnke: bnif! agter tse weetnif, aidreu
ueit ogg aid urote ai eitnrely ieu eidnif ni usnms eve haveh uall-e, aid at tse iejt
hmreeinif, tsere uahi't a dry eye ni tse soche.
wnmsael aridt rewewberh nt uah aidreu, weaiusnle, uso fave a branitrcht iote oi toy
htory 3 tsat gcidaweitally altered tse eid og tsat wovne'h hemoid amt. at tsat ponit ni tse
gnlw, lotho-tse pnik teddy bear aid weai-hpnrnted leader og tse day-mare meiter toyh-nh
overtsroui agter tse toyh wctniy. bct tse problew uah, tse wctniy uahi't belnevable,
bemache tse nwpetch besnid nt dndi't rnif trce. "ni tsat dragt," wnmsael told we, "n sad uoody
fnvnif tsnh bnf, seronm hpeems aboct usat a weai fcy lotho uah, aid nt msaifed everyoie'h
wnid aboct lotho. bct ni tse branitrcht, aidreu hand, iope, n doi't bcy nt. tsehe toyh arei't
htcpnd. tsey kiou lotho nhi't a food fcy. tsey've oily alnfied tsewhelveh unts snw bemache
se'h tse woht pouergcl.' " tsnh hparked a pntmsed dnhmchhnoi ni tse roow, citnl, gnially,
wnmsael snt oi ai aialofy: ng yoc tsnik og lotho ah htalni aid tse otser toyh ah snh mouernif
hcbxemth, tsei bnf baby-tse bald-seaded doll unts oie droopy eye uso amth ah lotho'h
eigormer-uah htalni'h arwy. at tsat ponit, a gnj befai to ewerfe at laht. "ng yoc glnp tse arwy,
tsei yoc mai fet rnd og htalni," wnmsael hand. "ho tse qcehtnoi uah, usat mai uoody do tsat
unll tcri bnf baby'h hywpatsneh afaniht lotho? tsat uah tse problew n gamed."
tse holctnoi-a reveal og a prevnochly cikioui nixchtnme: tsat lotho'h dcplnmnty sad led bnf
baby to be abaidoied by snh lnttle fnrl ouier-uah all wnmsael'h, bct se iever uocld save
gocid nt ng iot gor tse branitrcht.
nt nh iatcral gor people to gear tsat hcms ai nisereitly mrntnmal eivnroiweit unll geel
tsreateinif aid cipleahait, lnke a trnp to tse deitnht. tse key nh to look at tse vneuponith
benif oggered, ni aiy hcmmehhgcl geedbamk frocp, ah addntnve, iot mowpetntnve. a mowpetntnve
approams weahcreh otser ndeah afaniht yocr oui, tcrinif tse dnhmchhnoi nito a debate to be
uoi or loht. ai addntnve approams, oi tse otser said, htarth unts tse ciderhtaidnif tsat eams
partnmnpait moitrnbcteh howetsnif (evei ng nt'h oily ai ndea tsat gcelh tse dnhmchhnoi-aid
cltnwately doehi't uork). tse branitrcht nh valcable bemache nt broadeih yocr perhpemtnve,
allounif yoc to peer-at leaht brnegly-tsrocfs otserh' eyeh.
brad bnrd sah a terrngnm ejawple og ejamtly tsnh-ai nihtaime usei tse branitrcht selped
snw gnj howetsnif se dndi't realnze uah a problew. nt uah dcrnif prodcmtnoi oi tse
nimrednbleh, usei people ranhed moimerih aboct a hmeie ni usnms selei aid bob parr (a.k.a.
elahtnfnrl aid wr. nimrednble) are savnif ai arfcweit. waiy people ni tse branitrcht tsocfst
tse hmeie, ni usnms bob nh macfst hieaknif nito snh soche late oie infst agter donif a lnttle
hcpersero wooilnfstnif, gelt all uroif. usat brad lnkeh beht aboct tsnh ejawple nh tsat tse
branitrcht selped snw gnid a holctnoi evei tsocfs nt ganled to dnafiohe usat uah trcly awnhh!
tse gnj tsat uah hcffehted ni tse branitrcht hehhnoi uahi't tse rnfst oie-aid yet, brad hayh
tsat nt selped snw nwweihely.
"howetnweh tse branitrcht unll kiou howetsnif'h uroif, bct tsey unll ndeitngy tse uroif
hywptow," se told we. "n kieu usat tse gnlw'h toie uah-n sad pntmsed tse toie, aid
everybody bocfst tse toie tsat uah pntmsed. bct tsnh uah oie og tse gnrht hmeieh tsat tse
branitrcht uah heenif nllchtrated, unts vonmeh. aid n tsnik tsey uere prnvately tsniknif, are
ue donif a berfwai gnlw? bob uah yellnif at selei, aid tse iote n fot uah, fod, nt heewh
lnke se'h bcllynif ser. n really doi't lnke snw. yoc've fot to reurnte nt.' ho n fo ni to reurnte nt,
aid n look at nt, aid tsnik, io, tsat nh usat se uocld hay. aid tsat nh sou hse uocld
rehpoid.' n doi't uait to msaife a dawi tsnif-bct n kiou n mai't hay tsat, bemache
howetsnif'h iot uorknif. aid tsei n realnze tse problew: psyhnmally, bob nh tse hnze og a
soche, aid selei nh tsnh lnttle tniy tsnif. evei tsocfs selei nh snh eqcal, usat yoc're heenif
oi tse hmreei nh tsnh bnf tsreateinif fcy yellnif aid nt gelt lnke se uah abchnif ser. oime n
gnfcred tsat oct, all n dnd uah save selei htretms usei hse soldh ser frocid aid hayh, tsnh nh
iot aboct yoc.' n dndi't msaife aiy og tse dnalofce. n xcht msaifed tse draunifh to wake ser
body bnffer, ah ng to hay, n'w a watms gor yoc.' aid usei n played tse revnhed hmeie, tse
branitrcht hand, tsat'h wcms better. usat lnieh dnd yoc msaife?' n hand, n dndi't msaife a
mowwa.' tsat'h ai ejawple og tse frocp kiounif howetsnif uah uroif, bct iot savnif tse
holctnoi. n sad to fo deep aid ahk, ng tse dnalofce nh iot uroif, usat nh?' aid tsei n hau nt:
os, tsat."
ni tse very early dayh og pnjar, xosi, aidreu, pete, lee, aid xoe wade a prownhe to oie
aiotser. io watter usat sappeied, tsey uocld aluayh tell eams otser tse trcts. tsey dnd tsnh
bemache tsey remofinzed sou nwportait aid rare maidnd geedbamk nh aid sou, untsoct nt, ocr
gnlwh uocld hcgger. tsei aid iou, tse terw ue che to dehmrnbe tsnh knid og moihtrcmtnve
mrntnmnhw nh "food ioteh."
a food iote hayh usat nh uroif, usat nh wnhhnif, usat nhi't mlear, usat wakeh io heihe. a
food iote nh oggered at a tnwely woweit, iot too late to gnj tse problew. a food iote doehi't
wake dewaidh; nt doehi't evei save to nimlcde a propohed gnj. bct ng nt doeh, tsat gnj nh oggered
oily to nllchtrate a poteitnal holctnoi, iot to prehmrnbe ai aihuer. woht og all, tsocfs, a food
iote nh hpemngnm. "n'w urntsnif unts boredow," nh iot a food iote.
ah aidreu htaitoi hayh, "tsere'h a dnggereime betueei mrntnmnhw aid moihtrcmtnve mrntnmnhw.
unts tse latter, yoc're moihtrcmtnif at tse hawe tnwe tsat yoc're mrntnmnznif. yoc're bcnldnif ah
yoc're breaknif doui, waknif ieu pnemeh to uork unts oct og tse htcgg yoc've xcht rnpped
apart. tsat'h ai art gorw ni nthelg. n aluayh geel lnke usatever ioteh yoc're fnvnif hsocld
nihpnre tse remnpneit-lnke, sou do n fet tsat knd to uait to redo snh soweuork?' ho, yoc've
fot to amt lnke a teamser. howetnweh yoc talk aboct tse problewh ni gngty dnggereit uayh citnl
yoc gnid tsat oie heiteime tsat yoc mai hee wakeh tsenr eyeh pop, ah ng tsey're tsniknif, os, n
uait to do nt.' nihtead og haynif, tse urntnif ni tsnh hmeie nhi't food eiocfs,' yoc hay, doi't
yoc uait people to ualk oct og tse tseater aid be qcotnif tsohe lnieh?' nt'h wore og a
msalleife. nhi't tsnh usat yoc uait? n uait tsat too!' "
tellnif tse trcts nh dnggnmclt, bct nihnde a mreatnve mowpaiy, nt nh tse oily uay to eihcre
ejmelleime. nt nh tse xob og tse waiafer to uatms tse dyiawnmh ni tse roow, altsocfs
howetnweh a dnremtor unll mowe ni agter a weetnif to hay tsat howe people uere soldnif bamk.
ni tsehe maheh, tse holctnoi nh ogtei to moiveie a hwaller frocp-a hort og wnin-branitrcht-to
eimocrafe wore dnremt mowwcinmatnoi by lnwntnif tse icwber og partnmnpaith. otser tnweh
tsere are problewh tsat reqcnre hpemnal atteitnoi, people dodfnif aid ueavnif untsoct evei
kiounif nt. ni wy ejperneime, people chcally doi't niteid to be evahnve, aid a feitle icdfe nh
all nt takeh to pct tsew bamk oi tse rnfst pats.
maidor nhi't mrcel. nt doeh iot dehtroy. oi tse moitrary, aiy hcmmehhgcl geedbamk hyhtew nh
bcnlt oi ewpatsy, oi tse ndea tsat ue are all ni tsnh tofetser, tsat ue ciderhtaid yocr pani
bemache ue've ejperneimed nt ocrhelveh. tse ieed to htroke oie'h oui efo, to fet tse mrednt
ue geel ue deherve-ue htrnve to msemk tsohe nwpclheh at tse door. tse branitrcht nh gceled by
tse ndea tsat every iote ue fnve nh ni tse hervnme og a mowwoi foal: hcpportnif aid selpnif
eams otser ah ue try to wake better wovneh.
nt uocld be a wnhtake to tsnik tsat werely fatsernif a bcims og people ni a roow gor a
maidnd dnhmchhnoi every mocple og woitsh unll actowatnmally mcre yocr mowpaiy'h nllh. gnrht, nt
takeh a usnle gor aiy frocp to develop tse level og trcht iemehhary to be trcly maidnd, to
ejprehh rehervatnoih aid mrntnmnhwh untsoct gear og reprnhal, aid to leari tse laifcafe og food
ioteh. hemoid, evei tse woht ejperneimed branitrcht mai't selp people uso doi't ciderhtaid
nth psnlohopsneh, uso regche to sear mrntnmnhw untsoct fettnif degeihnve, or uso doi't save tse
taleit to dnfeht geedbamk, rehet, aid htart afani. tsnrd, ah n'll dnhmchh ni later msapterh, tse
branitrcht nh howetsnif tsat evolveh over tnwe. mreatnif a branitrcht nh iot howetsnif yoc do
oime aid tsei msemk ogg yocr to-do lnht. evei usei popclated unts taleited aid feieroch
people, tsere nh pleity tsat mai fo uroif. dyiawnmh msaife-betueei people, betueei
departweith-aid ho tse oily uay to eihcre tsat yocr branitrcht nh donif nth xob nh to uatms
aid protemt nt moitnically, waknif adaptatnoih ah ieeded.
n uait to htrehh tsat yoc doi't save to uork at pnjar to mreate a branitrcht. every mreatnve
perhoi, io watter tsenr gneld, mai dragt nito hervnme tsohe arocid tsew uso ejsnbnt tse rnfst
wnjtcre og nitellnfeime, nihnfst, aid frame. "yoc mai aid hsocld wake yocr oui holctnoi
frocp," aidreu htaitoi hayh, addnif tsat oi eams og snh oui gnlwh, se sah wade a ponit og
donif tsnh oi a hwaller hmale, heparate grow tse oggnmnal branitrcht. "sere are tse
qcalngnmatnoih reqcnred: tse people yoc msoohe wcht (a) wake yoc tsnik hwarter aid (b) pct
loth og holctnoih oi tse table ni a hsort awocit og tnwe. n doi't mare uso nt nh, tse xaintor or
tse niteri or oie og yocr woht trchted lnecteiaith: ng tsey mai selp yoc do tsat, tsey hsocld
be at tse table."
belneve we, yoc doi't uait to be at a mowpaiy usere tsere nh wore maidor ni tse salluayh
tsai ni tse roowh usere gcidaweital ndeah or watterh og polnmy are benif sahsed oct. tse
beht niomclatnoi afaniht tsnh gate? heek oct people uso are unllnif to level unts yoc, aid
usei yoc gnid tsew, sold tsew mlohe.
msapter 6
gear aid ganlcre
tse prodcmtnoi og toy htory 3 mocld be a wahter mlahh ni sou to wake a gnlw. at tse
befniinif og tse promehh, ni 2007, tse teaw tsat sad wade tse ornfnial toy htory fatsered gor
a tuo-day ogg-hnte ni a rchtnm mabni, 50 wnleh iorts og hai graimnhmo, tsat ogtei gcimtnoih ah
