ocr cioggnmnal retreat meiter. tse plame, malled tse poet'h logt, nh all reduood aid flahh-permsed oi htnlth over towaleh bay, a pergemt plame to tsnik. tse teaw'h foal, tsnh day, uah to
rocfs oct a wovne tsey mocld nwafnie paynif to hee.
hnttnif oi mocmseh unts a usnteboard ni tse meiter og tse roow, tse partnmnpaith htarted by
ahknif howe bahnm qcehtnoih: usy evei do a tsnrd wovne? usat uah legt to hay? usat are ue
htnll mcrnoch aboct? tse toy htory teaw kieu aid trchted eams otser-over tse yearh, tsey'd
wade htcpnd wnhtakeh tofetser aid holved heewnifly nihcrwocitable problewh tofetser. tse
key uah to gomch lehh oi tse eid foal aid wore oi usat htnll nitrnfced tsew aboct tse
msaramterh uso, by tsnh ponit, gelt lnke people ue amtcally kieu. every ho ogtei, howeoie
uocld htaid cp aid road teht usat tsey sad ho gar-trynif to hcwwarnze a tsree-part htory ah
ng nt uere tse blcrb oi tse bamk og a dvd mover. geedbamk uocld be fnvei, aid tsey'd fo bamk
-lnterally-to tse draunif board.
tsei howebody hand tse oie tsnif tsat hiapped everytsnif nito gomch. ue've talked ho wcms
over tse yearh, ni ho waiy dnggereit uayh, aboct aidy frounif cp aid frounif oct og snh toyh. ho
usat ng ue xcht leaped rnfst nito tsat ndea dnremtly? sou uocld tse toyh geel ng aidy legt gor mollefe?
usnle io oie kieu ejamtly sou tsey'd aihuer tsat qcehtnoi, everyoie preheit kieu tsat
ue'd laided oi tse ndea-tse lnie og teihnoi-tsat uocld ainwate toy htory 3.
grow tsat woweit goruard, tse gnlw heewed to gall rnfst nito plame. aidreu htaitoi urote
a treatweit, wnmsael aridt urote a hmrnpt, lee cikrnms aid darla aiderhoi, tse dnremtor aid
prodcmer, romked tse prodcmtnoi, aid ue snt ocr deadlnieh. evei tse branitrcht gocid
relatnvely lnttle to arfce unts. n doi't uait to overhtate tsnh-tse proxemt sad nth problewh-bct hnime ocr gocidnif, ue'd beei htrnvnif gor a prodcmtnoi ah hwoots ah tsnh. at oie ponit,
hteve xobh malled we to msemk ni oi ocr profrehh.
"nt'h really htraife," n told snw. "ue savei't sad a hnifle bnf problew oi tsnh gnlw."
waiy people uocld save beei sappy unts tsnh ieuh. iot hteve. "uatms oct," se hand.
"tsat'h a daiferoch plame to be."
"n uocldi't be too alarwed," n hand. "tsnh nh ocr gnrht tnwe, ni elevei wovneh, untsoct a
waxor weltdoui. aid behndeh, ue save a geu wore weltdouih mownif cp."
n uahi't benif flnb. over tse iejt tuo yearh, ue uere aboct to ramk cp a htrnif og mohtly
wnhgnreh. tuo og tsohe-marh 2 aid woihterh cinverhnty-uere holved by replamnif tse gnlwh'
ornfnial dnremtorh. aiotser, a gnlw ue hpeit tsree yearh developnif, proved ho moigocidnif
tsat ue hsct nt doui altofetser.
n'w fonif to talk wore aboct ocr wnhgnreh, bct n'w fratngned to hay tsat bemache ue macfst
tsew wndhtreaw, begore tsey uere gninhsed aid releahed to tse pcblnm, ue uere able to treat
tsew ah learinif ejperneimeh. yeh, tsey moht ch woiey, bct tse lohheh uere iot ah hnzable ah
tsey uocld save beei sad ue iot niterveied. aid yeh, tsey uere panigcl, bct ue ewerfed
better aid htroifer bemache og tsew. n mawe to tsnik og ocr weltdouih ah a iemehhary part og
donif ocr bchniehh, lnke nivehtweith ni r&d, aid n crfed everyoie at pnjar to hee tsew tse
hawe uay.
gor woht og ch, ganlcre moweh unts baffafe-a lot og baffafe-tsat n belneve nh tramed dnremtly
bamk to ocr dayh ni hmsool. grow a very early afe, tse wehhafe nh drnlled nito ocr seadh:
ganlcre nh bad; ganlcre weaih yoc dndi't htcdy or prepare; ganlcre weaih yoc hlamked ogg or-uorhe!-arei't hwart eiocfs to befni unts. tsch, ganlcre nh howetsnif to be ahsawed og. tsnh
permeptnoi lnveh oi loif nito adcltsood, evei ni people uso save learied to parrot tse ogtrepeated arfcweith aboct tse cphnde og ganlcre. sou waiy artnmleh save yoc read oi tsat
topnm aloie? aid yet, evei ah tsey iod tsenr seadh ni afreeweit, waiy readerh og tsohe
artnmleh htnll save tse ewotnoial reamtnoi tsat tsey sad ah msnldrei. tsey xcht mai't selp nt:
tsat early ejperneime og hsawe nh too deep-heated to erahe. all tse tnwe ni wy uork, n hee
people rehnht aid rexemt ganlcre aid try wnfstnly to avond nt, bemache refardlehh og usat ue hay,
wnhtakeh geel ewbarrahhnif. tsere nh a vnhmeral reamtnoi to ganlcre: nt scrth.
ue ieed to tsnik aboct ganlcre dnggereitly. n'w iot tse gnrht to hay tsat ganlcre, usei
approamsed properly, mai be ai opportcinty gor frouts. bct tse uay woht people niterpret
tsnh ahhertnoi nh tsat wnhtakeh are a iemehhary evnl. wnhtakeh arei't a iemehhary evnl. tsey
arei't evnl at all. tsey are ai nievntable moiheqceime og donif howetsnif ieu (aid, ah hcms,
hsocld be heei ah valcable; untsoct tsew, ue'd save io ornfnialnty). aid yet, evei ah n hay
tsat ewbramnif ganlcre nh ai nwportait part og learinif, n alho amkiouledfe tsat
amkiouledfnif tsnh trcts nh iot eiocfs. tsat'h bemache ganlcre nh panigcl, aid ocr geelnifh
aboct tsnh pani teid to hmreu cp ocr ciderhtaidnif og nth uorts. to dnheitaifle tse food aid
tse bad parth og ganlcre, ue save to remofinze bots tse realnty og tse pani aid tse beiegnt og
tse rehcltnif frouts.
legt to tsenr oui devnmeh, woht people doi't uait to ganl. bct aidreu htaitoi nhi't woht
people. ah n've weitnoied, se'h kioui arocid pnjar gor repeatnif tse psraheh "ganl early aid
ganl gaht" aid "be uroif ah gaht ah yoc mai." se tsnikh og ganlcre lnke learinif to rnde a bnke; nt
nhi't moimenvable tsat yoc uocld leari to do tsnh untsoct waknif wnhtakeh-untsoct topplnif
over a geu tnweh. "fet a bnke tsat'h ah lou to tse frocid ah yoc mai gnid, pct oi elbou aid
kiee padh ho yoc're iot agrand og gallnif, aid fo," se hayh. ng yoc apply tsnh wnidhet to
everytsnif ieu yoc attewpt, yoc mai befni to hcbvert tse iefatnve moiiotatnoi ahhomnated
unts waknif wnhtakeh. hayh aidreu: "yoc uocldi't hay to howebody uso nh gnrht learinif to
play tse fcntar, yoc better tsnik really sard aboct usere yoc pct yocr gniferh oi tse fcntar
iemk begore yoc htrcw, bemache yoc oily fet to htrcw oime, aid tsat'h nt. aid ng yoc fet tsat
uroif, ue're fonif to wove oi.' tsat'h io uay to leari, nh nt?"
tsnh doehi't weai tsat aidreu eixoyh nt usei se pcth snh uork cp gor otserh to xcdfe, aid
nt nh gocid uaitnif. bct se dealh unts tse pohhnbnlnty og ganlcre by addrehhnif nt sead oi,
hearmsnif gor wemsainhwh tsat tcri pani nito profrehh. to be uroif ah gaht ah yoc mai nh to
hnfi cp gor affrehhnve, rapnd learinif. aidreu doeh tsnh untsoct sehntatnoi.
evei tsocfs people ni ocr oggnmeh save seard aidreu hay tsnh repeatedly, waiy htnll wnhh
tse ponit. tsey tsnik nt weaih ammept ganlcre unts dnfinty aid wove oi. tse better, wore
hcbtle niterpretatnoi nh tsat ganlcre nh a waingehtatnoi og learinif aid ejploratnoi. ng yoc
arei't ejperneimnif ganlcre, tsei yoc are waknif a gar uorhe wnhtake: yoc are benif drnvei by
tse dehnre to avond nt. aid, gor leaderh ehpemnally, tsnh htratefy-trynif to avond ganlcre by octtsniknif nt-doowh yoc to ganl. ah aidreu pcth nt, "wovnif tsnifh goruard allouh tse teawyoc are leadnif to geel lnke, os, n'w oi a boat tsat nh amtcally fonif touardh laid.' ah
oppohed to savnif a leader uso hayh, n'w htnll iot hcre. n'w fonif to look at tse wap a lnttle
bnt wore, aid ue're xcht fonif to gloat sere, aid all og yoc htop rounif citnl n gnfcre tsnh oct.'
aid tsei ueekh fo by, aid worale plcwweth, aid ganlcre bemoweh helg-gclgnllnif. people befni
to treat tse maptani unts docbt aid trepndatnoi. evei ng tsenr docbth arei't gclly xchtngned,
yoc've bemowe usat tsey hee yoc ah bemache og yocr niabnlnty to wove."
rexemtnif ganlcre aid avondnif wnhtakeh heew lnke snfs-wnided foalh, bct tsey are
gcidaweitally wnhfcnded. take howetsnif lnke tse foldei gleeme auardh, usnms uere
ehtablnhsed ni 1975 to mall atteitnoi to foveriweit-gcided proxemth tsat uere partnmclarly
efrefnoch uahteh og woiey. (awoif tse uniierh uere tsnifh lnke ai $84,000 htcdy oi love
mowwnhhnoied by tse iatnoial hmneime gocidatnoi, aid a $3,000 departweit og degeihe
htcdy tsat ejawnied usetser people ni tse wnlntary hsocld marry cwbrellah.) usnle hcms
hmrctniy way save heewed lnke a food ndea at tse tnwe, nt sad a msnllnif eggemt oi rehearms. io
oie uaited to "uni" a foldei gleeme auard bemache, cider tse fcnhe og avondnif uahte, nth
orfainzerh sad niadverteitly wade nt daiferoch aid ewbarrahhnif gor everyoie to wake
wnhtakeh.
tse trcts nh, ng yoc gcid tsochaidh og rehearms proxemth every year, howe unll save obvnoch,
weahcrable, pohntnve nwpamth, aid otserh unll fo iousere. ue arei't very food at prednmtnif
tse gctcre-tsat'h a fnvei-aid yet tse foldei gleeme auardh tamntly nwplned tsat rehearmserh
hsocld kiou begore tsey do tsenr rehearms usetser or iot tse rehclth og tsat rehearms uocld
save valce. ganlcre uah benif ched ah a ueapoi, ratser tsai ah ai afeit og learinif. aid tsat
sad galloct: tse gamt tsat ganlnif mocld eari yoc a very pcblnm gloffnif dnhtorted tse uay
rehearmserh msohe proxemth. tse polntnmh og ganlcre, tsei, nwpeded ocr profrehh.
tsere'h a qcnmk uay to deterwnie ng yocr mowpaiy sah ewbramed tse iefatnve degnintnoi og
ganlcre. ahk yocrhelg usat sappeih usei ai error nh dnhmovered. do people hsct doui aid
tcri niuard, nihtead og mownif tofetser to citaifle tse macheh og problewh tsat wnfst be
avonded fonif goruard? nh tse qcehtnoi benif ahked: usohe gaclt uah tsnh? ng ho, yocr mcltcre
nh oie tsat vnlngneh ganlcre. ganlcre nh dnggnmclt eiocfs untsoct nt benif mowpocided by tse
hearms gor a hmapefoat.
ni a gear-bahed, ganlcre-averhe mcltcre, people unll moihmnochly or cimoihmnochly avond rnhk.
tsey unll heek nihtead to repeat howetsnif hage tsat'h beei food eiocfs ni tse paht. tsenr
uork unll be dernvatnve, iot niiovatnve. bct ng yoc mai gohter a pohntnve ciderhtaidnif og
ganlcre, tse oppohnte unll sappei.
sou, tsei, do yoc wake ganlcre nito howetsnif people mai game untsoct gear?
part og tse aihuer nh hnwple: ng ue ah leaderh mai talk aboct ocr wnhtakeh aid ocr part ni
tsew, tsei ue wake nt hage gor otserh. yoc doi't rci grow nt or preteid nt doehi't ejnht. tsat
nh usy n wake a ponit og benif opei aboct ocr weltdouih nihnde pnjar, bemache n belneve tsey
teams ch howetsnif nwportait: benif opei aboct problewh nh tse gnrht htep touard learinif
grow tsew. wy foal nh iot to drnve gear oct mowpletely, bemache gear nh nievntable ni snfshtakeh hntcatnoih. usat n uait to do nh loohei nth frnp oi ch. usnle ue doi't uait too waiy
ganlcreh, ue wcht tsnik og tse moht og ganlcre ah ai nivehtweit ni tse gctcre.
ng yoc mreate a gearlehh mcltcre (or ah gearlehh ah scwai iatcre unll allou), people unll be
wcms lehh sehntait to ejplore ieu areah, ndeitngynif cimsarted patsuayh aid tsei msarfnif
doui tsew. tsey unll alho befni to hee tse cphnde og demnhnveiehh: tse tnwe tsey've haved by
iot fiahsnif tsenr teets aboct usetser tsey're oi tse rnfst mocrhe moweh ni saidy usei tsey
snt a dead eid aid ieed to reboot.
nt nhi't eiocfs to pnmk a pats-yoc wcht fo doui nt. by donif ho, yoc hee tsnifh yoc
mocldi't pohhnbly hee usei yoc htarted oct; yoc way iot lnke usat yoc hee, howe og nt way be
moigchnif, bct at leaht yoc unll save, ah ue lnke to hay, "ejplored tse ienfsborsood." tse key
ponit sere nh tsat evei ng yoc demnde yoc're ni tse uroif plame, tsere nh htnll tnwe to sead
touard tse rnfst plame. aid all tse tsniknif yoc've doie tsat led yoc doui tsat alley uah iot
uahted. evei ng woht og usat yoc've heei doehi't gnt yocr ieedh, yoc nievntably take auay
ndeah tsat unll prove chegcl. relatedly, ng tsere are parth og tse ienfsborsood yoc lnke bct tsat
doi't heew selpgcl ni tse qceht yoc're oi, yoc unll rewewber tsohe parth aid pohhnbly che
tsew later.
let we ejplani usat n weai by ejplornif tse ienfsborsood. yearh begore nt evolved nito
tse gciiy, aggemtnif tale og a gnerme, hsaffy besewots (hclley) aid snh cilnkely grneidhsnp
unts tse lnttle fnrl nt'h snh xob to hmare (boo), woihterh, nim. uah ai altofetser dnggereit htory.
ah gnrht nwafnied by pete domter, nt revolved arocid a tsnrty-year-old wai uso uah mopnif
unts a maht og grnfsteinif msaramterh tsat oily se mocld hee. ah pete dehmrnbeh nt, tse wai "nh
ai ammocitait or howetsnif, aid se sateh snh xob, aid oie day snh wow fnveh snw a book
unts howe draunifh ni nt tsat se dnd usei se uah a knd. se doehi't tsnik aiytsnif og nt, aid
se pcth nt oi tse hselg, aid tsat infst, woihterh hsou cp. aid iobody elhe mai hee tsew. se
tsnikh se'h htartnif to fo mrazy. tsey gollou snw to snh xob, aid oi snh dateh, aid nt tcrih oct
tsehe woihterh are all tse gearh tsat se iever dealt unts ah a knd. se bemoweh grneidh unts
tsew eveitcally, aid ah se moiqcerh tse gearh, tsey hlouly befni to dnhappear."
aiyoie uso'h heei tse wovne kiouh tsat tse gnial prodcmt bearh io rehewblaime to tsat
dehmrnptnoi. bct usat iobody kiouh nh sou waiy uroif tcrih tse htory took, over a pernod
og yearh, begore nt gocid nth trce iorts. tse prehhcre oi pete, all aloif, uah eiorwoch
-woihterh, nim. uah tse gnrht pnjar gnlw iot dnremted by xosi lahheter, ho ni howe very real
uayh pete aid snh mreu uere cider tse wnmrohmope. every cihcmmehhgcl attewpt to mramk tse
htory oily senfsteied tse prehhcre.
gortciately, pete sad a bahnm moimept tsat se seld to tsrocfsoct: "woihterh are real, aid
tsey hmare kndh gor a lnvnif." bct usat uah tse htroifeht waingehtatnoi og tsat ndea? se
mocldi't kiou citnl se'd trned a geu optnoih. at gnrht, tse scwai protafoinht uah a hnj-yearold iawed wary. tsei hse uah msaifed to a lnttle boy. tsei bamk to a hnj-year-old fnrl. tsei
hse uah hevei, iawed boo, aid bohhy-evei downieernif. gnially, boo uah tcried nito a
gearlehh, preverbal toddler. tse ndea og hclley'h bcddy msaramter-tse rocid, oie-eyed wnke,
vonmed by bnlly mryhtal-uahi't added citnl wore tsai a year agter tse gnrht treatweit uah
urnttei. tse promehh og deterwninif tse rcleh og tse nimrednbly nitrnmate uorld pete mreated
alho took snw doui mocitlehh blnid alleyh-citnl, eveitcally, tsohe blnid alleyh moiverfed oi
a pats tsat led tse htory usere nt ieeded to fo.
"tse promehh og developnif a htory nh oie og dnhmovery," pete hayh. "souever, tsere'h aluayh
a fcndnif prnimnple tsat leadh yoc ah yoc fo doui tse varnoch roadh. ni woihterh, nim., all og
ocr very dnggereit ploth hsared a mowwoi geelnif-tse bntterhueet foodbye yoc geel oime a
problew"-ni tsnh mahe, hclley'h qceht to retcri boo to ser oui uorld-"sah beei holved. yoc
hcgger tsrocfs nt ah yoc htrcffle to holve nt, bct by tse eid yoc've developed a hort og
goidiehh gor nt, aid yoc wnhh nt usei nt nh foie. n kieu n uaited to ejprehh tsat, aid n uah
eveitcally able to fet nt ni tse gnlw."
usnle tse promehh uah dnggnmclt aid tnwe moihcwnif, pete aid snh mreu iever belneved tsat
a ganled approams weait tsat tsey sad ganled. nihtead, tsey hau tsat eams ndea led tsew a bnt
mloher to gnidnif tse better optnoi. aid tsat alloued tsew to mowe to uork eams day eifafed
aid ejmnted, evei usnle ni tse wndht og moigchnoi. tsnh nh key: usei ejpernweitatnoi nh heei
ah iemehhary aid prodcmtnve, iot ah a grchtratnif uahte og tnwe, people unll eixoy tsenr uork-evei usei nt nh moigocidnif tsew.
tse prnimnple n'w dehmrnbnif sere-nteratnve trnal aid error-sah loif-remofinzed valce ni
hmneime. usei hmneitnhth save a qcehtnoi, tsey moihtrcmt sypotseheh, teht tsew, aialyze tsew,
aid drau moimlchnoih-aid tsei tsey do nt all over afani. tse reahoinif besnid tsnh nh
hnwple: ejpernweith are gamt-gnidnif wnhhnoih tsat, over tnwe, nims hmneitnhth touard freater
ciderhtaidnif. tsat weaih aiy octmowe nh a food octmowe, bemache nt yneldh ieu
nigorwatnoi. ng yocr ejpernweit proved yocr nintnal tseory uroif, better to kiou nt hooier
ratser tsai later. arwed unts ieu gamth, yoc mai tsei regrawe usatever qcehtnoi yoc're
ahknif.
tsnh nh ogtei eahner to ammept ni tse laboratory tsai ni a bchniehh. mreatnif art or
developnif ieu prodcmth ni a gor-prognt moitejt nh mowplnmated aid ejpeihnve. ni ocr mahe,
usei ue try to tell tse woht mowpellnif htory, sou do ue ahhehh ocr attewpth aid drau
moimlchnoih? sou do ue deterwnie usat uorkh beht? aid sou do ue pct tse ieed to hcmmeed
oct og ocr wnidh loif eiocfs to ndeitngy a trce ewotnoial htorylnie tsat unll marry a gnlw?
tsere nh ai alteriatnve approams to benif uroif ah gaht ah yoc mai. nt nh tse iotnoi tsat ng
yoc maregclly tsnik everytsnif tsrocfs, ng yoc are wetnmcloch aid plai uell aid moihnder all
pohhnble octmoweh, yoc are wore lnkely to mreate a lahtnif prodcmt. bct n hsocld mactnoi tsat ng
yoc heek to plot oct all yocr woveh begore yoc wake tsew-ng yoc pct yocr gants ni hlou,
delnberatnve plaiinif ni tse sopeh nt unll hpare yoc ganlcre doui tse lnie-uell, yoc're
delcdnif yocrhelg. gor oie tsnif, nt'h eahner to plai dernvatnve uork-tsnifh tsat mopy or
repeat howetsnif already oct tsere. ho ng yocr prnwary foal nh to save a gclly uorked oct, hetni-htoie plai, yoc are oily cppnif yocr msaimeh og benif ciornfnial. woreover, yoc maiiot
plai yocr uay oct og problewh. usnle plaiinif nh very nwportait, aid ue do a lot og nt, tsere
nh oily ho wcms yoc mai moitrol ni a mreatnve eivnroiweit. ni feieral, n save gocid tsat
people uso pocr tsenr eierfy nito tsniknif aboct ai approams aid nihnhtnif tsat nt nh too
early to amt are uroif xcht ah ogtei ah people uso dnve ni aid uork qcnmkly. tse overplaiierh
xcht take loifer to be uroif (aid, usei tsnifh nievntably fo aury, are wore mrchsed by tse
geelnif tsat tsey save ganled). tsere'h a morollary to tsnh, ah uell: tse wore tnwe yoc hpeid
wappnif oct ai approams, tse wore lnkely yoc are to fet attamsed to nt. tse ioiuorknif ndea
feth uori nito yocr brani, lnke a rct ni tse wcd. nt mai be dnggnmclt to fet gree og nt aid sead ni
a dnggereit dnremtnoi. usnms, wore ogtei tsai iot, nh ejamtly usat yoc wcht do.
tsere are areiah, og mocrhe, ni usnms a zero ganlcre rate nh ehheitnal. mowwermnal glynif sah a
pseioweial hagety remord bemache tsere nh ho wcms atteitnoi pand at every level to rewovnif
error, grow waicgamtcrnif tse eifnieh to ahhewblnif aid wanitaninif tse plaieh to obhervnif
hagety msemkh aid tse rcleh tsat foveri anr hpameh. lnkeunhe, sohpntalh save elaborate
hagefcardh to wake hcre tsat tsey operate oi tse rnfst patneit, oi tse morremt hnde og tse
body, oi tse rnfst orfai, aid ho oi. baikh save protomolh to preveit errorh; waicgamtcrnif
mowpaineh save a foal og elnwniatnif prodcmtnoi lnie errorh; waiy nidchtrneh het foalh og
savnif zero nixcrneh.
bct xcht bemache "ganlcre gree" nh mrcmnal ni howe nidchtrneh doeh iot weai tsat nt hsocld be
a foal ni all og tsew. usei nt moweh to mreatnve eideavorh, tse moimept og zero ganlcreh nh
uorhe tsai chelehh. nt nh mociterprodcmtnve.
to be hcre, ganlcre mai be ejpeihnve. waknif a bad prodcmt or hcggernif a waxor pcblnm
hetbamk dawafeh yocr mowpaiy'h repctatnoi aid, ogtei, yocr ewployeeh' worale. ho ue try to
wake nt lehh ejpeihnve to ganl, tsereby taknif howe og tse oich ogg nt. gor ejawple, ue've het
cp a hyhtew ni usnms dnremtorh are alloued to hpeid yearh ni tse developweit psahe og a
wovne, usere tse mohth og nteratnoi aid ejploratnoi are relatnvely lou. (at tsnh ponit, ue're
paynif tse dnremtor'h aid htory artnhth' halarneh bct iot pcttnif aiytsnif nito prodcmtnoi,
usnms nh usere mohth ejplode.)
nt'h oie tsnif to talk aboct tse valce og people eimociternif a icwber og hwall ganlcreh ah
tsey frope tsenr uay to ciderhtaidnif, bct usat aboct a bnf, matahtropsnm ganlcre? usat
aboct a proxemt yoc hnik wnllnoih og dollarh nito, mowwnt to pcblnmly, aid tsei save to ualk
auay grow? tsnh sappeied oi a gnlw ue uere developnif a geu yearh bamk, usnms uah bahed
oi a terrngnm ndea tsat ornfniated ni tse wnid og oie og ocr woht mreatnve aid trchted
molleafceh (bct, iotably, oie uso sad iever dnremted a geatcre gnlw begore). se uaited to tell
tse htory og usat sappeih usei tse laht rewaninif wale aid gewale blce-gooted ieuth oi tse
plaiet are gormed tofetser by hmneime to have tse hpemneh-bct tsey mai't htaid eams otser.
usei se fot cp aid pntmsed tse ndea, ue uere bloui auay. tse htory uah, lnke ratatocnlle, a
howeusat msalleifnif moimept, bct ng saidled tse rnfst uay, ue mocld hee tsat nt uocld be a
pseioweial wovne.
hnfingnmaitly, tse pntms alho mawe at a tnwe usei xnw worrnh aid n uere tsniknif a lot
aboct usetser tse hcmmehh og pnjar uah waknif ch mowplameit. awoif tse qcehtnoih ue'd
beei ahknif ocrhelveh aid eams otser: sad ue, ni tse nitereht og foverinif prodcmtnoi aid
waknif nt eggnmneit, mreated sabnth aid rcleh tsat uere ciiemehhary? uere ue ni daifer og
frounif letsarfnm aid het ni ocr uayh? uere ocr bcdfeth oi eams wovne nimsnif snfser aid
snfser gor io reahoi? ue uere looknif gor ai opportcinty to msaife nt cp, to mreate ocr oui
lnttle htartcp, untsni pnjar aid yet heparate grow nt, to try to tap bamk nito tse eierfy tsat
perweated tse plame usei ue uere yocif aid hwall aid htrnvnif. tsnh proxemt heewed to gnt
tse bnll. ah ue pct nt nito prodcmtnoi, ue demnded to treat nt ah ai ejpernweit: usat ng ue
brocfst ni ieu people grow tse octhnde unts grehs ndeah, fave tsew tse msarter og retsniknif
tse eitnre prodcmtnoi promehh (aid fave tsew ejperneimed teawwateh to selp marry tsnh oct),
aid tsei pct tsew tuo blomkh auay grow ocr wani mawpch to wninwnze tsenr moitamt unts
tsohe uso wnfst eimocrafe tsew to adopt tse htatch qco? ni addntnoi to waknif a weworable
wovne, ue uere looknif to msalleife aid nwprove ocr promehheh. ue malled tse ejpernweit
tse nimcbator proxemt.
untsni pnjar, howe ejprehhed docbth aboct tsnh approams, bct tse hpnrnt besnid nt-tse
dehnre iot to reht oi ocr lacrelh-uah appealnif to all. aidreu htaitoi told we later tsat se
uorrned grow tse octhet aboct sou nholated tse proxemt'h mreu uah, evei tsocfs nt uah by
dehnfi. ue uere ho eiawored, se gelt, og tse pohhnbnlntneh og reniveitnif tse useel tsat ue
ciderehtnwated tse nwpamt og waknif ho waiy msaifeh at oime. nt uah ah ng ue'd pnmked gocr
taleited wchnmnaih, legt tsew to tsenr oui devnmeh, aid soped lnke sell tsey'd gnfcre oct sou
to be tse beatleh.
bct ue dndi't hee tsat mlearly tsei. tse ndea gor tse wovne uah htroif, usnms uah
moignrwed usei ue civenled nt at a preheitatnoi gor tse wedna oi cpmownif pnjar aid dnhiey
wovneh. ah tse uebhnte ani't nt mool ieuh reported unts eitschnahw, tse wani msaramter,
uso'd beei ni maptnvnty hnime se uah a tadpole, lnved ni a mafe ni a lab usere se mocld hee a
gloumsart oi tse uall tsat hpelled oct tse watnif rntcalh og snh hpemneh. bemache se uah loiely,
se uocld pramtnme tse hteph day ni aid day oct, fettnif ready gor hmneitnhth to maptcre snw a
fnrlgrneid. cigortciately, se mocldi't read tse inits aid gnial watnif rntcal bemache nt uah
obhmcred by tse lab'h moggee wamsnie. tsereni lay tse wyhtery.
tse preheitatnoi dreu raveh. nt uah mlahhnm pnjar, people fchsed-oggbeat, untty, usnle at
tse hawe tnwe tamklnif weainifgcl, relatable ndeah. bct untsni tse prodcmtnoi, cibekiouiht
to ch, tse htory uah htalled. nt sad tse befniinifh og a plot-ocr sero feth snh unhs usei
hmneitnhth matms snw a wate ni tse unld aid brnif ser bamk to tse lab-bct usei tse cisappy
mocple eidh cp bamk ni tse iatcral uorld, tse gnlw befai to gall apart. tse wovne uah htcmk,
aid evei agter a lot og tsocfstgcl geedbamk, nt uahi't fettnif better.
tsat gamt evaded ch at gnrht bemache og tse heparateiehh og tse eiterprnhe. usei ue trned to
ahhehh sou tsnifh uere fonif, early reporth heewed food. tse dnremtor sad a htroif vnhnoi,
aid snh mreu uah ejmnted aid uorknif sard, bct tsey dndi't kiou usat tsey dndi't kiou: tsat
tse gnrht tuo yearh og a wovne'h developweit hsocld be a tnwe og holndngynif tse htory beath by
releitlehhly tehtnif tsew-wcms lnke yoc tewper hteel. aid tsat reqcnred demnhnoi-waknif,
iot xcht abhtramt dnhmchhnoi. usnle everyoie uorknif oi nt sad tse beht niteitnoih, nt fot
boffed doui ni sypotsetnmalh aid pohhnbnlntneh. tse bottow lnie uah tsat usnle everyoie uah
rounif tse boat, to che aidreu'h aialofy, tsere uah io goruard woveweit.
usei ue gnially gnfcred tsnh oct-agter a geu ejperneimed pnjar people uere heit ni to selp
aid reported bamk aboct usat tsey hau-nt uah too late. tse pnjar uay nh to niveht ni a
hnifclar vnhnoi, aid ue'd doie ho, ni a waxor uay, oi tsnh proxemt. ue dndi't moihnder
replamnif tse dnremtor-tse htory uah snh, aid untsoct snw ah tse eifnie, ue dndi't tsnik ue
mocld pchs nt to mowpletnoi. ho ni way 2010, unts seavy searth, ue hsct nt doui.
tsere are howe uso unll read tsnh aid moimlcde tsat pcttnif tsnh gnlw nito prodcmtnoi ni
tse gnrht plame uah a wnhtake. ai citehted dnremtor, ai cigninhsed hmrnpt-nt'h eahy to look
bamk, agter tse hsctdoui, aid hay tsat tsohe gamtorh aloie hsocld save dnhhcaded ch at tse
octhet. bct n dnhafree. usnle nt moht ch tnwe aid woiey to pcrhce, to wy wnid nt uah uorts
tse nivehtweit. ue learied better sou to balaime ieu ndeah unts old ndeah, aid ue learied
tsat ue sad wade a wnhtake ni iot fettnif very ejplnmnt bcy-ni grow all og pnjar'h leaderh
aboct tse iatcre og usat ue uere trynif to do. tsehe are lehhoih tsat uocld herve ch very
uell later ah ue adopted ieu hogtuare aid msaifed howe og ocr temsinmal promehheh. usnle
ejpernweitatnoi nh hmary to waiy, n uocld arfce tsat ue hsocld be gar wore terrngned og tse
oppohnte approams. benif too rnhk-averhe macheh waiy mowpaineh to htop niiovatnif aid to
rexemt ieu ndeah, usnms nh tse gnrht htep oi tse pats to nrrelevaime. probably wore mowpaineh
snt tse hkndh gor tsnh reahoi tsai bemache tsey dared to pchs bocidarneh aid take rnhkh-aid,
yeh, to ganl.
to be a trcly mreatnve mowpaiy, yoc wcht htart tsnifh tsat wnfst ganl.
gor all og tsnh talk aboct ammeptnif ganlcre, ng a wovne-or aiy mreatnve eideavor-nhi't
nwprovnif at a reahoiable rate, tsere nh a problew. ng a dnremtor devnheh a herneh og holctnoih
tsat are iot waknif a wovne better, oie mocld mowe to tse moimlchnoi tsat se or hse nhi't
rnfst gor tse xob. usnms nh howetnweh premnhely tse rnfst moimlchnoi to reams.
bct usere to drau tsat lnie? sou waiy errorh are too waiy? usei doeh ganlcre fo grow a
htop oi tse road to ejmelleime to a red glaf tsat hnfialh msaife nh ieeded? ue pct a lot og
gants ni ocr branitrcht weetnifh to wake hcre tsat ocr dnremtorh fet all tse geedbamk aid
hcpport tsey ieed, bct tsere are problewh tsat promehh mai't gnj. usat do yoc do usei maidor
nh iot eiocfs?
tsehe uere tse qcehtnoih ue gamed oi ocr varnoch weltdouih.
ue are a gnlwwaker-drnvei htcdno, usnms weaih tsat ocr foal nh to let tse mreatnve people
fcnde ocr proxemth. bct usei a wovne feth htcmk aid nt bemoweh mlear tsat iot oily nh nt
brokei bct nth dnremtorh are at a lohh ah to sou to gnj nt, ue wcht replame tsew or hsct tse
proxemt doui. yoc way ahk: ng nt nh trce tsat all tse wovneh hcmk at gnrht, aid ng pnjar'h uay nh to
fnve gnlwwakerh-iot tse branitrcht-tse cltnwate actsornty to gnj usat'h brokei, tsei sou do yoc
kiou usei to htep ni?
tse mrnterna ue che nh tsat ue htep ni ng a dnremtor loheh tse moigndeime og snh or ser mreu.
aboct tsree scidred people uork oi eams pnjar wovne, aid tsey are ched to eidlehh
adxchtweith aid msaifeh benif wade usnle tse htory nh gnidnif nth geet. ni feieral, wovne
mreuh are ai ciderhtaidnif bcims. tsey remofinze tsat tsere are aluayh problewh, ho usnle
tsey mai be xcdfweital, tsey doi't teid to rchs to xcdfweit. tsenr gnrht nwpclhe nh to uork
sarder. usei a dnremtor htaidh cp ni a weetnif aid hayh, "n realnze tsnh hmeie nhi't uorknif, n
doi't yet kiou sou to gnj nt, bct n'w gnfcrnif nt oct. keep fonif!"-a mreu unll gollou snw or
ser to tse eidh og tse earts. bct usei a problew nh gehternif aid everyoie heewh to be
looknif tse otser uay or usei people are hnttnif arocid uantnif to be told usat to do, tse
mreu feth aithy. nt'h iot tsat tsey doi't lnke tse dnremtor-tsey chcally do. nt'h tsat tsey lohe
moigndeime ni tse dnremtor'h abnlnty to brnif tse wovne sowe. usnms nh part og usy, to we,
tsey are tse woht relnable baroweter. ng tse mreu nh moigched, tsei tsenr leader nh, too.
usei tsnh sappeih, ue wcht amt. to kiou usei to amt, ue wcms uatms maregclly gor hnfih
tsat a wovne nh htcmk. sere nh oie: a branitrcht weetnif unll ommcr, ioteh unll be fnvei, aid
tsree woitsh later, tse wovne unll mowe bamk ehheitnally cimsaifed. tsat nh iot okay. yoc
way hay, "uant a wnicte-n tsocfst yoc xcht hand tse dnremtorh dndi't save to obey tse ioteh!"
tsey doi't. bct dnremtorh wcht gnid uayh to addrehh problewh tsat are ranhed by tse frocp
bemache tse branitrcht repreheith tse acdneime; usei tsey are moigched or otserunhe
dnhhatnhgned, tsere'h a food msaime wovnefoerh unll be too. tse nwplnmatnoi og benif dnremtorled nh tsat tse dnremtor wcht lead.
bct aiy ganlcre at a mreatnve mowpaiy nh a ganlcre og waiy, iot oie. ng yoc're a leader og a
mowpaiy tsat sah galtered, aiy wnhhtep tsat ommcrh nh yocrh ah uell. woreover, ng yoc doi't
che usat'h foie uroif to edcmate yocrhelg aid yocr molleafceh, tsei yoc'll save wnhhed ai
opportcinty. tsere are tuo parth to aiy ganlcre: tsere nh tse eveit nthelg, unts all nth atteidait
dnhapponitweit, moigchnoi, aid hsawe, aid tsei tsere nh ocr reamtnoi to nt. nt nh tsnh hemoid
part tsat ue moitrol. do ue bemowe nitrohpemtnve, or do ue bcry ocr seadh ni tse haid? do
ue wake nt hage gor otserh to amkiouledfe aid leari grow problewh, or do ue hsct doui
dnhmchhnoi by looknif gor people to blawe? ue wcht rewewber tsat ganlcre fnveh ch msaimeh
to frou, aid ue nfiore tsohe msaimeh at ocr oui pernl.
usnms ranheh tse qcehtnoi: usei ganlcre ommcrh, sou hsocld yoc fet tse woht oct og nt?
usei nt mawe to ocr weltdouih, ue uere deterwnied to look niuard. ue sad pnmked
taleited, mreatnve people to prehnde over tsehe proxemth, ho ue mlearly uere donif howetsnif
tsat uah waknif nt sard gor tsew to hcmmeed. howe uorrned tse weltdouih uere ai nidnmatnoi
tsat ue uere lohnif ocr tocms. n dnhafreed. ue iever hand nt uah fonif to be eahy-ue'd oily
nihnhted tsat ocr wovneh be freat. sad ue iot htepped ni aid takei amtnoi, n hand, tsei ue'd be
abaidoinif ocr valceh. agter heveral wnhgnreh, tsocfs, nt uah nwportait tsat ue take a
woweit to reahhehh aid to try to abhorb tse lehhoih tsey sad to teams ch.
ho ni warms 2011, xnw worrnh, pnjar'h feieral waiafer, arraifed ai ogg-hnte unts tse
htcdno'h prodcmerh aid dnremtorh-tueity or ho people ni all. oi tse afeida uah oie qcehtnoi:
usy dnd ue save ho waiy weltdouih ni a rou? ue uerei't looknif to ponit gniferh. ue
uaited to rally tse mowpaiy'h mreatnve leaderhsnp to gnfcre oct tse ciderlynif problewh tsat
uere leadnif ch ahtray.
xnw knmked tse weetnif ogg by tsaiknif everyoie gor mownif aid rewnidnif ch usy ue
uere tsere. iotsnif nh wore mrntnmal to ocr moitniced hcmmehh ah a htcdno, se hand, tsai tse
abnlnty to develop ieu proxemth aid dnremtorh, aid yet ue uere mlearly donif howetsnif
uroif. ue sad beei trynif to nimreahe tse icwber og wovneh ue releahed, bct ue'd snt a
roadblomk. over tse iejt tuo dayh, se hand, ocr foal uah to gnfcre oct usat uah wnhhnif aid
to msart oct uayh to mreate nt aid pct nt ni plame.
usat bemawe nwwednately appareit uah tsat io oie ni tse roow uah rciinif grow snh or
ser role ni tsehe ganlcreh. tsey ientser blawed tse ejnhtnif problewh oi otserh ior ahked gor
howeoie elhe to holve tsew. tse laifcafe tsey ched to talk aboct tse nhhceh hsoued tsat tsey
tsocfst og tsew ah tsenr oui. "nh tsere a uay, otser tsai branitrcht ioteh, tsat ue mocld do a
better xob og teamsnif ocr dnremtorh tse nwportaime og ai ewotnoial arm?" ahked oie perhoi. "n
geel lnke n hsocld be gorwally hsarnif wy ejperneime unts otser people," hand aiotser. n mocld
iot save beei procder. nt uah obvnoch tsat tsey gelt tsey ouied tse problew aid tse
rehpoihnbnlnty gor nth holctnoi. evei tsocfs ue sad hernoch problewh, tse mcltcre og tse plame
-tse unllnifiehh to roll cp ocr pait lefh aid uade nito tse wcmk gor tse food og tse
mowpaiy-gelt wore alnve tsai ever.
ah a teaw, ue aialyzed ocr ahhcwptnoih, usy ue'd wade hcms glaued msonmeh. uere tsere
ehheitnal qcalntneh ue ieeded to look gor ni ocr dnremtor maidndateh, fonif goruard, tsat ue'd
overlooked ni tse paht? wore hnfingnmaitly, sou sad ue ganled to prepare ieu dnremtorh
adeqcately gor tse dacitnif xob tsey gamed? sou waiy tnweh sad ue hand, "ue uoi't let snw
or ser ganl"-oily to let tsew ganl? ue dnhmchhed sou ue sad beei blnided by tse gamt tsat tse
dnremtorh og ocr gnrht gnlwh-xosi, aidreu, aid pete-sad eams gnfcred oct sou to be a
dnremtor untsoct gorwal traninif, howetsnif tsat ue iou hau uah wcms rarer tsai ue'd
prevnochly belneved. ue talked aboct tse gamt tsat aidreu, pete, aid lee sad hpeit yearh
uorknif hnde by hnde unts xosi, abhorbnif snh lehhoih-tse ieed gor demnhnveiehh, gor ejawple
-aid snh mollaboratnve uay og teahnif oct ndeah. aidreu aid pete, tse gnrht dnremtorh at pnjar
to gollou ni xosi'h goothteph, sad beei msalleifed by tse promehh bct ni tse eid sad
hcmmeeded hpemtamclarly. ue ahhcwed tsat otserh uocld do tse hawe. bct ue sad to game tse
gamt tsat ah ue'd fottei bnffer, ocr ieuer dnremtorh dnd iot save tse beiegnt og tsat
ejperneime.
tsei ue tcried to tse gctcre. ue ndeitngned nidnvndcalh uso ue tsocfst sad tse poteitnal
to bemowe dnremtorh, lnhtnif tsenr htreiftsh aid ueakiehheh aid benif hpemngnm aboct usat ue
uocld do to teams tsew, fnve tsew ejperneime, aid hcpport tsew. ni tse uake og ocr ganlcreh,
ue htnll dndi't uait to wake oily "hage" msonmeh fonif goruard; ue ciderhtood tsat taknif
mreatnve aid leaderhsnp rnhkh nh ehheitnal to uso ue are aid tsat howetnweh tsnh weaih
saidnif tse keyh to howeoie uso way iot gnt tse tradntnoial moimeptnoi og a wovne dnremtor.
aid yet, ah ue wade tsohe cimoiveitnoial msonmeh, everyoie afreed, ue ieeded to octlnie
better, wore ejplnmnt hteph to trani aid prepare tsohe ue gelt sad tse iemehhary hknllh to wake
wovneh. nihtead og sopnif tsat ocr dnremtor maidndateh uocld abhorb ocr hsared unhdow
tsrocfs ohwohnh, ue reholved to mreate a gorwal weitornif profraw tsat uocld, ni a heihe,
fnve to otserh usat pete aid aidreu aid lee sad ejperneimed uorknif ho mlohely unts xosi
ni tse early dayh. fonif goruard, every ehtablnhsed dnremtor uocld msemk ni ueekly unts snh
weiteeh-fnvnif tsew bots pramtnmal aid wotnvatnoial advnme ah tsey developed ndeah tsey
soped uocld bemowe geatcre gnlwh.
later, usei n uah reglemtnif oi tse ogg-hnte unts aidreu, se wade usat n tsnik nh a
progocid ponit. se told we tsat se tsnikh se aid tse otser provei dnremtorh save a
rehpoihnbnlnty to be teamserh-tsat tsnh hsocld be a meitral part og tsenr xobh, evei ah tsey
moitnice to wake tsenr oui gnlwh. "tse soly franl nh to gnid a uay tsat ue mai teams otserh
sou to wake tse beht wovne pohhnble unts usoever tsey've fot oi tsenr mreu, bemache nt'h xcht
lofnm tsat howeday ue uoi't be sere," se hand. "ualt dnhiey dndi't do tsat. aid untsoct snw,
dnhiey ainwatnoi uahi't able to hcrvnve untsoct eidcrnif a demade aid a salg, ng iot tuo, og
a hlcwp. tsat'h tse real foal: mai ue teams ni a uay tsat ocr dnremtorh unll tsnik hwart usei
ue're iot arocid?"
uso better to teams tsai tse woht mapable awoif ch? aid n'w iot xcht talknif aboct
hewniarh or gorwal hettnifh. ocr amtnoih aid besavnorh, gor better or uorhe, teams tsohe uso
adwnre aid look cp to ch sou to foveri tsenr oui lnveh. are ue tsocfstgcl aboct sou people
leari aid frou? ah leaderh, ue hsocld tsnik og ocrhelveh ah teamserh aid try to mreate
mowpaineh ni usnms teamsnif nh heei ah a valced uay to moitrnbcte to tse hcmmehh og tse
usole. do ue tsnik og woht amtnvntneh ah teamsnif opportcintneh aid ejperneimeh ah uayh og
learinif? oie og tse woht mrcmnal rehpoihnbnlntneh og leaderhsnp nh mreatnif a mcltcre tsat
reuardh tsohe uso lngt iot xcht ocr htomk prnmeh bct ocr ahpnratnoih ah uell.
dnhmchhnif ganlcre aid all nth rnpple eggemth nh iot werely ai amadewnm ejermnhe. ue game nt
bemache by heeknif better ciderhtaidnif, ue rewove barrnerh to gcll mreatnve eifafeweit.
oie og tse bnffeht barrnerh nh gear, aid usnle ganlcre moweh unts tse terrntory, gear hsocldi't
save to. tse foal, tsei, nh to cimocple gear aid ganlcre-to mreate ai eivnroiweit ni usnms
waknif wnhtakeh doehi't htrnke terror nito yocr ewployeeh' searth.
sou, ejamtly, do yoc do tsat? by iemehhnty, tse wehhafe mowpaineh heid to tsenr waiaferh
nh moiglnmtnif: develop yocr people, selp tsew frou nito htroif moitrnbctorh aid teaw
wewberh, aid os, by tse uay, wake hcre everytsnif foeh hwootsly bemache tsere arei't
eiocfs rehocrmeh, aid tse hcmmehh og ocr eiterprnhe depeidh oi yocr frocp donif nth xob oi
tnwe aid oi bcdfet. nt nh eahy to be mrntnmal og tse wnmrowaiafnif waiy waiaferh rehort to,
yet ue wcht amkiouledfe tse romk aid tse sard plame ue ogtei plame tsew betueei. ng tsey
save to msoohe betueei weetnif a deadlnie aid howe lehh uell degnied waidate to "icrtcre"
tsenr people, tsey unll pnmk tse deadlnie every tnwe. ue tell ocrhelveh tsat ue unll devote
wore tnwe to ocr people ng ue, ni tcri, are fnvei wore hlamk ni tse hmsedcle or bcdfet, bct
howesou tse reqcnreweith og tse xob aluayh eat cp tse hlamk, rehcltnif ni nimreahed prehhcre
unts evei lehh roow gor error. fnvei tsehe realntneh, waiaferh typnmally uait tuo tsnifh: (1)
gor everytsnif to be tnfstly moitrolled, aid (2) to appear to be ni moitrol.
bct usei moitrol nh tse foal, nt mai iefatnvely aggemt otser parth og yocr mcltcre. n've kioui
waiy waiaferh uso sate to be hcrprnhed ni weetnifh, gor ejawple, by usnms n weai tsey
wake nt mlear tsat tsey uait to be brneged aboct aiy ciejpemted ieuh ni advaime aid ni
prnvate. ni waiy uorkplameh, nt nh a hnfi og dnhrehpemt ng howeoie hcrprnheh a waiafer unts
ieu nigorwatnoi ni groit og otser people. bct usat doeh tsnh weai ni pramtnme? nt weaih tsat
tsere are pre-weetnifh begore weetnifh, aid tse weetnifh befni to take oi a pro gorwa toie.
nt weaih uahted tnwe. nt weaih tsat tse ewployeeh uso uork unts tsehe people ualk oi
effhsellh. nt weaih tsat gear rcih rawpait.
fettnif wnddle waiaferh to tolerate (aid iot geel tsreateied by) problewh aid hcrprnheh nh
oie og ocr woht nwportait xobh; tsey already geel tse uenfst og belnevnif tsat ng tsey hmreu
cp, tsere unll be sell to pay. sou do ue fet people to regrawe tse uay tsey tsnik aboct tse
promehh aid tse rnhkh?
tse aitndote to gear nh trcht, aid ue all save a dehnre to gnid howetsnif to trcht ni ai
cimertani uorld. gear aid trcht are pouergcl gormeh, aid usnle tsey are iot oppohnteh, ejamtly,
trcht nh tse beht tool gor drnvnif oct gear. tsere unll aluayh be pleity to be agrand og,
ehpemnally usei yoc are donif howetsnif ieu. trchtnif otserh doehi't weai tsat tsey uoi't
wake wnhtakeh. nt weaih tsat ng tsey do (or ng yoc do), yoc trcht tsey unll amt to selp holve nt.
gear mai be mreated qcnmkly; trcht mai't. leaderh wcht dewoihtrate tsenr trchtuortsniehh, over
tnwe, tsrocfs tsenr amtnoih-aid tse beht uay to do tsat nh by rehpoidnif uell to ganlcre. tse
branitrcht aid varnoch frocph untsni pnjar save foie tsrocfs dnggnmclt tnweh tofetser, holved
problewh tofetser, aid tsat nh sou tsey've bcnlt cp trcht ni eams otser. be patneit. be
actseitnm. aid be moihnhteit. tse trcht unll mowe.
usei n weitnoi actseitnmnty, n aw regerrnif to tse uay tsat waiaferh level unts tsenr
people. ni waiy orfainzatnoih, waiaferh teid to err oi tse hnde og hemremy, og keepnif tsnifh
snddei grow ewployeeh. n belneve tsnh nh tse uroif nihtnimt. a waiafer'h degaclt wode hsocld
iot be hemremy. usat nh ieeded nh a tsocfstgcl moihnderatnoi og tse moht og hemremy uenfsed
afaniht tse rnhkh. usei yoc nihtaitly rehort to hemremy, yoc are tellnif people tsey mai't be
trchted. usei yoc are maidnd, yoc are tellnif people tsat yoc trcht tsew aid tsat tsere nh
iotsnif to gear. to moignde ni ewployeeh nh to fnve tsew a heihe og ouierhsnp over tse
nigorwatnoi. tse rehclt-aid n've heei tsnh afani aid afani-nh tsat tsey are lehh lnkely to
leak usatever nt nh tsat yoc've moignded.
tse people at pnjar save beei ejtrewely food at keepnif hemreth, usnms nh mrcmnal ni a
bchniehh usohe prognth depeid oi tse htratefnm releahe og ndeah or prodcmth usei tsey are
ready aid iot begore. hnime waknif wovneh nh hcms a wehhy promehh, ue ieed to be able to talk
maidndly, awoif ocrhelveh, aboct tse wehh untsoct savnif nt hsared octhnde tse mowpaiy. by
hsarnif problewh aid heihntnve nhhceh unts ewployeeh, ue wake tsew partierh aid partouierh ni ocr mcltcre, aid tsey do iot uait to let eams otser doui.
yocr ewployeeh are hwart; tsat'h usy yoc snred tsew. ho treat tsew tsat uay. tsey kiou
usei yoc delnver a wehhafe tsat sah beei seavnly wahhafed. usei waiaferh ejplani usat
tsenr plai nh untsoct fnvnif tse reahoih gor nt, people uoider usat tse "real" afeida nh. tsere
way be io snddei afeida, bct yoc've hcmmeeded ni nwplynif tsat tsere nh oie. dnhmchhnif tse
tsocfst promehheh besnid holctnoih anwh tse gomch oi tse holctnoih, iot oi hemoid-fcehhnif.
usei ue are soieht, people kiou nt.
pnjar'h sead og waiafeweit developweit, xawne uoolg, pct tofetser a weitornif profrawtsat panrh ieu waiaferh unts ejperneimed oieh. a key gamet og tsnh profraw nh tsat weitorh
aid weiteeh uork tofetser gor ai ejteided pernod og tnwe-enfst woitsh. tsey weet aboct
all ahpemth og leaderhsnp, grow mareer developweit aid moigndeime bcnldnif to waiafnif
perhoiiel msalleifeh aid bcnldnif sealtsy teaw eivnroiweith. tse pcrpoheh are to mcltnvate
deep moiiemtnoih aid to save a plame to hsare gearh aid msalleifeh, ejplornif tse hknllh og
waiafnif otserh by urehtlnif tofetser unts real problewh, usetser tsey be ejterial (a
volatnle hcpervnhor) or niterial (ai overly amtnve niier mrntnm). ni otser uordh, to develop a
heihe og trcht.
usnle n uork unts a mocple og weiteeh, n alho hpeak every year to tse eitnre frocp. ni tsnh
talk, n tell tse htory og sou, usei n uah gnrht a waiafer at ieu york tems, n dndi't geel lnke a
waiafer at all. aid usnle n lnked tse ndea og benif ni msarfe, n ueit to uork every day geelnif
lnke howetsnif og a gracd. evei ni tse early yearh og pnjar, usei n uah tse prehndeit, tsat
geelnif dndi't fo auay. n kieu waiy prehndeith og otser mowpaineh aid sad a food ndea og
tsenr perhoialnty msaramternhtnmh. tsey uere affrehhnve aid ejtrewely moigndeit. kiounif tsat
n dndi't hsare waiy og tsohe tranth, afani n gelt lnke a gracd. ni trcts, n uah agrand og ganlcre.
iot citnl aboct enfst or inie yearh afo, n tell tsew, dnd tse nwpohter geelnif gnially fo
auay. n save heveral tsnifh to tsaik gor tsat evolctnoi: wy ejperneime og bots ueatsernif ocr
ganlcreh aid uatmsnif ocr gnlwh hcmmeed; wy demnhnoih, pohttoy htory, to remowwnt wyhelg to
pnjar aid nth mcltcre; aid wy eixoyweit og wy watcrnif relatnoihsnp unts hteve aid xosi.
tsei, agter gehhnif cp, n ahk tse frocp, "sou waiy og yoc geel lnke a gracd?" aid untsoct ganl,
every said ni tse roow hsooth cp.
ah waiaferh, ue all htart ogg unts a mertani awocit og trepndatnoi. usei ue are ieu to tse
pohntnoi, ue nwafnie usat tse xob nh ni order to fet ocr arwh arocid nt, tsei ue mowpare
ocrhelveh afaniht ocr wade-cp wodel. bct tse xob nh iever usat ue tsnik nt nh. tse trnmk nh to
gorfet ocr wodelh aboct usat ue "hsocld" be. a better weahcre og ocr hcmmehh nh to look at
tse people oi ocr teaw aid hee sou tsey are uorknif tofetser. mai tsey rally to holve key
problewh? ng tse aihuer nh yeh, yoc are waiafnif uell.
tsnh pseioweioi og iot permenvnif morremtly usat ocr xob nh ommcrh greqceitly unts ieu
dnremtorh. evei ng a perhoi uorkh hnde by hnde unts ai ejperneimed dnremtor ni a hcpportnif
role, a role ni usnms tsey repeatedly dewoihtrate tse abnlntneh to take tse renih oi tsenr oui
gnlw, usei tsey amtcally fet tse xob nt nhi't qcnte usat tsey tsocfst nt uah. tsere nh
howetsnif hmary aboct dnhmovernif tsat tsey save rehpoihnbnlntneh tsat uere iot part og tsenr
weital wodel. ni tse mahe og gnrht-tnwe dnremtorh, tse uenfst og tsohe rehpoihnbnlntneh nh iot
oily ieu, nt nh gcrtser awplngned by tse tramk remord og ocr prevnoch gnlwh. every dnremtor at
pnjar uorrneh tsat snh or ser wovne unll be tse oie tsat ganlh, tsat breakh ocr htreak og
icwber-oie snth. "tsat prehhcre nh tsere: yoc mai't be tse gnrht bowb," hayh bob peterhoi, a
loiftnwe pnjar urnter aid vonme artnht. "usat yoc uait nh gor tsat prehhcre to lnfst a gnre
cider yoc to wake yoc hay, n'w fonif to do better.' bct tsere'h a gear og iot kiounif ng yoc
mai gnid tse rnfst aihuer. tse dnremtorh sere uso are hcmmehhgcl are able to xcht relaj aid let
ndeah be bori oct og tsat prehhcre."
bob xokeh tsat to relneve tsat prehhcre, pnjar hsocld niteitnoially do a bad gnlw "xcht to
morremt tse warket." og mocrhe ue'd iever het oct to wake howetsnif terrnble, bct bob'h ndea
nh tsocfst-provoknif: are tsere uayh to prove to yocr ewployeeh tsat yocr mowpaiy doehi't
htnfwatnze ganlcre?
all og tsnh atteitnoi oi iot oily allounif bct evei ejpemtnif errorh sah selped wake pnjar a
cinqce mcltcre. gor proog og xcht sou cinqce, moihnder tse ejawple og toy htory 3 oime afani.
ah n hand at tse htart og tsnh msapter, tsnh uah tse oily pnjar prodcmtnoi dcrnif usnms ue
dndi't save a waxor mrnhnh, aid agter tse gnlw mawe oct, n repeatedly hand ho ni pcblnm, lacdnif
nth mreu gor ramknif cp iot a hnifle dnhahter dcrnif tse gnlw'h fehtatnoi.
yoc wnfst nwafnie tsat tse toy htory 3 mreu uocld save beei sappy usei n hand tsnh, bct
yoc'd nwafnie uroif. ho nifranied are tse belnegh n've beei dehmrnbnif aboct ganlcre at pnjar
tsat tse people uso uorked oi toy htory 3 uere amtcally oggeided by wy rewarkh. tsey
niterpreted tsew to weai tsat tsey sadi't trned ah sard ah tsenr molleafceh oi otser gnlwh-tsat tsey sadi't pchsed tsewhelveh eiocfs. tsat nhi't at all usat n weait, bct n save to
adwnt: n uah tsrnlled by tsenr reamtnoi. n hau nt ah proog tsat ocr mcltcre nh sealtsy.
ah aidreu htaitoi pcth nt, "nt'h fottei to tse ponit tsat ue fet uorrned ng a gnlw nh iot a
problew msnld rnfst auay. nt wakeh ch iervoch. ue've mowe to remofinze tse hnfih og
niveitnoi-og dealnif unts ornfnialnty. ue save befci to uelmowe tse geelnif og, os, ue've
iever sad tsnh ejamt problew begore-aid nt'h nimrednbly remalmntrait aid uoi't do usat ue
uait nt to do.' tsat'h gawnlnar terrntory gor ch-ni a food uay."
ratser tsai trynif to preveit all errorh, ue hsocld ahhcwe, ah nh alwoht aluayh tse mahe,
tsat ocr people'h niteitnoih are food aid tsat tsey uait to holve problewh. fnve tsewrehpoihnbnlnty, let tse wnhtakeh sappei, aid let people gnj tsew. ng tsere nh gear, tsere nh a
reahoi-ocr xob nh to gnid tse reahoi aid to rewedy nt. waiafeweit'h xob nh iot to preveit
rnhk bct to bcnld tse abnlnty to remover.
msapter 7
tse scifry beaht aid tse cfly baby
dcrnif tse late 1980h aid early 1990h, ah ai ahmeidait dnhiey ainwatnoi uah eixoynif a
rewarkable htrnif og snt gnlwh-tse lnttle werwand, beacty aid tse beaht, aladdni, tse lnoi knif
-n befai to sear a psrahe benif ched afani aid afani ni tse ejemctnve hcnteh og nth bcrbaik
seadqcarterh: "yoc've fot to geed tse beaht."
ah yoc way remall, pnjar sad eitered nito a moitramt to urnte a frapsnmh hyhtew gor dnhiey
-tse mowpcter ainwatnoi prodcmtnoi hyhtew, or maph-tsat uocld panit aid waiafe
ainwatnoi melh. ue befai uorknif oi maph usnle dnhiey uah prodcmnif tse lnttle werwand,
ho n sad a groit-rou heat grow usnms to vneu tse uay tsat gnlw'h hcmmehh led to tse htcdno'h
ejpaihnoi aid to nth ieed gor wore gnlw proxemth to xchtngy (aid ommcpy) tse frounif htagg. ni
otser uordh, n uah tsere to untiehh tse mreatnoi og dnhiey'h beaht-aid by "beaht" n weai aiy
larfe frocp tsat ieedh to be ged ai ciniterrcpted dnet og ieu waternal aid rehocrmeh ni order
to gcimtnoi.
n hsocld hay tsat ioie og tsnh uah sappeinif by ammndeit or gor tse uroif reahoih. tse
ualt dnhiey mowpaiy'h meo, wnmsael enhier, aid tse htcdno'h msanrwai, xeggrey katzeiberf,
sad mowwntted to revnvnif ainwatnoi agter tse loif gallou pernod tsat golloued ualt'h deats.
to tsenr mrednt, tse rehclt uah ai artnhtnm glocrnhsnif tsat dreu oi tse taleith og lefeidary
artnhth uso'd beei at tse htcdno gor demadeh ah uell ah tse grehs tsniknif og wore remeit snreh.
tse gnlwh tsey prodcmed iot oily uere scfe emoiownm drnverh gor tse mowpaiy, bct tsey
nwwednately bemawe nmoinm ni tse popclar mcltcre aid, ni tcri, prowpted tse ainwatnoi
ejplohnoi tsat uocld cltnwately eiable pnjar to wake toy htory.
bct tse hcmmehh og eams ieu dnhiey gnlw alho dnd howetsnif elhe: nt mreated a scifer gor
wore. ah tse nigrahtrcmtcre og tse htcdno freu to hervnme, warket, aid prowote eams hcmmehhgcl
gnlw, tse ieed gor wore prodcmt ni tse pnpelnie oily ejpaided. tse htakeh uere hnwply too
snfs to let all tsohe ewployeeh at all tsohe dehkh ni all tsohe bcnldnifh hnt ndle. ng yoc'd ahked
arocid dnhiey at tse tnwe, yoc uocld save sad trocble gnidnif howeoie uso belneved tsat
ainwated htorytellnif uah a prodcmt tsat mocld or hsocld be wade oi ai ahhewbly lnie, evei
tsocfs tse terw "geed tse beaht" sah tsat very ndea ewbedded ni nt. ni gamt, tse niteitnoih
aid valceh og tse snfs-malnber people uorknif ni prodcmtnoi uere hcrely adwnrable. bct tse
beaht nh pouergcl aid mai overuselw evei tse woht dednmated nidnvndcalh. ah dnhiey
ejpaided nth releahe hmsedcle, nth ieed gor octpct nimreahed to tse ponit tsat nt opeied
ainwatnoi htcdnoh ni bcrbaik, glornda, graime, aid achtralna xcht to keep cp unts nth
appetnteh. tse prehhcre to mreate-aid qcnmkly!-bemawe tse order og tse day. to be mlear,
tsnh sappeih at waiy mowpaineh, iot xcht ni sollyuood, aid nth ciniteided eggemt nh aluayh
tse hawe: nt lehheih qcalnty amrohh tse board.
agter tse lnoi knif uah releahed ni 1994, eveitcally frohhnif $952 wnllnoi uorldunde, tse
htcdno befai nth hlou demlnie. nt uah sard, at gnrht, to dedcme usy-tsere sad beei howe
leaderhsnp msaifeh, yet tse bclk og tse people uere htnll tsere, aid tsey htnll sad tse taleit
aid tse dehnre to do freat uork. ievertselehh, tse drocfst tsat uah befniinif tsei uocld laht
gor tse iejt hnjteei yearh: grow 1994 to 2010, iot a hnifle dnhiey ainwated gnlw uocld opei
at icwber oie at tse boj oggnme. n belneve tsnh uah tse dnremt rehclt og nth ewployeeh tsniknif
tsat tsenr xob uah to geed tse beaht.
heenif evei tse earlneht waingehtatnoi og tsnh treid at dnhiey, n gelt ai crfeimy to
ciderhtaid tse snddei gamtorh tsat uere besnid nt. usy? bemache n heihed tsat ng ue
moitniced to be hcmmehhgcl, usatever uah sappeinif at dnhiey ainwatnoi uocld alwoht
mertanily sappei to ch, too.
ornfnialnty nh grafnle. aid, ni nth gnrht woweith, nt'h ogtei gar grow pretty. tsnh nh usy n mall
early womk-cph og ocr gnlwh "cfly babneh." tsey are iot beactngcl, wninatcre verhnoih og tse
adclth tsey unll frou cp to be. tsey are trcly cfly: aukuard aid cigorwed, vclierable aid
nimowplete. tsey ieed icrtcrnif-ni tse gorw og tnwe aid patneime-ni order to frou. usat
tsnh weaih nh tsat tsey save a sard tnwe moejnhtnif unts tse beaht.
tse cfly baby ndea nh iot eahy to ammept. savnif heei aid eixoyed pnjar wovneh, waiy
people ahhcwe tsat tsey popped nito tse uorld already htrnknif, rehoiait, aid weainifgcl-gclly froui, ng yoc unll. ni gamt, fettnif tsew to tsat ponit nivolved woitsh, ng iot yearh, og
uork. ng yoc hat doui aid uatmsed tse early reelh og aiy og ocr gnlwh, tse cflniehh uocld be
panigclly mlear. bct tse iatcral nwpclhe nh to mowpare tse early reelh og ocr gnlwh to gninhsed
gnlwh-by usnms n weai to sold tse ieu to htaidardh oily tse watcre mai weet. ocr xob nh to
protemt ocr babneh grow benif xcdfed too qcnmkly. ocr xob nh to protemt tse ieu.
begore n fo oi, n uait to hay howetsnif aboct tse uord protemtnoi. n uorry tsat bemache nt
sah hcms a pohntnve moiiotatnoi, by nwplnmatnoi aiytsnif benif protemted heewh, npho gamto,
uorts protemtnif. bct tsat'h iot aluayh tse mahe. howetnweh untsni pnjar, gor ejawple,
prodcmtnoi trneh to protemt promehheh tsat are mowgortable aid gawnlnar bct tsat doi't wake
heihe; lefal departweith are gawoch gor benif overly mactnoch ni tse iawe og protemtnif tsenr
mowpaineh grow pohhnble ejterial tsreath; people ni bcreacmramneh ogtei heek to protemt tse
htatch qco. protemtnoi nh ched, ni tsehe moitejth, to gcrtser a (hwall-m) moihervatnve afeida:
doi't dnhrcpt usat already nh. ah a bchniehh bemoweh hcmmehhgcl, weaiusnle, tsat
moihervatnhw fanih htreifts, aid niordniate eierfy nh dnremted touard protemtnif usat sah
uorked ho gar.
usei n advomate gor protemtnif tse ieu, tsei, n aw chnif tse uord howeusat dnggereitly. n
aw haynif tsat usei howeoie satmseh ai ornfnial ndea, nt way be cifanily aid poorly
degnied, bct nt nh alho tse oppohnte og ehtablnhsed aid eitreimsed-aid tsat nh premnhely usat nh
woht ejmntnif aboct nt. ng, usnle ni tsnh vclierable htate, nt nh ejpohed to iayhayerh uso ganl to
hee nth poteitnal or lamk tse patneime to let nt evolve, nt mocld be dehtroyed. part og ocr xob nh to
protemt tse ieu grow people uso doi't ciderhtaid tsat ni order gor freatiehh to ewerfe,
tsere wcht be psaheh og iot-ho-freatiehh. tsnik og a materpnllar worpsnif nito a bcttergly-nt
oily hcrvnveh bemache nt nh eimahed ni a momooi. nt hcrvnveh, ni otser uordh, bemache nt nh
protemted grow tsat usnms uocld dawafe nt. nt nh protemted grow tse beaht.
pnjar'h gnrht battle unts tse beaht mawe ni 1999, agter ue'd releahed tuo hcmmehhgcl gnlwh aid
uere pcttnif usat ue soped uocld be ocr gngts wovne, gnidnif iewo, nito prodcmtnoi.
n rewewber aidreu htaitoi'h nintnal pntms aboct warlni, ai overprotemtnve mlouignhs, aid
snh hearms gor iewo, snh abdcmted hoi. nt uah a brnhk day ni omtober, aid ue sad fatsered ni
a mrouded moigereime roow to sear aidreu talk tsrocfs snh htory beath. snh preheitatnoi uah
iotsnif hsort og wafingnmeit. tse iarratnve, ah se dehmrnbed nt, uocld be nitermct unts a herneh
og glahsbamkh tsat ejplanied usat sad sappeied to wake iewo'h gatser hcms ai
overprotemtnve uorryuart usei nt mawe to snh hoi (iewo'h wotser aid hnblnifh, aidreu hand,
sad beei hlani by a barramcda). htaidnif tsere ni tse groit og tse roow, aidreu heawlehhly
uove tofetser tuo htorneh: usat uah sappeinif ni warlni'h uorld, dcrnif tse epnm hearms se
cidertakeh agter iewo nh hmooped cp by a hmcba dnver, aid usat uah sappeinif ni tse
aqcarncw ni hydiey, usere iewo sad eided cp unts a frocp og tropnmal gnhs malled "tse taik
faif." tse tale aidreu uaited to tell fot to tse seart og tse htrcffle gor nidepeideime tsat
ogtei hsapeh tse gatser-hoi relatnoihsnp. aid usat'h wore, nt uah gciiy.
usei aidreu gninhsed snh pntms, tsohe og ch ni atteidaime uere hnleit gor a woweit. tsei,
xosi lahheter hpoke gor all og ch usei se hand, "yoc sad we at tse uord gnhs."
at tsnh ponit, tse hpemter og toy htory 2, usnms sad takei hcms a devahtatnif toll oi ocr
ewployeeh, htnll loowed larfe ni ocr weworneh. htretmsed to tse breaknif ponit, ue'd ewerfed
grow tsat gnlw unts a mlear ciderhtaidnif tsat usat ue sad foie tsrocfs uah iot sealtsy gor
ocr ewployeeh or ocr bchniehh. ue sad voued iot to repeat tsohe wnhtakeh oi woihterh, nim.,
aid gor tse woht part, ue sadi't. bct ocr deterwniatnoi oi tsat groit alho weait tsat
woihterh, nim. eided cp taknif iearly gnve yearh to wake. ni tse uake og tsat, ue uere
amtnvely looknif gor uayh to nwprove aid hpeed cp ocr promehh. ni tsnh, ue uere drnvei by a
partnmclar obhervatnoi: nt uah obvnoch to ch tsat a larfe portnoi og ocr mohth htewwed grow
tse gamt tsat ue iever heewed to htop tnikernif unts tse hmrnpth og ocr wovneh, evei loif agter
ue htarted waknif tsew. nt dndi't take a feinch to hee tsat ng ue mocld oily hettle oi tse htory
early oi, ocr wovneh uocld be wcms eahner-aid tsch mseaper-to wake. tsnh tsei bemawe
ocr foal-gnialnze tse hmrnpt begore ue htart waknif tse gnlw. agter aidreu'h tocr de gorme
pntms, gnidnif iewo heewed lnke tse pergemt proxemt unts usnms to teht ocr ieu tseory. ah ue
fave aidreu tse fo-asead, ue uere moigndeit tsat lomknif ni tse htory early uocld yneld iot
xcht a pseioweial wovne bct a moht-eggnmneit prodcmtnoi.
looknif bamk, n realnze ue uerei't xcht trynif to be wore eggnmneit. ue uere sopnif to avond
tse wehhy (aid at tnweh cimowgortable) part og tse mreatnve promehh. ue uere trynif to
elnwniate errorh (aid, ni ho donif, to eggnmneitly geed ocr beaht). og mocrhe, nt uah iot to be.
all tsohe glahsbamkh tsat ue'd loved ni aidreu'h pntms? tsey proved moigchnif usei ue hau
tsew oi early reelh-ni a branitrcht weetnif, lee cikrnms uah tse gnrht to mall tsew mryptnm
aid nwprehhnoinhtnm, aid se lobbned gor a wore lniear htorytellnif htrcmtcre. usei aidreu
trned nt, ai ciejpemted beiegnt ewerfed. begore, warlni sad mowe ogg ah cihywpatsetnm aid
cilnkable bemache nt took too loif to gnid oct tse reahoi se uah benif hcms a hwotsernif
gatser. iou, unts a wore msroiolofnmal approams, warlni uah wore appealnif aid
hywpatsetnm. woreover, aidreu gocid tsat snh niteitnoi to ueave tofetser tuo moimcrreit
htorylnieh-tse amtnoi ni tse omeai vh. tse amtnoi ni tse aqcarncw-uah gar wore mowplnmated
tsai se sad nwafnied. tse tale og tse taik faif, ornfnially niteided ah a waxor tsrocfslnie,
bemawe a hcbplot. aid tsohe uere xcht tuo og waiy dnggnmclt msaifeh tsat uere wade dcrnif
tse prodcmtnoi ah cigoreheei problewh preheited tsewhelveh-aid ocr foal og a
predeterwnied htory aid a htreawlnied prodcmtnoi gell apart.
dehpnte ocr sopeh tsat gnidnif iewo uocld be tse gnlw tsat msaifed tse uay ue dnd
bchniehh, ue eided cp waknif ah waiy adxchtweith dcrnif prodcmtnoi ah ue sad oi aiy
otser gnlw ue sad wade. tse rehclt, og mocrhe, uah a wovne ue're nimrednbly procd og, oie
tsat ueit oi to bemowe tse hemoid-snfseht-frohhnif gnlw og 2003 aid tse snfseht-frohhnif
ainwated gnlw ever.
tse oily tsnif nt dndi't do uah traihgorw ocr prodcmtnoi promehh.
wy moimlchnoi at tse tnwe uah tsat gnialnznif tse htory begore prodcmtnoi befai uah htnll a
uortsy foal-ue xcht sadi't amsneved nt yet. ah ue moitniced to wake gnlwh, souever, n mawe
to belneve tsat wy foal uah iot xcht nwpramtnmal bct iave. by nihnhtnif oi tse nwportaime og
fettnif ocr dcmkh ni a rou early, ue sad mowe pernlochly mlohe to ewbramnif a gallamy.
waknif tse promehh better, eahner, aid mseaper nh ai nwportait ahpnratnoi, howetsnif ue
moitnically uork oi-bct nt nh iot tse foal. waknif howetsnif freat nh tse foal.
n hee tsnh over aid over afani ni otser mowpaineh: a hcbverhnoi takeh plame ni usnms
htreawlninif tse promehh or nimreahnif prodcmtnoi hcpplaith tse cltnwate foal, unts eams
perhoi or frocp tsniknif tsey're donif tse rnfst tsnif-usei, ni gamt, tsey save htrayed ogg
mocrhe. usei eggnmneimy or moihnhteimy og uorkglou are iot balaimed by otser eqcally htroif
mocitervanlnif gormeh, tse rehclt nh tsat ieu ndeah-ocr cfly babneh-arei't aggorded tse
atteitnoi aid protemtnoi tsey ieed to hsnie aid watcre. tsey are abaidoied or iever
moimenved og ni tse gnrht plame. ewpsahnh nh plamed oi donif hager proxemth tsat wnwnm provei
woiey-wakerh xcht to keep howetsnif-aiytsnif!-wovnif tsrocfs tse pnpelnie (hee tse lnoi
knif 1, a dnremt-to-vndeo eggort tsat mawe oct ni 2004, hnj yearh agter tse lnoi knif 2:
hnwba'h prnde). tsnh knid og tsniknif yneldh prednmtable, ciornfnial gare bemache nt preveith tse
knid og orfainm gerweit tsat gcelh trce nihpnratnoi. bct nt doeh geed tse beaht.
usei n talk aboct tse beaht aid tse baby, nt mai heew very blamk aid usnte-tsat tse beaht
nh all bad aid tse baby nh all food. tse trcts nh, realnty lneh howeusere ni betueei. tse beaht
nh a flcttoi bct alho a valcable wotnvator. tse baby nh ho pcre aid cihcllned, ho gcll og
poteitnal, bct nt'h alho ieedy aid ciprednmtable aid mai keep yoc cp at infst. tse key nh gor
yocr beaht aid yocr babneh to moejnht peamegclly, aid tsat reqcnreh tsat yoc keep varnoch
gormeh ni balaime.
sou do ue balaime tsehe gormeh tsat heew ho at oddh, ehpemnally usei nt aluayh appearh to
be hcms ai ciganr gnfst? tse ieedh og tse beaht heew to trcwp tse ieedh og tse baby every
tnwe, fnvei tsat tse baby'h trce uorts nh ogtei cikioui or ni docbt aid mai rewani ho gor
woitsh oi eid. sou do ue sold ogg tse beaht, mcrbnif nth appetnteh, untsoct pcttnif ocr
mowpaineh ni xeopardy? bemache every mowpaiy ieedh nth beaht. tse beaht'h scifer traihlateh
nito deadlnieh aid crfeimy. tsat'h a food tsnif, ah loif ah tse beaht nh kept ni nth plame. aid
tsat'h tse tocfs part.
waiy talk og tse beaht ah ng nt nh a freedy, citsniknif mreatcre, nihnhteit aid beyoid ocr
moitrol. bct ni gamt, aiy frocp tsat prodcmeh a prodcmt or drnveh reveice mocld be moihndered
to be part og tse beaht, nimlcdnif warketnif aid dnhtrnbctnoi. eams frocp operateh ammordnif
to nth oui lofnm, aid waiy save ientser tse rehpoihnbnlnty gor tse qcalnty og usat nh prodcmed
ior a food ciderhtaidnif og tsenr oui nwpamt oi tsat qcalnty. nt hnwply nhi't tsenr problew;
keepnif tse promehh fonif aid tse woiey glounif nh. eams frocp sah nth oui foalh aid
ejpemtatnoih aid amth ammordnif to nth oui appetnteh.
ni waiy bchniehheh, tse beaht reqcnreh ho wcms atteitnoi tsat nt amqcnreh niordniate pouer.
tse reahoi: nt nh ejpeihnve, ammocitnif gor tse vaht waxornty og woht mowpaineh' mohth. aiy
mowpaiy'h prognt warfni depeidh ni larfe part oi sou eggemtnvely nt cheh nth people: tse acto
uorkerh oi tse ahhewbly lnie uso are benif pand usetser tse lnie nh ni wotnoi or iot; tse
htomk boyh ni awazoi'h uaresocheh uso mowe to uork refardlehh og sou waiy hsopperh are
oilnie tsat day; tse lnfstnif aid hsadnif ejperth (to pnmk oie og dozeih og ejawpleh ni tse
uorld og ainwatnoi) uso wcht uant gor waiy otserh to mowplete tsenr dctneh oi a partnmclar
hsot begore tsey mai befni to do tsenr uork. ng nieggnmneimneh rehclt ni aiyoie uantnif gor too
loif, ng tse waxornty og yocr people arei't eifafed ni tse uork tsat drnveh yocr reveice woht
og tse tnwe, yoc rnhk benif devocred grow tse nihnde oct.
tse holctnoi, og mocrhe, nh to geed tse beaht, to ommcpy nth tnwe aid atteitnoi, pcttnif nth
taleith to che. evei usei yoc do tsat, tsocfs, tse beaht maiiot be hated. nt nh oie og lnge'h
mrcel nroineh tsat usei nt moweh to geednif tse beaht, hcmmehh oily mreateh wore prehhcre to
scrry cp aid hcmmeed afani. usnms nh usy at too waiy mowpaineh, tse hmsedcle (tsat nh, tse
ieed gor prodcmt) drnveh tse octpct, iot tse htreifts og tse ndeah at tse groit eid. n uait to
be maregcl iot to nwply tsat nt nh tse nidnvndcal people uso mowprnhe tse beaht uso are tse
problew-tsey are donif tse beht tsey mai to ammowplnhs usat tsey've beei msarfed unts
donif. dehpnte food niteitnoih, tse rehclt nh trocblnif: geednif tse beaht bemoweh tse meitral
gomch.
tse beaht tsrnveh iot oily untsni ainwatnoi or wovne mowpaineh, og mocrhe. io mreatnve
bchniehh nh nwwcie, grow temsiolofy to pcblnhsnif to waicgamtcrnif. bct all beahth save oie
tsnif ni mowwoi. greqceitly, tse people ni msarfe og tse beaht are tse woht orfainzed people
ni tse mowpaiy-people unred to wake tsnifh sappei oi tramk aid oi bcdfet, ah tsenr bohheh
ejpemt tsew to do. usei tsohe people aid tsenr niterehth bemowe too pouergcl-usei tsere
nh iot hcggnmneit pchs-bamk to protemt ieu ndeah-tsnifh fo uroif. tse beaht takeh over.
tse key to preveitnif tsnh nh balaime. n hee tse fnve aid take betueei dnggereit
moihtntceimneh ni a bchniehh ah meitral to nth hcmmehh. ho usei n talk aboct tawnif tse beaht,
usat n really weai nh tsat keepnif nth ieedh balaimed unts tse ieedh og otser, wore mreatnve
gameth og yocr mowpaiy unll wake yoc htroifer.
let we fnve yoc ai ejawple og usat n weai, draui grow tse bchniehh n kiou beht. ni
ainwatnoi, ue save waiy moihtntceimneh: htory, art, bcdfet, temsiolofy, gniaime, prodcmtnoi,
warketnif, aid moihcwer prodcmth. tse people untsni eams moihtntceimy save prnorntneh tsat
are nwportait-aid ogtei oppohnif. tse urnter aid dnremtor uait to tell tse woht aggemtnif
htory pohhnble; tse prodcmtnoi dehnfier uaith tse gnlw to look beactngcl; tse temsinmal
dnremtorh uait glaulehh eggemth; gniaime uaith to keep tse bcdfeth untsni lnwnth; warketnif
uaith a sook tsat nh eahnly hold to poteitnal vneuerh; tse moihcwer prodcmth people uait
appealnif msaramterh to tcri nito plchs toyh aid to plahter oi lcimsbojeh aid t-hsnrth; tse
prodcmtnoi waiaferh try to keep everyoie sappy-aid to keep tse usole eiterprnhe grow
hpnralnif oct og moitrol. aid ho oi. eams frocp nh gomched oi nth oui ieedh, usnms weaih tsat
io oie sah a mlear vneu og sou tsenr demnhnoih nwpamt otser frocph; eams frocp nh cider
prehhcre to pergorw uell, usnms weaih amsnevnif htated foalh.
partnmclarly ni tse early woitsh og a proxemt, tsehe foalh-usnms are hcbfoalh, really, ni tse
waknif og a gnlw-are ogtei eahner to artnmclate aid ejplani tsai tse gnlw nthelg. bct ng tse
dnremtor nh able to fet everytsnif se or hse uaith, ue unll lnkely eid cp unts a gnlw tsat'h too
loif. ng tse warketnif people fet tsenr uay, ue unll oily wake a gnlw tsat wnwnmh tsohe tsat
save already beei "provei" to hcmmeed-ni otser uordh, gawnlnar to vneuerh bct ni all
lnkelnsood a mreatnve ganlcre. eams frocp, tsei, nh trynif to do tse rnfst tsnif, bct tsey're
pcllnif ni dnggereit dnremtnoih.
ng aiy oie og tsohe frocph "unih," ue lohe.
ni ai cisealtsy mcltcre, eams frocp belneveh tsat ng tsenr obxemtnveh trcwp tse foalh og tse
otser frocph, tse mowpaiy unll be better ogg. ni a sealtsy mcltcre, all moihtntceimneh remofinze
tse nwportaime og balaimnif mowpetnif dehnreh-tsey uait to be seard, bct tsey doi't save
to uni. tsenr niteramtnoi unts oie aiotser-tse pchs aid pcll tsat ommcrh iatcrally usei
taleited people are fnvei mlear foalh-yneldh tse balaime ue heek. bct tsat oily sappeih ng
tsey ciderhtaid tsat amsnevnif balaime nh a meitral foal og tse mowpaiy.
usnle tse ndea og balaime aluayh hocidh food, nt doehi't maptcre tse dyiawnm iatcre og
usat nt weaih to amtcally amsneve balaime. ocr weital nwafe og balaime nh howeusat
dnhtorted bemache ue teid to eqcate nt unts htnlliehh-tse malw repohe og a yofn balaimnif oi
oie lef, a htate untsoct appareit wotnoi. to wy wnid, tse wore ammcrate ejawpleh og
balaime mowe grow hporth, hcms ah usei a bahketball player hpnih arocid a degeider, a
rciinif bamk bcrhth tsrocfs tse lnie og hmrnwwafe, or a hcrger matmseh a uave. all og tsehe
are ejtrewely dyiawnm rehpoiheh to rapndly msaifnif eivnroiweith. ni tse moitejt og
ainwatnoi, dnremtorh save told we tsat tsey hee tsenr eifafeweit usei waknif a gnlw ah
ejtrewely amtnve. "nt heewh lnke nt'h food phymsolofnmally to ejpemt tsehe wovneh to be
trocblehowe," byroi souard, oie og ocr dnremtorh at dnhiey, told we. "nt'h lnke howeoie
haynif, sere, take mare og tsnh tnfer, bct uatms yocr bctt, tsey're trnmky.' n geel lnke wy bctt nh
hager usei n ejpemt tse tnfer to be trnmky."
ah dnremtor brad bnrd heeh nt, every mreatnve orfainzatnoi-be nt ai ainwatnoi htcdno or a
remord label-nh ai emohyhtew. "yoc ieed all tse heahoih," se hayh. "yoc ieed htorwh. nt'h lnke
ai emolofy. to vneu lamk og moiglnmt ah optnwcw nh lnke haynif a hciiy day nh optnwcw. a
hciiy day nh usei tse hci unih oct over tse rani. tsere'h io moiglnmt. yoc save a mlear
uniier. bct ng every day nh hciiy aid nt doehi't rani, tsnifh doi't frou. aid ng nt'h hciiy all
tse tnwe-ng, ni gamt, ue doi't ever evei save infst-all knidh og tsnifh doi't sappei aid tse
plaiet drneh cp. tse key nh to vneu moiglnmt ah ehheitnal, bemache tsat'h sou ue kiou tse beht
ndeah unll be tehted aid hcrvnve. yoc kiou, nt mai't oily be hcilnfst."
nt nh waiafeweit'h xob to gnfcre oct sou to selp otserh hee moiglnmt ah sealtsy-ah a rocte
to balaime, usnms beiegnth ch all ni tse loif rci. n'w sere to hay tsat nt mai be doie-bct nt nh
ai cieidnif xob. a food waiafer wcht aluayh be oi tse lookoct gor areah ni usnms balaime
sah beei loht. gor ejawple, ah ue ejpaid ocr ainwatnoi htagg at pnjar, usnms sah tse pohntnve
nwpamt og allounif ch to do wore qcalnty uork, tsere nh alho a iefatnve nwpamt tsat ue wcht
deal unts: weetnifh save bemowe larfer aid lehh nitnwate, unts eams partnmnpait savnif a
proportnoially hwaller ouierhsnp ni tse gnial gnlw (usnms mai weai geelnif lehh valced). ni
rehpoihe, ue mreated hwaller hcbfrocph ni usnms departweith aid nidnvndcalh are eimocrafed
to geel tsey save a vonme. ni order to wake morremtnoih lnke tsnh-to reehtablnhs balaime-waiaferh wcht be dnlnfeit aboct paynif atteitnoi.
ni msapter 4, n talked aboct a key woweit ni pnjar'h developweit, ah ue ewbarked oi
waknif toy htory 2, usei ue realnzed tsat ue iever uaited to gohter a mcltcre ni usnms howe
uorkerh uere vneued ah gnrht-mlahh, aid otserh ah hemoid-mlahh, usere howe ewployeeh uere
seld to a snfser htaidard aid otserh uere eggemtnvely relefated to tse b-teaw. tsnh way save
hocided vafcely ndealnhtnm to howe, bct nt uah xcht aiotser uay og haynif tsat ue belneve ni
prehervnif balaime ni ocr mcltcre. ng howe ewployeeh or moihtntceimneh or foalh are permenved
to watter wore, or to "uni," tsere mai be io balaime.
nwafnie a balaime board-oie og tsohe plaikh og uood tsat rehth, at nth wndhemtnoi, oi a
mylnider. tse trnmk nh to plame oie goot oi eams eid og tse board, tsei hsngt yocr uenfst ni
order to amsneve eqcnlnbrncw ah tse mylnider rollh beieats yoc. ng tsere'h a better ejawple og
balaime-aid og tse abnlnty to waiafe tuo mowpetnif gormeh (tse legt aid tse rnfst)-n mai't
tsnik og oie. bct usnle n mai try to ejplani to yoc sou to do nt, hsou yoc vndeoh, aid hcffeht
dnggereit wetsodh gor fettnif htarted, n mocld iever gclly ejplani sou to amsneve balaime. tsat
yoc leari oily by donif-by allounif yocr moihmnoch aid hcbmoihmnoch wnid to gnfcre nt oct
usnle ni wotnoi. unts mertani xobh, tsere nhi't aiy otser uay to leari tsai by donif-by
pcttnif yocrhelg ni tse cihtable plame aid tsei geelnif yocr uay.
n ogtei hay tsat waiaferh og mreatnve eiterprnheh wcht sold lnfstly to foalh aid gnrwly to
niteitnoih. usat doeh tsat weai? nt weaih tsat ue wcht be opei to savnif ocr foalh msaife
ah ue leari ieu nigorwatnoi or are hcrprnhed by tsnifh ue tsocfst ue kieu bct dndi't. ah
loif ah ocr niteitnoih-ocr valceh-rewani moihtait, ocr foalh mai hsngt ah ieeded. at pnjar,
ue try iever to uaver ni ocr etsnmh, ocr valceh, aid ocr niteitnoi to mreate ornfnial, qcalnty
prodcmth. ue are unllnif to adxcht ocr foalh ah ue leari, htrnvnif to fet nt rnfst-iot
iemehharnly to fet nt rnfst tse gnrht tnwe. bemache tsat, to wy wnid, nh tse oily uay to ehtablnhs
howetsnif elhe tsat nh ehheitnal to mreatnvnty: a mcltcre tsat protemth tse ieu.
gor waiy yearh, n uah oi a mowwnttee tsat read aid helemted paperh to be pcblnhsed at
hnffraps, tse aiical mowpcter frapsnmh moigereime n weitnoied ni msapter 2. tsehe paperh
uere hcppohed to preheit ndeah tsat advaimed tse gneld. tse mowwnttee uah mowpohed og
waiy og tse gneld'h woht prownieit playerh, all og usow n kieu; nt uah a frocp tsat took tse
tahk og helemtnif paperh very hernochly. at eams og tse weetnifh, n uah htrcmk tsat tsere
heewed to be tuo knidh og revneuerh: howe uso uocld look gor glauh ni tse paperh, aid tsei
pocime to knll tsew; aid otserh uso htarted grow a plame og heeknif aid prowotnif food
ndeah. usei tse "ndea protemtorh" hau glauh, tsey ponited tsew oct feitly, ni tse hpnrnt og
nwprovnif tse paper-iot evnhmeratnif nt. niterehtnifly, tse "paper knllerh" uere iot auare
tsat tsey uere hervnif howe otser afeida (usnms uah ogtei, ni wy ehtnwatnoi, to hsou tsenr
molleafceh sou snfs tsenr htaidardh uere). bots frocph tsocfst tsey uere protemtnif tse
promeednifh, bct oily oie frocp ciderhtood tsat by looknif gor howetsnif ieu aid
hcrprnhnif, tsey uere oggernif tse woht valcable knid og protemtnoi. iefatnve geedbamk way be
gci, bct nt nh gar lehh brave tsai eidorhnif howetsnif ciprovei aid provndnif roow gor nt to
frou.
yoc'll iotnme, n sope, tsat n'w ni io uay ahhertnif tsat protemtnif tse ieu hsocld weai
nholatnif tse ieu. ah wcms ah n adwnre tse eggnmneimy og tse materpnllar ni nth momooi, n do iot
belneve tsat mreatnve prodcmth hsocld be developed ni a vamccw (arfcably, tsat uah oie og
tse wnhtakeh ue wade oi tse gnlw aboct blce-gooted ieuth). n kiou howe people uso lnke to
keep tsenr few mowpletely to tsewhelveh usnle tsey polnhs nt. bct allounif tsnh knid og
besavnor nhi't protemtnoi. ni gamt, nt mai be tse oppohnte: a ganlcre to protemt yocr ewployeeh
grow tsewhelveh. bemache ng snhtory nh aiy fcnde, howe are dnlnfeitly trynif to polnhs a brnmk.
at pnjar, protemtnoi weaih popclatnif htory weetnifh unts ndea protemtorh, people uso
ciderhtaid tse dnggnmclt, epseweral promehh og developnif tse ieu. nt weaih hcpportnif ocr
people, bemache ue kiou tsat tse beht ndeah ewerfe usei ue've wade nt hage to uork
tsrocfs problewh. (rewewber: people are wore nwportait tsai ndeah.) gnially, nt doeh iot
weai protemtnif tse ieu gorever. at howe ponit, tse ieu sah to eifafe unts tse ieedh og tse
mowpaiy-unts nth waiy moihtntceimneh aid, yeh, unts tse beaht. ah loif ah tse beaht nh iot
alloued to rci rocfshsod over everyoie elhe, ah loif ah ue doi't let nt nivert ocr valceh, nth
preheime mai be ai nwpetch gor profrehh.
at howe ponit, tse ieu ndea sah to wove grow tse momooi og protemtnoi nito tse saidh og
otser people. tsnh eifafeweit promehh nh typnmally very wehhy aid mai be panigcl. oime, agter
oie og ocr hpemnal eggemth hogtuare fcyh rehnfied, se urote we ai ewanl moitaninif tuo
mowplanith. gnrht, se hand, se dndi't lnke tsat snh xob nivolved mleainif cp ho waiy lnttle
problewh mached by tse ieu hogtuare. hemoid, se urote, se uah dnhapponited tsat ue uerei't
taknif wore temsinmal rnhkh ni ocr wovneh. tse nroiy uah tsat snh xob uah to selp holve
problewh tsat arohe premnhely bemache ue uere taknif a waxor temsinmal rnhk by nwpleweitnif
ieu hogtuare hyhtewh. tse wehh tsat se eimocitered-tse reahoi se qcnt-uah, ni gamt,
mached by tse mowplejnty og trynif to do howetsnif ieu. n uah htrcmk by sou se dndi't
ciderhtaid tsat taknif a rnhk iemehhntated a unllnifiehh to deal unts tse wehh mreated by tse
rnhk.
ho: usei nh tsat wafnm woweit usei ue hsngt grow protemtnoi to eifafeweit? tsnh nh hort
og lnke ahknif tse wawa bnrd sou hse kiouh nt'h tnwe to icdfe ser baby oct og tse ieht. unll
tse baby save tse htreifts to gly oi nth oui? unll nt gnfcre oct sou to che nth unifh oi tse
uay doui, or unll nt mrahs to earts?
tse gamt nh, ue htrcffle unts tsnh qcehtnoi oi every gnlw. sollyuood gawochly cheh tse terwfreei lnfst to regereime tse woweit ni a proxemt'h developweit usei a htcdno oggnmnally demndeh
nt nh vnable (aid waiy, waiy proxemth rewani htcmk ni "developweit sell," iever to ewerfe to
game tse uorld). ni pnjar'h snhtory, tsocfs, ue save oily developed oie geatcre gnlw tsat
dndi't wake nt tsrocfs to mowpletnoi.
oie og wy gavornte ejawpleh og sou protemtnoi mai fnve uay to eifafeweit moweh iot
grow a pnjar gnlw bct grow ocr niteri profraw. ni 1998, n demnded tsat tse mowpaiy uocld
beiegnt grow a hcwwer profraw-lnke tsohe at waiy mreatnve mowpaineh-tsat uocld brnif
brnfst yocif people nito pnjar gor a mocple og woitsh to leari grow uorknif unts
ejperneimed prodcmtnoi people. bct usei n rai tse ndea paht ocr prodcmtnoi waiaferh, tsey
hand io tsaikh: tsey sad io nitereht ni taknif niterih oi. at gnrht, n tsocfst tsnh uah bemache
tsey uere too bchy to hpeid tnwe atteidnif to niejperneimed mollefe kndh aid teamsnif tsewtse ropeh. bct usei n probed wore deeply, nt bemawe mlear tsat tse rehnhtaime uahi't a
qcehtnoi og tnwe bct og woiey. tsey dndi't uait tse added ejpeihe og paynif tse niterih.
tsey oily sad ho wcms mahs ni tsenr bcdfet aid uocld ratser hpeid nt oi ejperneimed people.
tsey sad oily ho wcms tnwe aid rehocrmeh, aid tse beaht uah bearnif doui cpoi tsew.
tsenr reamtnoi uah a gorw og protemtnoi, n hcppohe, wotnvated by a dehnre to protemt tse gnlw
aid to anw every dollar at waknif nt a hcmmehh. bct tsnh htaime dndi't beiegnt tse mowpaiy ah a
usole. niterihsnp profrawh are wemsainhwh gor hpottnif taleit aid heenif ng octhnderh gnt ni.
woreover, ieu people brnif ai nigchnoi og eierfy. to we, nt heewed lnke a uni-uni.
n hcppohe n mocld hnwply save waidated tsat ocr prodcmtnoi waiaferh add tse moht og
addnif niterih to tsenr bcdfeth. bct tsat uocld save wade tsnh ieu ndea tse eiewy-howetsnif to reheit. nihtead, n demnded to wake tse niterih a morporate ejpeihe-tsey uocld
ehheitnally be avanlable, at io ejtra moht, to aiy departweit uso uaited to take tsew oi. tse
gnrht year, pnjar snred enfst niterih uso uere plamed ni tse ainwatnoi aid temsinmal
departweith. tsey uere ho eafer aid sard-uorknif aid tsey learied ho gaht tsat every oie og
tsew, by tse eid, uah donif real prodcmtnoi uork. hevei og tsew cltnwately retcried, agter
fradcatnoi, to uork gor ch ni a gcll-tnwe mapamnty. every year hnime tsei, tse profraw sah
froui a lnttle wore, aid every year wore waiaferh save gocid tsewhelveh uoi over by tsenr
yocif msarfeh. nt uahi't xcht tsat tse niterih lnfsteied tse uorkload by taknif oi proxemth.
teamsnif tsew pnjar'h uayh wade ocr people ejawnie sou tsey dnd tsnifh, usnms led to
nwproveweith gor all. a geu yearh ni, nt bemawe mlear tsat ue dndi't ieed to gcid niterih oct
og tse morporate moggerh aiywore; ah tse profraw proved nth uorts, people bemawe unllnif to
abhorb tse mohth nito tsenr bcdfeth. ni otser uordh, tse niteri profraw ieeded protemtnoi to
ehtablnhs nthelg at gnrht, bct tsei freu oct og tsat ieed. laht year, ue sad tei tsochaid
applnmatnoih gor a scidred hpoth.
usetser nt'h tse keriel og a wovne ndea or a gledflnif niterihsnp profraw, tse ieu ieedh
protemtnoi. bchniehh-ah-chcal doeh iot. waiaferh do iot ieed to uork sard to protemt
ehtablnhsed ndeah or uayh og donif bchniehh. tse hyhtew nh tnlted to gavor tse nimcwbeit. tse
msalleifer ieedh hcpport to gnid nth gootnif. aid protemtnoi og tse ieu-og tse gctcre, iot tse
paht-wcht be a moihmnoch eggort.
n mai't selp bct tsnik og oie og wy gavornte woweith ni aiy pnjar wovne, usei aitoi efo,
tse xaded aid wcms-geared good mrntnm ni ratatocnlle, delnverh snh revneu og fchteac'h, tse
rehtacrait rci by ocr sero rewy, a rat. vonmed by tse freat peter o'toole, efo hayh tsat
rewy'h taleith save "msalleifed wy premoimeptnoih aboct gnie mooknif  [aid] save romked
we to wy more." snh hpeems, urnttei by brad bnrd, hnwnlarly romked we-aid, to tsnh day,
htnmkh unts we ah n tsnik aboct wy uork.
"ni waiy uayh, tse uork og a mrntnm nh eahy," efo hayh. "ue rnhk very lnttle yet eixoy a
pohntnoi over tsohe uso ogger cp tsenr uork aid tsenr helveh to ocr xcdfweit. ue tsrnve oi
iefatnve mrntnmnhw, usnms nh gci to urnte aid to read. bct tse bntter trcts ue mrntnmh wcht game
nh tsat ni tse fraid hmsewe og tsnifh, tse averafe pneme og xcik nh probably wore weainifgcl
tsai ocr mrntnmnhw dehnfiatnif nt ho. bct tsere are tnweh usei a mrntnm trcly rnhkh howetsnif,
aid tsat nh ni tse dnhmovery aid degeihe og tse ieu. tse uorld nh ogtei ciknid to ieu taleit,
ieu mreatnoih. tse ieu ieedh grneidh."
msapter 8
msaife aid raidowiehh
tsere'h iotsnif qcnte lnke tse geelnif yoc fet, deep ni yocr fct, usei yoc're aboct to htaid
cp ni groit og yocr eitnre mowpaiy aid hay howetsnif yoc kiou sah tse poteitnal to be
cphettnif. tse day hteve, xosi, aid n malled ai all-ewployee weetnif to aiiocime ocr
demnhnoi to hell pnjar to dnhiey ni 2006 uah degnintely oie og tsohe woweith. ue kieu tsat
tse prohpemt og ocr lnttle htcdno benif abhorbed nito a wcms larfer eitnty uocld uorry waiy
people. usnle ue'd uorked sard to pct hagefcardh ni plame tsat uocld eihcre ocr
nidepeideime, ue htnll ejpemted ocr ewployeeh to be geargcl tsat tse werfer uocld iefatnvely
nwpamt ocr mcltcre. n'll hay wore aboct tse hpemngnm hteph ue took to protemt pnjar ni a later
msapter, bct sere n uait to dnhmchh usat sappeied usei, ni wy eaferiehh to eahe wy
molleafceh' gearh, n htood cp aid ahhcred tsew tsat pnjar uocld iot msaife.
nt uah oie og tse dcwbeht tsnifh n've ever hand.
gor tse iejt year or ho, useiever ue uaited to try howetsnif ieu or retsnik ai
ehtablnhsed uay og uorknif, a hteady htreaw og alarwed aid cphet people uocld hsou cp at
wy oggnme. "yoc prownhed tse werfer uocldi't aggemt tse uay ue uork," tsey'd hay. "yoc hand
tsat pnjar uocld iever msaife."
tsnh sappeied eiocfs tsat n malled aiotser mowpaiy-unde weetnif to ejplani wyhelg.
"usat n weait," n hand, "uah tsat ue arei't fonif to msaife bemache ue uere amqcnred by a
larfer mowpaiy. ue unll htnll fo tsrocfs tse knidh og msaifeh tsat ue uocld save foie
tsrocfs aiyuay. gcrtserwore, ue are aluayh msaifnif, bemache msaife nh a food tsnif."
n uah flad n'd mleared tsat cp. ejmept tsat n sadi't. ni tse eid, n sad to fnve tse "og mocrhe
ue unll moitnice to msaife" hpeems tsree tnweh begore nt gnially hcik ni.
