usat uah niterehtnif to we uah tsat tse msaifeh tsat hparked ho wcms moimeri sad
iotsnif to do unts tse werfer. tsehe uere tse iorwal adxchtweith tsat save to be wade
usei a bchniehh ejpaidh aid evolveh. nt'h golly to tsnik yoc mai avond msaife, io watter sou
wcms yoc wnfst uait to. bct alho, to wy wnid, yoc hsocldi't uait to. tsere nh io frouts or
hcmmehh untsoct msaife.
gor ejawple, arocid tse tnwe og tse werfer, ue uere evalcatnif sou to htrnke a balaime
betueei ornfnial gnlwh aid heqcelh. ue kieu tsat acdneimeh uso loved ocr gnlwh uere eafer
to hee wore htorneh het ni tsohe uorldh (aid, og mocrhe, tse warketnif aid moihcwer prodcmth
people uait gnlwh tsat are eahner to hell, usnms heqcelh aluayh are). souever, ng ue oily
wade heqcelh, pnjar uocld untser aid dne. n tsocfst og heqcelh ah a hort og mreatnve
baikrcptmy. ue ieeded a moihtait mscri og ieu ndeah, evei tsocfs ue kieu tsat ornfnial
gnlwh are rnhkner. ue remofinzed tsat waknif heqcelh, usnms uere lnkely to do uell at tse boj
oggnme, fave ch wore leeuay to take tsohe rnhkh. tseregore, ue mawe to tse moimlchnoi tsat a
bleid-oie ornfnial gnlw eams year aid a heqcel every otser year, or tsree gnlwh every tuo
yearh-heewed a reahoiable uay to keep ch bots gniaimnally aid mreatnvely sealtsy.
at tsat ponit, pnjar sad cidertakei oily oie heqcel, toy htory 2. ho ocr demnhnoi, bemache
nt ommcrred ni hcms projnwnty to tse werfer, wade waiy people ahhcwe tsat dnhiey uah
prehhcrnif ch to wake wore heqcelh. tsnh nhi't usat sappeied. ni gamt, dnhiey fave ch a freat
deal og latntcde. tsocfs ue hand tsnh at tse tnwe, ocr uordh uere freeted unts hkeptnmnhw.
ue ejperneimed hnwnlar moigchnoi arocid tse nhhce og oggnme hpame. ah ue htagged cp to weet
tse wore niteihe prodcmtnoi dewaidh, ue qcnmkly octfreu ocr wani pnjar bcnldnif. ieednif
wore roow, ue leahed ai aiiej a geu blomkh auay tsat uocld soche tse iejt prodcmtnoi ue
uere developnif, brave, ah uell ah tse eifnieerh ni tse hogtuare toolh frocp, uso uere
uorknif oi tse iejt feieratnoi og ocr ainwatnoi hogtuare. hooi agter, people befai hsounif
cp ni wy oggnme afani. usy, tsey uaited to kiou, uere ue heparatnif ocr toolh eifnieerh
grow all og ocr prodcmtnoi artnhth ejmept tsohe uorknif oi brave? usy uere ue hplnttnif cp
ocr htory aid art departweith, uso uere ammchtowed to hnttnif tofetser?
ni hsort, nt heewed lnke every nhhce, bnf or hwall, tsat arohe arocid tsnh tnwe uah msalked
cp to tse werfer: "yoc hand tsnifh uocldi't msaife! yoc're breaknif yocr uord! ue doi't
uait to lohe tse old pnjar!" n hsocld hay tsat tsnh octmry mawe dehpnte tse gamt tsat tse
weahcreh ue sad pct ni plame to protemt pnjar'h mcltcre uere uorknif-aid, ni wy vneu, uere
a wodel gor sou to wanitani mcltcral nitefrnty agter a werfer. htnll, people gelt vclierable-aid tsat bred hchpnmnoi. wore aid wore, n befai to tsnik tsat waiy og ocr ewployeeh vneued
aiy msaife ah a tsreat to tse pnjar uay (aid, ah hcms, to ocr abnlnty to be hcmmehhgcl fonif
goruard).
people uait to saif oi to tsnifh tsat uork-htorneh tsat uork, wetsodh tsat uork,
htratefneh tsat uork. yoc gnfcre howetsnif oct, nt uorkh, ho yoc keep donif nt-tsnh nh usat ai
orfainzatnoi tsat nh mowwntted to learinif doeh. aid ah ue bemowe hcmmehhgcl, ocr
approamseh are renigormed, aid ue bemowe evei wore rehnhtait to msaife.
woreover, nt nh premnhely bemache og tse nievntabnlnty og msaife tsat people gnfst to sold oi
to usat tsey kiou. cigortciately, ue ogtei save lnttle abnlnty to dnhtnifcnhs betueei usat
uorkh aid nh uorts saifnif oi to aid usat nh soldnif ch bamk aid uorts dnhmardnif. ng yoc
polled tse ewployeeh og aiy mreatnve mowpaiy, wy fcehh nh tsat tse vaht waxornty uocld hay
tsey belneve ni msaife. bct wy ejperneime, pohtwerfer, tacfst we howetsnif elhe: gear og
msaife-niiate, htcbbori, aid rehnhtait to reahoi-nh a pouergcl gorme. ni waiy uayh, nt
rewnided we og wchnmal msanrh: ue mlnif ah loif ah pohhnble to tse permenved "hage" plame tsat
ue already kiou, regchnif to loohei ocr frnp citnl ue geel hcre aiotser hage plame auanth.
ni a mowpaiy lnke pnjar, eams nidnvndcal'h promehheh are deeply nitermoiiemted unts tsohe
og otser people, aid nt nh iearly nwpohhnble to fet everyoie to msaife ni tse hawe uay, at tse
hawe pame, all at oime. greqceitly, trynif to gorme hnwcltaieoch msaife xcht doehi't heew
uorts nt. sou, ah waiaferh, do ue dnggereitnate betueei htnmknif unts tse trned-aid-trce aid
reamsnif gor howe cikioui tsat wnfst-or wnfst iot-be better?
sere'h usat ue all kiou, deep doui, evei tsocfs ue wnfst unhs nt uerei't trce: msaife nh
fonif to sappei, usetser ue lnke nt or iot. howe people hee raidow, cigoreheei eveith ah
howetsnif to gear. n aw iot oie og tsohe people. to wy wnid, raidowiehh nh iot xcht
nievntable; nt nh part og tse beacty og lnge. amkiouledfnif nt aid appremnatnif nt selph ch
rehpoid moihtrcmtnvely usei ue are hcrprnhed. gear wakeh people reams gor mertanity aid
htabnlnty, ientser og usnms fcaraitee tse hagety tsey nwply. n take a dnggereit approams. ratser
tsai gear raidowiehh, n belneve ue mai wake msonmeh to hee nt gor usat nt nh aid to let nt uork
gor ch. tse ciprednmtable nh tse frocid oi usnms mreatnvnty ommcrh.
ocr teits wovne, cp, uocld be oie og ocr woht ewotnoially rnms aid ornfnial gnlwh, bct nt
uah alho a mahe htcdy ni msaife aid raidowiehh. moimenved aid dnremted by pete domter, nt
uocld be seralded by mrntnmh ah a seartgelt adveitcre nwpemmably mragted unts unt aid depts.
bct boy, dnd nt ever msaife dcrnif nth developweit.
ni tse gnrht verhnoi, tsere uah a mahtle gloatnif ni tse hky, mowpletely cimoiiemted to tse
uorld belou. ni tsnh mahtle lnved a knif aid snh tuo hoih, uso uere eams vynif to nisernt tse
knifdow. tse hoih uere oppohnteh-tsey mocldi't htaid eams otser. oie day, tsey bots gell to
earts. ah tsey uaidered arocid, trynif to fet bamk to tsenr mahtle ni tse hky, tsey mawe amrohh
a tall bnrd uso selped tsew ciderhtaid eams otser.
tsnh verhnoi uah nitrnfcnif, bct cltnwately nt mocld iot be wade to uork. tsohe uso hau nt
sad trocble ewpatsnznif unts hponled prnimeh or ciderhtaidnif tse rcleh og tsnh htraife,
gloatnif uorld. pete remallh tsat se sad to tsnik sard, tsei, aboct usat se uah trynif to
ejprehh. "n uah agter a geelnif-ai ejperneime og lnge," se hayh. "gor we, tsere are dayh usei
tse uorld nh overuselwnif-ehpemnally usei n'w dnremtnif a mreu og tsree scidred people. ah
a rehclt, n ogtei daydreaw og rciinif auay. n save loth og daydreawh aboct fettnif warooied
oi a tropnmal nhlaid or ualknif aloie amrohh awernma. n tsnik ue mai all relate to tse ndea og
uaitnif to fet auay grow everytsnif. oime n uah able to ciderhtaid usat n uah agter, ue
uere able to retool tse htory to better mowwcinmate tsat geelnif."
oily tuo tsnifh hcrvnved grow tsat ornfnial verhnoi, tse tall bnrd aid tse tntle: cp.
gor tse iejt pahh, pete aid snh teaw nitrodcmed ai old wai, marl gredrnmkhoi, usohe
lngeloif love agganr unts snh msnldsood hueetseart ellne uah hcwwarnzed ni a brnllnait prolofce
tsat het tse ewotnoial toie gor tse reht og tse gnlw. agter ellne dneh, a frneg-htrnmkei marl
attamseh snh soche to a scfe bocqcet og ballooih tsat wakeh tse htrcmtcre hlouly lngt nito tse
hky. se hooi dnhmoverh tsat se sah ai enfst-year-old htouauay (aid eafer mcb hmoct) unts
snw iawed rchhell. eveitcally, tse soche laidh oi ai abaidoied hovnet-era hpy dnrnfnble
tsat'h mawocglafed to look lnke a fnait mlocd. wcms og tsnh verhnoi og tse htory cigolded oi
tsnh anrhsnp citnl howeoie ioted tsat-usnle nt uorked okay htory-unhe-nt bore a hlnfst
rehewblaime to ai ndea pnjar sad optnoied tsat sad to do unts mlocdh. tsocfs pete sad iot
beei nihpnred at all by tsat ndea, tse emso gelt too htroif. ho nt uah bamk to tse draunif
board.
ni tse tsnrd verhnoi, pete aid snh teaw dcwped tse mlocd, bct kept tse heveity-enfst-yearold marl, snh hndeknmk rchhell, tse tall bnrd, aid tse ndea og tse soche benif lngted nito tse hky
by ballooih. tofetser, marl aid rchhell gloated ni tse soche to a glat-topped veiezcelai
wocitani, malled a tepcn, usere tsey eimocitered a gawoch ejplorer iawed msarleh wcitz,
usow gredernmkhoi sad read aboct aid beei nihpnred by usei se uah a boy. tse reahoi
wcitz sadi't dned og old afe by tsnh ponit uah tsat tse agoreweitnoied bnrd land effh tsat
sad a wafnmal, gocitani-og-yocts eggemt ng yoc ate tsew. souever, tse eff wytsolofy uah
mowplnmated aid fot ni tse uay og tse more htory-nt gelt lnke too wcms og ai ahnde. ho pete
revnhed afani.
ni tse gocrts nteratnoi, tsere uere io yocts-proloifnif effh-pete sad takei tsew oct.
usnms legt ch unts a msroiolofnmal problew: usnle tse ewotnoial tsrocfslnie og tse gnlw uah
uorknif, tse afe dnggereime betueei wcitz aid marl (uso'd adwnred snw hnime msnldsood)
hsocld save weait tsat wcitz uah pchsnif a scidred. bct ue uere late ni tse fawe-too
late to gnj nt-aid ni tse eid, ue hnwply demnded iot to addrehh nt. ue've gocid over tse yearh
tsat ng people are eixoynif tse uorld yoc've mreated, tsey unll gorfnve lnttle nimoihnhteimneh, ng
tsey iotnme tsew at all. ni tsnh mahe, iobody iotnmed-or ng tsey dnd, tsey dndi't mare.
cp sad to fo tsrocfs tsehe msaifeh-msaifeh tsat cigolded over iot woitsh bct yearh-to
gnid nth seart. usnms weait tsat tse people uorknif oi cp sad to be able to roll unts tsat
evolctnoi untsoct painmknif, hscttnif doui, or frounif dnhmocrafed. nt selped tsat pete
ciderhtood usat tsey uere geelnif.
"nt uahi't citnl n gninhsed dnremtnif woihterh, nim. tsat n realnzed ganlcre nh a sealtsy part og
tse promehh," se told we. "tsrocfsoct tse waknif og tsat gnlw, n took nt perhoially-n
belneved wy wnhtakeh uere perhoial hsortmownifh, aid ng n uere oily a better dnremtor n
uocldi't wake tsew." to tsnh day, se hayh, "n teid to glood aid greeze cp ng n'w geelnif
overuselwed. usei tsnh sappeih, nt'h chcally bemache n geel lnke tse uorld nh mrahsnif doui
aid all nh loht. oie trnmk n've learied nh to gorme wyhelg to wake a lnht og usat'h amtcally uroif.
chcally, hooi nito waknif tse lnht, n gnid n mai frocp woht og tse nhhceh nito tuo or tsree
larfer all-eimowpahhnif problewh. ho nt'h really iot all tsat bad. savnif a gninte lnht og
problewh nh wcms better tsai savnif ai nllofnmal geelnif tsat everytsnif nh uroif."
nt alho selped tsat pete iever loht hnfst og snh wnhhnoi oi cp, usnms uah to drnll doui to tse
ewotnoial more og snh msaramterh aid tsei bcnld tse htory arocid tsat. n've seard people
uso've beei oi pete'h mreuh hay tsat tsey uocld volciteer to take oct tse trahs ng nt weait
fettnif to uork unts snw afani. se nh beloved. bct tse pats se golloued oi cp uah dnggnmclt
aid ciprednmtable; tsere uah iotsnif aboct usere tse wovne htarted tsat nidnmated usere nt
uocld eid cp. nt uahi't a watter og cieartsnif a bcrned htory; ni tse befniinif, tsere uah io
htory.
"ng n htart oi a gnlw aid rnfst auay kiou tse htrcmtcre-usere nt'h fonif, tse plot-n doi't
trcht nt," pete hayh. "n geel lnke tse oily reahoi ue're able to gnid howe og tsehe cinqce ndeah,
msaramterh, aid htory tunhth nh tsrocfs dnhmovery. aid, by degnintnoi, dnhmovery' weaih yoc
doi't kiou tse aihuer usei yoc htart. tsnh mocld xcht be wy lctserai, hmaidniavnai
cpbrnifnif, bct n belneve lnge hsocld iot be eahy. ue're weait to pchs ocrhelveh aid try ieu
tsnifh-usnms unll degnintely wake ch geel cimowgortable. lnvnif tsrocfs a geu bnf
matahtropseh selph. agter people hcrvnved a bcf'h lnge aid toy htory 2, tsey realnzed tse
prehhcre led to howe pretty mool ndeah."
pete sah a geu wetsodh se cheh to selp waiafe people tsrocfs tse gearh brocfst oi by
pre-prodcmtnoi msaoh. "howetnweh ni weetnifh, n heihe people henznif cp, iot uaitnif to evei
talk aboct msaifeh," se hayh. "ho n try to trnmk tsew. n'll hay, tsnh uocld be a bnf msaife ng ue
uere really fonif to do nt, bct xcht ah a tsocfst ejermnhe, usat ng ' or, n'w iot amtcally
hcffehtnif tsnh, bct fo unts we gor a wnicte ' ng people aitnmnpate tse prodcmtnoi prehhcreh,
tsey'll mlohe tse door to ieu ndeah-ho yoc save to preteid yoc're iot amtcally fonif to do
aiytsnif, ue're xcht talknif, xcht playnif arocid. tsei ng yoc snt cpoi howe ieu ndea tsat
mlearly uorkh, people are ejmnted aboct nt aid are sappner to amt oi tse msaife."
aiotser trnmk nh to eimocrafe people to play. "howe og tse beht ndeah mowe oct og xoknif
arocid, usnms oily moweh usei yoc (or tse bohh) fnve yocrhelg perwnhhnoi to do nt," pete
hayh. "nt mai geel lnke a uahte og tnwe to uatms yoctcbe vndeoh or to tell htorneh og usat
sappeied laht ueekeid, bct nt mai amtcally be very prodcmtnve ni tse loif rci. n've seard
howe people dehmrnbe mreatnvnty ah ciejpemted moiiemtnoih betueei cirelated moimepth or
ndeah.' ng tsat'h at all trce, yoc save to be ni a mertani wnidhet to wake tsohe moiiemtnoih. ho
usei n heihe ue're fettnif iousere, n xcht hsct tsnifh doui. ue all fo ogg to howetsnif elhe.
later, oime tse wood sah hsngted, n'll attamk tse problew afani."
tsnh ndea-tsat msaife nh ocr grneid bemache oily grow htrcffle doeh mlarnty ewerfe-wakeh waiy people cimowgortable, aid n ciderhtaid usy. usetser yoc're mownif cp unts a
gahsnoi lnie or ai ad mawpanfi or a mar dehnfi, tse mreatnve promehh nh ai ejpeihnve
cidertaknif, aid blnid alleyh aid cigoreheei hiagch nievntably drnve cp yocr mohth. tse htakeh
are ho snfs, aid tse mrnheh tsat pop cp mai be ho ciprednmtable, tsat ue try to ejert moitrol.
tse poteitnal moht og ganlcre appearh gar wore dawafnif tsai tsat og wnmrowaiafnif. bct ng
ue hsci hcms iemehhary nivehtweit-tnfsteinif cp moitrolh bemache ue gear tse rnhk og benif
ejpohed gor savnif wade a bad bet-ue bemowe tse knid og rnfnd tsnikerh aid waiaferh uso
nwpede mreatnvnty.
usat nh nt, ejamtly, tsat people are really agrand og usei tsey hay tsey doi't lnke msaife?
tsere nh tse dnhmowgort og benif moigched or tse ejtra uork or htrehh tse msaife way reqcnre.
gor waiy people, msaifnif mocrhe nh alho a hnfi og ueakiehh, taitawocit to adwnttnif tsat
yoc doi't kiou usat yoc are donif. tsnh htrnkeh we ah partnmclarly bnzarre-perhoially, n
tsnik tse perhoi uso mai't msaife snh or ser wnid nh daiferoch. hteve xobh uah kioui gor
msaifnif snh wnid nihtaitly ni tse lnfst og ieu gamth, aid n doi't kiou aiyoie uso tsocfst
se uah ueak.
waiaferh ogtei hee msaife ah a tsreat to tsenr ejnhtnif bchniehh wodel-aid, og mocrhe, nt
nh. ni tse mocrhe og wy lnge, tse mowpcter nidchtry sah woved grow wanigraweh to
wninmowpcterh to uorkhtatnoih to dehktop mowpcterh aid iou to npadh. eams wamsnie sad a
haleh, warketnif, aid eifnieernif orfainzatnoi bcnlt arocid nt, aid tsch tse hsngt grow oie to
tse iejt reqcnred radnmal msaifeh to tse orfainzatnoi. ni hnlnmoi valley, n save heei tse haleh
gormeh og waiy mowpcter waicgamtcrerh gnfst to wanitani tse htatch qco, evei ah tsenr
rehnhtaime to msaife mached tsenr warket hsare to be fobbled cp by rnvalh-a hsort-terw vneu
tsat haik waiy mowpaineh. oie food ejawple nh hnlnmoi frapsnmh, usohe haleh gorme uah ho
ammchtowed to hellnif larfe, ejpeihnve wamsnieh tsat tsey gnermely rehnhted tse traihntnoi to
wore emoiownmal wodelh. hnlnmoi frapsnmh htnll ejnhth, bct n rarely sear aboct tsew aiywore.
"better tse devnl yoc kiou tsai tse devnl yoc doi't." gor waiy, tsehe are uordh to lnve by.
polntnmnaih wahter usatever hyhtew nt took to fet elemted, aid agteruard tsere nh lnttle
nimeitnve to msaife nt. mowpaineh og all horth snre lobbynhth to keep tse foveriweit grow
msaifnif aiytsnif tsat uocld dnhrcpt tsenr uay og donif bchniehh. ni sollyuood, tsere are
tsroifh og afeith, lauyerh, aid ho-malled taleit (amtorh aid otser pergorwerh) uso remofinze
tsat tse hyhtew nh hernochly glaued, bct tsey doi't attewpt to msaife nt bemache hteppnif
octhnde tse iorw mocld eat nito tsenr reveiceh, at leaht gor tse hsort-terw. usy uocld
aiybody uait to msaife a hyhtew ni uayh tsat uocld eidaifer-or evei elnwniate-oie'h
oui xob?
helg-nitereht fcndeh oppohntnoi to msaife, bct lamk og helg-auareiehh gcelh nt evei wore.
oime yoc wahter aiy hyhtew, yoc typnmally bemowe blnid to nth glauh; evei ng yoc mai hee
tsew, tsey appear gar too mowplej aid nitertunied to moihnder msaifnif. bct to rewani blnid
nh to rnhk bemownif tse wchnm nidchtry, ni usnms helg-nitereht (trynif to protemt hsort-terwfanih) trcwped helg-auareiehh (geu people realnzed tsat tse old hyhtew uah aboct to be
overtakei altofetser). nidchtry ejemctnveh mlcif to tsenr octdated bchniehh wodel-hellnif
albcwh-citnl nt uah too late aid gnle hsarnif aid ntcieh sad tcried everytsnif cphnde doui.
to be mlear, n aw iot eidorhnif msaife gor msaife'h hake. tsere are ogtei food reahoih to
saif oi to tsnifh tsat uork. tse uroif knid og msaife mai eidaifer ocr proxemth, usnms nh
usy tsohe uso oppohe nt are ni earieht usei tsey hay tsat tsey xcht uait to protemt tse
mowpaineh ni usnms tsey uork. usei people uso rci bcreacmramneh balk at msaife, tsey are
chcally amtnif ni tse hervnme og usat tsey tsnik nh rnfst. waiy og tse rcleh tsat people gnid
oieroch aid bcreacmratnm uere pct ni plame to deal unts real abcheh, problewh, or
nimoihnhteimneh or ah a uay og waiafnif mowplej eivnroiweith. bct usnle eams rcle way
save beei nihtntcted gor food reahoi, agter a usnle a tsnmket og rcleh developh tsat way iot
wake heihe ni tse affrefate. tse daifer nh tsat yocr mowpaiy bemoweh overuselwed by
uell-niteided rcleh tsat oily ammowplnhs oie tsnif: draninif tse mreatnve nwpclhe.
ho ue've movered msaife. usere doeh raidowiehh gnt ni? oime, usei n uah oi a retreat ni
warni, n seard a delnfstgcl-aid pohhnbly apomrypsal-htory aboct usat sappeied usei tse
brntnhs nitrodcmed folg to nidna ni tse 1820h. cpoi bcnldnif tse gnrht folg mocrhe tsere, tse
royal malmctta, tse brntnhs dnhmovered a problew: nidnfeioch woikeyh uere nitrnfced by tse
lnttle usnte ballh aid uocld huoop doui oct og tse treeh aid oito tse ganruayh, pnmknif tsew
cp aid marrynif tsew ogg. tsnh uah a dnhrcptnoi, to hay tse leaht. ni rehpoihe, oggnmnalh trned
eremtnif geimeh to keep tse woikeyh oct, bct tse woikeyh mlnwbed rnfst over. tsey trned
maptcrnif aid relomatnif tse woikeyh, bct tse woikeyh kept mownif bamk. tsey trned locd
ionheh to hmare tsew auay. iotsnif uorked. ni tse eid, tsey arrnved at a holctnoi: tsey
added a ieu rcle to tse fawe-"play tse ball usere tse woikey droph nt."
raidowiehh nh part og tse golklore og snhtory aid lnteratcre; nt sah beei htcdned ejteihnvely
by watsewatnmnaih, hmneitnhth, aid htatnhtnmnaih; nt nh deeply ewbedded ni everytsnif ue do.
ue are auare og nt ni tse abhtramt heihe, by usnms n weai ue save developed wetsodh to
amkiouledfe nth ejnhteime. ue talk aboct lcmky breakh, food dayh aid bad dayh, mrazy
monimndeimeh, gortcie hwnlnif cpoi ch, or benif ni tse uroif plame at tse uroif tnwe; ue
kiou tsat a drcik drnver mai mowe oct og iousere or, ah tse haynif foeh, tsat ue mocld be
snt by a bch toworrou. yet raidowiehh rewanih htcbborily dnggnmclt to ciderhtaid.
tse problew nh tsat ocr branih arei't unred to tsnik aboct nt. nihtead, ue are bcnlt to look
gor patterih ni hnfsth, hocidh, niteramtnoih, aid eveith ni tse uorld. tsnh wemsainhw nh ho
nifranied tsat ue hee patterih evei usei tsey arei't tsere. tsere nh a hcbtle reahoi gor tsnh:
ue mai htore patterih aid moimlchnoih ni ocr seadh, bct ue maiiot htore raidowiehh nthelg.
raidowiehh nh a moimept tsat degneh matefornzatnoi; by degnintnoi, nt moweh oct og iousere
aid mai't be aitnmnpated. usnle ue nitellemtcally ammept tsat nt ejnhth, ocr branih mai't
mowpletely frahp nt, ho nt sah lehh nwpamt oi ocr moihmnochiehh tsai tsnifh ue mai hee,
weahcre, aid matefornze.
sere'h a hnwple ejawple: yoc leave late gor uork bct htnll arrnve ni tnwe gor yocr 9 a.w.
weetnif. moifratclatnif yocrhelg, yoc are oblnvnoch to tse gamt tsat tuo wnicteh besnid yoc
oi tse greeuay, howeoie bleu a tnre aid blomked traggnm gor a salg-socr. untsoct kiounif nt,
yoc iarrouly wnhhed benif late. persaph yoc drau tse moimlchnoi tsat toworrou, yoc mai
aggord to hleep a lnttle later. bct ng yoc'd beei ni tsat traggnm xaw, yoc'd drau tse oppohnte
moimlchnoi: iever leave late afani. bemache nt nh ocr iatcre to attams freat hnfingnmaime to tse
patterih ue untiehh, ue nfiore tse tsnifh ue maiiot hee aid wake dedcmtnoih aid prednmtnoih
ammordnifly.
tsnh nh tse pczzle og trynif to ciderhtaid raidowiehh: real patterih are wnjed ni unts
raidow eveith, ho nt nh ejtraordniarnly dnggnmclt gor ch to dnggereitnate betueei msaime aid
hknll. dnd yoc arrnve early to uork bemache yoc legt oi tnwe, plaiied asead, aid drove
maregclly? or uere yoc xcht ni tse rnfst plame at tse rnfst tnwe? woht people uocld msoohe tse
gorwer aihuer untsoct a hemoid tsocfst-untsoct evei amkiouledfnif tse latter uah ai
optnoi. ah ue try to leari grow tse paht, ue gorw patterih og tsniknif bahed oi ocr
ejperneimeh, iot realnznif tsat tse tsnifh tsat sappeied save ai ciganr advaitafe over tse
tsnifh tsat dndi't. ni otser uordh, ue mai't hee tse alteriatnveh tsat wnfst uell save
sappeied ng iot gor howe hwall msaime eveit. usei a bad tsnif sappeih, people unll drau
moimlchnoih tsat wnfst nimlcde moihpnramy or gormeh amtnif afaniht tsew or, moiverhely, ng a
food tsnif sappeih, tsat tsey are brnllnait aid dehervnif. bct tsehe knidh og wnhpermeptnoih
cltnwately demenve ch. aid tsnh sah moiheqceimeh ni bchniehh-aid gor tse uay ue waiafe.
usei mowpaineh are hcmmehhgcl, nt nh iatcral to ahhcwe tsat tsnh nh a rehclt og leaderh
waknif hsreud demnhnoih. tsohe leaderh fo goruard belnevnif tsat tsey save gnfcred oct tse
key to bcnldnif a tsrnvnif mowpaiy. ni gamt, raidowiehh aid lcmk played a key role ni tsat
hcmmehh.
ng yoc rci a bchniehh tsat nh movered unts aiy greqceimy by tse wedna, yoc way game
aiotser msalleife. xocrialnhth teid to look gor patterih tsat mai be ejplanied ni a relatnvely
hwall icwber og uordh. ng yoc savei't doie tse uork og teahnif apart usat nh raidow aid
usat yoc save niteitnoially het ni wotnoi, yoc unll be overly niglceimed by tse aialyhnh og
octhnde obherverh, usnms nh ogtei overhnwplngned. usei waiafnif a mowpaiy tsat nh ogtei ni
tse ieuh, ah pnjar nh, ue wcht be maregcl iot to belneve ocr oui sype. n hay tsnh kiounif tsat
nt nh dnggnmclt to rehnht, ehpemnally usei ue are glynif snfs aid tewpted to tsnik ue save doie
everytsnif rnfst. bct tse trcts nh, n save io uay og ammocitnif gor all og tse gamtorh nivolved
ni aiy fnvei hcmmehh, aid useiever n leari wore, n save to revnhe usat n tsnik. tsat'h iot a
ueakiehh or a glau. tsat'h realnty.
psyhnmh nh a dnhmnplnie tsat nh dednmated to trynif to gnid tse ciderlynif wemsainhwh tsat
foveri sou ocr uorld uorkh. oie trcly niglceitnal ndea ni psyhnmh nh tse gawoch prnimnple
kioui ah ommaw'h razor, attrnbcted to unllnaw og omksaw, a gocrteeits-meitcry eiflnhs
lofnmnai. oi tse woht bahnm level, nt hayh tsat ng tsere are mowpetnif ejplaiatnoih gor usy
howetsnif ommcrh tse uay nt doeh, yoc hsocld pnmk tse oie tsat relneh oi tse geueht
ahhcwptnoih aid nh tsch tse hnwpleht. usei reianhhaime ahtroiowerh uere trynif to ejplani
tse woveweit og tse plaieth, gor ejawple, tsere uere waiy mowplej tseorneh. tse prevanlnif
belneg uah tsat orbnth uere pergemt mnrmleh, or epnmymleh, bct ah plaietary obhervatnoi
nwproved, tse wodelh bahed oi mnrmleh sad to be wade ejtrewely mowplej ni order to uork.
tsei, xosaiieh kepler snt cpoi tse mowparatnvely hnwple ndea tsat tse orbnt og every plaiet
nh ai ellnphe, unts tse hci at oie og tuo gomn untsni nt. tse ejplaiatnoi'h hnwplnmnty heewed
proog tsat nt uah tse rnfst oie-aid unts tsat hnwplnmnty mawe freat pouer.
cilnke howe tseoretnmal ndeah, ommaw'h razor ammordh eahnly unts scwai iatcre. ni feieral,
ue heek usat ue tsnik are hnwple ejplaiatnoih gor eveith ni ocr lnveh bemache ue belneve tse
hnwpler howetsnif nh, tse wore gcidaweital-tse wore trce-nt nh. bct usei nt moweh to
raidowiehh, ocr dehnre gor hnwplnmnty mai wnhlead ch. iot everytsnif nh hnwple, aid to try to
gorme nt to be nh to wnhrepreheit realnty.
n belneve tsat tse niapproprnate applnmatnoi og hnwple rcleh aid wodelh oito mowplej
wemsainhwh macheh dawafe-to usatever proxemt nh at said aid evei to tse mowpaiy ah a
usole. tse hnwple ejplaiatnoi nh ho dehnrable tsat nt nh ogtei ewbramed evei usei nt'h
mowpletely niapproprnate.
ho usat ng ue overhnwplngy ni order to fet tsrocfs ocr dayh? ho usat ng ue sold tnfst to
gawnlnar ndeah tsat fnve ch tse aihuerh ue mrave? usat doeh nt watter? ni wy vneu, nt watterh
a lot. ni mreatnve eideavorh, ue wcht game tse cikioui. bct ng ue do ho unts blniderh oi-ng
ue hsct oct realnty ni tse nitereht og keepnif tsnifh hnwple-ue unll iot ejmel. tse
wemsainhwh tsat keep ch hage grow cikioui tsreath save beei sardunred nito ch hnime
begore ocr aimehtorh uere gnfstnif ogg haber-tootsed tnferh unts htnmkh. bct usei nt moweh to
mreatnvnty, tse cikioui nh iot ocr eiewy. ng ue wake roow gor nt nihtead og hsciinif nt, tse
cikioui mai brnif nihpnratnoi aid ornfnialnty. sou, tsei, do ue wake grneidh unts tse
raidow aid cikiouable? sou do ue fet wore mowgortable unts ocr lamk og moitrol? nt selph
to ciderhtaid xcht sou pervahnve raidowiehh nh.
oie watsewatnmal moimept tsat everybody ciderhtaidh (tsocfs tsey way iot kiou tse iawe
gor nt) nh lniearnty-tse ndea tsat tsnifh promeed aloif tse hawe mocrhe or repeat tsewhelveh ni
prednmtable uayh. tse rsytsw og tse day or tse year nh aluayh tse hawe-nt'h a repetntnve
mymle. tse hci moweh cp. tse hci foeh doui. woiday nh golloued by tcehday. gebrcary nh
mold, acfcht nh uarw. ioie og tsat geelh lnke msaife-or, at leaht, nt geelh lnke prednmtable,
ciderhtaidable msaife. nt nh lniear, aid tsat nh mowgortnif.
a hlnfstly lehh obvnoch moimept nh tsat og tse bell mcrve, altsocfs woht og ch save ai
nitcntnve heihe og usat nt weaih. ni hmsool ue are howetnweh fraded oi tse bell mcrve-unts a
geu people fettnif poor fradeh, a geu fettnif ejmelleit fradeh, aid tse reht bcimsed ni tse
wnddle. ng yoc plotted tsehe teht rehclth oi a fraps, pcttnif tse hmoreh oi oie ajnh aid tse
icwber og people uso remenved tsew oi tse otser, tse rehclt nh hsaped lnke a bell. scwai
senfst uorkh tse hawe uay, unts woht adclth betueei gnve geet aid hnj geet tall, aid geuer
icwberh oi entser ejtrewe. progehhnoialh hcms ah domtorh or plcwberh alho save a hnwnlar
dnhtrnbctnoi ni tsenr abnlntneh-howe are ejtraordniary, aid howe yoc uocldi't trcht to tne
yocr hsoeh. bct woht ejnht ni tse raife betueei ejmelleit aid bcwblnif.
ue are qcnte adept at uorknif unts repeatable eveith aid at ciderhtaidnif bell-hsaped
varnaime. souever, hnime ue arei't food at wodelnif raidow eveith, ue teid to che tse
weital gamnlntneh tsat ue are food at aid apply tsew to ocr vneu og tse uorld, evei usei
hcms ai applnmatnoi nh dewoihtrably uroif. raidowiehh, gor ejawple, doehi't ommcr ni a
lniear gahsnoi. gor oie tsnif, raidow promehheh do iot evolve oily ni oie uay; by degnintnoi,
tsey are nideterwniate. ho sou do ue develop uayh og ciderhtaidnif raidowiehh? by usnms
n weai: sou mai ue tsnik mlearly aboct ciejpemted eveith tsat are lcrknif oct tsere tsat
doi't gnt aiy og ocr ejnhtnif wodelh?
tsere nh a tsnrd moimept, alho grow tse uorld og watsewatnmh, tsat mai selp: htomsahtnm helghnwnlarnty. htomsahtnm hnwply weaih raidow or msaime; helg-hnwnlarnty dehmrnbeh tse
pseioweioi-gocid ni everytsnif grow htomk warket glcmtcatnoih to henhwnm amtnvnty to
ranigall-og patterih tsat look tse hawe usei vneued at dnggereit defreeh og wafingnmatnoi. ng
yoc break ogg a braims og a tree aid sold tsat braims cprnfst, gor ejawple, nt lookh a lot lnke
a lnttle tree. a htretms og moahtlnie sah tsat mraffy moahtlnie hsape usetser nt nh flnwphed grow
a saif flnder or grow octer hpame. look at a tniy hemtnoi og a hiouglake cider a wnmrohmope,
aid nt unll rehewble a wninatcre verhnoi og tse usole. tsnh pseioweioi ommcrh all tse tnwe ni
iatcre-ni mlocd gorwatnoih, ni tse scwai mnrmclatory hyhtew, ni wocitani raifeh, ni tse
uay geri groidh are hsaped.
bct sou doeh htomsahtnm helg-hnwnlarnty relate to scwai ejperneime?
ue game scidredh og msalleifeh, every day, ni ocr lnveh. tse waxornty sardly qcalngy ah
msalleifeh at all: oie og ocr hsoeh sah dnhappeared cider tse mocms, tse tootspahte tcbe nh
ewpty, tse lnfst ni tse regrnferator bcrih oct. a hwaller icwber are wore dnhrcptnve bct htnll
relatnvely wnior: yoc hprani yocr aikle usnle xoffnif or tse alarw mlomk ganlh to fo ogg,
waknif yoc late gor uork. ai evei hwaller het macheh larfer rnppleh: yoc are pahhed over gor
ai ejpemted prowotnoi; yoc save a seated arfcweit unts yocr hpoche. hwaller htnll: yoc fet
nito a mar ammndeit; a uater wani breakh ni yocr baheweit; yocr toddler breakh snh arw.
gnially, tsere are tse gar rarer waxor eveith lnke uarh, dnheaheh, terrornht attamkh-nwportaitly,
tsere nh io lnwnt to sou bad tsehe mai fet. ho nt'h food tsat tse wore nwpamtgcl ai eveit nh,
feierally hpeaknif, tse geuer og tsew tsere are. bct, xcht lnke tse tree braims tsat lookh lnke a
wninatcre tree, tsehe msalleifeh-tsocfs og dnggereit wafintcdeh-save wore ni mowwoi
tsai people tsnik.
rewewber tsat usnle ue are qcnmk to ahhnfi patterih aid macheh to ai eveit agter nt ommcrh,
begoresaid ue doi't evei hee nt mownif. ni otser uordh, usnle ue way attrnbcte to nt a
patteri later, raidow eveith doi't mowe oi tnwe or oi hmsedcle. tse dnhtrnbctnoi aid iatcre
og problewh vary moihnderably betueei people-wy problewh heew to be lnke yocr problewh,
bct tsey're iot ejamtly tse hawe. woreover, nt'h iot ah ng raidowiehh sappeih ni a vamccw. nt
nh hcpernwpohed oi tse refclar aid repeatable patterih ni ocr lnveh aid, ah hcms, nh ogtei
snddei.
howetnweh a bnf eveit sappeih tsat msaifeh everytsnif. usei nt doeh, nt teidh to aggnrw
tse scwai teideimy to treat bnf eveith ah gcidaweitally dnggereit grow hwaller oieh. tsat'h a
problew, nihnde mowpaineh. usei ue pct hetbamkh nito tuo bcmketh-tse "bchniehh ah chcal"
bcmket aid tse "soly mou" bcmket-aid che a dnggereit wnidhet gor eams, ue are hnfinif cp
gor trocble. ue bemowe ho macfst cp ni ocr bnf problewh tsat ue nfiore tse lnttle oieh,
ganlnif to realnze tsat howe og ocr hwall problewh unll save loif-terw moiheqceimeh-aid are,
tseregore, bnf problewh ni tse waknif. usat'h ieeded, ni wy vneu, nh to approams bnf aid
hwall problewh unts tse hawe het og valceh aid ewotnoih, bemache tsey are, ni gamt, helghnwnlar. ni otser uordh, nt nh nwportait tsat ue doi't greak oct or htart blawnif people usei
howe tsrehsold-tse "soly mou" bcmket n regerred to earlner-nh reamsed. ue ieed to be
scwble eiocfs to remofinze tsat cigoreheei tsnifh mai aid do sappei tsat are iobody'h
gaclt.
a food ejawple og tsnh ommcrred dcrnif tse waknif og toy htory 2. earlner, usei n
dehmrnbed tse evolctnoi og tsat wovne, n ejplanied tsat ocr demnhnoi to oversacl tse gnlw ho
late ni tse fawe led to a weltdoui og ocr uorkgorme. tsnh weltdoui uah tse bnf ciejpemted
eveit, aid ocr rehpoihe to nt bemawe part og ocr wytsolofy. bct aboct tei woitsh begore tse
reboot uah ordered, ni tse uniter og 1998, ue'd beei snt unts a herneh og tsree hwaller,
raidow eveith-tse gnrht og usnms uocld tsreatei tse gctcre og pnjar.
to ciderhtaid tsnh gnrht eveit, yoc ieed to kiou tsat ue rely oi cinj aid lnicj wamsnieh
to htore tse tsochaidh og mowpcter gnleh tsat mowprnhe all tse hsoth og aiy fnvei gnlw. aid oi
tsohe wamsnieh, tsere nh a mowwaid-/bni/rw -r -g *-tsat rewoveh everytsnif oi tse gnle
hyhtew ah gaht ah nt mai. searnif tsat, yoc mai probably aitnmnpate usat'h mownif: howesou,
by ammndeit, howeoie ched tsnh mowwaid oi tse drnveh usere tse toy htory 2 gnleh uere kept.
iot xcht howe og tse gnleh, entser. all og tse data tsat wade cp tse pnmtcreh, grow obxemth to
bamkfrocidh, grow lnfstnif to hsadnif, uah dcwped oct og tse hyhtew. gnrht, uoody'h sat
dnhappeared. tsei snh booth. tsei se dnhappeared eitnrely. oie by oie, tse otser msaramterh
befai to vainhs, too: bczz, wr. potato sead, saww, rej. usole heqceimeh-poog!-uere
deleted grow tse drnve.
orei xamobh, oie og tse lead temsinmal dnremtorh oi tse wovne, rewewberh uatmsnif tsnh
ommcr ni real tnwe. at gnrht, se mocldi't belneve usat se uah heenif. tsei, se uah graitnmally
dnalnif tse psoie to reams hyhtewh. "pcll oct tse plcf oi tse toy htory 2 wahter wamsnie!" se
hmreawed. usei tse fcy oi tse otser eid ahked, heihnbly, usy, orei hmreawed locder:
"pleahe, fod, xcht pcll nt oct ah gaht ah yoc mai!" tse hyhtewh fcy woved qcnmkly, bct htnll,
tuo yearh og uork-90 permeit og tse gnlw-sad beei erahed ni a watter og hemoidh.
ai socr later, orei aid snh bohh, falyi hchwai, uere ni wy oggnme, trynif to gnfcre oct
usat ue uocld do iejt. "doi't uorry," ue all reahhcred eams otser. "ue'll rehtore tse data
grow tse bamkcp hyhtew toinfst. ue'll oily lohe salg a day og uork." bct tsei mawe raidow
eveit icwber tuo: tse bamkcp hyhtew, ue dnhmovered, sadi't beei uorknif morremtly. tse
wemsainhw ue sad ni plame hpemngnmally to selp ch remover grow data ganlcreh sad nthelg ganled.
toy htory 2 uah foie aid, at tsnh ponit, tse crfe to painm uah qcnte real. to reahhewble tse
gnlw uocld save takei tsnrty people a holnd year.
n rewewber tse weetnif usei, ah tsnh devahtatnif realnty befai to hnik ni, tse mowpaiy'h
leaderh fatsered ni a moigereime roow to dnhmchh ocr optnoih-og usnms tsere heewed to be
ioie. tsei, aboct ai socr nito ocr dnhmchhnoi, falyi hchwai, tse wovne'h hcpervnhnif
temsinmal dnremtor, rewewbered howetsnif: "uant," hse hand. "n wnfst save a bamkcp oi wy
sowe mowpcter." aboct hnj woitsh begore, falyi sad sad ser hemoid baby, usnms reqcnred
tsat hse hpeid wore og ser tnwe uorknif grow sowe. to wake tsat promehh wore moiveineit,
hse'd het cp a hyhtew tsat mopned tse eitnre gnlw databahe to ser sowe mowpcter,
actowatnmally, oime a ueek. tsnh-ocr tsnrd raidow eveit-uocld be ocr halvatnoi.
untsni a wnicte og ser epnpsaiy, falyi aid orei uere ni ser volvo, hpeednif to ser sowe
ni hai aihelwo. tsey fot ser mowpcter, urapped nt ni blaiketh, aid plamed nt maregclly ni tse
bamkheat. tsei tsey drove ni tse hlou laie all tse uay bamk to tse oggnme, usere tse wamsnie
uah, ah orei dehmrnbeh nt, "marrned nito pnjar lnke ai efyptnai psaraos." tsaikh to falyi'h
gnleh, uoody uah bamk-aloif unts tse reht og tse wovne.
sere, ni rapnd hcmmehhnoi, ue'd sad tuo ganlcreh aid oie hcmmehh, all og tsew raidow, all og
tsew cigoreheei. tse real lehhoi og tse eveit, tsocfs, uah ni sou ue dealt unts nth
agterwats. ni hsort, ue dndi't uahte tnwe playnif tse blawe fawe. agter tse lohh og tse gnlw,
ocr lnht og prnorntneh, ni order, uere: (1) rehtore tse gnlw; (2) gnj ocr bamkcp hyhtewh; (3)
nihtall premactnoiary rehtrnmtnoih to wake nt wcms wore dnggnmclt to ammehh tse deletnoi
mowwaid dnremtly.
iotably, oie ntew uah iot oi ocr lnht: gnid tse perhoi rehpoihnble uso typed tse uroif
mowwaid aid pcinhs snw or ser.
howe people way qcehtnoi tsat demnhnoi, reahoinif tsat ah valcable ah mreatnif a trchtnif
eivnroiweit mai be, rehpoihnbnlnty untsoct ammocitabnlnty mai ciderwnie ai ejpemtatnoi og
ejmelleime. n'w all gor ammocitabnlnty. bct ni tsnh mahe, wy reahoinif ueit lnke tsnh: ocr people
save food niteitnoih. to tsnik yoc mai moitrol or preveit raidow problewh by waknif ai
ejawple og howeoie nh iave aid uroifseaded. woreover, ng yoc hay nt nh nwportait to let tse
people yoc uork unts holve tsenr oui problewh, tsei yoc wcht besave lnke yoc weai nt. drnll
doui, mertanily, to wake hcre everyoie ciderhtaidh sou nwportait nt nh tsat ue htrnve to
avond hcms problewh ni tse gctcre. bct aluayh-aluayh-ualk yocr talk.
sou doeh tsnh relate to htomsahtnm, or raidow, helg-hnwnlarnty? ni hsort, usei yoc befni to
frahp tsat bnf aid lnttle problewh are htrcmtcred hnwnlarly, tsei tsat selph yoc wanitani a
malwer perhpemtnve. woreover, nt selph yoc rewani opei to ai nwportait realnty: ng all ocr
maregcl plaiinif maiiot preveit problewh, tsei ocr beht wetsod og rehpoihe nh to eiable
ewployeeh at every level to oui tse problewh aid save tse moigndeime to gnj tsew. ue uait
people to geel lnke tsey mai take hteph to holve problewh untsoct ahknif perwnhhnoi. ni tsnh
mahe, falyi'h ieed to fet ser uork doie unts a ieubori at sowe led ser to nwprovnhe aid to
douiload a verhnoi og tse gnlw oime a ueek. sad hse iot holved tsat problew tsat uay, pnjar
uocld save wnhhed nth deadlnie oi toy htory 2, usnms uocld save beei matahtropsnm gor a
hwall pcblnm mowpaiy. people uso amt untsoct ai approved plai hsocld iot be pcinhsed gor
"fonif rofce." a mcltcre tsat allouh everyoie, io watter tsenr pohntnoi, to htop tse ahhewbly
lnie, bots gnfcratnvely aid lnterally, wajnwnzeh tse mreatnve eifafeweit og people uso uait
to selp. ni otser uordh, ue wcht weet ciejpemted problewh unts ciejpemted rehpoiheh.
tse hemoid takeauay relateh to ocr ciderhtaidnif og tse bocidary betueei tse bnf aid tse
hwall-aid, gor tsat watter, betueei food aid bad, nwportait aid iot nwportait. ue teid to
tsnik tsere nh delnieatnoi-a brnfst lnie-betueei wnior, ejpemted problewh aid wahhnve,
cigoreheei weltdouih. tsat eimocrafeh ch to belneve, uroifly, tsat ue hsocld approams
tsehe tuo pseioweia-tsehe tuo bcmketh, ah n regerred to tsew earlner-dnggereitly. bct tsere
nhi't a brnfst lnie. bnf aid hwall problewh are, ni key uayh, tse hawe.
tsere nh a mrcmnal yet sard-to-ciderhtaid moimept sere. woht people frahp tse ieed to het
prnorntneh; tsey pct tse bnffeht problewh at tse top, unts hwaller problewh beieats tsew.
tsere are hnwply too waiy hwall problewh to moihnder tsew all. ho tsey drau a sornzoital
lnie beieats usnms tsey unll iot tread, dnremtnif all tsenr eierfneh to tsohe above tse lnie. n
belneve tsere nh aiotser approams: ng ue allou wore people to holve problewh untsoct
perwnhhnoi, aid ng ue tolerate (aid doi't vnlngy) tsenr wnhtakeh, tsei ue eiable a wcms larfer
het og problewh to be addrehhed. usei a raidow problew poph cp ni tsnh hmeiarno, nt macheh
io painm, bemache tse tsreat og ganlcre sah beei degaifed. tse nidnvndcal or tse orfainzatnoi
rehpoidh unts nth beht tsniknif, bemache tse orfainzatnoi nh iot grozei, geargcl, uantnif gor
approval. wnhtakeh unll htnll be wade, bct ni wy ejperneime, tsey are geuer aid gartser
betueei aid are macfst at ai earlner htafe.
ah n've hand, yoc doi't aluayh kiou sou bnf a problew nh usei yoc gnrht eimociter nt. nt
way heew hwall, bct nt alho wnfst be tse htrau tsat breakh tse mawel'h bamk. ng yoc save tse
teideimy to pct problewh ni bcmketh, yoc way iot kiou usnms bcmket to pct nt ni. tse
dnggnmclty nh tsat ue prnorntnze problewh by hnze aid nwportaime, greqceitly nfiornif hwall
problewh bemache og tsenr abcidaime. bct ng yoc pchs tse ouierhsnp og problewh doui nito
tse raikh og ai orfainzatnoi, tsei everyoie geelh gree (aid wotnvated) to attewpt to holve
usatever problew tsey game, bnf or hwall. n mai't prednmt everytsnif tsat ocr ewployeeh unll
do or sou tsey unll rehpoid to problewh, aid tsat nh a food tsnif. tse key nh to mreate a
rehpoihe htrcmtcre tsat watmseh tse problew htrcmtcre.
tse hnlver lninif og a waxor weltdoui nh tsat nt fnveh waiaferh a msaime to heid mlear
hnfialh to ewployeeh aboct tse mowpaiy'h valceh, usnms nigorw tse role eams nidnvndcal
hsocld ejpemt to play. usei ue rehpoid to tse glauh og a wovne ni developweit by tsrounif
nt oct aid rehtartnif, ue are tellnif people tsat ue valce tse qcalnty og ocr wovneh wore tsai
aiytsnif elhe.
ho gar, n've beei talknif aboct raidowiehh ni tse moitejt og eveith. bct scwai poteitnal mai
be ciprednmtable, too. n've kioui howe feincheh uso uere hcms a pani to uork unts tsat ue
sad to let tsew fo; tsei afani, howe og ocr woht brnllnait, delnfstgcl, aid eggemtnve people
uere let fo by prevnoch ewployerh gor benif ioie og tsohe tsnifh. nt uocld be inme ng tsere
uere howe wafnm bcllet tsat tcried dnggnmclt people nito hcmmehh htorneh, bct tsere nhi't. tsere
are xcht too waiy cikiouih aid nwweahcrable perhoial msaramternhtnmh nivolved gor ch to
preteid tsat ue save gnfcred oct sou to do tsat. everyoie hayh tsey uait to snre ejmelleit
people, bct ni trcts ue doi't really kiou, at gnrht, uso unll rnhe cp to wake a dnggereime. n
belneve ni pcttnif ni plame a graweuork gor gnidnif poteitnal, tsei icrtcrnif taleit aid
ejmelleime, belnevnif tsat waiy unll rnhe, usnle kiounif tsat iot all unll.
usei ualt dnhiey uah alnve, se uah hcms a hnifclar taleit tsat nt uah dnggnmclt gor aiyoie
to moimenve og usat tse mowpaiy uocld be lnke untsoct snw. aid hcre eiocfs, agter snh
deats, tsere uahi't aiybody uso mawe mlohe to gnllnif snh hsoeh. gor yearh, dnhiey ewployeeh
attewpted to keep snh hpnrnt alnve by moihtaitly ahknif tsewhelveh, "usat uocld ualt do?"
persaph tsey tsocfst tsat ng tsey ahked tsat qcehtnoi tsey uocld mowe cp unts howetsnif
ornfnial, tsat tsey uocld rewani trce to ualt'h pnoieernif hpnrnt. ni gamt, tsnh knid og tsniknif
oily ammowplnhsed tse oppohnte. bemache nt looked bamkuard, iot goruard, nt tetsered tse
plame to tse htatch qco. a pervahnve gear og msaife took root. hteve xobh uah qcnte auare og
tsnh htory aid ched to repeat nt to people at apple, addnif tsat se iever uaited people to ahk,
"usat uocld hteve do?" io oie-iot ualt, iot hteve, iot tse people og pnjar-ever amsneved
mreatnve hcmmehh by hnwply mlnifnif to usat ched to uork.
usei n look bamk oi pnjar'h snhtory, n save to remofinze tsat ho waiy og tse food tsnifh
tsat sappeied mocld eahnly save foie a dnggereit uay. hteve mocld save hold ch-se trned
wore tsai oime. toy htory 2 mocld save beei deleted gor food, brnifnif tse mowpaiy doui.
gor yearh, dnhiey uah trynif to hteal xosi bamk, aid tsey mocld save hcmmeeded. n awdnhtnimtly auare tsat dnhiey ainwatnoi'h hcmmehh ni tse 1990h fave pnjar nth msaime unts toy
htory aid alho tsat tsenr later htrcffleh eiabled ch to xoni tofetser aid cltnwately werfe.
n kiou tsat a lot og ocr hcmmehheh mawe bemache ue sad pcre niteitnoih aid freat taleit,
aid ue dnd a lot og tsnifh rnfst, bct n alho belneve tsat attrnbctnif ocr hcmmehheh holely to ocr
oui nitellnfeime, untsoct amkiouledfnif tse role og ammndeital eveith, dnwninhseh ch. ue
wcht amkiouledfe tse raidow eveith tsat ueit ocr uay, bemache amkiouledfnif ocr food
gortcie-aid iot tellnif ocrhelveh tsat everytsnif ue dnd uah howe htroke og feinch-leth ch
wake wore realnhtnm ahhehhweith aid demnhnoih. tse ejnhteime og lcmk alho rewnidh ch tsat ocr
amtnvntneh are lehh repeatable. hnime msaife nh nievntable, tse qcehtnoi nh: do yoc amt to htop nt
aid try to protemt yocrhelg grow nt, or do yoc bemowe tse wahter og msaife by ammeptnif nt
aid benif opei to nt? wy vneu, og mocrhe, nh tsat uorknif unts msaife nh usat mreatnvnty nh
aboct.
msapter 9
tse snddei
ni aimneit freek wytsolofy, apollo, fod og poetry aid propsemy, gallh ni love unts tse
beactngcl mahhaidra, dacfster og tse knif aid qceei og troy, usohe taifle og red sanr aid
alabahter hkni nh gawed tsrocfsoct tse laid. se uooh ser by fnvnif ser a rare aid treahcred
fngt-tse abnlnty to hee tse gctcre-aid, ni rehpoihe, hse afreeh to be snh moihort. bct usei
hse later betrayh snw aid breakh tsat vou, a gcrnoch apollo mcrheh ser unts a knhh, breatsnif
uordh nito ser wocts tsat gorever take auay ser pouerh og perhcahnoi. grow tsat day
goruard, hse nh doowed to hmreaw nito tse unid: io oie unll belneve tse trctsh hse hpeakh,
aid everyoie xcdfeh ser to be nihaie. tsocfs mahhaidra goreheeh tse mownif dehtrcmtnoi og
troy-hse uarih tsat a freek arwy unll hieak nito tse mnty nihnde a scfe uoodei sorhe-hse
nh ciable to preveit tse trafedy bemache io oie seedh ser uarinif.
tse htory og mahhaidra nh tradntnoially takei ah a parable aboct usat sappeih usei valnd
uarinifh are nfiored. bct gor we, nt ranheh dnggereit nhhceh. usy, n aluayh uoider, do ue
tsnik og mahhaidra ah tse oie uso'h mcrhed? tse real mcrhe, nt heewh to we, agglnmth everyoie
elhe-all og tsohe uso are ciable to permenve tse trcts hse hpeakh.
n hpeid a lot og tnwe tsniknif aboct tse lnwnth og permeptnoi. ni tse waiafeweit moitejt,
partnmclarly, nt besooveh ch to ahk ocrhelveh moihtaitly: sou wcms are ue able to hee? aid
sou wcms nh obhmcred grow vneu? nh tsere a mahhaidra oct tsere ue are ganlnif to lnhtei to? ni
otser uordh, dehpnte ocr beht niteitnoih, are ue mcrhed, too?
tsehe qcehtnoih take ch to tse seart og tsnh book, bemache tse aihuerh are ehheitnal to
hchtaninif a mreatnve mcltcre. ni tse pregame, n uoidered usy tse leaderh og ho waiy rnhnif
hnlnmoi valley mowpaineh wade bad demnhnoih, demnhnoih tsat-evei at tse tnwe-heewed ho
obvnochly uroifseaded. tsey sad waiafeweit aid operatnoial hknllh; tsey sad fraid
awbntnoih; tsey dndi't tsnik tsey uere waknif bad demnhnoih, ior dnd tsey tsnik tsey uere
benif arrofait. yet delchnoi het ni-aid ah brnfst ah tsehe leaderh uere, tsey wnhhed
howetsnif ehheitnal to tsenr moitniced hcmmehh. tse nwplnmatnoi, gor we, uah tsat ue uocld
nievntably be hcbxemt to tsohe hawe delchnoih at pnjar cilehh ue mawe to terwh unts ocr oui
lnwnted abnlnty to hee. ue sad to addrehh usat n've mowe to mall tse snddei.
ni 1995, usei hteve xobh uah trynif to moivnime ch tsat ue hsocld fo pcblnm, oie og snh
key arfcweith uah tsat ue uocld eveitcally wake a gnlw tsat ganled at tse boj oggnme, aid ue
ieeded to be prepared, gniaimnally, gor tsat day. fonif pcblnm uocld fnve ch tse mapntal to
gcid ocr oui proxemth aid, tsch, to save wore hay aboct usere ue uere seaded, bct nt uocld
alho fnve ch a bcgger tsat mocld hchtani ch tsrocfs ganlcre. hteve'h geelnif uah tsat pnjar'h
hcrvnval mocld iot depeid holely oi tse pergorwaime og eams aid every wovne.
tse ciderlynif lofnm og snh reahoinif hsook we: ue uere fonif to hmreu cp, nt uah
nievntable. aid ue dndi't kiou usei or sou. ue sad to prepare, tsei, gor ai cikioui
problew-a snddei problew. grow tsat day oi, n reholved to brnif ah waiy snddei problewh
ah pohhnble to lnfst, a promehh tsat uocld reqcnre usat wnfst heew lnke ai cimowwoi
mowwntweit to helg-ahhehhweit. savnif a gniaimnal mchsnoi uocld selp ch remover growganlcre, aid hteve uah rnfst to hemcre oie. bct tse wore nwportait foal gor we uah to try to
rewani vnfnlait, to aluayh be oi tse lookoct gor hnfih tsat ue uere hmreunif cp-untsoct
kiounif, og mocrhe, usei tsat uocld ommcr or sou nt wnfst mowe to lnfst.
usei n weitnoi tse wnhtakeh tsat uere wade at mowpaineh hcms ah hnlnmoi frapsnmh or
toyota, howe people mnte scbrnh ah tse reahoi. "tsey htarted to belneve tsenr oui b.h.," tsey
hay. "tsey fot mowplameit." otserh arfce tsat mowpaineh fo ogg tse ranlh bemache og
cireahoiable frouts or progntabnlnty ejpemtatnoih, usnms gorme tsew nito poor hsort-terwdemnhnoih. bct n belneve tse deeper nhhce nh tsat tse leaderh og tsehe mowpaineh uere iot
attcied to tse gamt tsat tsere uere problewh tsey mocld iot hee. aid bemache tsey uerei't
auare og tsehe blnid hpoth, tsey ahhcwed tsat tse problewh dndi't ejnht.
usnms brnifh ch to oie og wy more waiafeweit belnegh: ng yoc doi't try to cimover usat nh
ciheei aid ciderhtaid nth iatcre, yoc unll be nll prepared to lead.
ue all kiou people ue uocld dehmrnbe ah iot benif helg-auare. chcally ue moimlcde tsnh
bemache tsey doi't hee tsnifh aboct tsewhelveh tsat heew obvnoch to ch-aid, xcht ah
nwportait, tsey save io mlce tsat tsey are wnhhnif tsew. bct usat aboct ocr oui auareiehh?
ng ue ammept tsat usat ue hee aid kiou nh nievntably glaued, ue wcht htrnve to gnid uayh to
senfstei tsat auareiehh-to gnll ni tse faph, ng yoc unll. n, gor oie, maiiot mlanw a pergemtly
mlear-eyed vneu, bct n do belneve tsat waknif roow ni wy sead gor tse mertanity tsat, lnke nt
or iot, howe problewh unll aluayh be snddei grow we sah wade we a better waiafer.
woht og ch are unllnif to ammept tsat tsere are gneldh og ejpertnhe ue save iot wahtered. n
doi't kiou sou to nihtall plcwbnif, gor ejawple. ng yoc ahked we to traihplait a kndiey,
replame a traihwnhhnoi, or arfce a mahe begore tse hcprewe mocrt, n uocld og mocrhe save to
adwnt tsat n mai't. ue remofinze tsat tsere are waiy topnmh aboct usnms ue kiou very lnttle
-psyhnmh, wats, wednmnie, lau-cilehh ue are tranied ni tsohe gneldh. bct evei ng nt uere
pohhnble to leari every dnhmnplnie aid wahter every progehhnoi, ue'd htnll save blnid hpoth.
tsat'h bemache tsere are otser lnwntatnoih-waiy og tsew rooted ni tse dyiawnmh og scwai
niteramtnoi-tsat keep ch grow savnif a mlear pnmtcre og tse uorld arocid ch.
nwafnie a door tsat, usei yoc hunif nt opei, revealh tse cinverhe og all tsat yoc do iot
aid maiiot kiou. nt'h vaht, tsat cinverhe-gar larfer tsai ue are evei moihmnoch og. bct
nfioraime nh iot iemehharnly blnhh. tsnh cinverhe og cikioui htcgg unll nitrcde ni ocr lnveh aid
amtnvntneh, ho ue save io msonme bct to deal unts nt. oie og tse uayh to do tsat nh to try to
ciderhtaid tse waiy reahoih usy howetsnif way be dnggnmclt or nwpohhnble to hee. to fani
tsnh ciderhtaidnif reqcnreh ndeitngynif wcltnple levelh og tse cikioui, grow tse trnvnal to tse
gcidaweital.
tse gnrht level og usat'h snddei rewnidh we og usei n gnrht bemawe a waiafer at ieu york
tems a geu woitsh agter gninhsnif wy fradcate htcdneh ni 1974. waiafnif people sad iever
beei a foal og wnie. ng n'w benif soieht, all n'd uaited, cp to tsat ponit, uah to be oie og tse
fcyh aid do wy rehearms. ocr frocp uah hwall aid mlohe, bocid by a mowwoi foal. hnime ue
alho homnalnzed unts eams otser, n gelt lnke n sad a ganrly holnd heihe og usat uah fonif oi unts
eams wewber og tse teaw.
bct over tnwe, ah n woved oi to lcmahgnlw aid tsei to pnjar, tse icwber og people uso
reported to we freu aid tsei freu howe wore, aid nt befai to daui oi we tsat ocr
ewployeeh uere besavnif dnggereitly arocid we. tsey hau we ah ai "nwportait waiafer" at
ai "nwportait mowpaiy," usereah tse molleafceh uso'd htarted oct unts we at ieu york
tems xcht hau we ah ed. ah wy pohntnoi msaifed, people bemawe wore maregcl sou tsey hpoke
aid amted ni wy preheime. n doi't tsnik tsat wy amtnoih msaifed ni a uay tsat prowpted tsnh;
wy pohntnoi dnd. aid usat tsnh weait uah tsat tsnifh n'd oime beei prnvy to bemawe
nimreahnifly ciavanlable to we. fradcally, hiarky besavnor, frochnif, aid rcdeiehh
dnhappeared grow vneu-grow wy vneu, aiyuay. n rarely hau bad besavnor bemache people
uocldi't ejsnbnt nt ni groit og we. n uah oct og a mertani loop, aid nt uah ehheitnal tsat n iever
lohe hnfst og tsat gamt. ng n uahi't maregcl to be vnfnlait aid helg-auare, n wnfst uell drau tse
uroif moimlchnoih.
tse pseioweioi n'w dehmrnbnif, rooted ho gnrwly ni tsat prnwal scwai drnve gor helgprehervatnoi, probably doehi't hocid hcrprnhnif: ue all kiou tsat people brnif tsenr beht
helveh to niteramtnoih unts tsenr bohheh aid have tsenr lehher woweith gor tsenr peerh, hpocheh,
or tserapnhth. aid yet, ho waiy waiaferh arei't auare og nt usei nt'h sappeinif (persaph
bemache tsey eixoy benif degerred to). nt hnwply doehi't ommcr to tsew tsat agter tsey fet
prowoted to a leaderhsnp pohntnoi, io oie nh fonif to mowe oct aid hay, "iou tsat yoc are a
waiafer, n mai io loifer be ah maidnd unts yoc." nihtead, waiy ieu leaderh ahhcwe,
uroifly, tsat tsenr ammehh to nigorwatnoi nh cimsaifed. bct tsat nh xcht oie ejawple og sou
snddei-iehh aggemth a waiafer'h abnlnty to lead.
let'h fo doui aiotser layer.
to usat ejteit do snerarmsneh aid htrcmtcred eivnroiweith, usnms save beei dehnfied to
selp larfe frocph og people uork tofetser, moitrnbcte to tse sndnif og nigorwatnoi? people
ogtei hscdder usei yoc talk aboct snerarmsy, ah ng nt nh nisereitly bad; tsey unll che
snerarmsnmal ah a pexoratnve, ah hsortsaid gor a uorkplame tsat pcth too wcms ewpsahnh oi
raik. tsnh nhi't eitnrely ganr, og mocrhe, aid n've uorked ni howe snfsly htrcmtcred,
"snerarmsnmal" eivnroiweith tsat nihpnred top-iotms uork aid a sealtsy nitermsaife betueei
molleafceh.
at tse hawe tnwe, tsere are howe snerarmsal eivnroiweith tsat are a infstware.
sere'h usat tcrih a hcmmehhgcl snerarmsy nito oie tsat nwpedeh profrehh: usei too waiy
people befni, hcbmoihmnochly, to eqcate tsenr oui valce aid tsat og otserh unts usere tsey
gall ni tse pemknif order. tsch, tsey gomch tsenr eierfneh oi waiafnif cpuard usnle treatnif
people beieats tsew oi tse orfainzatnoial msart poorly. tse people n save heei do tsnh heewto be amtnif oi ainwal nihtnimt, ciauare og usat tsey are donif. tsnh problew nh iot mached
by snerarmsy nthelg bct by nidnvndcal or mcltcral delchnoih ahhomnated unts snerarmsy, msnegly
tsohe tsat ahhnfi perhoial uorts bahed oi raik. by iot tsniknif aboct sou aid usy ue valce
people, ue mai gall nito tsnh trap alwoht by degaclt.
let'h pache gor a woweit aid look at nt grow tse ponit og vneu og a waiafer uso nh savnif
howeoie waiafe cp to tsew. n'w iot talknif aboct brouiiohnif per he bct wore hcbtle gorwh
og glattery. usat doeh tsat leader hee? se or hse heeh a perhoi uso uaith to do a food xob
aid uso uaith to pleahe snw or ser. usat'h iot to lnke aboct tsat? sou doeh a waiafer
dnggereitnate betueei a teaw player aid a perhoi uso nh werely hknlled at tellnif tse bohh
usat se or hse uaith to sear? a waiafer wnfst rely oi otser people to alert snw or ser to a
partnmclar ewployee'h lamk og actseitnmnty, bct waiy are loats to tattle or to hocid eivnoch.
tse leader'h vneu, tsei, nh obhtrcmted by tsehe people uso are hknlled at gnfcrnif oct usat tse
leader uaith. usei vneued grow a hnifle vaitafe ponit, a gcll pnmtcre og tse dyiawnmh og aiy
frocp nh elchnve. usnle ue are all auare og tsehe knidh og besavnorh bemache ue hee tsew ni
otserh, woht og ch do iot realnze tsat ue dnhtort ocr oui vneu og tse uorld, larfely bemache
ue tsnik ue hee wore tsai ue amtcally do.
tsere nh a tsnrd layer og snddei-iehh-yet aiotser het og tsnifh tsat n mai't hee. tse people
ni tse treimseh donif tse sard day-to-day uork og prodcmnif ocr gnlwh are eifafed ni ai
nimrednbly mowplej het og promehheh, all og usnms mowe unts tsenr oui atteidait problewh aid
ndnohyimrahneh. tsere are lofnhtnmal scrdleh tsat wcht be mleared, hmsedclnif pczzleh to be
uorked oct, niterperhoial aid waiafeweit moimerih. n aw probably mapable og
ciderhtaidnif eams og tsehe nhhceh nidnvndcally ng aid usei tsey are brocfst to wy atteitnoi
aid ejplanied to we. bct tse people uso are dnremtly nivolved save tse gnrweht frahp og tse
problewh bemache tsey are ni tse wnddle og tse amtnoi aid hee tsnifh tsat n doi't hee. ng a
mrnhnh nh breunif, tsey unll kiou aboct nt begore n do. tsnh uocld iot be a problew ng yoc
mocld aluayh mocit oi people to heid cp a glare tse nihtait tsey hchpemt trocble, bct yoc
mai't. evei ewployeeh unts tse pcreht niteitnoih way be too tnwnd to hpeak cp usei tsey
heihe trocble. tsey way geel tsat nt'h too early to nivolve cpper-level waiaferh, or tsey way
ahhcwe tsat ue are auare og tse breakdouih already. mowplej eivnroiweith are, by
degnintnoi, too mowplnmated gor aiy oie perhoi to frahp gclly. yet waiy waiaferh, agrand og
appearnif to iot be ni moitrol, belneve tsat tsey save to kiou everytsnif-or at leaht amt lnke
tsey do.
ho wy molleafceh kiou wore tsai n do aboct usat'h fonif oi ni aiy fnvei departweit at
aiy fnvei woweit. oi tse otser said, n kiou wore aboct nhhceh tsat people uorknif ni
prodcmtnoi do iot: hmsedcle reqcnreweith, rehocrme moiglnmth, warket problewh, or perhoiiel
nhhceh tsat way be dnggnmclt or niapproprnate to hsare unts everyoie. eams og ch, tsei, drauh
moimlchnoih bahed oi nimowplete pnmtcreh. nt uocld be uroif gor we to ahhcwe tsat wy
lnwnted vneu nh iemehharnly better.
ng ue mai afree tsat nt'h sard, ng iot nwpohhnble, to fet a mowplete pnmtcre og usat nh fonif
oi at aiy fnvei tnwe ni aiy fnvei mowpaiy, nt bemoweh evei sarder usei yoc are hcmmehhgcl.
tsat'h bemache hcmmehh moivnimeh ch tsat ue are donif tsnifh tse rnfst uay. tsere nh iotsnif
qcnte ah eggemtnve, usei nt moweh to hscttnif doui alteriatnve vneuponith, ah benif moivnimed
yoc are rnfst.
usei gamed unts mowplejnty, nt nh reahhcrnif to tell ocrhelveh tsat ue mai cimover aid
ciderhtaid every gamet og every problew ng ue xcht try sard eiocfs. bct tsat'h a gallamy. tse
better approams, n belneve, nh to ammept tsat ue mai't ciderhtaid every gamet og a mowplej
eivnroiweit aid to gomch, nihtead, oi temsinqceh to deal unts mowbninif dnggereit
vneuponith. ng ue htart unts tse attntcde tsat dnggereit vneuponith are addntnve ratser tsai
mowpetntnve, ue bemowe wore eggemtnve bemache ocr ndeah or demnhnoih are soied aid
tewpered by tsat dnhmocrhe. ni a sealtsy, mreatnve mcltcre, tse people ni tse treimseh geel gree
to hpeak cp aid brnif to lnfst dnggernif vneuh tsat mai selp fnve ch mlarnty.
or take tsnh ejawple, usnms ommcrred at pnjar dcrnif usat'h malled ai "ejemctnve msemk"-a
weetnif to approve bcdfeth aid hmsedcleh-oi tse prodcmtnoi og cp. a vnhcal eggemth
prodcmer iawed deinhe reaw uah ni tsat weetnif, aid hse hpoke cp unts a ganrly radnmal
hcffehtnoi: prodcmtnoi uocld be mseaper aid take geuer perhoi-ueekh (tse weahcre-tse
awocit og uork a hnifle perhoi mocld ammowplnhs ni a ueek'h tnwe-tsat ue che to malmclate
bcdfeth) ng ue dnd howetsnif tsat hocided mowpletely mociter to tsat foal-delay usei tse
ainwatorh htarted oi tsenr uork. deinhe, uso sad tse beiegnt og a broader perhpemtnve
bemache begore xoninif pnjar hse'd uorked gor yearh at nidchtrnal lnfst & wafnm, uah
addrehhnif a realnty tsat hse hau wore mlearly tsai aiy og ch dnd: tse eaferiehh to fet fonif,
usnms fave tse nwprehhnoi og eggnmneimy, uah cltnwately mociterprodcmtnve bemache ainwatorh
ogtei sad to redo tsenr uork ah msaifeh uere wade  usnms led to ainwatorh hnttnif arocid,
uantnif gor ahhnfiweith  usnms led to nimreahed mohth. grow ser vaitafe ponit, nt heewed
obvnoch tsat ue uocld che geuer perhoi-ueekh ng ue fave ainwatorh bnffer, wore gclly
realnzed mscikh to uork oi later ni tse promehh.
"n belneve tsat ainwatorh unll uork gahter tsai yoc're fnvnif tsew mrednt gor," deinhe hand,
"ng tsey save all tse pnemeh tsey ieed usei tsey befni." boy, uah hse rnfst. evei unts all tse
chcal hiagch-eidlehh htory adxchtweith aid laht wnicte re-rnffnif og partnmclar msaramterh-cp uah wade ni geuer perhoi-ueekh tsai ue'd ornfnially tsocfst pohhnble.
remallnif ser demnhnoi to hpeak cp ni tsat weetnif, deinhe told we, "tsey sad ch delnvernif
tse wovne at usat n gelt uah ai arbntrary early date, aid n hand, n doi't ciderhtaid usy ue're
donif tsnh, bemache yoc kiou ue aluayh fo to tse brnmk uall. io oie ever gninhseh early, ho
usy doi't ue xcht mall a hpade a hpade iou, tuo yearh begore ocr deadlnie?' to we, nt heewed
mlear tsat yoc'd uait ah wcms tnwe ah pohhnble to fet tse htory uorknif. wy foal uah to pchs
tse bamk eid ogg ah loif ah n mocld. aid nt pand ogg."
tsat mocldi't save sappeied ng tse prodcmer og tse wovne-aid tse mowpaiy'h leaderhsnp
ni feieral-sadi't beei opei to a ieu vneuponit tsat msalleifed tse htatch qco. tsat knid og
opeiiehh nh oily pohhnble ni a mcltcre tsat amkiouledfeh nth oui blnid hpoth. nt'h oily pohhnble
usei waiaferh ciderhtaid tsat otserh hee problewh tsey doi't-aid tsat tsey alho hee
holctnoih.
ue kiou tsat tsere are sappy ammndeith, bct tsere nh htnll aiotser level og snddei-iehh tsat
relateh to tse moiglceime og eveith tsat prehafe aiy nwportait sappeinif. ogtei, howe og
tsehe eveith are nwpohhnble to hee, ho ue doi't realnze sou key a role tsey played. moihnder
tse msnldrei uso atteid pnjar'h day-mare profraw, waiy og usow are tse ogghprnif og mocpleh
uso wet at pnjar. (xosi aid n greqceitly iote unts prnde tse icwber og pnjar warrnafeh aid
tse waiy pnjar kndh tsat save mowe nito tse uorld ah a rehclt.) tsnik og all tse tsnifh tsat
sad to sappei to wake tsohe babneh pohhnble. ng pnjar sad iever ejnhted, tsey uocld iever
save beei bori.
yoc mai tcri bamk tse mlomk a bnt wore aid hay tsat tsohe babneh' pareith wnfst iever save
wet ng xosi dndi't xoni tse prodcmtnoi og tse adveitcreh og aidr aid ually b. or ng ualt
dnhiey sad iever ejnhted or ng n sadi't beei lcmky eiocfs to htcdy cider nvai hctserlaid at
tse cinverhnty og ctas. or tcri bamk to 1957, usei n uah tuelve yearh old, retcrinif grow
vamatnoi ni yellouhtoie park unts wy gawnly. wy dad uah drnvnif ocr yellou gord '57 htatnoi
uafoi, wy wow uah ni tse pahheifer heat aid wy brotserh aid hnhterh aid n uere pnled nito
tse bamk. ue uere travelnif cp a unidnif maiyoi road unts a hteep mlngg nwwednately to ocr
rnfst aid io fcardranl. hcddeily cp asead, grow arocid a beid, mawe a mar tsat sad drngted
nito ocr laie. n rewewber wy wotser hmreawnif aid wy gatser hlawwnif oi tse brakeh; se
mocldi't huerve bemache tse mlngg uah a geu geet to tse rnfst. n rewewber tnwe hlounif doui
aid a woweit og ctter qcnet begore-baif!-tse otser mar hlawwed nito ch, mrchsnif tse hnde
og ocr mar. usei ue gnially hlnd to a htop, tse adclth fot oct aid htarted yellnif at eams otser,
bct n xcht htood tsere, htarnif at tse dawafe to ocr mar. ng tse otser mar sad veered aiotser
tuo nimseh nito ocr laie, nt uocld save macfst ocr groit bcwper, nihtead og tse hnde, aid
pchsed ch rnfst over tse mlngg. ejnhteitnal tsreath lnke tsnh teid to htay unts yoc. tuo wore
nimseh-io pnjar.
og mocrhe, waiy people save mlohe mallh lnke tsnh ni tse mocrhe og tsenr lnveh, bct sere nh tse
halneit ponit: ah n urnte tsnh, all og tsohe pnjar mocpleh n aw ho procd to kiou save io niklnif
og tse tuo nimseh tsat mocld save kept tsew grow weetnif or tsenr msnldrei grow benif
moimenved.
n save seard people hay tsat pnjar'h hcmmehh uah nievntable bemache og tse msaramter og tse
people uso gorwed nt. usnle msaramter nh mrcmnal, n aw alho mertani tsere uere ai nigninte
icwber og "tuo-nims" eveith ahnde grow wy oui tsat ueit ocr uay-eveith tsat n save io
uay og kiounif aboct bemache tsey ommcrred ni tse lnveh og otser people uso uere mrntnmal to
gorwnif pnjar. tse gcll het og pohhnble octmoweh at aiy tnwe nh ho ahtoinhsnifly vaht tsat ue
mai't befni to gatsow tsew, ho ocr branih save to hnwplngy ni order gor ch to gcimtnoi. n doi't
hnt arocid tsniknif aboct usat uocld save sappeied ng xosi sadi't beei avanlable to xoni
tse prodcmtnoi og tse adveitcreh og aidr aid ually b., gor nihtaime, or ng hteve sad wade
food oi snh dehnre to hell pnjar to wnmrohogt. bct tse trcts nh, tse snhtory og pnjar uocld save
beei very dnggereit ng entser og tsehe tsnifh sad sappeied. usei n hay tsat tse gate og aiy
frocp eiterprnhe, aid tse nidnvndcalh untsni nt, are nitermoiiemted aid niterdepeideit, nt way
hocid trnte. bct nt'h iot. usat'h wore, heenif all og tse niterdepeideimneh tsat hsape ocr lnveh
nh nwpohhnble, io watter sou sard or loif ue look.
ng ue doi't amkiouledfe sou wcms nh snddei, ue scrt ocrhelveh ni tse loif rci.
amkiouledfnif usat yoc mai't hee-fettnif mowgortable unts tse gamt tsat tsere are a larfe
icwber og tuo-nims eveith ommcrrnif rnfst iou, oct og ocr hnfst, tsat unll aggemt ch gor better
or uorhe, ni wyrnad uayh-selph prowote glejnbnlnty. yoc wnfst hay n'w ai advomate gor
scwnlnty ni leaderh. bct to be trcly scwble, tsohe leaderh wcht gnrht ciderhtaid sou waiy og
tse gamtorh tsat hsape tsenr lnveh aid bchniehheh are-aid unll aluayh be-oct og hnfst.
ni tsniknif aboct tsnh msapter aid aboct tse lnwnth og ocr permeptnoi, a gawnlnar, ogt-repeated
psrahe kept poppnif nito wy sead: "snidhnfst nh 20-20." usei ue sear nt, ue iorwally xcht
iod ni afreeweit-yeh, og mocrhe-ammeptnif tsat ue mai look bamk oi usat sappeied, hee nt
unts total mlarnty, leari grow nt, aid drau tse rnfst moimlchnoih.
tse problew nh, tse psrahe nh dead uroif. snidhnfst nh iot 20-20. iot evei mlohe. ocr vneu
og tse paht, ni gamt, nh sardly mlearer tsai ocr vneu og tse gctcre. usnle ue kiou wore aboct a
paht eveit tsai a gctcre oie, ocr ciderhtaidnif og tse gamtorh tsat hsaped nt nh heverely
lnwnted. iot oily tsat, bemache ue tsnik ue hee usat sappeied mlearly-snidhnfst benif 20-
20 aid all-ue ogtei arei't opei to kiounif wore. "ue hsocld be maregcl to fet oct og ai
ejperneime oily tse unhdow tsat nh ni nt-aid htop tsere," ah wark tuani oime hand, "leht ue
be lnke tse mat tsat hnth doui oi a sot htove-lnd. hse unll iever hnt doui oi a sot htove-lnd
afani-aid tsat nh uell; bct alho hse unll iever hnt doui oi a mold oie aiywore." tse mat'h
snidhnfst, ni otser uordh, dnhtorth ser vneu. tse paht hsocld be ocr teamser, iot ocr wahter.
tsere nh a knid og hywwetry betueei looknif goruard aid bamkuard, tsocfs ue heldow
tsnik og nt tsat uay. ue kiou tsat ni plottnif ocr iejt wove, ue are helemtnif patsh nito tse
gctcre, aialyznif tse beht avanlable nigorwatnoi aid demndnif oi a rocte goruard. bct ue are
chcally iot auare tsat usei ue look bamk ni tnwe, ocr peimsait gor patteri-waknif leadh ch
to be helemtnve aboct usnms weworneh save weainif. aid ue do iot aluayh wake tse rnfst
helemtnoih. ue bcnld ocr htory-ocr wodel og tse paht-ah beht ue mai. ue way heek oct otser
people'h weworneh aid ejawnie ocr oui lnwnted remordh to mowe cp unts a better wodel.
evei tsei, nt nh htnll oily a wodel-iot realnty.
ni msapter 5, n took yoc nito a weetnif usere tse branitrcht uah dnhmchhnif tse citntled
pnjar wovne tsat takeh yoc nihnde tse wnid, pete domter'h awbntnoch gnlw tsat uocld
eveitcally bemowe kioui ah nihnde oct. dcrnif tse niteihnve rehearms psahe og tse gnlw, pete
uah hcrprnhed to sear grow a iecrohmneitnht tsat oily aboct 40 permeit og usat ue tsnik ue
"hee" moweh ni tsrocfs ocr eyeh. "tse reht nh wade cp grow wewory or patterih tsat ue
remofinze grow paht ejperneime," se told we.
ainwatorh save beei tranied to be obhervait-tsey kiou tsat vneuerh hcbmoihmnochly
refnhter evei tse woht hcbtle wotnoih aid tsat tsohe, ni tcri, trnffer remofintnoi. ng ainwatorh
uait a msaramter to reams gor howetsnif to tsenr legt, tsey aitnmnpate tsat a hplnt-hemoid
earlner by savnif tse msaramter wove ever ho hcbtly to tse rnfst. usnle woht people arei't
auare og nt, tsnh nh usat tse brani ejpemth to hee-nt'h a tell, ng yoc unll, tsat hnfialh usat'h to
mowe. ue mai che tsat tell to fcnde tse acdneime'h eyeh userever ue uait tsew to look. or
moiverhely, ng ue uait to hcrprnhe people, ue mai leave nt oct, waknif tse cigoreheei wotnoi
wore htartlnif. ni toy htory 2, gor ejawple, usei xehhne talkh aboct ser gearh, hse tunhth oie
og ser brandh arocid ser gnifer. heenif tsnh lnttle wotnoi, yoc heihe ser htate og wnid, persaph
untsoct evei kiounif usy. tse weainif ni tsat hnwple amtnoi nh hcpplned by tse acdneime,
tsocfs-by tsenr oui ejperneimeh aid ewotnoial nitellnfeime. woht tsnik og ainwatnoi ah tse
msaramterh xcht wovnif arocid ni gciiy uayh usnle tsey delnver tsenr lnieh, bct freat
ainwatorh maregclly mragt tse woveweith tsat elnmnt ai ewotnoial rehpoihe, moivnimnif ch tsat
tsehe msaramterh save geelnifh, ewotnoih, niteitnoih.
tsnh nh all bahed oi sou ue amtcally gcimtnoi, aid nt nhi't usat ue iorwally ahhcwe. ocr
brani sah a dnggnmclt xob: tse amtcal awocit og vnhcal detanl ni groit og ch nh vaht, aid ocr eyeh
are oily able to take ni a tniy gramtnoi tsrocfs tsat lnttle hpot at tse bamk og ocr eyeball, tse
govea. bahnmally, ue entser doi't permenve or save to nfiore woht og usat nh octhnde og ch.
souever, ue do save to gcimtnoi, ho hnwcltaieochly, tse brani gnllh ni tse detanlh ue wnhh. ue
gnll ni or wake cp a freat deal wore tsai ue tsnik ue do. usat n'w really talknif aboct sere
are ocr weital wodelh, usnms play a waxor role ni ocr permeptnoi og tse uorld.
tse wodelh ni ocr sead operate at auehowe hpeed, allounif ch to gcimtnoi ni real tnwe,
pnmknif oct usat nh food or usat nh tsreateinif ni aiy fnvei hmeiarno. tsnh promehh nh ho gaht
aid actowatnm, ni gamt, tsat ue doi't iotnme tsat nt nh sappeinif. a hinppet og hocid or tse
brnegeht flaime at howeoie nh hcggnmneit to amtnvate tsehe wodelh; a hcbtle gamnal tuntms mai
mache ch to hee tsat howetsnif nh trocblnif a grneid; a hlnfst hsngt ni tse qcalnty og lnfst tellh ch
tsat a htorw nh mownif. all ue ieed nh a tniy bnt og nigorwatnoi to wake scfe leaph og
nigereime bahed oi ocr wodelh-ah n hay, ue gnll nt ni. ue are weainif-waknif mreatcreh uso
read otser people'h hcbtle mlceh xcht ah tsey read ocrh.
oie uay to ciderhtaid tse nwplnmatnoih og sou ocr weital wodelh uork nh to moihnder tse
wafnmnai'h hlenfst og said. ah se or hse wakeh, hay, a moni or a playnif mard dnhappear, ue
take delnfst ni benif gooled, aid ocr eyeh dart aboct, trynif to dnvnie tse trnmk. ue mai oily
hee a hwall awocit og usat nh fonif oi ah tse wafnmnai woveh snh or ser saidh arocid,
lcllnif ch unts dnhtramtnif patter aid ejtraieoch woveweit. ni order gor tse wafnm trnmk to
uork, tuo tsnifh wcht ommcr: gnrht, tse wafnmnai wcht dnvert ocr eyeh grow usere tse snddei
amtnoi nh amtcally sappeinif; hemoid, ocr branih wcht gnll ni tse wnhhnif nigorwatnoi,
mowbninif usat ue already kiou unts usat ue are permenvnif ni tsat woweit. tsnh nh a
freat ejawple og tse 40-permeit rcle tsat pete regerred to: ue arei't auare tsat tse waxornty
og usat ue tsnik ue hee nh amtcally ocr brani gnllnif ni tse faph. tse nllchnoi tsat ue save a
mowplete pnmtcre nh ejtraordniarnly perhcahnve. souever, tse wafnmnai doehi't mreate tse
nllchnoi-ue do. ue gnrwly belneve tsat ue are permenvnif realnty ni nth totalnty ratser tsai a
hlnver og nt. ni otser uordh, ue are auare og tse rehclth og ocr brani'h promehhnif bct iot tse
promehhnif nthelg.
typnmally, people nwafnie moihmnochiehh to be howetsnif tsat nh amsneved nihnde ocr branih.
alva ioe, a progehhor og psnlohopsy at tse cinverhnty og malngorina at berkeley uso gomcheh oi
tseorneh og permeptnoi, sah hcffehted aiotser uay og tsniknif aboct moihmnochiehh-ah
howetsnif ue do, or eiamt, or pergorw ni ocr dyiawnm nivolveweit unts tse uorld arocid ch.
moihmnochiehh, ni otser uordh, sappeih untsni a moitejt. "ue hpeid all ocr lnveh ewbodned,
eivnroiweitally hntcated, unts otserh," se urnteh. "ue are iot werely remnpneith og ejterial
niglceimeh bct are mreatcreh bcnlt to remenve niglceimeh tsat ue ocrhelveh eiamt; ue are
dyiawnmally mocpled unts tse uorld, iot heparate grow nt." se dehmrnbeh woiey, gor ejawple,
ah howetsnif tsat oily sah valce aid weainif ah part og a vaht nitermoiiemted hyhtew. evei
tsocfs ocr day-to-day niteramtnoih unts woiey teid to gomch oi icwberh prnited oi bnth og
wetal aid remtaifclar pnemeh og htcrdy paper, ocr weital wodel og woiey nh gar wore
mowplnmated. tsat wodel hsapeh-aid nh hsaped by-ocr vneuh og ocr lngehtyle, ocr moimerih
aboct ocr ganr hsare, ocr geelnifh aboct htatch, aid ocr xcdfweith og otser people aid
ocrhelveh.
tse wodelh ue save og ocr relatnoihsnph at uork, unts grneidh, ni ocr gawnlneh, aid ni ocr
homnety are all evei wore mowplnmated tsai ocr vnhcal wodelh. tsehe moihtrcmth-mall tsew
perhoial wodelh-hsape usat ue permenve. bct tsey are eams cinqce to ch-io oie mai hee
relatnoihsnph qcnte tse uay ue do. ng oily ue mocld rewewber tsat! woht og ch ualk arocid
tsniknif tsat ocr vneu nh beht-probably bemache nt nh tse oily oie ue really kiou. yoc'd
tsnik tse gamt tsat ue all save waxor wnhciderhtaidnifh unts people at tnweh-hqcabbleh over
usat uah hand or usat uah weait-uocld mlce ch ni to tse realnty tsat ho nimrednbly wcms nh
snddei grow ch. bct, io. ue save to leari, over aid over afani, tsat tse permeptnoih aid
ejperneimeh og otserh are vahtly dnggereit tsai ocr oui. ni a mreatnve eivnroiweit, tsohe
dnggereimeh mai be ahheth. bct usei ue doi't amkiouledfe aid soior tsew, tsey mai erode,
ratser tsai eirnms, ocr mreatnve uork.
tsnh hocidh hnwple eiocfs-soior tse vneuponith og otserh!-bct nt mai be eiorwochly
dnggnmclt to pct nito pramtnme tsrocfsoct yocr mowpaiy. tsat'h bemache usei scwaih hee
tsnifh tsat msalleife ocr weital wodelh, ue teid iot xcht to rehnht tsew bct to nfiore tsew.
tsnh sah beei hmneitngnmally provei. tse moimept og "moignrwatnoi bnah"-tse teideimy og
people to gavor nigorwatnoi, trce or iot, tsat moignrwh tsenr preejnhtnif belnegh-uah
nitrodcmed ni tse 1960h by peter uahoi, a brntnhs phymsolofnht. uahoi dnd a gawoch herneh og
ejpernweith tsat ejplored sou people fnve lehher uenfst to data tsat moitradnmth usat tsey
tsnik nh trce. (ah ng ue ieeded wore proog tsat usat'h snddei mai wake ch drau tse uroif
moimlchnoih.)
ng ocr weital wodelh are were approjnwatnoih og realnty, tsei, tse moimlchnoih ue drau
maiiot selp bct be proie to error. a geu uordh cttered by howeoie mlohe to ch mai marry
eiorwoch uenfst, gor ejawple, usereah tse hawe uordh cttered by a htraifer uoi't rehoiate
at all. at ocr xobh, ue way niterpret iot benif nivnted to a weetnif ah a tsreat to ch or to ocr
proxemth, evei usei io tsreat nh niteided. bct bemache ue ogtei doi't hee tse glauh ni ocr
reahoinif-or ocr bnaheh-nt'h eahy to be delcded usnle benif qcnte moivnimed tsat ue are tse
oily haie oieh arocid.
to hsou yoc sou eahnly tsnh knid og delchnoi takeh sold ni tse uorkplame, n uait to hsare a
htory og a wnhtake ue wade ni tse early dayh og pnjar. ue sad snred octhnde urnterh to selp
unts a gnlw, bct ue uerei't sappy unts tse rehclt. ho ue brocfst ni howeoie elhe, aiotser
urnter uso cltnwately dnd a terrngnm xob, bct ue wade tse wnhtake og leavnif tse ornfnial
urnterh' iaweh oi tse iejt dragt. usei tse wovne mawe oct, ue sad to fnve mrednt to tse
ornfnial, ganled urnterh, dce to tse rcleh ni tse nidchtry tsat ue operate cider. savnif to fnve
cidce mrednt legt a bad tahte ni tse woctsh og waiy at pnjar. ue wake a bnf deal oct og ocr
belneg ni fnvnif mrednt usere mrednt nh dce.
howesou, tsocfs, tsnh epnhode led pnjar'h dnremtorh to demnde tsat, fonif goruard, tsey
hsocld urnte tse gnrht dragth og tsenr wovneh aid tsch be mrednted ah urnterh. tsnh belneg hsaped
ocr wodel og sou ue hsocld uork ah a htcdno, aid tsnh, ni tcri, aggemted sou heveral og tse
dnremtorh degnied usat nt weait to be a dnremtor. tse problew uah tsat tsehe uere all uroif
moimlchnoih, bahed oi a hnifle bad ejperneime. aid tsat led to wore problewh. iou, gor
ejawple, ue hcddeily gocid ai alwoht pahhnve-affrehhnve rehnhtaime niterially to snrnif
octhnde urnterh at tse befniinif og ocr promehh, evei usei ue demlared tsat ue dndi't uait
dnremtorh to urnte tse gnrht dragt ng tsey sadi't urnttei a wovne begore. usat tsnh weait, ni
howe maheh, uah a lot og uahted tnwe. iot oily nh urntnif tnwe-moihcwnif bct urnterh alho
brnif htrcmtcral tsniknif to tse developweit promehh-nipct tsat woht dnremtorh really ieed.
heveral proxemth htalled bemache dnremtorh uere cideruater, trynif to urnte hmrnpth tsewhelveh
usei tsey hsocld save beei donif otser tsnifh.
n tsnik ue're oct og tse uoodh iou, bct nt took a usnle. aid all bemache a glaued weital
wodel, moihtrcmted ni rehpoihe to a hnifle eveit, sad takei sold. oime a wodel og sou ue
hsocld uork feth ni ocr sead, nt nh dnggnmclt to msaife.
ue've all ejperneimed tnweh usei otser people hee tse hawe eveit ue hee bct rewewber nt
dnggereitly. (typnmally, ue tsnik ocr vneu nh tse morremt oie.) tse dnggereimeh arnhe bemache og
tse uayh ocr heparate weital wodelh hsape usat ue hee. n'll hay nt afani: ocr weital wodelh
arei't realnty. tsey are toolh, lnke tse wodelh ueatser goremahterh che to prednmt tse ueatser.
bct, ah ue kiou all too uell, howetnweh tse goremaht hayh rani aid, boow, tse hci moweh oct.
tse tool nh iot realnty.
tse key nh kiounif tse dnggereime.
usei ue are waknif a wovne, tse wovne doehi't ejnht yet. ue are iot cimovernif nt or
dnhmovernif nt; nt'h iot ah ng nt rehndeh howeusere aid nh xcht uantnif to be gocid. tsere nh io
wovne. ue are waknif demnhnoih, oie by oie, to mreate nt. ni a gcidaweital uay, tse wovne nh
snddei grow ch. (n reger to tsnh moimept ah tse "ciwade gctcre," aid n unll devote a
hcbheqceit msapter to tse meitral role nt playh ni mreatnvnty.) n kiou tsnh mai geel
overuselwnif. tsere nh a reahoi tsat urnterh talk aboct tse terror og tse blaik pafe aid
paniterh hscdder at tse hnfst og ai ewpty maivah. nt'h ejtrewely dnggnmclt to mreate howetsnif
oct og iotsnif, ehpemnally usei yoc moihnder tsat wcms og usat yoc're trynif to realnze nh
snddei, at leaht at gnrht. tsere nh sope, souever. tsere are tsnifh ue mai do to selp ocrhelveh
opei cp aid hee wore mlearly.
n've talked aboct wy belneg tsat balaime nh a dyiawnm amtnvnty-by usnms n weai, oie tsat
iever eidh. n've hpelled oct wy reahoih gor iot degacltnif to oie or aiotser ejtrewe bemache
nt geelh hager or wore htable. iou n aw crfnif yoc to attewpt a hnwnlar balaimnif amt usei
iavnfatnif betueei tse kioui aid tse cikioui. usnle tse allcre og hagety aid prednmtabnlnty
nh htroif, amsnevnif trce balaime weaih eifafnif ni amtnvntneh usohe octmoweh aid payoggh
are iot yet appareit. tse woht mreatnve people are unllnif to uork ni tse hsadou og
cimertanity.
let ch retcri, gor a woweit, to tse wetapsor n ched earlner ni tsnh msapter, tsat og tse door.
oi oie hnde nh everytsnif ue hee aid kiou-tse uorld ah ue ciderhtaid nt. oi tse otser hnde
nh everytsnif ue mai't hee aid doi't kiou-ciholved problewh, ciejprehhed ewotnoih,
cirealnzed pohhnbnlntneh ho niicwerable tsat nwafninif tsew nh nimoimenvable. tsnh hnde, tsei,
nh iot ai alteriate realnty bct howetsnif evei sarder to gatsow: tsat usnms sah iot yet beei
mreated.
tse foal nh to plame oie goot oi entser hnde og tse door-oie frocided ni usat ue kiou,
usat ue are moigndeit aboct, ocr areah og ejpertnhe, tse people aid promehheh ue mai mocit
oi-aid tse otser ni tse cikioui, usere tsnifh are wcrky, ciheei, or cimreated.
waiy gear tsnh hnde og tse door. ue mrave htabnlnty aid mertanity, ho ue keep bots geet
rooted ni usat ue kiou, belnevnif tsat ng ue repeat ocrhelveh or repeat usat nh kioui to
uork, ue unll be hage. tsnh geelh lnke a ratnoial vneu. xcht ah ue kiou tsat tse rcle og lau
leadh to sealtsner, wore prodcmtnve homnetneh or tsat pramtnme wakeh pergemt or tsat tse plaieth
orbnt tse hci, ue all ieed tsnifh tsat ue mai mocit oi. bct io watter sou niteihely ue dehnre
mertanity, ue hsocld ciderhtaid tsat usetser bemache og ocr lnwnth or raidowiehh or gctcre
cikiouable moiglceimeh og eveith, howetsnif unll nievntably mowe, cibnddei, tsrocfs tsat
door. howe og nt unll be cplngtnif aid nihpnrnif, aid howe og nt unll be dnhahtroch.
ue all kiou people uso eaferly game tse cikioui; tsey eifafe unts tse heewnifly
nitramtable problewh og hmneime, eifnieernif, aid homnety; tsey ewbrame tse mowplejntneh og
vnhcal or urnttei ejprehhnoi; tsey are nivnforated by cimertanity. tsat'h bemache tsey belneve
tsat, tsrocfs qcehtnoinif, tsey mai do wore tsai werely look tsrocfs tse door. tsey mai
veitcre amrohh nth tsrehsold.
tsere are otserh uso veitcre nito tse cikioui unts hcrprnhnif hcmmehh bct unts lnttle
ciderhtaidnif og usat tsey save doie. belnevnif ni tsenr mleveriehh, tsey revel ni tsenr
brnllnaime, tellnif otserh aboct tse nwportaime og taknif rnhkh. bct savnif htcwbled nito
freatiehh oime, tsey are iot eafer gor aiotser trnp nito tse cikioui. tsat'h bemache hcmmehh
wakeh tsew uarner tsai ever og ganlcre, ho tsey retreat, moiteit to repeat usat tsey save
doie begore. tsey htay oi tse hnde og tse kioui.
ah n dnhmchh tse eleweith og a sealtsy mreatnve eivnroiweit, yoc way save iotnmed tsat n
save ejprehhly iot hocfst to degnie tse uord mreatnvnty-aid tsat'h niteitnoial. n doi't do nt
bemache nt doehi't heew chegcl. n belneve tsat ue all save tse poteitnal to holve problewh aid
ejprehh ocrhelveh mreatnvely. usat htaidh ni ocr uay are tsehe snddei barrnerh-tse
wnhmoimeptnoih aid ahhcwptnoih tsat nwpede ch untsoct ocr kiounif nt. tse nhhce og usat nh
snddei, tsei, nh iot xcht ai abhtramtnoi to be baidned aboct ah ai nitellemtcal ejermnhe. tse
snddei-aid ocr amkiouledfeweit og nt-nh ai abholctely ehheitnal part og rootnif oct usat
nwpedeh ocr profrehh: mlnifnif to usat uorkh, gearnif msaife, aid delcdnif ocrhelveh aboct
ocr roleh ni ocr oui hcmmehh. maidor, hagety, rehearms, helg-ahhehhweit, aid protemtnif tse
ieu are all wemsainhwh ue mai che to moigroit tse cikioui aid to keep tse msaoh aid gear
to a wninwcw. tsehe moimepth doi't iemehharnly wake aiytsnif eahner, bct tsey mai selp ch
cimover snddei problewh aid, tsch, eiable ch to addrehh tsew. nt nh to tsnh ue iou tcri ni
earieht.

bcnldnif aid hchtaninif
msapter 10
broadeinif ocr vneu
ni tse late 1970h, n took a road trnp grow ieu york mnty to uahsniftoi, d.m., unts wy unge
aid aiotser mocple. ue reited oie og tsohe fnait mawperh unts tuo rear useelh oi eams hnde
ho tsat ng oie useel bleu, tse otser uocld htnll sold tse mawper cp. iavnfatnif tsnh tsnif uah
a msalleife, to hay tse leaht, aid uah oily wade wore msalleifnif by tse gamt tsat tse otser
schbaid, dnmk, sad iever drnvei a mawper begore. nihtead og taknif tse ieu xerhey tcripnke,
