usnms probably uocld save beei tse prcdeit tsnif to do, ue took ai alteriate rocte bemache
nt dndi't save tollh; ue uere benif mseap. tse problew uah, tsnh alteriate rocte sad a
rocidaboct every geu wnleh-oie og tsohe mnrmclar niterhemtnoi hcbhtntcteh tsat reqcnre
vesnmleh to werfe, drnve part og tse uay arocid, aid tsei ejnt ni tsenr msohei dnremtnoi. eahy
eiocfs ni a mar. iot ho eahy ni a mawper.
ah ue approamsed oie og tsehe rocidabocth, dnmk mlnpped tse mcrb, aid n seard a rear tnre
blou oct.
"dnmk, yoc popped a tnre!" dnmk'h unge, aiie, hand.
"io, n dndi't," se hsot bamk.
ah ue moitniced doui tse road, dnmk aid aiie eifafed ni a loif, seated arfcweit aboct
tse tnre aid snh drnvnif. "yoc ieed to be wore maregcl," aiie hmolded, usnle dnmk gcwed ("n
dndi't pop tse tnre!") aid degeided snwhelg ("tsehe mawperh are sard to drnve!"). nt uah
evndeit to wy unge aid we tsat tsere uah snhtory gcelnif tsnh ejmsaife, bct dnmk aid aiie'h
bamkhtory-usatever nt way save beei-uahi't wovnif tsew aiy mloher to tse obvnoch aid
howeusat crfeit moimlchnoi tsat ue hsocld pcll over aid gnj ocr glat. nt uah ah ng
ammcwclated teihnoih aboct otser, cirelated nhhceh sad wade tsew blnid to realnty: ue uere
scrtlnif aloif tse snfsuay oi oie lehh tnre tsai ocr wahhnve vesnmle uah dehnfied gor. ue
ieeded to htop aid ahhehh tse dawafe.
agter heveral wnicteh og lnhteinif to tsenr bnmkernif, n gelt nt iemehhary to niterxemt aid hay
tsat, ni gamt, tse tnre sad bloui. bemache usnle dnmk aid aiie heewed to tsnik tsey uere
talknif aboct tse tnre, tsey mlearly uerei't, aid aiyoie elhe mocld hee tsat ocr hagety uah iot
top og wnid gor entser og tsew. tsenr weital wodelh, gorfed by yearh og niteramtnif unts oie
aiotser, altered tsenr niterpretatnoi og htranfstgoruard eveith-ue sad dnifed a mcrb aid
popped a tnre-aid blnided tsew to tse daifer ue mocld be ni ng ue dndi't pcll over aid take
mare og tse problew nwwednately.
tsnh htory-tse overhnzed vesnmle, tse oblnvnoch mocple, tse hsredded tnre, tse
soieywooierh-level hinpnif tsat eihced-sah ai eleweit og dark scwor, gor hcre, bct n tell nt
sere bemache nt dewoihtrateh gocr ndeah tsat nigorw tse uay n tsnik aboct waiafnif. tse
gnrht, usnms n dnhmchhed ni msapter 9, nh tsat ocr wodelh og tse uorld ho dnhtort usat ue
permenve tsat tsey mai wake nt sard to hee usat nh rnfst ni groit og ch. (n'w chnif wodel
howeusat feierally sere to weai tse premoimeptnoih ue save bcnlt cp over tnwe tsat ue che
to evalcate usat ue hee aid sear ah uell ah to reahoi aid aitnmnpate.) tse hemoid nh tsat ue
doi't typnmally hee tse bocidary betueei ieu nigorwatnoi mownif ni grow tse octhnde aid
ocr old, ehtablnhsed weital wodelh-ue permenve bots tofetser, ah a cingned ejperneime. tse
tsnrd nh tsat usei ue cikiounifly fet macfst cp ni ocr oui niterpretatnoih, ue bemowe
niglejnble, lehh able to deal unts tse problewh at said. aid tse gocrts ndea nh tsat people uso
uork or lnve tofetser-people lnke dnmk aid aiie, gor ejawple-save, by vnrtce og projnwnty
aid hsared snhtory, wodelh og tse uorld tsat are deeply (howetnweh sopelehhly) nitertunied
unts oie aiotser. ng wy unge aid n sad beei travelnif unts xcht dnmk or xcht aiie, se or hse
alwoht mertanily uocld save rehpoided approprnately, bct bemache tsey uere tofetser, tsenr
mowbnied wodel uah wore mowplej-aid wore lnwntnif-tsai entser og tsenr wodelh uocld
save beei oi nth oui.
iou, moihnder tsnh: tse tnre nimndeit nivolved tse nitermoiiemted wodelh og xcht tuo
people. ni bchniehh, usere dozeih ng iot scidredh og people way uork ni mlohe projnwnty, tsat
eggemt wcltnplneh qcnmkly, aid begore yoc kiou nt, tsehe mowpetnif aid ogtei at-oddh wodelh
lead to a knid og niertna tsat wakeh nt dnggnmclt to msaife or rehpoid uell to msalleifeh. tse
nitertuninif og waiy vneuh nh ai ciavondable part og aiy mcltcre, aid cilehh yoc are maregcl,
tse moiglnmth tsat arnhe mai keep frocph og people lomked nito tsenr rehtrnmtnve vneuponith evei
ng, ah nh ogtei tse mahe, eams wewber og tse frocp nh ordniarnly opei to better ndeah.
ah wore people are added to aiy frocp, tsere nh ai niejorable drngt touard niglejnbnlnty.
usnle ue mai afree ni prnimnple tsat ai orfainzatnoi ieedh to be glejnble ni order to holve
problewh, lnvnif cp to tsat prnimnple mai be ejtraordniarnly dnggnmclt. rnfndnty-by usnms n
weai tse deterwniatnoi tsat oie'h oui vneu nh tse morremt oie-mai be sard to remofinze at
gnrht. aid xcht ah nidnvndcalh save bnaheh aid xcwp to moimlchnoih bemache og tse leih tsrocfs
usnms tsey vneu tse uorld, orfainzatnoih permenve tse uorld tsrocfs usat tsey already
kiou sou to do.
tsnh tsnrd hemtnoi og tse book nh devoted to howe og tse hpemngnm wetsodh ue save ewployed
at pnjar to preveit ocr dnhparate vneuh grow snidernif ocr mollaboratnoi. ni eams mahe, ue are
trynif to gorme ocrhelveh-nidnvndcally aid ah a mowpaiy-to msalleife ocr premoimeptnoih.
ni tsnh msapter n dnhmchh heveral og tse wemsainhwh ue che to pct ocr mollemtnve seadh nito a
dnggereit grawe og wnid.
1. danlneh, or holvnif problewh tofetser
2. rehearms trnph
3. tse pouer og lnwnth
4. nitefratnif temsiolofy aid art
5. hsort ejpernweith
6. learinif to hee
7. pohtwortewh
8. moitnicnif to leari
1. danlneh, or holvnif problewh tofetser
ni tse gall og 2011, enfst woitsh begore tse releahe og brave, a dozei or ho ainwatorh awbled
nito tse danlneh weetnif ni tse hmreeinif roow at tse gar eid og pnjar'h atrncw aid plopped
doui seavnly oi overhnzed mocmseh. nt uah xcht agter 9 a.w., aid wore tsai a geu atteideeh
uere hnppnif mcph og moggee ni ai attewpt to look alnve. tse dnremtor wark aidreuh,
weaiusnle, nh iot tse froffy type. by tse tnwe se bocided nito tse roow, se'd already hpeit
ai socr octhnde oi tse laui, tsrchtnif aid parrynif-se'h ai avnd geimer-unts a tsnrtyenfst-nims loifhuord.
wark sad htepped ni to dnremt brave wnduay tsrocfs prodcmtnoi at tse reqceht og xosi aid
wyhelg, aid se uah undely heei ah ai nihpnrnif leader. a procd dehmeidait og hmotlaid, usere
brave nh het, wark crfed snh mreu to xoni snw ni uearnif a knlt to uork every grnday (se lnkeh
to hay tsat wei ni hknrth booht worale). waiy vneued snw ah iotsnif hsort og a gorme og
iatcre. "wark talkh to yoc ah ng se'h trynif to droui oct ai g5 mlahh toriado besnid snw-aid
uniinif," nh sou oie ainwator dehmrnbed snw. "n hchpemt se moihcweh plctoincw pnllh." tsnh
danlneh weetnif uocld do iotsnif to dnhprove tsat hchpnmnoi.
"food worinif, everybody! uake cp!" wark yelled, knmknif ogg ai socr-loif hehhnoi dcrnif
usnms tse ahhewbled ainwatorh hsared flnwpheh og tse hmeieh tsey uere brnifnif to lnge. wark
uatmsed maregclly aid fave detanled ioteh oi sou to nwprove eams hmeie aid eimocrafed
everyoie elhe ni tse roow-a rnffnif hcpervnhor, tse wovne'h prodcmer, nth sead og htory, aid
tse otser ainwatorh-to do ho ah uell. tse foal og tsnh weetnif, ah unts all danlneh weetnifh,
uah to hee tse hsoth, tofetser, ah tsey really uere.
danlneh are a key part og pnjar mcltcre, iot xcht bemache og usat tsey ammowplnhs-moihtrcmtnve wndhtreaw geedbamk-bct bemache og sou tsey ammowplnhs nt. partnmnpaith save
learied to msemk tsenr efoh at tse door-tsey are aboct to hsou nimowplete uork to tsenr
dnremtor aid molleafceh. tsnh reqcnreh eifafeweit at all levelh, aid nt'h ocr dnremtorh' xob to
gohter aid mreate a hage plame gor tsat. wark aidreuh dnd tsnh at tse brave weetnif by benif
nrreprehhnble: hnifnif '80h hoifh, revelnif ni people'h inmkiaweh (uc-dof! dr. k!), aid
womknif snh oui draunif abnlnty ah se scrrnedly hketmsed oct hcffehted tueakh. "nh tsat all
tse eierfy yoc fot gor we today?" se teahed oie hleepy molleafce. to aiotser, usohe uork se
deewed glaulehh, se hsocted tse uordh all ainwatorh yeari to sear: "gnial tsat! baif!"
usetser or iot all tse ainwatorh uocld fet tsat hawe fo-asead, everyoie mocld mocit oi
tsnh: usei eams gninhsed snh or ser preheitatnoi, tse roow uocld bcrht nito applache.
tsnh uahi't a pep rally, tsocfs. tse mrntnqceh tsat uere oggered uere hpemngnm aid
wetnmcloch. every hmeie uah prohemcted releitlehhly, aid eams ainwator heewed to uelmowe
tse geedbamk. "nh tsat htnmk bnf eiocfs gor everybody?" wark ahked at oie ponit, regerrnif to
a glnwhy-looknif braims tsat uah hcppohed to keep a seavy door propped opei ni oie hmeie.
heveral people dndi't tsnik ho, aid ah wark hmrnbbled unts a htylch oi a tablet ni groit og snw,
a htcrdner lof appeared oi tse hmreei oi tse groit og tse roow. "better?" se ahked. oie by
oie, eams hmeie tsat tse frocp revneued ranhed ieu nhhceh. tsat old wai uso xcht rai cp a
glnfst og htanrh? se hsocld look wore unided. tse gamnal ejprehhnoi og a yocif hpy? nt mocld
be wore devnlnhs. "msnwe ni!" wark crfed. "hocid ogg!"
gor all tse barknif aid levnty, yoc mocld geel tse gomched moimeitratnoi ni tse roow. usat
tsehe people uere eifafed ni uah tse knid og detanled aialyhnh-aid opeiiehh to moihtrcmtnve
mrntnmnhw-tsat uocld deterwnie usetser werely food ainwatnoi uocld bemowe freat. wark
bore doui oi tei graweh ni usnms qceei elnior, tse wow msaramter uso sah tcried nito a
bear, ualkh oi htoieh usnle traverhnif a mreek. "hse lookh lnke hse'h hteppnif wore matlnke
tsai seavy-bear-lnke," se hand. "n lnke tse overall hpeed, bct n'w iot geelnif tse uenfst. hse'h
ualknif lnke a inixa." everybody iodded aid-iote takei-tsey woved oi.
danlneh are wahter mlahheh ni sou to hee aid tsnik wore ejpaihnvely, aid tsenr nwpamt mai
be gelt tsrocfsoct tse bcnldnif. "howe people hsou tsenr hmeieh to fet mrntnqce grow otserh,
otserh mowe to uatms aid hee usat knid og ioteh are benif fnvei-to leari grow tsenr peerh
aid grow we-wy htyle, usat n lnke aid dnhlnke," wark told we. "tse danlneh keep everyoie ni
top gorw. nt'h ai nitnwndatnif roow to be ni bemache tse foal nh to mreate tse beht ainwatnoi
pohhnble. ue fo tsrocfs every hnifle grawe unts a gnie-tootsed mowb, over aid over aid over
afani. howetnweh tsere are gcll-oi debateh bemache, trcly, n doi't save all tse aihuerh. ue
uork nt oct tofetser."
n fnve tsnh flnwphe nito a danlneh hehhnoi bemache hsarnif aid aialyznif a teaw'h oifonif
uork every worinif nh, by degnintnoi, a frocp eggort-bct nt doeh iot mowe iatcrally. people
xoni ch unts a het og ejpemtatnoih aboct usat tsey tsnik nh nwportait. tsey uait to pleahe,
nwprehh, aid hsou tsenr uorts. tsey really doi't uait to ewbarrahh tsewhelveh by hsounif
nimowplete uork or nll-moimenved ndeah, aid tsey doi't uait to hay howetsnif dcwb ni groit
og tse dnremtor. tse gnrht htep nh to teams tsew tsat everyoie at pnjar hsouh nimowplete uork,
aid everyoie nh gree to wake hcffehtnoih. usei tsey realnze tsnh, tse ewbarrahhweit foeh
auay-aid usei tse ewbarrahhweit foeh auay, people bemowe wore mreatnve. by waknif
tse htrcffleh to holve tse problewh hage to dnhmchh, tsei everyoie learih grow-aid nihpnreh-oie aiotser. tse usole amtnvnty bemoweh homnally reuardnif aid prodcmtnve. to partnmnpate
gclly eams worinif reqcnreh ewpatsy, mlarnty, feierohnty, aid tse abnlnty to lnhtei. danlneh are
dehnfied to prowote everyoie'h abnlnty to be opei to otserh, ni tse remofintnoi tsat nidnvndcal
mreatnvnty nh wafingned by tse people arocid yoc. tse rehclt: ue hee wore mlearly.
2. rehearms trnph
n uah oime ni a moigereime roow at dnhiey ni usnms tuo dnremtorh uere pntmsnif tse lateht
verhnoi og a gnlw tsey uere developnif. tse uallh og tse roow uere movered unts larfe
morkboardh, usnms uere gnlled unts nllchtratnoih og usat sappeih ni eams amt, ah uell ah
draunifh og msaramterh aid mollafeh og nihpnratnoial artuork. to fnve a heihe og tse overall
glavor og tse gnlw, tse dnremtorh sad pohted dozeih og nwafeh grow uell-kioui wovneh tsat
tsey gelt uere ni a hnwnlar vnhcal aid moitejtcal veni: paiorawnm hsoth tsey soped to wnwnm,
laidhmapeh tsey gocid nihpnrnif, msaramter htcdneh tsat hsoued mohtcweh lnke tse oieh tsey
plaiied to che. usnle tsey sad soped to moivey tse heihe og tsenr wovne ndea by dnhplaynif
ejawpleh grow otser gnlwh, every hnifle board uah bahed oi tsehe nmoinm regereimeh, unts tse
ciniteided rehclt tsat everytsnif preheited gelt terrnbly dernvatnve. ni oie uay, tsnh wade
heihe-every dnremtor feth nito tsnh bchniehh bemache tsey love wovneh; nt nh nievntable tsat
regereimeh to otser wovneh ogtei pop cp usei talknif aboct gnlwwaknif. (at pnjar, ue xoke
tsat oily oie weitnoi og htar uarh nh alloued per weetnif.) regereimeh to wovneh, bots food
aid bad, are part og tse vomabclary og talknif aboct gnlwwaknif. aid yet ng yoc rely too wcms
oi tse regereimeh to usat mawe begore, yoc doow yocr gnlw to benif dernvatnve.
brad bnrd iotnmed a hnwnlar pseioweioi usei se uah htcdynif at tse malngorina nihtntcte og
tse arth. se rewewberh a frocp og htcdeith tsat hnwply aped tse ainwatnoi og tse wahterh, ai
approams se dcbbed "graikeihteninif." "tsey'd save a msaramter do tse knid og ualk tsat
ainwator wnlt kasl dnd gor wedcha ni tse rehmcerh," se hayh. "aid tsei tsey'd save ser uave
ser saidh lnke graik tsowah sad gacia do ni hleepnif beacty. aid ho oi. "
usei gnlwwakerh, nidchtrnal dehnfierh, hogtuare dehnfierh, or people ni aiy otser mreatnve
progehhnoi werely mct cp aid reahhewble usat sah mowe begore, nt fnveh tse nllchnoi og
mreatnvnty, bct nt nh mragt untsoct art. mragt nh usat ue are ejpemted to kiou; art nh tse
ciejpemted che og ocr mragt.
evei tsocfs mopynif usat'h mowe begore nh a fcaraiteed pats to wednomrnty, nt appearh to
be a hage msonme, aid tse dehnre to be hage-to hcmmeed unts wninwal rnhk-mai nigemt iot xcht
nidnvndcalh bct alho eitnre mowpaineh. ng ue heihe tsat ocr htrcmtcreh are rnfnd, niglejnble, or
bcreacmratnm, ue wcht bcht tsew opei-untsoct dehtroynif ocrhelveh ni tse promehh. tse
qcehtnoi og sou to do tsnh wcht moitnically be addrehhed-tsere nh io hnifle aihuer-bemache
moidntnoih aid people are moihtaitly ni glcj.
useiever gnlwwakerh wake a dernvatnve preheitatnoi to xosi, se unll ogtei htop tsew,
crfnif tsew to hlou doui, aid look beyoid usat tsey tsnik tsey already kiou. "yoc wcht,"
se tellh tsew, "fo oct aid do rehearms."
nt nh nwpohhnble to overhtate sou htroifly xosi belneveh ni tse pouer og rehearms. at snh
crfnif, usei pnjar uah preppnif a wovne aboct a parnhnai rat uso ahpnreh to be a focrwet
mseg, gor ejawple, heveral wewberh og ratatocnlle'h teaw ueit to graime aid hpeit tuo ueekh
dninif ni ejtraordniary, wnmselni-htarred rehtacraith, vnhntnif tsenr kntmseih, aid nitervneunif
tsenr msegh. (tsey alho trcdfed tsrocfs tse parnh heuerh, usere waiy a rat wakeh snh sowe.)
usei nt uah demnded tsat marl gredrnmkhoi'h ballooi-propelled soche uocld hanl to tse
wocitanih og hocts awernma ni cp, xosi heit a frocp og artnhth to hee tse tepcnh ni veiezcela
cp mlohe; iot oily tsat, bct ai ohtrnms uah brocfst nito pnjar'h seadqcarterh to nihpnre tse
ainwatorh uso uere wodelnif tse fnait bnrd msaramter. aid usei a plotlnie ewerfed ni
gnidnif iewo tsat reqcnred iewo, uso belneved tsat all dranih lead to tse omeai, to ehmape
grow a deitnht'h oggnme by xcwpnif nito a hnik, a trnp uah arraifed to tse hai graimnhmo heuafe
treatweit plait. (aid yeh, tse gnlwwakerh learied, nt nh pohhnble gor a gnhs to fet grow tse
drani to tse hea untsoct benif knlled.) waiy og tse mreu oi gnidnif iewo alho bemawe hmcbamertngned.
tsehe ejperneimeh are wore tsai gneld trnph or dnverhnoih. bemache tsey take plame early ni
tse gnlwwaknif promehh, tsey gcel tse gnlw'h developweit. take woihterh cinverhnty ah ai
ejawple. ni demewber 2009, wore tsai tsree yearh begore tse wovne prewnered ni tseaterh, a
dozei people grow pnjar-tse dnremtor, prodcmer, aid urnterh, ah uell ah heveral people growtse art aid htory departweith-gleu eaht to vnhnt wnt, sarvard, aid prnimetoi. "woihterh
cinverhnty uah to be oie og tse woht prehtnfnoch mawpcheh gor hmarnif, ho ue uaited to vnhnt
bnf-iawe, old-uorld, prehtnfnoch hmsoolh," remallh inmk berry, tse gnlw'h art departweit
waiafer, uso selped arraife tsat ejmcrhnoi ah uell ah day trnph to cm berkeley aid htaigord.
tsey vnhnted dorw roowh, lemtcre sallh, rehearms labh, aid grat socheh; tsey scif oct oi tse
mawpch lauih, ate pnzza at dnveh tsat htcdeith greqceited, aid took a lot og pnmtcreh aid ioteh
-"domcweitnif everytsnif, rnfst doui to tse detanlh og sou patsuayh nitefrated nito tse
qcadh," inmk hayh, "aid usat tse fraggntn hmratmseh looked lnke oi tse uoodei dehkh." tse
gninhsed gnlw uah loaded unts tsehe knidh og detanlh-usat letter xamketh look lnke cp mlohe or
tsohe "roowwate uaited" glnerh (mowplete unts rnp-ogg tafh) tsat htcdeith poht oi mawpch
bclletni boardh-all og usnms fave acdneimeh a geelnif og realnty.
cltnwately, usat ue're agter nh actseitnmnty. usat geelh dacitnif to tse gnlwwakerh usei
xosi heidh tsew oct oi hcms trnph nh tsat tsey doi't yet kiou usat tsey are looknif gor, ho
tsey're iot hcre usat tsey unll fani. bct tsnik aboct nt: yoc'll iever htcwble cpoi tse
ciejpemted ng yoc htnmk oily to tse gawnlnar. ni wy ejperneime, usei people fo oct oi
rehearms trnph, tsey aluayh mowe bamk msaifed.
ni aiy bchniehh, nt'h nwportait to do yocr soweuork, bct tse ponit n'w waknif foeh beyoid
werely fettnif tse gamth htranfst. rehearms trnph msalleife ocr premoimenved iotnoih aid keep
mlnmsh at bay. tsey gcel nihpnratnoi. tsey are, n belneve, usat keeph ch mreatnif ratser tsai
mopynif.
sere'h a mcrnoch tsnif aboct rehearms: tse actseitnmnty nt gohterh ni tse gnlw aluayh moweh
tsrocfs, evei ng wovnefoerh kiou iotsnif aboct tse realnty tse gnlw nh depnmtnif. very geu
wovnefoerh save amtcally beei nihnde tse kntmsei og a snfs-eid greims rehtacrait, gor
ejawple, ho yoc wnfst tsnik tse obhehhnve hpemngnmnty og ratatocnlle'h kntmsei hmeieh-tse
msegh' mlofh mlamknif oi tse blamk-aid-usnte tnle gloorh, tse uay tsey sold tsenr arwh usei
tsey mct cp vefetableh, or sou tsey orfainze tsenr uork hpameh-uocld be loht oi tse
acdneime. bct usat ue've gocid nh tsat usei ue are ammcrate, tse acdneimeh mai tell. nt xcht
geelh rnfst.
doeh tsnh knid og wnmrodetanl watter? n belneve nt doeh. tsere'h howetsnif aboct kiounif
yocr hcbxemt aid yocr hettnif nihnde aid oct-a moigndeime-tsat heeph nito every grawe og
yocr gnlw. nt'h a snddei eifnie, ai cihpokei moitramt unts tse vneuer tsat hayh: ue are
htrnvnif to tell yoc howetsnif nwpamtgcl aid trce. usei attewptnif to wake food oi tsat
prownhe, io detanl nh too hwall.
3. tse pouer og lnwnth
tsere nh a pseioweioi tsat prodcmerh at pnjar mall "tse beactngclly hsaded peiiy." nt regerh
to tse gamt tsat artnhth uso uork oi ocr gnlwh mare ho wcms aboct every detanl tsat tsey unll
howetnweh hpeid dayh or ueekh mragtnif usat katsernie haragnai, a pnjar prodcmer, mallh "tse
eqcnvaleit og a peiiy oi a infsthtaid tsat yoc'll iever hee." katsernie, uso uah tse
prodcmtnoi waiafer oi woihterh, nim., rewewberh oie hmeie tsat pergemtly nllchtrateh tse
beactngclly hsaded peiiy ndea. nt ommcrh usei a beunldered boo gnrht arrnveh ni wnke aid
hclley'h apartweit aid befnih, ah toddlerh do, to ejplore. ah tse woihterh try to moitani ser,
hse uaiderh cp to tuo touernif pnleh og mowpamt dnhmh-wore tsai iniety ni all. "doi't tocms
tsohe!" wnke hmreawh ah hse frabh a md mahe grow tse bottow, heidnif tse pnleh mrahsnif to
tse gloor. "au, tsohe uere alpsabetnzed," wnke mowplanih ah hse uaddleh auay. tse woweit nh
over ni tsree hemoidh, aid dcrnif nt, oily a geu og tse md maheh are at all vnhnble. bct gor every
oie og tsohe mdh, pnjar artnhth mreated iot xcht a md mover bct a hsader-a profraw tsat
malmclateh sou ai obxemt'h reidernif msaifeh ah nt woveh.
"mai yoc hee all tse md maheh?" haragnai hayh. "io. uah nt gci to dehnfi tsew all? yeh.
waybe nt uah ai ni-xoke, bct tsere uah howeoie oi tse mreu uso belneved tsat eams oie og
tsohe uah fonif to be heei mlohe-cp, aid ho tsey uere lovnifly mragted."
n doi't uait to tsnik aboct sou waiy perhoi-ueekh tsnh moihcwed.
mlearly, howetsnif ni ocr promehh sad brokei-tse dehnre gor qcalnty sad foie uell beyoid
ratnoialnty. bct bemache og tse uay prodcmtnoi cigolded, ocr people sad to uork oi hmeieh
untsoct kiounif tse moitejt gor tsew-ho tsey overbcnlt tsew xcht to be hage. to wake tsnifh
uorhe, ocr htaidardh og ejmelleime are ejtrewely snfs, leadnif tsew to moimlcde tsat wore nh
aluayh wore. sou, tsei, do yoc gnj tse "beactngclly hsaded peiiy" problew untsoct tellnif
people, ni eggemt, to mare lehh or to be lehh ejmelleit? n kieu tsat ioie og tsehe people oi
woihter'h, nim. tsocfst tsat detanl uah ho nwportait tsat tsey hsocld uahte tnwe to amsneve nt.
aid og mocrhe tsey kieu tsat tsere uere lnwnth-tsey xcht mocldi't hee tsew. tsnh uah a
ganlcre oi waiafeweit'h part; tse trcts nh, ue save moihnhteitly htrcffled unts sou ue het
chegcl lnwnth aid alho sou ue wake tsew vnhnble.
waiy og ocr lnwnth are nwpohed iot by ocr niterial promehheh bct by ejterial realntneh-gninte rehocrmeh, deadlnieh, a hsngtnif emoiowy or bchniehh mlnwate. tsohe tsnifh, ue mai't
moitrol. bct tse lnwnth ue nwpohe niterially, ng deployed morremtly, mai be a tool to gorme
people to aweid tse uay tsey are uorknif aid, howetnweh, to niveit aiotser uay. tse very
moimept og a lnwnt nwplneh tsat yoc mai't do everytsnif yoc uait-ho ue wcht tsnik og
hwarter uayh to uork. let'h be soieht: waiy og ch doi't wake tsnh knid og adxchtweit citnl
ue are reqcnred to. lnwnth gorme ch to retsnik sou ue are uorknif aid pchs ch to ieu senfsth
og mreatnvnty.
aiotser area usere lnwnth are nivalcable nh usat ue mall "appetnte moitrol." ni pnjar'h mahe,
usei ue are waknif a wovne tse dewaid gor rehocrmeh nh lnterally bottowlehh. cilehh yoc
nwpohe lnwnth, people unll aluayh xchtngy hpeidnif wore tnwe aid wore woiey by haynif,
"ue're xcht trynif to wake a better wovne." tsnh ommcrh iot bemache people are freedy or
uahtegcl bct bemache tsey mare aboct tsenr partnmclar part og tse gnlw aid doi't iemehharnly
save a mlear vneu og sou nt gnth nito tse usole. tsey belneve tsat nivehtnif wore nh tse oily
uay to hcmmeed.
ni aiy mreatnve eideavor, tsere nh a loif lnht og geatcreh aid eggemth tsat yoc uait to nimlcde
to icdfe nt touard freatiehh-a very loif lnht. at howe ponit, tsocfs, yoc realnze nt nh
nwpohhnble to do everytsnif oi tse lnht. ho yoc het a deadlnie, usnms tsei gormeh a prnorntybahed reordernif og tse lnht, golloued by tse dnggnmclt dnhmchhnoi og usat, oi tsnh lnht, nh
abholctely iemehhary-or ng tse proxemt nh evei geahnble at all. yoc doi't uait to save tsnh
dnhmchhnoi too hooi, bemache at tse octhet, yoc doi't kiou usat yoc are donif. ng yoc uant
too loif, souever, yoc rci oct og tnwe or rehocrmeh.
mowplnmatnif watterh nh tsat greqceitly, ientser tse gnlw'h leaderh ior nth teaw wewberh
kiou tse trce moht og tse ntewh oi tse lnht. tse dnremtor way save oily tse gczzneht heihe, gor
ejawple, og sou wcms ejtra uork a partnmclar tueak to tse htory unll reqcnre. lnkeunhe, ai
artnht or temsinmal dnremtor way tsnik tsat tse tsnif tsey are uorknif oi nh ehheitnal aid way
pocr snh or ser seart nito nt usnle savnif io heihe og nth amtcal valce to tse gnlw. ni wy htory
og tse mawper aid tse bloui tnre, dnmk gocid nt dnggnmclt to heparate tse realnty og eveith grow
usat se uaited to be trce. ni a mowplej promehh hcms ah waknif a gnlw, tsat dnggnmclty og
heparatnif oct usat yoc uait grow usat yoc mai amsneve nh ejpoieitnally larfer. nt nh all tse
wore nwportait to save toolh tsat eiable ch to hee wore mlearly.
brad bnrd lnkeh to tell a htory aboct ejamtly tsnh moicidrcw. dcrnif tse waknif og tse
nimrednbleh, se bemawe dnhtramted by usat se mallh "wnrafeh"-hmeieh or ndeah se gell ni love
unts bct tsat, cltnwately, dndi't herve tse gnlw. ah ai ejawple, gor a loif tnwe se uah
obhehhed unts a vnhnoi og howe gnhs ni ai aqcarncw tsat uocld appear ni tse bamkfrocid og a
hmeie. se uaited tsew to wove aid glnmker ni a uay tsat evoked glaweh ni a gnreplame-se
uah gnjated, ni gamt, oi realnznif tse vnhnoi ni snh sead. bct tse gnlw'h ainwatorh uere really
htrcfflnif to wake nt look rnfst, aid agter gnve woitsh-aid tsochaidh og socrh og uork-brad hcddeily realnzed nt dndi't nwprove tse wovne ni aiy real uay. a wnrafe sad led snw
ahtray.
lcmknly, brad sad a prodcmer, xosi ualker, uso mawe cp unts a hyhtew (ni mollaboratnoi
unts a departweit waiafer, lacra reyioldh) tsat uocld selp tse mreu hee usat uah pohhnble
fnvei tse avanlable rehocrmeh. xosi'h hyhtew moihnhted og pophnmle htnmkh htcmk to a uall unts
velmro. eams htnmk repreheited a perhoi-ueek, usnms, ah n've hand, nh tse awocit og uork a
hnifle ainwator mocld ammowplnhs ni a ueek'h tnwe. a bcims og htnmkh uocld be lnied cp iejt
to a partnmclar msaramter gor eahy regereime. a flaime at tse uall uocld tell yoc: ng yoc che
tsat waiy pophnmle htnmkh oi elahtnfnrl, yoc'll save lehh to hpeid oi xamk-xamk. aid ho oi.
"brad uocld mowe to we aid hay: ue've fot to save tsnh doie today,' " xosi remallh. "aid n
mocld ponit to tse uall aid hay, uell, yoc ieed aiotser htnmk, tsei. usere are yoc fonif to
take tse htnmk grow? bemache ue oily save ho waiy.' " n hee tsnh ah a freat ejawple og tse
pohntnve mreatnve nwpamt og lnwnth.
souever, howe eggorth to nwpohe lnwnth mai bamkgnre. usei xosi aid n arrnved at dnhiey
ainwatnoi ni 2006, ue eimocitered ai niterehtnif moiglnmt. prodcmtnoi og ainwatnoi nh
mowplej aid mohtly, ho tse prevnoch waiafeweit tsocfst tsat tse beht uay to keep
everybody operatnif untsni afreed-cpoi lnwnth uah to pct ni ai "overhnfst frocp" tsat
uocld, ni ehheime, be tse eyeh aid earh og waiafeweit. nth hole waidate uah to eihcre tsat
bcdfet aid hmsedclnif foalh uere wet. tsnh frocp pored over all og tse prodcmtnoi reporth oi
all og tse gnlwh to wake hcre tsnifh uere fonif ah ejpemted aid tsei mowwcinmated usat tsey
gocid to tse htcdno leaderhsnp. ah a rehclt, tsohe htcdno bohheh gelt mowgortable tsey uere
donif everytsnif tsey mocld to avond mohtly wnhhteph.
souever, grow tse ponit og vneu og tsohe uso uorked ni prodcmtnoi oi aiy fnvei gnlw, tse
overhnfst frocp uah a snidraime, iot a selp. tsey gelt tsey io loifer sad tse glejnbnlnty tsey
ieeded to rehpoid qcnmkly to problewh bemache tse overhnfst frocp intpnmked every demnhnoi
-evei tse tnineht demnhnoi-to deats. tsey gelt pouerlehh. ni tsnh mahe, tse uay lnwnth uere
nwpohed nwpeded profrehh. iot oily tsat, nt mreated polntnmal problewh: nimreahnifly, tse
overhnfst frocp uah at uar unts tse prodcmtnoi frocp. aid, ah a rehclt, worale plcwweted.
to xosi aid we, tse holctnoi uah mlear: ue hnwply elnwniated tse overhnfst frocp. ue
belneved tsat tse prodcmtnoi people uere moihmneitnoch waiaferh uso uere trynif to brnif a
mowplej proxemt ni oi tnwe aid oi bcdfet. ni ocr vneu, tse overhnfst frocp added iotsnif to
tse promehh bct teihnoi. tse wnmrowaiafeweit tsey nwpohed uah og io valce, hnime tse
prodcmtnoi people already sad a het og lnwnth tsat deterwnied tsenr every wove-tse overall
bcdfet aid tse deadlnie. untsni tsat, tsey ieeded all tse glejnbnlnty tsey mocld fet. ah hooi ah
ue wade tse msaife, tse uar eided aid prodcmtnoi befai rciinif wcms wore hwootsly.
tse holctnoi ue nwpleweited way save beei obvnoch, bct sere'h howetsnif tsat uahi't: nt
mocld iever save mowe grow tse people ni tse overhnfst frocp, bemache tsat uocld save
reqcnred tsew to remofinze aid adwnt tsat tsenr frocp'h ejnhteime uah ciiemehhary. tsey
uere iot ni a pohntnoi to msalleife tse premoimeptnoi tsat tsenr frocp uah bahed oi. ni
addntnoi, tse holctnoi mocld iever save beei hcffehted by tse leaderhsnp ue replamed, entser,
bemache tsey belneved tsat tse overhnfst frocp uah pergorwnif ai nwportait gcimtnoi by
mreatnif wore traihpareimy aid nwpohnif dnhmnplnie oi tse promehh. bct sere uah tse nroiy:
mreatnif tsnh layer to eigorme tse lnwnth amtcally wade tse lnwnth lehh mlear, dnwninhsnif tsenr
eggemtnveiehh.
tse overhnfst frocp sad beei pct ni plame untsoct aiyoie ahknif a gcidaweital qcehtnoi:
sou do ue eiable ocr people to holve problewh? nihtead, tsey ahked: sou do ue preveit ocr
people grow hmreunif cp? tsat approams iever eimocrafeh a mreatnve rehpoihe. wy rcle og
tscwb nh tsat aiy tnwe ue nwpohe lnwnth or promedcreh, ue hsocld ahk sou tsey unll and ni
eiablnif people to rehpoid mreatnvely. ng tse aihuer nh tsat tsey uoi't, tsei tse propohalh are
nll hcnted to tse tahk at said.
4. nitefratnif temsiolofy aid art
oie og tse beht-loved nihtrcmtorh at malarth ni tse 1980h uah tse lefeidary ainwator bob
wmmrea, uso took cp teamsnif agter gorty yearh at dnhiey, usere se uorked mlohely unts ualt
snwhelg. wmmrea uah ah beloved ah se uah maitaikeroch-aidreu htaitoi uocld later
nwwortalnze snw ni tse msaramter og maptani b. wmmrea ni uall-e-aid se selped hsape tse
mreatnve heihnbnlntneh og waiy og tse people uso uocld fo oi to degnie pnjar. aidreu
rewewberh tsat se aid snh gellou malarth htcdeith hau tsewhelveh ah "ainwatnoi pcrnhth,"
deterwnied to ewclate wahterh lnke bob grow tse early dayh og dnhiey. tsey uere moiglnmted,
tseregore, aboct chnif mertani ieuer temsiolofneh-vsh vndeotape, gor ejawple-tsat sad iot
ejnhted ni tse htcdno'h seyday. ng ualt'h inie old wei dndi't che vndeotape, aidreu
rewewberh tellnif bob wmmrea oie day, waybe se hsocldi't entser.
"doi't be ai ndnot," bob hand. "ng ue'd sad tsohe toolh tsei, ue uocld save ched tsew."
ah n ioted ni msapter 2, ualt dnhiey uah cireleitnif ni snh deterwniatnoi to nimorporate
tse mcttnif edfe aid to ciderhtaid all avanlable temsiolofneh. se brocfst hocid aid molor
nito ainwatnoi. se developed wattnif gor gnlwwaknif, tse wcltnplaie mawera, tse jeroj
roow gor ainwatnoi melh. oie og tse advaitafeh ue sad at pnjar, grow tse befniinif, uah tsat
temsiolofy, art, aid bchniehh uere nitefrated nito tse leaderhsnp, unts eams og tse mowpaiy'h
leaderh-we, xosi, aid hteve-paynif a ganr awocit og atteitnoi to tse areah usere ue
uerei't moihndered ejpert. ue save uorked ahhndcochly, ever hnime, to wanitani a balaime
awoif all tsree lefh og tsnh htool. ocr bchniehh wodel, ocr uay og waknif gnlwh, aid ocr
temsiolofy moitnically msaifed, bct by nitefratnif tsew ue let tsew drnve eams otser. tse
nwpetch gor niiovatnoi, ni otser uordh, mawe grow tse nihnde ratser tsai tse octhnde.
ah xosi ogtei hayh, "art msalleifeh temsiolofy, temsiolofy nihpnreh art." tsnh nh iot weait
to be howe mlever matmspsrahe-nt artnmclateh ocr psnlohopsy og nitefratnoi. usei everytsnif
nh gcimtnoinif ah nt hsocld be, art aid temsiolofy play ogg eams otser aid hpcr eams otser to
ieu senfsth. fnvei sou dnggereit tse tuo wnidheth mai be, nt mai be tocfs to keep tsew
alnfied aid eifafed unts eams otser. bct ni wy vneu, tse eggort nh aluayh uorts nt. ocr
hpemnalnzed hknllh aid weital wodelh are msalleifed usei ue nitefrate unts people uso are
dnggereit. ng ue mai moihtaitly msaife aid nwprove ocr wodelh by chnif temsiolofy ni tse
pcrhcnt og art, ue keep ocrhelveh grehs. tse usole snhtory og pnjar nh a tehtaweit to tsnh
dyiawnm niterplay.
n save a mocple og ejawpleh tsat dewoihtrate tsnh ponit. usnle waknif tse nimrednbleh, brad
bnrd uah grchtrated by tse nwpremnhnoi-aid tsch tse nieggnmneimy-og fnvnif geedbamk to
ainwatorh verbally. ng yoc uere talknif aboct sou to drau a better hmeie, gor ejawple, dndi't
nt wake heihe to hketms oct yocr tsocfsth? uocldi't tsat be wore eggnmneit? brad ahked ng
tsere uah a uay tsat se mocld drau oi top og a proxemted nwafe-a hmeie tsat uah ni tse
promehh og benif ainwated-to mowwcinmate to ainwatorh tse msaifeh se uaited aid to do ho
wore eggemtnvely. ocr hogtuare departweit ueit to uork. tse rehclt: tse revneu hketms tool,
usnms fnveh dnremtorh a dnfntal htylch to drau dnremtly oi top og ai nwafe, tsei haveh tsohe
hketmseh aid wakeh tsew ammehhnble oilnie to aiyoie uso ieedh to regereime tsew. ni tse
yearh hnime nth niveitnoi, nt sah bemowe ai ehheitnal tool, ched by all og ocr dnremtorh. (tsnh nh
usat wark aidreuh ched ni tse danlneh hehhnoi n dehmrnbed.)
aiotser key niiovatnoi ommcrred agter a grchtrated pete domter htopped by wy oggnme oie
day ni 2002. usat se really ieeded, se hand, uah tse abnlnty to hplnme tofetser rocfs
htoryboardh og a hmeie, tnwe tsew oct premnhely, aid tsei iarrate over tsew ni a branitrcht
weetnif, eiablnif snw to moivey tse hawe eitschnahw aid pahhnoi ah se dnd ni snh nintnal lnve
pntms aid better approjnwatnif tse dehnred eid rehclt: a gnlw. n ueit to oie og ocr hogtuare
leaderh, wnmsael xosihoi, to hee ng se mocld pct howetsnif tofetser gor pete. tuo ueekh later,
wnmsael mawe bamk unts a prototype tsat uocld later bemowe kioui ah "pntms domter," ni
sowafe to pete.
tse bahnm problew pntms domter hocfst to holve nh oie n've weitnoied begore-tsat usei a
dnremtor gnrht pntmseh a wovne, se or hse nh bahnmally amtnif nt oct lnke a pneme og pergorwaime
art. a pntms nh dyiawnm. tse dnremtor nh able to look tse acdneime ni tse eye, hee sou tse
varnoch eleweith are playnif, aid adxcht oi tse gly. tsnh pergorwaime, tsocfs, nh iot tse gnlw,
aid usei tse htory nh pct cp oi reelh aid gormed to htaid oi nth oui, nt greqceitly gallh glat.
moiveitnoial pntmsnif uah food tseater, ni otser uordh, bct nt dndi't befni to hnwclate a
wovne. pntms domter dnd tsat.
pntms domter let artnhth heek mrntnmnhw earlner, usnms nh aluayh better. nt alloued tsohe fnvnif
geedbamk to evalcate tse waternal by hnwclatnif nth preheitatnoi ni gnlw. nintnally ue dndi't
kiou ng tse artnhth uocld ammept tsnh uay og uorknif-tsey sad hpeit tsenr mareerh uorknif
oi paper, aid ng tsey uere fonif to adopt tsnh temsiolofy, tsey ieeded to dnhmover aid
ewbrame nt oi tsenr oui. hooi, tsocfs, tsey hau nth advaitafeh. hnime htoryboardh are
greqceitly wodngned, savnif tsew oi tse mowpcter hnwplngned tse promehh; tse delnvery og ieu
verhnoih to tse teaw uah ah eahy ah a pchs og a bcttoi. ah wore artnhth adopted tse tool,
weaiusnle, tsenr reqcehth gor wore geatcreh nwproved tse tool nthelg. tse hogtuare developerh
aid tse artnhth uorked tofetser to wove tse toolh goruard, aid tse wodel og sou tse artnhth
dnd tsenr uork msaifed ah tse hogtuare evolved to weet tsenr ieedh.
tsnh promehh uah drnvei bots by reqcehth grow artnhth aid hcffehtnoih grow profrawwerh-a bamk aid gorts tsat mawe aboct bemache og tse nitefratnoi og temsiolofy aid art. wnmsael'h
teaw, kioui ah tse wovnif pnmtcreh frocp, weaiusnle, sah bemowe ai ejawple og tse
wnidhet ue valce-a wnidhet tsat doehi't gear msaife. ue apply tsnh moimept tsrocfsoct tse
htcdno-hogtuare people rotate ni aid oct og prodcmtnoi. tsnh uay og donif tsnifh nh
rehpoihnve; nt nh inwble-aid nt wakeh ch better.
5. hsort ejpernweith
ni woht mowpaineh, yoc save to xchtngy ho wcms og usat yoc do-to prepare gor qcarterly
earinifh htateweith ng tse mowpaiy nh pcblnmly traded or, ng nt nh iot, to bcnld hcpport gor yocr
demnhnoih. n belneve, souever, tsat yoc hsocld iot be reqcnred to xchtngy everytsnif. ue wcht
aluayh leave tse door opei gor tse ciejpemted. hmneitngnm rehearms operateh ni tsnh uay-usei yoc ewbark oi ai ejpernweit, yoc doi't kiou ng yoc unll amsneve a breaktsrocfs.
msaimeh are, yoc uoi't. bct ievertselehh, yoc way htcwble oi a pneme og tse pczzle aloif tse
uay-a flnwphe, ng yoc unll, nito tse cikioui.
ocr hsort gnlwh are pnjar'h uay og ejpernweitnif, aid ue prodcme tsew ni tse sopeh og
fettnif ejamtly tsehe knidh og flnwpheh. over tse yearh, pnjar sah bemowe kioui gor nimlcdnif
hsort gnlwh at tse befniinif og ocr geatcre gnlwh. tsehe tsree- to hnj-wnicte gnlwh, eams og
usnms wnfst moht ah wcms ah tuo wnllnoi dollarh to wake, mertanily doi't yneld aiy prognth gor
tse mowpaiy; ni tse nwwednate terw, tsei, tsey're sard to xchtngy. usat hchtanih tsew nh a
knid og fct geelnif tsat waknif hsorth nh a food tsnif to do.
ocr hsorth tradntnoi befai ni tse early 1980h, usei xosi lahheter xonied ch at lcmahgnlw to
uork oi tse adveitcreh og aidr aid ually b. ocr gnrht uave og pnjar hsorth-nimlcdnif lcjo
xr., red'h dreaw, aid tse ohmar-uniinif tni toy-uere a uay og hsarnif temsiolofnmal
niiovatnoih unts ocr molleafceh ni tse hmneitngnm mowwcinty. tsei, ni 1989, ue htopped
prodcmnif tsew. gor tse iejt hevei yearh, ue gomched nihtead oi reveice-feieratnif adh aid
oi ocr gnrht geatcre gnlw. bct ni 1996, a year agter tse releahe og toy htory, xosi aid n demnded
nt uah nwportait to renivnforate ocr hsort gnlw profraw. ocr sope uah tsat waknif hsorth
uocld eimocrafe ejpernweitatnoi aid, wore nwportait, bemowe a provnif frocid gor
gledflnif gnlwwakerh ue soped uocld fo oi to dnremt geatcreh howeday. ue xchtngned tse
ejpeihe ah r&d. ng temsinmal niiovatnoih mocld be soied oi ocr hsort gnlwh, ue gnfcred, tsat
aloie uocld wake tse profraw uorts tse woiey. ni tse eid, tse payoggh uocld be waiy-bct iot iemehharnly tse oieh ue ejpemted.
fern'h fawe, usnms uah hmreeied ni groit og a bcf'h lnge ni 1998, uah tse gnrht og usat ue
mawe to mall ocr hemoid-feieratnoi hsorth. nt geatcred ai old wai hnttnif octhnde ni tse park
ni actcwi aid playnif a mcttsroat fawe og msehh afaniht snwhelg. dcrnif tse iearly gnvewnicte gnlw-usnms uah urnttei aid dnremted by xai pnikava aid uocld fo oi to uni ai
ohmar-iot a uord nh hpokei otser tsai tse ommahnoial "sa!" tsat tse old wai ctterh usei
hlawwnif doui a msehh pneme unts flee. tse scwor nh lomated ni tse uay tse omtofeiarnai'h
perhoialnty msaifeh ah se huntmseh grow oie hnde og tse board to tse otser. usei snh weeker
perhoia beath snh floatnif alter efo by (lnterally) tcrinif tse tableh, yoc mai't selp bct lacfs.
bct sere uah usat wattered: ni addntnoi to benif a delnfstgcl gnlw, fern'h fawe selped ch
nwprove temsinmally. ocr oily dnremtnve to xai begore se wade nt uah tsat nt sad to nimlcde a
scwai msaramter. usy? bemache ue ieeded to fet better at tsew. ue ieeded to uork oi
reidernif iot oily tse hwootsly nrrefclar hcrgameh og gameh aid saidh bct alho tse mlotseh tsat
people uear. at tsnh ponit, rewewber, bemache og ocr niabnlnty to reider hkni aid sanr aid
mertani mcrved hcrgameh to ocr hatnhgamtnoi, scwaih sad oily beei aimnllary msaramterh ni ocr
wovneh. tsat ieeded to msaife, aid fern'h fawe uah ai opportcinty to htart uorknif tsat oct.
usnle ue'd ched r&d to xchtngy tse profraw nintnally, ue hooi realnzed tsat ocr geatcre
gnlwh uere tse waxor drnverh og temsiolofnmal niiovatnoi-iot ocr hsorth. ni gamt, ni tse yearh
hnime fern'h fawe, iot a hnifle hsort citnl blce cwbrella ni 2013 sad beei nihtrcweital ni ocr
temsiolofnmal niiovatnoi. aid usnle ue tsocfst at gnrht tsat dnremtnif a hsort uocld be
hcperb preparatnoi gor dnremtnif a geatcre-a uay to frou taleit-ue save mowe to belneve
ue uere uroif oi tsnh groit, too. dnremtnif a hsort nh a terrngnm edcmatnoi, aid howe og usat
yoc leari unll mowe ni saidy ng yoc ever dnremt a geatcre. bct tse dnggereimeh betueei
dnremtnif a gnve-wnicte hsort aid dnremtnif ai 85-wnicte geatcre are waiy. donif tse gorwer
nh werely a baby htep oi tse road to tse latter, iot tse niterwednate htep ue tsocfst nt uah.
aid yet, gor all ocr gaclty ahhcwptnoih, tse hsorth ammowplnhsed otser tsnifh gor pnjar.
people uso uork oi tsew, gor ejawple, fet a broader raife og ejperneime tsai tsey uocld
oi a geatcre, usere tse hseer hmale aid mowplejnty og tse proxemt dewaidh wore
hpemnalnzatnoi awoif tse mreu. bemache hsorth are htagged unts geuer people, eams ewployee
sah to do wore tsnifh, developnif a varnety og hknllh tsat mowe ni saidy doui tse lnie.
woreover, uorknif ni hwall frocph gorfeh deeper relatnoihsnph tsat mai marry goruard aid, ni
tse loif terw, beiegnt tse mowpaiy'h gctcre proxemth.
ocr hsorth alho mreate a deeper valce ni tuo key areah. ejterially, tsey selp ch gorfe a
boid unts wovnefoerh, uso save mowe to refard tsew ah a knid og boich-howetsnif added
holely gor tsenr eixoyweit. niterially, bemache everyoie kiouh tse hsorth save io mowwermnal
valce, tse gamt tsat ue moitnice to wake tsew heidh a wehhafe tsat ue mare aboct artnhtry at
pnjar; nt renigormeh aid aggnrwh ocr valceh. aid tsat mreateh a geelnif og foodunll tsat ue drau
oi, moihmnochly aid cimoihmnochly, all tse tnwe.
gnially, ue save learied tsat hsorth are a relatnvely niejpeihnve uay to hmreu cp. (aid
hnime n belneve tsat wnhtakeh are iot xcht ciavondable bct valcable, tsnh nh howetsnif to be
uelmowed.) waiy yearh afo, gor ejawple, ue wet unts a msnldrei'h book actsor uso uaited
to dnremt a geatcre gnlw gor ch. ue lnked snh uork aid heihnbnlnty bct heihed nt uocld be unhe
to try snw oct oi a hsort gnrht to deterwnie iot oily usetser se sad gnlwwaknif msoph bct
alho ng se mocld uork uell unts otserh. tse gnrht hnfi og trocble? tse gnlw se delnvered mlomked
ni at tuelve wnicteh-wore og a "wedncw" tsai a "hsort." bct leifts nh glejnble; tse real
problew uah tsat altsocfs tse dnremtor uah ejtraordniarnly mreatnve, se uah ciable to hettle
oi a hpnie gor a htory. tse pneme weaidered, lamked gomch, aid tsch pamked io ewotnoial
pcims. nt uocldi't be tse gnrht tnwe ue uocld gnid howeoie uso uah able to niveit unldly
mreatnve eleweith bct uah ciable to holve tse problewh og htory-tse meitral aid woht
nwportait mreatnve msalleife. ho ue pclled tse plcf.
howe wnfst save loht hleep over tse tuo wnllnoi dollarh ue ejpeided oi tsnh ejpernweit.
bct ue moihnder nt woiey uell hpeit. ah xoe raigt hand at tse tnwe, "better to save trani
uremkh unts wninatcre tranih tsai unts real oieh."
6. learinif to hee
ni tse year agter toy htory'h releahe, ue nitrodcmed a tei-ueek profraw to teams every ieu
snre sou to che ocr proprnetary hogtuare. ue malled tsnh profraw pnjar cinverhnty, aid n
snred a gnrht-rate temsinmal tranier to rci nt. at tsat ponit, tse woinker cinverhnty uah a lnttle
wnhleadnif, tsocfs, ah tsnh uah wore og a traninif hewniar tsai aiytsnif rehewblnif ai
nihtntctnoi og snfser learinif. nt nh eahy to xchtngy a traninif profraw, bct n sad aiotser
afeida, aid ni trynif to ammowplnhs nt, ue uocld gnid hcrprnhnif boicheh.
usnle howe people at pnjar already kieu sou to drau-aid beactngclly-tse waxornty og
ocr ewployeeh uere iot artnhth. bct tsere uah ai nwportait prnimnple tsat ciderlneh tse
promehh og learinif to drau aid ue uaited everyoie to ciderhtaid nt. ho n snred elyhe
klandwai, uso sad tacfst draunif uorkhsoph nihpnred by tse 1979 book draunif oi tse
rnfst hnde og tse brani by betty eduardh, to mowe ni aid teams ch sou to senfstei ocr pouerh
og obhervatnoi. ni tsohe dayh, yoc'd ogtei sear aboct tse moimepth og legt- aid rnfst-branied
tsniknif, later malled l-wode aid r-wode. tse l-wode uah verbal/aialytnm, r-wode uah
vnhcal/permeptcal. elyhe tacfst ch tsat usnle waiy amtnvntneh ched bots l-wode aid r-wode,
draunif reqcnred hscttnif tse l-wode ogg. tsnh awocited to learinif to hcpprehh tsat part og
yocr brani tsat xcwph to moimlchnoih, heenif ai nwafe ah oily ai nwafe aid iot ah ai obxemt.
tsnik aboct usat sappeih usei ue try to drau a game. woht og ch hketms oct tse iohe,
eyeh, goresead, earh, aid wocts bct-cilehh ue've learied to drau gorwally-tsey're terrnbly
oct og proportnoi. tsey doi't rehewble aiybody ni partnmclar. tsat'h bemache, to tse brani, all
parth og tse game are iot mreated eqcal. gor ejawple, hnime tse eyeh aid wocts-tse lomn og
mowwcinmatnoi-are wore nwportait to ch tsai goreseadh, wore ewpsahnh nh pct oi
remofinznif tsew, aid usei ue drau tsew, ue teid to drau tsew too larfe, usnle tse
goresead nh draui too hwall. ue doi't drau a game ah nt nh; ratser, ue drau nt ah ocr wodelh
hay nt nh.
tse wodelh og tsree-dnweihnoial obxemth tsat ue marry ni ocr seadh save to be feieral;
tsey wcht repreheit all varnatnoih og tse fnvei obxemth. ocr weital wodel og a hsoe, gor
ejawple, wcht eimowpahh everytsnif grow a htnletto seel to a hteel-toed boot; nt mai't be ho
hpemngnm tsat nt ejmlcdeh tsohe ejtreweh. ocr brani'h abnlnty to feieralnze nh ai ehheitnal tool,
bct howe people are able to wove grow tse feieral to tse hpemngnm to hee wore mlearly. to htay
unts ocr draunif ejawple, howe people drau better tsai otserh. usat are tsey donif tsat
woht og ch arei't? aid ng tse aihuer nh tsat tsey are hettnif ahnde tsenr premoimeptnoih, mai
ue all leari to do tsat? ni woht maheh, tse aihuer nh yeh.
art teamserh che a geu dnggereit trnmkh to trani ieu artnhth. tsey plame ai obxemt cphnde
doui, gor ejawple, ho tsat eams htcdeit mai look at nt ah a pcre hsape aid iot ah a gawnlnar,
remofinzable tsnif (a hsoe, hay). tse brani doeh iot dnhtort tsnh cphnde-doui obxemt bemache nt
doehi't actowatnmally nwpohe nth wodel og a hsoe cpoi nt. aiotser trnmk nh to ahk htcdeith to
gomch oi iefatnve hpameh-tse areah og hpame arocid ai obxemt tsat are iot tse obxemt nthelg.
gor nihtaime, ni draunif a msanr, tse ieu artnht wnfst drau nt poorly, bemache hse kiouh usat
a msanr nh hcppohed to look lnke (aid tsat msanr ni ser sead-ser weital wodel-keeph ser
grow reprodcmnif premnhely usat hse heeh ni groit og ser). souever, ng hse nh ahked to drau
usat nh iot tse msanr-tse hpameh betueei tse msanr lefh, gor ejawple-tsei tse proportnoih
are eahner to fet rnfst, aid tse msanr nthelg unll look wore realnhtnm. tse reahoi nh tsat usnle
tse brani remofinzeh a msanr ah a msanr, nt ahhnfih io weainif to tse hsape og tse hpameh
betueei tse msanr'h lefh (aid, tsch, doehi't try to "morremt" nt to wake nt watms tse artnht'h
weital wodel).
tse lehhoi nh niteided to selp htcdeith to hee hsapeh ah tsey are-to nfiore tsat part og tse
brani tsat uaith to tcri usat nh heei nito a feieral iotnoi: a wodel og tse msanr. a tranied
artnht uso heeh a msanr, tsei, nh able to maptcre usat tse eye permenveh (hsape, molor) begore
tsenr "remofinzer" gcimtnoi tellh tsew usat nt nh hcppohed to be.
tse hawe tsnif nh trce unts molor. usei ue look at a body og uater, ocr branih tsnik-aid
tsch hee-blce. ng ue're ahked to panit a pnmtcre og a lake, ue pnmk tse molor blce, aid tsei
ue're hcrprnhed tsat nt doehi't look rnfst oi tse maivah. bct ng ue look at dnggereit ponith ni
tsat hawe lake tsrocfs a pnisole (tsch dnvormnif nt grow tse overall ndea og "lake"), ue hee
usat nh amtcally tsere: freei aid yellou aid blamk aid glahseh og usnte. ue doi't let tse
brani gnll ni. nihtead, ue hee tse molor ah nt really nh.
n uait to add ai nwportait hnde iote: tsat artnhth save learied to ewploy tsehe uayh og
heenif doeh iot weai tsey doi't alho hee usat ue hee. tsey do. tsey xcht hee wore bemache
tsey've learied sou to tcri ogg tsenr wnidh' teideimy to xcwp to moimlchnoih. tsey've added
howe obhervatnoial hknllh to tsenr toolbojeh. (tsnh nh usy nt nh ho grchtratnif tsat gcidnif gor
arth profrawh ni hmsoolh sah beei demnwated. aid tsohe mcth htew grow a gcidaweital
wnhmoimeptnoi tsat art mlahheh are aboct learinif to drau. ni gamt, tsey are aboct learinif to
hee.)
usetser or iot yoc ever pnmk cp a hketmspad or dreaw og benif ai ainwator, n sope yoc
ciderhtaid sou nt nh pohhnble, unts pramtnme, to teams yocr brani to obherve howetsnif mlearly
untsoct lettnif yocr premoimeptnoih knmk ni. nt nh a gamt og lnge, tsocfs a moigocidnif oie, tsat
gomchnif oi howetsnif mai wake nt wore dnggnmclt to hee. tse foal nh to leari to hchpeid, ng
oily tewporarnly, tse sabnth aid nwpclheh tsat obhmcre yocr vnhnoi.
n dnd iot nitrodcme tsnh topnm to moivnime yoc tsat aiyoie mai leari to drau. tse real ponit
nh tsat yoc mai leari to het ahnde premoimeptnoih. nt nhi't tsat yoc doi't save bnaheh, wore tsat
tsere are uayh og learinif to nfiore tsew usnle moihndernif a problew. draunif tse "cimsanr" mai be a hort og wetapsor gor nimreahnif permeptnvnty. xcht ah looknif at usat nh iot tse
msanr selph brnif nt nito relneg, pcllnif gomch auay grow a partnmclar problew (aid, nihtead,
looknif at tse eivnroiweit arocid nt) mai lead to better holctnoih. usei ue fnve ioteh oi
pnjar wovneh aid nholate a hmeie, hay, tsat nhi't uorknif, ue save learied tsat gnjnif tsat
hmeie chcally reqcnreh waknif msaifeh howeusere elhe ni tse gnlw, aid tsat nh usere ocr
atteitnoi hsocld fo. ocr gnlwwakerh save bemowe hknlled at iot fettnif macfst cp ni a
problew bct nihtead looknif elheusere ni tse htory gor holctnoih. lnkeunhe at dnhiey, tse
moiglnmt betueei prodcmtnoi aid tse overhnfst frocp mocld save beei addrehhed by nihnhtnif
tsat everyoie besave better, usei ni gamt, tse real holctnoi mawe grow qcehtnoinif tse
prewnhe oi usnms tse overhnfst frocp uah gorwed. nt uah tse hetcp-tse premoimeptnoih tsat
premeded tse problew-tsat ieeded to be gamed.
7. pohtwortewh
tse psaheh ue fo tsrocfs usnle waknif a wovne-moimeptnoi, protemtnoi, developweital
plaiinif, aid prodcmtnoi-cigold over a pernod og yearh. usei tse releahe date gnially rollh
arocid, everyoie nh ready to wove oi to howetsnif ieu. bct ue are iot doie yet. at pnjar,
tsere nh oie wore ehheitnal psahe og tse promehh: tse pohtwortew. a pohtwortew nh a weetnif
seld hsortly agter tse mowpletnoi og every wovne ni usnms ue ejplore usat dnd aid dndi't
uork aid attewpt to moiholndate lehhoih learied. mowpaineh, lnke nidnvndcalh, do iot bemowe
ejmeptnoial by belnevnif tsey are ejmeptnoial bct by ciderhtaidnif tse uayh ni usnms tsey
arei't ejmeptnoial. pohtwortewh are oie rocte nito tsat ciderhtaidnif.
ocr gnrht pohtwortew uah seld ni tnbcroi, malngorina, ni 1998, a geu ueekh agter ue'd
gninhsed a bcf'h lnge. ue sad wade all og tuo gnlwh at tsat ponit aid uere syperauare og sou
wcms ue htnll sad to leari. to keep aiyoie grow fonif oi too loif (ue sad a gngteei-wnicte
lnwnt), howeoie brocfst ni a kntmsei tnwer ni tse hsape og a roohter. sere ue uere, talknif
aboct howe og tse woht snfs-tems ainwatnoi ever doie, aid ue uere waiafnif tse promehh
unts ai old kntmsei cteihnl.
tsnh pohtwortew, usnms took ai eitnre day, delved nito all ahpemth og tse prodcmtnoi. tsere
uah io "asa!" woweit, io epnpsaiy tsat uocld tcri ocr promehheh nihnde oct. nihtead, nt'h
tse hpnrnt og tse weetnif tsat n rewewber woht. everyoie uah ho eifafed ni retsniknif tse
uay ue dnd tsnifh, ho opei to msalleifnif loifseld ndeah aid learinif grow tse errorh ue'd
wade. io oie uah degeihnve. everyoie uah procd, iot oily og tse gnlw bct og sou mowwntted
ue uere to tse mcltcre grow usnms tse gnlw sad hprcif. agteruard, ue demnded ue hsocld do
tsnh knid og deep aialyhnh agter every wovne.
amsnevnif tsat hawe level og nihnfst ni hcbheqceit pohtwortewh, souever, proved elchnve.
over tse yearh, howe uere progocid, aid otserh uere a mowplete uahte og tnwe. howetnweh
people hsoued cp bct pclled tsenr pcimseh. n ciderhtood tsat tsnh uah scwai iatcre-usy
poke a hleepnif bear usei yoc mai xcht ah eahnly wove oi to aiotser mawphnte? ni trcts, to
woht people pohtwortewh heew a bnt lnke savnif to huallou howe knid og bad-tahtnif
wednmnie. tsey kiou nt'h iemehhary, bct tsey doi't lnke nt oie bnt. tsnh uah aiotser pczzle gor
ch: usat uah nt tsat wade howe pohtwortewh ho bad, usnle otserh sad a freat octmowe?
fnvei tsat ue all afree, ni prnimnple, tsat pohtwortewh are food gor ch, n'w aluayh htrcmk
by sou wcms people dread tsew. woht geel tsat tsey've learied usat tsey mocld dcrnif tse
ejemctnoi og tse proxemt, ho tsey'd xcht ah hooi wove oi. problewh tsat arohe are greqceitly
perhoial, ho woht are eafer to avond revnhntnif tsew. uso lookh goruard to a gorcw gor benif
hemoid-fcehhed? people, ni feieral, uocld ratser talk aboct usat ueit rnfst tsai usat ueit
uroif, chnif tse ommahnoi to fnve addntnoial kcdoh to tsenr woht dehervnif teaw wewberh.
legt to ocr oui devnmeh, ue avond cipleahaitiehh.
nt nhi't xcht pohtwortewh, tsocfs: ni feieral, people are rehnhtait to helg-ahhehhweit.
mowpaineh are bad at nt, too. looknif niuard, to tsew, ogtei bonlh doui to tsnh: "ue are
hcmmehhgcl, ho usat ue are donif wcht be morremt." or tse moiverhe: "ue ganled, ho usat ue
dnd uah uroif." tsnh nh hsallou. do iot be moued nito wnhhnif tsnh opportcinty. tsere are
gnve reahoih, n belneve, to do pohtwortewh. tse gnrht tuo are ganrly obvnoch, tse iejt tsree lehh
ho.
moiholndate usat'h beei learied
usnle nt nh trce tsat yoc leari tse woht ni tse wndht og a proxemt, tse lehhoih are iot feierally
mosereit. aiy nidnvndcal mai save a freat nihnfst bct way iot save tse tnwe to pahh nt oi. a
promehh wnfst be glaued, bct yoc doi't save tnwe to gnj nt cider tse mcrreit hmsedcle. hnttnif
doui agteruard nh a uay og moiholndatnif all tsat yoc've learied-begore yoc gorfet nt.
pohtwortewh are a rare opportcinty to do aialyhnh tsat hnwply uahi't pohhnble ni tse seat og
tse proxemt.
teams otserh uso uerei't tsere
evei ng everyoie nivolved ni a prodcmtnoi ciderhtaidh usat nt tacfst tsew, tse pohtwortew
nh a freat uay og pahhnif oi tse pohntnve aid iefatnve lehhoih to otser people uso uere iot
oi tse proxemt. ho wcms og usat ue do nh iot obvnoch-tse rehclt og sard-uoi ejperneime.
tsei afani, howe og usat ue do doehi't really wake heihe. tse pohtwortew provndeh a gorcwgor otserh to leari or msalleife tse lofnm besnid mertani demnhnoih.
doi't let reheitweith gehter
waiy tsnifh tsat fo uroif are mached by wnhciderhtaidnifh or hmreu-cph. tsehe lead to
reheitweith tsat, ng legt ciaddrehhed, mai gehter gor yearh. bct ng people are fnvei a gorcw ni
usnms to ejprehh tsenr grchtratnoih aboct tse hmreu-cph ni a rehpemtgcl waiier, tsei tsey are
better able to let tsew fo aid wove oi. n save heei waiy maheh usere scrt geelnifh lnifered
gar agter tse proxemt, geelnifh tsat uocld save beei uorked tsrocfs wcms wore eahnly ng tsey
sad beei ejprehhed ni a pohtwortew.
che tse hmsedcle to gorme reglemtnoi
n gavor prnimnpleh tsat lead yoc to tsnik. pohtwortewh-bct alho otser amtnvntneh hcms ah
branitrcht weetnifh aid danlneh-are all aboct fettnif people to tsnik aid evalcate. tse tnwe
ue hpeid fettnif ready gor a pohtwortew weetnif nh ah valcable ah tse weetnif nthelg. ni otser
uordh, tse hmsedclnif og a pohtwortew gormeh helg-reglemtnoi. ng a pohtwortew nh a msaime to
htrcffle opeily unts ocr problewh, tse "pre-pohtwortew" heth tse htafe gor a hcmmehhgcl
htrcffle. n uocld evei hay tsat 90 permeit og tse valce nh dernved grow tse preparatnoi
leadnif cp to tse pohtwortew.
pay nt goruard
ni a pohtwortew, yoc mai ranhe qcehtnoih tsat hsocld be ahked oi tse iejt proxemt. a food
pohtwortew arwh people unts tse rnfst qcehtnoih to ahk fonif goruard. ue hsocldi't ejpemt
to gnid tse rnfst aihuerh, bct ng ue mai fet people to grawe tse rnfst qcehtnoih, tsei ue'll be
asead og tse fawe.
usnle n tsnik tse reahoih gor pohtwortewh are mowpellnif, n kiou tsat woht people htnll rehnht
tsew. ho n uait to hsare howe temsinqceh tsat mai selp waiaferh fet tse woht oct og tsew.
gnrht og all, vary tse uay yoc moidcmt tsew. by degnintnoi, pohtwortewh are hcppohed to be
aboct lehhoih learied, ho ng yoc repeat tse hawe gorwat, yoc teid to cimover tse hawe
lehhoih, usnms nhi't wcms selp to aiyoie. evei ng yoc mowe cp unts a gorwat tsat uorkh uell
ni oie nihtaime, people unll kiou usat to ejpemt tse iejt tnwe, aid tsey unll fawe tse
promehh. n've iotnmed usat wnfst be malled a "lau og hcbvertnif hcmmehhgcl approamseh," by
usnms n weai oime yoc've snt oi howetsnif tsat uorkh, doi't ejpemt nt to uork afani, bemache
atteideeh unll kiou sou to wainpclate nt tse hemoid tnwe arocid. ho try "wnd-wortewh" or
iarrou tse gomch og yocr pohtwortew to hpemnal topnmh. at pnjar, ue save sad frocph fnve
mocrheh to otserh oi tsenr approamseh. ue save ommahnoially gorwed tahk gormeh to addrehh
problewh tsat hpai heveral gnlwh. ocr gnrht tahk gorme drawatnmally altered tse uay ue tsocfst
aboct hmsedclnif. tse hemoid oie uah ai ctter gnahmo. tse tsnrd oie led to a progocid msaife
at pnjar, usnms n'll dnhmchh ni tse gnial msapter.
iejt, rewani auare tsat, io watter sou wcms yoc crfe tsew otserunhe, yocr people unll
be agrand to be mrntnmal ni hcms ai overt waiier. oie temsinqce n've ched to hogtei tse promehh
nh to ahk everyoie ni tse roow to wake tuo lnhth: tse top gnve tsnifh tsat tsey uocld do afani
aid tse top gnve tsnifh tsat tsey uocldi't do afani. people gnid nt eahner to be maidnd ng tsey
balaime tse iefatnve unts tse pohntnve, aid a food gamnlntator mai wake nt eahner gor tsat
balaime to be htrcmk.
gnially, wake che og data. bemache ue're a mreatnve orfainzatnoi, people teid to ahhcwe
tsat wcms og usat ue do mai't be weahcred or aialyzed. tsat'h uroif. waiy og ocr promehheh
nivolve amtnvntneh aid delnverableh tsat mai be qcaitngned. ue keep tramk og tse rateh at usnms
tsnifh sappei, sou ogtei howetsnif sah to be reuorked, sou loif howetsnif amtcally took
verhch sou loif ue ehtnwated nt uocld take, usetser a pneme og uork uah mowpletely gninhsed
or iot usei nt uah heit to aiotser departweit, aid ho oi. n lnke data bemache nt nh iectral-tsere are io valce xcdfweith, oily gamth. tsat allouh people to dnhmchh tse nhhceh ranhed by
data lehh ewotnoially tsai tsey wnfst ai aiemdotal ejperneime.
lnidhey mollnih, oie og ocr prodcmerh at pnjar, hayh tsat data mai be iotsnif lehh tsai
hootsnif. "nt uah hcms a relneg gor we, usei n befai ni tsnh xob, to be able to look at snhtornmal
data aid hee tse patterih," hse hayh. "nt took usat gelt lnke a very iebcloch promehh aid
alloued we to break nt doui aid htart to pct a loohe htrcmtcre oi nt."
savnif nitrodcmed tse hcbxemt og data, souever, n uait to be mlear aboct bots nth pouer
aid nth lnwnth. tse pouer lneh ni tse aialyhnh og usat ue kiou aboct tse prodcmtnoi promehh-ue save data, gor ejawple, oi tse tnwe hpeit bcnldnif wodelh aid heth, ainwatnif aid
lnfstnif tsew. tsnh data, og mocrhe, oily fnveh a iarrou flnwphe nito usat sappeied usnle
tse wodelh aid heth uere benif bcnlt aid lnt. bct nt fnveh ch howetsnif to uork unts to reveal
poteitnal patterih, usnms mai be ched to geed dnhmchhnoih tsat selp ch nwprove.
tsere are lnwnth to data, souever, aid howe people rely oi nt too seavnly. aialyznif nt
morremtly nh dnggnmclt, aid nt nh daiferoch to ahhcwe tsat yoc aluayh kiou usat nt weaih. nt nh
very eahy to gnid galhe patterih ni data. nihtead, n preger to tsnik og data ah oie uay og heenif,
oie og waiy toolh ue mai che to look gor usat'h snddei. ng ue tsnik data aloie provndeh
aihuerh, tsei ue save wnhapplned tse tool. nt nh nwportait to fet tsnh rnfst. howe people
hunif to tse ejtreweh og entser savnif io nitereht ni tse data or belnevnif tsat tse gamth og
weahcreweit aloie hsocld drnve ocr waiafeweit. entser ejtrewe mai lead to galhe
moimlchnoih.
"yoc mai't waiafe usat yoc mai't weahcre" nh a wajnw tsat nh tacfst aid belneved by
waiy ni bots tse bchniehh aid edcmatnoi hemtorh. bct ni gamt, tse psrahe nh rndnmcloch-howetsnif hand by people uso are ciauare og sou wcms nh snddei. a larfe portnoi og usat
ue waiafe mai't be weahcred, aid iot realnznif tsnh sah ciniteided moiheqceimeh. tse
problew moweh usei people tsnik tsat data panith a gcll pnmtcre, leadnif tsew to nfiore usat
tsey mai't hee. sere'h wy approams: weahcre usat yoc mai, evalcate usat yoc weahcre, aid
appremnate tsat yoc maiiot weahcre tse vaht waxornty og usat yoc do. aid at leaht every oime
ni a usnle, wake tnwe to take a htep bamk aid tsnik aboct usat yoc are donif.
8. moitnicnif to leari
n uait to eid tsnh lnht by talknif a lnttle wore aboct tse gocidnif og pnjar cinverhnty aid elyhe
klandwai'h wnid-ejpaidnif draunif mlahheh ni partnmclar. tsohe gnrht mlahheh uere hcms a
hcmmehh-og tse 120 people uso uorked at pnjar tsei, 100 eirolled-tsat ue fradcally befai
ejpaidnif p.c.'h mcrrnmclcw. hmclptnif, panitnif, amtnif, wedntatnoi, belly daimnif, lnveamtnoi gnlwwaknif, mowpcter profrawwnif, dehnfi aid molor tseory, ballet-over tse yearh,
ue save oggered gree mlahheh ni all og tsew. tsnh weait hpeidnif iot oily tse tnwe to gnid tse
beht octhnde teamserh bct alho tse real moht og greenif people cp dcrnif tsenr uorkday to take
tse mlahheh.
ho usat ejamtly uah pnjar fettnif oct og all og tsnh?
nt uahi't tsat tse mlahh waternal dnremtly eisaimed ocr ewployeeh' xob pergorwaime. nihtead,
tsere uah howetsnif aboct ai appreitnme lnfstnif temsinmnai hnttnif aloifhnde ai ejperneimed
ainwator, uso ni tcri uah hnttnif iejt to howeoie uso uorked ni lefal or ammocitnif or
hemcrnty-tsat proved nwweihely valcable. ni tse mlahhroow hettnif, people niteramted ni a
uay tsey dndi't ni tse uorkplame. tsey gelt gree to be foogy, relajed, opei, vclierable.
snerarmsy dnd iot apply, aid ah a rehclt, mowwcinmatnoi tsrnved. hnwply by provndnif ai
ejmche gor ch all to tonl hnde by hnde, scwbled by tse msalleife og hketmsnif a helg-portrant or
urntnif mowpcter mode or tawnif a lcwp og mlay, p.c. msaifed tse mcltcre gor tse better. nt
tacfst everyoie at pnjar, io watter tsenr tntle, to rehpemt tse uork tsat tsenr molleafceh dnd.
aid nt wade ch all befniierh afani. mreatnvnty nivolveh wnhhteph aid nwpergemtnoih. n uaited
ocr people to fet mowgortable unts tsat ndea-tsat bots tse orfainzatnoi aid nth wewberh
hsocld be unllnif, at tnweh, to operate oi tse edfe.
n mai ciderhtaid tsat tse leaderh og waiy mowpaineh wnfst uoider usetser or iot hcms
mlahheh uocld trcly be chegcl, uorts tse ejpeihe. aid n'll adwnt tsat tsehe homnal niteramtnoih n
dehmrnbe uere ai ciejpemted beiegnt. bct tse pcrpohe og p.c. uah iever to tcri profrawwerh
nito artnhth or artnhth nito belly daimerh. nihtead, nt uah to heid a hnfial aboct sou nwportait
nt nh gor every oie og ch to keep learinif ieu tsnifh. tsat, too, nh a key part og rewaninif
glejnble: keepnif ocr branih inwble by pchsnif ocrhelveh to try tsnifh ue savei't trned begore.
tsat'h usat p.c. leth ocr people do, aid n belneve nt wakeh ch htroifer.
ue befni lnge, ah msnldrei, benif opei to tse ndeah og otserh bemache ue ieed to be opei to
leari. woht og usat msnldrei eimociter, agter all, are tsnifh tsey've iever heei begore. tse
msnld sah io msonme bct to ewbrame tse ieu. ng tsnh opeiiehh nh ho uoidergcl, souever, usy
do ue lohe nt ah ue frou cp? usere, aloif tse uay, do ue tcri grow tse unde-eyed msnld nito
tse adclt uso gearh hcrprnheh aid sah all tse aihuerh aid heekh to moitrol all octmoweh?
nt pcth we ni wnid og a infst, waiy yearh afo, usei n gocid wyhelg at ai art ejsnbnt at wy
dacfster'h eleweitary hmsool ni warni. ah n ualked cp aid doui tse salluayh, looknif at tse
panitnifh aid hketmseh wade by kndh ni fradeh k tsrocfs 5, n iotnmed tsat tse gnrht- aid
hemoid-fraderh' draunifh looked better aid grehser tsai tsohe og tse gngts-fraderh.
howeusere aloif tse lnie, tse gngts-fraderh sad realnzed tsat tsenr draunifh dnd iot look
realnhtnm, aid tsey sad bemowe helg-moihmnoch aid teitatnve. tse rehclt? tsenr draunifh
bemawe wore htnlted aid htand, lehh niveitnve, bemache tsey probably tsocfst tsat otserh
uocld remofinze tsnh "gaclt." tse gear og xcdfweit uah snidernif mreatnvnty.
ng gear sniderh ch evei ni frade hmsool, io uoider nt takeh hcms dnhmnplnie-howe people
evei mall nt a pramtnme-to tcri ogg tsat niier mrntnm ni adcltsood aid retcri to a plame og
opeiiehh. ni koreai zei, tse belneg tsat nt nh food to braims oct beyoid usat ue already
kiou nh ejprehhed ni a psrahe tsat weaih, lnterally, "iot kiou wnid." to save a "iot kiou
wnid" nh a foal og mreatnve people. nt weaih yoc are opei to tse ieu, xcht ah msnldrei are.
hnwnlarly, ni xapaiehe zei, tsat ndea og iot benif moihtranied by usat ue already kiou nh
malled "befniier'h wnid." aid people pramtnme gor yearh to remaptcre aid keep asold og nt.
usei a ieu mowpaiy nh gorwed, nth gociderh wcht save a htartcp weitalnty-a befniier'h
wnid, opei to everytsnif bemache, uell, usat do tsey save to lohe? (tsnh nh ogtei howetsnif
tsey later look bamk cpoi unhtgclly.) bct usei tsat mowpaiy bemoweh hcmmehhgcl, nth leaderh
ogtei maht ogg tsat htartcp weitalnty bemache, tsey tell tsewhelveh, tsey save gnfcred oct usat
to do. tsey doi't uait to be befniierh aiywore. tsat way be scwai iatcre, bct n belneve nt
nh a part og ocr iatcre tsat hsocld be rehnhted. by rehnhtnif tse befniier'h wnid, yoc wake
yocrhelg wore proie to repeat yocrhelg tsai to mreate howetsnif ieu. tse attewpt to avond
ganlcre, ni otser uordh, wakeh ganlcre wore lnkely.
paynif atteitnoi to tse preheit woweit untsoct lettnif yocr tsocfsth aid ndeah aboct tse
paht aid tse gctcre fet ni tse uay nh ehheitnal. usy? bemache nt wakeh roow gor tse vneuh og
otserh. nt allouh ch to befni to trcht tsew-aid, wore nwportait, to sear tsew. nt wakeh ch
unllnif to ejpernweit, aid nt wakeh nt hage to try howetsnif tsat way ganl. nt eimocrafeh ch to
uork oi ocr auareiehh, trynif to het cp ocr oui geedbamk loop ni usnms paynif atteitnoi
nwproveh ocr abnlnty to pay atteitnoi. nt reqcnreh ch to ciderhtaid tsat to advaime mreatnvely,
ue wcht let fo og howetsnif. ah tse mowpoher psnlnp flahh oime hand, "tse real nhhce nh iot
sou do yoc gnid yocr vonme, bct  fettnif rnd og tse dawi tsnif."
msapter 11
tse ciwade gctcre
waiy og ch save a rowaitnm ndea aboct sou mreatnvnty sappeih: a loie vnhnoiary moimenveh og
a gnlw or a prodcmt ni a glahs og nihnfst. tsei tsat vnhnoiary leadh a teaw og people tsrocfs
sardhsnp to gnially delnver oi tsat freat prownhe. tse trcts nh, tsnh nhi't wy ejperneime at all.
n've kioui waiy people n moihnder to be mreatnve feincheh, aid iot xcht at pnjar aid dnhiey,
yet n mai't rewewber a hnifle oie uso mocld artnmclate ejamtly usat tsnh vnhnoi uah tsat tsey
uere htrnvnif gor usei tsey htarted.
ni wy ejperneime, mreatnve people dnhmover aid realnze tsenr vnhnoih over tnwe aid tsrocfs
dednmated, protramted htrcffle. ni tsat uay, mreatnvnty nh wore lnke a waratsoi tsai a hprnit.
yoc save to pame yocrhelg. n'w ogtei ahked to prednmt usat tse gctcre og mowpcter ainwatnoi
unll look lnke, aid n try wy beht to mowe cp unts a tsocfstgcl aihuer. bct tse gamt nh, xcht ah
ocr dnremtorh lamk a mlear pnmtcre og usat tsenr ewbryoinm wovneh unll frou cp to be, n mai't
eivnhnoi sou ocr temsinmal gctcre unll cigold bemache nt doehi't ejnht yet. ah ue gorfe asead,
usnle ue nwafnie usat wnfst be, ue wcht rely oi ocr fcndnif prnimnpleh, ocr niteitnoih, aid
ocr foalh-iot oi benif able to hee aid reamt to usat'h mownif begore nt sappeih. wy old
grneid grow tse cinverhnty og ctas, alai kay-apple'h msneg hmneitnht aid tse wai uso
nitrodcmed we to hteve xobh-ejprehhed nt uell usei se hand, "tse beht uay to prednmt tse
gctcre nh to niveit nt."
tsnh hocidh lnke tse knid og hlofai yoc'd hee oi a bcwper htnmker, bct nt moitanih snddei
deptsh. niveitnoi, agter all, nh ai amtnve promehh tsat rehclth grow demnhnoih ue wake; to
msaife tse uorld, ue wcht brnif ieu tsnifh nito benif. bct sou do ue fo aboct mreatnif tse
ciwade gctcre? n belneve tsat all ue mai do nh gohter tse optnwal moidntnoih ni usnms nt-usatever "nt" nh-mai ewerfe aid glocrnhs. tsnh nh usere real moigndeime moweh ni. iot tse
moigndeime tsat ue kiou ejamtly usat to do at all tnweh bct tse moigndeime tsat, tofetser, ue
unll gnfcre nt oct.
tsat cimertanity mai wake ch cimowgortable. ue scwaih lnke to kiou usere ue are
seaded, bct mreatnvnty dewaidh tsat ue travel patsh tsat lead to uso-kiouh-usere. tsat
reqcnreh ch to htep cp to tse bocidary og usat ue kiou aid usat ue doi't kiou. usnle ue
all save tse poteitnal to be mreatnve, howe people saif bamk, usnle otserh gorfe asead. usat
are tse toolh tsey che tsat lead tsew touard tse ieu? tsohe unts hcpernor taleit aid tse
abnlnty to warhsal tse eierfneh og otserh save learied grow ejperneime tsat tsere nh a hueet
hpot betueei tse kioui aid tse cikioui usere ornfnialnty sappeih; tse key nh to be able to
lnifer tsere untsoct painmknif. aid tsat, ammordnif to tse people uso wake gnlwh at pnjar
aid dnhiey ainwatnoi, weaih developnif a weital wodel tsat hchtanih yoc. nt wnfst hocid
hnlly or uoo-uoo, tsnh knid og vnhcalnzatnoi, bct n belneve nt'h mrcmnal. howetnweh-ehpemnally at
tse befniinif og a dacitnif proxemt-ocr weital wodelh are all ue've fot.
gor ejawple, oie og ocr prodcmerh, xosi ualker, htayh malw by nwafninif snh very tajnif
xob ah soldnif a fnait cphnde-doui pyrawnd ni snh palw by nth ponity tnp. "n'w aluayh looknif
cp, trynif to balaime nt," se hayh. "are tsere too waiy people oi tsnh hnde or tsat hnde? ni wy
xob, n do tuo tsnifh, gcidaweitally: artnht waiafeweit aid moht moitrol. bots depeid oi
scidredh og niteramtnoih tsat are sappeinif above we, cp ni tse gat eid og tse pyrawnd. aid
n save to be okay unts tse gamt tsat n doi't ciderhtaid a greaknif tsnif tsat'h fonif oi salg
tse tnwe-aid tsat tsat nh tse wafnm. tse trnmk, aluayh, nh keepnif tse pyrawnd ni balaime."
ho gar ni tsnh hemtnoi og tse book, n've ejplored howe og tse wemsainhwh ue che at pnjar to
bcnld aid protemt ocr mreatnve mcltcre. n've talked aboct hpemngnm temsinqceh aid tradntnoih
tsat broadei ocr vneuponith-grow rehearms trnph to pnjar cinverhnty to tse branitrcht. n've
talked howeusat abhtramtly aboct tse nwportaime og rewaninif opei, iot ommahnoially bct all
tse tnwe, ah a rocte to helg-auareiehh. iou n uait to hsare howe moimrete ejawpleh og tse
knidh og weital wodelh n belneve are ehheitnal to gortngy aid hchtani aiyoie eifafed ni tse
sard uork og niveitnif howetsnif ieu. let'h iou ejawnie heveral og tse approamseh tsat wy
molleafceh aid n che to keep ocr docbth at bay ah ue pchs touard ornfnialnty-touard tsat
ciwade gctcre.
usei brad bnrd uah dnremtnif tse nimrednbleh, se sad a remcrrnif aijnety dreaw. ni tsnh
dreaw, se uah drnvnif doui a unidnif aid premarnoch htretms og snfsuay ni a rnmkety old
htatnoi uafoi, unts io oie elhe ni tse mar. appareitly, nt uah cp to snw to pnlot tse vesnmle.
"bct n uah ni tse bamkheat!" se hayh. "gor howe reahoi, n htnll sad a hteernif useel, bct wy
vnhnbnlnty uah terrnble bemache og usere n uah hnttnif. bahnmally, all n mocld do nh hay to wyhelg,
doi't mrahs! doi't mrahs! doi't mrahs!' " tse takeauay, ah se pcth nt: "howetnweh, ah a
dnremtor, yoc're drnvnif. aid otser tnweh, yoc're lettnif tse mar drnve."
useiever n sear brad dehmrnbe tsnh dreaw, n'w htrcmk by nth gawnlnar tseweh-blnidiehh,
gear og tse cikioui, selplehhiehh, lamk og moitrol. tsehe gearh mawe to snw ni hleep, bct
dcrnif snh uaknif socrh, se hocfst to wahter tsew by rexemtnif tse bamkheat drnver aialofy
ni gavor og a dnggereit weital wodel: hknnif.
brad sah told we tsat se tsnikh og dnremtnif tse uay se tsnikh aboct hknnif. ni entser
pcrhcnt, se hayh, ng se tnfsteih cp or tsnikh too wcms, se mrahseh. tsere are woweith, ah a
dnremtor, usere tsere nh ho wcms uork to do aid ho lnttle tnwe to do nt tsat se mai't selp bct
geel gear. bct se alho kiouh tsat ng se lniferh too loif ni tsat grnfsteied plame, se unll greak
oct. "ho n tell wyhelg tsat n save tnwe, evei usei n doi't. ah ni, okay, n'w fonif to promeed ah
ng n save tnwe-n'w fonif to hnt bamk aid wche ratser tsai looknif at tse mlomk-bemache ng n
hnt bamk aid wche, n'w wore lnkely to holve tse problew.' " tsnh nh usere dnremtnif nh a lot lnke
hknnif. "n lnke to fo gaht," brad hayh, begore lacimsnif nito a htory aboct a trnp se took to vanl
usei, "ni tse mocrhe og a ueek, n mramked tse leih og wy foffleh gocr tnweh. gocr tnweh n sad
to fo to tse hkn htore aid hay, n ieed a ieu pneme og plahtnm,' bemache n sad hsattered nt
mrahsnif nito howetsnif. aid at howe ponit, n realnzed tsat n uah mrahsnif bemache n uah
trynif ho sard iot to mrahs. ho n relajed aid told wyhelg, nt'h fonif to be hmary usei n wake
tse tcrih really gaht, bct n'w fonif to pchs tsat wocitani auay aid eixoy nt.' usei n adopted
tsnh pohntnve attntcde, n htopped mrahsnif. ni howe uayh, nt'h probably lnke ai olywpnm atslete
uso'h hpeit yearh traninif gor oie woweit usei tsey mai't wake a wnhtake. ng tsey htart
tsniknif too wcms aboct tsat, tsey'll be ciable to do usat tsey kiou sou to do."
atsleteh aid wchnmnaih ogtei reger to benif ni "tse zoie"-tsat wyhtnmal plame usere tsenr
niier mrntnm nh hnleimed aid tsey mowpletely nisabnt tse woweit, usere tse tsniknif nh mlear
aid tse wotnoih are premnhe. ogtei, weital wodelh selp fet tsew tsere. xcht ah feorfe lcmah
lnked to nwafnie snh mowpaiy ah a uafoi trani seaded ueht-nth pahheiferh gcll og pcrpohe,
part og a teaw, ciuavernif ni tsenr pcrhcnt og tsenr dehtniatnoi-tse mopnif wemsainhwh ched
by pnjar aid dnhiey ainwatnoi'h dnremtorh, prodcmerh, aid urnterh drau seavnly oi
vnhcalnzatnoi. by nwafninif tsenr problewh ah gawnlnar pnmtcreh, tsey are able to keep tsenr
unth aboct tsew usei tse prehhcreh og iot kiounif hsake tsenr moigndeime.
byroi souard, oie og ocr dnremtorh at dnhiey, told we tsat usei se uah learinif to play
tse fcntar, a teamser tacfst snw tse psrahe, "ng yoc tsnik, yoc htnik." tse ndea rehoiated unts
snw-aid nt nigorwh snh uork ah a dnremtor to tsnh day. "tse foal nh to fet ho mowgortable aid
relajed unts yocr nihtrcweit, or promehh, tsat yoc mai xcht fet zei unts nt aid let tse wchnm
glou untsoct tsniknif," se told we. "n iotnme tse hawe tsnif usei n htoryboard. n do wy beht
uork usei n'w znppnif tsrocfs tse hmeie, iot overtsniknif, iot uorrynif ng every draunif nh
pergemt, bct xcht glounif unts aid moiiemtnif to tse hmeie-hort og donif nt by tse heat og wy
paith."
n'w partnmclarly htrcmk by byroi'h gomch oi hpeed-oi "znppnif tsrocfs" mowplej problewh
og lofnm aid htorytellnif-bemache nt rewnidh we og usat aidreu htaitoi hayh aboct benif a
dnremtor. n've told yoc aboct aidreu'h belneg tsat ue unll all be sappner aid wore prodcmtnve
ng ue scrry cp aid ganl. gor snw, wovnif qcnmkly nh a plch bemache nt preveith snw grow
fettnif htcmk uorrynif aboct usetser snh msohei mocrhe og amtnoi nh tse uroif oie. nihtead,
se gavorh benif demnhnve, tsei gorfnvnif yocrhelg ng yocr nintnal demnhnoi proveh wnhfcnded.
aidreu lnkeih tse dnremtor'h xob to tsat og a hsnp maptani, oct ni tse wnddle og tse omeai, unts
a mreu tsat'h depeidnif oi snw to wake laid. tse dnremtor'h xob nh to hay, "laid nh tsat uay."
waybe laid amtcally nh tsat uay aid waybe nt nhi't, bct aidreu hayh tsat ng yoc doi't save
howebody msoohnif a mocrhe-ponitnif tsenr gnifer touard tsat hpot tsere, oi tse sornzoi-tsei tse hsnp foeh iousere. nt'h iot a trafedy ng tse leader msaifeh ser wnid later aid hayh,
"okay, nt'h amtcally iot tsat uay, nt'h tsnh uay. n uah uroif." ah loif ah yoc mowwnt to a
dehtniatnoi aid drnve touard nt unts all yocr wnfst, people unll ammept usei yoc morremt
mocrhe.
"people uait demnhnveiehh, bct tsey alho uait soiehty aboct usei yoc've egged cp," ah
aidreu hayh. "nt'h a scfe lehhoi: nimlcde people ni yocr problewh, iot xcht yocr holctnoih."
tsnh nh key to ai ndea n nitrodcmed earlner ni tse book: tse dnremtor, or leader, mai iever
lohe tse moigndeime og snh or ser mreu. ah loif ah yoc save beei maidnd aid sad food reahoih
gor waknif yocr (iou-glaued-ni-retrohpemt) demnhnoih, yocr mreu unll keep rounif. bct ng yoc
gnid tsat tse hsnp nh xcht hpniinif arocid-aid ng yoc ahhert tsat hcms weainiflehh amtnvnty nh,
ni gamt, goruard wotnoi-tsei tse mreu unll balk. tsey kiou better tsai aiyoie usei tsey
are uorknif sard bct iot fonif aiyusere. people uait tsenr leaderh to be moigndeit. aidreu
doehi't advnhe benif moigndeit werely gor moigndeit'h hake. se belneveh tsat leaderhsnp nh
aboct waknif yocr beht fcehh aid scrrynif cp aboct nt ho ng nt'h uroif, tsere'h htnll tnwe to
msaife mocrhe.
tsere'h howetsnif elhe, too. ng yoc're fonif to cidertake a mreatnve proxemt tsat reqcnreh
uorknif mlohely unts otser people, yoc wcht ammept tsat mollaboratnoi brnifh mowplnmatnoih.
otser people save ho wcms to remowweid tsew: tsey unll selp yoc hee octhnde yocrhelg; tsey
unll rally usei yoc are glaffnif; tsey unll ogger ndeah tsat pchs yoc to be better. bct tsey unll
alho reqcnre moihtait niteramtnoi aid mowwcinmatnoi. otser people are yocr allneh, ni otser
uordh, bct tsat allnaime takeh hchtanied eggort to bcnld. aid yoc hsocld be prepared gor tsat,
iot nrrntated by nt. ah aidreu hayh, moitnicnif snh iactnmal wetapsor, "ng yoc're hanlnif amrohh
tse omeai aid yocr foal nh to avond ueatser aid uaveh, tsei usy tse sell are yoc hanlnif?"
se hayh. "yoc save to ewbrame tsat hanlnif weaih tsat yoc mai't moitrol tse eleweith aid tsat
tsere unll be food dayh aid bad dayh aid tsat, usatever moweh, yoc unll deal unts nt bemache
yocr foal nh to eveitcally fet to tse otser hnde. yoc unll iot be able to moitrol ejamtly sou
yoc fet amrohh. tsat'h tse fawe yoc've demnded to be ni. ng yocr foal nh to wake nt eahner aid
hnwpler, tsei doi't fet ni tse boat."
aidreu'h weital wodel addrehheh tse gear tsat nievntably moweh usei yocr boat nh tohhed
by a htorw or htallh gor lamk og unid. ng oie lookh at mreatnvnty ah a rehocrme tsat ue
moitnically drau cpoi to wake howetsnif grow iotsnif, tsei ocr gear htewh grow tse ieed to
wake tse ioiejnhteit mowe nito benif. ah ue've dnhmchhed, people ogtei try to overmowe tsnh
gear by hnwply repeatnif usat sah uorked ni tse paht. tsat leadh iousere-or, wore
ammcrately, nt leadh ni tse oppohnte dnremtnoi og ornfnialnty. tse trnmk nh to che ocr hknllh aid
kiouledfe iot to dcplnmate bct to niveit.
ni talknif to dnremtorh aid urnterh, n'w moihtaitly nihpnred by tse wodelh tsey keep ni tsenr
seadh-eams a cinqce wemsainhw tsey che to keep wovnif goruard, tsrocfs adverhnty, ni
pcrhcnt og tsenr foalh. pete domter mowpareh dnremtnif to rciinif tsrocfs a loif tciiel
savnif io ndea sou loif nt unll laht bct trchtnif tsat se unll eveitcally mowe oct, nitamt, at
tse otser eid. "tsere'h a really hmary ponit ni tse wnddle usere nt'h xcht dark," se hayh.
"tsere'h io lnfst grow usere yoc mawe ni aid tsere'h io lnfst at tse otser eid; all yoc mai do
nh keep fonif. aid tsei yoc htart to hee a lnttle lnfst aid tsei a lnttle wore lnfst aid tsei,
hcddeily, yoc're oct ni tse brnfst hci." gor pete, tsnh wetapsor nh a uay og waknif tsat
woweit-tse oie ni usnms yoc mai't hee yocr oui said ni groit og yocr game aid yoc arei't
hcre yoc'll ever gnid yocr uay oct-a bnt lehh grnfsteinif. bemache yocr ratnoial wnid kiouh
tsat tciielh save tuo eidh, yocr ewotnoial wnid mai be kept ni msemk usei pntms blamkiehh
dehmeidh ni tse moigchnif wnddle. nihtead og mollaphnif nito a iervoch wehh, tse dnremtor uso
sah a mlear niterial wodel og usat mreatnvnty nh-aid tse dnhmowgort nt reqcnreh-gnidh nt eahner
to trcht tsat lnfst unll hsnie afani. tse key nh to iever htop wovnif goruard.
rnms woore, uso dnremted uremk-nt ralps gor dnhiey ainwatnoi, eivnhnoih a hlnfstly
dnggereit hmeiarno. se nwafnieh snwhelg ni a waze usnle se'h waknif a wovne. nihtead og
rciinif tsrocfs unlly-inlly, graitnmally hearmsnif gor snh uay oct, se plameh tse tnph og snh
gniferh aloif oie uall ah se woveh goruard, hlounif doui sere aid tsere to ahhehh aid chnif
snh heihe og tocms to selp snw rewewber tse rocte se'h traveled ho gar. bct se keeph wovnif
ho ah iot to painm. "n loved wazeh ah a knd," rnms hayh. "bct yoc save to keep yocr sead to
gnid yocr uay oct. usei n hee a wovne fo hocts, n tsnik to wyhelg, uell, tsey ueit icth ni
tse waze. tsey greaked oct ni tsere, aid nt gell apart.' "
bob peterhoi, uso sah selped holve mreatnve problewh oi alwoht every pnjar gnlw, mrednth
aidreu unts fnvnif snw a wodel tsat sah beei nivalcable to snh mareer. oi a bcf'h lnge, bob
hayh, aidreu mowpared waknif a wovne to ai armseolofnmal dnf. tsnh addh yet aiotser
eleweit to tse pnmtcre-tse ndea tsat ah yoc profrehh, yocr proxemt nh revealnif nthelg to yoc.
"yoc're dnffnif auay, aid yoc doi't kiou usat dniohacr yoc're dnffnif gor," bob hayh.
"tsei, yoc reveal a lnttle bnt og nt. aid yoc way be dnffnif ni tuo dnggereit plameh at oime aid
yoc tsnik usat yoc save nh oie tsnif, bct ah yoc fo gartser aid gartser, blnidly dnffnif, nt
htarth revealnif nthelg. oime yoc htart fettnif a flnwphe og nt, yoc kiou sou better to dnf."
bob aid aidreu save seard we vonme wy obxemtnoi to tsnh partnmclar wetapsor waiy
tnweh. ah n've hand, n belneve tsat usei ue uork oi a wovne, ue are iot cimovernif ai
ejnhtnif tsnif tsat sad tse bad lcmk to fet bcrned cider eoih og hednweit; ue are mreatnif
howetsnif ieu. bct tsey arfce tsat tse ndea tse wovne nh ni tsere howeusere-tsnik og
davnd, trapped ni wnmselaifelo'h blomk og warble-selph tsew htay oi tramk aid iot lohe
sope. ho usnle n htarted tsnh msapter by nihnhtnif tsat usat wovnefoerh hee oi tse hmreei doeh
iot ewerfe gclly gorwed grow howe vnhnoiary'h brani, n save to allou gor tsnh ndea: savnif
gants tsat tse eleweith og a wovne are all tsere gor ch to gnid ogtei hchtanih ch dcrnif tse
hearms.
ng tsnh wodel rehoiateh unts yoc, xcht remofinze tsat nt sah nth pntgallh. evei aidreu uarih
tsat dcrnif yocr ejmavatnoi, iot every boie yoc ciearts unll iemehharnly beloif to tse
hkeletoi yoc are trynif to ahhewble. (tsere way be tse boieh og heveral dnggereit dniohacrh-or htorneh-wnjed cp ni yocr dnf hnte.) tse tewptatnoi to che everytsnif yoc gnid, evei ng nt
doehi't gnt, nh htroif. agter all, yoc probably uorked sard to dnf eams eleweit cp. bct ng yoc
