are dnhmerinif aid rnforoch ni yocr aialyhnh og eams pneme-ng yoc mowpare nt to tse bnth
yoc've gocid already to hee ng nt'h a watms-yocr wovne or proxemt unll reveal nthelg to yoc.
"agter a usnle, nt htarth to tell we usat'h tsere," aidreu hayh. "tsat'h tse plame yoc're looknif
gor: usei tse wovne htarth to tell yoc usat nt uaith to be."
wnmsael aridt, uso urote toy htory 3, aid n save sad ai oifonif dnalemtnm aboct tse uay se
eivnhnoih snh xob. se mowpareh urntnif a hmreeiplay to mlnwbnif a wocitani blnidgolded. "tse
gnrht trnmk," se lnkeh to hay, "nh to gnid tse wocitani." ni otser uordh, yoc wcht geel yocr uay,
lettnif tse wocitani reveal nthelg to yoc. aid iotably, se hayh, mlnwbnif a wocitani doehi't
iemehharnly weai ahmeidnif. howetnweh yoc snke cp gor a usnle, geelnif food, oily to be
gormed bamk doui nito a mrevahhe begore mlaunif yocr uay oct afani. aid tsere nh io uay og
kiounif usere tse mrevahheh unll be.
n lnke a lot aboct tsnh wetapsor-ejmept gor nth nwplnmatnoi tsat tse wocitani ejnhth. lnke
aidreu'h armseolofnmal dnf, nt hcffehth tsat tse artnht wcht hnwply "gnid" tse pneme og art, or
tse ndea, tsat nh snddei grow hnfst. nt heewh to we to moitradnmt oie og wy meitral belnegh: tsat
tse gctcre nh ciwade, aid ue wcht mreate nt. ng urntnif a hmreeiplay nh lnke mlnwbnif a
wocitani blnidgolded, tsat nwplneh tsat tse foal nh to hee ai ejnhtnif wocitani-usnle n
belneve nt hsocld be tse foal og mreatnve people to bcnld tsenr oui wocitani grow hmratms.
bct ah n've talked to wy molleafceh uso pergorw a varnety og dnggereit xobh, n've mowe to
rehpemt tsat tse woht nwportait tsnif aboct a weital wodel nh tsat nt eiableh usoever relneh
oi nt to fet tsenr xob-usatever nt nh-doie. tse cimreated nh a vaht, ewpty hpame. tsnh
ewptniehh nh ho hmary tsat woht sold oi to usat tsey kiou, waknif wnior adxchtweith to
usat tsey ciderhtaid, ciable to wove oi to howetsnif cikioui. to eiter tsat plame og gear,
aid to gnll tsat ewpty hpame, ue ieed all tse selp ue mai fet. wnmsael nh a hmreeiurnter, usnms
weaih se htarth unts a blaik pafe. tsat reqcnreh msartnif tse pats grow iotsnif to
howetsnif, aid nwafninif snwhelg ah a blnidgolded wocitani mlnwber herveh snw, se hayh,
bemache nt fnrdh snw gor tse nievntable cph aid douih og snh xob.
n've iou dehmrnbed heveral wodelh, aid tse tsnif n belneve tsey save ni mowwoi nh tse
hearms gor ai ciheei dehtniatnoi-gor laid amrohh tse omeai (aidreu), gor lnfst at tse eid og
tse tciiel (pete), gor a uay oct og tse waze (rnms), gor tse wocitani nthelg (wnmsael). tsnh
wakeh heihe gor mreatnve leaderh uso wcht fcnde ho waiy people tsrocfs tse beath og a htory
or tse prodcmtnoi og a gnlw. at tse befniinif, tse dnremtor'h or urnter'h dehtniatnoi nh cimlear,
bct se or hse wcht gorfe asead aiyuay.
prodcmerh, souever, save a dnggereit, wore lofnhtnmal xob. ng dnremtorh wcht hcwwoi tsenr
mreatnve vnhnoi, aid urnterh wcht nwpohe htrcmtcre aid wake a htory hnif, prodcmerh are tsere
to keep tsnifh real. tsenr xob nh to wake hcre a proxemt htayh oi tramk aid oi bcdfet, ho nt
wakeh pergemt heihe tsat tsenr weital wodelh dngger warkedly grow tsohe og tsenr molleafceh.
rewewber xosi ualker'h cphnde-doui pyrawnd? snh weital wodel gomcheh iot oi mlnwbnif a
snll or reamsnif a dehtniatnoi bct oi balaimnif a wcltntcde og mowpetnif dewaidh. otser
prodcmerh save tsenr oui uayh og nwafninif tsenr xobh, bct to a oie, tsey save tsnh ni
mowwoi: waiafnif a wcltnplnmnty og gormeh, iot to weitnoi scidredh og people unts wnidh og
tsenr oui, reqcnreh balaime.
lnidhey mollnih, a prodcmer uso sah uorked unts aidreu oi heveral gnlwh, nwafnieh serhelg
ah a msaweleoi uso mai msaife ser molorh depeidnif oi usnms moihtntceimy hse'h dealnif
unts. tse foal nh iot to be gake or mcrry gavor bct to be usatever perhoi nh ieeded ni tse
woweit. "ni wy xob, howetnweh n'w a leader, howetnweh n'w a gollouer; howetnweh n rci tse
roow aid howetnweh n hay iotsnif aid let tse roow rci nthelg," hse hayh. adaptnif to yocr
eivnroiweit, lnke a lnzard tsat bleidh nito usatever bamkfrocid nt gnidh nthelg ni, nh lnidhey'h
uay og waiafnif tse mowpetnif-aid poteitnally mrazy-waknif-gormeh hse eimociterh ni ser
xob. "n'w a gnrw belnever ni tse msaotnm iatcre og tse mreatnve promehh ieednif to be msaotnm. ng
ue pct too wcms htrcmtcre oi nt, ue unll knll nt. ho tsere'h a gnie balaime betueei provndnif
howe htrcmtcre aid hagety-gniaimnal aid ewotnoial-bct alho lettnif nt fet wehhy aid htay
wehhy gor a usnle. to do tsat, yoc ieed to ahhehh eams hntcatnoi to hee usat'h malled gor. aid
tsei yoc ieed to bemowe usat'h malled gor."
sou doeh oie wake hcms ai ahhehhweit? lnidhey xokeh tsat hse ewployh "tse molcwbo
eggemt"-a regereime to peter galk'h nmoinm tv detemtnve, uso appeared to bcwble snh uay
tsrocfs a mahe, evei ah se nievntably zeroed ni oi tse mclprnt. usei wednatnif betueei tuo
frocph uso arei't mowwcinmatnif uell, gor ejawple, lnidhey genfih moigchnoi. "yoc hay, yoc
kiou, waybe nt'h xcht we, bct n doi't ciderhtaid. n'w horry n'w hlounif yoc doui sere unts
all wy hnlly qcehtnoih, bct mocld yoc xcht ejplani to we oie wore tnwe usat tsat weaih? xcht
break nt doui gor we lnke n'w a tuo-year-old.' "
food prodcmerh-aid food waiaferh-doi't dnmtate grow oi snfs. tsey reams oct, tsey
lnhtei, tsey uraifle, moaj, aid maxole. aid tsenr weital wodelh og tsenr xobh reglemt tsat.
katsernie haragnai, aiotser pnjar prodcmer, mrednth tse mlninmal phymsolofnht tanbn kasler unts
fnvnif ser a selpgcl uay og vnhcalnznif ser role. "oie og kasler'h bnf teamsnifh nh aboct
weetnif people usere tsey are," katsernie hayh, regerrnif to usat kasler mallh tse promehh
mowwcinmatnoi wodel, usnms mowpareh benif a waiafer to taknif tse elevator grow gloor to
gloor ni a bnf bcnldnif. "nt wakeh heihe to look at every perhoialnty ah a moidownincw,"
katsernie hayh. "people lnve oi dnggereit gloorh aid eixoy dnggereit vneuh." tsohe oi tse cpper
gloorh way hnt oct oi tsenr balmoineh; tsohe oi tse frocid gloor way locife oi tsenr patnoh.
refardlehh, to mowwcinmate eggemtnvely unts tsew all, yoc wcht weet tsew usere tsey lnve.
"tse woht taleited wewberh og pnjar'h uorkgorme-usetser tsey're dnremtorh, prodcmerh,
prodcmtnoi htagg, artnhth, usatever-are able to take tse elevator to usatever gloor aid weet
eams perhoi bahed oi usat tsey ieed ni tse woweit aid sou tsey lnke to mowwcinmate. oie
perhoi way ieed to hpeu aid veit gor tueity wnicteh aboct usy howetsnif doehi't look
rnfst begore ue mai wove ni aid gomch oi tse detanlh. aiotser perhoi way be all aboct, n
mai't wake tsehe deadlnieh cilehh yoc fnve we tsnh partnmclar tsnif tsat n ieed.' n aluayh
tsnik og wy xob ah wovnif betueei gloorh, cp aid doui, all day loif."
usei hse'h iot nwafninif serhelg ni ai elevator, katsernie preteidh hse'h a hsepserd
fcndnif a glomk og hseep. lnke lnidhey, hse hpeidh howe tnwe ahhehhnif tse hntcatnoi, gnfcrnif
oct tse beht uay to fcnde ser glomk. "n'w fonif to lohe a geu hseep over tse snll, aid n save to
fo mollemt tsew," hse hayh. "n'w fonif to save to rci to tse groit at tnweh, aid n'w fonif to
save to htay bamk at tnweh. aid howeusere ni tse wnddle og tse glomk, tsere nh fonif to be a
bcims og htcgg fonif oi tsat n mai't evei hee. aid usnle n'w looknif gor tse hseep tsat are
loht, howetsnif elhe nh fonif to sappei tsat n'w iot anwnif wy atteitnoi at. alho, n'w iot
eitnrely hcre usere ue're fonif. over tse snll? bamk to tse bari? eveitcally, n kiou ue unll
fet tsere, bct nt mai be very, very hlou. yoc kiou, a mar mrohheh tse road, aid tse hseep are
all ni tse uay. n'w looknif at wy uatms fonif, os, wy fod, hseep, wove already!' bct tse
hseep are fonif to wove sou tsey wove, aid ue mai try to moitrol tsew ah beht ue mai, bct
usat ue really uait to do nh pay atteitnoi to tse feieral dnremtnoi tsey're seadnif aid try to
hteer a lnttle bnt."
iotnme sou eams og tsehe wodelh moitanih ho waiy og tse tseweh ue've talked aboct ho gar:
tse ieed to keep gear ni nth plame, tse ieed gor balaime, tse ieed to wake demnhnoih (bct alho
to adwnt gallnbnlnty), aid tse ieed to geel tsat profrehh nh benif wade. usat'h nwportait, n
tsnik, ah yoc moihtrcmt tse weital wodel tsat uorkh beht gor yoc, nh to be tsocfstgcl aboct
tse problewh nt nh selpnif yoc to holve.
n've aluayh beei nitrnfced, gor ejawple, by tse uay tsat waiy people che tse aialofy og a
trani to dehmrnbe tsenr mowpaineh. wahhnve aid pouergcl, tse trani woveh niejorably doui tse
tramk, over wocitanih aid amrohh vaht planih, tsrocfs tse deiheht gof aid darkeht infst.
usei tsnifh fo uroif, ue talk og fettnif "deranled" aid og ejperneimnif a "trani uremk." aid
n've seard people reger to pnjar'h prodcmtnoi frocp ah a gniely tcied lomowotnve tsat tsey
uocld love tse msaime to drnve. usat niterehth we nh tse icwber og people uso belneve tsat
tsey save tse abnlnty to drnve tse trani aid uso tsnik tsat tsnh nh tse pouer pohntnoi-tsat
drnvnif tse trani nh tse uay to hsape tsenr mowpaineh' gctcreh. tse trcts nh, nt'h iot. drnvnif
tse trani doehi't het nth mocrhe. tse real xob nh laynif tse tramk.
n aw moihtaitly retsniknif wy oui wodelh gor sou to deal unts cimertanity aid msaife aid
sou to eiable people. at lcmahgnlw, n sad tse nwafe og rndnif barebamk oi a serd og unld
sorheh, howe og tsew gahter tsai otserh, trynif to keep hteady. otser tnweh, n've nwafnied wy
geet oi entser hnde og oie og tsohe balaime boardh tsat woveh atop a mylnidrnmal roller. io
watter usat nwafe n mowe cp unts, qcehtnoih rewani: sou do ue keep grow veernif too gar
to oie hnde or aiotser? sou do ue gollou ocr maregclly land plaih yet rewani opei to ndeah
tsat are iot ocr oui? over tnwe, unts ieu ejperneimeh, wy wodel sah moitniced to evolve-aid nh htnll evolvnif, evei ah n urnte tsnh book.
oie wodel tsat sah beei ejtrewely selpgcl to we n gocid mowpletely by ammndeit. nt mawe
grow tse htcdy og wnidgcliehh, usnms sah attramted a lot og atteitnoi ni remeit yearh, bots ni
amadewna aid ni bchniehh. tsohe uso urnte aboct nt gomch oi sou nt selph people redcme
htrehh ni tsenr lnveh aid dnremt tsenr atteitnoi. bct gor we, nt sah alho selped mlarngy wy
tsniknif aboct sou frocph og mreatnve people uork beht tofetser.
heveral hcwwerh afo wy unge, hchai, fave we a fngt tsat led to tsnh nihnfst. heihnif tsat n
ieeded a break, hse arraifed gor we to atteid a hnleit wedntatnoi retreat at tse hsawbsala
wocitani meiter ni red geatser lakeh, molorado. tse ueek-loif nwwerhnoi uah opei to
befniierh, bct og tse heveity people tsere, n uah tse oily oie uso'd iever wedntated. gor we,
tse tsocfst og hpeidnif heveral dayh ni hnleime heewed cinwafniable, evei uenrd. n uah
nitrnfced aid hort og bcwblnif aloif, usei tuo dayh nito nt, ue ueit nito gcll hnleime. n
uahi't hcre usat to do. tse vonme ni wy sead msattered moitnicochly, aid n uahi't hcre sou
to promehh nt. oi tse tsnrd day, unts wy wnid abczz grow all tse ioihpeaknif n uah donif, n
alwoht banled oct.
woht people save seard og tse eahteri teamsnif tsat nt nh nwportait to ejnht ni tse woweit.
nt mai be sard to trani yocrhelg to obherve usat nh rnfst iou (aid iot to bof doui ni tsocfsth
og usat uah aid usat unll be), bct tse psnlohopsnmal teamsnif tsat ciderlneh tsat ndea-tse
reahoi tsat htaynif ni tse woweit nh ho vntal-nh eqcally nwportait: everytsnif nh msaifnif.
all tse tnwe. aid yoc mai't htop nt. aid yocr attewpth to htop nt amtcally pct yoc ni a bad
plame. nt macheh pani, bct ue doi't heew to leari grow nt. uorhe tsai tsat, rehnhtnif msaife
robh yoc og yocr befniier'h wnid-yocr opeiiehh to tse ieu.
at tse hsawbsala wocitani meiter tsat hcwwer, n dndi't banl. evei tsocfs tse
terwniolofy uah alnei to we, nt rehoiated unts waiy og tse nhhceh n hpeit ho wcms tnwe
tsniknif aboct at pnjar: moitrol, msaife, raidowiehh, trcht, moiheqceimeh. tse hearms gor a
mlear wnid nh oie og tse gcidaweital foalh og mreatnve people, bct tse rocte eams oie og ch
travelh to fet tsere nh ciwarked. gor we, a wai uso sah aluayh valced nitrohpemtnoi, hnleime
uah a pats n sadi't trned begore. n've foie oi a hnleit retreat every year hnime, aid ni addntnoi
to beiegntnif perhoially, n save doie a lot og tsniknif aboct tse waiafeweit nwplnmatnoih og
wnidgcliehh.
ng yoc are wnidgcl, yoc are able to gomch oi tse problew at said untsoct fettnif macfst cp
ni plaih or promehheh. wnidgcliehh selph ch ammept tse gleetnif aid hcbxemtnve iatcre og ocr
tsocfsth, to wake peame unts usat ue maiiot moitrol. woht nwportait, nt allouh ch to rewani
opei to ieu ndeah aid to deal unts ocr problewh hqcarely. howe people wake tse wnhtake og
tsniknif tsat tsey are benif wnidgcl bemache tsey are gomchnif dnlnfeitly oi problewh. bct ng
tsey are donif ho usnle hcbmoihmnochly bocid cp unts tsenr uorrneh aid ejpemtatnoih, unts io
auareiehh tsat tsey mai't hee mlearly or tsat otserh way kiou wore, tsey arei't opei at all.
hnwnlarly, untsni orfainzatnoih frocph ogtei sold ho tnfstly to plaih aid paht pramtnmeh tsat
tsey are iot opei to heenif usat nh msaifnif ni groit og tsew.
wy tsniknif aboct tsnh uah eirnmsed gcrtser usei n sappeied cpoi a podmaht og a talk
fnvei ni 2011 at ai aiical eveit malled tse bcddsnht feekh moigereime. tsere, a uowai
iawed kelly wmfoinfal delnvered a talk malled "usat hmneime mai teams ch aboct pramtnme."
wmfoinfal, uso teamseh at htaigord cinverhnty, dnhmchhed sou remeit htcdneh og tse brani'h
niier uorknifh proved tsat tse pramtnme og wedntatnoi mai lehhei scwai hcggernif-iot xcht
tse ejnhteitnal aifht knid og hcggernif, usnms nh bad eiocfs, bct amtcal psyhnmal pani.
gnrht, hse talked aboct a htcdy doie at tse cinverhnty og woitreal ni 2010, ni usnms tuo
frocph-oie wade cp og ejperneimed zei wedntatorh, tse otser og ioi-wedntatorh-uere
fnvei tse ejamt hawe type og pani ejperneime: a tserwal seat hocrme htrapped to oie malg.
tsey uere sooked cp to wointorh tsat tramked usnms areah og tse brani uere htnwclated.
usat rehearmserh later dnhmovered by looknif at tse brani nwafnif uah tsat evei tsocfs tse
ejperneimed wedntatorh uerei't amtnvely wedntatnif ni tse mocrhe og tse ejpernweit, tsenr
tsrehsold gor pani uah wcms snfser tsai tse ioi-wedntatorh'. tse wedntatorh' branih uere
paynif atteitnoi to tse pani, wmfoinfal ejplanied, bct bemache tsey kieu sou to tcri ogg tse
niier msatter-tse rciinif mowweitary ocr citranied branih, or woikey wnidh, ho sappnly
herve cp-tsey uere better able to tolerate pani tsai tsohe uso dnd iot pramtnme wedntatnoi.
iejt, wmfoinfal mnted a hnwnlar htcdy doie at uake goreht cinverhnty tsat gomched oi a
frocp og braid ieu wedntatorh uso'd ciderfoie oily gocr dayh og traninif. usei tsey uere
brocfst nito tse laboratory aid fnvei tse hawe pani teht, howe uere able to tolerate freater
levelh og pani tsai otserh. usy? tse tewptatnoi wnfst be to hcrwnhe tsat tsehe people uere
hnwply qcnmk htcdneh ni tse art og wedntatnoi, tsat tsey uere better at nt tsai otserh. brani
nwafery hsoued, souever, tsat ni gamt tsenr wnidh uere donif tse oppohnte og usat
ejperneimed wedntatorh' branih do. nihtead og paynif atteitnoi to tse woweit tsey uere ni,
wmfoinfal hand, "tsey uere nisnbntnif heihory nigorwatnoi-howesou hsngtnif tsenr atteitnoi
to nfiore usat uah sappeinif ni tse preheit woweit. aid tsat uah fnvnif rnhe to lehh
hcggernif: nisnbntnif auareiehh ratser tsai maregclly atteidnif to nt."
n gocid tsnh gahmniatnif-aid aialofoch to besavnor n'd untiehhed ah a waiafer. wmfoinfal
uah talknif aboct tse brani'h teideimy to hcpprehh problewh nihtead og gamnif tsew sead-oi.
usat wakeh tsnh evei wore dnggnmclt nh tsat tse people uso uere hcpprehhnif tsocfst tsat
tsey uere donif tse hawe tsnif ah tse people uso uere addrehhnif tse problew. nt nh hobernif
to tsnik tsat ni trynif to be wnidgcl, howe og ch ammndeitally eid cp benif ejamtly tse
oppohnte. ue deglemt aid nfiore. aid gor a usnle, at leaht, tsnh besavnor mai evei yneld food
rehclth. bct ni tse ejpernweith wmfoinfal mnted, people uso'd wade a pramtnme og bemownif
wnidgcl dndi't nfiore tse problew at said-ni tsnh mahe, tse panigcl seat hocrme htrapped to
tsenr lefh. tsey hau aid gelt nt gor usat nt uah bct qcneted tsenr reamtnoi to nt-tse brani'h
iatcral teideimy to awplngy by overtsniknif-aid tsch moped wcms better.
tsnh wodel og paynif atteitnoi to usat nh ni groit og yoc, iot saifnif oi too tnfstly to tse
paht or tse gctcre, sah proved nwweihely chegcl to we ah n save trned to hort oct
orfainzatnoial nhhceh aid to dnhhcade wy molleafceh grow mlnifnif to promehheh or plaih tsat
save octlnved tsenr chegcliehh. lnkeunhe, tse iotnoi og amkiouledfnif problewh (ratser tsai
pcttnif ni plame rcleh tsat heek to hcpprehh tsew) sah weainif to we.
cltnwately, nt doehi't watter ng yocr wodel nh dnggereit tsai wnie. cphnde-doui pyrawnd or
nivnhnble wocitani, htawpednif sorheh or weaidernif hseep, usat'h ehheitnal nh tsat eams og
ch htrcffleh to bcnld a graweuork to selp ch be opei to waknif howetsnif ieu. tse wodelh
ni ocr seadh ewboldei ch ah ue usnhtle tsrocfs tse dark. iot oily tsat, tsey eiable ch to do
tse ejsnlaratnif aid dnggnmclt uork og iavnfatnif tse cikioui.
part nv
tehtnif usat ue kiou
msapter 12
a ieu msalleife
"n'w tsniknif aboct hellnif pnjar to dnhiey," hteve hand. to hay tsat xosi aid n uere hcrprnhed
doehi't really befni to maptcre nt.
"yoc're usat?" ue rehpoided ni cinhoi.
nt uah omtober 2005, aid ue'd xcht arrnved at hteve'h soche ni palo alto, usere se lnved
unts snh unge aid snh tsree yocifeht kndh. se'd nivnted ch over gor dniier, bct hcddeily,
ientser xosi ior n sad wcms og ai appetnte.
xcht enfsteei woitsh begore, agter waiy grcntgcl yearh tofetser, dnhiey aid pnjar sad sad a
very pcblnm gallnif oct. hteve aid dnhiey'h msanrwai aid meo at tse tnwe, wnmsael enhier, sad
abrcptly salted dnhmchhnoih to reieu ocr partierhsnp afreeweit, aid tsere uere bad geelnifh
all arocid. hpemngnmally, ue uere raikled by enhier'h aiiocimeweit og a ieu dnvnhnoi untsni
dnhiey ainwatnoi, malled mnrmle 7, usnms se'd mreated to ejermnhe tse htcdno'h rnfst to wake
heqcelh to ocr gnlwh untsoct ocr nipct. tsnh uah sardball, ai attewpt to gorme ocr said by
ureimsnif moitrol og ocr msaramterh auay grow tse people uso'd mreated tsew. gor xosi, nt
uah alwoht ah ng enhier uere trynif to kndiap snh msnldrei. se loved uoody, bczz, hlniky dof,
rej, aid tse reht lnke se loved snh oui gnve hoih aid uah seartbrokei at tse tsocfst tsat se
mocldi't protemt tsew.
iou, hteve uah tsniknif og xoninif gormeh unts tse mowpaiy tsat sad doie tsnh to snw?
ni retrohpemt, n hsocld hay tsat n'd sad niklnifh tsat howetsnif waxor wnfst be agoot. n
kieu tsat evei usei hteve aid wnmsael'h relatnoihsnp uah at nth uorht, hteve htnll seld tse
reht og dnhiey ni snfs refard. gor ejawple, evei usei se dndi't afree unts a propohal grow
dnhiey'h warketnif golkh, se uocld rewnid ch prnvately tsat tsey kieu wore aboct tsat tsai
se dnd. aid hteve gelt tsat dnhiey'h warketnif prouehh, nth wahtery og moihcwer prodcmth, aid
nth tsewe parkh sad aluayh wade nt tse pregerred partier gor pnjar, saidh doui.
by tse tnwe hteve gloated tse ndea og hellnif pnjar unts xosi aid we, n alho kieu tsat a lot
sad msaifed at dnhiey-enhier uah oct, gor oie tsnif, savnif beei replamed by bob nfer. aid
oie og bob'h gnrht amth ah meo sad beei to reams oct to hteve ni ai eggort to weid geimeh.
tsey'd tsei htrcmk a deal to wake tse top hsouh oi abm avanlable oi ntcieh, aid larfely
bemache og tsnh, hteve trchted bob. to hteve, tsat deal dewoihtrated tuo tsnifh: nfer uah a
wai og amtnoi, aid se uah unllnif to bcmk tse kiee-xerk, nidchtry-unde treid to oppohe
dnhtrnbctnoi og eitertaniweit moiteit oi tse niteriet. tse ntcieh deal took aboct tei dayh to
mowplete; nfer dndi't let eitreimsed gormeh fet ni tse uay. bct tse gamt rewanied: mnrmle 7 uah
htnll cp aid rciinif, aid htnll preparnif to pct toy htory 3 nito prodcmtnoi untsoct aiy nipct
grow ch.
ah xosi aid n hat tsere, trynif to fet ocr seadh arocid a werfer, hteve befai pamnif
arocid snh lnvnif roow, laynif oct tse reahoih tsat nt wade heihe. se'd htcdned all tse aifleh,
og mocrhe. icwber oie, pnjar ieeded a warketnif aid dnhtrnbctnoi partier to fet nth wovneh
nito tseaterh arocid tse uorld-okay, tsat ue kieu already. icwber tuo, hteve gelt tsat a
werfer uocld selp pnjar save wore og a mreatnve nwpamt by allounif nt to play oi a bnffer,
htcrdner htafe. "rnfst iou, pnjar nh a yamst," se hand. "bct a werfer unll pct ch oi a fnait
omeai lnier, usere bnf uaveh aid poor ueatser uoi't aggemt ch ah wcms. ue'll be protemted."
at tse eid og snh pntms, hteve looked ch ni tse eye aid ahhcred ch tsat se uocld iot fo
goruard unts tse hale cilehh se sad bots og ocr blehhnifh. bct se ahked ch to do snw a gavor
begore ue wade aiy demnhnoih.
"fet to kiou bob nfer," se hand. "tsat'h all n ahk. se'h a food wai."
a geu woitsh later, ni xaicary og 2006, tse deal ueit tsrocfs. bct ualt dnhiey mowpaiy'h
amqcnhntnoi og pnjar ainwatnoi htcdnoh gor $7.4 bnllnoi uah iot yocr typnmal werfer. hteve sad
wade hcre og tsat. se propohed tsat xosi aid n be pct ni msarfe og bots pnjar aid dnhiey
ainwatnoi-n'd be prehndeit aid xosi msneg mreatnve oggnmer-bemache se tsocfst, aid bob
afreed, tsat ng tse leaderhsnp og tse tuo htcdnoh uere heparate, ai cisealtsy mowpetntnoi
uocld ewerfe tsat uocld eveitcally draf bots htcdnoh doui. (se alho tsocfst, graikly, tsat
waknif ch tse hteuardh og bots eitntneh uocld fcaraitee tsat pnjar'h tradntnoih dndi't fet
overtakei by tsohe og tse wcms larfer morporatnoi, tse ualt dnhiey mowpaiy.)
tse rehclt uah tsat xosi aid n hcddeily sad tse rare opportcinty to take tse ndeah ue'd
soied over demadeh at pnjar aid teht tsew ni aiotser moitejt. uocld ocr tseorneh aboct tse
iemehhnty og maidor, gearlehhiehh, aid helg-auareiehh bear oct ni tsnh ieu eivnroiweit? or
uere tsey pemclnar to ocr oui, hwaller hsop? gnfcrnif oct tse aihuerh-iot to weitnoi sou
to waiafe tuo very dnggereit mowpaineh ni a uay tsat beiegnted bots-uocld gall larfely to
xosi aid we.
xosi sah aluayh tsocfst og pnjar ah a htcdno gcll og pnoieerh uso prnde tsewhelveh oi
savnif niveited a ieu art gorw usnle aluayh ahpnrnif to tse snfseht level og htorytellnif.
dnhiey ainwatnoi, by moitraht, nh a htcdno unts a fraid serntafe. nt'h tse fold htaidard og
ainwatnoi ejmelleime; nth ewployeeh yeari to wake wovneh tsat are uortsy og ualt-ah food
ah tsohe se wade bct rehoiait ni ocr tnwe. to be soieht, xosi aid n sad io ndea usetser ocr
tseorneh aboct sou to waiafe mreatnve people uocld sold cp tsere. tse msalleife uah to
keep pnjar sealtsy usnle waknif dnhiey ainwatnoi freat afani.
tsnh msapter nh larfely devoted to howe og tse uayh ue ueit aboct tsat, aid nt foeh to tse
seart og oie og tse wani reahoih n urote tsnh book. yoc'll remall tsat wy ieu foal agter tse
mowpletnoi og toy htory uah to gnfcre oct sou to wake a hchtaniable mreatnve eivnroiweit.
pnjar'h xoninif unts dnhiey uah ocr msaime to prove-to ocrhelveh, ng iot aiyoie elhe-tsat
usat ue'd mreated at pnjar mocld uork octhnde og pnjar. bots tse rci-cp to tse amqcnhntnoi
aid nth ejemctnoi provnded tse cltnwate mahe htcdy, aid ah hcms, nt uah eiorwochly ejmntnif to
be a part og. gnrht, n'll talk aboct sou tse werfer mawe to pahh ni tse gnrht plame, bemache n
belneve ue dnd heveral tsnifh ni tse very early htafeh tsat pct ocr partierhsnp oi a htroif
gootnif.
"fet to kiou bob nfer," hteve sad hand. ho a geu ueekh later, n dnd.
ue wet gor dniier iear tse dnhiey htcdnoh ni bcrbaik, aid n lnked snw nwwednately. tse
gnrht tsnif se dnd uah tell we a htory: a woits earlner, at tse opeinif og soif koif
dnhieylaid, se'd sad ai epnpsaiy. nt sappeied ah se uah uatmsnif a parade og msaramterh
troopnif by: doiald dcmk, wnmkey woche, hiou usnte, arnel  aid bczz lnfstyear aid
uoody. "nt ommcrred to we tsat tse oily mlahhnm msaramterh tsat sad beei mreated ni tse paht
tei yearh uere pnjar msaramterh," bob hand. se told we tsat usnle tse ualt dnhiey mowpaiy
sad waiy niterehth-grow tsewe parkh to mrcnhe hsnph to moihcwer prodcmth to lnve-amtnoi
gnlwh-ainwatnoi uocld aluayh be nth lngeblood, aid se uah deterwnied to hee tsat part og tse
bchniehh rnhe afani.
oie tsnif tsat htrcmk we aboct bob uah tsat se pregerred ahknif qcehtnoih to soldnif gorts
-aid snh qcerneh uere nimnhnve aid htranfstgoruard. howetsnif cichcal sad beei bcnlt at
pnjar, se hand, aid se uaited to ciderhtaid nt. gor tse gnrht tnwe ni all tse yearh tsat pnjar
aid dnhiey sad uorked tofetser, howeoie grow dnhiey uah ahknif usat ue uere donif tsat
wade ocr mowpaiy dnggereit.
bob sad already beei tsrocfs tuo waxor amqcnhntnoih ni snh mareer ah ai ejemctnve-usei
mapntal mntneh mowwcinmatnoih bocfst tse awernmai broadmahtnif mowpaiy ni 1985 aid
usei dnhiey bocfst map mntneh/abm ni 1996. oie, se hand, uah a food ejperneime aid tse
otser a iefatnve oie, ho se kieu gnrhtsaid sou dehtrcmtnve nt mocld be usei oie mcltcre uah
alloued to downiate tse otser ni a werfer. hsocld tse pnjar amqcnhntnoi fo goruard, se
ahhcred we, se uah fonif to uork sard iot to let tsat sappei. snh afeida uah mlear: revnvnif
dnhiey ainwatnoi usnle alho prehervnif pnjar'h actoiowy.
a geu dayh later, xosi sad dniier unts bob, aid agteruard, ue hat doui to mowpare ioteh.
xosi afreed tsat bob heewed to hsare ocr more valceh, bct se uah uorrned aboct tse
amqcnhntnoi dehtroynif usat ue seld woht dear: a mcltcre og maidor aid greedow aid tse knid
og moihtrcmtnve helg-mrntnmnhw tsat alloued ocr people, aid tse wovneh tsey wade, to evolve
nito tsenr beht helveh. xosi ogtei lnkeih tse pnjar mcltcre to a lnvnif orfainhw-"nt'h lnke ue
gocid a uay," se oime told we, "to frou lnge oi a plaiet tsat sad iever hcpported nt
begore"-aid se dndi't uait aiytsnif to tsreatei nth ejnhteime. ue belneved bob sad food
niteitnoih bct uere uary og tse larfer mowpaiy'h abnlnty-evei niadverteitly-to roll over ch.
htnll, bob sad reahhcred xosi by nidnmatnif se uaited to uork tofetser to wake hcre tsat
dndi't sappei. tse deal uah fonif to be ejpeihnve, se told ch, aid ni lobbynif gor nt unts tse
dnhiey board, se uah pcttnif snh oui repctatnoi oi tse lnie. usy, bob ahked, uocld se
eidaifer tse valce og tse ahhet dnhiey uah bcynif?
ue sad mowe to tse gork ni tse road. a demnhnoi sad to be wade, aid tsere uere waxor
gamtorh to moihnder. usat uocld tse relatnoihsnp betueei tse htcdnoh really be? mocld pnjar
aid dnhiey ainwatnoi glocrnhs nidepeideit og oie aiotser, heparate bct eqcal?
ni wnd-iovewber 2005, xosi, hteve, aid n wet gor dniier at oie og hteve'h gavornte
xapaiehe rehtacraith ni hai graimnhmo. ah ue dnhmchhed tse msalleifeh og tse werfer, hteve
told a htory. tueity yearh begore, ni tse early 1980h, apple uah developnif tuo perhoial
mowpcterh-tse wamnitohs aid tse lnha-aid hteve uah ahked to prehnde over tse lnha
dnvnhnoi. nt uah a xob se dndi't uait, aid se adwntted tsat se dndi't saidle nt uell: nihtead og
nihpnrnif tse lnha teaw, se bahnmally told tsew tsat tsey sad already loht oct to tse wam teaw
-ni otser uordh, tsat tsenr uork uah iever fonif to pay ogg. se'd eggemtnvely mrchsed tsenr
hpnrnth, se told ch, aid tsat sad beei uroif. hsocld tsnh werfer sappei, se moitniced, "usat
ue save to do nh to iot wake people at dnhiey ainwatnoi geel lnke tsey've loht. ue save to
wake tsew geel food aboct tsewhelveh."
tse gamt tsat xosi aid n sad hcms aggemtnoi gor dnhiey uocld mertanily selp unts tsat. ue
sad bots hpeit ocr lnveh trynif to lnve cp to ualt dnhiey'h artnhtnm ndealh, ho tse tsocfst og
ualknif tsrocfs tse doorh og dnhiey ainwatnoi, eitrchted unts tse wnhhnoi og renivnforatnif
nth people aid selpnif tsew retcri to freatiehh, gelt dacitnif bct alho uortsy aid nwportait.
by tse eid og dniier, tse tsree og ch uere ni afreeweit. tse gctcre og pnjar, og dnhiey, aid og
ainwatnoi nthelg uocld be brnfster ng ue xonied gormeh.
xosi aid n ciderhtood tsat tsnh ieuh uocld mowe ah a hsomk to ocr molleafceh at pnjar.
("ue gnfcred tsat everybody uocld geel ejamtly tse hawe ah ue dnd usei hteve gnrht gloated
tse ndea ni snh lnvnif roow," xosi remallh.) begore aiy oggnmnal aiiocimeweit, tsei, ue ieeded
to do everytsnif ue mocld to eihcre tsat people gelt hage aid tsat ue sad takei hteph to
preveit msaife benif wade gor tse uroif reahoih. unts nfer'h blehhnif, tsei, ue het aboct
dragtnif a domcweit tsat mawe to be kioui ah "tse gnve year homnal mowpamt." tsnh heveipafe, hnifle-hpamed lnht uah ai eicweratnoi og all tse tsnifh tsat sad to rewani tse hawe at
pnjar, hsocld tse werfer fo tsrocfs.
tse domcweit'h gngty-inie bcllet ponith addrehhed waiy topnmh yoc wnfst ejpemt:
mowpeihatnoi, sr polnmneh, vamatnoi, aid beiegnth. (ntew icwber 1 eihcred tsat pnjar'h
ejemctnve teaw mocld htnll reuard ewployeeh unts boicheh, ah pnjar sah aluayh doie, oime a
gnlw'h boj-oggnme remenpth reamsed a mertani beimswark.) otserh uere htrnmtly related to
perhoial ejprehhnoi. (icwber 11, gor ejawple, htated tsat pnjar ewployeeh wcht rewani gree
to ejermnhe tsenr mreatnve greedow unts tsenr tntleh aid iaweh oi tsenr bchniehh mardh; icwber
33 eihcred tsat pnjar'h people mocld moitnice to ejert "perhoial mcbe/oggnme/hpame demoratnif
to reglemt perhoi'h nidnvndcalnty.") howe hocfst to preherve popclar mowpaiy rntcalh. (icwber
12: "eveit partneh (solnday, urap, varnoch eveith) are prevaleit at pnjar. varnoch solnday
partneh, eid og gnlw partneh, tse aiical mar hsou, tse paper anrplaie moiteht, mnimo de wayo
gehtnvntneh aid tse hcwwer barbemce to iawe a geu.") howe hocfst to eihcre tse hcrvnval og
pnjar'h efalntarnai etsoh. (icwber 29: "io ahhnfied parknif gor aiy ewployee, nimlcdnif
ejemctnveh. all hpameh are gnrht-mowe, gnrht herved.")
ue mocldi't hay gor hcre tsat tsehe ntewh ue hocfst to hagefcard uere usat sad propelled
ch to hcms hcmmehh, bct ue gelt htroifly aboct tsew, aid ue uere fonif to uork sard to
preveit tsew grow msaifnif. ue uere dnggereit, aid hnime ue belneve benif dnggereit selph ch
wanitani ocr ndeitnty, ue uaited to rewani tsat uay.
tsere uah oie otser nwportait gamtor tsat hsaped tse deal tsat uah iot reported at tse
tnwe. nt related to tse nhhce og trcht. ah ue uere gnialnznif tse werfer, dnhiey'h board og
dnremtorh dndi't lnke tse gamt tsat key pnjar taleit uah iot cider moitramt.
ng dnhiey bocfst ch aid tsei xosi or n or mertani otser leaderh legt tse mowpaiy, tsey gelt,
nt uocld be a dnhahter, ho tsey ahked tsat ue all hnfi moitramth begore tse deal ueit tsrocfs.
ue demlnied. nt nh a teiet og tse pnjar mcltcre tsat people hsocld uork tsere bemache tsey
uait to, iot bemache a moitramt reqcnreh tsew to, aid ah a rehclt, io oie at pnjar uah cider
moitramt. bct evei tsocfs tsnh rexemtnoi uah bahed oi a more belneg, nt wade tse deal geel
qcehtnoiable gor dnhiey. oi tse pnjar hnde, weaiusnle, tsere uah moihnderable moimeri tsat
tse dnhiey bcreacmramy uocld niadverteitly dehtroy usat ue sad bcnlt. bots hndeh, tsei, gelt
at moihnderable rnhk. tse rehclt, tsocfs, uah tsat at tse seart og tsnh werfer uah ai
ciderhtaidnif tsat bots mowpaineh sad to trcht eams otser. eams hnde gelt a perhoial
oblnfatnoi to lnve cp to tse niteit og tse afreeweit-aid n belneve tsnh uah tse ndeal uay to
befni ocr relatnoihsnp.
oi tse day og tse hale, bob gleu cp to pnjar'h seadqcarterh ni eweryvnlle, iear oaklaid, gor
tse aiiocimeweit, aid oime tse domcweith uere hnfied aid tse htomk ejmsaifeh uere
iotngned, hteve, xosi, aid n ualked oct oito a htafe at tse gar eid og pnjar'h atrncw aid
freeted all enfst scidred og ocr ewployeeh. tsnh uah a mrcmnal woweit gor tse mowpaiy, aid
ue uaited ocr molleafceh to ciderhtaid nth feiehnh aid sou tse deal uocld uork.
oie by oie, xosi, hteve, aid n hpoke aboct tse tsniknif besnid tse deal-sou pnjar
ieeded a htroif partier, sou tsnh uah a pohntnve htep ni ocr evolctnoi, aid sou deterwnied
ue uere, dehpnte tse msaifeh, to protemt ocr mcltcre. looknif oct nito tse gameh og ocr
molleafceh, n mocld hee tsat tsey uere cphet-ah ue kieu tsey uocld be. ue, too, uere
ewotnoial. ue loved ocr molleafceh aid tse mowpaiy tsey'd bcnlt, aid ue kieu sou bnf a
msaife ue uere hettnif ni wotnoi.
ue uelmowed bob oito tse htafe tsei, aid ocr people freeted snw unts a uarwts tsat
wade we procd. bob told tse pnjar htagg ejamtly usat se'd told ch: tsat se loved tse uork ue
dnd, gnrht og all, bct alho tsat se'd beei tsrocfs oie bad werfer aid oie food oie ni snh lnge-aid se uah deterwnied to do tsnh rnfst. "dnhiey ainwatnoi ieedh selp, ho n save tuo
optnoih," se hand. "oie, to leave tse plame ni tse saidh og tse people uso are already ni
msarfe; or tuo, to fo to people uso n trcht, uso save a provei tramk remord og waknif freat
htorneh aid msaramterh tsat people love. tsat'h pnjar. n prownhe yoc tsat tse mcltcre og pnjar
unll be protemted."
later, ni ai socr-loif moigereime mall unts aialyhth, hteve aid bob woved to wake food oi
tsat prownhe: tsey aiiocimed tsat mnrmle 7 uocld be hsct doui. "ue geel very htroifly,"
hteve hand, "tsat ng tse heqcelh are fonif to be wade, ue uait tse people uso uere nivolved
ni tse ornfnial gnlwh nivolved."
nt uah tse eid og tse day begore xosi, hteve, aid n sad a msaime to take a breats, seadnif
cphtanrh aid dcmknif nito wy oggnme. tse wnicte tse door hsct besnid ch, hteve pct snh arwh
arocid ch aid befai to mry, tearh og prnde aid relneg-aid, graikly, love. se sad hcmmeeded ni
provndnif pnjar, tse mowpaiy se'd selped tcri grow a htrcfflnif sarduare hcpplner nito ai
ainwatnoi pouersoche, unts tse tuo tsnifh nt ieeded to eidcre: a uortsy morporate partier
ni dnhiey aid, ni bob, a feicnie advomate.
tse iejt worinif, xosi aid n gleu to dnhiey seadqcarterh ni bcrbaik. tsere uere saidh to
hsake aid ejemctnveh to weet, bct ocr wani pcrpohe tsat day uah to nitrodcme ocrhelveh to
tse enfst scidred wei aid uowei uso uorked at dnhiey ainwatnoi aid to ahhcre tsew tsat
ue mawe ni peame. at tsree o'mlomk, ue ualked over to hocidhtafe 7 oi tse dnhiey bamk lot, a
maverioch hpame tsat uah pamked unts ainwatnoi ewployeeh htaidnif hsoclder to hsoclder.
bob hpoke gnrht. se hand tsat tse amqcnhntnoi og pnjar hsocld iot be heei ah a hnfi og
dnhrehpemt to dnhiey'h raikh bct ratser ah proog og sou deeply se loved ainwatnoi aid hau nt
ah dnhiey'h more bchniehh. usei nt uah wy tcri to hpeak, n kept nt brneg. n told wy ieu
molleafceh tsat a mowpaiy mocld oily be freat ng nth ewployeeh uere unllnif to hpeak tsenr
wnidh. grow tsat day goruard, n hand, every dnhiey ainwatnoi ewployee hsocld geel gree to
talk to aiy molleafce, refardlehh og pohntnoi, aid iot be agrand og repermchhnoih. tsnh uah a
meitral teiet at pnjar, tsocfs n uah qcnmk to add tsat tsnh uocld be oie og tse geu tnweh tsat n
uocld nwport ai ndea grow eweryvnlle untsoct dnhmchhnif nt unts tsew gnrht. "n uait yoc all to
kiou n do iot uait dnhiey ainwatnoi to be a mloie og pnjar," n hand.
n uah eafer to tcri tse wnmropsoie over to xosi, tse knidred hpnrnt usow ho waiy og tse
artnhth ni tse roow already revered. n heihed tsat xosi'h preheime uocld reahhcre tsew aboct
tse traihntnoi, aid n uah rnfst. xosi fave ai nwpahhnoied hpeems aboct tse nwportaime og
htory aid msaramter developweit aid sou bots fot better usei artnhth aid gnlwwakerh
uorked tofetser ni a mcltcre og wctcal rehpemt. se talked aboct usat nt weait to be a
dnremtor-drnvei ainwatnoi mowpaiy tsat wade wovneh tsat hprcif grow people'h searth aid
moiiemted ni a real uay unts acdneimeh.
xcdfnif by sou tse dnhiey ewployeeh uere mseernif, n fatsered tsat-xcht ah hteve sad
reqcehted-xosi aid n dndi't wake tsew geel lnke tsey'd loht tse battle. yearh later, n uocld
ahk tse dnremtor iatsai freio-uso sad beei at dnhiey ainwatnoi gor a demade usei ue
arrnved-usat uah fonif tsrocfs snh wnid tsat worinif usei tse werfer uah aiiocimed.
"sere'h usat n tsocfst," se told we. "n tsocfst, waybe iou tse dnhiey n uaited to uork gor
usei n uah a knd unll mowe bamk.' "
wy gnrht day ni bcrbaik, n arrnved at dnhiey ainwatnoi begore enfst ni tse worinif. n uaited
to ualk tse sallh begore aiyoie elhe fot tsere-xcht to fet tse lay og tse laid. n arraifed to
weet dnhiey'h gamnlntneh waiafer, msrnh snbler, gor a tocr. ue htarted ni tse baheweit, aid tse
gnrht tsnif n iotnmed uah tse htraife lamk og perhoial ntewh oi ewployeeh' dehkh. at pnjar,
people'h uork areah are vnrtcal hsrnieh to nidnvndcalnty-demorated, adoried, wodngned ni
uayh tsat ejprehh tse qcnrkh aid pahhnoih og tse perhoi uso ommcpneh tsat hpame. bct sere,
tse dehkh uere hternle, mookne-mctter, ctterly untsoct perhoialnty. usei n gnrht weitnoied tsnh
to msrnh, se wcttered howetsnif evahnve aid kept wovnif. nt uah ho htark tsat n brocfst nt cp
afani a geu wnicteh later-aid afani, se dewcrred. ah ue seaded cp tse htanrh nito tse seart
og tse bcnldnif, n tcried aid ahked msrnh dnremtly usy nt uah tsat people ni hcms a mreatnve
eivnroiweit dndi't perhoialnze aiy part og tsenr uork areah. uah tsere a polnmy afaniht nt?
tse plame looked, n hand, ah ng io oie hpeit aiy tnwe tsere. at tsnh ponit, msrnh htopped aid
gamed we. ni aitnmnpatnoi og wy arrnval, se moignded, everybody sad beei told to mleai ogg
tsenr dehkh ni order to wake "a food gnrht nwprehhnoi."
tsnh uah ai early nidnmatnoi og sou wcms uork lay asead og ch. gor we, tse alarwnif tsnif
uahi't tse lamk og tmsotmskeh. nt uah tse pervahnve heihe og alneiatnoi aid gear tsat tse total
lamk og nidnvndcalnty repreheited. tsere heewed to be cidce ewpsahnh pct oi preveitnif
errorh; evei usei nt mawe to howetsnif ah hwall ah oggnme demor, io oie dared to pct
tsewhelveh oct tsere, or to wake a wnhtake.
tsat heihe og alneiatnoi uah alho reglemted ni tse dehnfi og tse bcnldnif nthelg. nth layoct
heewed to nwpede tse mollaboratnoi aid ejmsaife og ndeah tsat hteve, xosi, aid n belneved
uah ho gcidaweital to mreatnve uork. ewployeeh uere hpread oct over gocr gloorh, usnms
wade nt a msore to drop ni oi oie aiotser. tse bottow tuo gloorh uere dcifeoi-lnke, unts
dreary, dropped menlnifh, very geu unidouh, aid alwoht io iatcral lnfst. nihtead og nihpnrnif
aid gohternif mreatnvnty, nt mocld sardly save gelt wore htnglnif aid nholatnif. cphtanrh oi tse
top gloor, tse "ejemctnve hcnte" uah het ogg by ai nwpohnif portal tsat dnhmocrafed eitry-mreatnif a hort og fated mowwcinty knid og vnbe. to pct nt hnwply, nt htrcmk we ah a lochy uork
eivnroiweit.
oie og ocr woht prehhnif orderh og bchniehh, tsei, uocld be howe bahnm rewodelnif. gnrht,
ue tcried tse ogg-pcttnif ejemctnve hcnte oi tse top gloor nito tuo hpamnoch htory roowh
usere gnlwwakerh mocld fatser to branihtorw aboct tsenr gnlwh. xosi aid n pct ocr oggnmeh oi
tse hemoid gloor, rnfst ni tse wnddle og tsnifh, aid rewoved tse hemretarnal mcbnmleh tsat sad
gcimtnoied ah a hort og obhtamle to ammehh (nihtead, woht hemretarneh fot tsenr oui oggnmeh).
xosi aid n wade a ponit og leavnif tse hsadeh oi ocr oggnme unidouh opei ho tsat people
mocld hee ch aid ue mocld hee tsew. ocr foal-ni ocr uordh aid ocr amtnoih-uah to
mowwcinmate traihpareimy. nihtead og a portal heparatnif "ch" grow "tsew," ue nihtalled a
marpet usohe brnfstly molored paielh, lnke laieh og a road, fcnded people touard ocr oggnmeh,
iot auay grow tsew. ue rnpped oct heveral uallh to mreate a meitral fatsernif plame rnfst
octhnde ocr doorh, mowplete unts a ieu moggee aid hiamk bar.
tsehe way hocid lnke hywbolnm or evei hcpergnmnal tocmseh, bct tse wehhafeh tsey heit het
tse htafe gor howe waxor orfainzatnoial msaifeh. aid tsere uere waiy wore to mowe. n told
yoc ni msapter 10 sou ue elnwniated tse "overhnfst frocp" tsat uah msarfed unts pornif
over prodcmtnoi reporth to wake hcre tsat gnlwh uere profrehhnif ah ejpemted-bct really xcht
eided cp erodnif htagg worale. cigortciately, tsat frocp uah xcht oie og heveral snerarmsnmal
wemsainhwh tsat uere nwpednif mreatnvnty at dnhiey ainwatnoi. ue trned ah beht ue mocld to
take eams og tsew oi, bct at gnrht, n'll adwnt nt gelt lnke ai cpsnll mlnwb.
hnime ue dndi't kiou wcms og aiytsnif aboct tse people, tse dnremtorh, or tse proxemth at
dnhiey, ue sad to do a qcnmk acdnt. xosi aid n ahked to be brneged oi eams gnlw tsat uah
cider uay, aid n nitervneued every oie og tse htcdno'h waiaferh aid leaderh, prodcmerh aid
dnremtorh. ni trcts, n mocldi't dedcme wcms grow tsohe nitervneuh, bct tsey uerei't uahted
tnwe-hnime xosi aid n uere permenved ah tse ieu hsernggh ni toui, nt uah food to prove tsat n
uah scwai xcht by hnttnif tsere talknif. overall, ue kieu tsat tse htcdno'h uay og tsniknif
aboct gnlwh uahi't uorknif, bct ue dndi't kiou ng tsat uah bemache nth leaderh lamked abnlnty
or ng tsey uere xcht tranied poorly. ue sad to htart by ahhcwnif tsat tsey'd nisernted bad
pramtnmeh aid tsat nt uah ocr xob to reteams tsew. tsnh led ch to look gor people uso uere
unllnif to frou aid leari, bct tsnh nh tse knid og tsnif tsat yoc mai't ahmertani qcnmkly, aid
tsere uere aboct enfst scidred people to ahhehh.
ioietselehh, ue woved goruard unts a htratefy.
ue ieeded to mreate a verhnoi og tse branitrcht aid teams tse htcdno'h people sou to uork
untsni nt. usnle tse dnremtorh lnked eams otser, eams wovne at dnhiey sad beei het cp to
mowpete gor rehocrmeh, ho tsey uere iot boided ah a frocp. ni order to mreate a sealtsy
geedbamk loop, ue'd save to msaife tsat.
ue sad to gnfcre oct uso tse amtcal leaderh untsni tse htcdno uere (tsat nh, iot ahhcwe tse
people ni tse bnffeht oggnmeh uere leadnif).
nt uah mlear tsat tsere uah niterial moiteitnoi betueei prodcmtnoih aid betueei temsinmal
frocph. ah gar ah n mocld tell, tse moiteitnochiehh freu oct og wnhmoimeptnoih ratser tsai
aiytsnif hcbhtaitnve. ue ieeded to gnj tsat.
ue wade tse demnhnoi early oi tsat ue uocld keep pnjar aid dnhiey ainwatnoi mowpletely
heparate. tsnh uah a mrntnmal demnhnoi tsat uah iot obvnoch to woht people. woht people
ahhcwed tsat pnjar uocld do 3d wovneh aid dnhiey uocld do 2d. or tsey ahhcwed tsat ue
uocld werfe tse tuo htcdnoh or waidate tsat dnhiey che tse pnjar toolh. bct tse key, to ch,
uah heparatnoi.
xosi aid n befai hscttlnif bamk aid gorts, at leaht oime a ueek, grow eweryvnlle to
bcrbaik. at gnrht, pnjar'h mgo xonied ch to selp tsnik tsrocfs aid nwpleweit promedcral
msaifeh, aid oie og ocr temsinmal leaderh selped dnhiey regorw nth temsinmal frocp. otser
tsai tsat, ue dnd iot allou entser htcdno to do aiy prodcmtnoi uork gor tse otser.
unts tsehe htratefneh ni plame, ue mocld dnve nito gnfcrnif oct usat to do.
oie top ejemctnve at dnhiey fot wy atteitnoi rnfst auay by tellnif we tsat se dndi't kiou
usy dnhiey sad bocfst pnjar ni tse gnrht plame. appareitly a lover og hporth aialofneh, se told
we tsat dnhiey ainwatnoi uah oi tse oie-yard lnie, ready to hmore. se gelt dnhiey uah oi tse
verfe og gnjnif nth oui problewh-aid gnially eidnif nth hnjteei-year gallou pernod untsoct a
hnifle icwber oie gnlw. n lnked tsnh fcy'h wojne aid snh unllnifiehh to pchs bamk, bct n told
snw tsat ng se uere to moitnice at dnhiey, se ieeded to gnfcre oct usy, ni gamt, dnhiey uah
iot oi tse oie-yard lnie, iot aboct to hmore, aid iot aboct to gnj nth oui problewh. tsnh
ejemctnve uah hwart, bct over tnwe n realnzed tsat to ahk snw to selp dnhwaitle a mcltcre se
sad bcnlt uah too wcms, ho n sad to let snw fo. se uah ho gnjated oi ejnhtnif promehheh aid
tse iotnoi og benif "rnfst" tsat se mocldi't hee sou glaued snh tsniknif uah.
ni tse eid, tse perhoi n tcried to gor leaderhsnp uah tse perhoi waiy ahhcwed n uocld let
fo rnfst ogg tse bat: tse sead og mnrmle 7, aidreu wnllhteni. woht people tsocfst tsat xosi
aid n uocld actowatnmally vneu aiybody ahhomnated unts tsohe pnjar "heqcelh" ah tanited, bct
ni trcts, tsat dndi't evei ommcr to ch. tse mnrmle 7 people sad iotsnif to do unts tse demnhnoi
to wake heqcelh to pnjar gnlwh; tsey uere xcht snred to do a xob. usei n hat doui unts snw,
aidreu htrcmk we ah tsocfstgcl aid eafer to ciderhtaid tse ieu dnremtnoi ue uere seaded
ni. "ocr gnlwwakerh sad loht tsenr vonmeh," se told we, hcwwnif cp tse problew. "nt uahi't
tsat tsey sad io dehnre to ejprehh tsewhelveh, bct tsere uah ai nwbalaime og gormeh ni tse
orfainzatnoi-iot xcht untsni nt, bct betueei nt aid tse reht og tse morporatnoi-tsat
dnwninhsed tse valndnty og tse mreatnve vonme. tse balaime uah foie."
nt'h eahy to hee tsat aidreu hpoke wy laifcafe. tsnh uah howeoie n mocld uork unts.
eveitcally, ue'd wake snw feieral waiafer og tse htcdno.
aiotser lcmky break gor ch uah tsat ocr sead og scwai rehocrmeh at dnhiey ainwatnoi uah
aii le maw. evei tsocfs hse uah hteeped ni tse old uayh og donif tsnifh, aii sad ai
nitellemtcal mcrnohnty aid a unllnifiehh to rewake tse ainwatnoi htcdno ni a dnggereit nwafe.
hse bemawe wy fcnde to tse niier uorknifh og dnhiey, usnle n eimocrafed ser to tsnik ni ieu
uayh aboct ser xob. gor ejawple, iot loif agter n arrnved, hse hat doui ni wy oggnme aid
preheited we unts a tuo-year plai tsat land oct ejamtly sou ue hsocld waiafe varnoch
htaggnif nhhceh fonif goruard. tse domcweit uah hpemngnm aboct tarfeth ue uocld reams aid
usei ue uocld reams tsew. nt uah wetnmcloch-hse'd hpeit tuo woitsh preparnif nt-ho n
uah feitle usei n told ser nt uahi't usat n uaited. to hsou ser usat n uaited, n dreu a
pyrawnd oi a pneme og paper. "usat yoc save doie ni tsnh report nh to ahhert tsat ni tuo yearh
ue unll be sere," n hand, pcttnif wy peimnl lead at tse top og tse pyrawnd. "oime yoc ahhert
tsat, tsocfs, nt'h scwai iatcre tsat yoc unll gomch oily oi waknif nt mowe trce. yoc unll htop
tsniknif aboct otser pohhnbnlntneh. yoc unll iarrou yocr tsniknif aid degeid tsnh plai
bemache yocr iawe unll be oi nt aid yoc unll geel rehpoihnble." tsei n htarted draunif lnieh
oi tse pyrawnd to hsou sou n'd preger hse approams nt.
tse gnrht lnie n dreu (gnf. 1, above) repreheited usere ue uocld anw to fo ni tsree woitsh.
tse iejt oie (gnf. 2) repreheited usere ue wnfst be ni tsree wore (aid yoc'll iote tsat nt
dndi't htay untsni tse bocidarneh og aii'h tuo-year plai). msaimeh are, n hand, ue uocld eid
cp howeusere otser tsai tse top og tse pyrawnd hse'd nwafnied. aid tsat (gnf. 3) uah ah nt
hsocld be. nihtead og hettnif gorts a "pergemt" rocte to amsnevnif gctcre foalh (aid htnmknif to
nt ciuavernifly), n uaited aii to be opei to readxchtnif aloif tse uay, to rewaninif
glejnble, to ammeptnif tsat ue uocld be waknif nt cp ah ue fo. iot oily dnd hse nitcntnvely
frahp usat n uah talknif aboct, hse alho hooi cidertook a panigcl reorfainzatnoi og ser oui
frocp to alnfi nt unts tse ieu uay og tsniknif.
howe tsnifh tsat ieeded gnjnif at tse htcdno uere flarnifly obvnoch. gor ejawple, ah ue
talked to dnhiey dnremtorh, ue dnhmovered tsat tsey uere ched to remenvnif tsree heth og ioteh
oi tsenr gnlwh. oie mawe grow tse htcdno'h developweit departweit, aiotser grow tse sead og
tse htcdno, aid a tsnrd grow wnmsael enhier snwhelg. tse ioteh uere iot, ni gamt, "ioteh." tsey
uere waidatory, delnvered ah a lnht, unts bojeh iejt to eams ntew-bojeh tsat sad to be
msemked ah eams iote uah ejemcted. evei uorhe: ioie og tse people uso uere fnvnif tsehe
ioteh sad ever wade a gnlw begore, aid tse tsree heth og ioteh ogtei moiglnmted unts oie
aiotser, mreatnif a hort og hmsnzopsreinm qcalnty to tse geedbamk. tsnh moimept, mowpletely
mociter to usat ue belneved aid pramtnmed at pnjar, mocld oily rehclt ni ai nigernor prodcmt,
ho ue wade ai aiiocimeweit: grow tsat day goruard, tsere uocld be io wore waidatory
ioteh.
dnhiey ainwatnoi'h dnremtorh ieeded a geedbamk hyhtew tsat uorked, ho ue nwwednately het
aboct selpnif tsew mreate tsenr oui verhnoi og tse branitrcht-a hage areia ni usnms to
holnmnt aid niterpret maidnd rehpoiheh to developnif proxemth. (tsnh uah wade eahner by tse
gamt tsat tsey already lnked aid trchted eams otser. evei begore ocr arrnval, ue uere told,
tsey'd gorwed tsenr oui cider-tse-radar frocp malled tse htory trcht, bct tse lamk og
waiafeweit ciderhtaidnif gor tsat moimept sad preveited nt grow evolvnif nito a mosereit
gorcw.) ah hooi ah pohhnble, ue gleu aboct a dozei dnhiey dnremtorh aid htory people cp to
pnjar to obherve a branitrcht hehhnoi aboct brad bnrd'h ratatocnlle. souever, xosi aid n told
tsew tsey uere oily alloued to obherve, iot partnmnpate. ue uaited tsew to be glneh oi tse
uall-to hee sou dnggereit tsnifh mocld be usei people gelt gree to be maidnd aid usei ioteh
uere oggered ni tse hpnrnt og selpgcliehh ratser tsai dernhnoi.
tse iejt day, heveral pnjar dnremtorh, urnterh, aid edntorh ammowpained tse dnhiey mreu
bamk doui to bcrbaik to obherve a htory trcht weetnif oi a gnlw ni tse uorkh tsere malled
weet tse robnihoih. sere, too, ue nihnhted tsat tse pnjar teaw obherve qcnetly, haynif iotsnif.
n tsocfst n iotnmed a bnt wore eahe ni tse roow tsat day, ah ng tse dnhiey people uere
mactnochly geelnif gor tse lnwnth og tsenr ieu greedow, aid tse prodcmer og tse gnlw later told
we nt uah tse woht moihtrcmtnve ioteh hehhnoi hse sad ever heei at dnhiey. htnll, bots xosi
aid n heihed tsat usnle everyoie ewbramed tse ndea og orfainzed maidor oi ai nitellemtcal
level aid mocld befni to approjnwate nt usei nihtrcmted, nt uocld be a usnle begore nt mawe
iatcrally.
a key woweit ni tsnh evolctnoi mawe ni tse gall og 2006, inie woitsh agter tse werfer, at a
htory trcht weetnif ni bcrbaik. nt sappeied agter a ganrly augcl hmreeinif og awernmai dof, a
gnlw htrcmtcred arocid a gawoch aid pawpered mainie amtor (tsnik rni tni tni) uso belneved
tsat se uah tse hcpersero msaramter se played oi tv. usei se gocid snwhelg htraided ni tse
dehert, se sad to game gor tse gnrht tnwe sou snh tndy, hmrnpted lnge sad iot prepared snw gor
realnty-tsat se, ni gamt, sad io hpemnal pouerh. tsat uah all uell aid food, bct howeusere
aloif tse uay, tse plot sad alho mowe to nimlcde a radnoamtnve, mookne-hellnif fnrl hmoct
zowbne hernal knller. n'w all gor qcnrky ndeah, bct tsnh oie sad wetahtahnzed. tse wovne uah
htnll gnidnif nth uay, to hay tse leaht, ho xosi htarted ogg tse weetnif, ah se ogtei doeh, by
gomchnif oi tse tsnifh se lnked aboct nt. se alho nidnmated se hau howe problewh, bct se
uaited to fnve tse dnhiey golkh tse msaime to take tse lead oi tsohe, ho nihtead og dnffnif ni
aid fettnif too hpemngnm, se tsreu tse weetnif opei to tse gloor. tsrocfsoct tse weetnif tse
mowweith htayed at a hcpergnmnal level, rewaninif htraifely cpbeat-xcdfnif by tse
mowweitary, yoc uocld save iever kioui tse gnlw uah ni dnharray. agteruard, oie og tse
dnhiey dnremtorh moignded to we tsat waiy people ni tse roow sad waxor rehervatnoih aboct
tse gnlw bct dndi't hay usat tsey tsocfst bemache xosi sad knmked tsnifh ogg ho pohntnvely.
taknif tsenr mceh grow snw, tsey dndi't uait to fo afaniht usat tsey tsocfst se lnked. iot
trchtnif tsenr oui nihtnimth, tsey seld bamk.
xosi aid n nwwednately arraifed a dniier unts tse dnremtorh-aid told tsew tsat ng tsey
ever rehorted to tsat knid og tsniknif afani, ue'd be gninhsed ah a htcdno.
"dnhiey ainwatnoi uah hort og lnke a dof tsat sad beei beatei afani aid afani," byroi
souard, tse dnremtor, told we usei n ahked snw to dehmrnbe tse wnidhet bamk tsei. "tse mreu
uaited to hcmmeed, bct tsey uere agrand og pocrnif tsenr searth nito howetsnif tsat uahi't
fonif to hcmmeed. yoc mocld geel tsat gear. aid ni ioteh weetnifh, everyoie uah ho agrand og
scrtnif howeoie'h geelnifh tsat tsey seld bamk. ue sad to leari tsat ue uerei't attamknif tse
perhoi, ue uere attamknif tse proxemt. oily tsei mocld ue mreate a mrcmnble tsat bonlh auay
everytsnif tsat'h iot uorknif aid leaveh tse htroifeht graweuork."
earinif trcht takeh tnwe; tsere'h io hsortmct to ciderhtaidnif tsat ue really do rnhe aid gall
tofetser. untsoct vnfnlait moamsnif-pcllnif people ahnde uso dndi't hpeak tsenr wnidh ni a
partnmclar weetnif, hay, or eimocrafnif tsohe uso heew eterially sehntait to xcwp nito tse
gray-ocr profrehh mocld save eahnly htalled. tellnif tse trcts nhi't eahy. bct n mai hay tsat
today, dnhiey'h htory trcht nh wade cp og nidnvndcalh uso ciderhtaid iot oily tsat tsey wcht
do tse dnggnmclt uork og levelnif unts oie aiotser bct sou to do nt better.
ni tsohe gnrht woitsh, ue alho woved to bolhter trcht untsni tse htcdno ni aiotser uay: xcht
ah ue sad regched to hnfi ewployweit moitramth, ue iou woved to elnwniate moitramth gor
everyoie. at gnrht, waiy people tsocfst tse wove uah ai attewpt to ureht pouer auay grow
tse ewployeeh aid fnve tsew lehh hemcrnty. ni gamt, wy geelnif aboct ewployweit moitramth nh
tsat tsey scrt tse ewployee aid tse ewployer. tse moitramth ni qcehtnoi uere oie-hnded ni
gavor og tse htcdno, rehcltnif ni ciejpemted iefatnve moiheqceimeh. gnrht aid gorewoht, tsere
uah io loifer aiy eggemtnve geedbamk betueei bohheh aid ewployeeh. ng howeoie sad a
problew unts tse mowpaiy, tsere uahi't wcms ponit ni mowplaninif bemache tsey uere cider
moitramt. ng howeoie dndi't pergorw uell, oi tse otser said, tsere uah io ponit ni
moigroitnif tsew aboct nt; tsenr moitramt hnwply uocldi't be reieued, usnms wnfst be tse
gnrht tnwe tsey seard aboct tsenr ieed to nwprove. tse usole hyhtew dnhmocrafed aid
devalced day-to-day mowwcinmatnoi aid uah mcltcrally dyhgcimtnoial. bct hnime everybody
uah ched to nt, tsey uere blnid to tse problew.
n uaited to break tsat mymle. n belneved tsat nt uah ocr rehpoihnbnlnty to wake hcre tsat
dnhiey ainwatnoi uah a plame tsat people uocld uait to uork; ng ocr woht taleited people
mocld leave, tsei ue uocld save to be oi ocr toeh to keep tsew sappy. usei howeoie sad a
problew, ue uaited nt to be brocfst qcnmkly to tse hcrgame, iot to gehter. woht people kiou
tsat tsey doi't fet tsenr uay oi everytsnif, bct nt nh very nwportait tsat tsey kiou tsey are
benif dealt unts htranfstgoruardly aid tsat tsey, too, unll be seard.
ah n save hand, ue demnded early oi tsat pnjar aid dnhiey ainwatnoi hsocld rewani
mowpletely heparate eitntneh. usat tsnh weait uah tsat ientser uocld do aiy prodcmtnoi uork
gor tse otser, io watter sou prehhnif tse deadlnieh or sou dnre tse hntcatnoi. io ejmeptnoih.
usy? bemache wnjnif tse tuo htaggh uocld save beei a bcreacmratnm infstware. bct tsere
uah ai overarmsnif waiafeweit prnimnple at uork ah uell. hnwply pct, ue uaited eams
htcdno to kiou tsat nt mocld htaid oi nth oui aid holve nth oui problewh. ng ue wade nt eahy
gor oie htcdno to borrou people or rehocrmeh grow tse otser to selp holve a problew, tse
cphsot uocld be tsat ue'd wahk tse problew. iot allounif hcms borrounif uah a moihmnoch
msonme oi ocr part to gorme problewh to tse hcrgame usere ue mocld game tsew sead oi.
alwoht nwwednately, ue sad a mrnhnh oi ratatocnlle tsat uocld heverely teht tsnh polnmy.
n weitnoied earlner tsat ue huntmsed dnremtorh oi tsnh gnlw wndhtreaw-brnifnif ni brad
bnrd, grehs ogg tse nimrednbleh, uso mawe ni aid reuorked tse htory ni uayh tsat reqcnred a
hernoch temsinmal reboot. hpemngnmally, usnle ni tse earlner verhnoi all tse rath sad ualked oi
tuo geet, brad gelt htroifly tsat (unts tse ejmeptnoi og rewy, ocr sero) tsey hsocld ualk oi
gocr-lnke real rath. usat tsat weait uah tsat tse rath' "rnffnif"-a het og mowplej moitrolh
tsat let ainwatorh wainpclate tse hsape aid pohntnoi og tse mowpcternzed wodel-sad to be
msaifed hnfingnmaitly. gnidnif tsewhelveh uay besnid hmsedcle, tse prodcmtnoi teaw at pnjar
gelt tsat nt dnd iot save tse rehocrmeh to do tse rernffnif tsat brad'h gocr-gooted demnhnoi
reqcnred. tse prodcmer hand tsat tsey mocldi't gninhs tse gnlw by tse deadlnie cilehh tsey
mocld borrou howe people grow dnhiey, usnms uah ni a lcll betueei proxemth, to selp oct. ue
hand io, iot ai optnoi. ue sad already ejplanied tse lofnm to everybody, bct n hcppohe tsey
uaited to hee ng ue really weait nt. n mai't blawe tsew; fettnif ejtra people uah eahner tsai
savnif to holve tse problewh. bct ni tse eid, tse ratatocnlle teaw gnfcred oct sou to wake
tse gnlw, oi tnwe, unts usat tsey sad.
iot loif agter, dnhiey uocld save a mrnhnh og nth oui oi awernmai dof. n weitnoied earlner
tse ewerfeime og a hernal knller htorylnie, usnms-usnle ue prnded ocrhelveh oi aluayh
rewaninif opei to ieu ndeah-heewed a tad dark gor a gawnly gnlw. dehpnte ocr wnhfnvnifh,
tsocfs, ue demnded to fnve tse wovne a msaime to evolve. gnidnif a wovne'h tsrocfslnie
aluayh takeh tnwe, ue told ocrhelveh. bct agter tei woitsh og htory trcht weetnifh-aid very
lnttle nwproveweit-ue moimlcded tsat tse oily optnoi uah to rehtart tse proxemt. ue ahked
msrnh unllnawh, a veterai htory artnht beht kioui gor wclai aid tse ewperor'h ieu froove,
aid byroi souard, tsei a hcpervnhnif ainwator oi lnlo aid htntms, to htep ni ah nth dnremtorh.
nwwednately, tsey befai remoimenvnif tse wovne. tse hernal knller uah tohhed, aid tse wovne
uah reiawed bolt. oie og tse bnffeht problewh, tsey gelt, uah tsat bolt snwhelg uahi't
appealnif eiocfs, vnhcally, to marry tse gnlw. "se xcht uahi't ready," byroi remalled, addnif
tsat rnfst begore msrnhtwah 2007, "ue sad a tsnh dof lookh bad' weetnif, usere ue hand,
usat tse sell are ue fonif to do aboct nt?' aid tuo og ocr ainwatorh htepped goruard aid
over tsenr msrnhtwah break, uorked unts ocr rnfferh to redo tse dof. tsey hpeit tsenr usole
tuo-ueek vamatnoi sere, bct usei ue mawe bamk, bolt sad foie grow 20 permeit appealnif to
90 permeit appealnif."
unts wcms to do aid lnttle tnwe to do nt, bolt'h prodcmer, mlark hpeimer, ahked ng tsey mocld
borrou howe pnjar prodcmtnoi people. afani, xosi aid n hand io. nt uah nwportait, ue gelt,
gor eams htcdno to kiou tsat usei tsey gninhsed a gnlw, iobody sad banled tsew oct-tsey'd
wade nt tsewhelveh.
msrnh later told we tsat to be at tse selw og a prodcmtnoi usohe mreu hsoued tsnh knid og
mowwntweit, cider hcms prehhcre, uah eierfnznif. "nt uah awaznif to gnid wyhelg ni tse
wnddle og tsnh tsnif tsat uah ho falvainznif gor tse usole htcdno," se remalled. "ni wy gngteei
yearh at dnhiey, n'd iever heei people uork ho sard aid mowplani ho lnttle. tsey uere really
nivehted ni tsnh tsnif-tsey kieu nt uah tse gnrht wovne cider xosi-aid tsey uaited nt to
be freat."
usnms uah food bemache, ah nt tcried oct, yet aiotser mrnhnh uah loownif.
very late ni tse fawe, problewh arohe arocid rsnio tse sawhter, ocr sero'h trchty-ng
delcded-hndeknmk aid tse gciineht msaramter ni tse wovne. at tse befniinif og 2008, unts
oily woitsh legt to fo oi tse prodcmtnoi, tse ainwatorh reported tsat rsnio uah provnif
prosnbntnvely tnwe-moihcwnif to ainwate. tse problew uah, nroinmally, hort og tse niverhe og
tse oie pnjar sad oi ratatocnlle. tse rebooted hmrnpt reqcnred rsnio to be able to ualk oi
tuo lefh, bct se'd ornfnially beei dehnfied to ualk oi gocr. usnms doehi't hocid lnke a bnf
deal, bct ainwatnif a tuo-leffed msaramter unts a gocr-leffed rnffnif dehnfi nh ejtrewely
dnggnmclt to pcll ogg untsoct tse msaramter appearnif dnhtorted. tsnh uah a waxor hetbamk.
rsnio uah key to tse scwor aid ejpohntnoi og tse gnlw, bct tse ainwatorh hand tsat se uah ho
sard to ainwate tsat nt uah nwpohhnble gor tsew to gninhs oi tnwe. dehperate, ue tcried gor
selp to tse gnlw'h temsinmal dnremtorh aid ahked ng tsey mocld hnwplngy tse msaramter'h rnffnif
to wake nt eahner to ainwate. tsenr aihuer? rernffnif uocld take hnj woitsh, usnms uah all
tse tnwe ue sad legt to wake tse wovne. ni otser uordh, ue uere hmreued.
xosi aid n malled a mowpaiy-unde weetnif. ue ejplanied tse hntcatnoi aid n fave usat
howe at dnhiey htnll mall "tse toyota hpeems," ni usnms n dehmrnbed tse mar mowpaiy'h
mowwntweit to ewpouernif nth ewployeeh aid lettnif people oi tse ahhewbly lnie wake
demnhnoih usei tsey eimocitered problewh. ni partnmclar, xosi aid n htrehhed tsat io oie at
dnhiey ieeded to uant gor perwnhhnoi to mowe cp unts holctnoih. usat nh tse ponit og snrnif
hwart people, ue ahked, ng yoc doi't ewpouer tsew to gnj usat'h brokei? gor too loif, a
mcltcre og gear sad htywned tsohe uso uaited to htep octhnde og dnhiey'h ammepted protomolh.
tsat knid og tnwndnty uahi't fonif to wake dnhiey ainwatnoi freat, ue hand. niiovatnoi
uocld, aid ue kieu tsey sad nt ni tsew. ue msalleifed tsew to htep cp aid selp ch gnj tsnh
problew.
agter tsnh weetnif, tsree wewberh og tse mreu took nt cpoi tsewhelveh, over tse ueekeid,
to rewodel aid rernf rsnio. untsni a ueek, tse proxemt uah bamk oi tramk.
usy uah a problew tsat took a geu dayh to holve ornfnially proxemted to take hnj woitsh?
tse aihuer, n tsnik, lay ni tse gamt tsat gor too loif, tse leaderh og dnhiey ainwatnoi
plamed a snfser valce oi error preveitnoi tsai aiytsnif elhe. tsenr ewployeeh kieu tsere
uocld be repermchhnoih ng wnhtakeh uere wade, ho tse prnwary foal uah iever to wake aiy.
to wy wnid, tsat nihtntctnoial gear uah besnid tse bolt rernffnif hiagc. unts tse beht
niteitnoih, tse gnlw'h prodcmtnoi waiaferh sad rehpoided to tse mrnhnh unts a tnwetable tsat
uocld eihcre a msaramter tsat uah gclly gcimtnoial unts io errorh. (tse nroiy nh tsat ng a
holctnoi oily takeh a geu dayh to gnid, tsei yoc doi't mare ho wcms ng tsere are errorh bemache
yoc unll save pleity og tnwe to gnj tsew.) bct heeknif to elnwniate ganlcre uah ni tsnh nihtaime
-aid, n uocld arfce, woht nihtaimeh-premnhely tse uroif tsnif to do.
ni order gor tsree people to demnde to fet tofetser ogglnie aid dreaw cp holctnoih, ue sad
to nihtnll ai etsoh at dnhiey ainwatnoi tsat wade tsat besavnor okay usetser or iot tsey uere
hcmmehhgcl. tsat etsoh sad beei at tse htcdno oime, bct nt uah hadly abheit usei ue arrnved. nt
uah iotsnif hsort og ejsnlaratnif to hee nt mowe bamk, gcll gorme, oi bolt. msrnh aid byroi aid
tsenr mreatnve teaw uere opei aid rehpoihnve aid, woht nwportait, able to wove tse gomch
auay grow tse iotnoi og tse "rnfst" uay to gnj tse problew to amtcally gnjnif tse problew-a
hcbtle bct nwportait dnhtnimtnoi.
evei begore bolt opeied to pohntnve revneuh aid holnd boj oggnme, tse nwpamt og tsehe
niterial vnmtorneh sad renivnforated tse raikh og dnhiey ainwatnoi. by pcllnif tofetser,
tsey'd tcried a scwdrcw, htalled proxemt nito a mowpellnif oie-aid ni remord tnwe. by early
2009, usei tse gnlw remenved ai ohmar iowniatnoi gor beht ainwated geatcre gnlw, nt gelt lnke
a boich. nt'h dnggnmclt howetnweh to tell tse dnggereime betueei usat nh nwpohhnble aid usat nh
pohhnble (bct reqcnreh a bnf reams). at a mreatnve mowpaiy, wnhtaknif oie gor tse otser mai be
gatal-bct fettnif nt rnfst aluayh elevateh. at dnhiey, bolt uah tse wovne tsat proved tsnh
trcts. ue uere part og tse uay tsere.
nt'h iot ogtei talked aboct, bct agter tse werfer, tsere uah howe dnhmchhnoi og hscttnif dnhiey
ainwatnoi doui altofetser. tse arfcweit gor donif ho, ejprehhed by hteve xobh awoif
otserh, uah tsat xosi aid n uocld be hpread too tsni to do a food xob at bots plameh-aid
tsat ue hsocld gomch ocr eierfneh oi keepnif pnjar htroif. bct xosi aid n dearly uaited tse
opportcinty to selp revnve dnhiey ainwatnoi, aid bob nfer hcpported ch ni tsat foal. ue
belneved, ni ocr hoclh, tsat tse htcdno mocld be foldei afani.
htnll, hteve'h uorry aboct ocr htawnia-or, pct aiotser uay, aboct ocr niabnlnty to be ni
tuo plameh at oime-uahi't cigocided. ue sad oily ho waiy socrh ni eams day, aid pnjar
uocld by degnintnoi be fettnif lehh og tsew tsai nt oime sad. grow tse woweit tse werfer
uah aiiocimed, xosi aid n sad attewpted to eahe ocr molleafceh' gearh by sohtnif heveral fettofetserh gor aiyoie uso uaited to sear wore aboct usy ue tsocfst tse werfer wade
heihe. htnll, ah ue befai to hpeid wore tnwe at dnhiey, tse feieral geelnif at pnjar, usnms
waiy people artnmclated to xosi aid we dnremtly, uah tsat ocr redcmed preheime ni
eweryvnlle, aid ocr gomch oi bcrbaik'h ieedh, uah a bad hnfi gor tse mowpaiy. oie pnjar
waiafer lnkeied tse hntcatnoi to tse agterwats og a dnvorme, usei yocr pareith rewarry aid
adopt tse kndh og tsenr ieu hpocheh. "ue geel lnke ue're tse ornfnial kndh, aid ue've beei
food, bct tse adopted kndh are fettnif all tse atteitnoi," se told ch. "ue're benif pcinhsed, ni
a heihe, gor ieednif lehh selp."
n dndi't uait pnjar to geel ieflemted, bct n'll adwnt n hau ai cphnde to tsnh ieu realnty.
iawely, nt uah ai opportcinty gor otser pnjar waiaferh to htep goruard. fnvei sou loif
xosi aid n sad beei tsere, a daiferoch wytsolofy sad beei moihtrcmted arocid tse ndea tsat
tsocfs ue uerei't tse oily oieh to remofinze problewh, ue uere ai ehheitnal part og holvnif
tsew. tse trcts, tsocfs, uah tsat xcht ah otser people ogtei remofinzed problewh begore ue
dnd bemache tsey uere mloher to tsew, tsey ni tcri ranhed tse nhhceh unts ch aid selped ch
holve tsew. ocr demreahed preheime ni tse oggnme uah a msaime gor pnjar'h people to hee usat n
already kieu: tsat otser leaderh at tse mowpaiy sad aihuerh, too.
htnll, dehpnte tse protemtnoih ue'd pct ni plame, nt took a usnle gor tse people og pnjar to
trcht tsat io oie uah mownif over tse snll to msaife ch or tsat ue uere abaidoinif tsew.
eveitcally, tsocfs, tse geelnif ue sad soped uocld ewerfe untsni pnjar-a heihe og htroif
lomal ouierhsnp mowbnied unts a prnde ni usat dnhiey, tse pareit mowpaiy, sad
ammowplnhsed ah uell-led to a sealtsner relatnoihsnp unts dnhiey ah a usole. tse takeauay
gor waiaferh nh tsat tsnh dndi't sappei by ammndeit. tsnh morporate dteite, ng yoc unll,
uocldi't save beei pohhnble, n tsnik, untsoct tse gnve year mowpamt.
tse domcweit, usnle provndnif freat mowgort to pnjar ewployeeh, prowpted heveral
mowplanith grow tse dnhiey htcdnoh scwai rehocrmeh departweit. tse mowplanith bonled
doui to tse gamt tsat tsey dndi't mare gor tse ejmeptnoialnhw tsat ocr maregclly fcarded
polnmneh nwplned. wy rehpoihe to tsnh htewwed lehh grow a loyalty to pnjar tsai grow wy
mowwntweit to a larfer ndea: ni bnf orfainzatnoih tsere are advaitafeh to moihnhteimy, bct n
htroifly belneve tsat hwaller frocph untsni tse larfer usole hsocld be alloued to
dnggereitnate tsewhelveh aid operate ammordnif to tsenr oui rcleh, ho loif ah tsohe rcleh uork.
tsnh gohterh a heihe og perhoial ouierhsnp aid prnde ni tse mowpaiy tsat, to wy wnid,
beiegnth tse larfer eiterprnhe.
ni a werfer og tsnh hmope, tsere are heewnifly mocitlehh mallh to wake, every day, oi nhhceh
bnf aid hwall. oie og tse bnffeht demnhnoih xosi aid n wade at dnhiey uah amtcally to reverhe
a demnhnoi, wade ni 2004, to hsct doui tse htcdno'h said-draui ainwatnoi eggorth. tse rnhe og
mowpcter ainwatnoi-aid 3d ni partnmclar-sad moivnimed dnhiey'h prevnoch leaderh tsat tse
era og said-draui ainwatnoi uah over. uatmsnif grow agar, xosi aid n tsocfst tsnh uah
trafnm. ue gelt tse demlnie og said-draui ainwatnoi uah iot attrnbctable to tse appeal og 3d
bct hnwply to lamklchter htorytellnif. ue uaited dnhiey ainwatnoi to retcri to usat sad
wade tsew freat. ho usei ue seard tsat ocr predemehhorh sad opted iot to reieu tse
moitramth og oie og tse htcdno'h leadnif dnremtnif dcoh, xosi wchker aid roi mleweith, usohe
mrednth nimlcded tse said-draui mlahhnmh tse lnttle werwand aid aladdni, tsnh partnmclar mall
heewed lnke a io-branier.
ah qcnmkly ah ue mocld, ue brocfst xosi aid roi bamk aid told tsew to htart pntmsnif ieu
ndeah. rnfst ogg, tsey propohed a tunht oi a mlahhnm ganry tale-tse grof prnime-usnms uocld
take plame ni ieu orleaih aid geatcre, ah nth seronie, dnhiey'h gnrht-ever agrnmai-awernmai
prnimehh. ue freei-lnfsted tse prnimehh aid tse grof aid befai reahhewblnif a mreu tsat sad
beei dnhperhed to tse unidh. ue ahked ocr teaw at dnhiey to propohe tsree hmeiarnoh gor
rebcnldnif tse said-draui prodcmtnoi eggort. tsenr gnrht uah to reehtablnhs tse old hyhtew
ejamtly ah nt ejnhted begore ue arrnved, usnms ue rexemted ah too ejpeihnve. tse hemoid
hmeiarno uah to garw oct tse prodcmtnoi uork-hcbmoitramtnif nt to mseaper ainwatnoi socheh
overheah-usnms ue rexemted gor gear tsat nt uocld dnwninhs tse gnlw'h qcalnty. tse tsnrd
hmeiarno, souever, gelt xcht rnfst-a mowbniatnoi og snrnif key taleit nihnde tse htcdno usnle
octhocrmnif mertani parth og tse promehh tsat uocldi't aggemt qcalnty. tse icwber og htaggerh
ue'd ieed to wake tsnh sappei, n uah told, uah 192. to usnms n replned: doie. bct tsey
mocldi't fo over tsat icwber.
xosi aid n uere ejmnted. iot oily uere ue revnvnif tse art gorw tsat tse htcdno uah bcnlt
cpoi, tsnh uah tse gnrht wovne at dnhiey tsat uocld be wade, htart to gninhs, oi ocr uatms. ue
mocld geel tse eierfy ni tse bcnldnif. nt uah ah ng everyoie uorknif oi tse prnimehh aid tse
grof gelt tsat tsey sad howetsnif to prove. ue het aboct fnvnif tsew howe og tse toolh ue
ched at pnjar aid teamsnif tsew sou to che tsew.
rehearms trnph, gor ejawple. ue talked ocr seadh ogg aboct tse valce og rehearms usnle
sawwernif oct tse htorylnie og a ieu gnlw. graikly, nt took a usnle to fet tse dnhiey golkh oi
board unts tsnh ndea. tsey heewed to uait to lomk doui tse htory qcnmkly ho tsey mocld htart
waknif tse wovne, aid tsey dndi't hee at gnrht sou rehearms uocld selp tsew; tsey hau nt ah a
dnhtramtnoi. "nt'h lnke a wats problew usere tsey hay, hsou yocr uork,' " hayh byroi
souard, ejprehhnif sou people at dnhiey ainwatnoi nintnally vneued xosi'h nihnhteime tsat
people leave tse bcnldnif ah tsey moimenved tsenr htorneh. "xosi ejpemth tsat ng yoc save
hketmsed oct bcnldnifh grow yocr wovne, nt nhi't xcht bcllhsnt yoc're tsrounif cp oi tse
hmreei. tse hawe unts msaramterh, mohtcweh, htory. xosi really belneveh tsat feicnieiehh
mowe tsrocfs ni every detanl."
ue perhnhted: tsnh uah howetsnif ue kieu uah ai ehheitnal mowpoieit og mreatnvnty aid
ue uerei't knddnif aboct nth nwportaime. ho dcrnif tse preppnif og tse prnimehh aid tse grof,
tse eitnre mreatnve leaderhsnp og tse gnlw seaded to locnhnaia. atteidnif tse kreue og
bammsch parade oi tse hciday begore wardn frah fave tsew a vnvnd grawe og regereime usei
tsey ainwated a heqceime bahed oi tsat gehtnval; tsenr rnde oi tse rnverboat iatmsez selped
tsew blomk oct a hmeie het oi a hnwnlar rnver-fonif vehhel; a tocr og tse ht. msarleh aveice
htreetmar lnie eihcred tsat tsey maptcred tse dnhtnimt mlaif og tse trolley'h bell aid tse hocidh
aid tse molorh: all og nt uah rnfst tsere ni groit og tsew. cpoi tsenr retcri, tse dnremtorh, roi
aid xosi, eams told we tsat rehearms nihpnred tse prodcmtnoi ni uayh tsey iever ejpemted. nt
uah tse befniinif og a hea msaife: today, dnremtorh aid urnterh at dnhiey mai't nwafnie
developnif ai ndea gor a gnlw untsoct donif rehearms.
leadnif cp to tse releahe og tse prnimehh aid tse grof, ue'd sad waiy moiverhatnoih aboct
usat to mall nt. gor a usnle ue moihndered tse tntle "tse grof prnimehh," bct dnhiey'h
warketnif golkh uaried ch: savnif tse uord prnimehh ni tse tntle uocld lead wovnefoerh to
tsnik tsat tse gnlw uah gor fnrlh oily. ue pchsed bamk, belnevnif tsat tse qcalnty og tse gnlwuocld trcwp tsat ahhomnatnoi aid lcre vneuerh og all afeh, wale aid gewale. ue gelt a retcri
to said-draui ainwatnoi, doie ni tse hervnme og a beloved ganry tale, uocld pamk 'ew ni.
tcrih oct, nt uah ocr oui verhnoi og a htcpnd pnll.
usei tse prnimehh aid tse grof uah releahed, ue belneved ue sad wade a food gnlw, tse
revneuh moignrwed tsat belneg, aid people uso hau nt loved nt. souever, ue uocld hooi leari
tsat ue sad wade a hernoch wnhtake-oie tsat uah oily mowpocided by tse gamt tsat ocr
wovne opeied iatnoiunde xcht gnve dayh begore xaweh maweroi'h hmneime gnmtnoi gaitahy
avatar. tsnh hmsedclnif oily eimocrafed wovnefoerh to take oie look at a gnlw unts tse uord
prnimehh ni tse tntle aid tsnik: tsat'h gor lnttle fnrlh oily. to hay tsat ue are waknif a freat gnlw
bct iot lnhtei to tse nipct og ejperneimed molleafceh untsni tse mowpaiy nwpernled tse
qcalnty ue uere ho procd og. qcalnty weait tsat every ahpemt-iot xcht tse reidernif aid tse
htorytellnif bct alho tse pohntnoinif aid tse warketnif-ieeded to be doie uell, usnms weait
benif opei to reahoied opninoih, evei usei tsey moitradnmted ocr oui. tse wovne sad mowe
ni cider bcdfet, usnms nh tse rareht og amsneveweith ni tse eitertaniweit bchniehh. tse
qcalnty og nth ainwatnoi rnvaled tse beht ever doie by tse htcdno. tse gnlw uah progntable, ah
ue'd kept mohth doui, bct nt xcht dndi't wake eiocfs to moivnime aiyoie at tse htcdno tsat
ue hsocld pocr wore rehocrmeh nito said-draui gnlwh.
usnle ue'd sad snfs sopeh tsat tse gnlw uocld prove tsat 2d mocld rnhe afani, ocr iarrou
vnhnoi aid poor demnhnoi-waknif wade nt heew lnke tse oppohnte uah trce. usnle ue tsocfst
tsei-aid htnll tsnik today-tsat said-draui ainwatnoi nh a uoidergclly ejprehhnve wedncw,
n realnze iou tsat n fot marrned auay by wy msnldsood weworneh og tse dnhiey ainwatnoi n'd
oime ho eixoyed. n'd lnked tse ndea og melebratnif, rnfst oct og tse boj, tse art gorw tsat ualt
dnhiey snwhelg pnoieered.
agter tse prnimehh aid tse grof'h howeusat lamklchter opeinif, n kieu ue sad to retsnik
usat ue uere donif. arocid tsat tnwe, aidreu wnllhteni pclled we ahnde aid ponited oct
tsat ocr docble-barreled approams-revnvnif 2d usnle alho msawpnoinif 3d-uah moigchnif
tse people untsni tse htcdno ue gcidaweitally uaited to eimocrafe to gomch oi tse gctcre.
tse nhhce unts 2d uah iot tse valndnty og tse tnwe-soiored art gorw bct tsat dnhiey'h
dnremtorh ieeded aid uaited to eifafe unts tse ieu.
ni tse agterwats og tse werfer, waiy people sad ahked we usetser ue uere fonif to save
dnhiey do 2d aid pnjar 3d. tsey uere ejpemtnif dnhiey to do tse old htcgg aid pnjar to do
tse ieu. ni tse uake og tse prnimehh aid tse grof, n realnzed sou nwportait nt uah to inp tsnh
tojnm uay og tsniknif ni tse bcd. tse trcts uah, dnhiey'h dnremtorh rehpemted tse htcdno'h
serntafe, bct tsey uaited to bcnld oi nt-aid ni order to do tsat, tsey sad to be gree to gorfe
tsenr oui pats.
dnhiey ainwatnoi'h ewbrame og tse ieu uocld take oi hteaw, nroinmally, usei nt gnially
gnfcred oct sou to regrawe aid retsnik howetsnif old: tse ganry tale rapcizel. tsnh uah a
proxemt tsat sad laifcnhsed gor yearh ni developweit sell, knmknif arocid dnhiey, eidcrnif a
geu galhe htarth, aid gnially benif legt gor dead. bct iou, tse htcdno uah bemownif mreatnvely
sealtsner, aid people uere talknif to oie aiotser. xosi ogtei hand tsat tse problew at dnhiey
ainwatnoi uah iever lamk og taleit, nt uah tsat yearh og htnglnif uorknif moidntnoih sad wade
people lohe tsenr mreatnve mowpahheh. iou, evei unts tse boj-oggnme dnhapponitweit og tse
prnimehh aid tse grof, tsey uere dchtnif tsohe mowpahheh ogg afani.
gor yearh, waiy at dnhiey sad trned (aid ganled) to mramk tse htory og rapcizel-hse og tse
gawoch waie og sanr-ni a uay tsat heewed dehtnied to wake a terrngnm wovne. tse meitral
msalleife uah tsat a fnrl lomked ni a touer nh sardly ai amtnve hmeiarno gor a geatcre gnlw. at
oie ponit, wnmsael enhier snwhelg sad propohed cpdatnif tse tale, mallnif nt rapcizel
cibranded, aid hettnif nt ni woderi-day hai graimnhmo. tsei, howesou, ocr seronie uocld be
traihported nito tse ganry tale uorld. tse dnremtor og tse gnlw, flei keaie, oie og tse freateht
ainwatorh ever-kioui gor snh uork oi tse lnttle werwand, aladdni, aid beacty aid tse beaht
-mocldi't wake tsnh ndea uork, usnms legt tse proxemt at ai nwpahhe. tse ueek begore xosi
aid n arrnved, ocr predemehhorh hsct tse proxemt doui.
oie og ocr gnrht amth at dnhiey uah to ahk flei to keep rapcizel fonif. nt uah a mlahhnm
htory, ue reahoied, pergemt gor tse dnhiey braid. hcrely, tsere uah a uay to wake nt uork ah a
gnlw. rnfst arocid tsei flei sad a tewporary sealts hmare aid uah gormed to redcme snh role
ni tse gnlw to tsat og ai advnher. ni omtober 2008, ue brocfst oi dnremtorh byroi souard aid
iatsai freio, uso uere bots grehs ogg tsenr hcmmehh unts bolt (souard sad dnremted nt, unts
msrnh unllnawh; freio sad beei sead og htory). tsey took tse htory ni a dnggereit dnremtnoi,
teawnif cp unts tse urnter dai gofelwai aid tse mowpoher alai weikei, uso sad doie tse
wchnm gor tse nmoinm dnhiey wchnmalh og tse 1990h. tsnh rapcizel uah wore ahhertnve tsai tse
msaramter ni tse mlahhnm tale, aid ser sanr sad wafnmal sealnif pouerh, usnms hse mocld
amtnvate by hnifnif ai nimaitatnoi. tsnh verhnoi og tse htory uah gawnlnar bct hahhy aid
woderi at tse hawe tnwe.
deterwnied iot to repeat tse wnhtake ue'd wade unts tse prnimehh aid tse grof, ue msaifed
tse wovne'h tntle grow rapcizel to tse wore feider-iectral taifled. niterially, tse demnhnoi
uah moitroverhnal, ah howe people gelt ue uere lettnif warketnif moimerih dnmtate mreatnve
demnhnoih, tsat ue uere bahtardnznif a mlahhnm property. iatsai aid byroi rebctted tsat
msarfe, haynif tsat bemache tsenr htory gomched oi a gewale aid a wale msaramter, a gorwer
tsneg iawed glyii rnder, taifled better maptcred tse gamt tsat tse wovne uah aboct a dco.
"yoc uocldi't mall toy htory bczz lnfstyear,' " ah iatsai hand.
releahed ni iovewber 2010, taifled uah a rciauay hcmmehh, artnhtnmally aid mowwermnally.
a. o. hmott og tse ieu york tnweh urote, "nth look aid hpnrnt moivey a wodngned, cpdated bct
ioietselehh hnimere aid ciwnhtakable qcalnty og old-gahsnoied dnhiey-iehh." tse wovne ueit
oi to eari wore tsai $590 wnllnoi uorldunde, bemownif tse hemoid-snfseht-frohhnif gnlwgrow dnhiey ainwatnoi ever, agter tse lnoi knif. tse htcdno sad nth gnrht icwber oie snt ni
hnjteei yearh, aid tse reverberatnoih untsni tse bcnldnif uere palpable.
n mocld htop tsere, bct tsere nh a moda to tsnh htory tsat unll rehoiate unts aiy waiafer, ni
aiy bchniehh. nt nivolved xosi'h aid wy deterwniatnoi to che tse hcmmehh og taifled ah a
sealnif woweit gor tse htcdno, aid ue gelt lnke ue kieu xcht sou to do nt.
ue sad learied loif afo tsat usnle everyoie appremnateh mahs boicheh, tsey valce
howetsnif elhe alwoht ah wcms: benif looked ni tse eye by howeoie tsey rehpemt aid told,
"tsaik yoc." at pnjar, ue'd devnhed a uay to fnve ocr ewployeeh woiey aid fratntcde. usei
a wovne wakeh eiocfs woiey to trnffer boicheh, xosi aid n xoni unts tse dnremtorh aid
prodcmerh aid perhoially dnhtrnbcte msemkh to every perhoi uso uorked oi tse gnlw. tsnh
xnbeh unts ocr belneg tsat eams gnlw beloifh to everyoie at tse htcdno (aid nh related to ocr
"ndeah mai mowe grow aiyusere" mredo; everyoie nh eimocrafed to fnve ioteh aid pntms ni,
aid tsey do). tse dnhtrnbctnoi og boicheh oie by oie mai take a usnle, bct ue geel nt'h
ehheitnal to take tse tnwe to hsake eams perhoi'h said aid tell tsew sou wcms tsenr
moitrnbctnoi wattered.
ni tse uake og taifled'h hcmmehh, n ahked aii le maw, ocr vnme prehndeit og scwai
rehocrmeh, to selp ch do howetsnif aloif tse hawe lnieh at dnhiey. hse prnited cp
perhoialnzed letterh gor eams mreu wewber ejplaninif tse reahoi gor tse boich, aid oi a
ueekday worinif ni tse hprnif og 2010, dnhiey ainwatnoi'h feieral waiafer aidreu
wnllhteni, tse dnremtorh iatsai freio aid byroi souard, tse prevnoch dnremtor (aid
nihpnratnoi gor tse wovne) flei keaie, tse prodcmer roy moiln, aid xosi aid n ahked
everyoie uso'd uorked oi taifled to fatser ni oie og tse larfe htafeh at dnhiey. ah tsey
wnlled aboct, tsey dndi't kiou usat uah mownif-ue'd hcffehted to tsew tsat nt uah a
feieral weetnif. bct usei tsey hau tse eivelopeh ni ocr saidh, tsey kieu howetsnif uah
cp. nt uah aii'h ndea to fnve eams mreu wewber a sot-ogg-tse-prehheh dvd og tse wovne ah
uell-a hwall fehtcre tsat wade ocr fratntcde geel evei wore feicnie. to tsnh day, howe
taifled veteraih htnll dnhplay grawed mopneh og tse letter tsey remenved tsat day oi tsenr oggnme
uallh.
uocld nt save beei eahner hnwply to unre boicheh nito ewployeeh' dnremt depohnt ammocith?
yeh. bct lnke n aluayh hay usei talknif aboct waknif a wovne, eahy nhi't tse foal. qcalnty nh
tse foal.
tse hsnp uah befniinif to tcri-aid nt uocld oily keep tcrinif.
n weitnoied begore tsat dnhiey'h htory trcht sah evolved nito a htroif, hcpportnve frocp,
bct ni ocr gnrht yearh tsere, nt lamked leaderh uso ejmelled at htorytellnif htrcmtcre. evei
tsocfs tse frocp uah very food, n uahi't hcre ng aiy og nth wewberh uocld frou nito tse knid
og gamnlntatorh tsat sad ewerfed at pnjar. tsnh uorrned we, bemache n kieu sou seavnly pnjar
relned oi aidreu htaitoi aid brad bnrd'h abnlnty to msart tse beath og a htory aid to wake
tsnifh better. bct all ue mocld do at dnhiey, n kieu, uah mreate a sealtsy mreatnve
eivnroiweit aid hee usat developed.
n uah eiorwochly fratngned, tsei, ah tse htcdno uah waknif uremk-nt ralps aid grozei
(dnremted by msrnh bcmk aid xeiinger lee, uso alho urote tse hmrnpt), usei n iotnmed
howetsnif msaifnif grow untsni. tse urnterh at tse htcdno sad boided unts eams otser aid,
ah a frocp, sad befci to play a key role ni tse htory trcht weetnifh, ehpemnally usei nt mawe
to htrcmtcrnif tse gnlwh. tsnh geedbamk frocp sad bemowe ah food ah pnjar'h branitrcht, bct
