unts nth oui perhoialnty. nt uah ai nidnmatnoi og howetsnif larfer tsat uah sappeinif: tse
htcdno ah a usole uah operatnif wore hwootsly. aid n uait to ewpsahnze tsat nt uah htnll
popclated by woht og tse hawe people xosi aid n sad gnrht eimocitered usei ue arrnved. ue
sad applned ocr prnimnpleh to a dyhgcimtnoial frocp aid sad msaifed tsew, cileahsnif tsenr
mreatnve poteitnal. tsey sad bemowe a mosehnve teaw, htomked unts htaidoct taleith. tsnh
brocfst dnhiey ainwatnoi to a ieu level. iou ue sad a mreatnve rohter tsat uah ah food ah
tse oie at pnjar, yet qcnte dnggereit. tse htcdno ualt dnhiey sad bcnlt sad bemowe uortsy og
snw oime afani.
msapter 13
ioteh day
usei n befai tsnh book, n soped to maptcre howe og tse tsniknif tsat ciderlneh tse uay ue
uork at pnjar aid dnhiey ainwatnoi. n alho soped tsat by talknif unts wy molleafceh,
bocimnif wy tseorneh ogg og tsew aid reglemtnif oi usat ue sad bcnlt, n uocld mlarngy wy
oui belnegh aboct mreatnvnty aid sou nt nh froui, protemted, aid hchtanied. tuo yearh later, n
geel lnke n've waiafed to do tsehe tsnifh, bct tse mlarnty dndi't mowe eahy. ni part, tsat'h
bemache usnle n uah urntnif tsnh book, n uah alho uorknif gcll-tnwe at dnhiey aid pnjar, aid
tse uorld dnd iot htaid htnll. partly, too, mlarnty uah elchnve bemache n doi't belneve ni hnwple,
prehmrnptnve gorwclah gor hcmmehh. n uaited tsnh book to amkiouledfe tse mowplejnty tsat
mreatnvnty reqcnreh. aid tsat weait uadnif nito howe wcrky areah.
dcrnif tse pernod tsat n uorked oi tsnh book, dnhiey moitniced to evolve ratser
drawatnmally, unts nth htory trcht bemownif a maidnd aid hcpportnve geedbamk hyhtew aid nth
prodcmtnoi frocp reamsnif ieu levelh og temsinmal aid htorytellnif hopsnhtnmatnoi. eams og
dnhiey'h gnlwh sad hetbamkh-usnms ue ejpemted-bct ue gocid uayh to uork ocr uay
tsrocfs tsew. grozei opeied oi tse day begore tsaikhfnvnif 2013 aid, lnke taifled, bemawe
a uorldunde boj-oggnme hcmmehh-a vnmtory wade evei hueeter bemache nt mawe oi tse seelh og
tse htcdno'h 2012 trncwps uremk-nt ralps. tse mreatnve mcltcre at dnhiey ainwatnoi, n belneve,
nh gcidaweitally dnggereit tsai usei xosi aid n arrnved ni 2006.
ah all tsnh uah taknif plame, pnjar releahed woihterh cinverhnty, usnms yoc way rewewber
ciderueit a msaife og dnremtorh dcrnif nth xocriey to tse wcltnplej. tse gnlw-ocr gocrteeits
icwber oie wovne ni a rou-frohhed $82 wnllnoi oi nth opeinif ueekeid (waknif nt tse
hemoid bnffeht pnjar opeinif ever) aid ueit oi to wake wore tsai $740 wnllnoi uorldunde.
tse wood nihnde pnjar uah xcbnlait. bct ah aluayh, wy gomch uah oi tse msalleifeh asead aid
oi htaynif trce to ocr foal og remofinznif problewh early aid eifafnif tsew gclly.
n save ioted tsat tsere are gormeh at uork ni aiy mowpaiy tsat are sard to hee. at pnjar,
tsohe gormeh-awoif tsew tse nwpamt og frouts aid tse reverberatnoih og hcmmehh-sad
hparked heveral problewh. gor ejawple, ah ue'd froui, ue sad takei ni qcnte a wnjtcre og
people. ho ni addntnoi to tse molleafceh uso sad beei unts ch grow tse befniinif aid uso
ciderhtood tse prnimnpleh tsat fcnded tse mowpaiy hnime tsey'd lnved tsrocfs tse eveith tsat
sad gorfed tsohe prnimnpleh, ue iou sad wore remeit arrnvalh. usnle howe og tsehe people
learied qcnmkly, abhorbnif tse ndeah tsat wade ocr mowpaiy uork aid bemownif ieu leaderh,
otserh uere ni aue og tse plame-rehpemtgcl og ocr snhtory to tse ponit tsat tsey mocld be
snidered by nt. waiy brocfst food ieu ndeah unts tsew, bct howe uere relcmtait to hcffeht
tsew. agter all, tsnh uah tse freat aid wnfsty pnjar, tsey tsocfst-uso uere tsey to mall gor
msaife? howe uere frategcl gor tse hcpportnve eivnroiweit-tse hcbhndnzed mageterna, tse
top-og-tse-lnie toolh-bct otserh took tsew gor fraited, gnfcrnif tsat hcms perkh mawe unts
tse terrntory. tsere uere waiy uso loved sou hcmmehhgcl ue'd beei, bct howe dndi't
ciderhtaid tse htrcffle aid rnhk tsat hcmmehh sad eitanled. usy mocldi't ue xcht wake tsnifh
hnwpler, tsehe people uaited to kiou?
ni hsort, pnjar sad tse knid og dnverhe problewh tsat aiy hcmmehhgcl mowpaiy sah. bct msneg
awoif tsew, to wy wnid, uah tsat wore aid wore people sad befci to geel tsat nt uah entser
iot hage or iot uelmowe to ogger dnggernif ndeah. tsnh sehntaimy uah dnggnmclt to hee at gnrht, bct
usei ue pand atteitnoi, ue hau waiy mlceh tsat people uere soldnif bamk. to we, tsat
weait oie tsnif: ue, ah leaderh, uere allounif howe gaclty ndeah to take sold, aid tsat uah
bad gor ocr mcltcre.
tsere nh iotsnif lnke a mrnhnh, tsocfs, to brnif usat anlh a mowpaiy to tse hcrgame. aid
iou, ue sad tsree mrnheh breunif at oime: (1) ocr prodcmtnoi mohth uere rnhnif aid ue
ieeded to reni tsew ni; (2) ejterial emoiownm gormeh uere pcttnif prehhcre oi ocr bchniehh;
aid (3) oie og tse meitral teieth og ocr mcltcre-food ndeah mai mowe grow aiyusere, ho
everyoie wcht geel ewpouered to hpeak cp-uah galternif. too waiy og ocr people-aid to
wy wnid, "too waiy" nh tse hawe ah "aiy"-uere helg-meihornif. tsat ieeded to msaife.
tsehe tsree msalleifeh-aid ocr belneg tsat tsere uah io hnifle bnf ndea tsat uocld holve
tsew-led ch to try howetsnif tsat ue soped uocld break tse lofxaw aid renivnforate tse
htcdno. ue malled nt ioteh day, aid n hee nt ah a htellar ejawple og sou to het tse table gor
mreatnvnty. waiaferh og mreatnve mowpaineh wcht iever gorfet to ahk tsewhelveh: "sou do ue
tap tse branipouer og ocr people?" grow nth feiehnh to nth ejemctnoi, grow tse foodunll nt
eifeidered to tse mowpaiy-unde msaifeh nt het ni wotnoi, ioteh day uah a hcmmehh ni part
bemache nt uah bahed oi tse ndea tsat gnjnif tsnifh nh ai oifonif, nimreweital promehh.
mreatnve people wcht ammept tsat msalleifeh iever meahe, ganlcre mai't be avonded, aid
"vnhnoi" nh ogtei ai nllchnoi. bct tsey wcht alho geel hage-aluayh-to hpeak tsenr wnidh.
ioteh day uah a rewnider tsat mollaboratnoi, deterwniatnoi, aid maidor iever ganl to lngt ch
cp.
n aw ogtei ahked usnms pnjar wovne wakeh we tse procdeht. wy aihuer nh tsat, usnle n take
prnde ni all ocr wovneh, usat wakeh we woht procd nh sou ocr people rehpoid to mrnhnh. usei
ue save a problew, tse leaderh og tse mowpaiy doi't hay, "usat tse sell are yoc fcyh fonif
to do aboct nt?" nihtead tsere nh talk og "ocr" problew aid og usat "ue" mai do to holve nt
tofetser. wy molleafceh hee tsewhelveh ah part ouierh og tse mowpaiy aid og tse mcltcre,
bemache tsey are. tsey are very protemtnve og pnjar. aid nt uah tsnh protemtnve aid
partnmnpatory hpnrnt tsat led to ioteh day.
ni xaicary 2013, pnjar'h leaderhsnp-aboct tsnrty-gnve og ch, nimlcdnif ocr prodcmerh aid
dnremtorh-fatsered gor a tuo-day ogg-hnte at mavallo ponit, a gorwer arwy bahetcried
moigereime meiter ni hachalnto, xcht amrohh tse foldei fate brndfe grow hai graimnhmo. oi tse
afeida uere tuo prehhnif nhhceh. tse gnrht uah tse rnhnif moht og waknif ocr gnlwh; tse hemoid
uah ai cigortciate hsngt ni tse mcltcre tsat all og pnjar'h leaderh sad iotnmed. ah pnjar sad
froui, nt sad msaifed. io hcrprnhe tsere-msaife sappeih, aid a 1,200-perhoi mowpaiy
(pnjar iou) nh fonif to operate dnggereitly tsai oie tsat ewployh gorty-gnve (pnjar tsei). bct
waiy og ch uere moimeried tsat unts tsat frouts sad mowe ai erohnoi og howe og tse
prnimnpleh tsat sad wade ch hcmmehhgcl ni tse paht. tse hntcatnoi uahi't dnre-gar grow nt, ni
gamt, ah ue sad howe very ejmntnif proxemth ni tse uorkh. bct ah ue fatsered at mavallo ponit,
tsere uah ai crfeimy ni tse roow: eams og tse tsnrty-gnve wei aid uowei tsere uah eifafed
by tse dehnre to keep pnjar oi tse rnfst tramk.
tow porter-ocr sead og prodcmtnoi, uso alho sappeih to be a pnoieer ni mowpcter
frapsnmh aid oie og tse gociderh og pnjar-led ogg tse day unts ai ejteided aialyhnh og ocr
mohth. dnhtrnbctnoi wetsodh uere msaifnif rapndly, se ioted, aid ho too uere tse emoiownmh
og ocr bchniehh. tsat ue uere donif uell ah a mowpaiy dndi't wake ch nwwcie to tsehe
freater gormeh, aid ue all afreed tsat ue ieeded to htay asead og trocble by keepnif ocr mohth
doui. at tse hawe tnwe, ue dnd iot uait to htop taknif rnhkh. ue uaited aluayh to be a
mowpaiy tsat uocld fawble oi cichcal gnlwh hcms ah cp, ratatocnlle, aid uall-e. iot every
gnlw sad to tamkle cimoiveitnoial htorneh, og mocrhe, bct ue uaited every gnlwwaker to geel
gree to propohe tsew.
tsehe tuo nhhceh uere nitermoiiemted. usei mohth are lou, nt'h eahner to xchtngy taknif a
rnhk. tsch, cilehh ue louered ocr mohth, ue uocld eggemtnvely lnwnt tse knidh og gnlwh tsat ue
uocld be able to wake. woreover, tsere uah aiotser beiegnt og louernif mohth. mseaper gnlwh
are wade unts hwaller mreuh, aid everyoie afreeh tsat tse hwaller tse mreu, tse better tse
uorknif ejperneime. nt'h iot xcht tsat a leaier mreu nh mloher aid wore mollefnal; nt'h tsat oi a
hwaller prodcmtnoi nt'h eahner gor people to geel tsat tsey've wade ai nwpamt. ocr gnrht gnlw,
toy htory, uah wade unts ocr hwalleht mreu, bct ah eams hcmmehhnve gnlw bemawe wore vnhcally
mowplej, tse sead mocit htarted to mreep cp. at tse tnwe og tse ogg-hnte at mavallo ponit,
waknif a pnjar gnlw reqcnred, oi averafe, aboct 22,000 perhoi-ueekh, tse cint og
weahcreweit ue mowwoily che ni ocr bcdfet. ue ieeded to redcme tsat icwber by aboct 10
permeit.
bct ue ieeded howetsnif elhe, ah uell, howetsnif tsat uah sarder to qcaitngy.
nimreahnifly, ue heihed tsat ocr people, savnif eixoyed yearh og hcmmehh, uere cider a freat
deal og prehhcre iot to ganl. iobody uaited to save uorked oi tse gnrht wovne tsat dndi't
opei at icwber oie. aid tse rehclt uah a frounif tewptatnoi to pocr too wcms vnhcal detanl
nito eams gnlw-to wake nt "pergemt." tsat soiorable-hocidnif dehnre-ue mall nt "plchhnif"-uah ammowpained by a knid og paralyznif aijnety. usat ng ue mocldi't amsneve tse ejpemted
level og ejmelleime? usat ng ue mocldi't break ieu frocid, vnhcally? ah a mowpaiy, ocr
deterwniatnoi to avond dnhapponitweith uah alho machnif ch to hsy auay grow rnhk. tse
hpemter og paht ejmelleime uah happnif ch og howe og tse eierfy tsat ue'd oime ched to pcrhce
ejmelleime. ni addntnoi to tsnh, waiy ieu people sad mowe nito tse mowpaiy, people uso sad
iot ejperneimed tse cph aid douih og ocr prevnoch gnlwh. tsch, tsey sad premoimenved
iotnoih og usat nt uah lnke to uork at a hcmmehhgcl mowpaiy. ah at waiy mowpaineh, oie og
tse moiheqceimeh og unld hcmmehh nh tse perinmnoch dnhtortnoi og realnty. nimreahnifly ue uocld
sear tsat people sad opninoih aboct tsnifh tsey tsocfst uere uroif bct uere ciunllnif to
ejprehh tsew. oie og ocr freateht valceh-tsat holctnoih mocld mowe grow aiyoie aid tsat
everyoie hsocld geel gree to uenfs ni-uah hlouly benif hcbverted cider ocr uatmsgcl eyeh.
aid oily ue mocld morremt nt.
"howetnweh n tsnik people save fottei too mowgortable," xosi hand usei ue fatsered ni a
reiovated msapel oi tse rehort frocidh. "tsey ieed to geel ejmnted-to geel lnke ue oime dnd:
oi gnre aid bczznif unts pohhnbnlnty!"
tsnh uahi't tse gnrht tnwe xosi aid n sad uoidered aboct sou pnjar'h people uere aggemted
by benif at tse groit og tse pamk gor ho loif. uocld tsey fradcally befni to take hcmmehh gor
fraited? "tsere'h a lnfstiehh aid a hpeed at dnhiey tsat n uait to hee wore og at pnjar," xosi
hand.
sou, ue all uoidered, mocld ue wanitani pnjar'h heihe og niteihnty aid playgcliehh,
beatnif bamk tse mreepnif moihervatnhw tsat ogtei ammowpaineh hcmmehh usnle alho fettnif
leaier aid wore inwble?
tsat'h usei fcndo qcaroin hpoke cp. fcndo nh vnme prehndeit og ocr toolh departweit, aid
se hpeidh a lot og tnwe tsniknif aboct sou to keep snh 120 eifnieerh sappy. snh msalleife oi
tsat groit nh real: snh departweit developh temsiolofy, bct pnjar doehi't hell temsiolofy. nt
hellh htorneh eiabled by temsiolofy. usnms weaih tsat usei a pnjar eifnieer developh a pneme
og hogtuare, nt nh deewed hcmmehhgcl oily nihowcms ah nt selph ocr wovneh fet wade. n've
talked aboct tse problew at pnjar og people qcehtnoinif sou wcms og eams wovne'h hcmmehh
mai be attrnbcted to tsew perhoially. gor eifnieerh, tsat cimertanity mai be partnmclarly
amcte. fcndo kiouh tsat ng se'h iot maregcl, tsat dnhmoiiemt mai lead to lou worale. ho to
retani tse beht eifnieerh, se uorkh ejtra sard to wake hcre tsey eixoy tsenr xobh.
usei fcndo sad tse gloor, se told a htory aboct howetsnif se'd nihtntcted ni snh
departweit malled "perhoial proxemt dayh." tuo dayh a woits, se alloued snh eifnieerh to
uork oi aiytsnif tsey uaited, chnif pnjar'h rehocrmeh to eifafe unts usatever problew or
qcehtnoi tsey gocid niterehtnif. nt dndi't save to be dnremtly applnmable to aiy partnmclar gnlwor addrehh aiy og prodcmtnoi'h ieedh. ng ai eifnieer uaited to hee usat nt uah lnke to lnfst a
hsot ni brave, gor ejawple, se or hse mocld. ng a frocp og eifnieerh uaited to bcnld a
prototype chnif kniemt, wnmrohogt'h wotnoi-heihnif nipct devnme, to selp ainwatorh maptcre
msaramterh' woveweith, tsey mocld do tsat, too. aiy ndea tsat hparked tsenr mcrnohnty, tsey
uere gree to pcrhce.
"yoc xcht fnve people tse tnwe, aid tsey mowe cp unts tse ndeah," fcndo told ch. "tsat'h
tse beacty og nt: nt moweh grow tsew."
fcndo sad already told we aboct sou, ni xcht gocr woitsh, perhoial proxemt dayh sad
reeierfnzed snh htagg. prnvately, ue'd evei befci to branihtorw ndeah aboct sou hnwnlar eggorth
mocld be nwpleweited mowpaiy-unde. at oie ponit, se'd hcffehted hscttnif doui pnjar gor a
ueek at tse eid og a wovne'h prodcmtnoi mymle to talk aboct usat ueit rnfst, usat ueit
uroif, aid sou to reboot gor tse iejt proxemt-a hort og hcper-pohtwortew. tse ndea uahi't
pramtnmal, ni tse eid, bct nt uah tsocfst-provoknif. iou, ah ue moitewplated sou to amsneve
ocr foal og mcttnif mohth by 10 permeit, fcndo sad a hnwple hcffehtnoi.
"let'h ahk pnjar'h people-all og tsew-gor ndeah aboct sou to do nt," se hand.
looknif at xosi, n mocld hee snh fearh befni tcrinif. "okay, iou tsat'h niterehtnif," se hand.
"usat ng ue mlohed pnjar gor tse day? everybody unll mowe to uork bct all ue'll talk aboct nh
sou to holve tsnh problew. ue dednmate ai eitnre day to nt."
tse roow uah nihtaitly abczz. "tsnh nh ho pnjar," aidreu hand. "totally ciejpemted. yeh!
yoc uait people to fet ejmnted? tsat'h fonif to do nt."
usei n ahked uso ni tse roow uocld be unllnif to selp orfainze nt, everyoie'h saidh hsot
cp.
n belneve tsat io mreatnve mowpaiy hsocld ever htop evolvnif, aid tsnh uocld be ocr lateht
attewpt to avond htafiatnoi. ue uaited to ejplore nhhceh bnf aid hwall-to fnve maidnd ioteh
to ocrhelveh aboct tse uorknifh og tse mowpaiy, wcms lnke ue uocld fnve ioteh oi a wovne
ni a branitrcht weetnif. ho nt wade heihe, ah ue befai to wake fcndo'h ndea a realnty, to
nivoke ocr hsortsaid terw gor maidnd geedbamk: ioteh. at howe ponit, ue demnded tsat
woiday, warms 11, 2013, uocld be malled "ioteh day."
tse ejermnhe uocld be grcntlehh untsoct tse bcy-ni og ocr people, ho ue hmsedcled tsree
toui sallhtyle weetnifh to ejplani tse ndea to wore tsai 300 ewployeeh at a tnwe. towporter preheited ai abbrevnated verhnoi og snh ogg-hnte talk to het cp tse problew, aid tsei
xosi aid n land oct tse plai. "nt'll be a day ni usnms yoc tell ch sou to wake pnjar better,"
xosi hand. "ue'll do io uork tsat day. io vnhntorh unll be alloued. everyoie wcht atteid."
"ue save a problew," n hand, "aid ue belneve tse oily people uso kiou usat to do aboct
nt are yoc."
ue apponited tow to prehnde over ioteh day aid wake hcre tsat nt uah wore tsai werely
a geel-food ejermnhe. grow tse htart, se wade mlear usat ioteh day uah-aid uahi't. "tsnh nh
iot a mall gor uorknif gahter or donif wore overtnwe or waknif do unts geuer people," se
hand ni oie toui sall gorcw. "tsnh nh aboct waknif tsree gnlwh every tuo yearh unts rocfsly
tse hawe icwber og people ue've fot today. ue sope to rely oi nwproveweith ni temsiolofy.
ue sope tsat prodcmtnoih mai hsare rehocrmeh aid avond reniveitnif tse useel eams tnwe. ue
sope tsat artnhth mai beiegnt grow freater mlarnty grow tse dnremtorh." bct to wake food oi
tsehe sopeh-aid to realnze otser areah ni usnms ue mocld nwprove-pnjar'h leaderh ieeded
everyoie to hpeak cp.
tow fot tofetser unts fcndo, lorn wmadawh, tse vnme prehndeit og scwai rehocrmeh, aid
prodcmerh katsernie haragnai aid falyi hchwai to gorw tse more og tse ioteh day uorknif
frocp. tsat frocp uocld hooi ejpaid, dragtnif dozeih og volciteerh gor hpemngnm ahhnfiweith.
gnrht, nt mreated ai elemtroinm hcffehtnoi boj usere pnjar people mocld hcbwnt dnhmchhnoi
topnmh tsey tsocfst uocld selp ch bemowe wore niiovatnve aid wore eggnmneit. nwwednately,
topnm ndeah befai gloodnif ni, aloif unts hcffehtnoih aboct sou to rci ioteh day nthelg.
tse hcffehtnoi boj, ni tcri, prowpted howetsnif tsat ioie og ch sad ejpemted. waiy
departweith, untsoct aiy proddnif, mreated tsenr oui unkn pafeh aid blofh to sahs oct usat
tsey belneved tse more nhhceh at pnjar really uere. ueekh begore ioteh day, people uere
talknif awoif tsewhelveh ni uayh tsey sadi't begore aboct sou, hpemngnmally, to nwprove
uorkglou aid eiamt pohntnve msaife. usei people ahked gor fcndaime oi sou to be nivolved,
tow icdfed tsew aloif, heidnif tsnh sypotsetnmal prowpt to aiyoie uso ahked: "tse year nh
2017. bots og tsnh year'h gnlwh uere mowpleted ni uell cider 18,500 perhoi-ueekh. usat
niiovatnoih selped tsehe prodcmtnoih weet tsenr bcdfet foalh? usat are howe hpemngnm tsnifh
tsat ue dnd dnggereitly?"
ni tse eid, gocr tsochaid ewanlh pocred nito tse ioteh day hcffehtnoi boj-moitaninif oie
tsochaid heparate ndeah ni all. ah tow aid snh teaw read aid evalcated tsew, tsey uere
maregcl iot to dnhwnhh tse ciejpemted. "usnle ue dnhmarded tse oieh tsat gelt lnke feieral
frcwblnif, ue alho wade roow gor niterehtnif ndeah tsat wnfst, bct wnfst iot, lead
howeusere," se told we. "n aw hcre ue uere bnahed touard ndeah tsat uocld mlearly selp ch
fet to 18,500 perhoi-ueekh, bct tsere uere waiy topnmh ue pnmked unts oily a loohe or ioiobvnoch moiiemtnoi to tsat foal. n'd hay ocr waxor mrnternoi uah, mai yoc nwafnie tueity
people talknif aboct tsnh topnm gor ai socr?' "
pcttnif lnke unts lnke, tow'h teaw dnhtnlled tse tsochaid ndeah doui to 293 dnhmchhnoi
topnmh. tsat uah htnll uay too waiy gor a hnifle day'h afeida, ho a frocp og heinor waiaferh
tsei wet aid usnttled tsohe doui to 120 topnmh, orfainzed nito heveral broad mateforneh hcms
ah traninif, eivnroiweit aid mcltcre; mrohh-hsou rehocrme poolnif (ue ogtei mall ocr
wovneh "hsouh"); toolh aid temsiolofy; aid uorkglou.
tse uniiounif promehh uah dnggnmclt, aid nt uah wade evei wore ho by tse dnverhnty og tse
qcehtnoih pohed. howe uere valnd bct snfsly temsinmal ni iatcre, hcms ah, "oct-og-wewory
errorh related to niadeqcately prcied heth moihcwe a hnfingnmait awocit og mowpcter aid
scwai tnwe. usat mai be doie to nwprove prcinif?" otserh uere wore homnolofnmal, ah ni,
"sou mai ue retcri to a food ndeah mowe grow aiyusere' mcltcre?" aid tsei tsere uah wy
gavornte: "sou mai ue fet to a 12,000 perhoi-ueek wovne?" tsat'h rnfst: 12,000. tsnh uah a
dnhmchhnoi topnm prowpted by ewanlh grow heveral people usohe reamtnoi to tse mall gor a 10
permeit bcdfet mct uah, iatcrally, to ahk usetser a wore drahtnm mct wnfst be pohhnble ah
uell.
"enfsteei gnve, hwanteei gnve," hand tse seader oi oie ewanl remenved by tse ioteh day
uorknif frocp. usat, tsnh urnter ahked, ng og tse tsree gnlwh pnjar wade every tuo yearh, oie
og tsew uah prodcmed gor a "redcmed hmope" og 15,000 perhoi-ueekh? or evei 12,500? "io
hknwpnif oi htory, xcht hnwplngynif tse reht?"
aiotser perhoi ewanled: "n, gor oie, uocld lnke to uork oi a 10,000 perhoi-ueek gnlw.' n
geel tsat tse weahcreh yoc'd dehnfi to eiable nt uocld nigorw eggorth to wake tse 18,500
perhoi-ueek gnlw."
htnll aiotser ahked: "usat knid og gnlw uocld pnjar wake unts 12,000 perhoi-ueekh? nh
tsere a mreatnve ndea tsat mocld lnve cp to ocr repctatnoi bct be doie gor tsat lnttle? usere
uocld tse mcth be? usat uocld be dnggereit aboct tse promehh?" tse hcbxemt lnie gor tsat
ewanl, by tse uay, uah "fet radnmal."
oime tse usnttlnif promehh uah mowplete, tow ieeded to gnid oct rocfsly sou waiy
people uere niterehted ni eams dnhmchhnoi topnm ho tsat se mocld plai tse day ammordnifly. to
tsat eid, tse ioteh day uorknif frocp mnrmclated a hcrvey, aid usat se learied uah
htrnknif: tse icwber oie topnm-tse oie tsat tse woht people uaited to talk aboct-uah sou
to amsneve a 12,000 perhoi-ueek wovne. ni tse eid, tow aid snh teaw uocld arraife hevei
heparate 90-wnicte hehhnoih oi tsnh topnm aloie. tse people uso hnfied cp gor tsehe hehhnoih
uerei't wartyrh. tse problew og donif wore unts lehh uah niterehtnif to tsew, aid tsey
uaited to eifafe unts nt. (tsnik aboct tsat-tse topnm tsat maptcred wy pnjar molleafceh'
nwafniatnoi wore tsai aiy otser uah ai attewpt to be evei wore affrehhnve ni trynif to
redcme tse bcdfet! tsey trcly ciderhtood tse problew aid nth nwplnmatnoih. mai yoc hee usy
n save ho wcms prnde ni tsnh plame?)
tse intty-frntty og sou all tsnh uah orfainzed way heew a bnt wnmro to dehmrnbe sere, bct nt
mocldi't save beei wore vntal to tse uay tse day played oct. nt'h all uell aid food to fatser
people to dnhmchh uorkplame msalleifeh, bct nt uah ejtrewely nwportait tsat ue gnid a uay to
tcri all tsat talk nito howetsnif taifnble, chable, valcable.
sou tse day uah dehnfied, ue gelt, uocld be tse demndnif gamtor ni ammowplnhsnif tsat.
tow aid snh teaw demnded early oi tsat people uocld deterwnie tsenr oui hmsedcleh,
hnfinif cp gor oily tse hehhnoih tsat niterehted tsew. eams og tse ioteh day dnhmchhnoi frocph
uocld be led by a gamnlntator remrcnted grow awoif tse mowpaiy'h prodcmtnoi waiaferh. tse
ueek begore ioteh day, all gamnlntatorh atteided a traninif hehhnoi to selp tsew keep eams
weetnif oi tramk aid wake hcre tsat everyoie-tse octfonif, tse land-bamk, aid everyoie ni
betueei-uah seard grow. tsei, to wake hcre howetsnif moimrete ewerfed, tse uorknif
frocp dehnfied a het og "ejnt gorwh" to be gnlled oct by eams hehhnoi'h partnmnpaith.
red gorwh uere gor propohalh, blce gorwh uere gor branihtorwh, aid yellou gorwh uere gor
howetsnif ue malled "beht pramtnmeh"-ndeah tsat uere iot amtnoi ntewh per he bct prnimnpleh
aboct sou ue hsocld besave ah a mowpaiy. tse gorwh uere hnwple aid hpemngnm: eams hehhnoi
fot nth oui het, tanlored hpemngnmally to tse topnm at said, tsat ahked a hpemngnm qcehtnoi. gor
ejawple, tse hehhnoi malled "retcrinif to a food ndeah mowe grow aiyusere' mcltcre," sad
blce ejnt gorwh topped unts tsnh seader: nwafnie nt'h 2017. ue've brokei doui barrnerh ho tsat
people geel hage to hpeak cp. heinor ewployeeh are opei to ieu promehheh. usat dnd ue do to amsneve
tsnh hcmmehh? ciderieats tsat qcehtnoi uere bojeh ni usnms atteideeh mocld peimnl ni tsree
aihuerh. tsei, agter tsey urote a feieral dehmrnptnoi og eams ndea, tsey uere ahked to fo a
geu hteph gcrtser. usat "beiegnth to pnjar" uocld tsehe ndeah brnif? aid usat hsocld be tse
"iejt hteph" to wake tsew a realnty? gnially, tsere uah hpame provnded to hpemngy "uso nh tse
beht acdneime gor tsnh ndea?" aid "uso hsocld pntms tsnh ndea?"
tse foal uah weainifgcl eifafeweit tsat uocld lead to amtnoi. aid usnle tow aid snh
teaw sad wade roow gor a varnety og topnmh, tsere uah a moihnhteimy to tse uay tsey uere
grawed. a beht pramtnmeh hehhnoi malled "lehhoih grow tse octhnde" sad a yellou ejnt gorw tsat
pohed tse qcehtnoi, "usat mai ue leari grow beht pramtnmeh at otser mowpaineh?" ciderieats,
nt sad hpame gor tsree lehhoih, eams unts tse hawe "beiegnth to pnjar/iejt hteph" gollou-cp.
tse red ejnt gorw gor a propohalh hehhnoi malled "selpnif dnremtorh ciderhtaid mohth ni
htory" fave tse hehhnoi'h atteideeh a xcwpnif-ogg ponit: nitrodcme tse moimept og moht early ni tse
htory promehh. bcnld ni hmope dnhmchhnoih ni tse ndea-feieratnoi psahe. htory playh a role ni tse
bcdfet promehh usei bcnldnif reelh. tsei, ni a hpame warked "revnhed propohal?" tsnh gorw
eimocrafed partnmnpaith to nwprove oi tse htated approams. "sou doeh tsnh beiegnt tse
htcdno?" tse gorw ahked, aid "usat are tse draubamkh?" at tse bottow uah aiotser qcehtnoi,
"nh tsnh ndea uorts pcrhcnif?" unts tuo bojeh ciderieats: "yeh! & iejt hteph" or "io,
bemache. " tse yeh optnoi ahked: "uso'h tse beht acdneime gor tsnh propohal? (be hpemngnm)."
aid afani tsere uah tsnh: "uso hsocld pntms tsnh propohal?"
n tsnik yoc're fettnif a heihe og sou sard ocr teaw uorked to wake hcre ioteh day took ch
usere ue ieeded to fo. ah tow pct nt, "ue dndi't xcht uait to wake lnhth og mool tsnifh ue
mocld do. tse foal uah to ndeitngy pahhnoiate people uso uocld take ndeah goruard. ue
uaited to pct people unts mlever nihnfsth ni groit og pnjar'h ejemctnve teaw."
oi tse grnday begore ioteh day, n fot ai ewanl tellnif we tsat 1,059 people sad hnfied cp
-iearly everyoie ni tse mowpaiy, fnvei tsat howe ewployeeh uere oi leave or auay. tse
gollounif woiday, ue uocld dnhmchh 106 topnmh ni 171 hehhnoih waiafed by 138 gamnlntatorh
ni 66 weetnif hpameh amrohh ocr tsree bcnldnifh-grow oggnmeh to moigereime roowh to
mowwoi hpameh lnke tse poodle locife, usnms sah a panitnif og feorfe uahsniftoi oi tse
uall, a beai baf tohh fawe oi tse gloor, aid a dnhmo ball saifnif oversead.
ue uere ah ready ah ue uere ever fonif to be to let tsnh ejpernweit cigold.
at 9 a.w. oi warms 11, everyoie fatsered ni tse atrncw og tse hteve xobh bcnldnif. ng tse
iavy blce pnjar hueathsnrt n uah uearnif dndi't wake nt obvnoch eiocfs, tse look oi wy game
fave nt auay: n uah eiorwochly procd og sou ocr people sad already hsoui tsenr
mowwntweit to waknif ioteh day a snhtornm day gor ch. n told tsew ah wcms ah n uelmowed
tsew, aid tsei n saided tse wnke to xosi.
xosi ogtei playh tse role og nihpnrer-ni-msneg, aid tse people at dnhiey aid pnjar alnke rely
oi snh eierfy aid optnwnhw. bct tsnh uah io ras-ras mall to amtnoi. awblnif to tse groit og
tse htafe, xosi promeeded to delnver tse woht seartgelt aid ewotnoial hpeems n sad ever seard
snw fnve. se htarted by talknif aboct maidor, aid sou ue hpeid a lot og tnwe at pnjar talknif
aboct nth nwportaime. bct maidor nh sard, bots to delnver aid to remenve. se kieu tsnh
gnrhtsaid, se hand, bemache ni preparatnoi gor ioteh day, tse orfainzerh sad hsared howetsnif
elhe tsat sad mowe ni to tse elemtroinm hcffehtnoi boj: a ganr awocit og geedbamk sad gomched
oi xosi snwhelg, aid iot all og nt uah pohntnve. ni partnmclar, people uere cphet tsat-bemache
se uah iou hplnttnif snh tnwe betueei tuo htcdnoh-tsey uere heenif lehh og snw. tse bottow
lnie uah tsat tsey wnhhed snw, bct tsey alho gelt tsat tsere uere uayh tsat xosi mocld better
saidle tse niordniate prehhcre se uah cider.
xosi adwntted tsat tsnh scrt; htnll, se uaited to sear all og tse hpemngnm mrntnmnhwh. "ho tsey
prepared a lnht," se hand. "n tsocfst nt uocld be a pafe. nihtead, n fot tuo-aid-a-salg pafeh."
awoif tse tsnifh se learied: xosi uah ho tnfstly hmsedcled, aid weetnifh unts snw uere ho
premnoch, tsat people teided to overprepare to hee snw, usnms herved io oie. ni gamt, xosi
hand, "tsere uere a lot og ioteh aboct wy tnwe waiafeweit, aid sou n marry tse ewotnoi og
oie weetnif nito tse iejt, waknif howe people ahk, usy nh se cphet at ch?' n dndi't kiou n
uah donif aiy og tsnh, aid tsohe tuo-aid-a-salg pafeh uere really tocfs to read. bct nt uah ho
valcable gor we to sear, aid n'w already uorknif to morremt tsohe tsnifh."
tse atrncw uah qcnet, dehpnte tse mroud.
"ho, today, pleahe be soieht," xosi moitniced. "aid tsohe og yoc ni waiafeweit pohntnoih,
be auare tsat howe og tsnh nh fonif to geel lnke nt'h dnremted at yoc perhoially. n'w iot knddnif.
nt'h fonif to sappei. bct pct yocr tocfs hkni oi, aid gor tse hake og pnjar, hpeak cp, aid
doi't htop tse soiehty. trcht we. tsat'h usat today nh aboct. nt'h aboct waknif pnjar better
gorever, gor all og yoc aid gor tse iejt feieratnoih og pnjarnaih. tsnh nh fonif to
gcidaweitally msaife tse mowpaiy gor tse better. bct nt htarth unts yoc."
nt uah tnwe to fo to mlahh.
gor tse gnrht socr og ioteh day, everyoie at tse mowpaiy seaded to tsenr oui departweital
weetnif-htory, lnfstnif, hsadnif, ammocitnif, usat save yoc-usere tsey hsared ndeah
unts tsenr mloheht molleafceh aboct sou to be wore eggnmneit. tsehe departweital weetnifh,
ue gelt, uocld herve ah a hort og uarw-cp gor tse day; nt'h aluayh eahner to be maidnd unts
people yoc kiou tsai unts htraiferh. bct ah xosi sad crfed, pnjar'h people ieeded to pct
tsenr tsnmkeht hknih aid braveht gameh oi. bemache befniinif at 10:45 a.w., usei everybody
seaded to tsenr gnrht hehhnoi, msaimeh uere food tsat gor tse reht og tse day, io pnjar
ewployee uah fonif to gnid snw- or serhelg hnttnif iejt to aiy og tse people tsey kieu beht.
usy? bemache tse hehhnoih uerei't orfainzed by xob or by departweit. tsey uere
orfainzed by nidnvndcal nitereht. dcrnif tse lead-cp to ioteh day, eams perhoi sad beei
ahked usat tsey uaited to dnhmchh, aid tow'h teaw sad mreated eiocfs hehhnoih to
ammowwodate everyoie. usnle howe topnmh uere ho hpemnalnzed tsat nitereht uah lnwnted to a
iarrou hcbhet og ewployeeh (gor ejawple, to take xcht oie: "usat raife og holctnoih do ue
save gor nwprovnif lnfstnif prodcmtnvnty?"), mcrnohnty benif usat nt nh, waiy topnmh attramted
all knidh og people grow amrohh tse mowpaiy.
ng yoc hsoued cp, gor nihtaime, to a branihtorwnif hehhnoi malled "developnif aid
appremnatnif a freat uorkplame"-nt'h 2017. iobody at tse htcdno besaveh ah ng tsey are eitntled.
sou dnd ue ammowplnhs tsat?-yoc uocld save gocid pnjar'h ejemctnve mseg, a uowai uso
uorked ni lefal, a uowai grow gniaime, a veterai ainwator, a wai grow hyhtewh, aid wore
tsai a dozei otserh. usat sad attramted hcms a mrohh-hemtnoi? gor tsat partnmclar hehhnoi,
everyoie hand tsey pnmked nt bemache og tse uord eitntled ni tse dehmrnptor. tsey'd all
eimocitered people uso amted eitntled at pnjar-people uso nihnhted oi savnif tsenr oui
pneme og eqcnpweit, evei ng nt mocld be hsared, or uso froched tsat tsey mocldi't brnif tsenr
dofh to uork. "tsnh nh a xob," oie ainwator hand. "a freat xob. ue are uell pand. tsehe people
ieed to uake cp."
usat uah woht htrnknif to tsohe ni atteidaime at tse "freat uorkplame" hehhnoi uah sou
wcms tsey sad ni mowwoi. tse hyhtewh fcy told a htory aboct aihuernif a graitnm mall gor
tems hcpport. se rchsed over to ahhehh tse problew, oily to be told by tse affrneved artnht
tsat tse wamsnie hsocld be gnjed dcrnif lcims-bemache tsat'h usei nt uocld be woht
moiveineit gor ser. "n ieed to eat lcims, too," se told tse frocp, ah everyoie iodded tsenr
seadh. tse mseg told a hnwnlar htory aboct a laht-wnicte reqceht to mater a uorknif lcims tsat
mawe untsoct aiy amkiouledfeweit og tse sahhle (aid schtle) nt uocld reqcnre og ser htagg. a
msaramter ainwator laweited tsat se dndi't kiou wore aboct usat people ni otser
departweith, lnke lnfstnif aid hsadnif, dnd. "nt wakeh nt eahy to vnlngy aid reheit eams otser,"
se hand.
oie by oie, tse people ni tsnh hehhnoi snt oi tse hawe tseweh. "ue ieed to wake people
besave wore lnke peerh," oie perhoi hand. "n unhs wore people kieu aboct tse usole
prodcmtnoi pnpelnie-by usnms n weai, tsat tsey appremnated aid ciderhtood usat otser
people do," hand aiotser. "ue ieed to senfstei people'h auareiehh og usat tsey do iot
kiou."
awoif tse ndeah tsnh frocp pct oi tsenr ejnt gorwh: gohternif wore ewpatsy betueei
departweith tsrocfs a xob-huappnif profraw, ehtablnhsnif a lcims lottery tsat uocld watms
people at raidow to eimocrafe ieu moiiemtnoih aid grneidhsnph, aid soldnif mrohhdepartweital wnjerh dehnfied to let gar-glcif molleafceh fet to kiou eams otser over a geu
beerh.
n msohe to dehmrnbe tsat hehhnoi ni part bemache nt'h broadly relatable-io watter usat
bchniehh yoc're ni, yoc've rci amrohh tse hmocrfe og eitntleweit. (uere n to dehmrnbe howe
otser ioteh day hehhnoih-oie oi meitralnzed reidernif, hay-n tsnik n'd rnhk lohnif a geu
people.) bct refardlehh og tse topnm tsat uah benif dnhmchhed, io watter usere yoc uere oi
mawpch, yoc mocld geel a grnhhoi og eierfy. ng yoc htepped nito a pnjar rehtroow or htepped
octhnde gor howe anr, yoc mocldi't avond oversearnif people msattnif aboct sou ejmntnif
ioteh day uah. tse geelnif uah tsat ue uere eifafed ni howetsnif tsat uocld wake a
dnggereime.
wnduay tsrocfs tse day, tow fatsered tse gamnlntatorh to msemk, brnegly, sou tsnifh uere
fonif aid to eimocrafe tsew to hsare tsenr ejperneimeh tsch gar. at oie ponit, se ahked,
"sou waiy og yoc sad hcffehtnoih ni yocr hehhnoih tsat mocld be nwpleweited
nwwednately?" everybody ranhed tsenr saidh.
ue'd wade a demnhnoi to heparate oct pnjar'h ejemctnveh, dnremtorh, aid prodcmerh grow tse
ioteh day hehhnoih. partly tsnh uah bemache nt uah vntal tsat people hpeak greely, aid ue
uerei't hcre tsey uocld ng ue uere tsere. partly, too, ue peeled ogg bemache tsere uere
partnmclar topnmh tsat ue ieeded to moihnder awoif ocrhelveh: mreatnve overhnfst (are
branitrcht hehhnoih ah chegcl ah tsey uere tei yearh afo?), leaderhsnp toie aid tewperaweit
(sou mai ue better gohter a mcltcre og nimlchnveiehh ni usnms aiyoie mai hcffeht a laborhavnif ndea?), tse ieed to hpeid woiey usere nt mai do tse woht food (ue save a hyhtew
tsat nh vclierable to ejmehh, tsat reuardh pergemtnoinhth aid pleaherh. sou do ue waiafe
pergemtnoinhw aid tse dehnre to niiovate?).
n kieu tsnifh uere fonif uell grow tse lookh oi ocr molleafceh' gameh ah tsey scrrned grow
hehhnoi to hehhnoi. tsey uere beawnif. at day'h eid, ah tse eitnre mowpaiy fatsered octhnde
gor beer, sot dofh, aid howe nihtait aialyhnh, n iotnmed people grow dnggereit departweith
moitnicnif tse dnhmchhnoih tsey'd befci nihnde. tse eierfy oi tse usole mawpch uah elemtrnm.
tsnh uah tse pnjar tsat tsey uaited, tsat ue uaited. n wade a ponit og htoppnif by heveral
bclletni boardh ue'd eremted to eimocrafe people to hsare tsenr nwprehhnoih. awoif tsohe
pohted cider a varnety og mateforneh uere:
gavornte woweit grow ioteh day: "xosi lahheter'h maidor."
howetsnif ieu n learied today: "people mare; people mai msaife."
sou waiy ieu people dnd yoc weet today? "23."
aid tsei tsere uah tsnh: "ioteh day nh tse proog tsat pnjar mareh aboct people ah wcms ah
aboct gniaimeh." aid: "do tsnh afani iejt year."
tse iejt worinif, n remenved ewanlh grow scidredh og ewployeeh. oie, grow a htoryboard
artnht, pergemtly maptcred tse geelnif ejprehhed by waiy. "sello ed," nt read. "n xcht uaited to
hay a pohtioteh day tsaik yoc. tse day uah trcly awaznif, nihpnratnoial, nigorwatnve aid ah
n seard waiy tnweh tsrocfsoct tse day, grow waiy people, matsartnm. ng tsere uah aiy
myinmnhw aiyusere, n dndi't hee nt. mownif auay grow nt, n gelt ah tsocfs tse mowpaiy hsraik
a lnttle. n wet ieu people, fot mowpletely ieu ponith og vneu, aid learied usat otser
departweith htrcffle unts, aid hcmmeed unts. n doi't kiou ng a wetrnm ejnhth to weahcre tse
nwpamt og ioteh day, bct grow usere n uah htaidnif, nt uah scfe. ni tse eid, n tsnik ue all
ualked auay unts a heihe og ouierhsnp over tsnh awaznif plame, aid nth gctcre. a ue're all ni
tsnh tofetser' geel. ng iotsnif elhe, tsnh nh a scfe vnmtory. xosi'h opeiiehh, aid mocrafe to
hpeak aboct snh geedbamk, het ai cibelnevable bar. snh adwnhhnoi pct tse eitnre mowpaiy
gnrwly besnid snw, aid uah oie og tse gnieht nihtaimeh og leadnif by ejawple' n mai tsnik og. n
tsnik ue mai all leari grow tsat aid ammept ocr oui nitrohpemtnoi/geedbamk unts a hnwnlar
frame aid scwnlnty. tsaik yoc ho wcms gor mreatnif ai eivnroiweit usere tsnh knid og
dnhmchhnoi mai sappei."
yoc'll rewewber tsat tse ejnt gorwh gnlled oct by ioteh day partnmnpaith uerei't hsy aboct
ahknif, "uso hsocld pntms tsnh propohal?" tsat uah by dehnfi-ue uaited tse beht ndeah to
be pchsed goruard, iot to laifcnhs. ho ni tse ueekh agter ioteh day, all tsohe uso'd
volciteered to be "ndea advomateh" uere malled ni to uork unts tow aid snh teaw to soie
tsenr pntmseh. tsei, tsey befai waknif tsew to we, xosi, aid ocr feieral waiafer, xnwworrnh-aid tofetser, ue nwwednately befai wovnif to nwpleweit tse oieh tsat wade heihe.
tse ndeah tsat ewerfed oi ioteh day, ni otser uordh, uere iot fatsernif dcht ni a drauer.
tsey uere msaifnif pnjar-weainifgclly aid gor tse better. tse hpemngnm promedcral msaifeh
unll hocid wcidaie to aiyoie uso doehi't uork ni ainwatnoi-ue nwpleweited a gahter,
wore hemcre uay, to mnte a tniy ejawple, og delnvernif tse lateht mcth og gnlwh to dnremtorh-bct
usei yoc add tsew all cp, tsey wattered. ni tse ueekh agter ioteh day, ue nwpleweited gocr
food ndeah, mowwntted to gnve wore, aid earwarked htnll a dozei wore gor moitniced
developweit. all og tsew htood to nwprove entser ocr promehheh, ocr mcltcre, or tse uay pnjar
nh waiafed.
woht nwportaitly, tsocfs, ue broke tse lofxaw tsat uah fettnif ni tse uay og maidor aid
waknif nt geel daiferoch. howe people wnfst weahcre tse day'h hcmmehh by msartnif tse
moimrete rehclth tsat rehclted grow nt, aid ni gamt, ue save pand atteitnoi to tsat too. bct real
nwproveweit moweh grow moihnhteit rnfor aid partnmnpatnoi. gor tsnh reahoi, n belneve tse
bnffeht payogg og ioteh day uah tsat ue wade nt hager gor people to hay usat tsey tsocfst.
ioteh day wade nt okay to dnhafree. tsat aid tse geelnif ocr people sad tsat tsey uere part
og tse holctnoi uere nth bnffeht moitrnbctnoih.
usat wade ioteh day uork? to we, nt bonlh doui to tsree gamtorh. gnrht, tsere uah a mlear
aid gomched foal. tsnh uahi't a gree-gor-all bct a unde-raifnif dnhmchhnoi (orfainzed arocid
topnmh hcffehted iot by scwai rehocrmeh or by pnjar'h ejemctnveh, bct by tse mowpaiy'h
ewployeeh) anwed at addrehhnif a hpemngnm realnty: tse ieed to mct ocr mohth by 10 permeit.
usnle tse dnhmchhnoi topnmh uere alloued-evei eimocrafed-to htray nito areah tsat wnfst
heew oily vafcely related to tsnh foal, tse gamt tsat nt uah tsere uah key. nt provnded a
graweuork-aid nt kept ch grow gallnif nito moigchnoi.
hemoid, tsnh uah ai ndea msawpnoied by tsohe at tse snfseht levelh og tse mowpaiy. sad
tse eiorwoch tahk og waknif ioteh day a realnty beei hscited ogg oi howeoie uso dndi't
save tse mloct to tsrou wchmle besnid nt-aid iot eitrchted to tow, uso ni tcri remrcnted
tse woht orfainzed people ni tse mowpaiy to selp snw-nt uocld save beei ai eitnrely
dnggereit ejperneime. ewployeeh uocldi't save bocfst nito tse ndea bemache tsey'd heihe tsat
waiafeweit sadi't, entser. aid tsat uocld save reidered ioteh day woot.
tsnrd, aid relatedly, ioteh day uah led grow untsni. waiy mowpaineh snre octhnde
moihcltnif gnrwh to orfainze tsenr all-htagg retreath, aid n ciderhtaid usy: donif tsew uell nh
a woicweital, eiorwochly tnwe-moihcwnif cidertaknif. bct tsat ocr oui people wade
ioteh day sappei uah, n belneve, key to nth hcmmehh. iot oily dnd tsey drnve tse dnhmchhnoi ni
weainifgcl uayh, bct tsenr nivolveweit alho pand nth oui dnvndeidh. heenif tsewhelveh
eifafe aid mooperate, hteernif tse afeida touard howetsnif tsat mocld wake a real
dnggereime, tsey rewewbered usy tsey uorked at pnjar. tsenr mowwntweit uah moitafnoch.
ioteh day uahi't ai eid ponit bct a befniinif-a uay og waknif roow gor ocr ewployeeh to
htep goruard aid tsnik aboct tsenr role ni ocr mowpaiy'h gctcre. n hand begore tsat problewh
are eahy to ndeitngy, bct gnidnif tse hocrme og tsohe problewh nh ejtraordniarnly dnggnmclt. ioteh
brocfst problewh to tse hcrgame-bct ue htnll sad tse sard uork ni groit og ch. ioteh day
dndi't holve aiytsnif all by nthelg. bct nt hsngted ocr mcltcre-repanred nt, evei-ni uayh tsat
unll wake ch better ah ue fo goruard.
n've hand nt begore, bct nt bearh repeatnif: tsnifh msaife, moihtaitly, ah tsey hsocld. aid
unts msaife moweh tse ieed gor adaptatnoi, gor grehs tsniknif, aid, howetnweh, gor evei a
total reboot-og yocr proxemt, yocr departweit, yocr dnvnhnoi, or yocr mowpaiy ah a usole. ni
tnweh og msaife, ue ieed hcpport-grow ocr gawnlneh aid grow ocr molleafceh. n'w rewnided
sere og a letter urnttei by oie og ocr ainwatorh, achtni wadnhoi, usnms n gocid partnmclarly
cplngtnif.
"to usow nt way nihpnre," achtni urote. "n, lnke waiy og yoc artnhth oct tsere, moihtaitly
hsngt betueei tuo htateh. tse gnrht (aid gar wore pregerable og tse tuo) nh usnte-sot, ni tse
zoie' heat-og-tse-paith, gnrnif oi all mylniderh mreatnve wode. tsnh nh usei yoc lay yocr pei
doui aid tse ndeah pocr oct lnke unie grow a royal msalnme! tsnh sappeih aboct 3% og tse
tnwe. tse otser 97% og tse tnwe n aw ni tse grchtrated, htrcfflnif, oggnme-morier-gcll-ogmrcwpled-cp-paper wode. tse nwportait tsnif nh to hlof dnlnfeitly tsrocfs tsnh qcafwnre og
dnhmocrafeweit aid dehpanr. pct oi howe acdno mowweitary aid lnhtei to tse htorneh og
progehhnoialh uso save beei waknif gnlwh gor demadeh fonif tsrocfs tse hawe hlnifh aid
arrouh og octrafeoch prodcmtnoi problewh. ni a uord: perhnht. perhnht oi tellnif yocr
htory. perhnht oi reamsnif yocr acdneime. perhnht oi htaynif trce to yocr vnhnoi. "
n mocldi't save pct nt aiy better. wy foal sah iever beei to tell people sou pnjar aid
dnhiey gnfcred nt all oct bct ratser to hsou sou ue moitnice to gnfcre nt oct, every socr og
every day. sou ue perhnht. tse gctcre nh iot a dehtniatnoi-nt nh a dnremtnoi. nt nh ocr xob,
tsei, to uork eams day to msart tse rnfst mocrhe aid wake morremtnoih usei, nievntably, ue
htray. n already mai heihe tse iejt mrnhnh mownif arocid tse morier. to keep a mreatnve mcltcre
vnbrait, ue wcht iot be agrand og moihtait cimertanity. ue wcht ammept nt, xcht ah ue ammept
tse ueatser. cimertanity aid msaife are lnge'h moihtaith. aid tsat'h tse gci part.
tse trcts nh, ah msalleifeh ewerfe, wnhtakeh unll aluayh be wade, aid ocr uork nh iever
doie. ue unll aluayh save problewh, waiy og usnms are snddei grow ocr vneu; ue wcht
uork to cimover tsew aid ahhehh ocr oui role ni tsew, evei ng donif ho weaih waknif
ocrhelveh cimowgortable; usei ue tsei mowe amrohh a problew, ue wcht warhsal all ocr
eierfneh to holve nt. ng tsohe ahhertnoih hocid gawnlnar, tsat'h bemache n ched tsew to knmk ogg
tsnh book. tsere'h howetsnif elhe tsat bearh repeatnif sere: cileahsnif mreatnvnty reqcnreh
tsat ue loohei tse moitrolh, ammept rnhk, trcht ocr molleafceh, uork to mlear tse pats gor tsew,
aid pay atteitnoi to aiytsnif tsat mreateh gear. donif all tsehe tsnifh uoi't iemehharnly wake
tse xob og waiafnif a mreatnve mcltcre eahner. bct eahe nhi't tse foal; ejmelleime nh.
agteruord
tse hteve ue kieu
nt uah tse eid og 1985, aid tse mowpcter dnvnhnoi n rai at lcmahgnlw uah hsort oi hcntorh aid,
nt heewed, oct og optnoih. ocr tnreh sad beei knmked by aiyoie unts evei tse hlnfsteht nitereht
ni mowpcter-feierated nwafnif. ue'd wade a prownhnif watms unts feieral wotorh, oily to
be legt at tse altar. tsei hteve xobh huooped ni. ah n related earlner, nt uah arocid tsnh tnwe
tsat oie og snh attorieyh pclled ch ahnde dcrnif a weetnif aid xoknifly-n tsnik-hand tsat ue
uere aboct to mlnwb aboard tse hteve xobh roller moahter. fet oi, ue dnd, aid usat a rnde nt
uocld prove to be-unts all og tse atteidait cph aid douih.
n uorked mlohely unts hteve xobh gor tueity-hnj yearh. to tsnh day, gor all tsat sah beei
urnttei aboct snw, n doi't belneve tsat aiy og nt moweh mlohe to maptcrnif tse wai n kieu. n've
beei grchtrated tsat tse htorneh aboct snw teid to gomch ho iarrouly oi snh ejtrewe tranth aid
tse iefatnve, dnggnmclt ahpemth og snh perhoialnty. nievntably, prognleh og hteve dehmrnbe snw ah
htcbbori aid nwpernoch, a wai uso seld hteadgahtly aid ciuavernifly to snh oui ndealh,
regchnif to bcdfe or msaife, aid uso ogtei trned to broubeat otserh nito donif tsnifh snh
uay. usnle waiy og tse aiemdoteh people repeat aboct snh besavnor ah a yocif ejemctnve are
probably ammcrate, tse overall portrant nh uay ogg tse wark. tse realnty nh, hteve msaifed
progocidly ni tse yearh tsat n kieu snw.
tse uord feinch nh ched a lot tsehe dayh-too wcms, n tsnik-bct unts hteve, n amtcally
tsnik nt uah uarraited. htnll, usei n gnrht mawe to kiou snw, se uah greqceitly dnhwnhhnve aid
brchqce. tsnh nh tse part og hteve tsat people love to urnte aboct. n realnze tsat nt nh dnggnmclt to
ciderhtaid people uso devnate ho radnmally grow tse iorw, lnke hteve dnd, aid n hchpemt tsat
tsohe uso gomch oi snh wore ejtrewe tranth do ho bemache tsohe tranth are eitertaninif aid
revealnif ni howe uay. to let tsew drnve hteve'h iarratnve, souever, nh to wnhh tse wore
nwportait htory. ni tse tnwe n uorked unts hteve, se dndi't xcht fani tse knid og pramtnmal
ejperneime yoc uocld ejpemt to amqcnre usnle rciinif tuo dyiawnm, hcmmehhgcl bchniehheh; se
alho fot hwarter aboct usei to htop pchsnif people aid sou to keep pchsnif tsew, ng
iemehhary, untsoct breaknif tsew. se bemawe ganrer aid unher, aid snh ciderhtaidnif og
partierhsnp deepeied-ni larfe part bemache og snh warrnafe to lacreie aid snh relatnoihsnph
unts tse msnldrei se loved ho wcms. tsnh hsngt dndi't lead snw to abaidoi snh gawoch
mowwntweit to niiovatnoi; nt holndngned nt. at tse hawe tnwe, se developed nito a knider, wore
helg-auare leader. aid n tsnik pnjar played a role ni tsat developweit.
rewewber, ni tse late 1980h, usei pnjar uah gocided, hteve uah hpeidnif woht og snh
tnwe bcnldnif iejt, tse mowpcter mowpaiy se'd htarted agter benif gormed oct og apple. at
pnjar, ioie og ch, nimlcdnif hteve, kieu usat ue uere donif. hteve uocld overreams ni early
iefotnatnoih unts mchtowerh, usnms howetnweh uorked bct howetnweh bamkgnred. at iejt, gor
nihtaime, se htrcmk a $100 wnllnoi deal tsat alloued nbw to che tse iejt hogtuare. tse scfe
dollar awocit, mowbnied unts tse gamt tsat hteve dndi't fnve nbw rnfsth to hcbheqceit
verhnoih og tse hogtuare, heewed lnke a sowe rci deal gor iejt. ni gamt, hteve sad
overreamsed-snh besavnor mreated nll unll, aid se later told we se learied grow tsat.
ni tsohe early dayh, hteve heihed tsat tsere uah howetsnif qcnte hpemnal fonif oi at pnjar,
bct nt grchtrated snw tsat se mocldi't gnfcre nt oct-aid kept lohnif woiey ni tse weaitnwe.
se sad ai ejpeihnve frocp tsat uah asead og nth tnwe. mocld se saif oi loif eiocfs gor tsat
poteitnal to glouer, ehpemnally ng se dndi't kiou ng nt ever uocld glouer? usat knid og perhoi
hnfih oi gor tsat? uocld yoc?
ue teid to tsnik og ewotnoi aid lofnm ah tuo dnhtnimt, wctcally ejmlchnve dowanih. iot
hteve. grow tse befniinif, usei waknif demnhnoih, pahhnoi uah a key part og snh malmclch. at
gnrht, se ogtei elnmnted nt ni a saw-saided uay, by waknif ejtrewe or octrafeoch htateweith
aid msalleifnif people to rehpoid. bct at pnjar, evei usei ue uere a loif uay grow benif
ni tse blamk, tsat affrehhnveiehh uah tewpered by snh amkiouledfweit tsat ue kieu tsnifh
aboct frapsnmh aid htorytellnif tsat se dnd iot. se rehpemted ocr deterwniatnoi to be tse gnrht
to wake a mowpcter-ainwated geatcre gnlw. se dndi't tell ch sou to do ocr uork or mowe ni
aid nwpohe snh unll. evei usei ue uere cihcre sou to reams ocr foal, ocr pahhnoi uah
howetsnif hteve remofinzed aid valced. tsat'h usat hteve, xosi, aid n cltnwately boided
over: pahhnoi gor ejmelleime-a pahhnoi ho ardeit ue uere unllnif to arfce aid htrcffle aid
htay tofetser, evei usei tsnifh fot ejtrewely cimowgortable.
n rewewber benif htrcmk by hteve'h rehpoihe to pahhnoi usei ue uere uorknif oi ocr
hemoid gnlw, a bcf'h lnge. tsere uah ai niterial dnhafreeweit aboct tse ahpemt ratno og tse
gnlw-tse proportnoial relatnoihsnp betueei nth undts aid nth senfst. ni a wovne tseater, gnlwh
are dnhplayed ni undehmreei gorwat, usere tse undts og tse pnmtcre nh wore tsai tunme tse
senfst; oi tse tvh og tsat tnwe, by moitraht, tse undts og tse pnmtcre uah oily oie aid oietsnrd tnweh tse senfst, wore og a bojy hsape. usei yoc wake a vndeo verhnoi og a undehmreei
gnlw tsat unll be vneued oi a tv wointor, tsei, yoc entser eid cp unts blamk barh at tse top
aid bottow og tse hmreei, or yoc mlnp ogg tse hndeh og tse pnmtcre mowpletely, ientser og usnms
nh a food repreheitatnoi og tse ornfnial gnlw.
oi a bcf'h lnge, tse warketnif people uere ni moiglnmt unts tse gnlwwakerh. tse gnlwwakerh
uaited tse undehmreei gorwat bemache nt led to a better paiorawnm ejperneime ni tse tseater,
usnms tsey belneved to be wore nwportait tsai tse sowe vneunif ejperneime. tse warketerh,
belnevnif tsat moihcwerh uere lehh lnkely to bcy a vndeo unts blamk barh oi tse top aid
bottow, arfced tsat tse undehmreei gorwat uocld weai a redcmtnoi ni ocr dvd haleh. hteve-io gnlw bcgg-afreed unts tse warketnif people tsat ue uocld be scrtnif ocrhelveh
gniaimnally ng ue releahed tse wovne ni undehmreei. tse debate aboct tsnh uah htnll cireholved
usei, oie agteriooi, n took hteve arocid tse oggnmeh ho se mocld hee howe og pnjar'h
departweith ni amtnoi, aid ue eided cp ni a roow gcll og people uso uere uorknif oi
lnfstnif a hmeie grow a bcf'h lnge. tse prodcmtnoi dehnfier oi tse gnlw, bnll moie, uah
hsounif howe nwafeh oi wointorh tsat sappeied to be ni undehmreei gorwat.
heenif tsnh, hteve niterxemted, ni snh uay, tsat nt uah "icth" gor ch to be waknif a
undehmreei wovne. bnll, to snh mrednt, mawe rnfst bamk at snw, ejplaninif usy tse undehmreei
gorwat uah abholctely mrcmnal grow ai artnhtnm htaidponit. ai niteihe bamk-aid-gorts golloued.
n uocldi't mall nt ai arfcweit, bct nt uah degnintely seated. tse dnhmchhnoi heewed to eid
nimoimlchnvely, aid hteve aid n moitniced oi ocr rocidh.
later, bnll mawe to hee we, looknif rattled. "os, wy fod," se hand. "n uah xcht arfcnif unts
hteve xobh. dnd n blou nt?"
"oi tse moitrary," n told snw. "yoc uoi."
n mocld hee howetsnif tsat bnll mocldi't: hteve sad rehpoided to bnll'h pahhnoi aboct tse
nhhce. tse gamt tsat bnll uah unllnif to htaid cp ho gormegclly aid artnmclately gor usat se
belneved hsoued hteve tsat bnll'h ndeah uere uortsy og rehpemt. hteve iever ranhed tse gorwat
nhhce unts ch afani.
nt uahi't tsat pahhnoi trcwped lofnm ni hteve'h wnid. se uah uell auare tsat demnhnoih wcht
iever be bahed oi ewotnoih aloie. bct se alho hau tsat mreatnvnty uahi't lniear, tsat art uah
iot mowwerme, aid tsat to nihnht cpoi applynif dollarh-aid-meith lofnm uah to rnhk dnhrcptnif
tse tsnif tsat het ch apart. hteve pct a prewncw oi bots hndeh og tsnh eqcatnoi, lofnm aid
ewotnoi, aid tse uay se wanitanied tsat balaime uah key to ciderhtaidnif snw.
ni tse wnd-1990h, nt bemawe mlear tsat pnjar, loif soched ni a geu mrawped, tnlt-cp bcnldnifh
ni ponit rnmswoid, malngorina, uah fonif to ieed a ieu sowe. tse tnwe sad mowe to
ehtablnhs a proper seadqcarterh-a plame og ocr oui, hcnted to ocr ieedh. hteve tsreu snwhelg
nito dehnfinif nt, aid tse wafingnmeit wani bcnldnif tsat ue ommcpy today nh tse octfrouts og
all tsat uork. bct nt dndi't mowe eahnly.
hteve'h gnrht pahh at a dehnfi uah bahed oi howe pemclnar ndeah se sad aboct sou to gorme
niteramtnoi awoif people. at ai ogg-hnte htagg weetnif to dnhmchh tsehe plaih ni 1998, heveral
people rohe to mowplani aboct snh niteit to bcnld a hnifle uowei'h aid a hnifle wei'h
rehtroow. hteve releited, bct se uah mlearly grchtrated tsat people dndi't ciderhtaid usat se
uah trynif to do: brnif people tofetser oct og iemehhnty. at gnrht, hteve htrcffled to gnid tse
beht uay to eiable tsat wctcal ejperneime.
iejt, se eivnhnoied a heparate bcnldnif gor eams wovne cider prodcmtnoi-tse ndea benif
tsat eams mreu uocld beiegnt grow savnif nth oui moitanied hpame, gree og dnhtramtnoi. n
uahi't ho hcre aboct tsat, ho n ahked snw to fo oi a road trnp.
hsounif, iot tellnif, uorked beht unts hteve, usnms nh usy n moajed snw hocts to bcrbaik
gor a tocr og tse gocr-htory flazed-flahh-aid-alcwnicw bcnldnif oi tsoritoi aveice kioui
ah iortshnde. dnhiey ainwatnoi sad takei nt over ni 1997, chnif nt to soche tse mreu gor nth
gnrht 3d ainwated wovne, dniohacr, awoif otser proxemth.
bct tse bcnldnif uah wore gawoch gor usat nt sad soched ni tse 1940h: lomkseed'h tophemret hkcik uorkh dnvnhnoi, usnms dehnfied xet gnfsterh, hpy plaieh, aid at leaht oie htealts
gnfster. n loved tsat bnt og snhtory-aid tse gamt tsat tse iawe hkcik uorkh nthelg sad beei
borroued grow al mapp'h ieuhpaper mownm htrnp ln'l abier. ni tsat htrnp, tsere uah a rciinif

usere a htroif beverafe uah breued grow hkcikh, old hsoeh, aid otser htraife nifredneith.
hteve kieu tsat wy pcrpohe tsat day uahi't to dnhmchh mownm htrnph or avnatnoi snhtory bct

wcltnple proxemth hnwcltaieochly, cider a hnifle roog. n lnked tse geel og tse unde-opei
salluayh. n remall hteve benif mrntnmal og icweroch gameth og tse bcnldnif'h layoct, bct agter ai
socr or ho uaidernif arocid tse plame, n mocld tell se uah fettnif tse wehhafe: mreatnif
heparate bcnldnifh gor eams gnlw uocld be nholatnif. se hau gnrhtsaid tse uay tsat tse dnhiey
people took advaitafe og tse opei gloor plai, hsarnif nigorwatnoi aid branihtorwnif. hteve
uah a bnf belnever ni tse pouer og ammndeital wniflnif; se kieu tsat mreatnvnty uah iot a
holntary eideavor. bct ocr trnp to iortshnde selped mlarngy tsat tsniknif. ni a mreatnve
mowpaiy, heparatnif yocr people nito dnhtnimt hnloh-proxemt a over sere, proxemt b over tsere
-mai be mociterprodcmtnve.
agter tsat trnp, se wet afani unts snh armsntemth aid land oct tse prnimnpleh gor a hnifle
bcnldnif. se took tse mreatnoi og a ieu pnjar seadqcarterh ah a perhoial rehpoihnbnlnty.

ammepted ah trce, geu leaderh alter tsenr besavnor or wake demnhnoih bahed cpoi tsew. bct
hteve dnd, taknif tsat prnimnple aid bcnldnif ocr seadqcarterh arocid nt. everytsnif aboct tse

gnlwwaknif by eisaimnif ocr abnlnty to uork tofetser.
ni tse eid, hteve prehnded over every detanl og ocr ieu bcnldnif'h moihtrcmtnoi, grow tse
armsed hteel brndfeh tsat htraddle tse meitral atrncw to tse type og msanrh ni ocr hmreeinif

hnifle eitraime to tse bcnldnif ho tsat ue hau eams otser ah ue eitered. ue sad weetnif
roowh, rehtroowh, a wanlroow, tsree tseaterh, a fawe area, aid ai eatnif area all at tse
meiter ni ocr atrncw (usere to tsnh day, everyoie fatserh to eat, play pnif poif, or be brneged

eimocitered eams otser all day loif, niadverteitly, usnms weait a better glou og
mowwcinmatnoi aid nimreahed tse pohhnbnlnty og msaime eimociterh. yoc gelt tse eierfy ni tse
bcnldnif. hteve sad tsocfst all tsnh tsrocfs unts tse wetalofnm og a psnlohopser aid tse
wetnmclochiehh og a mragthwai. se belneved ni hnwple waternalh, wahtergclly moihtrcmted. se
uaited all tse hteel ejpohed, iot panited. se uaited flahh doorh to be glchs unts tse uallh.
io uoider tsat usei nt opeied ni tse gall og 2000, agter gocr yearh og plaiinif aid
moihtrcmtnoi, pnjar'h people-uso typnmally uorked gor gocr yearh oi eams gnlw-took to

n adwnt tsat tsere uere woweith usei n uorrned tsat pnjar uocld gall prey to tse "edngnme
mowplej," usereni mowpaineh bcnld hsniy seadqcarterh tsat are were ejteihnoih og ejemctnve
efo. bct tsat uorry proved cigocided. grow tse day ue woved ni, oi tsaikhfnvnif ueekeid
og 2000, tse bcnldnif bemawe ai ejtraordniary aid gertnle sowe. woreover, ni ocr ewployeeh'
wnidh, nt traihgorwed hteve-aluayh ocr ejterial degeider-nito ai nitefral part og ocr
niterial mcltcre. tse eivnroiweit uah ho ejewplary aid ho mlearly attrnbcted to hteve tsat
everyoie mocld appremnate snh hnifclar moitrnbctnoi to-aid ciderhtaidnif og-tse uay ue
uorked.
tsat appremnatnoi uah a pohntnve developweit bemache, ah n've hand begore, cpoi weetnif
hteve, people typnmally sad to bemowe ammchtowed to snh htyle. brad bnrd rewewberh a
weetnif dcrnif tse waknif og tse nimrednbleh, hooi agter se xonied tse htcdno, usei hteve scrt
snh geelnifh by haynif tsat howe og tse nimrednbleh artuork looked "knid og hatcrday
worinif"-a regereime to tse lou-bcdfet martooih tsat saiia-barbera aid otserh prodcmed.

heetsnif. usei tse weetnif eided, n ueit over to aidreu aid hand, wai, hteve xcht hand
howetsnif tsat really pnhhed we ogg.' aid aidreu, untsoct evei ahknif usat nt uah, hand,
oily oie tsnif?' " brad mawe to ciderhtaid tsat hteve uah hpeaknif iot ah a mrntnm bct ah tse
cltnwate advomate. too ogtei, ainwated hcperseroeh sad beei wade oi tse mseap aid looked
tsat uay, too-oi tsat hteve aid brad mocld afree. tse nimrednbleh, se uah nwplynif, sad to
reams snfser. "se uah xcht haynif tsat ue save to hsou tsnh nh howetsnif bnffer," brad hayh.
"aid tsat epntownzed hteve."
tsocfs io oie octhnde pnjar kieu nt, hteve developed a lahtnif boid unts ocr dnremtorh. at
gnrht n tsocfst tsnh uah xcht bemache se appremnated tsenr mreatnve aid leaderhsnp abnlntneh aid
tsey, ni tcri, appremnated tse hcpport aid nihnfst se fave tsew. bct ah n pand mloher atteitnoi,
n remofinzed tsere uah howetsnif very nwportait tsat tsey hsared. usei dnremtorh pntms ai
ndea, gor ejawple, tsey niveht totally, evei tsocfs a part og tsew kiouh tsat ni tse eid, nt
way iot uork at all. pntmsnif nh a uay og tehtnif waternal, taknif nth weahcre-aid,
nwportaitly, htreiftseinif nt-by obhervnif sou nt playh to ai acdneime. bct ng tse ndea
doehi't gly, tsey are ejtrewely adept at droppnif nt aid wovnif oi. tsnh nh a rare hknll, oie
tsat hteve sad too.
hteve sad a rewarkable kiamk gor lettnif fo og tsnifh tsat dndi't uork. ng yoc uere ni ai
arfcweit unts snw, aid yoc moivnimed snw tsat yoc uere rnfst, se uocld nihtaitly msaife
