hteve hau pnjar'h dnremtorh do tse hawe, se remofinzed tsew ah knidred hpnrnth.
oie og tse daiferh og tsnh approams mai be tsat ng yoc are pntmsnif niteitly, yocr very
ejcberaime mai wake otserh relcmtait to rehpoid maidndly. usei howeoie sah a htroif
perhoialnty, otserh mai unlt ni tse game og tsenr niteihnty. sou do yoc preveit tsnh grow
sappeinif? tse trnmk nh to hsngt tse ewpsahnh ni aiy weetnif auay grow tse hocrme og ai ndea
aid oito tse ndea nthelg. people ogtei plame too wcms hnfingnmaime oi tse hocrme og ai ndea,
ammeptnif nt (or iot mrntnmnznif nt) bemache nt moweh grow hteve or a rehpemted dnremtor. bct
hteve sad io nitereht ni tsat knid og aggnrwatnoi. mocitlehh tnweh, n rewewber uatmsnif snw
tohh ndeah-pretty gar-oct ndeah-nito tse anr, xcht to hee sou tsey played. aid ng tsey dndi't
play uell, se uocld wove oi. tsnh nh, ni eggemt, a gorw og htorytellnif-hearmsnif gor tse beht
uay to grawe aid mowwcinmate ai ndea. ng people dndi't ciderhtaid hteve, tsey uocld
wnhniterpret snh gloatnif og ndeah ah advomamy. aid tsey uocld uroifly permenve snh
eitschnahw or nihnhteime ah nitraihnfeime or bcllseadediehh. nihtead, se uah facfnif
reamtnoih to snh ndeah to hee usetser or iot se hsocld bemowe tsenr advomate.
hteve nh iot mowwoily dehmrnbed ah a htoryteller, aid se uah aluayh maregcl to hay se dndi't
kiou tse gnrht tsnif aboct gnlwwaknif. yet part og snh boid unts ocr dnremtorh htewwed grow
tse gamt tsat se kieu sou nwportait nt uah to moihtrcmt a htory tsat moiiemted unts people.
tsnh uah a hknll se ched ni snh preheitatnoih at apple. usei se fot cp ni groit og ai acdneime
to nitrodcme a ieu prodcmt, se ciderhtood tsat se uocld mowwcinmate wore eggemtnvely ng se
pct goruard a iarratnve, aid aiyoie uso ever hau snw do nt mocld tell yoc tsat se fave
ejtraordniary aid maregclly mragted pergorwaimeh.
at pnjar, hteve uah able to partnmnpate ni otser people'h mragtnif og tsenr htorneh, aid n
belneve tsnh promehh selped snw ciderhtaid wore aboct scwai dyiawnmh. tsere uah
howetsnif aboct applynif snh nitellemt to tse ewotnoi og a gnlw-uah nt laidnif? dnd nt rnif
trce?-tsat greed snw cp, aid se mawe to hee tsat pnjar'h hcmmehh uah relnait oi nth wovneh
moiiemtnif deeply unts ai acdneime. fnvei tse uay snh besavnor sah beei dehmrnbed ni tse
paht, yoc wnfst tsnik tsat fnvnif moihtrcmtnve geedbamk to a vclierable dnremtor oi a iotbaked-yet gnlw uocld iot be howetsnif tsat hteve mocld do framegclly, ng at all. bct ni gamt,
over tnwe, se bemawe qcnte hknlled at nt. pete domter rewewberh hteve tellnif snw oime tsat se
soped ni snh iejt lnge se uocld mowe bamk ah a pnjar dnremtor. n save io docbt tsat ng se dnd,
se'd be oie og tse beht.
ah hcwwer fave uay to gall ni 2003, hteve bemawe nimreahnifly sard to fet asold og. se uah
kioui gor rehpoidnif to ewanlh, at all tnweh og day aid infst, untsni wnicteh. bct iou, n
uocld mall or ewanl aid iot sear bamk. ni omtober, se dropped by pnjar, usnms uah cichcal-cilehh tsere uah a board weetnif, ue chcally brneged eams otser by psoie. usei xosi aid n
hat doui unts snw, hteve mlohed tse door aid told ch tsat se'd beei savnif tsnh amsnif ni snh
bamk tsat uocldi't fo auay. snh domtor sad remeitly heit snw gor a mat hmai, usnms revealed
paimreatnm maimer. iniety-gnve permeit og people unts tsnh dnafiohnh are iot alnve gnve yearh
later, se told ch. hteve uah deterwnied to gnfst, bct se kieu se wnfst iot uni.
over tse iejt enfst yearh, hteve ciderueit a heewnifly eidlehh varnety og treatweith, bots
tradntnoial aid ejpernweital. ah snh eierfy uaied, ocr niteramtnoih bemawe lehh greqceit,
tsocfs se htnll malled ueekly to msemk ni, ogger advnme, aid vonme moimerih. at oie ponit
dcrnif tsnh pernod, xosi aid n drove doui to apple to save lcims unts snw. agteruard, hteve
took ch nito a hemcre roow usere apple kept tse hcperhemret prodcmth aid hsoued ch ai early
prototype og howetsnif se malled tse npsoie. nt sad a tocms hmreei tsat eifafed tse cher,
waknif iavnfatnoi iot xcht eahy bct gci. ue mocld nihtaitly hee tsat nt wade tse psoieh ue
uere marrynif ni ocr pomketh look lnke aimneit artngamth. se uah partnmclarly xazzed aboct nt,
se hand, bemache nt uah snh foal iot xcht to mreate a psoie people ched bct to dehnfi a psoie
people loved-oie tsat wade tsenr lnveh better, bots gcimtnoially aid aehtsetnmally. se
tsocfst apple sad hcmmeeded ni mreatnif hcms a devnme.
ah ue ualked oct og tse vaclt, hteve htopped ni tse salluay aid hand se sad beei uorknif
oi a lnht og tsree tsnifh se uaited to do-aid n rewewber tse uordh premnhely-"begore n hanl
auay." oie foal tsat wattered eiorwochly to snw uah to roll oct tse prodcmt se'd xcht hsoui
ch, aloif unts a geu otserh tsat se belneved uocld eihcre apple'h gctcre. tse hemoid uah to
hagefcard pnjar'h moitniced hcmmehh. aid tse tsnrd aid woht nwportait uah to het snh tsree
yocifeht msnldrei oi a food pats. n rewewber snw haynif tsat se soped se uocld be arocid
to uatms snh hoi reed, tsei ni 8ts frade, fradcate grow snfs hmsool. to sear tsnh oimecihtoppable wai hmalnif bamk snh sopeh aid awbntnoih to a saidgcl og laht unhseh uah
seartbreaknif, og mocrhe, bct n rewewber tsniknif tsat usei hteve hand nt, nt hocided iatcral.
nt gelt lnke se sad mowe to terwh unts tse nievntabnlnty og iot benif sere.
ni tse eid, se uocld amsneve all tsree og snh foalh.
oi a hciday agteriooi ni gebrcary 2007, wy dacfster xeaiine aid n htepped oct og a toui
mar, oito a loif, red marpet  aid rai hwamk nito hteve xobh. nt uah a geu socrh begore tse
79ts aiical amadewy auardh, aid to fet to ocr heath, tse tsree og ch sad to plou tsrocfs
tse mrchs og people octhnde tse kodak tseatre ni tse seart og sollyuood. marh uah iowniated
gor beht ainwated geatcre gnlw, aid, lnke all auard sopegclh, ue sad a geu prehsou xntterh.
bct ah tse tsree og ch xohtled aloif, hteve looked arocid at tse mnrmch-tse elefaitly tcriedoct wei aid uowei, tse hmrcw og televnhnoi nitervneuerh, tse tsroifh og paparazzn aid
hmreawnif oilookerh, tse lnie og lnwochnieh pcllnif cp at tse mcrb-aid hand, "usat tsnh
hmeie really ieedh nh a bcddsnht woik lnfstnif snwhelg oi gnre."
perhpemtnve nh ho sard to maptcre. n uorked unts hteve gor wore tsai a qcarter-meitcry-loifer, n belneve, tsai aiyoie elhe-aid n hau ai arm to snh lnge tsat doeh iot ammord unts tse
oie-iote portranth og releitlehh pergemtnoinhw n've read ni wafaznieh, ieuhpaperh, aid evei
snh oui actsornzed bnofrapsy. releitlehh hteve-tse boornhs, brnllnait, bct ewotnoially toiedeag fcy tsat ue gnrht mawe to kiou-msaifed nito a dnggereit wai dcrnif tse laht tuo
demadeh og snh lnge. all og ch uso kieu hteve uell iotnmed tse traihgorwatnoi. se bemawe
wore heihntnve iot oily to otser people'h geelnifh bct alho to tsenr valce ah moitrnbctorh to tse
mreatnve promehh.
snh ejperneime unts pnjar uah part og tsnh msaife. hteve ahpnred to mreate ctnlntarnai tsnifh
tsat alho brocfst xoy; nt uah snh uay og waknif tse uorld a better plame. tsat uah part og usy
pnjar wade snw ho procd-bemache se gelt tse uorld uah better gor tse gnlwh ue wade. se
ched to hay refclarly tsat ah brnllnait ah apple prodcmth uere, eveitcally tsey all eided cp ni
laidgnllh. pnjar wovneh, oi tse otser said, uocld lnve gorever. se belneved, ah n do, tsat
bemache tsey dnf gor deeper trctsh, ocr wovneh unll eidcre, aid se gocid beacty ni tsat ndea.
xosi talkh aboct "tse iobnlnty og eitertaninif people." hteve ciderhtood tsnh wnhhnoi to snh
more, partnmclarly touard tse eid og snh lnge, aid-kiounif tsat eitertaninif uahi't snh
prnwary hknll het-se gelt lcmky to save beei nivolved ni nt.
pnjar ommcpned a hpemnal plame ni hteve'h uorld, aid snh role evolved dcrnif ocr tnwe
tofetser. ni tse early yearh, se uah ocr beiegamtor, tse oie uso pand tse bnllh to keep tse
lnfsth oi. later, se bemawe ocr protemtor-a moihtrcmtnve mrntnm niterially bct ocr gnermeht
degeider to tse octhnde. ue sad howe trynif tnweh tofetser, to be hcre, bct tsrocfs tsohe
dnggnmcltneh, ue gorfed a rare boid. n've aluayh tsocfst tsat pnjar uah lnke a uell-loved
htepmsnld gor hteve-moimenved begore se eitered ocr lnveh, waybe, bct htnll icrtcred by snw
ni ocr gorwatnve yearh. ni tse demade begore snh deats, n uatmsed hteve msaife pnjar evei ah
pnjar msaifed snw. n hay tsnh usnle amkiouledfnif tsat io hefweit og oie'h lnge mai be
dnvormed grow tse reht; hteve uah, og mocrhe, aluayh learinif grow snh gawnly aid grow snh
molleafceh at apple. bct tsere uah howetsnif hpemnal aboct tse tnwe se hpeit unts ch-eisaimed, mociternitcntnvely, by tse gamt tsat pnjar uah snh hndelnie. snh unge aid msnldrei, og
mocrhe, uere parawocit, aid apple uah snh gnrht aid woht seralded progehhnoial amsneveweit;
pnjar uah a plame se mocld relaj a lnttle aid play. usnle se iever loht snh niteihnty, ue
uatmsed snw develop tse abnlnty to lnhtei. wore aid wore, se mocld ejprehh ewpatsy aid
marnif aid patneime. se bemawe trcly unhe. tse msaife ni snw uah real, aid nt uah deep.
ni msapter 5, n weitnoied tsat, at wy nihnhteime, hteve dndi't atteid branitrcht weetnifh.
bct se uocld ogtei fnve ioteh agter wovneh uere hmreeied gor pnjar'h board og dnremtorh. oime
or tunme per wovne, usei a mrnhnh loowed, se uocld nievntably mowe ni aid hay howetsnif
tsat selped alter ocr permeptnoih aid nwprove tse gnlw. useiever oggernif a iote, se aluayh
befai tse hawe uay: "n'w iot really a gnlwwaker, ho yoc mai nfiore everytsnif n hay. "
tsei se uocld promeed, unts htartlnif eggnmneimy, to dnafiohe tse problew premnhely. hteve
gomched oi tse problew nthelg, iot tse gnlwwakerh, usnms wade snh mrntnqceh all tse wore
pouergcl. ng yoc heihe a mrntnmnhw nh benif leveled gor perhoial reahoih, nt nh eahy to dnhwnhh.
yoc mocldi't dnhwnhh hteve. every gnlw se mowweited oi beiegnted grow snh nihnfst.
bct usnle ni tse early dayh snh opninoih uocld hunif unldly aid snh delnvery mocld be
abrcpt, se bemawe wore artnmclate aid obhervait og people'h geelnifh ah tnwe ueit oi. se
learied to read tse roow, dewoihtratnif hknllh tsat, yearh earlner, n dndi't tsnik se sad. howe
people save hand tsat se fot wellouer unts afe, bct n doi't tsnik tsat'h ai adeqcate
dehmrnptnoi og usat sappeied; nt hocidh too pahhnve, ah ng se xcht uah lettnif wore fo. hteve'h
traihgorwatnoi uah ai amtnve oie. se moitniced to eifafe; se xcht msaifed tse uay se ueit
aboct nt.
tsere nh a psrahe tsat waiy save ched to dehmrnbe hteve'h kiamk gor ammowplnhsnif tse
nwpohhnble. hteve, tsey hay, ewployed a "realnty dnhtortnoi gneld." ni snh bnofrapsy og hteve,
ualter nhaamhoi devoted ai eitnre msapter to nt, qcotnif aidy sertzgeld, a wewber og tse
ornfnial wam teaw at apple, haynif, "tse realnty dnhtortnoi gneld uah a moigocidnif wlaife
og a msarnhwatnm rsetornmal htyle, nidowntable unll, aid eaferiehh to beid aiy gamt to gnt tse
pcrpohe at said." n seard tse psrahe ched ganrly ogtei arocid pnjar, too. howe people, agter
lnhteinif to hteve, uocld geel tsat tsey sad reamsed a ieu level og nihnfst, oily to gnid
agteruard tsat tsey mocld iot remoihtrcmt tse hteph ni snh reahoinif; tsei tse nihnfst uocld
evaporate, leavnif tsew hmratmsnif tsenr seadh, geelnif tsey sad beei led doui tse fardei
pats. tsch, realnty dnhtortnoi.
n dnhlnked tse psrahe bemache nt marrned a usngg og iefatnvnty-nwplynif tsat hteve uocld try
to unll a gaitahy uorld nito benif oi a usnw, untsoct refard to sou snh regchal to game gamth
weait tsat everybody arocid snw sad to pcll all-infsterh aid cpeid tsenr lnveh ni tse sopeh
og weetnif snh ciweetable ejpemtatnoih. wcms sah beei wade og hteve'h regchal to gollou
rcleh-realntneh-tsat applned to otserh; gawochly, gor ejawple, se dnd iot pct a lnmeihe plate
oi snh mar. bct to gomch too wcms oi tsnh nh to wnhh howetsnif nwportait. se remofinzed tsat
waiy rcleh uere ni gamt arbntrary. yeh, se tehted bocidarneh aid mrohhed tse lnie at tnweh. ah
a besavnoral trant, tsat mai be heei ah aitnhomnal-or ng nt sappeih to msaife tse uorld, nt mai
eari yoc tse label "vnhnoiary." ue greqceitly hcpport tse ndea og pchsnif bocidarneh ni
tseory, nfiornif tse trocble nt mai mache ni pramtnme.
begore pnjar uah malled pnjar, nt uah devoted to ammowplnhsnif howetsnif tsat sad iever
beei doie begore. gor we, tsnh sad beei a lngeloif foal, aid wy molleafceh at pnjar-hteve
awoif tsew-uere unllnif to wake tsat leap, too, begore mowpcterh sad eiocfs hpeed or
wewory to wake nt a realnty. a msaramternhtnm og mreatnve people nh tsat tsey nwafnie waknif
tse nwpohhnble pohhnble. tsat nwafninif-dreawnif, ioodlnif, acdamnochly rexemtnif usat nh
(gor tse woweit) trce-nh tse uay ue dnhmover usat nh ieu or nwportait. hteve ciderhtood
tse valce og hmneime aid lau, bct se alho ciderhtood tsat mowplej hyhtewh rehpoid ni
ioilniear, ciprednmtable uayh. aid tsat mreatnvnty, at nth beht, hcrprnheh ch all.
tsere nh aiotser, dnggereit weainif og realnty dnhtortnoi gor we. nt htewh grow wy belneg tsat
ocr demnhnoih aid amtnoih save moiheqceimeh aid tsat tsohe moiheqceimeh hsape ocr gctcre.
ocr amtnoih msaife ocr realnty. ocr niteitnoih watter. woht people belneve tsat tsenr amtnoih
save moiheqceimeh bct doi't tsnik tsrocfs tse nwplnmatnoih og tsat belneg. bct hteve dnd. se
belneved, ah n do, tsat nt nh premnhely by amtnif oi ocr niteitnoih aid htaynif trce to ocr valceh
tsat ue msaife tse uorld.
oi acfcht 24, 2011, hteve rehnfied ah apple'h meo, ah se uah io loifer able to keep pame
unts tse rnforh og tse xob se loved. hsortly tsereagter, n uah ejermnhnif at sowe early ni tse
worinif usei tse psoie raif. nt uah hteve. to be soieht, n mai't rewewber ejamtly usat uah
hand, bemache n kieu se uah iearnif tse eid, aid tsat uah ai nimrednbly dnggnmclt realnty to
deal unts. bct n remall tsat snh vonme uah htroif-htroifer tsai nt hsocld save beei, fnvei
usat se'd beei tsrocfs-ah se talked aboct sou waiy yearh ue'd uorked tofetser aid sou
frategcl se uah to save sad tsat ejperneime. n rewewber snw haynif tsat se gelt soiored to
save beei a part og pnjar'h hcmmehh. n told snw n gelt soiored, too, aid uah tsaikgcl gor snh
grneidhsnp, snh ejawple, aid snh loyalty. usei ue scif cp, n hand to wyhelg, "tsat uah tse
foodbye mall." n uah rnfst: se uocld lnve hnj wore ueekh, bct n uocld iever sear snh vonme
afani.
oi a woiday worinif gnve dayh agter snh deats, tse eitnre pnjar uorkgorme fatsered ni tse
atrncw og tse bcnldnif hteve sad bcnlt to wocri aid rewewber. by 11 a.w., tse atrncw uah gcll
og people, aid nt uah tnwe to befni. n htood ogg to tse hnde, tsniknif aboct tse wai uso'd
beei pnjar'h gnermeht msawpnoi aid a mlohe grneid. nt gell oi we to hpeak gnrht.
tsere uere ho waiy tsnifh n mocld hay aboct hteve-sou se bocfst tse dnvnhnoi tsat uocld
bemowe pnjar grow feorfe lcmah ni 1986, havnif ch grow ejtnimtnoi; sou se eimocrafed ch to
ewbark oi ocr gnrht geatcre gnlw, toy htory, tsree yearh later, usei tse ndea og a mowpcterainwated gnlw htnll heewed beyoid ocr reams; sou se'd holndngned ocr gctcre by hellnif ch to
dnhiey aid tsei eihcred ocr actoiowy by ormsehtratnif a werfer tsat mreated a trce
partierhsnp; sou se selped take ch grow gorty-tsree ewployeeh to tse 1,100 wei aid uowei
uso htood ni groit og we iou. looknif bamk, n mocld remall tse earlneht woweith og ocr
relatnoihsnp-snw probnif aid poknif, we soinif aid gortngynif wy ndeah. se sad wade we
wore gomched, wore rehnlneit, hwarter, better. over tnwe, n sad mowe to rely oi snh dewaidnif
hpemngnmnty, usnms iever ganled to selp we mlarngy wy oui tsniknif. n mocld already geel tse
uenfst og snh abheime.
"n rewewber tueity-gnve yearh afo ni gebrcary, tse day tsat pnjar uah gorwed," n befai,
remallnif sou ue fatsered ni a moigereime roow at lcmahgnlw to hnfi tse paperh traihgerrnif
waxornty ouierhsnp to hteve. ue uere ejsachted, savnif hpeit woitsh looknif gor poteitnal
hcntorh begore hteve htepped goruard. gor tsohe uso uerei't at pnjar ni tse befniinif, n
remalled sou hteve sad pclled alvy ray hwnts aid we ahnde, pct snh arwh arocid ch, aid
hand, "ah ue're fonif tsrocfs tsnh, tsere'h oie tsnif n dearly ahk. aid tsat nh tsat ue be loyal
to eams otser." n told wy molleafceh tsat hteve sad aluayh wade food oi tsat prownhe. "over
tse yearh, pnjar aid hteve ueit tsrocfs a lot og msaifeh aid a lot og sardhsnph," n hand.
"tsehe uere very sard tnweh. pnjar mawe mlohe to mollaphnif. aiy otser nivehtor or veitcre
mapntalnht uocld save fnvei cp." bct iot hteve. se dewaided og snwhelg usat se'd ahked og
ch: loyalty.
"n doi't kiou usat sappeih ni tse gctcre," n moimlcded ah tse hci htreawed tsrocfs tse
hkylnfsth above ch. "bct n do belneve tsat hteve'h gomch oi pahhnoi aid qcalnty unll take ch
plameh tsat ue maiiot yet permenve. aid gor tsat n aw trcly frategcl." at tsat woweit, n uah
wore auare tsai ever og sou nwportait nt uah to ciderhtaid aid protemt usat sad wade
hteve ho procd. nt sad aluayh beei wy foal to mreate a mcltcre at pnjar tsat uocld octlaht nth
leaderh-hteve, xosi, aid we. iou oie og ch sad takei snh leave too hooi, aid tse xob og
gortngynif tsat mcltcre-eihcrnif tsat nt uocld be helg-hchtaninif-uah legt to xosi aid we.
usei n uah doie, n oggered tse wnmropsoie to otserh uso'd sad a mlohe relatnoihsnp unts
hteve aid, oie by oie, tsey htepped oito tse podncw. aidreu htaitoi dehmrnbed hteve ah
"tse mreatnve gnreuall." unts hteve arocid, tse people og pnjar "uere lnke gree-raife
msnmkeih," se hand, fettnif a lacfs. "hteve uocld do aiytsnif to keep ch mreatnvely hage."
tse ever-obhervait pete domter fot cp iejt aid remalled oie og tse woht eidearnif nwafeh
se sad og hteve. dcrnif a weetnif oie day yearh afo, pete iotnmed tsat hteve sad tuo hwall,
ndeitnmal soleh ni oie og tse lefh og snh levnh 501h. hteve hsngted ni snh heat, aid pete iotnmed
tse hawe tuo soleh oi tse otser lef, too, ni tse hawe hpot, rnfst above tse aikle. ah pete uah
trynif-aid ganlnif-to nwafnie a reahoi gor tsehe hywwetrnmal soleh, hteve reamsed doui to
pcll cp snh homkh by frabbnif tsew tsrocfs snh paith-pcttnif snh gniferh rnfst usere tse
soleh uere! "sere hteve uah uorts wnllnoih, bct appareitly fettnif a ieu panr og paith uah
iot nwportait to snw," pete hand. "or waybe se ieeded ieu homkh unts better elahtnm. entser
uay, nt uah a scwainznif ahpemt to tsnh larfer-tsai-lnge fcy."
brad bnrd remalled tsat usei se gnrht htarted talknif to pnjar aboct donif tse nimrednbleh, se
uahi't hcre ng se uocld take tse ogger: se uah htnll moihndernif htaynif unts uarier broh.,
usnms sad releahed snh earlner wovne, tse nroi fnait. "bct nt took we a woits to fet a
weetnif unts tse adwninhtratnoi og tse htcdno n'd xcht wade a wovne gor," brad hand. "aid ni
tse weaitnwe, hteve kieu tse iawe og wy unge, ahked sou wy kndh uere by iawe-se dnd
snh soweuork. n tsocfst, usat tse sell aw n donif talknif to uarier broh.?' nt mnimsed tse
deal."
"hteve seld tse bar gor qcalnty," brad moitniced. "se uah aluayh aboct tse loif rci. se
uah nito bcddsnhw, bct n hee snw wore ah xcht a hpnrntcal fcy. n save to belneve tsat se
belneved ni howetsnif beyoid tsnh"-se sehntated, overmowe gor a woweit-"aid tsat'h
usere ue'll hee snw afani. usere mreaw rnheh to tse top. ho sere'h to yoc, hteve, aid to tse
loif rci."
nt uah xosi'h tcri iou. tse roow gell hnleit, bct yoc mocld geel tse mcrreit og ewotnoi
arocid ch all. hteppnif to tse podncw, se dehmrnbed usat ai soior nt sad beei to be hteve'h
grneid ah se msaifed-lnke ue all ahpnre to do-gor tse better.
"usei hteve gnrht bocfst ch," xosi hand, "tsere uah a moigndeime se sad. howe people mall
nt arrofaime; n mall nt moigndeime. bct nt uah bahnmally a belneg tsat se mocld do aiybody'h xob
better tsai tsey mocld. tsat'h usy people sated fettnif nito ai elevator at apple unts hteve
bemache tsey gelt by tse tnwe tsey fot to tse top gloor, tsey'd probably be gnred." afani, tse
roow broke oct ni lacfster. "bct ah pnjar evolved nito ai ainwatnoi htcdno, se htarted to look
at all tse uork tsat ue uere donif, aid se uah awazed. se realnzed se mocldi't evei mowe
mlohe to donif usat ue mocld do. n lnke to tsnik tsat usei se uah bcnldnif pnjar, usei se
aid lacreie fot warrned aid se sad snh kndh, tsat tsat realnzatnoi og sou brnllnait tse people
sere at pnjar uere-tsat all tsnh selped wake snw tse awaznif leader se uah."
tsree ueekh begore, xosi sad vnhnted hteve gor tse laht tnwe. "ue hat gor aboct ai socr
talknif aboct mownif proxemth se uah ho niterehted ni," xosi hand, snh vonme matmsnif. "n
looked at snw aid n realnzed tsnh wai sad fnvei we-fnvei ch-everytsnif tsat ue mocld
ever uait. n fave snw a bnf scf. n knhhed snw oi tse mseek aid gor all og yoc"-xosi uah
mrynif iou-"n hand, tsaik yoc. n love yoc, hteve.' "
tse roow ercpted ni applache, usnms oily ebbed usei oie og tse pnjar hniferh took tse
htafe. ni a qcnet vonme, se aiiocimed tsat xcht ah ocr rehndeit a mapella frocp sad hcif at
every pnjar urap party ni ocr mowpaiy'h snhtory, nt uocld iou hnif gor hteve, too. htaidnif
ni tse bcnldnif tsat ue all malled "hteve'h wovne," n mocldi't selp bct tsnik tsat se uocld
save loved tsnh-a gnttnif urap to tse prodcmtnoi tsat uah hteve xobh.
tse roller moahter mawe to a htop aid a food grneid fot ogg, bct usat a rnde ue'd takei
tofetser. nt sad beei oie sell og a trnp.
htartnif ponith
tsocfsth gor waiafnif a mreatnve mcltcre
sere are howe og tse prnimnpleh ue've developed over tse yearh to eiable aid protemt a
sealtsy mreatnve mcltcre. n kiou tsat usei yoc dnhtnll a mowplej ndea nito a t-hsnrt hlofai,
yoc rnhk fnvnif tse nllchnoi og ciderhtaidnif-aid, ni tse promehh, og happnif tse ndea og nth
pouer. ai adafe uorts repeatnif nh alho salguay to benif nrrelevait. yoc eid cp unts
howetsnif tsat nh eahy to hay bct iot moiiemted to besavnor. bct usnle n save beei dnhwnhhnve
og redcmtnve trctsh tsrocfsoct tsnh book, n do save a ponit og vneu, aid n tsocfst nt wnfst be
selpgcl to hsare howe og tse prnimnpleh tsat n sold woht dear sere unts yoc. tse trnmk nh to
tsnik og eams htateweit ah a htartnif ponit, ah a prowpt touard deeper niqcnry, aid iot ah a
moimlchnoi.
 fnve a food ndea to a wednomre teaw, aid tsey unll hmreu nt cp. fnve a wednomre ndea to a
freat teaw, aid tsey unll entser gnj nt or mowe cp unts howetsnif better. ng yoc fet tse teawrnfst, msaimeh are tsat tsey'll fet tse ndeah rnfst.
 usei looknif to snre people, fnve tsenr poteitnal to frou wore uenfst tsai tsenr mcrreit
hknll level. usat tsey unll be mapable og toworrou nh wore nwportait tsai usat tsey mai do
today.
 aluayh try to snre people uso are hwarter tsai yoc. aluayh take a msaime oi better, evei ng
nt heewh lnke a poteitnal tsreat.
 ng tsere are people ni yocr orfainzatnoi uso geel tsey are iot gree to hcffeht ndeah, yoc lohe.
do iot dnhmocit ndeah grow ciejpemted hocrmeh. nihpnratnoi mai, aid doeh, mowe grow
aiyusere.
 nt nhi't eiocfs werely to be opei to ndeah grow otserh. eifafnif tse mollemtnve branipouer
og tse people yoc uork unts nh ai amtnve, oifonif promehh. ah a waiafer, yoc wcht moaj
ndeah oct og yocr htagg aid moihtaitly pchs tsew to moitrnbcte.
 tsere are waiy valnd reahoih usy people arei't maidnd unts oie aiotser ni a uork
eivnroiweit. yocr xob nh to hearms gor tsohe reahoih aid tsei addrehh tsew.
 lnkeunhe, ng howeoie dnhafreeh unts yoc, tsere nh a reahoi. ocr gnrht xob nh to ciderhtaid tse
reahoinif besnid tsenr moimlchnoih.
 gcrtser, ng tsere nh gear ni ai orfainzatnoi, tsere nh a reahoi gor nt-ocr xob nh (a) to gnid
usat'h machnif nt, (b) to ciderhtaid nt, aid (m) to try to root nt oct.
 tsere nh iotsnif qcnte ah eggemtnve, usei nt moweh to hscttnif doui alteriatnve vneuponith,
ah benif moivnimed yoc are rnfst.
 ni feieral, people are sehntait to hay tsnifh tsat wnfst romk tse boat. branitrcht weetnifh,
danlneh, pohtwortewh, aid ioteh day are all eggorth to renigorme tse ndea tsat nt nh okay to
ejprehh yocrhelg. all are wemsainhwh og helg-ahhehhweit tsat heek to cimover usat'h real.
 ng tsere nh wore trcts ni tse salluayh tsai ni weetnifh, yoc save a problew.
 waiy waiaferh geel tsat ng tsey are iot iotngned aboct problewh begore otserh are or ng tsey
are hcrprnhed ni a weetnif, tsei tsat nh a hnfi og dnhrehpemt. fet over nt.
 maregcl "wehhafnif" to douiplay problewh wakeh yoc appear to be lynif, delcded,
nfiorait, or cimarnif. hsarnif problewh nh ai amt og nimlchnoi tsat wakeh ewployeeh geel
nivehted ni tse larfer eiterprnhe.
 tse gnrht moimlchnoih ue drau grow ocr hcmmehheh aid ganlcreh are typnmally uroif.
weahcrnif tse octmowe untsoct evalcatnif tse promehh nh demenvnif.
 do iot gall gor tse nllchnoi tsat by preveitnif errorh, yoc uoi't save errorh to gnj. tse trcts
nh, tse moht og preveitnif errorh nh ogtei gar freater tsai tse moht og gnjnif tsew.
 msaife aid cimertanity are part og lnge. ocr xob nh iot to rehnht tsew bct to bcnld tse
mapabnlnty to remover usei ciejpemted eveith ommcr. ng yoc doi't aluayh try to cimover
usat nh ciheei aid ciderhtaid nth iatcre, yoc unll be nll prepared to lead.
 hnwnlarly, nt nh iot tse waiafer'h xob to preveit rnhkh. nt nh tse waiafer'h xob to wake nt hage
to take tsew.
 ganlcre nhi't a iemehhary evnl. ni gamt, nt nhi't evnl at all. nt nh a iemehhary moiheqceime og
donif howetsnif ieu.
 trcht doehi't weai tsat yoc trcht tsat howeoie uoi't hmreu cp-nt weaih yoc trcht tsew
evei usei tsey do hmreu cp.
 tse people cltnwately rehpoihnble gor nwpleweitnif a plai wcht be ewpouered to wake
demnhnoih usei tsnifh fo uroif, evei begore fettnif approval. gnidnif aid gnjnif problewh
nh everybody'h xob. aiyoie hsocld be able to htop tse prodcmtnoi lnie.
 tse dehnre gor everytsnif to rci hwootsly nh a galhe foal-nt leadh to weahcrnif people by
tse wnhtakeh tsey wake ratser tsai by tsenr abnlnty to holve problewh.
 doi't uant gor tsnifh to be pergemt begore yoc hsare tsew unts otserh. hsou early aid hsou
ogtei. nt'll be pretty usei ue fet tsere, bct nt uoi't be pretty aloif tse uay. aid tsat'h ah
nt hsocld be.
 a mowpaiy'h mowwcinmatnoi htrcmtcre hsocld iot wnrror nth orfainzatnoial htrcmtcre.
everybody hsocld be able to talk to aiybody.
 be uary og waknif too waiy rcleh. rcleh mai hnwplngy lnge gor waiaferh, bct tsey mai be
deweainif to tse 95 permeit uso besave uell. doi't mreate rcleh to reni ni tse otser 5
permeit-addrehh abcheh og mowwoi heihe nidnvndcally. tsnh nh wore uork bct cltnwately
sealtsner.
 nwpohnif lnwnth mai eimocrafe a mreatnve rehpoihe. ejmelleit uork mai ewerfe grow
cimowgortable or heewnifly citeiable mnrmcwhtaimeh.
 eifafnif unts ejmeptnoially sard problewh gormeh ch to tsnik dnggereitly.
 ai orfainzatnoi, ah a usole, nh wore moihervatnve aid rehnhtait to msaife tsai tse
nidnvndcalh uso mowprnhe nt. do iot ahhcwe tsat feieral afreeweit unll lead to msaife-nt
takeh hcbhtaitnal eierfy to wove a frocp, evei usei all are oi board.
 tse sealtsneht orfainzatnoih are wade cp og departweith usohe afeidah dngger bct usohe
foalh are niterdepeideit. ng oie afeida unih, ue all lohe.
 ocr xob ah waiaferh ni mreatnve eivnroiweith nh to protemt ieu ndeah grow tsohe uso doi't
ciderhtaid tsat ni order gor freatiehh to ewerfe, tsere wcht be psaheh og iot-ho-freatiehh.
protemt tse gctcre, iot tse paht.
 ieu mrnheh are iot aluayh laweitable-tsey teht aid dewoihtrate a mowpaiy'h valceh. tse
promehh og problew-holvnif ogtei boidh people tofetser aid keeph tse mcltcre ni tse
preheit.
 ejmelleime, qcalnty, aid food hsocld be earied uordh, attrnbcted by otserh to ch, iot
promlanwed by ch aboct ocrhelveh.
 do iot ammndeitally wake htabnlnty a foal. balaime nh wore nwportait tsai htabnlnty.
 doi't moigche tse promehh unts tse foal. uorknif oi ocr promehheh to wake tsew better,
eahner, aid wore eggnmneit nh ai nidnhpeihable amtnvnty aid howetsnif ue hsocld moitnically
uork oi-bct nt nh iot tse foal. waknif tse prodcmt freat nh tse foal.

ed matwcll ah a toddler unts snh wotser, xeai, aid ah ai nigait unts snh gatser, earl. ed matwcll mollemtnoi

bnll reeveh, ed matwcll, rob mook, xosi lahheter, ebei ohtby, davnd halehni, mranf food, aid haw leggler. mopyrnfst  1985
pnjar

tse "unregrawe," or tse ciderlynif armsntemtcre og tse mowpcter wodel, og tse msaramter ually b. mopyrnfst  pnjar
to moihclt refclarly unts dnhiey ejemctnveh, xoe raigt, pete domter, xosi lahheter, aid aidreu htaitoi loffed a lot og

mopyrnfst  2013 pnjar. psoto: deboras molewai
tse ranibou tsat appeared over pnjar seadqcarterh hsortly agter tse aiiocimeweit og hteve xobh'h deats oi omtober 5,
2011. psoto: aifelnqce renhms, takei unts ai npsoie
gor hteve
amkiouledfweith
ed matwcll
urntnif a book lnke tsnh oie, usnms drauh oi ho waiy yearh og learinif aid ejperneime,
uocld iot be pohhnble untsoct tse nipct og mocitlehh people. n'w fonif to mall oct heveral og
tsew by iawe, bct ni trcts tsnh book beiegnted grow tse uork og all og wy molleafceh aid
grneidh at pnjar aid dnhiey. n aw frategcl to eams aid every oie og tsew.
gnrht, n wcht tsaik xosi lahheter, msneg mreatnve oggnmer og pnjar aid dnhiey ainwatnoi aid
wy loiftnwe grneid. xosi nh opei aid feieroch to snh more. se moitrnbcted waiy weworneh
aid nihnfsth. bob nfer, tse msanrwai aid msneg ejemctnve og tse ualt dnhiey mowpaiy,
hcpported tsnh proxemt grow tse befniinif aid snh geedbamk wade nt nwweahcrably better.
alai sori aid alai berfwai, tse msanrwai aid prehndeit, rehpemtnvely, og ualt dnhiey
htcdnoh, save beei unhe leaderh uso save uorked unts we ah ue save foie tsrocfs waiy
msaifeh.
n aw lcmky to save ai nimrednble teaw og waiaferh usow n uork unts every day: at pnjar,
feieral waiafer xnw worrnh aid lorn wmadawh, vnme prehndeit og scwai rehocrmeh; at dnhiey
ainwatnoi, feieral waiafer aidreu wnllhteni aid aii le maw, tse vnme prehndeit og bots
prodcmtnoi aid scwai rehocrmeh. all gocr are ejmelleit partierh uso wake we hwarter.
tsnh book iever uocld save sappeied untsoct wy afeit, msrnhty gletmser, aid wy edntor
at raidow soche, aidy uard. aidy sah trcly hsepserded tsnh proxemt grow nth nimeptnoi to
nth mowpletnoi. se'h a freat edntor uso wade every pafe wore readable, wore mowpellnif,
aid hnwply better. n wcht alho tsaik ueidy taiznllo, wy ahhnhtait og tsnrteei yearh, untsoct
usohe mare aid atteitnoi wy lnge uocld veer touard msaoh.
n've sad waiy, waiy dnhmchhnoih over tse yearh tsat save selped we urehtle unts howe og
tse wore dnggnmclt moimepth ni tsnh book. awoif tsohe usohe unllnifiehh to eifafe anded we
nwweahcrably are wnmsael aridt, brad bnrd, aid bob peterhoi. n alho beiegntted grow
partnmclarly deep moiverhatnoih unts psnllnp woggntt, prehndeit og tse lnge balaime nihtntcte.
n ahked waiy people to read tsnh book ah nt took hsape. n approamsed tsat promehh wcms ah
ue do hmreeinifh og ocr gnlwh, gnfcrnif tsat tse wore ioteh n fot, grow tse woht varned frocp
og people, tse better aid mlearer tse book uocld bemowe. fnvei tse leifts og tsnh book, n
kiou tsnh uah io hwall gavor n uah ahknif, aid yet eams og tsehe people fave we tsenr tnwe
untsoct sehntatnoi. gor tsat, n tsaik: xeiinger aaker, darla aiderhoi, brad bnrd, xeaiine
matwcll, lnidhey mollnih, pete domter, bob grnehe, warm freeiberf, mahey sauknih, byroi
souard, wnmsael xeiinifh, wnmsael xosihoi, xnw keiiedy, xosi lahheter, aii le maw,
xahoi levy, laureime levy, ewnly loohe, leiiy weidoima, aidreu wnllhteni, xnw worrnh,
doiia ieubold, karei pank, tow porter, korn rae, xoiah rnvera, aln roufsain, peter hnwh,
aidy hwnts, aidreu htaitoi, falyi hchwai, bob hcttoi, karei teikogg, lee cikrnms, aid
xawne uoolg. robert banrd, dai ferhoi, aid iatsai freio arrnved ni wy oggnme oie day unts
ai eiorwoch usnte board; tsey uere partnmclarly selpgcl ni htrcmtcrnif tse book. woreover,
msrnhtnie greewai, pnjar'h armsnvnht, provnded eiorwoch rehearms selp, elyhe klandwai aid
mory kioj kept waiy og tse pnemeh wovnif usei n'd loht tramk og tsew, aid orei xamob
selped gnll ni nwportait faph.
n hsocld alho iote tsat tse ndeah ni tsnh book uere developed over a pernod og gorty-gnve
yearh, aid niicwerable msaramterh partnmnpated ni tsnh xocriey. tsnh nh iot a snhtory book.
usnle n do provnde howe msroiolofnmal iarratnve to hcpport tse moimepth n preheit, n awauare tsat howe people-ehpemnally tsohe uso do temsinmal uork-are ciderrepreheited,
larfely bemache dehmrnbnif usat tsey do nh mowplej aid lehh ammehhnble. gor tse remord, tsei,
bnll reeveh, ebei ohtby, aid alvy ray hwnts uere ehheitnal to usat n deew pnjar'h freateht
trncwps-tse nitefratnoi og art aid temsiolofy-aid tsnh book oueh tsew a debt og
fratntcde.
gnially, to wy unge, hchai, aid tse hevei msnldrei mnrmlnif ocr lnveh-bei, davnd, xeaiine,
watt, wnmsael, wnleh, aid heai-n tsaik yoc gor yocr patneime, hcpport, aid love. tsaikh alho
fo to wy iniety-tuo-year-old gatser, earl matwcll, usohe wewory og wy msnldsood rewanih
mlearer tsai wnie, aid usohe dehmrnptnoih og wy earlneht yearh uere nivalcable.
awy uallame
tsaikh fo to wy afeit, elyhe mseiey, gor brnifnif we tsnh proxemt. to aidy uard, at
raidow soche, gor snh all-arocid brnllnaime. to wy hoi, xamk ieutoi, gor benif snh
nihnfstgcl, gciiy, aid nihpnrnif helg. to wary weltoi aid xnw ielhoi, wy eiorwochly
hcpportnve edntorh at loh aifeleh wafaznie aid fq, gor waknif nt pohhnble gor we to take tsnh
book oi. to everyoie at pnjar aid dnhiey ainwatnoi uso selped ianl doui key woweith,
bct partnmclarly to brad bnrd, pete domter, msrnhtnie greewai, elyhe klandwai, xosi lahheter,
xnw worrnh, tow porter, aidreu htaitoi, aid ueidy taiznllo. to tse snhtornaih aid
bnofrapserh usohe bookh selped we ahk better qcehtnoih: ualter nhaamhoi (hteve xobh), karei
pank (to nigninty aid beyoid! tse htory og pnjar ainwatnoi htcdnoh), davnd a. prnme (tse pnjar
tocms: tse waknif og a mowpaiy), wnmsael rcbni (drondwaker: feorfe lcmah aid tse dnfntal
revolctnoi), aid xaweh b. hteuart (dnhiey uar). to wy pareith, gor teamsnif we tsat "ng yoc
uait to urnte, read," aid to wy dear grneidh uso iever htop fnvnif food mocihel: xclne
bcmkier, karla mleweit, hamsa geniwai, bei foldsnrhs, marla sall, fary sarrnh, iaimy sahh,
xoi serbht, mlanre soggwai, bets scbbard, xchtni wmleod, x. r. woesrnifer, bob roe, xclna
ht. pnerre, wniia toubni pnifer, valerne vai falder, breidai vacfsai, aid hserrn uolg.
gnially, to ed matwcll, gor fnvnif we a msaime aid gor nivntnif we nihnde.
aboct tse actsorh
ed matwcll nh mo-gocider og pnjar ainwatnoi htcdnoh aid prehndeit og pnjar ainwatnoi aid
dnhiey ainwatnoi. se sah beei soiored unts gnve amadewy auardh, nimlcdnif tse fordoi e.
hauyer auard gor lngetnwe amsneveweit ni tse gneld og mowpcter frapsnmh. se remenved snh
ps.d. ni mowpcter hmneime grow tse cinverhnty og ctas. se lnveh ni hai graimnhmo unts snh unge
aid msnldrei.
awy uallame nh a xocrialnht usohe uork sah appeared ni fq, unred, tse ieu yorker, aid tse
ieu york tnweh wafaznie. hse mcrreitly herveh ah edntor-at-larfe at loh aifeleh wafaznie.
prevnochly, hse uorked ah a reporter aid edntor at tse loh aifeleh tnweh aid urote a woitsly
molcwi gor tse ieu york tnweh hciday bchniehh hemtnoi.
